links_reviews_title: Make this a summer wardrobe staple!
links_reviews_text: I've rented this a few times and I wear it for work, for fun social nights, and just recently wore it to a luau in Hawaii. It's one of my fave warm weather rentals. It's a gorgeous dress that has great material (not stretchy/clingy) but is light weight. I've lost about 10 pounds since I last rented it and the same size works because it's a wrap. The only potential con: the wrap part is a string, so if you want to tie the dress tight, it can be a bit uncomfortable. I'll keep renting this again!
A bit big for my petite stature but still made it work, tied it as tight as I could.

This dress was absolutely amazing! The flow was so fun and I got so many compliments. I recently had a baby and am below my pre pregnancy weight yet nothing fits. I ordered this in my pre pregnancy size and actually needed to go down a size! The bust was large, despite my large chest size. I tried to safety pin it shut but ultimately just put a cami on underneath so I would stop messing with it. The wrap was so great for my body shape and was not as hard to tie as many have said. The trick is there's a hole for the string on the right side of the dress. Would definitely rent this style/brand again!

links_reviews_title: Wrap dresses are always flattering but this one is better
links_reviews_text: I love the bright colors and style. The dress is flowy but still structured with quality fabric. The sleeves are probably my favorite part. They have a lot of movement and bounce. I did end up pinning this because it was a bit too low cut for work.
Would recommend a bralette underneath or lots of garment tape
I wore this in the Philippines. It was perfect for the warm weather and the print and color is gorgeous. TTS and very easy to wear.

This dress was better than expected. I wore for a birthday cruise and it was perfect. It was comfortable, flowy and the colors are beautiful in person. I went a size up because I am busty and because it was a wrap I was able to make it work although it was a little big.

This is a beautiful flowy dress and I may have received more compliments on it than and other RTR dress to date. I did wear something under it for work and it was almost too long for me. I had to wear platform heels to keep it from dragging. Gorgeous overall!

links_reviews_title: I got so many compliments in this dress
links_reviews_text: Amazing fabrics and amazing feeling in the dress

links_reviews_title: Wrap dress is beautiful!! Fit perfectly and love the material.
links_reviews_text: Love love love!! Perfect fit!!

links_reviews_title: Top notch, wrap around dress with great pattern, sleeves and length.
links_reviews_text: The wrap around tie sat nicely at my bra line, making for a very flattering fit. The length ensured it was flowy and the slit was never a challenge, even while dancing. I 100% would rent this dress again for another wedding.
This is the first wrap dress that I have worn in awhile that I felt was very flattering. It flows nicely and was very comfortable.
This dress is perfect for a summer evening! The fabric is soft and silky. It's comfy and glamorous. Love it!

This is a lovely dress for summer parties and galas, but doesn't look quite like the photos. There were not pleats. That's ok. I think it's better without them! The dress runs large. I had a tough time getting it as fitted as I wanted. Good thing it's flowy. The bust was also tricky. I wore this to work and felt like I was exposing myself all day. Later that night I switched undergarments and embraced it and it felt better. I love that I could wear two inch heels with this and not have it hit the ground. Order this and enjoy. It's beautiful.

links_reviews_title: So comfy! Slipped this on after a long day in the OR- fabric feels amazing. Compliments all night!
links_reviews_text: Long in the back for me, I'm 5'5" and wore 3" sandals.
Beautiful print, I received many compliments
Wore this for my rehearsal dinner and enjoyed it a lot.

links_reviews_title: Love the dress! Loose fitting at the top but so flowy and fun.

links_reviews_text: Went with the suggested size and probably going have sized down but it was true to sizing and still fit well
This dress fit perfect.
Super fun dress print, but I had to pair with a cami to wear out. I'm an old navy 12-14 kind of girl, so of course my size on these sites are a 16+, but even so, the XXLR barely fit.

I got so many compliments on this dress! It was also super comfortable and all I had to do was wear a camisole and pin the dress closed to make it modest. The only thing is that trying to tie it shut was a nightmare. It made no sense and I ended up probably doing it wrong with the help of a few safety pins. This dress would be ideal if I could take it to a tailor to make the wrap more user-friendly.
Not a fan of a wrap dress w bigger boobs. And a tiny bit of wind and you'd flash everyone.

links_reviews_title: Great Style, Should Have Worn a Tank Underneath
links_reviews_text: Stunning dress but require lots of tugging/adjustment to keep the wrap closed. Didn't want to wear a tank underneath but should have.

links_reviews_title: It is so light that on a super hot day for an outdoor party, it was perfect! Incredibly flattering.
links_reviews_text: Long in back so need to wear with shoes with a little height but totally worked. Love love this dress!
I read the reviews before renting and echo what others said - be careful with the opening when a breeze comes, and i required a cami. But fun dress for a day at work, loved the flowiness :).
Beautiful pattern!! Bodice was too small for my bust. Tried to embrace the no bra look, but not enough structure to cup the girls.
Absolutely love this dress...the bright colors, the length, and the airy feel. Received many compliments.

links_reviews_title: Didn't wear- to much fabric for shorter person.
links_reviews_text: color is great, fun pattern, it could be cute on a taller person. As a 5'4" person, it was just too big all around. Too much fabric on the bottom which just made me look huge. couldn't tie it up or anything so I had to return.

links_reviews_title: Watching an old friend get married.
links_reviews_text: This dress was almost impossible to figure out how to get it to tie. If you do rent it make sure you don't untie it and put it on that way because you will never get it re-tied the right way.

links_reviews_title: Wedding on a boat in Newport Beach
links_reviews_text: Print is beautiful and vibrant - skirt length was perfect with 3" heels (I'm 5'5). Just wish the tie would have been placed a little lower on the dress.

The print and colors are amazing! Be aware that this is a true wrap dress. I got lots of compliments. It is super low cut, so I had to wear a camisole underneath. If you choose to go without, you might want to use fashion tape. The dress was also a bit too long for me in the back. If you wear heels, that fixes the issue though. This was my first time renting a Hutch dress, but it certainly won't be my last!
Pros: Nice material, beautiful print. Lots of compliments at work! Cons: Needed safety pin to pin top together.

links_reviews_title: Lots of compliments. Had to wear a cami as top was huge
links_reviews_text: Top was large

links_reviews_title: loved the feminine feel of the dress
links_reviews_text: perfect fit, very long, needed heels to not trip on stairs

I liked this dress a lot, very comfortable and easy, fit true to size. The cleavage is good and at times was a little more but nothing that wasn't manageable to fix. If I had double sided tape it would have been an easy fix
This cute wrap dress runs very small. I even sized up but it still didn't fit. Also very long for a short girl. It dragged the ground in back. I had to return unworn. Sad face!
Top was a little big, 36b. Beautiful print!

links_reviews_title: So beautiful and elegant. Perfect for a summer wedding.
links_reviews_text: Deep V in front. I had to wear a lace tank.
Nice wrap dress, needed a tank top, not good for a windy day
Absolutely love this skirt!! It made me feel so fun and flirty. It was so flattering on and paired perfectly with a bodysuit and heels for Valentine's date night.

links_reviews_title: Loved it! Statement skirt that I got compliments on all night
links_reviews_text: Loved it and can't wait to rent it in the blue/purple colors. Got lots of compliments and felt like a million bucks. Fits true to size.

links_reviews_title: Perfect for a day in NYC!
links_reviews_text: On the longer side so it worked for me since I'm 5'8, wore for brunch party and a full day in NYC. Got sooo many compliments! Paired with maroon a leather jacket also from rtr

This skirt is drop dead gorgeous. I've gotten so many compliments on this skirt and the way I styled it for my family holiday pictures that I'm actually going to purchase it. It's a bold piece. A big fashion statement. Rent it, and you'll never want to send it back.

I loved this skirt. It‚Äôs so fun, and the compliments came rolling in all evening - on the street, at the event, from all the people I texted pictures to so they could see how kicka** my outfit was. Wore with the Samantha Sipos ribbed biker jacket in raisin. (Also available from Unlimited.) In retrospect, I probably would have gotten the skirt in a small as it wouldn't have been quite so snug around my waist. Definitely the kind of piece you want to rent and not own, b/c it is super memorable.

I've been eyeing this skirt for so long, and when my friend decided to throw a Robyn themed party, I knew it was the right moment. I absolutely love this skirt. It was so much fun to wear and totally perfect for dancing in. I honestly felt like everyone at the party had something to say about this great skirt. I hope to rent the blue one soon too!
This skirt was so much fun to wear. Lots of compliments on this skirt, it's so eye catching. I wore it for a Halloween office party and it was perfect.

links_reviews_title: Iridescent, luminous, and compliments all night!
links_reviews_text: I rented this for a gala, the theme of which was "iridescent." It was perfect. It is super comfortable and swishes beautifully when you move/twirl. It is about tea length. I want to wear again! The only weird part of the dress is that the panels are not continuous all around, so there is about an inch of the nude, inner layer that shows when you bend down.

Loved this fun skirt! Wore for an outdoor fundraiser where the theme was Mojitos and salsa. I'm typically a size 2, but only the Medium was available in this color. I also rented the small in the blue/purple tone version of this skirt and it was a perfect fit. I made the Med work with this one though bc I loved the fun colors. #standout

I wore this for a wedding. On my way to the wedding, I had to drop off another RTR order at the UPS store. No lie, I got 4 separate compliments on my way from the car to the store. It's a real head turner. I love that it's so beautiful, but comfortable. I was able to dance all night. It is a little longer and sits higher than I thought.
Wore this for a party that I hosted for my birthday! The party was outside and the skirt shined beautifully. Non stop complements all day! Felt super special and was pretty comfortable the whole day!

links_reviews_title: It's will wow you and everyone else
links_reviews_text: I loved this SKIRT!!! I wore it to the Ros√® Mansion and aside from it being the perfect color scheme, I could hardly walk through the rooms without being stopped for compliments. The skirt was super comfortable and light weight and I love loved the colors. I can't say one bad thing about it.
Absolutely loved this skirt! I felt like a million bucks! Multiple people stopped me on the street to ask where it was from. It fit true to size!

links_reviews_title: I was intimidated by this skirt when I first received it but it ended up being so fun.
links_reviews_text: Medium fit slightly snug as a size 8, but it made me keep my posture up. Has great movement. A little hard to style, seemed to work best with a crop top.
Runs a bit tight, but peefect to dress up or down

links_reviews_title: Fun and festive. I stood out!
links_reviews_text: I got a ton of compliments and felt so comfortable in it! American Apparel body suit for the top!

links_reviews_title: Everyone told me to keep it!
links_reviews_text: The skirt was a show stopper for a color-themed luncheon. I had strangers come up to me all day asking where I got it, and once I said RTR they told me I had to keep it. I probably would have but the waist is a little tight. I was expecting to wear a fitted shirt tucked in but the skirt gave me a little muffin top and I decided to go with a looser shirt.

links_reviews_title: Fun, shiny skirt that grabs everyone's attention!
links_reviews_text: I wore this on a date and had a great time! Several people at the restaurant commented on how fun and pretty the skirt was and a waitress (not ours, but one who liked the skirt) was surprised about how affordable it was to rent.

links_reviews_title: Sooo many compliments. Total show stealer.
links_reviews_text: Fit great. More comfortable than it looks.
Beautiful skirt, lots of compliments!

links_reviews_title: So cute I didn't want to return it!!!
links_reviews_text: This skirt definitely fits slightly big, usually I'm a medium but the small fit perfectly. It's such a unique beautiful design. I got compliments all night long! I was so sad I had to return it, such a beautiful skirt that will give you the best outfit of the night!

This skirt is BOLD and SHINY (not for everyone!) but amazing. I had the bride approve it given how much of a statement it makes. Some reviews said the skirt runs small, but I did not find that. I am a 4 (right now) and the small fit great, though it did sit high on my waist though (which is what I wanted!). I am short -- the skirt was almost tea-length on me.

I love this piece and was flooded with compliments when I recently wore it for my birthday! I paired it with a simple tank, then graphic tee, then Nike sweatshirt to warm up, and it was comfy and easy and SO glam! However, I'll say that it fit me perfectly at the waist, which makes me think it runs small. I am slender and xs items are often a bit loose on me, but this was just right. Had I tried to pull it down to wear at hips it would have been too tight. If looking for backup size, size up! A def must-rent; just make sure to take lots of pics!
This is THE skirt. Rented for vacay in Miami! A little tighter at the waist than I would have liked. Ruffles are light and fun!
The clasp on the back of the skirt is a little delicate.
Perfect fit. Tried several tops with it. That was the hard part. But amazing. Got so many compliments and turned tons of heads
Obsessed with the colors of that skirt It looks like a million bucks
This skirt was one of my favorite things I've ever ordered. It is so colorful and the ruffles bouncy when you walk. Received so many compliments and will definitely order again in the future.

links_reviews_title: I love the colors and the layers. It was a great fit!
links_reviews_text: The waste was pretty true to size so make sure you pick what size you are. It was a hit and loved the overall appearance of the skirt!

Wore this skirt to a brunch during Mardi Gras and it was a huge crowd pleaser! Super eye catching and got so many compliments! Someone described it was a "Party in a skirt". I'm a size 8 and usually wear a medium, but got the large to be safe and it fit great.

I wore this skirt for my engagement pictures and it was amazing. It has great movement and stood out without much effort. I would highly recommend this item/wear it again. It runs a bit small so I recommend getting one size up
The skirt fit perfectly. I would say it fits true to size. I loved it and would rent again. Maybe in the other color combo.

links_reviews_title: I wore this to my internship at Prabal Gurung.
links_reviews_text: I loved this skirt it fit true to size and I got so many compliments! It was a little too cold for the weather however but I wore it to my internship and thought it was perfect! I paired it with a basic white tee to dress it down and a leather jacket.
Wore this to a baby shower. The compliments kept on coming. Has no stretch but it's a very forgiving skirt. Be careful, you'll be a standout so you must be comfortable with all eyes on you!
Paired with low v leotard, blazer and knee high boots. One of my best combos ever. Huge attention grabber!

Worn for my friends sex and the city themed bridal shower. Got so many compliments! Both small and medium fit me, but with medium there was no chance of seeing the nude colored under skirt in the back. I vary between small and medium.

The size small was a little snug l so I went with the medium (I wear a size 4 normally) which ended up being perfect. The skirt is very comfortable. I had a hard time finding the perfect top to wear with this. Everything felt a little boxy with it. I ended up wearing a black velvet crop top with it. Length was good, and I received SO MANY compliments. This skirt brought on lots of attention!

The skirt was beautiful! I wore it for a Mardi Gras themed luncheon. I was worried that the skirt was going to be heavy, but it was very light. I have a fairly small waist and the extra small fits perfectly. I would rent again.
This dress is beautiful! The fabric is thick and covers all lumps and bumps. So flattering!
5'9" and wore 3" heels length was perfect with long version. Thicker material but in my opinion is flattering. I got compliments all night long. Comfy.

links_reviews_title: quarantined at home - helped to dress up fancy!
links_reviews_text: it's a thick material, think wetsuit. BIG ruffles. Was fun, but probably wouldn't actually wear it in public.

This dress was an absolute showstopper! The red is so vibrant. The only reason I did not give a full five stars was the zipper is difficult the last 4-5 inches( you will definitely need help) and it's only because the material is thick and I have a large chest. Otherwise, you will feel like a million bucks in this dress! P

I was afraid the 2 would be too big but it fit like a glove. I'm 5'6 110 lbs. This dress was a showstopper I couldn't have been any happier. I wish I could buy this dress! Also loved the customer service, I was able to change the delivery to my hotel and send it back easily. Thank you RTR for making this event amazing!

This dress was beautiful! I usually don't wear red, but this dress was worth the exception. The material is thick and comfortable but does hide any lump or bump so good undergarments seems a must. I wore it off my shoulders for a less poofy effect. I'm large busted 34 DD so it was a bit snug up top and I'm smaller in the hips size 2 jeans and the hips were a little too large, so a perfect dress for someone who is bottom dominant let's call it. I was unsure about renting this but am happy I did

Got complimented all evening and felt fantastic! Was sad sending it back. Glad I had a few options of Spanx to choose from because the lace seam showed thru on one slip. Did it need a bra with it (36c) Was very warm to dance in, but also super fun. Pair with a nice shoe and go easy on jewelry - let this dress do all the talking!
I felt ultra glam all night. The color is gorgeous & the material is thick. The dress is well constructed & very dramatic. I wore a shorter block heel & the length was perfect.
10/10 dress all around. It fit perfectly and was definitely an all-time favorite. Thick material, great color, gorgeous cut.

Loved this dress! Received so many compliments. I normally wear a size 8 but had a 10 in this because my back and shoulders are broad. The fabric is forgiving and the spandex in makes it easy to tug to zip. This dress made me feel like I was on the red carpet at the Oscars! Would definitely rent again!
This dress was very comfortable and forgiving. I felt great and felt like a dancing emoji in this red dress. I will definitely order it again. If you are curvy I would suggest sizing up.
I wore this for a Havana Nights themed Gala and it was a stunner
Perfect fit. Great cleavage, flattering fit. Knick our dress for a gala.

links_reviews_title: The process was super easy & the dress looked exactly like I thought it would!
links_reviews_text: The material was very forgiving - it didn't hold any wrinkles and felt so comfortable. I chose the size 20, which is typically what I would wear because I have a larger midline. The top was slightly loose but a very good trade off for such comfort in the waist. I would order this dress over and over! I felt like I stood out, it was a pleasure to receive more compliments & feel more beautiful than I expected to!
Very comfy dress easy to wear, needs low cut strapless bra or no bra, I got tons of compliments in this dress.

This dress is gorgeous and comfortable! Fits like a glove just make sure if you have any little rolls or a pooch you use some kind of spanx as the material shows every ripple. But really a beautiful dress!
Need to wear spanx with it unless your stomach is super flat

Loved the scuba material, sucked you in all the right places! I'm 5'2 and it was a little long but I wore a 3 1/2 inch heel and it was perfect. It does show quite a bit of your d√©colletage but you can wear a regular bra, no strapless needed. Wonderful rental and I received numerous compliments all night long!
I got so many compliments on this dress! I am 156 lbs and ordered a size 10...it was a little big on me at the shoulders but because I have a big butt and hips the bottom fit just fine.

links_reviews_title: I looked like the red dress emoji woman
links_reviews_text: I wore this dress to Mariah's Christmas show in Vegas, so basically the best moment of my life. As you can see in all of the reviews, the neoprene fabric makes curves look killer. I felt like a million dollars and looked like even more than that. It's low cut on top and high-slitted on the bottom BUT not so high-slitted that you can't get away with Spanx. Not that you need them...The neoprene is smoothing and supportive. I can't recommend this dress enough.
I felt so glamorous in this gorgeous red dress! I received SO many compliments!

I am normally a 12, but also requested a size 14. Long story short...the 14 was to big on the top, so I decided to were the size 12, which fit perfect in the bust (albeit a little snug in the tummy). I received numerous compliments and felt really great in it.
This brand runs small so go up one size. Great for plus sized ladies as it's thick, structured, stretchy, and forgiving. So comfortable. The long length was necessary for me at 5'11".
I wore this for a wedding and it was a big hit. I got a ton of compliments and am debating on purchasing.

I was sent this dress as my original request became unavailable (prior renter did not return in time they said) and turned out I loved it! Got many compliments. Does have a little stretch to it. I'm 5'6 120 lbs and wore a zero, fit perfectly!
I was so nervous because I had never worn this designer before. Omg I was so ready for the red carpet entrance. I received so many compliments the entire night.

Loved! Loved! Loved this dress I ordered both the 8 and the 6 and they both fit comfortably. I chose to wear the 6 which wasn't snug, just fit and showed off my curves more. The sizes almost felt the same on. Sooo many compliments.

This dress was everything I wanted it to be and more. I ended up wearing the 6L (as they were out of the 6R), my alternate size was 4R and it also fit but was a little more snug. I felt more comfortable in the 6 which is my regular size, the length was not a problem with a heel. The fabric was neoprenelike, as other people mentioned, I didn't mind it at all. Just a beautiful and fun to wear dress!!!

links_reviews_title: Gorgeous debut for a jazz concert
links_reviews_text: I recently sang in a jazz concert and rented this dress for stage presence. It certainly delivered!! Loved, loved, loved.

This dress fits so well! It might be a touch on the small side. I weigh around 165 and 5'4. The weight of the dress helps smooth everything out so beautiful and the flow of it when you walk is awesome! I was stopped all night long to compliment this dress!! Seriously beautiful!!!

This dress was an absolute stunner! The cut, the fit, the style are all impeccable. As a top heavy woman, I did not have to wear a bra with this dress... it fit perfectly. My only advice is to wait a while after you shower before putting it on... Even if you dry yourself pretty well, your skin still holds moisture and makes it a bit difficult for the dress to slide on. Besides that, I recommend this dress fully & wholeheartedly!

links_reviews_title: The dress is gorgeous, you will stand out in this dress. It's a showstopper
links_reviews_text: The dress fit my hourglass body perfectly. If you plan to wear shapewear this dress will show it. I ended up going with panyhose with the toes out for the smooth look I wanted and was happy with the overall look.

I pulled the sleeves down on this fabulous gown for a more sultry off-the-shoulder look. The thick material is forgiving, and highlights the curves. And not to fear fellow petite ladies: I'm 5'2" and wore 4" heels and it just grazed the ground.

links_reviews_title: So many compliments on the dress!
links_reviews_text: Went with the long because with my heels I was 6'2. The 16 was a little big, but still hugged my curves perfectly. Definitely wear shapewear if your curvy. Easy to move around in, bending and dancing. Great color and fabric wasnt too heavy for a September night in NC. Would definitely wear again!
This dress made me feel super glamorous. It was long and flowy and the color made my skin pop. I got compliments all night!!

links_reviews_title: This dress was absolutely FABULOUS! My only complaint is the dress arrived VERY WRINKLED!
links_reviews_text: I rented this for a black tie optional wedding and it was so comfortable and beautiful; the BEST of both worlds in my dress dreams. I would say this dress runs on the large size. I am an hourglass shape-ish, smaller on the top now since breast feeding. I usually wear a size 4 if the dress is not form fitting on the bottom (ex. empire waist), or size 6 if I need to accommodate my hips and bum. Although this dress is clearly form fitting, it just runs large and the 4L ended up being the perfect fit for me. I read in advance that some people did not prefer the thicker/stretchy, almost foam-like fabric, but I LOVED it!! The fabric was thick enough to hide any small lump/bums, forgiving enough to allow me to chow down on the the delicious meal and cake that was served without feeling constricted, and comfy enough to be able to bust a move on the dance floor. I am also generally cold nature, so it kept me the perfect temp for this indoor wedding! I got so many compliments on this dress, but my favorite of all was that I looked like a real-life stunning version of the red-dress dancing emoji woman, ha! üíÉüèª Again, my only COMPLAINT about this dress is that arrived so wrinkled; this was a BIG disappointment because not only do I feel like this is not acceptable for this type of service where the dress should arrive dry-cleaned and pressed, but I truly hate ironing. This completely ruined the convenience factor for me by adding a time consuming chore to my "to-do" list. I believe RTR should take more care in how they ship certain fabrics;I am hoping this was a result of the shipping process and not how it left the warehouse, but either way the responsibility lies with RTR to package appropriately and prevent these types of issues. Since convenience is key for me, I must admit I am slightly hesitant about the condition of any future arrivals and giving the overall experience 4/5 and the dress 5/5!

I truly felt like Pretty Woman, because I added the gloves as part of the theme of the event and I looked as though I was channeling Julia Roberts from the movie! The material was much thicker than I anticipated (almost like a wet suit), but that helped smooth out the curves. I received so many compliments on the dress, the color, and its fit. It is perfect for curvy women.
It fit perfect in all the right places. Gorgeous!

This dress was amazing and fit so well. The material is giving and forgiving. I wore this in Texas during the summer and for a formal gown was not overly hot! I got compliments all evening. Highly recommend!

Absolutely loved this dress and got a ton of compliments all night. The scuba material is very forgiving and comfortable but spanx were still a must for me. Also shows a lot of bust so if you're not comfortable with that this isn't the dress for you.

links_reviews_title: The photo doesn't do it justice - it looked really good and fit so well and comfortable!
links_reviews_text: 5'3", 150 lbs, size 10 was perfect. I got a lot of compliments! There was a hole in the arm which I didn't notice until someone pointed it out to me at the party.

links_reviews_title: Package came super early! Nice surprise
links_reviews_text: Dress was comfortable and received lots of compliments. Only issue- material had some snags and pulls that I noticed. Otherwise would recommend it for a fun and classy night out
Fit perfectly. I had compliments on this dress all night long. It definitely looks better on that it does just hanging on the hanger.

links_reviews_title: Cute and flattering dress for a night out
links_reviews_text: The dress was really cute and fit well. It wasn‚Äôt too short, and although it was very fitted it was flattering. My only issue was that the quality control on the dress was not good. It came to me with two very noticeable holes (one of the sleeve and one at the back of the neck). which I had to quickly stitch up before our event because my husband immediately noticed and said no way I could wear the dress that way. The material on the neck and sleeves is delicate so I can see how it would snag easily, but the dress should have been checked and fixed before it went out.

This dress is perfect for a party or night out. Fit is true to size and it was surprisingly very comfortable. The material is very light and airy. It was a little short, but just long enough to wear spanx :)

links_reviews_title: Loved the dress! It was comfortable and fit perfect! I am 5'2", 114 lbs. Wore a size 2.
links_reviews_text: Dress was gorgeous! It's wasn't too short, but a perfect length to show off legs. I was careful when I inserted my arms into the sleeve as it can easily tear with the type of material it is. I highly recommend the dress!

links_reviews_title: Flirty and fun for semi-formal gala
links_reviews_text: After having a baby over the summer, I had nothing that fit for a holiday gala. This was perfect. It was stretchy and comfortable, yet flirty and stylish. I felt confident and cute.
I loved this dress. I ended up wearing the larger size because it was more comfortable, but man I loved this dress! So flattering. Length is perfect. Loved the sleeves and stretchy material.
Perfect party dress for NYE

links_reviews_title: The dress was very comfortable and was fun to wear !
links_reviews_text: Great LBD, the fabric is light and comfy. The fit was flattering the the sleeves and ruffles are adorable touches to make it stand out. Conservative but sexy

Great dress! Form fitting but not too tight. Loved the details on the sleeves and skirt. Wore the 4 which was a little more snug in my midsection, but there was bunching in the back on the 6 due to my petite frame. 5'3", 120 lbs.
I ordered this dress as a backup and it ended up being just what I needed!! It has stretch so it fit good, felt good and looked good! It was a hit!

links_reviews_title: Wore it for my birthday and got tons of compliments!
links_reviews_text: Loved the fit of the dress and although it has long sleeves still very breathable (wore it in Miami in the summer). Fun dress.
This dress was incredibly flattering and held everything in while still being comfy and stretchy. Short but not too short, runs tts
Loved this dress. I didn't end up wearing but would rent it again. It's comfortable, fitted and forgiving. Cute ruffle details. Cute LBD

I guess I overestimated my size picking a 14, thank goodness I decided to go down a size for my backup. I wore a size 12. It fit perfectly, the very thin zipper catches on the fabric so I did have a freak out moment when I couldn't zip up, but we got it and I had a great night in this super cute dress. True to size, sits perfectly I didn't spend the whole night adjusting my skirt. Rent this dress y'all.

links_reviews_title: Not only did I get engaged this night but I also had the perfect dress to wear!
links_reviews_text: Comfortable, and perfect fit

Wore this to an engagement party! Love the material, design, and brand but felt it was not very forgiving in the midsection contrary to the photos. I sized up 2 dress sizes because it was so form fitting around the stomach, but was very happy with the way it looked! would rent again!
Lots of compliments!! Dress was comfy and easy to well. Got a little hot but didn't mind. Shows off your curves. Great dress!!

links_reviews_title: This dress was flattering and beautiful.
links_reviews_text: I loved this dress, I ordered an 8 & 6. When they arrived the 8 fit perfectly and look amazing, except there was a big hole in the mesh near the shoulder. I couldn't figure out how to fix it since it was mesh. I squeezed into the 6 and made it work, would've given it 5 stars had they checked the dress thoroughly for damage prior to shipping.

links_reviews_title: Being with Jenny McCarthy and Donnie Wahlberg
links_reviews_text: Fit nice, hard to zip. Perfect dress for the cocktail attire party.

links_reviews_title: Super comfy and true to size!
links_reviews_text: This dress is great! It fits true to size and has some stretch to it. I am 5' 4" and it was a little longer- down to my knees. I was SO comfortable in it all night at a wedding. I would definitely recommend this one! It is a little tighter on the stomach and shows any "pooch"

links_reviews_title: Loved this dress - so forgiving and comfortable on a VERY cold night.
links_reviews_text: This dress was REALLY comfortable. The fit was so flattering and I got so many compliments on the different textures (both lace and the ruffles). We were literaally having a 'blizzard' during the event and it was nice to have the sleeves but not feel like I was covered up completely. The length was perfect!

links_reviews_title: I felt great in this dress!
links_reviews_text: The dress was so comfortable and I received many compliments!

links_reviews_title: I rented this dress for a gala.
links_reviews_text: Nice and comfortable dress. The quality wasn‚Äôt as nice as I thought it would be, but it was flattering. I usually wear a 10. I wore the 14.

links_reviews_title: Gorgeous, fun dress! Wore to an evening wedding on a cool CA night and received many compliments.
links_reviews_text: Perfect fit and so comfortable. Both sizes fit similar, but I liked the longer length in the larger size. First time using RTR & couldn't be happier with the process. Having 2 sizes to choose from takes the guesswork & worry out!

Great fit - getting the zip up was a but tough- but felt good and looked hot all night. Fits true to size, possibly the size 8 is a but stretched out. No fiddling, no tugging and lots of compliments! Highly recommend this dress!

This dress was so beautiful and I loved the fabric. It very forgiving and the lines laid perfectly on places I wanted to hide. It was soft and warm on a cold night. I highly recommend this dress and I'll probably rent it again. Get $30 off your first order and I'll get $30 when it ships, if you use my referral code: https://rtr.app.link/e/DTWp2fxmbU.

This dress was amazing. I wore it for a company cocktail event and received so many compliments! I'm always cautious of dresses with sleeves because of my bigger arms, but dress material was stretchy and form fit perfectly to my shoulders and arms. This dress is flirty and fun and I would 100% rent again!
Rented this for my bff's rehearsal dinner & it fit perfectly! Compliments all night on the details! The fit was nice and fabric was super soft and wasn't tooo clingy. Would rent again!

I ended up not wearing this dress but I think I should have. I usually don't wear dresses that are tighter around the stomach area which it was but with a good amount of stretch. I thought the frills on the dress and sleeves were really cute. I will definitely give it another try!
Great fit - stretchy material. It stayed in place and I wasn't adjusting myself all night!
Perfect fit. True to size. Perfect for a winter wedding. Got lots of compliments!

links_reviews_title: Very comfy and forgiving. Nice dress.
links_reviews_text: You'll need help with the zipper!

The stretchy material of this dresss makes it really comfortable and un-fussy. The ruffles all over make the skin-tight dress very forgiving. I received so many compliments in it and felt very beautiful!

links_reviews_title: This dress was an amazing fit!!!
links_reviews_text: Loved the way this fit very flattering:)

links_reviews_title: Perfect black dress for any occasion
links_reviews_text: Love this dress! I wore for Christmas dinner out. It has a nice amount of stretch to it. Nice detailing of sheer sleeves and ruffled skirt.

links_reviews_title: Loved this dress and perfect fit! So comfortable!
links_reviews_text: Two of three hangers were broken when my bag arrived, but I‚Äôm sure it occurred in shipping. The dresses were in perfect condition. So convenient and easy to ship back!
Lovely dress. There is a little give but not a tremendous amount. It was tight on the waist but bearable for a NYE dinner. I'm fairly large chested and it didn't feel suffocating.

links_reviews_title: Super fun print but beware of midsection
links_reviews_text: True to size, great print and flattering due to the large puffy sleeves. However, it could not be the best option for those conscious of their midsection
It's a "fan favorite". I've rented it twice. Everyone loves it. The sleeves are soo fun.
Fit TTS and was very comfortable! I loved the fit.
It fit well. Can be worn on several different occasions. It's dressed up without being dressy. Definitely rent. It's better than it looks.

Needed a dress for a night out that wasn't too dressy, and this fit the bill! The print could not be better for summer and I was pleasantly surprised with the shoulder pads (I love a good shoulder pad moment). Definitely recommend!

links_reviews_title: Cute but sleeves take the puffy sleeve to a new level
links_reviews_text: This dress was cute-ish. I liked the print and overall fit, but the sleeves were just too puffy for my taste. I don't mind some but these were very large. If I would have worn this dress, I would've pinned them down somehow to reduce the size

I wore this for a night out with friends and it was super fun! I paired it with a leather jacket and booties since it was a little chilly, but would also wear it with fun sneakers if I wanted to be more casual. I'm usually a jeans girl, so it was fun to wear something different. Received a lot of compliments and felt good in it! Fun dress!

links_reviews_title: Cute but less versatile than I had hoped
links_reviews_text: Cute dress. Love the pattern. Much more summery and less versatile than I had hoped, but if I had an event I'd def be into it.

The print on this dress is to die for! Very light fabric so perfect for a summer day; the puff sleeves are a nice design touch. Great dress for a summer date with heels or gladiator sandals during the day. Beware, it is short. I'm petite (5'2"), and it fell to a good length on me, but I can see how other users say it is short.

This dress was perfect for a night out in the Hamptons. Nonstop compliments all night. I have a rather narrow hips but broader shoulders and big chested and it worked perfectly, if not gave the illusion of being smaller (not that it matters, but just goes to show how great this works for any body). Loved it and would consider buying if it drops in price.

Material is airy, almost linen like. Shape and proportions are all off -- wide, Sister Wives-esque on top and tight and hip hugging on bottom. Might be best for a straight and narrow figure, but curvy girls beware.

links_reviews_title: Beautiful tropical pattern perfect for summer.
links_reviews_text: This dress is gorgeous. I ended not wearing it since I deemed it uncomfortably too short for me.

I wore this dress twice/ a night out with a girlfriend and to work. I got so many compliments. I'm short so I wouldn't recommend for a taller woman to wear to work but the sleeves are so fun and the stretchy panel is so flattering!

I didn't wear this, but if I were not pregnant, I totally would have! The print is tropical but subtle, fabric is soft and light, and the stretchy skirt makes it very comfortable. I just love the statement shoulders as well. Will rent again at a time when it flatters my non pregnant shape.

links_reviews_title: I wore this to my bridal shower and got so many compliments!
links_reviews_text: I wore it with a strapless bra but most probably could wear without. This dress was super comfortable, durable, and all around a great pick for my very first rent the runway experience.

I wanted to wear white to my welcome/rehearsal dinner but since it was at the botanical gardens I also needed to wear florals. This dress was exactly what I was looking for. The floral pattern is bold but the dress is still white enough that it was obvious who the bride was. The dress felt fitted in the chest but I found there was a little extra fabric around the stomach. I kind of wish I could've tried on a 2, but it probably would've been TOO tight. Plus, I may have noticed a little extra fabric in the stomach area, but in pictures it's really not a thing. Overall, quality dress that I'm so glad I rented.

I love Black Halo dresses and this one was great. I just found a better dress for the party I was attending. The fabric is thick and flattering, the bust was a little big but a perfect dress for a summer wedding or shower

Loved this dress for my bridal shower! Thankful it didn't show sweat, showed the curves but also was comfortable! It did show any imperfections so I wore some shaping undergarments and it was perfect!

links_reviews_title: I felt confident but it kept bunching!
links_reviews_text: I wore this dress to my bridal shower. It was a lovely, comfortable dress. However, I wouldn't recommend wearing it on very warm days since it's designed to fit very close to the body. The humidity was not my friend that day. I felt confident putting it on but the bunching kept causing the dress to move upwards on my body and ended up making me look like I have a larger belly than I do. It could have also been the humidity combined with the alcohol making me bloat. If you're a bloater - I would pick something else! What a pretty pattern thou! :)

links_reviews_title: @thanksitsrtr - love a good dress up/dress down
links_reviews_text: This was a littttle tight but overall TTS. The material was fancier than I anticipated but I threw on a jean jacket & my favorite chucks to keep it casual for one of the last days before Labor Day. Got compliments all day!!! If you want to see what else I've rented and loved, check out @thanksitsrtr on insta :)

There is so much to say about this dress. When I tried it on I was in LOVE. the fabric is light and so soft. I initially thought it was a strapless dress but the spaghetti straps added a level of comfort for me. I didn't have to wear a bra. That was an absolute plus and I didn't look like i had a uniboob. I am not curvy but this dress made me feel like Marilyn Monroe and the length was great too!. I wore this dress to my rehearsal/welcome cocktail party and it was a total hit!

This was my "back up" dress for my rehearsal dinner, but when I tried it on I loved it so much I wore it instead of the original dress I was going to wear. It was perfect for summer, and I loved the hints of color it had to bring some uniqueness to bridal outfit. The size 2 was the only size available-- I may have been able to fit into the 0 if I wanted it a little tighter, but the 2 gave me room to eat and drink all night. I'm only 5'3" and loved the length on it. The material is stretchy which is different than other dresses I've worn by this designer. All in all, would definitely recommend.
This was my first pick for an afternoon summer wedding. I ordered my normal size but it ran a little larger than usual. It was cute, but I ended up wearing a different dress.

links_reviews_title: Fun dress for a nice brunch!
links_reviews_text: This dress hugs in all the right places and has a lovely pattern. I wore this dress to a wedding brunch outing with friends and it was a hit! Size up!

Fit great! Hugged all the right places, but was forgiving as well. It was a little big for me around the midsections/hips, but I didn‚Äôt mind it! I got a ton of compliments on the dress! I‚Äôm definitely happy I rented it! It‚Äôs perfect if you‚Äôre a curvier girl, but be careful because it is not very stretchy and might not fit a large bust super well unless you‚Äôre ordering up.

Curvy girls dream!! Very stretchy! Fits so well! The top was just a little loose since I'm a pear shape. But it wasn't a problem since the straps can be adjusted. Just overall perfect dress. Would definitely rent again! Wore this for graduation

links_reviews_title: I wore this dress to my college graduation at it was absolutely perfect!
links_reviews_text: This dress was beautiful. It fit perfectly, it showed off my curves yet was still appropriate for my college graduation. Absolutely loved it.
Was definitely on the tighter side but the size up was too big.
I wore this to my bridal shower and it fit true to size. Straps are adjustable which was great. The length of the dress fell right below my knee cap (I'm 5'3")

links_reviews_title: Elegant, feminine, and perfect for a bridal shower!
links_reviews_text: Great for an hour glass figure

I wore this dress to the Kentucky Oaks at Churchill Downs in Louisville. It fit really well, and looked smooth with high rise spanx, and a strapless bra. The adjustable shoulder straps helped keep the girls under control. Styled with a white shrug and hot pink accessories to fit the Oaks' "wear pink for the fillies" tradition. My fiance loved it! I was obviously the first renter of this beauty as it arrived ready to wear, with tags intact. Thanks for an easy and perfect rental RTR!
This dress is gorgeous! I loved it and it hugged in all the right places!
Tight through the waist, and not much stretch. Would recommend a size up from normal. Very structured, and great material! Was perfect for the spring banquet!
This dress is fitted and lovely for a special lunch or even a romantic night out!

links_reviews_title: Originally got the 10 but it was too tight. Got the 12 and it was just right.
links_reviews_text: The fabric is smooth and lays well with the lining. Very appealing. I will be taking this to Thailand for a destination wedding with many outdoor tropical events. I feel this will serve me well.
hugged every curve in a flattering way.

links_reviews_title: runs small, was not able to wear it....
links_reviews_text: runs small, was not able to wear it....

links_reviews_title: A lovely dress for a summer evening indoor/outdoor wedding at a country club.
links_reviews_text: It does run small in the waist, so I would recommend ordering one size up. The straps are adjustable. I am very petite (4'10"), so the hem landed well below my knees, but it still worked nicely.

links_reviews_title: Actually a little big, for me
links_reviews_text: Not tight, didn't wear
It was just not the dress for me. I'm sure on someone else it will be great

links_reviews_title: It fit like a glove. Received many compliments!
links_reviews_text: The sizing was spot on!

Wore this dress for my bridal shower. It was perfect because I didn‚Äôt want to wear *another* white dress ;) I‚Äôm typically between a 0 and 2, and ended up wearing the 0. The zero was a little tight, but worked out fine because of the stretch! If you want something a little different, comfortable, but still sleek/cute then I totally recommend!

Pros: great silhouette, beautiful design, good quality, great length and comfortable! Cons: a little see thru at the chest, couldn't even wear nipple covers so ended up w at strapless bra. Would definitely rent again
I loved this dress. It was snug but still looked great. The perfect combo of modest abs sexy. If you're debating between sizes I would say to size up. I would definitely rent this again
I did not end up wearing this dress. The material seemed very skimpy to me and it showed every imperfection. It did run small.

links_reviews_title: The emergency backup dress was better than my initial choice.
links_reviews_text: This line is sized really small. I usually wear a size 10-12 or medium, and I was struggling to get into a 14 but the 16 fit just right. Size WAY up. That said the dress was gorgeous and super comfortable. I danced for hours with no issues. I would absolutely rent this dress again.
loved it,but was a bit too vava voom for my event!

links_reviews_title: Liked enough to exchange for a size that fit
links_reviews_text: I didn't wear it but it was a Nice dress. Was a bit snug so I returned for next size. Nice fabric, nice fit. A little longer than I normally wear on my 5'4 frame but is the style

links_reviews_title: Love this dress. Perfect for a garden party or semi formal event or dinner1
links_reviews_text: Fits great and is very flattering

links_reviews_title: Wore it to the Kentucky Derby. Received many compliments. It was extremely comfortable.
links_reviews_text: Loved this dress. Fit beautifully. I wish I could actually purchase it.

links_reviews_title: Beautiful fit. Wore for Easter Sunday.
links_reviews_text: Fit perfectly in waist and hips (has a little stretch). I have a smaller bust, so it was a bit large, but not too bad.

links_reviews_title: Runs very small, but there's hope
links_reviews_text: This ran extremely small on me. Forget wearing a bra, but the good news is that you don't really need one. I have a larger chest, and I'm always worried about falling out of things - but even with this being tight, I didn't feel like I was in danger of anyone being able to see through it. I'm sizing up and crossing my fingers, because it really is beautiful for a spring formal event.
I tried on this dress as a potential option for my bridal shower. I loved it a lot but found it to be a drop tight in the upper abdominal region which was a little unflattering and uncomfortable.

I wore with a jacket for work event, but would be great for a date too. The lace border on the arm holes make it more dress up - and requires a racer-back bra. Thin, silky fabric is navy with black print. I wore tights for colder climate but would work in different temps with no stockings. Dress up or down with different shoes and jewelry. True to size and flattering. A little wrinkled in back from sitting.

links_reviews_title: Arms are low cut, lace shows bra
links_reviews_text: Realized too late I needed a cami with this for work. Otherwise relatively flattering. Gorgeous fabric. Looked better for work with a turtleneck over it
Subtle details made this perfect for a 20s party - drop waist, hints of lace and a femme silky finish. Would rent/wear this again with a leather jacket and boots for a modern take!
This dress was so flowy, soft and flattering. Possibly one of my favorite dresses ever rented die to the ultra flattering neckline and skirt.

links_reviews_title: Didn't wear but the dress is stunning
links_reviews_text: Rented for a holiday party, but after trying on it looked too much like a summer wedding dress. It's absolutely beautiful and i will be renting in warmer weather. Fits true to size, the arm holes are a bit low with the lace so you need a lower bra

links_reviews_title: Beautiful Dress & Perfect for the Occassion
links_reviews_text: Had a 'Roaring 20s' work themed party and this dress worked great. It runs a little big - I wore a small and am usually a medium. It's VERY silly, so subject to bad static cling, etc. So grab some Spanx or a slip. I had to run out and get as it was too bad to wear with nothing. Otherwise, I loved it.
I love a good wrap dress and this one was no exception! Fun pattern and very comfortable fabric!

This pretty dress was perfect for a summer event. It's fully lined and very light and cool. I was comfortable despite very hot weather. The wrap feature is great and, at 5'5" length was perfect - right at/below my knee.

I rented this for my sisters rehearsal dinner over fourth of july weekend. The print is so cute and even more vibrant in person and the wrap style of the dress is great because you can adjust it to be tighter or looser. I did have to use some safety pins because I felt my chest was too exposed normally but it was easy to do and you couldn't tell. It was very comfortable and great for a hot July day. I'd recommend ordering your normal size and maybe a size up for backup if you have a bigger chest. I'd definitely rent this again for any other occasion, formal or casual!

This dress was everything. This the first midi length dress that actually looked proportional on me. I received so many compliments on this dress. I felt so pretty and feminine in this dress. Only complaint it was a little low cut as most wrap dresses are.... had to wear a cami underneath. This dress is perfect for petites. Great dress for work or a function.

links_reviews_title: I should have bought this dress!
links_reviews_text: Beautiful print. Fits great. I wish the chest area would have closed a little bit more. I felt like I was self-conscious that it was too low because I have a bigger chest. But seriously love this piece!

This wrap dress was feminine and light. It fit great and I got lots of compliments. A nice choice for a shower, brunch, or daytime party. True to size. I have a small chest; would recommend sizing up if your chest is larger, as it fit me well but was inclined to open more in chest area. Highly recommend this dress.
Fit great. Very comfortable. Great for any summer party.

links_reviews_title: Perfect fit, raked in the compliments
links_reviews_text: This was my first Unlimited rental and will likely make a return appearance. Cute and flattering, didn't need to wear a cami underneath. It was long enough and the wrap crossover overlapped enough that I wasn't in danger of flashing my office, and the summery print was great. Winner!
Everyone said I looked like summer. I loved wearing this dress! The fabric is light and airy - very comfortable on an 80 degree day. It is true to size. My favorite RtR yet!
Perfect dress- got tons of compliments. Only gave four stars bc had to use four pieces of dress tape to keep the top appropriate.

links_reviews_title: This dress was made for Italy
links_reviews_text: Wore this dress on two separate days in Italy and loved it. It's comfortable and so flattering. I did have to safety pin the neckline so my bra didn't show, but other than that it was perfect.
So many compliments! And can perfectly go from semi casual to formal
So cute, bright and fun dress

links_reviews_title: Unique and fun dress - great for spring!
links_reviews_text: I wore this to work and for Easter. It was super cute; I wore a white cami underneath because it is pretty low cut, but that worked out fine. Would wear again.

I wore this to a baby shower. I usually wear a size 2 but the size 0 fit better. I would say this runs just slightly big. I have a smaller chest and didn't have any trouble with the cut of the dress being too revealing. It was an easy, lightweight dress that would be good for many occasions as it can be dressed up or down to suit your needs.

links_reviews_title: Perfect for a Spring Bridal Shower!
links_reviews_text: Great material, such a beautiful dress, really stood out! Since it's a wrap dress, I was able to wear a 0 comfortably when RTR was out of my usual 2. The 4 was a bit long on me. The dress was so perfect, I'm considering buying it online because I just couldn't stop looking at how bright and happy it looks!

Most perfect dress - flattering shape and pattern. I found the stripes very slimming and the wrap dress slimmed the waist. Fluttery sleeves and hem were very romantic and sweet. Worn on vacay - lightweight and perfect for spring/summer. True to size.
I rented this for a family trip to Florida and wore it out one evening. Loved! Got tons of compliments and the dress was super flattering.

We had a last-minute opportunity for a family photo shoot. Rent the Runway to the rescue! This dress is AMAZING. My husband asked me right away if I could buy it. The wrap was super flattering, especially for someone like me who needs help defining my waistline. The silk had a lovely weight to it--didn't show off any bumps and lumps. I did pin the neckline about 1/4", mostly because it was family photos. I would've felt comfortable wearing it as-is for a date or an event. (By the way, I totally bought it online from a department store within an hour of trying it on. Can't wait to wear it again!)
So cute!

links_reviews_title: So flattering and perfect for summer or vacation
links_reviews_text: Loved this dress. Wore on vacation in Italy and received so many compliments. It fit true to size. I am normally between a 4 and a 6 and the 4 was fine (because it was a wrap dress). I probably could have worn the 6 as well. I wore without a cami underneath but it was definitely low cut so keep that in mind.
I didn't expect the fabric to be silky. The dress fit me just fine, but I think in person it's a little much with the lemons, stripes and ruffles.
More low-cut than I expected. Get your pin or fashion tape ready!
Loved this dress!!! Wish I had a lacy tank to wear under, but it worked with a white one. Lots of compliments, lots of fun. High quality. Not sheer.

This is the perfect summer dress. I was happy to get it before the cold weather sets in. The fabric print is so eye-catching and adorable. The dress is flexible in regards to sizing. I'm usually a 12, but only the 14 was available. It worked just fine. No complaints, just a lovely dress for a warm day.
Loved this dress for Charleston vacation. Wore with white sneakers during the day and nude strappy heels at night. Love the way it fit

This dress is so amazing. It has such a gorgeous lemon print and a super flattering wrap style fit. I've worn this several times and will definitely rent again (and again). Fits TTS and is a great length. Does have a lower cut to the front of it. One of my favorite rentals so far!

Lovely fit great for small to medium chested ladies but without clevage. The dress was so amazing the full felt great wore to a concert and got so many compliments. Would definitely wear on a weekends, date night, or out with friends. Not sustainable for work it is low cut but not revealing.
Comfortable, cute, and perfect summer dress. The cleavage is a little intense if you're wearing this to a family or work event (like me). Luckily, tank top or bandeau totally fixes that.

This is a fantastic wrap dress with good coverage underneath (lifted to see in the photo), I didn't need to worry about catching wind on my walk to work and it was still comfortable at my friend's going away party late into the night. The silk felt so good and the ruffles were just enough. This dress was super flattering and I would highly recommend it.

This dress is so adorable and perfect For Summer I wore to a formal convention Light weight wrap dress- I wore a camisole underneath for modesty Fits true to size very comfortable The lemons are so summery and cute very different and cheery
Comfortable and flowy! Easy to wear.
Rented for work but ended up wearing to a bridal shower! Loved it. Didn't wrinkle, and got tons of compliments!
A little tight on the bust but apart from that I loved this dress and will rent again.

Rented this lovely summer dress for my vacation in Italy. It was very comfortable and the fabric, while lined, was still cool enough to wear all day in 85 weather. Husband loved it too! Thinking of buying it.
This dress is gorgeous, but because it's a wrap dress I couldn't tie it any tighter to make the neckline not as revealing. I did not wear
Got many compliments. Fit beautifully
LOVED wearing this dress! It was a little long on me. Received a bunch of compliments. Considering whether or not to buy it.
This wrap dress is perfection. Lightweight and fun. Had to pin to keep my bra from showing.

Such a flattering cut and the crochet detailing was stunning. I wish I had other reasons to wear it! Highly recommend for a wedding or special occasion. Very comfortable, easy to dance in and has pockets.

Super fun dress!!! Pros: gorgeous color (a darker red in person, although photographs as cherry red), fun silhouette, a touch sexy, classy, comfortable, unique, a little sassy...and it has pockets! I'm a 34C and I wore this without a bra, danced my face off at a wedding and had no issues. Cons: runs small- size up Received MANY compliments and felt fab in this dress! Highly recommended!

I've had my eye on this dress for months & snatched it up as part of my RTR Unlimited membership weeks before I needed to wear it, just so I'd have it! Overall I'd say this fits true to size, with the chest area maybe being a little tight. I'm a 34D and the dress really "smooshed" me in. I don't see how you could wear a bra with this. I'm 5'5" and the dress came down to the bottom of my calf. A few other reviewers noted pockets with brown buttons at the sides. IMO it makes the dress look more casual than if it didn't include the buttons - something to be aware of if you want to wear this to a more formal event.

This dress was for a wedding. Loved it and got tons of compliments. It does run small so go up in a size. I'm 5'4 at 130 and usually wear a 2 or 4 and wore a 6. My only con is it appears wrinkle no matter what you do.

This was way cute and unique! Received tons of compliments. Based on other reviews I went up a size and shouldn't have. It worked well but was a little loose in waist and bust. Still was supportive enough to not need a bra with a 34 D, though :) highly recommend if you don't want to look like anybody else!
Dress fit like a glove. I got so many compliments on it. I was definitely worried the length would look odd on me since I am so short but I was pleasantly surprised with how it fit!
Loved this dress so much. Super flattering. Tons of compliments. Loved the pockets. Didn't need a bra (32B). Such a different and unique dress. Would rent again!

I felt so beautiful in this dress. I was able to wear a strapless bra which for someone with a chest makes all the difference in comfort. The details were perfect from the material, to the peek a boo mid drift on the front to the color and one shoulder. This was my first RTR experience and I'll definitely do it again!

I‚Äôm usually a size 0/2. This 2R fit me just right! A little tight on the chest area but not to a point where I was uncomfortable. The pockets are amazing!! Super fun and comfy dress for a New Orleans wedding!

links_reviews_title: When everyone was wearing the LBD this dress was A PERFECT STANDOUT!
links_reviews_text: It was a bit on the itchy side when sitting because the lining was short but totally worth the irritation. No bra was needed because of the shape of the bodice and the pockets made this the PERFECT dress at a party. I was able to keep my phone and lip gloss without anyone even noticing because of the texture of the lace.

links_reviews_title: Super cute and comfy, but runs SO SMALL
links_reviews_text: Seriously, heed my advice and order at LEAST two sizes up. I am a pretty faithful 0, sometimes 2 if I want more room... I ordered the 2 (based on other reviews) and couldn't even zip it up in the littlest bit. Returned it to get the 4. Even the 4 was HORRIFICALLY tight. Like, by the end of the night I had marks all over my rib cage from the pattern of the dress cutting into my skin. I can't even fathom going on 3+ sizes, but seriously, you must! I loved this dress but the sizing is very, very off.
I wore this dress to an Alice in Wonderland themed party as the Red Queen and it was perfect! Love the details of the eyelit fabric.

Beautiful color and perfect for a fall or winter wedding/event. The material is high quality and so lovely. With the dress length being mid-calf and mid-section cutouts, it's a great combo of fun and classy. The pockets are always an awesome bonus! Received tons of compliments and will definitely be renting this one again!! Only "con" or heads up I will give - I am smaller chested so this didn't cause an issue for me, but the bust is smaller/snug as well as around the rib cage. This was something that was a relief for me as dresses are usually big in this area for me but bigger busted ladies this may mean you need to size up.
Thought it fit true to size. I usually am a size 6 in a dress.

links_reviews_title: Fun red dress - with POCKETS. Flattering and lots of compliments.
links_reviews_text: True to fit and snug around the ribs. Love the pockets - I didn't need to bring a purse for the wedding. Great for a wedding. The material is nice and sturdy.
I loved this dress! Pretty lace with functional pockets. Wish I had gone up a size but this was my backup dress.

links_reviews_title: Felt like the Lady in Red!
links_reviews_text: Felt so great in this dress. Really flattering fit- made me feel sexy which was quite the feat being I 3 month postpartum and it was our first date since baby!

This dress was amazing! The color was perfect, great fit and of course it had pockets. Didn't even need to carry a purse. Lots of complements and a great color. Ended up wearing my backup a size larger because it was a little tight towards the top.

This dress was so easy. The cutouts are fun but not too revealing. The pockets are a huge plus. And the lace was heavy enough that it doesn't pull or tear, but light enough to keep the dress fun and airy. I wore this to an outdoor wedding on a 95 degree day and it was perfect. No bra, no problem. Really easy to dance in and move around. Love, love, love.

I really loved the way this dress photographed. I got tons of complements. When receiving the dress, it smelled of self tanner....bad. I had to febreeze and place in the dryer. The dress itself is itchy to sit in. If you have wide hips, the under layer fits tightly and does not give you much wiggle room. The pockets on the lace part of the dress are attached to the inner layer, giving your hips a little extra(unneeded in my case) volume. Bottom line, Would I rent it again.....yaaaaaassssss, it has pockets! I had a ton of fun dancing in this dress.

I chose this dress for a friend's wedding in upstate New York in June. June is a tricky time for me because I tend to get very hot, very easily, but this dress could not have been more perfect! I chose the size 10R which fit great and just a bit snug in the chest area - which turned out to be perfect because I'm busty and needed to make sure everything was going to stay put! I wore the dress for the ceremony then to the reception and received nothing but compliments all night - and after when friends and family saw the photos! Even the lovely associate at the Rent the Runway store applauded the choice of dress - high praise! The material was light and perfect for a warm sunny day, the color was the perfect true shade of red, it was very comfortable - much needed for a full night of dancing, AND it has pockets. Truly, the perfect dress. Rent this little number - you won't regret it!

I loved this dress. It was my back up style and ended up wearing it and loving it so much! I received many compliments on it and it was perfect for the wedding I attended. The dress has pockets, which is awesome! Also the cutout details is pretty, the zipper works fine, and it was nice and fitted in the waist and not too loose. Would recommend this dress 10/10. My only issue was siting in it for a while, your legs are on the lace, due to a shorter lining, and sitting on it became slightly uncomfortable.

I usually wear a 0-2. Wore the 2 (there is no 0) and it was snug but fit really well. I'm a 32-A. If you have a larger bust I would size up!! Beautiful color and the cut outs are the perfect pop of fun

This is the cutest laced dress! The one shoulder and cut outs on the front and back of the dress give the dress a sexier look than expected but still keeps it classy. I vary between a size 8 and 10 because of my hips but the 10R seemed to fit me best in this style. I would definitely recommend sizing up for backup as the fabric does not have much give in the bust area however, the full skirt allows for a lot of room once past the waist. Paired with a cute pair of open toe heels, this dress is perfect for a daytime or even evening event!

This dress was magical. It was the perfect look for my 30th birthday brunch! The quality was great and the I felt extremely comfortable in the dress all day. The sizes do run small; I'm usually in between 2-4 but 6 was a perfect fit. I just started my RTR unlimited membership and I am now officially hooked. For more RTR looks, follow me at @sallyrentstherunway on Instagram. :)
I felt like if I ate a lot in it, it would explode, but it's so cute. I ended up buying it.
Beautiful cut and color- didn't work for my body but great for semi formal summer occasions

links_reviews_title: I had a dream to wear Self Portrait!
links_reviews_text: And the fit, the quality of the lace and style didn't disappoint! It's not super formal because of the pockets. Perfect for a party, but I wouldn't wear it in a formal wedding.

links_reviews_title: Didn‚Äôt wear because it was too small around the waist
links_reviews_text: This dress is very pretty and but I couldn‚Äôt wear my normal size because it fits tight in the ribs.

links_reviews_title: Two sizes up, still doesn't fit.
links_reviews_text: I wear a four. The four didn't fit, neither did the six. Who thinks to order two sizes up? It would have been gorgeous. My eight year old daughter tried to convince me to just be uncomfortable all night because it's so pretty! I wore an old dress of my own.

links_reviews_title: LOVED this dress and received so many compliments!
links_reviews_text: This was one of my favorite dresses I've ever worn to a wedding - I got so many compliments and even contemplated buying the dress! I will say it runs VERY small - I would size up from your normal dress size and order two sizes bigger than normal as a back up.

links_reviews_title: Didn't wear. I'm between a 2 & 4 and the size 2 was too small in the waist.
links_reviews_text: I'm between a 2 & 4 and the size 2 was too small in the waist.

links_reviews_title: Beautiful dress but I already sized up and it didn't fit me at all in my chest. Had to return.
links_reviews_text: Chest area was way too small. Maybe try 2 sizes up?

links_reviews_title: Runs too small for larger rib cage or chest
links_reviews_text: Normally I'm a 2/4 based on chest size. The 4 was still too small. Size up and then up again.
I had people crossing streets to tell me how much they liked this dress and ask where I bought it. I wore it to an event at an embassy in Washington DC. Loved. Loved. Loved.

I was so excited for this dress but it just ran too small. I‚Äôm usually between a 6 and an 8 and the 8 was just barely too small. If I didn‚Äôt have breasts, it would have fit great! It‚Äôs probably for the best though because the style seemed a lot more casual in person than online. It seems more daytime/summery in person and the wedding I‚Äôm attending is formal so I think I would have had to choose something else anyway.
runs small
I rented the dress for a sep wedding. I usually wear 2 or 4. I am 120 lbs and 34C. The dress is so small I can't even zip the upper body part it. If you want to rent it, definitely SIZE UP!

Unfortunate circumstances meant I didn't get to wear this to a July wedding (my desired size couldn't be delivered and the backup size was too big). Nonetheless! It's super cute. Color borders on cranberry and it has pockets! I worried a little about the cut-outs, but they are tasteful. Comfortable, flattering and well-made. I would definitely consider this dress again (in the right size) for another event.
Great fits. Lots of compliments.

I picked this as a back-up style when the back-up size of my original order became unavailable due to someone returning late. This fit was cute and I liked that it was fitted in the hips without being too clingy. I didn't expect to like the pleats because my booty usually splits pleats so they don't lay right, but these held their shape which was nice. I didn't wind up wearing this because my original order did fit, but I liked this one.

links_reviews_title: Beautiful dress, too small on top
links_reviews_text: I'm usually between 8-10 in sizing, so I rented this in an 8 and unfortunately I just couldn't quite get the zipper all the way up. The top of the dress is not stretchy at all, so if you are a C or larger I'd suggest going a size up. I loved the pattern and style of this dress so much.
Loved this dress! I had some trouble with the zipper and the top was tight but I also have a larger chest. The fabric was flowy and fun!

links_reviews_title: believe the reviews - this dress is incredible and worth the hype
links_reviews_text: I've had this dress on my favorites list for months now, and was so psyched that it was available for a wedding i was attending. For some reason the photos make the dress appear to be a heavier fabric/material, but in person it's much more lightweight - it's a super finely pleated silk with a subtle but intricate pattern on it. The "waistline" does hit high on your torso (more like rib cage) and with no give, so I recommend sizing up. I got constant compliments and felt like a million bucks in this piece. It was comfortable enough to wear all day and into the evening; i was sad to take it off! Yigael Azrouel knows how to design a dress for a woman's body. I'm hourglass shaped and this dress narrowed me out, which is an accomplishment :) LOVE this dress.

links_reviews_title: Got compliments on this dress all night, and it was very comfortable
links_reviews_text: Fit great, but the zipper is almost impossible and I definitely would not have been able to zip it without some solid teamwork from my husband

links_reviews_title: This was such a classy, unique dress!!
links_reviews_text: This dress defnitely fit pretty snug! It was tight on me in the ribs and chest. Usually, a size six would have fit a little loose and this was very fitted.

links_reviews_title: Love it so much, I wish I could buy it!
links_reviews_text: Unique, very flattering, very comfortable and super high quality. By far my favorite RTR rental to-date!

I loved this dress the moment I saw it! It's very flattering and really comfortable too for a long gown! I wore it to a black tie optional wedding, which I thought it was perfect for. My only complaint is the zipper!! So terribly hard to zip up the dress. My friend and I were sweaty by the time we got the thing up. The bust area was a little tight on me, I'm normally a true 2. If you're bustier, I'd recommend sizing up. Ultimately - I would recommend renting just budget 10-15 min to zip it up into your getting ready routine!

LOVED this dress. I would own it if it wasn't so expensive! Ran slightly long since I'm on the shorter side, but worked great with heels. Fabric is super comfortable, style is chic. Important to note the center part of the bust area is slightly see-thru. I only had a black strapless with me, but luckily it wasn't too noticeable. Great dress!
This dress was so comfortable and elegant. I would definitely wear it again. It was a little long but still looked good (dress came to my ankles instead of my shins). Everyone loved it!
I got tons of compliments on this dress. It was comfortable and not too heavy for the Florida summer. I'd definitely rent it again.
Stretchy material, super comfy for dancing in and eating. Perfect wedding guest dress. I'd rent this again in a heartbeat.

The bust area is pretty small with no stretch so size up if you have a wide rib cage or larger chest. Otherwise the pleating on the bottom of the skirt can really accommodate any size or amount of food you choose to consume that night

links_reviews_title: This dress was a huge hit! It really lengthens you out.
links_reviews_text: The dress ran pretty true to size. I will saw the cut-in around the armpit area was lower than expected, but ending up looking OK. The dress is a great length for tall women, and it made me look really lengthened out. Very flattering-such a treat to wear!

links_reviews_title: My dress to see the Marvel Black Panther movie!
links_reviews_text: I love this dress! It is very light weight and flowy. The colors were great especially for such a colorful and stylish crowd during the opening week in Oakland of Marvel's newest movie, the Black Panther! Two things: the zipper is hard to zip up!!! And the top part is a little small so if you are not super narrow in your mid dection, i suggest that you size up, i did! I want to keep this dress!

I really liked this dress! Like others mentioned, it was very hard to zip it down and up because of how thick the middle details are. I had to use pliers as well. I'm not that tall so I ended up using hemming tape to shorten the dress, which worked our nicely since the material is so light. This would be harder to do with a thicker dress or with a different silhouette dress. I could've left the length alone and it would've came to about my ankles but I thought it looked better midi length. I wore this to a wedding at an elegant venue so the dress fit the location well. The top part is pretty tight so I wouldn't recommend for big busted ladies. I'm an A to B cup and I didn't wear bra or petals. The bottom is pretty loose and comfortable.
Had to use pliers to zip up the dress. The zipper was awful. Dress fit well though.

This was a beautiful, luxurious dress, & I received tons of compliments throughout the night! The unique details (color, pleats, length, cutouts) made this dress a standout. It was both flattering (nice waist definition, no awkward armpit fat) & comfortable (lots of eating & dancing). The reason I am giving this dress 4 instead of 5 stars is that it was impossible to zip by myself! The zipper got very stuck at the waistband, & it was even difficult for another person to zip. Definitely plan on having assistance! As other reviews have mentioned, the top is very snug with no give. Order at the top of your size range, & maybe a size up. Overall, loved this dress!

links_reviews_title: Loved the peekaboo trim and accordion fabric!
links_reviews_text: I wore this dress for a November wedding and the teal and black was perfect for fall. The fabric was nice and flexible so dancing was no problem. The top fit great and I didn't need a bra (went with petals). The dress hit me right T the ankle so it was a little long than I expected but still appropriate for a wedding but could also work for black tie optional or formal affair.

links_reviews_title: RTR for the Win! Wedding Stunner
