links_reviews_text: This dress was an absolute hit! I loved the cut - super elegant. I loved the pleated details and fitted waist. A perfect balance. A word to the ladies - if you're like me and have an athletic shape be sure to size up. The lace band doesn't have stretch.

I got a lot of compliments on this dress. The material is really lightweight but hangs well because of the pleats. It was probably a tad too long for me, but I was happy none the less. The zipper was difficult at the waist with all the trim/embroidery, but nothing you couldn't muscle past.

Y'all, this dress is everything! Super flattering, comfortable, amazing color, etc. The pleated fabric allows for plenty of movement in the dress (i.e. dance floor approved). The cut and fit make it great for a variety of body types. Guaranteed lots of compliments. PRO TIP: The zipper requires a buddy. I tried on a bigger size and same issue with the zipper. Once you are in it though so WORTH IT!
The dress is beautiful and ultra comfy. Definitely recommend this dress

This was one of my favorites so far. The color was fabulous, the material is actually extremely light and thin. The dress moves great and fit true to size. Had I had no need to wear a bra as I am small chested but you could wear one just know that there are some slightly see through elements to the decorative trim so select appropriately. Would totally recommend this dress!

Minimal difference between sizes 2&4 in terms of the bodice. I went with the 2 because it was slightly shorter. I am 5'5 and length was a little long, closer to ankle length than midi as on the model. The zipper is very difficult to get past the thicker fabric accents on the midsection. All in all a gorgeous dress and I got compliments all evening.

When this dress arrive I have to admit, I was very disappointed. I thought the fabric was a bit more vibrant and formal. (In the inventory image, it almost looks like it has sequins although that isn't stated in the description.) The colors are actually a bit flat with a taupe color in the pattern that I did not anticipate by the image. When I tried it on I knew I had the right chhoice for me rather than going with the typical LBD. As far as the fit, the banding was very snug around my rib cage, even in the size 6, which is some thing to consider... The angles in the bodice along with that black band gives the dress this fun artsy look. And little sassy surprise was that the black & white bands are see through! The length is pretty long even for my height and I think what makes this design so pretty is that it should brush the ankles. I went with a little higher heel than initially intended to lift the hem line away from the floor more. Overall, it was a huge hit and I felt great all night.

links_reviews_title: One of my favorite RTR dresses to date!
links_reviews_text: Perfect dress for tall women. The colors are so vibrant and different plus the texture of this dress is incredible. My only con for this dress is the zipper. I tried the larger size on first and I still had issues - make sure you have a friend to help zip it up!

links_reviews_title: Beautiful and unique dress to wear to an outdoor wedding
links_reviews_text: This dress is beautiful and unique. I wish I would have listened to reviews about ordering a size up. It definitely runs tight through the waistband and has no give in the waist/bust area and the zipper is very difficult to negotiate over the waist band. Overall glad I rented this look.

This is hands down one of my all time favorites! I love this dress! I felt so beautiful in it and it fit perfectly. I would wear this for a wedding or even just a fun night out. I would pair it with some amazing statement earrings and be ready to go! I would wear this with a strapless bra and Spanx might be necessary as it is fitted throughout. I will be renting this again!

Glamorous and sophisticated style. Wore to a black tie optional wedding. I'm 5'3" and could probably used a petite size as the waist to shoulder ratio was a bit big for my frame. But all in all I loved wearing this beautiful dress.

links_reviews_title: The bottom half of the dress is loose which made it great for dancing.
links_reviews_text: This dress was stunning! The only negative I have is that the zipper was very rough to move, it took two people to zip and unzip me since it kept getting stuck.

So, I did not originally rent this dress. RTR ended up not having the size I needed in my previously rented dress so I chose this as an alternative. I am generally a size 6 and probably could have worn the 6 in this dress but only had the 8 as an option. It ended up being around 90 degrees the day of this wedding so this lighter flowy option was best! I received a ton of compliments on it because it was so unique. I have a smaller bust (32b) and the top fit me perfectly and I am 5'7 and the length was just right. If you were any shorter I think this dress would be too long on you if you are hoping to get the midi look. All in all, positive experience with a dress that I didn't really want but ended up wearing!

Beautiful dress! One of my favorites. Running true to size, I'd recommend sizing up for backup. There is some stretch to the fabric in the hip/waist area, but the bust has little to no stretch. If you're bustier, I'd recommend sizing up because the bust area is cut on the smaller side. The waist is also more fitted, but gives the illusion of curves. Love the print, perfect for a cocktail party or wedding. Best worn without a bra or with a nubra. Pair with black heels.

links_reviews_title: Fun and fancy choice for Gala
links_reviews_text: I rented this for my fianc√©s business school gala- the top is fitted and the bottom is cut straight, so even with a curvier bottom half I didn't have to worry about the style being or looking tight. The fabric is light and airy with a fun pattern that received many compliments.

I rented this for a bridal luncheon and it was quite the hit! The fabric is lighter and more flowy in person making it appropriate enough for day. I recommend being tall for this dress or it would hit at an awkward length.

This yigal dress is beautiful and the color is very rich. The fabric is light and for my height at 5'4" it is just right above my ankle. I had a very hard time zipping where the middle embroidery was but once it is on it is very comfortable with a lot of room in the hips. The only thing is that it is quite tight at the bust area. At 34D I felt squished (but then again I was wearing a bra) but it was just right exact at my waist (25). I think that it would work better for A-C cups (with bra) or if higher cups then go bra less. Overall, this dress is beautiful! Perfect for a spring weather!

I absolutely loved this dress! The pattern matched with the tiny pleats was beautiful and the tasteful cutouts at the top made this still feel like a youthful style despite the length. I would definitely recommend that anyone considering renting this piece size up, however. My measurements are H: 34, W:24 B: 34 and this was comfortable at my waist, tight at my bust and there was no stretch in the top of the dress.. If I were to rent this again, I would probably do the size 2 rather than the 0. Also, at 5'5" this came to my ankles, so for more petite women this could easily become a floor length style. I wore this with black ankle boots, but as the weather warms up this would look beautiful with a nude or black strappy sandal and simple jewelry.
Considering renting it again this year!! Details are the best part. The fit was perfect on me and I didn't even have to worry about it being too long.
I'm smaller chested and this was so tight across the chest I couldn't wear it.
I rented this dress for a family gathering. I was comfortable and the color was great.

links_reviews_title: Easy, breezy, and just so pretty.
links_reviews_text: I felt like a spring goddess in this dress. I rented for a bridal shower, and it was spot on. So easy to wear, beautiful colors and material.

links_reviews_title: Super flattering, gorgeous colors. A little bit too long
links_reviews_text: I love this dress, so so feminine and pretty! I did have to wear extra tall wedges with it because it was so long, dragging on the ground. Even with tall heels hard to walk in without tripping. But if you are tall this dress is absolutely gorgeous!

This dress is beautiful and I loved wearing it. I do think it runs a tad small though. I'm 5-9 and I wore it with flat sandals and it was the perfect length. The material is heavy so probably not the best choice for the middle of summer but it flows so well that I was not uncomfortable.

links_reviews_title: Gorgeous dress for a spring wedding
links_reviews_text: This dress was so flattering and flowy. I got compliments all night. It was perfect for a cool spring wedding! Would rent again! Or buy!!!

Ran true to size, but was a bit long (I'm only 5'4"). I wore 3 in heels and it still grazed the ground. Very comfortable and flowy. I rented this for the month and wore it twice - to Easter brunch and Mother's Day brunch. Perfect for the occasions.

links_reviews_title: LOVE this dress! Wore this for my husband's MBA graduation and felt like a queen. Many compliments
links_reviews_text: The dress is light, flowy, and very long. I am 5'8" and it would have been too long for me without heels. Dark undergarments may show through without a slip. The fabric is essentially wrinkle-free. I did not have to steam or iron it out of the bag. Just an absolutely perfect dress.

links_reviews_title: Wanted to love it. Really did.
links_reviews_text: I wanted to love it so much, but it just didn't work for me. SUPER long and just "eh" on. My friend asked when I left the prairie lol.

I wore this for Easter and LOVED it! I thought it might be too much fabric and make me look big, but it was so flattering! The print has so much detail in the flowers. The waistband in the middle really defines your waist and blouses out nicely above. I would definitely rent this again!

links_reviews_title: Staff exceptionally helpful (email and phone support) even when I realized I rented the wrong size.
links_reviews_text: I loved the style and look of this dress. I could fit into the 10, but it was pretty snug on waist, so I went up a size to a 12 and that was also pretty fitted. By going up a size, the sleeves were a bit too long and the length was very long as well, which made it drag on the floor and cause people to step on it. :-/ Other than that a very unique and elegant dress with a nice conservative touch. I'm 5'5" and am very curvy, so I also appreciated that the dress was able to minimize the curves that I didn't want to highlight. Overall, very happy.

I love maxi dresses! And I love that this one is longsleeved, feminine yet conservative. I am in the middle of a size 8 and 10 in dresses, and ordered the 10, which was a little too big. The waist didn't quite fit snuggly. However, I think the eight might have gapped at the chest. The fabric is great, but weighty and pulls the dress down. As a result, the waist hung lower than it should and the dress felt a bit heavy. I'm 5'9 and it hit the floor barefoot, which is awesome for tall ladies! My daughter's (male) dentist complimented the dress as "lovely" but hubby thought it was just ok (as you can see from his comment above!). Nice to wear once, but sent back after that.
Countless compliments, and the dress was super comfortable! It's pretty shear, so an undershirt is wise. I'm top heavy, and the top barely fit. Considering purchasing.

I wore this dress to a late summer baby shower. I got so many compliments! It is very long though! I am 5'5" and I needed to wear 3" heels with it so it would not drag. It barely cleared the floor. Definitely a dress designed for tall girls! Also, I have a petite frame and sometimes between a 4 and a 6, but the chest buttons up tight, so size up if you are between sizes. The waist pulls tight some with the drawstring, so there isn't much difference between sizes.

links_reviews_title: Fits perfectly and is such a beautiful pattern I got loads of compliments
links_reviews_text: A great button down dress if you have a larger bust .... fit great!
This is a beautiful maxi and I loved it for fall/end of summer. I liked it so much I kept it another month and plan to wear it for a fall wedding. A bit large and very long.

links_reviews_title: Casually regal and beautiful to wear. My boyfriend thought it was sexy.
links_reviews_text: To me this looked like a loose dress to size down in, but not so: In the store, I tried on both the 4 and the 6. I'm usually a 4, but on that one, the button at the breast gaped and it was weirdly snug in the armpit/ shoulder area, so I went with the 6. Emotionally, it was so beautiful to feel both feminine AND covered.

I LOVE this floral summer dress by Fame & Partners ! Running true to size , I recommend wearing your true size for your primary size and going up for your back up. This style is free comfy and cute . It works best for all cup sizes and can also be worn with a full strapped standard bra. From the waist down , this style has a loose free fit. At 5‚Äô2‚Äù, the length stops me at floor length , with beige heels or sandals this style has flexibility to wear in multiple ways. Adding a trendy solid color handbag will settle this unique dress with a fashionable touch.

If you want to feel like a million buck put this one on the bag. More compliments than I can count- Two people called out of car windows on the street to say nice dress. It seemed to evoke a strong emotional reaction. It is comfortable and airy. Perfect for a small waist with curves. Be warned that It's floor length at 5'6 with 4 inch heels.
Feels great on, snug in all the right places. Great material. It is long for short people. I'm 5'2'' and had 3 inch heels on.
It was super long. I got compliments on it being pretty, but it was too long (even with heels) and just felt like too much fabric.

links_reviews_title: This dress was so flowy and dreamy, simply beautiful! I worn it for a daytime meeting event.
links_reviews_text: I‚Äôm 5‚Äô 4‚Äô and this dress was almost too long for me

links_reviews_title: This is such a lovely dress. Felt super feminine and had a vintage vibe.
links_reviews_text: Fit perfectly, I am 5'9" the length was ideal, not too short, hit the floor. Got a ton of compliments. Held onto in through my next rental I loved it so much.
So long
Runs way too long. Im 5 5" and even in heels it would've been too long. It was super cute.

links_reviews_title: What a gorgeous and easy to wear piece!
links_reviews_text: This dress was a little long on me, so I paired with some low heels. The fabric felt amazing and cool enough for mild temperatures. ...and can we talk about the flow !? There was just enough fabric to have the perfect amount of movement without adding too much volume to my frame. I wish I could wear this every week!
It was too tight in the ribcage to button. Also would have needed pretty high heels to not drag on the ground.
Love it
The dress was pretty, but way too long for me at 5'4", no matter what heels I tried.

links_reviews_title: Size up a few for 3rd trimester
links_reviews_text: This is a beautiful dress however I didn't size up enough to account for my belly which is sitting pretty high at 34 weeks pregnant. I would size up 2 or possibly 3 sizes to account for a 3rd trimester belly. Unfortunately one size up was not sufficient and the waist button wouldn't button.
I loved this dress and wore it to multiple work events where I was in all day meetings and then had to transition to evening. Got so many compliments and will definitely rent again this summer.

links_reviews_title: This dress is FUN to wear and I received countless compliments! It flows beautifully!
links_reviews_text: The 10R was a better length (I'm 5'4" and it was a sliver off the ground with 3" heels) and fit my waist better. Sheer though - plan to wear a slip!
I am obsessed with this dress. It fits perfectly! I wish i could buy it!

links_reviews_title: Was very comfortable and perfect for a spring day.
links_reviews_text: The dress was a little long and fit tight in the mid section but I would rent it again.

links_reviews_title: I know it‚Äôs a maxi dress, but it was too long to wear!
links_reviews_text: I just could not wear this dress. It was much too long and I‚Äôm 5‚Äô6‚Äù and even with heels it was too long. It‚Äôs sort of pretty in person, but could look like a nightgown.
Needs a slip not lined. The area below the boobs is tight I am a 36 D and I was able to button but it was snug.
Compliments galore.

links_reviews_title: Such a beautiful dress. Loved everything about it!
links_reviews_text: Everything was perfect. The waist was a little snug but fit wonderful.

This dress was cute but I rented this and another to try for Easter and I liked the other one better so I never wore this one. The waist has no give.. It still fit but I felt like it may have been a little uncomfortable over time. Came with the bottom button missing but this wouldn't have mattered if I would have decided to wear it!

links_reviews_title: Never left the house with it
links_reviews_text: The length is insanely long and the built in waist band is pretty tight which smooshed my boobs in an unflattering way. Between that and the length, I just never left good leaving the house with it on.

links_reviews_title: I wore this to church and have never had so many people stop and comment on my dress.
links_reviews_text: Long, lightweight but lined. Quality piece. I want to buy it!
I wore this dress for a baby shower and hanging out with family and friends. It was super comfortable and really fun and flowy. Great colors!
I wore this dress on a trip to the USVI. It was perfect for the location and very comfortable. I got tons of compliments in person and in pictures. I will definitely rent again.
Loved this for our beach vacation. It's so fun and bright. You don't need a bra as it has built in cups. Gorgeous fit!
Wore this for birthday pictures with my daughter. Loved it!

I enjoyed this dress, rented a 10L to wear with wedges and it was the perfect height. I was able to skip the bra thanks to the lining and built in cups, as well as the adjustable straps. I did find this dress to be very warm - it's a thicker cotton and it's fully lined so it wasn't as breathable/light as I was expecting. Just something to consider if planning to be outside on an 85+ degree day in this dress. Love Lilly dresses and will definitely rent the brand again :)

links_reviews_title: Beautiful dress. I've received many compliments. Love the vibrant colors!
links_reviews_text: I am 5' 4" It's a long dress. I wore it with high wedge sandals. You don't need to wear a bra !
Beautiful color, great shape and the fit wasn't too loose. Must rent!
Perfect flowy dress for vacation. Colors are bright and the dress is so comfortable. Got lots of compliments. I wore it with flip flops and dress hit the floor. Highly recommend!
I wore this for an outdoor wedding in the heat and it was a perfect choice. The fabric is lightweight and breathable and it had padding in the bust so a bra was not necessary.

This is one of my favorite rentals ever!! The length is perfect; I'm 5'7" and wore flat sandals. My favorite part was I didn't have to wear a bra! I love the built-in pads and adjustable straps! Fits TTS.

links_reviews_title: Loved it so much I bought it.
links_reviews_text: This dress is everything for a beach vacation.
Beautiful dress! Very bright & comfy. Had to get Long because my size wasn't available in regular but it still worked out great

links_reviews_title: Was so sad to return this dress!
links_reviews_text: I rented this super cute dress for an afternoon fundraiser event and absolutely loved it! Would usually wear a 10L but ended up wearing the 8L as it fit better in the bust area. Beautiful colors and very comfortable, especially not having to wear a bra. I would definitely choose this one again!
I am 5'4 and 125#. 2R fit great. Would have hit the ground if I wore flats but with a small wedge sandal it was the perfect length and fit!

I rented this dress for a beach wedding in the Keys. I am 4 months postpartum and needed something to accommodate my bust. The dress was gorgeous and extremely comfortable. I may actually go purchase it at my local Lilly store I loved it so much!
Wore this dress for a Luau. Did not have to wear a bra yay!
Perfect vacation maxi

links_reviews_title: Renting Lilly is such a game changer! Saved me so much money for family pictures
links_reviews_text: Fit true to size. Had to wear a strapless bra to fill out the top (small C cup) and heels to suit the length (5‚Äô3). Nice soft material, adjustable straps were very helpful, neckline allowed for appropriate coverage. Loved it!

I loved this dress!! I received so many compliments when I wore it! It is quite long though. At 5'5", it was trailing the ground even with high wedges on. My wedge shoes IÔ∏è was going to wear broke right before leaving our room so I had to wear flats with it. I just tied it up on one side with a hair tie from underneath and it was fine but I did have to kind of hold it up when I walked. It was also pretty tight on the chest area and I'm an A cup. But it was a fun dress to wear on vacation.
I love the print and the top is very much like a bra so you don't have to wear one! Loved this!

This dress makes me smile just looking at it. It's so soft and extremely comfortable. I would recommend sizing up if you have a large bust. My only choice was a 6 or a 10 as I used my Unlimited, but I think the 8 may have fit a little less snug in the bust. There is zero stretch to the material, but it zips in the back so I was able to fit my bust in and zip it up.

links_reviews_title: Perfect gender reveal dress for impartial auntie
links_reviews_text: Beautiful color on the dress and perfect for an impartial auntie at a gender reveal party because it is pink and blue. The 4R fit great everywhere, except it was pretty long on me (I wore flats but should've worn a 3" wedge) and the bust was slightly too big on me (not an issue if you avoid bending over). A major plus was the built-in cups, so no bra was necessary!
I rented this dress for family Photos and it worked out great! This is a casual dress but high quality fabric. Great blue color.
Everyone loved it and I did too

This is a beautiful, lightweight, classic Lilly Pulitzer dress. Great for an event in the summer or vacation. I wore this to a tropical-themed charity event and received tons of compliments. Fair warning, if you're 5'5" or under this dress will only work if you have rather high heels. I wore 4-inch heeled sandals and the dress was still almost touching the ground!

links_reviews_title: Really liked this dress but runs a little large in top
links_reviews_text: This dress was very comfortable and worked great for a rehearsal dinner. It was a little large in the top and the straps didn't adjust as well as I needed it to

Such a great, fun and bold dress! Lilly Pulitzer's line is always so vibrant and well fitted. I am a only 5 ft tall so it ran long on me with 3 inch heels on. However, the fit of the dress was perfect! A little too perfect in the bust area, not much room for any more unless you size up. The fabric is stretchy which makes this dress very comfortable. You don't need to wear a bra with this dress, but if you need to go for a strapless or Nu Bra.
Perfect flowy dress! Comfortable and flattering. Fits true to size in every area. High quality material and perfect for a summer day/night. Wore this several times before sending back.

links_reviews_title: Zips up the back with long straps
links_reviews_text: It seems rare for a Lilly to have a zipper closure but this one did, so be sure to account for your bust size. The straps were adjustable but still long and I felt like I was constantly popping out of it.

The dress not only arrived ahead of schedule after a last minute order (thanks customer service) but it was perfect very comfy and fit great. The boob area was a little loose even after tightening up the straps but otherwise was a great dress and colors for a beach wedding

links_reviews_title: It was just ok. The built in bra was nice but other than that it didn't have a WOW effect

links_reviews_text: I wore this dress for an end of summer party. I loved that is has padded cups built into the bust, so you can get away without a bra (I didn't want to). The straps are adjustable as well. I received many compliments and was so comfortable all night.
flattering and colorful.

links_reviews_title: Pretty pattern, casual fit; way too long for my height
links_reviews_text: I rented a size Small for my 5'2" frame but with my tallest heels (about 4") I still couldn't clear the ground. The fit through the bust was nice, albeit a little on the large side (I'm a 32C). The material was a beautiful, flowing material with quality weight to it but not overly heavy. When I tried it on, the length and the way it flowed to the ground did not have a stately flow like the model; rather, it looked as if I were playing dress-up! Not a dress for the petite in stature.

This is a lovely dress, but was a bit too small in bust for me, so it shows more cleavage than I was comfortable with. Bigger busted ladies may want to size up. Very pretty though, may try again but size up.

Rented this for a wedding in the mountains - the colors were beautiful and it was super comfortable. Fit was true to size, ended up having to get a 4L because that was all that was available. Since we were in the mountains, I had to wear flats, so it was a tad longer than I'd like, but would've been perfect with low heels.

Very comfortable. Great for a day-time event or a casual event. The only downside for me was that it wasn't 100% boob-propriate for a family gathering. No cleavage per-say, but definitely low cut. I'm a C-cup.
I fell in love with the print! It was suggested for bigger bust but I didn't think it fit too well but it worked just enough. It's just a beautiful dress and super comfortable (low neckline aside).

I rented this dress for a summer party we hosted at our home. We had huge turnout and I never got a photo in all the craziness. I loved that the straps are adjustable! True to size and very comfy with a flattering cut. I wore a strapless bra but I think this would work well braless. The bright colors were awesome as a party host so guests could spot me easily. Love this dress and highly recommend!

The fabric is vibrant like in the photos. It fits true to size and has built in bra cups making a bra unnecessary. I am a 32C and barely 5'5. The 2R fit perfectly with wedges. It was a touch long with flats, but I could get by with it.
Paired with black high waisted skinny jeans and black knee high boots for date night. Super easy top to throw on and look elegant/sexy. The silky dark brown color is different too - loved it!
Perfect winter going out top! Really easy and fun, definitely cropped though.
Definitely was a bit cropped.
I have a long-ish torso, so I was afraid it was going to be too cropped on me and cheapen the look. But, I was so happy with the length. Perfect for party or night out.

links_reviews_title: Loved it so much I bought it!
links_reviews_text: This shirt was just the right amount of sexy with the sheer panel in the front, while still being covered everywhere else! The zip up side made the fit snug and flattering, and the long bell sleeves were just so fun and flirty! As far as sizing goes, I run between a small and a medium depending on the brand, the medium fit snugly for me.
Wore to work with black pants then paired with jeans. Super versatile and easy
Great shirt, trendy, comfy, professional and flattering.
Love the big sleeves. Its comfortable. The front is a little open, you cant tell from this photo but you need to wear a bra that is sticky or nude under this top.
Wore this to work and then with jeans out and about. Looks very nice in person.

links_reviews_title: Cute bell sleeves and cinched waist make this a great top for work or fun!
links_reviews_text: Fit is true to size, there is a side zipper so it accents your waist nicely. I wore a black tank under since my event was daytime casual.
A lot of compliments on this top, a good day to night top for a Friday
I really loved this shirt. It felt more flattering on that it looks in this picture. It's fitted, nice patterns, fun bell sleeves that weren't too long, feels very well-constructed.
Love this top. Such a feminine fit with added flare in the sleeves. Really loved it.
Very tru to size. Flowy and flattering. Great for work.

links_reviews_title: So many compliments on this top.
links_reviews_text: Great fit, looks perfect with jeans. Loved it so much I bought it. A little snug if you have a larger bust but only when you are putting the top on, just need to be careful.

links_reviews_title: I liked the material of the blouse.
links_reviews_text: The blouse runs a little big. For reference I am 5.5 ft. tall and 118 pounds, I wear the XS, and it was loose around my bust and shoulders.

links_reviews_title: Love this and will rent it again for a date night
links_reviews_text: I wore this to work but with a camisole because of the see thru seam in the middle but I will definitely rent this again for a date night

I wanted to wear this for work but 2 things stopped me. First one: It is pretty large in the bust and shoulders so I felt I was swimming in it. Secondly: I couldn't tell from the photos that the mesh in the front is see through. As much as I love pushing boundaries. I felt someone seeing my bra at work was probably inappropriate. #verycuteonthemodel
I enjoyed wearing this top for a date, could also be worn for work or day out. It was overall pretty snug in the arms and chest area, would recommend sizing up.
Very flattering

links_reviews_title: Loved it so much I bought it.
links_reviews_text: Lovely top. Material is soft and breathable and I adore the slight sexiness in the chest of an otherwise conservative top. I wore it out to a dinner with black leggings and boots and a little lace bralette.
Keep in mind that center is see through so you may have to wear a shirt underneath.
Wore with gray jeggings. Looked cute.

I didn't end up wearing this shirt, because the fit was so weird. I am 5'2" and it seemed very long for me. The shoulders were tight, but the waist was big. It didn't do anything for me and hung strange. Disappointed because the print was so cute! just need a couple inches taken in on the waist!
Wish I had been able to get one size smaller but I loved this top. Wore to drinks, work, a concert, a travel day. Did Nubra for evenings, tank underneath for work/day

Really loved this blouse. Light material and the see through strip in the middle gives it a hint of sexy that's really nice. Was kind of difficult to get off. Probably a combination of the fit and me having largish shoulders. Wish it were mine though.
really cute..must wear a shirt underneath so size up

Seriously considering purchasing this one. Super cute, flowy, and flattering. Absolutely love it. Just an FYI - there is a zipper under the left sleeve! i didn't notice it at first, so getting the top over my chest was a bit of a challenge lol - it would've been much easier if I had noticed that zipper first! Looks great with jeans, black leggings - anything!

links_reviews_title: Cute work top. sheer in the middle but still work appropriate
links_reviews_text: A little tight to get over your shoulders but fits like a glove once its on

links_reviews_title: See through middle hard for work
links_reviews_text: Shirt as hard for work as the center stripe I'd see through. Runs a tiny bit small in shoulders and ribcage
Nice top a little tight around the busy and armpits!!
This was good for work and for a date! Highly recommend. No fit issues. It was also comfortable.

links_reviews_title: Cute, the sleeves were a little long
links_reviews_text: I felt this top was great, however I have shorter arms and the sleeves would get in the way of a shiny your hands or just daily things. For work I ended up wearing a black tank under.
TBH couldnt get it on and had to be helped out. Size up!
Flowly and pretty
I mistakenly ordered the medium, but I think the small would've been big too. Pretty blouse!
I was excited about the boho chic look of this but in person it lacked anything special. Didn't end up wearing it.

I loved this piece! I want to buy it. I wore it on vacation and when I got back to a concert. This is totally my style and right up my alley. I love free people/ whimsical pieces and this was so cute and comfortable. Got lots of compliments and loved it.

links_reviews_title: Super cute! My husband wanted me to buy this he liked it so much!
links_reviews_text: Really easy fit, looks really cute with jeans.

links_reviews_title: cute but should have ordered a small. Everyone said it didn't have any give so i ordered up a size
links_reviews_text: should have ordered a small

Fits great. Has a side zipper, so the fit flatters. The crochet-work goes all down the front to the waist and is see through. So I wore a cami underneath for work. Otherwise it doesn't need it because it's fully lined.

links_reviews_title: Wore to work and out for drinks
links_reviews_text: I got a ton of compliments on this. It fits true to size. I wore it with a black tank under it for work, but then I wore it out for drinks and music the next night with just a nude bralette under it. It fit great!
This top was so cute. Loved the bell sleeves. I wore it with a pair of jeans and ankle boots and it was perfect!
This shirt came just as pictured. It fit nicely and it was super cute to wear out on a date under a leather jacket. There was just not a wow factor to it, ya know.

links_reviews_title: Convenience! Looked great without the Great price!

links_reviews_text: Took the hubby out for his birthday dinner tonight and I wore this Cinq √† Sept LBD! This dress is so hot!üî• Unfortunately, it's not made for twerking! üò≠üòÇ But I'm glad I used a lot of double sided tape! Lol P.S. Go up a size!
Gorgeous dress and material! I did feel like my boobs might pop out but some dress tape and you're good! It does run a tad small so it's ok to size up!
I really loved the way this dress fit my body. Was worried about the cut out but everything stayed in place perfectly. I got countless compliments and felt incredibly confident.

links_reviews_title: I felt like a million bucks.
links_reviews_text: This dress fit like a glove. It has no stretch though so if you're in between sizes, I would size up. For reference I am a 32C and size 0/24 in pants/ skirts/ dresses. Would definitely rent again!
Just didn't have enough room to move.
It was long on my 5'2 frame but looked ok with high heels. The bust fit perfectly but I'm a 34 B. Over all great quality and fabric.
Love everything about this dress! Made me feel sexy and was easy to dance in!

Absolutely loved this dress. But it wasn't love at first sight. The material isn't stretchy at all and putting it on is a little bit of a production. It fit great but was so tight over my hips that pulling it down would pull my undergarments along with it. But ultimately, I felt like a million bucks and shamelessly basked in all the compliments.
Dress runs a little tight but not uncomfortable. Not much stretch but felt more comfortable as the night went on
YALL this dress was perfect!!!! I have a small chest, so it worked well for me. It was so fun and comfortable to wear, perfect for a formal night out.
I felt like it runs a little small but maybe not. Show stopper though for events. I think it does a good job of holding your boobs in, but that didnt stop me from being nervous.
Perfect little (and I mean little) black dress. I wore it for my girlfriends 21st birthday bash and received so many compliments. The cutouts were super sexy and hugged me in all the right places.
looked great on! couldn't wear a bra due to the cut outs - I am flat chested so that was fine. 4 stars for no bra and it didn't stay in place well, kept having to pull it down to lay flat.

Wore this for a very dressy date, fit perfectly, runs slightly small but not as tight as a previous cinq a sept dress I rented. Fits a small bust (32A), and is comfortable to boot! memorable and sexy while still being formal.
The 8 was snug but the 10 was too big. I am small chested so the 8 held me in place. I am 5'9" and the dress came down to my knees. It was a fun dress to wear and I got sevearl compliments!
I loved this dress. I was worried it wouldn't fit because people were saying it runs small but it's TTS. definitely better for people with a flat chest

Received so many compliments on this dress. It was perfect for my cousins wedding. I am usually between a 4 and 6. I wound up going with the 4 as it was a bit tighter. The top seemed a tiny bit stretched out (I wear a 34B-C) but I was able to secure it in place with some tape and I didn't have to touch it again. Would certainly recommend this dress.

This is something I normally would not wear with slits and form fit. I fell in love with it the most it's I put it on. Very comfortable and again did not need a bra! Received many compliments and would definitely wear again!

links_reviews_title: Little black dress with a side of underboob
links_reviews_text: I wore this dress to a party and felt very elegant in it. I think overall, it didn't fit perfectly enough to justify five stars but I liked it well enough. I am a little bit surprised that no other person on their pictures seems to have the underboob problem that I encountered especially since I don't have a large cleavage at all. Didn't dampen my mood or me liking the dress, though.

links_reviews_title: Sexy dress, but wardrobe malfunction waiting to happen!
links_reviews_text: This is one of the sexiest but elegant dresses I've worn . The 4 fit my body like a glove, and i could comfortably wear spanx underneath (though I'm 5'2" so it was a little long but not a big deal). The top part, however, is tricky--you can't wear a bra, so i used a ton of boob tape and a pair of pasties to keep everything in place. It was hard to dance bc moving around a lot would risk pulling the tape out of place. I would recommend wearing this dress for a wedding that you don't plan on dancing at or a cocktail party that requires you to just sit, stand and walk.

This dress takes the LBD to the next level. I'm 5'11 and the dress length was perfect. I was a little concerned with my boobs falling out the bottom of the dress but the bigger size would've been too baggy on top. I received many compliments and would recommend this dress!

This was my backup dress but I ended up wearing it for the wedding. I loved both dresses I rented but the hubby liked this one best. It‚Äôs so classic with a bit of an edge. Got lots of compliments. I‚Äôm usually between a 0 and 2 and the 2 fit perfect. The chest area is VERY small so I think it works best for people with smaller boobs but it‚Äôs a great dress!

I absolutely love this dress. The top part was a little tricky to figure out at first but with some body tape I was all good to go! I wore this for a party and everyone complimented me. I would definitely rent this again. Another successful RTR

links_reviews_title: So many compliments! Even total strangers!!!
links_reviews_text: This dress was a stunner! I received many compliments. The material was very easy to move in. The bust ran a bit small in my opinion but I really enjoyed wearing the dress!

links_reviews_title: Loved the dress! So many compliments and felt so confident!
links_reviews_text: Dress can run small. Be prepared to put something underneath, like a lace bralette, if you have larger boobs because you will fall out. Great, thick material. Didn‚Äôt get hot or sweaty and was able to move and feel comfortable!
Fits fine, no weird bulges, surprised that it fit my broad shoulders! It just looks kind of stupid.

links_reviews_title: This dress was lovely and I am tempted to purchase it!
links_reviews_text: I thought this dress was a perfect rehearsal dinner dress. A little edgy but still classy. I would not recommend to women larger in the chest area.
Felt sexy and comfortable, even after eating a bunch. I'm 5"6', 32 C bra.

I LOVE this dress! It's so flattering and I got so many compliments! It does run small so size up! I have a small chest so I didn't have to worry about slipping out of wearing tape. It holds you in real good. I wish I could own this dress!
I read reviews about this dress running small but 0R was my only option so I took a chance and I'm glad that I did.
The perfect dress and fit ! Very flattering and comfortable too!
Thick material and gorgeous dress. Did not wear it as I was worried to dance in it and maybe have a wardrobe malfunction. Wish I had somewhere to wear it to

Fit like a glove, shower just the perfect amount of skin, and made my tiny tatas look perfect. The neckline on this is stunning! Best part is I didn‚Äôt even need fashion tape. Everything stayed right where it should! Not the easiest to dance in due to the shape of the skirt but I made it work. Loved it!

I rented this dress for NYE, and I felt drop dead gorgeous! I agree with other reviewers that it runs small; I am between a size 4-6 and I ended up wearing the 6. The top part is VERY open and VERY small. I am a small 32B, and even I felt like the coverage was minimal. I secured everything with fashion tape to make sure everything stayed in place on the dance floor :) The fabric has a luxurious weight to it and a little stretch‚Äîno Spanx needed! I honestly have never felt more glamorous and powerful than in this dress!

I really liked this dress. However, the slits on the side are a lot larger than they appear in the photo, when I tried on the dress I was very surprised. If you aren't a fan of some underboob (and I'm fairly small chested) I wouldn't rent this dress. The capped sleeves were a very nice touch!

links_reviews_title: Fun dress, felt great in it!
links_reviews_text: Got this for a surprise fancy dinner for my boyfriend's birthday. I was concerned it might shift throughout the night, but it stayed in place just fine. It was a bit longer than I would have preferred, but I had to wear the bigger size to fit my chest. Overall, I loved it, and I got a lot of compliments!

links_reviews_title: I absolutely loved this dress! I received endless compliments on it!
links_reviews_text: The dress hugged all the right places and was a perfect dress!

I loved this dress for my birthday dinner. Its definitely an eye catcher. If you are at all insecure about showing cleavage, please don't get this dress. Also, I cannot stress this enough, please size up and get the larger size as a backup. It runs small. I'm 145 and had to basically hold my breath to zip up a size 6. Also, I'm a DD and had under boob showing.
Loved it. I was worried with the cut outs it would hinder my dancing or movement but it fits like a glove. A bit on gapping in the back if you don't watch your posture. Overall it was great
Dress was a perfect fit for the all white party. Received many compliments.

I rented this for a bachelorette dinner out with my girlfriends. It's a super fun piece. The back is totally open - there is no way you could wear a bra with this, but then front is really structured and you are held in quite securely. It is short - like really short. I'm only 5"3' and this dress was questionably short for my age/style. Overall glad I rented it for a fun night out
Loved the overall fit and styling of this dress, it wasn't starch white but the details add to it. Definitely need a little bit of a chest to have it properly and need pasties !
super cute!
Wore for my graduation photos, loved it! Is a bit short in the back but pretty much true to size

links_reviews_title: Darts in bust area makes for a really odd look
links_reviews_text: I loved everything about this dress...in pictures. However when I received it I was sadly disappointed. Pros - beautiful material and detail, cutout in the back was gorgeous. Fun mini skirt length for summer. Was planning on wearing with flat sandals since I am 5'10". Cons - reviews said to size up. I am normally a 4 on top and 6 on bottom so I ordered a L. The bust area was tight (I'm a 34-36C) and the darts were higher than my boobs so it fit so weird! The bottom in the waist area was gappy because it was too large and the hip area was larger however I would have been ok with that because it made the dress a little longer. I tried this on to wear several times and each time I couldn't get over the odd look the darts gave me from the side and even the front (my nipples looked higher than my girls!) sadly have to send it back :(

This dress is very short, but if you have legs to rock, I say go ahead. Just wear nude undies or something for the inevitable Marylin Monroe moments you'll be having. This fit well, even braless, the material is thick enough to conceal the nips. There is a lining as well that makes the dress lay smooth but traps body heat in the mid section. I'm 5'7", almost 6ft in the heels and would probably be more appropriate for a shorter person.

links_reviews_title: Rented this for my college reunion and it was so fun!
links_reviews_text: The small fit great and I'm 5'2/116lbs. The dress is a little on the short side! The open back was so fun and I just threw on some sticky boob things but you may not need anything if you are less busty!
This is a cute dress. The cut out in the back went down to about my low back. The dress was true to size and fit pretty comfortably. Not my faaaavorite rental but overall it was a nice dress to wear.

links_reviews_title: Great graduation dress! So many compliments
links_reviews_text: Fit was true to size and really popped in photos!

Midsection was the least flattering part of this dress. Neckline and sleeves with cutouts were a cute addition. Skirt is pretty flared, would have been hesitant to dance/bend over much due to concern for revealing too much. Dress was perfect length for my height, would run the risk of being too short for taller individuals. My chest is on the smaller size and definitely didn't fill out the top of the dress but it still looked good. Backless feature was stunning.

links_reviews_title: Got so many compliments on the dress! It was very flattering and comfortable.
links_reviews_text: Would definitely rent again! It was the perfect dress for a graduation. The fit of the dress is true to size as well.

While this dress was a little tight, it was actually a lot more flattering than I thought! Only issue was I had to size up because my regular size was way too short in the back even thought I'm 5'2. Overall really great dress and received a lot of compliments!
Perfect back

links_reviews_title: Perfect dress for a wedding celebration
links_reviews_text: I wore this for a wedding celebration my in laws through for us. It's a little short, but super cute! I got compliments on it all night.

Perfect fit and true to size! People came up to me and asked where I bought this dress from. I am petite and it hit at a perfectly appropriate length with heels on. Loved this dress and wish I could have kept it!

links_reviews_title: I received a ton of compliments, especially when people saw the back of the dress!
links_reviews_text: The dress fit well and was flattering. The flared bottom and back of the dress were adorable. Dress was a little short but wasn‚Äôt an issue since I‚Äôm only 5‚Äô1‚Äù. Once again a perfect dress from RTR!!

links_reviews_title: Very Cute! Should Have Sized Up
links_reviews_text: I'm 5'11 and ordered a medium and it was a little short! Not too bad though. So many compliments, the back is my favorite part! Definitely would recommend :)

I wore this dress to my outdoor wedding shower in April. The bell short sleeves and skirt are so cute and fun, while the open back adds the slightest touch of sexy. It's a Very high quality fabric and I would rent again.

links_reviews_title: Needed this dress for an all white bridal shower, this dress was perfect for it!
links_reviews_text: This dress is a bit short in the back and rides up a little bit, but not to the point where you show anything. If you are personally comfortable with shorter fitting dresses then this dress will make you very happy!

I loved this dress! I wore it for my graduation pictures! It was classy, yet fun with the cutout back! I loved the material-- it definitely made me feel confident enough to not wear a bra and still give me support. I would rent this dress again. Only con could be if you have a bigger butt the dress might lay as flat in the back causing it to be shorter than expected.

links_reviews_title: I wore this to my bridal shower and received lots of compliments!
links_reviews_text: The dress fit awesome and had great material. I loved the open back!
Fit true to size. The shape is very flattering. Good winter white dress for Christmastime in a warm place. Would definitely also work in spring/summer
The quality and fit are great! The back is a perfect amount of interest and fun. Worn for my engagement session.
Loved this so much I actually ended up buying it! It's so trendy, flattering and super easy to wear! Perfect for an hourglass figure but if you're more boxy it might not be the best fit for you

links_reviews_title: Great in photographs and stunning back
links_reviews_text: Beautiful dress. If you're subconscious about your lower belly, I wouldn't recommend it, because it doesn't sit quite flat due to the lining. The cutout details are beautiful and gold. I wore it to a baby shower and got many compliments. It won't fit everyone well, as it's very tailored. I wouldn't have bought it in a store but it's exactly the kind of dress that is perfect to rent!
Fit like a glove but in a good way. Originally ordered the large but it was too big in the bust. Went with the medium and it fit perfectly around my larger stomach!

links_reviews_title: SO CUTE!! Very short but great fit
links_reviews_text: So cute and I have to find a reason to wear so will rent again. I ended up not wearing to an engagement party because I felt like bride may be in white and that would be rude but I love the fit and this dress is adorable in. Very short FYI and I am 5' 2" so just a heads up. Open back is great

Overall the dress fit just OK. Not super flattering- felt a little like a tennis dress. I was hoping to wear for engagement photos but it was a little big and baggy. Shorter in the back... not sure if going down a size would have worked either.

links_reviews_title: I felt so beautiful and confident in this dress!
links_reviews_text: In my experience, this brand runs pretty small--so definitely size up.

The white is so crisp and clean! I got so many compliments on the back. I thought it might be too much for work, but it's modest everywhere else. Beware if you're tall as I think it's a little short (hard for me to tell I'm about 5 feet tall). I really liked this dress a lot more than I thought I would!
Cute for daytime rooftop bar hopping
This dress fits like a glove and has a cute flare. It's not too short, but short enough to be sassy, and the gold kicks it up a notch.

links_reviews_title: Short and open back, fit like a glove!
links_reviews_text: I loved this so much! I wore it to perform singing and playing fiddle...it was comfortable enough for that and was sooo cute! It's short but I didn't mind. Also no bra needed for a full C cup which happens only rarely. Also it's very well lined!! Not see through at all.

links_reviews_title: Received SO MANY compliments in this dress!! Would rent again in a heartbeat.
links_reviews_text: This dress fit like a glove - it was so flattering in every way and was just the right amount of flirty and fun, yet still classy. Wore it to a fraternity formal and had a GREAT time!! I almost always wear a medium/size 6 and the medium in this dress was no different - it fit perfectly. The dress is a little short though I will say - for my occasion it was fun, but definitely something to think about if attending a fancier event or you don't like short dresses.
Wore this for graduation! Looked amazing just a little tight!!

Great dress. Extremely flattering. I'm 5'2 and wore the XL because of how short it was. I wanted it a little longer for a conservative graduation ceremony. Besides running extremely small, great dress for any occasion.
It was a statement dress and I got so many compliments on it throughout the day. I'd definitely rent again!
Already reviewed with another picture but wanted to share the back view

Loved the details and back of this dress although it is hard to get a pic and see both the front and back details. I wore this to Oaks and it was great and flattering! I will say the darts seem to be a little high on the chest but not a deal breaker.
I'm a plus size lady and this jumpsuit worked perfectly for me! Looks great with flat shoes and heels! Wore it all day long in humid Texas weather. Will definitely rent again. OBSESSED!
As others have said the straps are a hair long but nothing unbearable. I wore it twice in Maui and loved it.
Comfortable, light and comfortable. Ties in the back so it can show tour bra
Loved this jumpsuit

links_reviews_title: Absolute stunner! From start to finish. Perfect fit, flattering, very comfortable.
links_reviews_text: I'm tall and jumpsuits can be problematic at times but this one was perfect. Super cute tie detail in the back. Very cool that the bottom half is not lined in the legs and high slit on the sides adds for it to be unforgettable. Many compliments and I felt great. I would say that the particular one that I wore was probably ready to be retired as it felt a bit old but it was really great none the less.

The fabric and texture makes this jumper luxurious. It especially highlights the smallest part of your waist. It was a tight fit and I needed help zipping it up and closing the pin. You really can't wear a bra with this. Perfect for the weekend.

I loved the slit up the sides and how the lining underneath is only the length of a short so you can really see the design of the jumper. I am very busty but it was super comfortable with the back being adjustable I didn't even need to wear a bra. The color was great and fit was flattering. I was looking for an easy piece to throw on for lunch during vacation and look put together since we were going away with many other couples and it was just perfect! The color was beautiful in person!

links_reviews_title: Good color and pattern, not the most flattering
links_reviews_text: Maybe I was just too tall for this romper, but I didn't find it all that flattering.

links_reviews_title: Airy, coral, and stands out from the crowd!
links_reviews_text: As many other renters have commented, neither of the two available button holes for the straps were small enough for my short frame. But, I got creative, unbuttoned them, and made my own halter top instead! The color is vibrant and very fun. I wore this on 90 degree days during the summer to keep me cool and it did the trick. I received many compliments and would absolutely rent again!

I'm in between sizes these days, so I ordered the 4 which had a lot of room (could've probably fit into the 2) although I don't think it was noticeable in person or to anyone other than myself. Length was great for someone short like me (5'1"), I have it a quick steam before wearing.
Very comfortable fit was true to size.
Adjustable straps make the fit easy. Fun lace legs

This is a beautiful coral color that I think would be flattering on the lightest to darkest skin tones. It is very cool and comfortable for summer wear, but would work spring through fall. The straps have two buttonholes so are adjustable. My weight has fluctuated, so I ordered on the large size because I didn't want tightness. I think a 16 would be fine. I can't get over how many compliments I have gotten!!! Would rent again for sure.

links_reviews_title: Perfect fit, except for long straps
links_reviews_text: The fit on this jumpsuit was great except for the long straps. They're only adjustable to two options, the tighter one still being too loose. I wore it anyway and kept pulling the straps back up because it was so cute otherwise.
Didn't do me any favors and didn't wear.

What a fun jumper!!! I got an unreal number of compliments and felt GREAT in it. I sized up because I feel like I never know, but I probably shouldn't have. I have a large bust and felt like everything fit awesomely. Will definitely be renting this again!!!!

Loved the color and structure of this piece, but something about the heaviness of the fabric made it feel the opposite of effortless. It was larger on top, but the bow in the back allowed for adjusting. Very pretty, just not for me. Would be nice for a professional event in the summer time. Straps were also adjustable which was a huge plus!

I wore this on a girls trip to Palm Springs when we went out to brunch. It was super comfortable and I received many compliments. I only gave it 4 stars because of the quality. One of the straps was very worn out and ripped within 10 min of putting it on, but I was able to pin it and wear it all day.
Looked very worn and the button broke

I am 5'1" and 110 lbs. this fit me so awkwardly. I felt like it gathered in the crotch area as if it was too short for my torso, but the straps were actually slightly long. I did not think it was flattering and I didn't wear it, unfortunately.
Tons of compliments. Felt confident

links_reviews_title: Great color, great wide leg, slimming fit! so trendy.
links_reviews_text: Great color, great wide leg, slimming fit! so trendy.

links_reviews_title: This jumpsuit was fun! It was a nice coral color and I received many compliments..
links_reviews_text: I thought it was a little long in crotch area .. but I‚Äôm a little short.. but otherwise it fit perfectly!

links_reviews_title: Unique color and very cool openwork fabric made me live this jumpsuit
links_reviews_text: I wore this a bunch of times and rented it twice this summer. It was lightweight due to the openwork fabric but looked pulled together for a summer evening party
Soooo stinking cute! You will love this! Forgot to take a picture! Fits great and comfortable!!
This jumpsuit was super cute but it wasn't a proportional fit. The waist was tiny, the bust was probably made for a B-cup and the straps were long (despite being adjusted to the shortest length).
This was a fun piece, but the fabric was a bit thicker and stiffer than I expected. I sit between a 4 and 6 and the 6 looked a bit frumpy on me.

links_reviews_title: Perfect for summer weekend, outdoor party
links_reviews_text: This is adorable, comfortable and light. The color is a good bright red. The pant legs are not lined beyond the upper thighs, so the eyelet pattern is see-through adding a nice summer touch. Also there are high slits on the sides, again making it more airy. Only consideration is that it's not the easiest in terms of bathroom breaks, and you need to be flexible enough to untie the back and climb out of this before any accidents!
Fit well but a little big in waist

links_reviews_title: LOVE THIS GREAT FIT GREAT COLOR
links_reviews_text: Got tons of compliments, this was perfect

i wish i had taken a photo in this! regardless, tons of compliments on the color. i tend to stray from red because my skin is more olive and i feel like red sometimes makes me look a little washed out. also, i wore this a couple days after spending too much time in the sun and was a bit redder than usual. regardless, this is a super comfortable and effortless jumpsuit. i have a bit of a tummy and the pleats on this we're flattering and made me feel great. i didn't love the slits in the side of the pants, felt as if the jumpsuit had enough going in with the see through crochet in the legs, but it did help cool me down since it was so hot out the day i wore this!

links_reviews_title: Love the color but runs large
links_reviews_text: Loved the color, but it was too big so I was unable to wear it

links_reviews_title: Such a great color but the top fit in a way that I didn't love
links_reviews_text: Sadly, did not wear this- the top was so cute but impossible for me to get to fit correctly. I could not cover up my bra (and wearing a real bra is a must for me). Great jumper, just didn't work for me.

links_reviews_title: Loved It, but ordered too big!
links_reviews_text: Ordered up in size and definitely didn't need the extra room. A 4R would have fit perfectly. I have narrow hips and a smaller chest so it just looked roomy on me. Definitely would love to try it in a smaller size!!!
I ordered up a size, worried about my curvy thighs. But it was actually too big. So a 14 would have been fine.
Rented this before it got cold and did errands during the weekend with my hubby and everywhere we went ladies were dolling out the compliments - loved it!

I have an hourglass shape and this jumpsuit really emphasized the smallest part of my waist. It was very flattering. The color, back tie detail, the eyelets and slits on the sides really made this jumpsuit a standout in the crowd.

links_reviews_title: Loved this jumpsuit, very cute and comfortable.
links_reviews_text: Change the straps to fit your height and tighten the bow a lot to make the top tighter.

links_reviews_title: Super fun for Cinco de Mayo
links_reviews_text: I wore this romper on a girls trip on Cinco De Mayo and it was very fun and festive. The only downside were that the straps were extremely loose and kept falling down, and it's difficult to wear a bra if you don't want to wear a jacket due to to open tie back. Otherwise, it's very cute for a day walking around town.
Rented this in a size 6 (I am usually a 4) because it looked like it might run narrow in the legs, but it actually runs quite large. I plan to re-rent in a 4, or maybe 2, because it's really cute!
This dress was adorable! I loved it so much I purchased it. I would size up as it runs very small. Love the pop of red color!

links_reviews_title: Best for going out vs work
links_reviews_text: A little short for work, tight around rib cage, but stellar dress otherwise.

links_reviews_title: I wore this for Christmas Eve. It was great due to the color obviously.
links_reviews_text: Super cute. Little shorter than I'm used to wearing, but not inappropriate with hose/tights. The fabric and detail ribbons definitely look warn and vintage after all the dry cleaning this garment has been through. Perhaps that wouldn't be the case if it was singularly owned, but given it has been dry cleaned many times, it has a worn look. Not as sharp as I had expected or seen in the photos online.
Loved the scallop detailing - the vibrant red - and of course the pockets! Was perfect with my lipstick!
This dress would be dressed up or down! Perfect for a rehearsal dinner! Definitely pops!
Great cut and color.
A tad tight in the top but material is stretchy I ordered the size 2 and I am usually a 2 to 4, so 4 probably would've been better. But still wearable!

links_reviews_title: Cute dress but runs small, especially chest and arm holes
links_reviews_text: Cute dress,.. but agree with other posts. Runs one to two sizes too small. Arm holes were tight on me too.

This dress was a great color. It looked stunning with a black Ted Baker blazer and Anyi Lu heels .... and don't we wish she would go back to making shoes? The dress was very tight in the bust and under the arms. If I were to wear it without a jacket would need a larger size. It came new with the tags on. However, the bric brac on the bottom was unstitched and gaping slightly....I think that is not acceptable on any garment in this situation. I wore this for an all day into evening event. It has a lot of wrinkles in it now. Would have liked to have gotten two wearings, but really needs a good cleaning to address the wrinkles. Also the tightness under arms meant that the under arm area needs cleaning. Still a stunning outfit and many compliments.

links_reviews_title: This dress runs true to size, but it was a little short.

links_reviews_text: SUPER CUTE
This dress was too snug and it did not work for me. I should have sized up

links_reviews_title: Causal day date with the hubs, such a fun dress.
links_reviews_text: Felt like I was right out of the 60's. Paired with some funky glasses and hit downtown Manhattan with the hubs. He even commented, "cute dress"

links_reviews_title: Adorable but several sizes smaller than I anticipated.
links_reviews_text: Could not wear. Too short and too tight.
Fit, but tight. Would probably need a size up to be comfortable but looked good.

Another reviewer had commented that it was the perfect summer dress for work. Not for my office. It was very short and also ran small overall. I'm typically a size 2 and am a size 4 in brands that run small. The 40, equivalent to a US 4, was almost too small for me to get on. Cute dress for a night out or event though.

links_reviews_title: So cute - wish it was two inches longer
links_reviews_text: I personally do not mind a short dress for things like brunch with the girls. However this one is REALLY REALLY short. It didn't even pass the fingertip test. And I wanted so much to wear it but it was an accident waiting to happen. As a side note the comments about the arm holes running small is true, that was a little snug. But that was liveable.
Very cute, but it runs really small in the bodice. I had to return it. The arm holes and neck are especially small. If you're between sizes I would definitely recommend sizing up.
Loved it! Held up well all day - pretty color.

Loved it! Definitely go one size up (or if you're between sizes, just go towards the bigger one). I actually have a very small upper body frame, so I was delighted with the fit...but I get it. The style is adorable, and translated well to a summer formal work environment. Would buy it if I could afford it.

links_reviews_title: Love this dress but def. order a size up. Style was cute but I couldn't wear it bc too small.
links_reviews_text: I would order 2 sizes up from your 'normal' size.
The color and dress is adorable but material is thick so wrinkles easy.

Overall cute, but is on the short side. I am 5'4" and this dress falls mid thigh. If I were on the taller side, I would seemed this as an everyday wear dress. Fabric wrinkles easily and quality is decent.
Dress was wrinkled, and warning - it‚Äôs very short!
Very tight around the hips so it rides up if you have any shape

links_reviews_title: Didnt wear- Cute dress but so tiny!
links_reviews_text: Didnt wear

links_reviews_title: Great dress for a work event with pockets!
links_reviews_text: Love this dress! So cute and fits well. Feels well made. Pockets were a huge plus. Maybe a little on the shorter side, but I still felt very comfortable at work and have long legs.

links_reviews_title: This is my favorite thing I have ever rented!
links_reviews_text: This dress is just perfect. You can wear it with a normal bra, it is long enough that I could wear my spanx but above the knee. It is well made and cute and professional at the same time. It's the perfect dress!
Great for hourglass, but a little snug in the bust. Beautifully made!
Calling this a dress is a generous term. I would have taken a picture but I would have basically been naked. The length barely covered my bum.

So many compliments on this! I got an 8 because the 6 wasn't available & it was a little big, so I would say it runs true to size. It also wrinkles fairly easily, so you will need to press if wearing day to night or more than once.
This is so small and short, maybe 2 sizes bigger would have worked? Not only the length but the arm holes were very small which is not usually an issue for me.
I loved everything about this top the fit was very flattering even if it ran a little big. Beautiful fabric would definitely rent again
Wore a XS but am usually between a 4 and 6. It itches in the neck area. Nice fabric though
I loved this top. I wore it a few different ways, with leather look leggings and with jeans. Very versatile. Looks cute either tied up or not. Very flattering, runs large.
I wore this top a couple of times during my rental. I got tons of compliments when wearing it. I probably would have purchased it was it not for the price. Very nice top!!
I originally rented a medium, and it was not flattering. I sized down to a small, and it was a perfect fit! The sleeves sexy and fun. I would rent again!

links_reviews_title: Cute top but not really flattering
links_reviews_text: I'm 5'6 and about 180lbs. The top fit well, but the lack of structure just wasn't flattering to me.
This top was okay, but it did not look like a $400 top. The material was low quality and it looked heavily worn. Fun for one night, but I wouldn't rent again.
Loved this top! Very comfortable and fit perfectly/true to size. Beautiful burgundy color. Don't hesitate to rent this one!

This was pretty. I liked wearing it because it's light weight and comfy, while still super feminine. I wore it to a casual Christmas get together. Paired it with black jeans and booties. The only reason I didn't give this 5 starts is because there is a lot of fabric. A little more "flowy" than I prefer. Still a great rental.

links_reviews_title: Fun top! I wore it to my daughters concert... it can be dressed up or down. Does run big
links_reviews_text: Runs big, very flattering. All around just fun!

This runs big but the stunning shape is great with skinny jeans or leather pants. The wya the sleeves cinch at the wrists was very comfortable too!! I wore this two different ways during the week I had it. It's a fun shirt!

Rented this for a concert, was super cute! Instead of tying the neck I tucked in the strings and left it open. Sleeves were a bit long but I'm almost very short so I didn't think much of it. Great color, looks sheer but isn't see through.

This was a fun blouse. Perfect for a girls night out birthday party. I felt beautiful in it and received a ton of compliments. It was a good length. Fabric is a little sheer but with so much fabric it covered everything nicely.
Cute top, not flattering for busty women.

links_reviews_title: So huge I didn't get to wear it
links_reviews_text: I may try to order this in a small but not sure. It was so incredibly large it looked awful on me.

Wore this to a work holiday party. Sleeves were a little much and kind of annoying but overall the top was fun a flowy, perfect for dancing. Definitely intended to be more of a baby doll fit, so not fitted. You can tie the little neck tie or not. I chose not to and it worked out well.
Wore this to an after wedding brunch and to a nice dinner with leather leggings and got so many compliments! Comfortable and true to size.
Too baggy, not a great cut, just overall was not good for me
Wore this to thanksgiving dinner and loved it. Got tons of compliments and the silk straps to tie at the neck are festive. It's not super long but looked great with boots.
I wore this to my family's Thanksgiving, beautiful shirt got tons of compliments, will be renting again
If you are super thin this would probably be cute but if you have any boobs the shirt hangs off your boobs in a weird way and makes you look like a balloon.

links_reviews_title: Easy to wear and cute with jeans.
links_reviews_text: It is loose but flattering. I wore it to work also. Great material, color and style
Amazing color & style elevated and outfit

The color and drape of this blouse is fantastic, and it is so comfortable! It was amazingly flattering on me, so I was glad I rented it after having some hesitation in reading other reviews. Whether this blouse works will probably depend on where the length hits you. This is one of those soft, voluminous tops that are best worn with skinny pants, and if the length hits you in the wrong spot, it might make you look larger than you are. However, I say it is worth giving a try because, if it works for you, this one is tempting enough to buy!

This top is very pretty. The color is amazing and it is well made. It is very flowy and shapeless so not the most flattering top on my frame but it looked cute with skinny jeans. I wore this twice and got so many compliments on it. It is see through so you do need to wear something under it.
Flirty fun. Felt like a flowing goddess.
True to size and love how it just flows

I borrowed this for a date night, but went with my other borrowed back up top. Even with the cold shoulders, it was just too much fabric. I felt like a tent! I just couldn't pull it off, even with skinny ankle jeans and heels. Just wasn't for me!
Did not wear

links_reviews_title: Gorgeous ! Easy breezy beautiful dress up or down !
links_reviews_text: Gorgeous ! Easy breezy beautiful dress up or down !
This is a cute blouse - great for a casual night out with a pair of jeans or slacks.

links_reviews_title: Feels like a ton of fabric
links_reviews_text: Color is pretty and it's very flowy, not fitted at all. It made me feel huge but I think it probably looked cuter from other people's perspective. It just felt like too much fabric. Well made piece.
Loved this shirt. It can be dressed up or dressed down. Super comfortable and flattering on.
NICE

links_reviews_title: Very flattering and comfortable. Hide all my trouble areas and so comfy!
links_reviews_text: Beautiful material.

links_reviews_title: Lovely burgundy color with interesting sleeves
links_reviews_text: Sleeves were interesting but got in the way a little by the wrists. If in between sizes, size down because it runs slightly large.
Great. Would of preferred medium but was not available when order was placed. I felt like I was swimming in it. But overall made it work and super cute style.

links_reviews_title: Most comfortable shirt I've worn on a date in awhile
links_reviews_text: Fun sleeves & bow

links_reviews_title: Balloon circus tent city population: ME
links_reviews_text: I am a big fan of three things: Ramy, maroon, and off the shoulder chiffon blouses. However ...this completely missed the mark. I rented the small because I have a small bust and narrow shoulders and I was swimming in it ! Nothing about this top flattered me the cut was also awkwardly too short yet too long on my longer 5'8" torso. Hit me at my largest part on my middle creating a "mrs circus balloon tent" effect. ~So Chic~ I tried it tied and untied up top and nothing worked I immediately put it back in the bag. I think this might potentially work if you are short and busty but hey roll the dice on this one. Sorry not posting the pic.

links_reviews_title: Cute shirt to hit the town
links_reviews_text: I got this shirt for holiday parties but did not end up wearing it out. That said, it would have been very cute - fit well, flowy but not too flowy. The material was not see through. I would wear it for the right occasion.

links_reviews_title: I decided to take a chance and rent this for my baby shower!!!
links_reviews_text: I had read that there was no give in the torso area but it actually felt okay around my 34 weeks pregnant belly! The layers and asymmetrical look flatters the body! Made very nicely!

Wore this for our anniversary dinner and it. Is. Gorgeous. It flattered my middle (I'm apple shaped) and was such a standout dress. It was extremely long, even with my tallest heels (I'm 5'3"), but I managed to tie up part of it underneath a layer of ruffles so that I could Wear it with sandles without tripping over it. I will DEFINITELY rent this again for a Hawaii trip in January.

This came as a replacement for my original order. Lovely ruffles and elegant asymmetrical neckline. Surprisingly warm and heavily lined. The side zipper felt awkwardly placed I needed help getting it to close. But overall a surprisingly beautiful alternative for an anniversary dinner by the lake!

This dress was a back-up style and wow, was it a bit. It is so lightweight and unique, covering all of my insecure spots (the dreaded armpit fat and tummy pooch) while still having a classy sexy factor (hello, shoulders and cleavage). Loved it, I am struggling with having to return it. I would highly recommend this dress, I received compliments all night.

links_reviews_title: Blending in with the English garden and feeling romantic in this dreamy dress!
links_reviews_text: I rented this dress for a summer wedding in Belfast when I was 4 months postpartum and still breastfeeding. It was light and airy and oh so romantic. I loved this dress and loved how it made me feel! It's absolutely stunning and was flattering. I felt so beautiful and would definitely rent again!
Stunning dress and oh so flattering with the A-line cut. Really hides the stomach area. I loved this dress so much I bought it!
#unique #comfortable #feminine #elegant

The sizes I ordered varied tremendously. The 18 was way too big and long but ultimately what I had to wear. The 16 that I received had both the straps and the waist altered and it looked like it may have been done by hand (the straps were the most apparent). However, other than the sizing discrepancy the dress itself is light even though it is layered. I received many compliments on the look! If you're lucky to get the perfect fit you'll absolutely love it!

This dress is gorgeous ! I used it for my engagement shoot, perfect for Springtime. I wore an 8R it basically fit but I said "ran small" because it doesn't stretch much, and the strap on the right was kind of tight but my left side was falling off my arm. Other than that I loved it!

Really pretty cut. Interesting details, love the ruffles and it fit well! It was actually more flattering than I expected. The fabric pulled over a bit in the bust area for me revealing the white silk lining but a very small amount. Got lots of compliments and wore it again for dinner on the honeymoon! Need a strapless bra.

links_reviews_title: Rehearsal Dinner... perfect for the occasion
links_reviews_text: This dress fit so perfect!!! Normally I can't wear v cut necklines because of my bust, but with dress, i had no problem. There wasn't a ton of cleavage and it fit perfect!!
Rented this for my bridal shower and it was ideal! You can make this dress really formal, but it also worked for a Sunday brunch situation. Fit was perfect and quality is top notch.

links_reviews_title: LOVED this dress!! Size up for larger bust.
links_reviews_text: Gorgeous print and fun ruffly design- loved wearing.

Ok, so this dress was a little long because I am 5"2 but when I tell y'all that it was so comfortable and lightweight I tell no lies. Dresses by Monique Lhuillier are typically formal, but this one can be worn on date night, an elegant brunch or some other special occasion you want to look damn fabulous for. Also, the lining stretches. *yells, "Praise God!!!Thank you Jesus!!!"*
Beautiful romantic dress perfect for a wedding. It is fully lined so it was a little warmer than I was hoping but it looked great and moved so nicely in the breeze.

This dress was so flattering! The ruffles and cut were perfect to hide those extra pounds and the flowy sleeves gave the dress an extra pop. The other reviews are right about the straps being very loose - we used a safety pin in the back to tighten them up and show less cleavage (I mean, it was a brunch bridal shower...none of my mom's friends want to see that, hah).
