At 5'9 the maxi length was good, I wore flats and it hit right below my ankle. I got so many compliments and I know it wasn't just because I was the bride. Highly recommend this dress!

links_reviews_title: Felt so great in this dress!
links_reviews_text: Only con was that I had to keep pulling it up. But I ordered large for my bust size. Overall- loved it!

I wore this dress for both my engagement photos and for wine tasting at my bachelorette party. I received tons of compliments on the dress and was so comfortable -the dress is totally unique from most dresses I've seen. The top was a little big so the sleeves feel down a lot, but it was kind of in keeping with the dresses flowy feel, so I didn't mind that much
Loved the dress and got tons of complements A bit hard to walk in due to width of dress

links_reviews_title: Beautiful, classy dress for elegant spring/summer event
links_reviews_text: Great dress, fit TTS. I am 5'8" and it was a perfect length with heels in the regular size. If short, may want to order the shorter version. Great "flowy", comfortable dress. Received tons of compliments and the dress did not wrinkle all day.

links_reviews_title: Such a pretty dress, but an awkward fit.
links_reviews_text: I rented this for my sister in law's bridal shower, and it received lots of compliments. The color and pattern is SO pretty. The fit, however, is a little odd. I have narrow shoulders, but the straps were too long and kept falling down, and the v is low... I kept having to adjust so you couldn't see the top of my strapless bra. The rest of the dress is overall relatively small - only small steps in this dress! I did like it, but you need a strapless plunge bra (and maybe a longer torso?) to make this work.

I wanted to feel special for my birthday and this dress did not disappoint. I've put on a little weight and wanted something flattering. I could have done a size 12 but the 14 was fine. I think sizing up made it easier to walk in since the slip is narrow. This photo does not do the dress justice. I felt great the whole night. I elected not to wear a bra and it was fine.

links_reviews_title: I got so many compliments while wearing this dress!
links_reviews_text: This dress is amazing! The asymmetrical cut is fantastic for my curvy body and I felt so sexy and pretty while wearing it. There is a lining, so if it will be warm at your event, you may want to rethink wearing this dress. Other than that it was really comfortable. The top is a bit tiny but I have DD and this is a designer dress so I was prepared to fill it out and then some. I wore it to a college graduation and didn't feel like it was too revealing. I would totally wear this dress again!
Received so many compliments wearing this dress!! Fits great a little long but nothin heels can't fix.

Even though this dress was too long for me, I just had to wear it because I was struck by the beauty of the print the moment I unzipped the garment bag. The print looks like a watercolor, & the fabric moves beautifully as you walk. I wore my highest heels, and taking a tip from another customer, I rolled the fabric at the waist to keep it from dragging on the ground. Strangely enough, it was slightly large on me as well. If I rent this again, I think the 2 would work better for me. If it fits better, I might not need to roll the waist to keep it from dragging.

LOVED THIS DRESS!!! I'm usually a 12 but went up to the 14 (the 12 was snug at the chest, 38DD.) The straps were aaaalmost too long, but I think the larger bust took up the excess, didn't need to pin, one shoulder slid off only when sitting. The draping is super flattering without looking like you're trying to hide bulges! The bottom was pretty slim, so don't expect to take long strides, but it didn't interfere with anything. The back went down low enough to show off neck and shoulders, but still high enough to wear a strapless body suit. Wore coral strappy wedges from WHBM, got so many complements. Felt gorgeous and relaxed all night!
The dress was a bit big, but they didn't have a size 4. I ended up pinning it a few places to fit. Felt like the front was a little low cut. In general pretty flowy and flattering.

The fabric does have little give, but the 6 fit perfectly. I felt comfortable all night and received several compliments from both guests and venue staff at a formal, lakeside rehearsal dinner. A little long for my height, but I made it work with a high wedge.
Rented for a Christening and loved it. Fit me perfectly and was comfortable. Beautiful pattern.
slightly tight fit, love the length and the flow. the top part was fairly loose (strap kept falling down and needed adjusting) but it is a great dress. got compliments all day long!
Feminine, flowy and comfortable. Form fitting but not tight, with just the right amount of ruffle. Side zipper helps you get the dress on.

links_reviews_title: Little room to breath but beautiful dress
links_reviews_text: Dress material has no give, was a little tight and therefor made sitting in it difficult
A little long but easily tucks and conforms. Beautiful dress.
It was a beautiful dress to wear for Mother's Day! Many compliments, nice flow and beautiful colors.

I absolutely love this dress, it was perfect for my Bridal Shower and I got so many compliments! Fits true to size and is fairly comfortable to wear. My only note is the bottom half of the dress is a little restricting (no long strides) but it really wasn't a problem.

I wore this dress to my Bridal Shower. I wanted something that would be great for the backyard affair but not a plain white dress. this one fit the bill and the pattern/floral detailing was really pretty. I found it fit pretty true to size, but the straps were too long for me and I had to pin them so the top didn't fall down too low. I am only 5"3, so I think if you were a couple inches taller you wouldn't have that problem. Also, because of my height, you couldn't really see the asymmetrical detail and the right side did touch the ground, but not too big of a deal, if there had been petite sizes, it would have been perfect. I loved how it was flowy, yet fitted and showed off just the right amount of cleavage.
Beautiful dress but long!
This dress is a really good piece to start an outfit with. The only downside is there's no slit in the skirt so walking is a bit of a chore.

I wore this to a charity luncheon for cancer partners and I had many compliments on it. It was very comfortable and beautiful I felt great in it but it is really long especially on one side even with 5 inch wedges it covered my foot on that side. Glad I rented it though stinking dress.
Fits perfectly. Very flowly. Looks great!
Runs TTS, I think if I rent again I will go down to a small. Pretty conservative IMO, but the slots on the side spice it up a little!

I wore this dress to dinner on vacation in Santorini, Greece. It was unique and comfortable. The length was a perfect maxi length for someone my height. Per other reviews I ordered a size up from my regular size and it fit well except a little big in the hips.

I ordered this in the medium and large and ended up wearing the large. The dress was comfortable, fit really well, and there was no need to wear a bra. Sometimes off the shoulder dresses are hard to dance in at weddings, but this one wasn't constricting at all! I loved the long slit from the base of the dress to the white hem, and the eyelets that run through the base as well. Highly recommend renting!

I rented this dress for a pretty formal rehearsal dinner and cannot be more satisfied with it. It's a little heavy but that didn't really bother me. It's a beautiful dress with gorgeous details. Very happy with this rental!

Form-fitting and flattering for girls with curves:). My only mini complaint is the length (3/4(?)) which one has to get used to first..- I wish it would exist in floor length! On the other hand, can highlight your heels;)
I'm in love with this dress. It is so crazy flattering, accentuates your curves so well. It runs small and has no stretch so best to size up. Didn't need to wear a bra and I'm a DD.

I wore to a Western Chic themed rehearsal dinner in Colorado. Perfect and fit occasion without looking costumey. I would also wear again for other events without the cowboy boots. Could also look great for a Southern formal event or any event where a structured but still romantic stress fits the occasion.

links_reviews_title: Was delivered straight to my hotel!
links_reviews_text: I wore this to an international religious convention, I was confused with being foreign bc of the beauty of this dress! I received so many compliments! It wasn't tight, I wanted something. Modest and this was perfect! Rent this!

I found this dress very flattering - it fits nicely throughout the bodice. I didn't realize that the bottom of the dress is basically see-through and there are two huge slits up both sides. It was a bit more risqu√© than I had thought but I felt fine in it once it was on and my legs were covered when sitting. It was a tiny bit tight in the chest/ribs but not uncomfortable.

links_reviews_title: Beautiful, flirty dress... compliments all night!!
links_reviews_text: This dress really is so gorgeous. Simple and understated with a sexy silhouette. I wore the medium and it was slightly tight in the hips and a bit loose in the waist. This made sitting a bit difficult but it really wasn't a huge issue. The eyelet fabric was great for masking any imperfections. I received countless compliments the entire evening. There are belt loops on this dress but a belt is not included, so not sure what that's about. Overall, a really fun, flirty dress that I would definitely rent again.

links_reviews_title: TRIPLE D'S AND I DIDN'T HAVE TO WEAR A BRA
links_reviews_text: Oh my gosh, I love this dress! I seriously dream about an opportunity where I could rent this again! I rented it for a September 23rd wedding at a Florida blueberry farm. It was a coworker's wedding where my entire office was attending, so I needed it to be modest enough to wear in front of everyone, but breezy enough that I could wear it in the Florida heat outside. I absolutely love the off the shoulder style but I can never get away with it because as a 32F, I always need to wear a bra. This dress let me fulfill my dreams!!!!! It was 100% supportive and the frill on top covered up any nippy peeks! The dress is a beautiful denim blue with white eyelets. It does have a slit that goes up to that last seam. That fell about low to mid thigh for me (5 foot 4). There's a zipper up the left side. The dress stays up well even through all the dancing! I don't think I ever adjusted it! I will 100% rent again!

Great fit. Unforgiving fabric and very true to size. The bottom part of the dress where the horizontal line is is where the full coverage stops and that was right below my backside. Beautiful dress. Wore it to a day date with the hubby. One thing though, there are loops for a belt but there was no belt and I don't see one in the original phot so I am not sure what that is about.

links_reviews_title: So comfortable and I got compliments everywhere I went!
links_reviews_text: The only con was that the bottom half is see through with side slits so I had to add a lacy slip underneath for work.
This dress was cute and comfortable! Perfect for a casual summer wedding. Wore the small, even though I usually wear medium. I recommend getting a smaller backup size.

links_reviews_title: Gorgeous dress for summer day party
links_reviews_text: This dress fits perfectly and the bottom is unlined which gives it a little extra something. Wore to a day party and got so many compliments. Would def rent again, maybe even buy.
I absolutely loved this dress! It was perfect for a late summer by the ocean wedding. I received so many compliments and felt super comfortable in it all night. It had so many fun details!

Ok. Wow. This. Dress. The only size available was a small and it was a tight fit on me but I just HAD to wear this. Such a fun and beautiful dress that is beautifully made. I did not need to wear a bra due to the top ruffle and the length is very flattering. I will say that the actual cover of the dress is pretty short and the added length to the dress is the eyelet material without a liner. This is totally fine but you will need to be careful how you sit. This has been my favorite rental yet! I will rent again...and next time in a medium so I can wear it comfortably all day long.
Got this dress for my vacation in Miami and got tons of compliments. Very Spanish vibe!
Love the color and design. I think this dress would fit prettier for tall girls tho! (I was wearing 10cm heels in da pic. I'm 5.4)

I wore this for a wedding rehearsal dinner. It's a pretty dress but I found the off shoulder sleeves to be a bit tight/uncomfortable. Also, not great for super hot summer days as the material is a bit thick.
Loved everything about this dress! I'm very small chested so it was a little big but overall amazing.

I really love this dress. I wore it to brunch and to meet my friend's new baby and then out to dinner that night and it was comfortable all day long. The fabric is great quality and thick without being heavy. It fit more form fitting than I thought in my waist but was still super flattering. The off the shoulder was great and stayed in place without me having to mess with it. I got stopped by 6 women that day alone who told me they loved the dress or wanted to know where I got it. I highly recommend it, one of my favorite rentals.

links_reviews_title: Great quality and color. So cute! Wore to nice dinner and wedding rehearsal.
links_reviews_text: Fitted around the tummy, but still slimming. I have a large bust (34DD) but didn't need to wear a bra because it was tight enough to hold up. I'm 5'4" and it hit tops of my feet in flats.

links_reviews_title: Summer Dress Greatness. No Bra Required.
links_reviews_text: Recommended by stylist at RTR Store and sooooooo grateful as I would not normally have tried it. Very well made, great details & construction. I'm a 32C and did not need a bra because of the ruffle. Sat comfortably for hours at a party in this dress, no wrinkles!! Love!

links_reviews_title: So much more beautiful in person!
links_reviews_text: Was surprised that this dress wasn't very popular. So beautiful in person! Will definitely be renting again. The fit was perfect and the details of the fabric were gorgeous....be ready for tons of compliments!!
I rented this for a cocktail reception the evening before a wedding. The dress was comfortable and flattering. Would rent again!

links_reviews_title: It was a for a civil wedding in Mexico, followed by a wedding party walk around the town.
links_reviews_text: I loved everything about this dress. Fit, comfort, and style.
Fit perfectly!

links_reviews_title: Did not wear it , it's too small
links_reviews_text: it's too small
I love this dress! But the elastic had given out on the shoulders of the one i received and the straps flopped down and exposed my bosom, so that was a no-go. :(

links_reviews_title: Lovely and sassy for the Greek vacation in my dreams!
links_reviews_text: This wasn't available when I was looking for a festive frock, and I thought I'd come up with someplace to wear it, but no luck. I asked my daughter where I could wear it and she said, "Greece!" The bottom half of the dress is unlined eyelet with slits on sides. Really fun and flattering. Part of me wants to hold on to it until I plan a trip to the islands!

links_reviews_title: Gorgeous, but go up a size
links_reviews_text: Very pretty, but part below your bum is true eyelet so purely see-through. I would suggest sizing up
It's curvy and fits well
I didn't end up wearing this but it was flattering and cute! I'm between a 0 and 2 and the XS was tight but wearable, if I rented again I'd get the small. The print is great for summer.

links_reviews_title: Nice casual dress for everyday wear.
links_reviews_text: The dress is a beautiful blue color and has good detailing including the slits on the sides that go up to about knee level. I am 5'8 -150 lbs. and the medium fit perfectly with no bra needed. It had very little stretch but was comfortable.

links_reviews_title: Adorable and even cuter on someone who is petite!
links_reviews_text: I am 5'3" and this makes a great maxi, which is so nice as maxis are always too long. It runs a bit slim in the waist, but bonus for not needing a bra.
The off the shoulder sleeves didn't have any elasticity and fell off the shoulders. Would have been cute if fit properly.

I wore this dress for a western themed party and it turned out great. I used it with boots and camel colored buckled belt and a cute purse. I received so many compliments. It's comfortable and appealing.

links_reviews_title: Such a great option for a hot August outdoor wedding.
links_reviews_text: Not too loose, not too tight. Fit really nicely. The embroidery is beautiful on the dress. The wedding I attended was completely outside at a winery and by wearing nice jewelry & shoes I was the perfect amount of 'dressed up'.

links_reviews_title: This dress is so cute, transitioning perfectly from dinner to bars while in Lisbon.
links_reviews_text: While I loved the style, I would say the dress I received had been stretched out in the stomach area by other wearers, so it wasn't as tailored as it should be.

Wow this dress is stunning!! Wore it during work from home and really wish I could wear it to a royal gala!!! The puff sleeves and high neck with the bow in the back are so glam, and the pockets are an additional plus!!!
I was truly heartbroken to return this dress. It is stunning and comfortable. I received so many compliments on it!
Pictures don't do this stunning dress justice. Find an appropriate event and wear this dress. You will not regret it!
I wore backwards for a different look. So cool, rent for fun!

The perfect cinnamon red. It's loose and flowing with enough shape in the bust to show you have a body. I added a belt for even more shape. The compliments rolled in all night. Love a high neck and a statement sleeve. I think everyone at the party is going to join RtR now.
I wore this to a fall wedding. It was gorgeous, comfortable and I wish that I could wear it again. I highly recommend this dress.
The dress had a ton of fabric (and pockets!) yet its incredibly flattering. I felt like a million bucks!

Can't say enough good things about this dress - it's dramatic, elegant, unique, and low maintenance. I've never gotten so many compliments. This was rented for a black tie wedding. I think for someone tall, it could work without a belt, but I needed it to add some shape and also to make the length marginally more manageable. I'm 5'2" and it brushed the ground in 5 inch heels. It's very comfortable and relatively wrinkle resistant.

links_reviews_title: A different take on a dress
links_reviews_text: @lallietand Absolutely loved this piece! It arrived new with tags, and I rented this for a movie premiere. I styled with a belt and sneakers (yes! I am just coming back from a broken foot) and it look super cool. The sleeves are to die for, and the material is very comfortable.

This was one of two dresses ordered for a single special occasion and I did not end up wearing it because the other ended up being more flattering all around. The cinnamon color/fabric for the sleeves is exquisite, but the body of the dress (fabric) is just OK. Belt is a must do in my opinion, but the color is neutral and lends itself to many looks.

I love this brand and I love crazy artistic outfits. This dress is amazing on tall lean women. I'm 5'6" and medium sized chest and it just wasn't flattering. I got lots of compliments but My husband and defienda were honest and said it was not attractive. For the right figure... this would be a stunning choice. The sleeves and neckline are awesome. Note they wrinkle easily so it's best not to wear a coat.

links_reviews_title: Felt like a model on the runway-so many compliments!
links_reviews_text: Likely works best for someone tall who can also wear heels (I'm 5'7'' and wore 4 inch heels). It's not meant to be fitted, so wouldn't recommend renting if that's the look for which you're going.
Wore this dress for my child's baptism. It is definitely both baggy and long, but with a belt and heels it looked amazing and received tons of compliments!
Beautiful gown! Something different... color is striking and very comfortable to wear. Really enjoyed it for a fall black tie gala
Wore this dress to a black tie wedding. Even the wedding planner came to me and told me my dress was tr√®s chic. Paired with Lizzie Furtado earrings. I felt great all night. Very comfortable dress

links_reviews_title: Beautifully snug and great for small chested women!
links_reviews_text: I don't have a small chest- 34D. But I think this dress would be perfect for small chest women since I had to pin it together to make it work appropriate. You can totally take this from day to night. Had I unpinned it would have been a sexy evening date dress! Size up if you have a large chest or apple shape. The fit was pretty tight on me. I wore booties since it was a warm Jan day in Texas: High 75 / Low 50s. Wear antiperspirant! It will show any kind of pit stain or wetness!
Pros-beautiful green color. Fun flowy shape. Fun to wear. Super soft silk. Cons-pretty low cut in the chest area. Wore to work but could have used some double stick tape because it kept falling down.
I got stopped by strangers to compliment me on this dress! I wasn't expecting it at all. The top is cut a little low, but nothing crazy. Light and easy to wear!

I adored this dress and wore it several times. The color is amazing, silk is soft and flows. The only con was the wrap top was a little snug, and needed a safety pin to keep from opening too low. I sized up to fix the problem.

Rented this for a casual wedding dinner and it worked great. Perfect fit except for just a little big for me on the top - I am a small B cup and did have to pin it and still adjust a bit throughout the evening. Bit still lots of compliments!
This is a beautiful dress, pictures don't do it justice. The color is gorgeous, it's comfortable, and it has pockets. I'm thinking of buying this one!
loved it!

This dress was pretty but was missing 1 of the buttons so I had to pin it closed Runs true to size maybe even a bit big in the bust- I wore a camisole for modesty The green color is very flattering perfect For fall or summer Lightweight comfortable Not your typical wrap dress since it buttons closed Has a sash to make tighter
Loved this dress. It was too large because my size wasn't available but I was planning on wearing with a jacket so it was fine. The colors are stunning. Lots of compliments.
Comfortable, flowy dress. Slightly lower cut than I usually wear for work but covers well. Has pockets!!

I love this elegant tailored dress. The 6 fits me perfectly true to size but I did pin the neck as always with a wrap dress. Didn't love the wrap belt that came with it so I used t own. It's beautiful and moves with you as you walk, careful in a strong wind and you may expose your underwear. Would consider buying if it were a bit less $$$. Love it! Rent it
Didn't come with a belt, added my own. Fit well and got many compliments
I got a ton of compliments. The color is great but I was worried about the top of the wrap exposing my breasts the whole time.

I'm not sure how a dress can be comfy, classy, and elegant, but this one sure is! I received many compliments and was told "green is my color" by quite a few folks (something I've never heard before so I'll ascribe it to the quality of this gorgeous dress). Details: size 2R, wore to sister's outdoor engagement party (I'm MOH), 31-years-old, 34C-ish, 5'2", 113lbs, wore w/ 3.5" nude heels. FYI dress comes with a detachable belt, which is key to it fitting right.
Can't say enough great things about this dress. So flattering; so many compliments. Possibly my favorite rental so far. I did need a tank under-the v neck is pretty deep.
No cons. This dress is comfy and beautiful. I'd wear it again and again.

This dress is so beautiful. This is a very flattering cut, and the color is so different. The green is more like a grass green. Very unique. I got compliments all day. The best part (and I am sure you will agree), it has POCKETS!
Pros: perfect for St. Patrick's Day, fun hem, and light weight material Cons: bigger than expected and inadequate coverage for bust and legs (when sitting)

links_reviews_title: Could have sized down lovely color
links_reviews_text: Loved this color
If you hate low cut wrap dresses that show way too much cleavage, don't rent this! Beautiful fabric and pattern but just way too low cut.

links_reviews_title: cool and pulled together yet high comfort!
links_reviews_text: the fabric and drape of this are divine. it sways just so when you walk. not my ultimate cut/fit but very nice relaxed summer dress for evening event.

This dress fit very true to size. I am a size 8 and rented a size 6 on the RTR size suggestion, but it was too small. I have rather broad shoulders and large upper arms relative to my size and do not think sizing up one size would have been enough to accommodate. I didn't particularly care for the fabric either. Never wore this out.
Would have been pleased to wear this beautifully made dress but was just a bit to tight.
Fit well and exactly as described
The dress looked and fit for the most part ... except for when you got to the top ... it was too small and could not cover my boobage. :(
I had to pin the dress at the skirt for work and church but it was a perfect Easter dress

links_reviews_title: Loved the color and the style!
links_reviews_text: Fit great!
Great fit! Lovely dress!
I Loved the way the fabric felt and how the dress fit and moved from the waist down. Couldn't wear it because I was completely exposed on top
This is a nice dress but a little more low cut than I expected and runs small.

links_reviews_title: Much lower cut than it seems, very tight on torso with no stretch. Belt hung weird.
links_reviews_text: I wanted to like this dress. I fit a 4/6 and am a 34B, I rented this in a 4 and it was really tight around my torso/waist. It is much lower cut than the picture seems, I couldn't wear it to work. The belt hung awkwardly as well. The bottom was flowy and pretty, but the top of the dress didn't work. There are 2 inner buttons to create the wrap and they make one inlet smaller so you can tell which button hoes where, but it was still very confusing. Sent back without wearing.
Perfectly true to size in a 6. Very flowy, cute, and classy. Def a favorite.
I will rent again with a size up.

links_reviews_title: love the color and the hanky hem skirt!
links_reviews_text: I had to wear a bigger size than usual because the waist was a little high and the bust was slightly small. I normally wear 4 or 6, but had to wear an 8 in this dress. the only thing I didn't like was the sleeve length. It would have been cuter with either shorter sleeves or long sleeves. this length looked a little frumpy for me...
I do have a large chest so it is a tight for but still very flattering for a current figure. Waiting for it to get a little cheaper before purchasing. It can be worn to work or brunch.

links_reviews_title: It was nicer than usual in December
links_reviews_text: Very nice color and dress. Not great for a windy day.
This dress is awesome, the color, the fit, the flowing bottom! Absolutely love this dress!
Could not wear this it was way small and my entire chest was exposed. Go up a size and don't have a bust!
Loved this dress and so bummed it was just too low a cut to wear a bra and with larger bust, that's a must. Fabric gorgeous silk and loved the wrap

a little loose at the bust, so I used some fashion tape, but otherwise lovely. I really appreciate that the "wrap" is actually a pair of buttons so there was no risk of flashing when the wind picked up.
Worn this Red # for a family photo shoot n it was a picture perfect fit

links_reviews_title: Swingy, fun skirt to party in!
links_reviews_text: I loved this dress! The skirt was so fun and gave some movement to me! Got so many compliments and it was perfect for a summertime wedding -- specifically a huge party atmosphere one! Wore the XS because it held me in better - no spanx needed. The color and fabric were fantastic!
Great dress to see the ballet during the holidays! Also wore it to a girls' brunch. The fabric is nice and felt firm around the tummy area. Would definitely rent this again!
Very tight in the midsection so Spanx are a must!

I wore this for Christmas Eve, it's beautifully made and is so unique!!! The fit is definitely form fitting in the stomach area, it will show everything, but it is super flattering on the arms and legs!! Great dress for a special occasion!!

Beautiful dress and fun to wear. Little stretch across the stomach/chest, but that wasn‚Äôt a problem thanks to Spanx. The neckline is a little high, touching my neck. Dress is definitely shorter on tall ladies like myself, but I work black tights, so didn‚Äôt fear revealing too much. Overall - loved it and would rent again.

Wore this to my company's holiday party and it was so fun and festive! I got so many comments on the dress - I was apprehensive of this style but JUST RENT IT! It's totally worth it! I traditionally wear medium / 6-8 and rented a medium and small as I read it ran a little large. I ended up wearing the small and it was pretty tight but fit like a glove and was pretty forgiving without spans!
Loved the look and fit of this dress. It was fun to wear and got several compliments! Regarding fit, it was form-fitting in the torso, but totally comfortable throughout the night.
Loved this dress!!! I got so many compliments and it was so flattering!!!

links_reviews_title: A showstopper on the dance floor!
links_reviews_text: This dress was a great fit with a pop of color. I loved the lace details, definitely got compliments all night especially how the bottom ruffles swayed on the dance floor.
Great special occasion dress that still feels comfy. So many compliments and felt like a million bucks!

I really ended up loving this dress, BUT only with the right shapewear. (I would have given it a 5 if there were any hopes of it fitting looser in the middle as pictured on the model.) I'm normally a size 10 and the XL was TIGHT. I needed my husband to help zip for sure. Once it was on and all the smoothing was done underneath, it turned out great. But in order to wear this, you need to be comfortable with a true bodycon dress. It was gripping my whole bod from my chest to my lower hip. On the plus side, no bra needed and I'm a 34 DDD-E!
Awesome dress! Was a little tight in the stomach, so I sized up for a more comfortable fit. Length was perfect on me, and I loved the sleeves for more coverage.

Beautiful red dress with lace details. Great fit!! Perfect for my birthday dinner / date night with the #Husbae. Got stopped by many people downtown who commented on how great it looked. Told them I get a lot of my piece from #RTR. xoxo @Oni7

links_reviews_title: Want to stand out? Okay cool, here's how:
links_reviews_text: I've rented this dress twice to different events because it is that damn good. Whether red is your color or not, you need to wear this dress, which is essentially the real-life version of the fire emoji. The lace neck/arms area sets it apart immediately, and the tight bodice is almost like a comfortable corset. Essentially it's spanx built right in! If you're worried about your upper arms (as I am), this is the dress for you, girl. I felt so beautiful in this! At 5'4, it hits at the mid thigh, making it a really nice option for dress codes ranging from cocktail to creative black tie. TBH, I'd wear this with some white chucks and rock it any day.

Beautiful, well made dress. Has NO stretch in the torso area so be weary of that. It‚Äôs a thicker material (I wore it to a summer wedding and was definitely warm) but it holds up well and doesn‚Äôt show sweat. Overall a beautiful dress!
I wanted to wear the XL because it fit a little better in the torso, but the zipper wouldn't work, so I wore the Large. It worked out well and I received a lot of compliments. I wish I could buy it.
Loved this look! Super cute. Very close fit but I loved that part. I would rent this again. üíÉüèæ

links_reviews_title: The sheer number of compliments I received on the dress!
links_reviews_text: This was my first time renting and I was hesitant only because I am not the easiest person to dress ( read short, fat) . But I have to say completely fell in love and the dress I was sent was a perfect fit ! Thank you RTR!

links_reviews_title: so many compliments on this dress!!!!
links_reviews_text: It fits your body and made me appear smaller than I am!!

links_reviews_title: So many compliments to my neice on this dress'
links_reviews_text: Perfect fit! Vibrant color!
Wore this for Easter. Received so many compliments!
This dress was a hit. I had a number of people come up to me and tell me that I was the best dressed at the event. Thanks RTR!
I received compliments all night! The dress was a tad big and had a lot of extra fabric but overall that meant I didn't have to wear spanx so I didn't hate it!

links_reviews_title: Made me feel incredible the entire night! Received so many compliments.
links_reviews_text: A little snug along the neckline, but the dress fit like a glove. So much fun to wear and flowy towards the bottom which I loved. Comfortable to wear all night long!
Great for party. Standout in the crowd Thick material
Fits well in all the right places. I returned it with out wearing it this time around because i selected a different dress. Will likely rent again.
I wanted to wear something unique and eye catching for Valentine's Day this year and this dress was perfect. I got compliments all day and my fianc√© loved it!
You won't fade into the background in this. I wore it to a party and danced the night away. I felt like a Spanish flamenco dancer. Tons of compliments.

This dress is great, except for the clasp in the back which is a pain to get done up by yourself. I sized up since the fabric has no stretch and sits a bit lower in the hips than I thought. A strapless bra works great. The color and texture are much more vibrant in person, and I got tons of compliments.

links_reviews_title: Everyone loved this dress, including me. It was fun and flirty and perfect for my holiday party.
links_reviews_text: I noted that it runs a bit small. Luckily I have a small waist, otherwise it wouldn't have fit at all. Even with that, the back bunched up a tiny bit. It was knee length on me which is perfect for my style. Overall this dress is amazing. I wish I could have kept it!

I have nothing negative to say about this dress. It was very comfortable and so fun to wear. I hated returning it! I am tall and could see that on a smaller person the fabric could engulf them. But looking at all the other photos is why I decided to rent...it looks good on everyone! You won't regret it!
The dress is gorgeous and was the perfect outfit to wear to a work holiday party. The fit was perfect. I got tons of compliments.

was much longer on me than on the model - I think shorter would be a bit cuter. Fit me very well in other ways, but I am typically between M and L, and this was perfect at M, so I think it runs large. I am 5'4", 145 lb, 36D bust.

Dress was a day late and almost didn't get it on time but showed up when I was getting into my lift to head to the store! I am a 34D so the chest was tight but the length was perfect and I am 5'2 so dresses normally are too long. I went with a size small after reading the reviews and it fit perfect.

Could not be more enthusiastic about this dress! I would have bought it, except that it's memorable and I just don't go to enough parties. I rented a medium. As other reviewers mentioned, it's a little tight in the waist (and I've got a large waist) but the material is thick and stretchy. The end result is that it holds you in without spanx, and you do have some room in the middle. The lace is memorable and even more beautiful than in the photo, and the color is a bright red with an almost orange undertone. I'm petite and this dress has a long torso, but the material accommodated me without much trouble. It's stunning! If you're on the fence, just rent it. I wore it for a work party with thousands of people, and got compliments all night on the dress (including from several random men at bars we went to afterwards, who specifically commented on my dress...maybe not a desirable result but hey) One woman even commented on the fit, saying it looked like it had been 'made for me'. All in all, a huge success and I'd def rent it again for an event.

The dress was very comfortable. I danced in it, and wore it all evening, and loved every moment! I wore it for a 70s-themed party, but I would say it's only slightly 70s looking, which was fine with me because the main thing I loved is how flattering and slimming it looked!
Got so many compliments on this dress at my holiday party. It was flattering and it fit great. I didn't even feel the need to wear spanx which made the whole evening even more enjoyable!

links_reviews_title: Perfect for our engagement photos! I received so many compliments. Loved!
links_reviews_text: Was a little big, and longer than I wanted. But made my photo's pop!

links_reviews_title: I felt like the Lady in Red!
links_reviews_text: This was stunning on-- so flattering with the cut out fabric and the bell sleeves. I wore it to shoot a commercial and loved it so much I bought it!

links_reviews_title: After trying a bunch of dresses for an upcoming wedding, this one was just right
links_reviews_text: Started RtR so I could find the perfect dress 4 a wedding abroad. After selecting & returning almost 6 dresses, this was it! It's sophisticated but not plain-Jane boring. The slit made me feel sexy w/o being too revealing. The shoulder & hip detail were interesting w/o being flashy. The best was the material-it was stretchy & comfy that hug things in :) this pic was the initial try on & it doesn't do it justice. Perfect length w/ heels. Returned w/o wearing due to travel ban but will rent again!
Beautiful dress ! It fit perfectly ! I wish I could keep it :)

links_reviews_title: The dress was flattering and sexy without being revealing
links_reviews_text: I loved the fabric on this one. It was decently thick, which means it didn't cling too tightly in the belly area, which can be a struggle. It was really flattering without being revealing, which I appreciated because I wore it to a family wedding. You could wear the straps further up on your shoulders or down like I did, they both worked well. At 5'9, I'm definitely glad I got the long size - the regular was too short even with flats.

This dress was stunning! It drew numerous compliments. The fit was great. I love the material; it was thick and snug for a winter formal event, yet it could also be worn in warmer weather. The arm straps fit perfectly and did not slide down. The dress offered the right amount of coverage; I did not feel as though the dress was revealing (I was among my work colleagues, so this was a plus!). The color is bold and beautiful. I had great appreciation for the minimal effort I needed to put into accessorizing the dress (hair, makeup, jewelry, etc.) because it spoke for itself. This dress was timeless and classy. I‚Äôd rent this dress again without hesitation!

Love this dress, received so many compliments, especially about the slit. My only complaint is I wish the neckline was an inch or two lower because it seems to sit a little bit too high which makes it a bit awkward.

Plenty of stretch around the zipper and the material is thick enough that I skipped a bra. This dress was a nice fit, showed some leg but was elegant. The cut of the sleeves is slightly restrictive but not uncomfortable.

links_reviews_title: I felt absolutely stunning in this dress!
links_reviews_text: I ADORED this dress! The fabric is thick, luxurious and forgiving! I felt it ran a bit large as I normally wear a size 6 or 8 jeans but I ordered the 6 and got the 4 as the backup size with the 4 fitting perfectly! I got so many compliments on the dress and I wish I could have kept it forever!
The dress has a beautiful weight and is very slimming. I wish the long was in stock and I could have also sized down for a better fit. Overall really easy dress to wear and lots of compliments.

links_reviews_title: Felt like the belle of the masquerade ball
links_reviews_text: This is the most comfortable gown I've ever worn. The fabric was incredibly soft and had a slight stretch. The slit was a good height and had a flirtatious ruffle at the top. The blue is a true navy. I received a lot of compliments as well, I was surrounded by people in other gowns but this one felt special.

links_reviews_title: The dress was gorgeous and perfect for a winter wedding! I stayed warm even at an outdoor ceremony.
links_reviews_text: Got so many compliments on it and it fit so well! I'm 5'0 so it was a little long! I wore 4 inch heels.
Such a beautiful dress!! It is so incredibly flattering! The material is super stretchy so I wish I would have gotten a smaller size so it would be a bit more snug. Will definitely rent again!

This was my backup style. I got it in a long as I am pretty tall. I would have worn it but the long was so long it dragged on the floor even in 3-4 inch heels. I'm sure a regular would have been perfect. It fit everywhere else except the length. The fabric is very nice quality and I liked the effect of the ruffle in front. My fianc√© liked how different the cut was with the slit up the middle. I'll keep it in mind for next time!

I received this dress as an alternative choice when my first choice back up size became unavailable last minute. I ended up wearing this dress over my first choice, it was stunning! I am 5'11" and the Long size was perfect. The fabric is thick and luxurious and it fit really nicely, it was also comfortable. I would definitely rent this again

As a woman with hips, I'm always hesitant to try on a dress with a straight profile. Inevitably, it will either fit my hips and not my waist, or my waist and not my hips. This dress was magic, and fit perfectly. The material had some stretch, but it was soft (not bodycon), I was able to move very easily. I've never felt so elegant and beautiful. I hope I have the chance to rent again!

This dress is beautiful! The fabric is stretchy but this and hides a lot! The color is a perfectly true Navy. This dress is super comfortable and forgiving with no adjusting! Once you put this dress on you are good to go all night. The slit is significant and a little dicey when sitting. Get the dress...you will love it!
Got so many compliments on this dress! It was the perfect fit and was a nice heavy material, which made it very forgiving. The slit added a little sexiness to it.
Beautiful gown, I got so many compliments on this dress. Fit perfectly, I usually wear a size 4 or small 6 depending on brands. Heavy fabric smooths out body lines

I wore this gown to a black tie optional wedding and it was perfect! The slit in front is a nice touch and it wasn't too high for me. I was worried the straps would be annoying or too tight but they laid on my perfectly and it was comfortable to dance in all night. This dress really fit me like a glove. The side peplum hides the right area for me and the fabric is a thicker material but very stretchy. I'm sometimes in between sizes and the smaller size fit me so I'd say this dress runs a tiny bit on the larger side. The regular length was also perfect for me with a taller heel hight (I wore about 4 in heels). I would love to wear this dress again!
I love this dress. It was very soft and comfortable. It was great for movement, especially dancing. This was a very flattering silhouette. I love this dress!
This dress is all class. Loved wearing it for a wedding with a navy theme color
Very comfortable
Received so many compliments, and this dress made me feel like a queen. Will rent again.

links_reviews_title: Went to a black tie wedding - everyone loves this dress.
links_reviews_text: The 2L fit perfect.

links_reviews_title: This was absolutely perfect for my role as the maid of honor in my sister's wedding!
links_reviews_text: Honestly, the fit was perfect! I am a little over 5'9" and I wore the long because it was recommended for women my height. The dress dragged on the floor without heels, and with 2 inch heels the dress barely skimmed the floor, which was perfect. I received many, many compliments throughout the afternoon. This dress is so easy to walk in because of the slit in the front, but it's definitely not too revealing.
The sleeves flip over in the front, I think you could wear it a variety of ways, I wore it flipped down. Comfortable, didn't have to worry about my food tummy showing later in the evening.

links_reviews_title: Magical wedding with family and friends!
links_reviews_text: Dress fits like a glove! Very easy to walk/dance/sit in. The it for the legs is a little short but very flattering. So many compliments! The arms are a little restrictive but nothing too bad. I would recommend at least 4 inch heels if you are 5‚Äô6 in the long. Easy to wear with strapless bra and spanx.

This dress is comfortable, easy to wear, and gorgeous. I rented it for an awards dinner out of town and love the material of this dress as I didn't have to steam it. I got ready and slipped right in and was ready for a lovely evening. I received countless compliments on the dress! The off-the-shoulder, long design of the dress was perfect for the cool evening at hand. PRO: easy-on; no wrinkles; beautiful color and fabric; layering on bodice gave slimming effect to my stomach; perfect length for my height (5'7") CON: heavy material but was perfect for how chilly it has been this summer in the Midwest! May not have been as comfortable in a more mild climate
Very high quality material that fit in all the right places!

I'm 4'11, 140lbs, athletic, wore 4" heels, and wore the 2R. I got the 4P as a backup, and I liked the length better but it was a bit big around my body. I think if there was a 2P it would have been perfect. It did not drag on the floor with my heels, but I did have to lift the end to go up/down stairs and to dance. I wore it for a black tie gala, I got many compliments, and I loved the off-shoulder look!! The dress is a thick, comfortable and quality material and the navy blue is a beautiful color. 10/10 would wear again!

I'm 5'5", small busted and usually wear 2-4 in dresses. I ordered 4R and 2R as a backup. 2R was a bit snug but the 4R was perfect. Good quality material and design. The dress worked well for a formal black tie optional wedding.

Such comfortable and flattering material! Wore this for a gala event. I'm normally a 4-6 in pants, S/M in tops, but I tried on various dresses in the RTR store and seemed to be a 2-4 for gowns, for a better idea of sizing. This length for me was perfect with ~4 inch heels.

I loved this dress! It is beautiful and the color is rich and perfect. I love the sexy slit that shows off your legs! I am 5'4 120 pounds and size 4 fit me like a glove. Totally would recommend again.
Wears well, fits beautifully. Love, love, love.
It fit perfectly! The fabric is great, it doesn't wrinkle and is very flattering
This was my backup dress and I was so glad the fabric was forgiving and stretched. It made for a comfortable and elegant black tie event at the aquarium.
The dress fit great! It was very comfortable and easy to move in.

links_reviews_title: the dress was a hit. it was comfortable and beautiful!
links_reviews_text: the dress for true to size. I ordered a long to make sure it was the right length with heels. I am wide across the back so the straps fit weird. great dress! big hit!

Very classy without being dull. Beautiful neckline, nice slit to show a little leg. Perfect length with 3 " heels. Runs large. I usually wear a 2 to 4 and the 2 was a little loose. Feel like the 0 would have been perfect but was not available. The little flap definitely hides any problem tummy area! Wore to black tie wedding at Beverly Hills Hotel and it was perfect.

links_reviews_title: Loved the fit and the style!
links_reviews_text: Wore it for a black tie wedding.. was perfect.. I am 5.2 and wore 5 inch heels.. wish it was a tad smaller in length but was so great!

Beautiful dress and perfect fit! Received soo many compliments! Runs a little big. I'm usually a size 6 but based on prior reviews I ordered Size 4. It was perfect. This was actually my second dress choice, but loved it.

links_reviews_title: Absolutely stunning and lots of compliments
links_reviews_text: I rented this for a more formal wedding and it was perfect. It is absolutely gorgeous, the raspberry color pops enough but isn't overbearing like wearing red. It is extremely comfortable and easy to move and dance it. I also liked the way it was cut in the midsection as it gave a little wiggle room. I would definitely rent again!

I wore this to a formal dinner and got so many compliments!! The only issue I had was I thought the top was a tad loose but it worked (I am also not use to wearing one sleeve so it could have been that). It fit like a glove everywhere else. But I felt amazing in it
Gorgeous color

links_reviews_title: Not for me, but still a very nice dress
links_reviews_text: I'm usually all for Galvan and a long leg slit, but this dress was just very ill-fitting. I tried to make it work with the right shoes, the right hair, the right accessories, but it just wasn't working out for me. May be a beautiful gown on another body type, but personally not for me. Still, great material and nice design.
Loved this dress! Great fit and tons of compliments! Won't disappoint!
Fit was spot on. I used some fashion tape on the slit to keep the spanks from showing, which is challenging when sitting. But great coverage and super comfortable.

Good quality dress. Well lined and cut. Great color. Didn't work for me though...I went up one size and it fit everywhere except too low/loose on shoulder-less side...and didn't do my relative thick waist any favors.
Make sure what you have underneath is seamless because the material is not forgiving.
Didn't wear this dress but I loved it. It just wasn't right for my party.
Best dress I ever rented from RTR. Super flattering, form fitting. The color pops.

I loved this dress! Got so many compliments and it was really stretchy and comfortable to move around and dance in (for 8+ hours!). I sized up because usually French sizing runs small but I should have gone true to size. This size was a little loose around my natural waist and made me look bigger but it still looked awesome!

links_reviews_title: Wowza! You will make an entrance in this dress!
links_reviews_text: This dress! I rent dresses from RTR all the time and is a showstopper! Would totally rent again if it had not received so much attention and was photographed like crazy! Sexy yet sophisticated. A strong silhouette and it is a nice balance of revealing just enough while still leaving a bit to the imagination. Word of caution - the fabric is so comfortable and flexible but I would advise Spanx to smooth out problem areas - I needed it primarily for backside. I was able to wear a strapless bra and it never showed. 100% rent this dress! Felt confident all night long! Also paired with stunning flower dangle earrings from RTR!
Beautiful dress more of a magenta. But really fun!
Nice material for doing - it is lined and has a little weight Very sexy dress - you will show legs when seated!

Couldn't wear this, it was too large everywhere. Even with a padded bra, it was too large under the arms. I usually wear an 8, sometimes a 10. It was a lovely dress though. The sleeve was long, but didn't bother me.
Rent it wont be disappointing
Comfy fit, roomy on chest, long length, wore for a Psek presentation, got compliments.
Dress ran a little larger, but I added belt and it was instantly tailored! Great dress for in last warm summer day!

links_reviews_title: Cute but forgettable. Wish it had pockets.
links_reviews_text: Nice dress but unremarkable. I usually wear an 8- but rented this in a 10. 8 would have been better.

links_reviews_title: Husband hated it and I freakin loved it
links_reviews_text: Ya, sure. It's a bit of a sack. I could've sized down. But even though the hubs hated it, I wore it to work and felt like a goddess. I got compliments from dudes too, so there. Check out the side pattern on my pic... THIS. JUST THIS.
I wore this dress to a March wedding with a black blazer. I absolutely love the print and got a ton of compliments. It's super distinctive so great to rent and wear to a special event.

links_reviews_title: Nice print, a little wrinkly looking and frumpy.
links_reviews_text: It was big on me and in spite of my best efforts always looked a little wrinkly.
Great fit. Wore it to work but could easily be worn for multiple occasions, dressed up or down. Love the versatility!
Loved the fit and the print. Absolutely will rent again!

This runs small in the chest. I ordered this first in a 6, which was too small in the chest to zip up, and now an 8, which did fit. However, I felt like there was just too much material in the size 8 to be comfortable. Also this was a little bit too loud for my office. But I love the print. It almost has a rayon feel to it, so it may be better for spring and summer.
Love, love, love this dress!! I wore it for a work presentation and got a million compliments all day. It was comfy, the fabric is the perfect weight and the colors are bold and fun.

links_reviews_title: For a work party, I got a lot of compliments and it was very unique.
links_reviews_text: Fits a little tight I. The bust and around the waste, but I'm a G cup, so I am used to that. Otherwise it's great. The material is almost linen like and the design. Appears to be black, but it's actually navy.
Very tight in the bust area. Loved the fabric and print.

links_reviews_title: Paired this with the black and white houndstooth Joie coat which looked fabulous
links_reviews_text: I ordered the 4 because the 2 wasn't available. It was a bit big leading me to believe my true size 2 would have been perfect.
Much more summer-y than the photos indicate. It's a linen fabric.
This is a beautiful dress. And comfy. Just note the length - I'm 5'5" and the dress hit just above my ankles.

links_reviews_title: Due to UK sizing it's a must to size up. I were a 2/4 in everything and the 4 is like a glove.
links_reviews_text: Thick fabric appropriate for work, wore with a black blazer and black heels. Could easily be worn for something more casual. I love the bold print, flattering cut and quality. Highly recommend and have rented multiple times.
Lots of fabric but looks nice with tall shoes.

Rented this for a day time work conference out of state. Not only did it travel in a suitcase well, but also made me feel confident yet polish. The sized down based on reviews. Was a little snug in the chest but was glad I got the smaller size. The bottom skirt is full so it was a good contrast and added the belt for a more casual look. The pattern and material was amazing! Stood out in a sea of solids colors and got tons of compliments. Very versatile. Highly recommend
Fun spin on a classic style. Quality fabric, semi lined, structured shape. Great for ladies lunch, day at the office, meetings, etc.

links_reviews_title: Received so many compliments about it. Love the unique print!
links_reviews_text: It's definitely tight on the upper body. Not for the busty girls.
Great dress with a fantastic fit and a beautiful pattern. My husband loved it! Work it with flats to work and with strappy sandals for dinner. Very versatile and comfortable.
I originally got this for work and thought it might be too much. But I toned it down with a sweater. It stood out and was really cute. It was a bit big overall though.

This was a really fun dress to wear. Hits mid calf so can be worn at work or casual events. The print was really interesting and the cut was flattering. One fit note - I am a fairly busty person but this dress was a little loose in the bust area for me. If you're flattering chested it might be a weird fit.

Not very flattering from the side. I liked this dress but received no compliments at work ;) and when I have a great rtr piece I'm normally flooded with compliments, so I'm guessing it wasn't a smash hit with others haha
Pretty pattern but there was so much volume that it was overwhelming. Maybe it it was shorter it could have handled all that material.
True to size for brand(which for me is one size up due to bust) wore with tights/boots for a fall look.

I am 5'6 - 150 - 28 in waist I really love when I get outfits from rent the runway with the tag still on it! üòÇ I'm the first to wear it! Anyway, I absolutely adore this dress! The colors and the print are perfect. I think for a fall, winter dress this is not bad. The material and style is comfortable and chic. I did definitely recommend for all and would rent again! I do reviews on all the clothes from Rent the Runway and you can see videos and pictures via Instagram: @Mrs.chicchanel
Striking. Details are a dark navy, fabric is almost a linen. Can work for winter with tights and a dark blazer. Details are dark navy.

links_reviews_title: Amazing print and so so many comments from strangers!
links_reviews_text: Loved this print dress. I received so many comments and compliments - even from strangers.

This dress has a gorgeous print. It drapes in a lovely way in the back. It's also very flattering. I've got a wider rib cage and a lot of dresses are too tight through that area, but not this one. It has a great fit. The fabric is somewhat thin, so I'm not sure what season this would be best for.
Love this dress! I usually wear a 4/6 in dresses but since this had more of a flare and my waist is slim I was able to size down. I'm 5'8 and this a tea length on me.
Super tight in the rib cage only, big everywhere else! Pretty fabric!
Do not, I repeat, do not size down in this dress. It runs small in the bust as this brand is known to do. Gorgeous style and print.

I absolutely adore this dress! Well crafted, beautiful print, flattering length, and cut that flatter tall curvy bodies. I always receive so many compliments when I wear this dress. Good for work, day time event, or brunch!
Tight in chest. A-line skirt. Lightweight.

links_reviews_title: Loved this dress - will probably order it again
links_reviews_text: Not my normal "go-to" style but this is why I love RTR - a great chance to branch out of the norm. Ended up having an impromptu interview - explained I wasn't in "interview attire" - they loved the dress and me.

links_reviews_title: Amazing! The print, the length and material makes this dress a work win.

links_reviews_text: Comfortable fit (wish it had pockets for how voluminous it is!) the arm holes are a little smaller than I personally like, but overall I would rent this again.

links_reviews_title: I decided not to wear this item. This dress is pretty long. I'm only 5'1.
links_reviews_text: I didn't wear this item.

This dress would be an A++ if it had pockets. But I loved it. Definitely true to size so I ordered up so the waist would not be too tight, which meant the top part was a little to big. I modified with a jardigan so the ill-fit was not too obvious and wore to work. The fabric is light, breezy, elegant and does not wrinkle too badly despite a long commute and a full day at the office. Would rent again- even with the off fit.
Very form fitting but cute overall !!! Would wear again!
Would have fit with or without the bump! So cute and comfortable.

links_reviews_title: Very cute but wear with spanx!
links_reviews_text: Wear with cute sneakers for daytime activities! The fit is reeeeally tight, so spanx made me feel much better in it. The dress is a bit long but I just sinched it up to the desired length.
This dress is super cute. The material stretches and it very flattering. The tie straps are super cute and the color is fabulous. I loved it!
It is a form fitting dress but super comfortable and flexible.

links_reviews_title: Perfect & comfy for hot weather, but unforgiving and tight.
links_reviews_text: I rented this for a very hot weekend vacation in DC and paired it with sneakers as I was walking a lot. I really liked the straps and the color, but it was very tight and unforgiving.
A great summer dress for a girls night or even a date night. Fit so well and was so comfy!

links_reviews_title: Very cut. Not very forgiving though
links_reviews_text: Great for bachelorette or vaca
Wouldn't be flattering with a belly
15 year old wore for homecoming. The X-small was very small, but it worked for her.
Clings to your body! Shows every single curve :/ didn't really love it
This was not flattering unfortunately. The material was thin and it was tight.

links_reviews_title: Fun and fluffy: flatters but doesn't disguise
links_reviews_text: Fun Summer dress with nice movement. Not a deal-breaker, but it is verrrrry stretchy without giving any structure. IE you will see every contour of your body. The smocking flatters but doesn't disguise.
loved the smocking tight fit
Nice color but shows every little curve!

Generally, the price of a dress gives some idea of the quality. The retail price of this dress seems way off. The elastic smocking throughout the dress ensures that it will follow the curves of the body, but it also ensures that it will pull up or down, depending on your curves. It's the kind of inexpensive looking dress you might find at a summer beach shop or discount store. The red was a beautiful shade, flattering to blonde hair and medium skin tones.

links_reviews_title: Cute dress, just too revealing for the occassion
links_reviews_text: This is a curve-hugging dress. it's cute and flattering but outlined my figure too much for my taste.

links_reviews_title: Luxe fabric but suck it in!
links_reviews_text: Beautiful, luxurious fabric and beautiful bright red. It‚Äôs snug, not really forgiving so embrace your curves and don‚Äôt eat dinner. Love the bows on the shoulders and the length is short but still totally wearable. Just really emphasizes the belly.
The dress was a completely stretchy, tight material with ruching that allowed for some forgiveness. The tie shoulder straps allow for a great fit as well!

links_reviews_title: Slimming black dress with a twist!
links_reviews_text: This dress is a very thick, nice material. Perfect for my cold office. The sleeves are beautiful! Very slimming although a little difficult to zip but over a larger bust. Comfortable to wear throughout the day.

Wore for work and it was super comfy. The sleeves were super fun and adding a necklace to it brought some needed detail to the dress. It doesn't cling to the body and provided a little give so it was easy to move around in.
This dress was fun to wear. I called it my witch dress. Very comfortable, although the fabric is quite heavy. Definitely a cold weather dress. Note that the sleeves will not fit in a coat.
The collar and sleeves are stunning! Size up it runs small! I received numerous compliments and felt glamorous as I danced the night away.

links_reviews_title: Wore for a television segment. It was very comfortable, unique and boosted my confidence.
links_reviews_text: Received numerous compliments. I'd rent again.

I actually wore this to a funeral. I hadn't seen a lot of family members in a while, but once they saw me I had to say I received tons of compliments. I def have curves, and the dress handled each one well!

links_reviews_title: Slim Dress with Fashion Forward Sleeve Detail
links_reviews_text: This dress was a little more flamboyant than I expected from the RTR photos. Yet, I still really liked it. When I put it on, my 8-year-old told me I looked like a "fashionable witch." HA! I wore to work and got compliments from co-workers and a perfect stranger at lunch. The sleeves are major statements. They are not too long, and the material is very heavy so the sleeves don't flop. They also have large metal grommets that add to the drama. This is not a dress for the faint-hearted. The material is very thick, making the dress somewhat heavy--it is definitely not a warm-weather dress. When I say heavy, it wasn't districting--more that the material had a presence. It had some stretch to it and was form-fitting, but didn't feel too sexy because of the boat collar, length (past my knee) and longer sleeves. It was comfortable to wear and not constrictive at all. The only "con" is that the sleeves would NOT fit in any coat I had. You would HAVE to wear a cape. Also, not sure how breathable the fabric is. I sweat very little and usually have no odor issues, but my underarms were a little scented at the end of the day. Luckily, the heavy fabric also kept the scent in. ;)
Very comfortable to wear! The sleeves are dramatic but didn't get in the way. The dress was heavier than I anticipated but perfect for a winter banquet. Caution is warmer climates!

This was a backup dress for an event that wasn't dressy enough but I loved the dress and would rent again for a cocktail party vs a formal affair. The material is thick and hides your flaws, the neckline is pretty great and would work best of you wore your hair up, and the sleeves are quite dramatic. Overall, a fun dress and I'm sorry I didn't get to wear it this time!

This dress fit like a dream. The sleeves were a bit OTT for work...but they were still fun to wear and didn't get in the way as much as I expected. Slightly witch-y, slightly bat-like, but totally fun to wear.
The dress fit well and I wanted a statement and something fun, but I looked too much like I was dressed for Halloween.

links_reviews_title: It was big but I don't care. AMAZING
links_reviews_text: Got a few sizes too big but still looked amazing. This dress is absolutely gorgeous, I had on tights and was so happy spanx weren't necessary as I had been wearing them all weekend. The collar itself is a statement no necklace is needed. Sleeves make it. Amazing
It didn't fit well and wasn't right for the occasion so I didn't wear it .
Most of the BadgleyMischka dresses are low cut but this neckline is very work appropriate!
I liked the dress. I wore it to a bar mitzvah in manhattan. Got a lot of compliments.

links_reviews_title: Great dress to transition from work to post-work events
links_reviews_text: Runs very tight through the hips and tummy. I have thick thighs and booty for days, but I still don't usually wear a 14. Followed advice of reviewers and glad I did. I definitely needed the 14. Great dress.

links_reviews_title: This dress fit me well and I got lots of compliments.
links_reviews_text: I got lots of compliments on this dress. It's a LBD but has enough details to make it stand out. Its fitted through the top but has a little room through the hips. The neckline is flattering and the bell sleeves with the grommets are a fun detail.

I LOVE this dress. So much so that I bought it. The fabric is heavy with just the right amount of stretch, very forgiving in the stomach area. It wasn't too short which I appreciate as I get older. I am 5'6" and it hit just below the knee. The grommet detail and flare of the arms are stunning, stylish without being overwhelming. I just can't get over how beautiful and flattering it is. Just wow.

links_reviews_title: This dress is high quality and is very flattering. The material is thick, think cold weather.
links_reviews_text: Con - pretty worn Pro - Fitted beautifully, great fabric.
I wore this to a black tie event and liked the style, but it was super heavy.

Great for a curvy figure (have to be comfortable with it showing your stomach) - sized up to make sure it didn't feel too tight. Felt very classy - wore with black fishnet stockings that have some silver to make it a little more fun.
This chic and sexy dress was a great fit and comfortable. I got compliments all night long!

links_reviews_title: Incredibly comfortable, fabric was very forgiving, and looked amazing! Received many compliments!
links_reviews_text: Fabric was very forgiving and hid a multitude of sins. Nice, thick, well-made garment, that moved with you and was very comfortable. Very stylish, sleeves looked amazing and had great movement, was more than noticed. Lots of compliments, would definitely recommend.

This is a dress for people with more confidence than me. The sleeves are very dramatic and the cut is much more form hugging than I anticipated. I rented it for an evening party/presentation, and am sending back. It is a cool dress, but not for me.

links_reviews_title: Quality dress. Structured fit. Fun sleeves!
links_reviews_text: Stunning neckline and feels great on the body. Structured and holds everything in right where you want it. Love the sleeve details. The fabric is thick and heavy, but in a good way.
Love the sleeves. Nice thick fabric.
I sized up & it fit perfectly
I felt confident and chic throughout the day.
The dress is a little tighter than I would like it to be around the middle section. It is very classy and comfortable other wise.

links_reviews_title: It was a bit snug so I am returning it.
links_reviews_text: It's a bit snug in the hip.

Beautiful dress and I was really looking forward to wearing it. However, I was unable to wear the dress as it ran too small across the torso and bustling area. I couldn't close the back or zipper. :-(
Multiple compliments all evening, especially about the sleeves on this dress
Heavy material, the sleeves are really really big and look silly.
Beautiful dress, i love it! It's casual enough to be worn to work and fun enough to wear for a evening outing.

I rented this for my sister who is usually a size 12 or 14. But based on other dresses we got from RTR, we ordered her a 16 with a larger back yo size. I never got to see the dress, because she wouldn't take her coat off at the event. She said the quality was excellent however the 16 was too tight throughout the body and she felt self conscious. She said the size larger was WAY to larger as if it was three sizes bigger with way too much room in the hips and bust. I just realized that I had ordered her an 18W, not 18 as a backup.

links_reviews_title: couldn't wear the dress at all
links_reviews_text: I was not even able to wear this dress, it was WAY TOO SMALL. Material is very heavy. The sleeves are HUGE.
For a short stubby gal, the sleeves were a little overwhelming

links_reviews_title: Very comfortable with stretch and give for dancing and sitting.
links_reviews_text: Wore this to a family wedding - very easy to really dress it up or play it down a little. The sleeves are very pretty, you just have to be careful at dinner to not put them into the food :-) . I wore my normal size but could have sized-up one for extra comfort.

links_reviews_title: Great dress. I was Madam CEO in this dress. I'm really a size 18 tho
links_reviews_text: Due to some snafus I got a size 20 it was a little loose but worked for the event. The collar is everything and the sleeve make grand gestures really GRAND.
Overall the dress fit great. I sized up to a size 8 because my shoulders are broader (Triangle shaped). Felt a bit tight but was still comfortable the rest of the night.
Perfect summer dress with long sleeves! xxx

I wear a 29 pant and the dress fit perfectly in the waist/arms and throughout. I loved the pocket detail. This fabric is way thinner than I thought it would be. I couldn't wear this dress though because it was so short. It barely covered my behind and it was about 4 inches below my crotch. I'm 5'8", so maybe this would work better on shorter girls. I'm really bummed because it was comfortable, and I loved the silhouette it created.
I liked it, comfortable and cute

I loved this dress. I am sometimes a 0, sometimes a 2, but I definitely needed the 2 in this dress. Definitely a little on the shorter side, but I didn't have any issues with length and wore it to a charity event. It felt mature/appropriate while still being young and fun!

I'm usually a 2 or a 4 depending on the brand, so I first tried this in a 4. I was able to zip it up, but it was a little snug through the shoulders and way too short to wear. I thought about wearing it as a tunic with leggings, but I decided to send it back for the 6, which was more comfortable and slightly longer, so I was able to wear it as a dress. I wore this to a Passover Seder and got lots of compliments. Wrinkled a bit by the end of the night, as you can see in the picture, but it's still cute!
Suer cute dress with pockets! However, it runs small and was short on me. I'm 5'3". Fits tight through arms, shoulders, bust. Thin material.

For the retail price, and based on the pictures of the model, I was expecting a more structured skirt/substantial fabric. The skirt doesn't hang that well, and the fabric is thicker than some crepes, but still kind of flimsy. The dress is quite short for a conservative office. If you have broad shoulders or a fuller bust, consider ordering up--I have both and my usual size was a tight squeeze for me. The print is pretty and this is a nice dress, just not that special
Ran small. Very short. I'm 5'8" and had to wear bloomers underneath!

The fit is small as noted by other renters. I'm normally a 6 but went up to a 10 in this dress...so glad I did! Any smaller and it would have been WAY too short and I wouldn't be able to lift my arms as the shoulder area has no give. The dress was beautiful and received many compliments. Perfect spring dress!

Most size 0 dresses are either too long or too wide on my frame. This one fits me perfectly and even slightly tight than my other dresses. I will say it is a size 00. Consider sizing up. It is appropriate for all kinds of occasions such as work, date night, brunch, wedding, you name it.

I loved the material and the dress overall. It just fit me too tight. I could barely breathe. I would say choose a size bigger if you are busty or get concious of your stomach or curves showing too much. Overall I loved the dress and would love to rent in a larger size maybe a 6. Great for a date night
Loved this dress so much. You can dress up and down. Perfect for work, GDO, date and etc. probably will order it again.

I really loved this dress, and received so many compliments. I'm 5' 4", 115#, with a thin/straight build. I'm between a 2 and 4, and I only rented the 2. Luckily it fit, but the top half was very snug. So much so, that the lines from a regular bra were way too visible. I wore one of those lace-up, adhesive bras, and it worked perfectly. The 2 was short, but it worked for me because I have a small butt. The 2 worked, but maybe the 4 would have been a little more comfortable. Still loved it, and would rent the 2 again if no 4 available.

The pattern of this dress is great. It's a heavy material that feels very high quality. It's perfect for a fall day. I'm 5'7 and it was slightly short on me, so I opted to wear shorts underneath. Overall, a very cute dress for a Sunday Funday!
I wore this dress for an anniversary photoshoot with my husband and it made me look 10lbs thinner. Gorgeous colors and very comfortable fit.
I trusted other reviewers and sized up one size. It fit perfectly and was so flattering! I got so many compliments. Highly recommend!
ALC is one of my favorite designers so every time I rent a piece of theirs I love it. Flattering fit and great fabric.

links_reviews_title: Fun party dress or date night dress
links_reviews_text: I originally got this for work, but it was way too short to wear to the office. I wore it out for drinks and a burlesque show with friends and got lots of compliments! I didn't feel the need to wear biker shorts or anything, but I definitely wore underwear that covered everything. Felt fine sitting down, but definitely was not able to bend over or down!
It's a nice dress but I don't get the $$$$ price tag. It's pretty short. Liked the pockets. Size up. I'm usually a 6 but the 8 was a perfect fit.

links_reviews_title: Beautiful dress but short even for me
links_reviews_text: Beautiful pattern and fit. It's short for me 5'2

links_reviews_title: Cute dress - a bit short for work.
links_reviews_text: Love the print & the pockets! I absolutely would wear this out without any tights on and camel booties. But I originally intended to wear this for work. It needed to be paired with tights and was nervous about bending over for most of the day.

I am pretty slim and a standard size 2, even a 0 at times. Like 25 pants. This was tight and SHORT like long tunic short. Really a shame because it's a beautiful print and the cut could be great. I'd try sizing up but I don't want to waste a rental and have it still be too short. I'm not even tall, I'm 5'5" and, again, it was seriously like can't raise you arms at all short. TBH I'm not a prude and I don't mind if things are short but this was just unacceptable in public short.
A dress with sleeves AND pockets... I'm totally sold! Awesome material and great fit.

Really gorgeous dress, but it does run a little small. I normally wear a 4 in dresses. The 8 fit with a little extra room, but I think the 6 would have fit fine as well. I knocked off a star because even at 5'2", it was really short for an otherwise work appropriate dress. I couldn't raise my arms at all without flashing people.
True to size. It's a fun flirty dress and perfect for transitioning from day to night.

links_reviews_title: Rented for work but extremely short.
links_reviews_text: Ordered two sizes up from my normal size and it's still so short it looks more like a tunic. It barely covers my bottom.

links_reviews_title: Too short to wear anywhere, let alone work
links_reviews_text: I like this dress a lot, but it was reallly short. If you wore it with tights, I suppose that could work? It fit everywhere but the length, and I'm only 5'4" . . .

As others have mentioned, it is a pretty short dress (even on me, and I'm 5'4"), but the more conservative long sleeves balance out the less conservative length. I wore it to work, but it might be better for a night out. Super flattering.
runs small for ALC, as I am a 0 in every other ALC dress. fabric was nice and thin- perfect for a summer night. great length for petite ladies and pockets are super cute.

Loved this dress but it was almost an indecent length on my 5'11" frame. I might try it again with tights in the fall. Other than the length, it had a fantastic fit, plenty of room up top if you're busty and the pockets are cute but shallow and high so not super functional.
the bust too tight, baggy in some areas, too tight in others, loved the pattern but couldn't wear due to bad fit
I rented for a summer work day but it felt just a little on the short side. Really cute though, warmed than expected and has pockets. Great pattern and easy to match with.
I'm 5'7" and this barely covered my bottom. Definitely a no

links_reviews_title: Cheap material and runs really small!
links_reviews_text: Was expecting this to be a thicker more structured dress but it was very thin and made with thin, cheap material. I sized up from a normal 6 based on reviews and ordered an 8 and even that was too small and way too short, and I am only 5'3". Needless to say I didn't wear it.
