Lovedddd this dress but a little short for work. I'm short so I was fine with some tights but would think twice if I was any taller. Plus it's thin so definitely spring time dress. If I wasn't wearing tights I'd need a slip which I probably wouldn't be able to fit under this dress as it was that perfect fitting. Def good for the petite.

links_reviews_title: Cute print and liked that it had sleeves
links_reviews_text: The fabric is soft and comfortable. I'm 5"11 but the dress was simply too short for me. Didn't end up wearing it.
Wanted to wear this to work, but it was quite short and tight across the midsection

links_reviews_title: Fit fine but might size up to try to see if length longer
links_reviews_text: The size 2 fit me without being too tight but I might size up next time for ALC to address the length issue (couldn't bend over without exposing everything...). I'm 5'6 but have a long torso. Fabric has limited stretch but is otherwise relatively comfortable.

Wore this to my bachelorette brunch. Lots of comments on how nicely the fabric moved. It was light and comfy with a nice enough pattern, but it didn't wow me. I did like the pockets. It fit me perfectly and I'm short and petite, so it may fit others a bit snugly.
I go to 1-2 work events a year wear I need to be formal of some sort and always looking for something I like that is also appropriate for coworkers, this was a perfect balance.

I ended up enjoying wearing this gown. True to size. A little stretch. Needs spanx. The color was a bit meh on me but ultimately looked pretty with nude glossy lips. Super comfortable. A little on the short side - wore 3" heels am 5-7 and it was a bit shorter than I would've liked. Overall a fun, different look!

I absolutely loved this dress! I thought I'd be a 4, but 2 was the only size available and fit very well. The dress is form fitting and elegant, and the color makes it "not too fancy". (Wedding vs. ballroom event). Just stunning!
Loved this dress and the thick fabric - definitely made well! Be aware this runs a bit small and does not have any give

links_reviews_title: Best dress to celebrate my last undergraduate event before commencement!
links_reviews_text: Stunning dress!! I received this dress hours before my gala event and it fit like a glove! Wish I had more occasions to wear this dress. My heels were 2.5"; I would have gone with a higher 3"+ heel so that the hem hit the floor but wanted to comfortably dance :) The material was fairly flexible and straps were secure.

links_reviews_title: This dress fits like a glove!
links_reviews_text: LOVE this dress. It fit perfectly and hugged my curves well. The color is beautiful, and the dress is super comfortable. It's definitely something that you can wear for hours and feel great in. I'm 5'6" and the length was great with a moderate heel, though it might be somewhat long on someone more petite.

links_reviews_title: Gorgeous dress but sleeves can be annoying!
links_reviews_text: This dress is beautiful but if you have any sort of problem areas, this material shows them. I was super self conscious with my mid section in this dress. I just had a baby and you could see my underwear line. The sleeves are adorable but annoying and restricting. I wore this just for a photo shoot But would have been annoyed if I had to wear it all night. It served its purpose however and I loved our photos!

Didn't end up wearing this because the zipper got stuck the day of, but boy was this pretty. Super unique too. Would definitely rent again for a wedding or formal affair! It fit like a glove - even the chest area which I'm always nervous about. Super silky on the inside - would have been a comfy dress to wear!

I've had my eye on this dress for a couple of weeks for blush-themed holiday photos for work. The only size that was available was a 0... I risked it. I am usually a 2, but the 0 actually fit pretty darn well. My only complaint- the straps are TIGHT. They were digging into my shoulders, but I guess that is to be expected if you size down. The material is stunning, the cut is stunning, this dress makes you feel like $1 million bucks. RENT IT.
Fit perfectly.
Exceptional fit and color. Felt incredible and glamorous- loads of compliments all night. Worn to black tie wedding.

Wore this dress to a wedding in Hawaii. The construction and fit of the dress were impeccable. The color was a perfect pale pink. Sophisticated and fun at the same time. I received so many compliments on this dress the whole night. Definitely a show stopper without being over the top flashy.

links_reviews_title: Ordered the dress at the last minute and it was delivered to the store the same day!!
links_reviews_text: Dress was a perfect fit. Received many compliments and I felt beautiful!

Love this dress. It was a tad bit loose but the size 0 wasn't available and I had to rent the 2. Thick nice material. I read other reviews saying straps were too delicate but I disagree, they seemed thick and sturdy to me. I didn't have any problem moving around w/ the sleeves either. I rented this as a back up for a wedding, I liked my other dress better. Now I'm just trying to find an excuse to wear this dress somewhere else!
Well made. Nice fabric with a little stretch. Sleeve detail is unique. Tons of compliments all night.

I wore this to a Rodeo gala. I doubt Christian Siriano evisioned getting that type of mileage out of it but it was perfect. Its a confortable fit and transitions from sitting to dancing easily. The train can be a bit tricky going downstairs so make sure you have help. Ran a little large and u have to watch out for lines. But tons of compliments all night on it.

This dress was beautiful and the fabric had a slight stretch, so you can easily sit, eat and dance in it. In my picture I am not wearing heels, i am 5'4" and weigh 169 lbs. One reviewer said this dress wont work if you have a large chest, but i do and had no problem wearing the dress with a bra (not padded, but kind of thick to support the girls). Another reviewer said you cant wear Spanx with this dress, but i wore them (the ones that are tights with the very high control top) and it worked out great. Both of those reviews had me worried, so i hope to alleviate similar worries in anyone else. Overall, the dress was beautiful and unique with the arm detail and i got a ton of compliments.
PERFECT FIT

The dress fit like it was taylored for me. It was a perfect dress for a black tie wedding. The sleeves were a little restrictive of movement in the arms but it wasn't ever a problem, even for dancing.
Nice color and fit- perfect for a wedding

I liked this but felt a little over dressed at a fundraiser. It would be perfect for a wedding. The cut is nice. You will need a strapless of course. IÔ∏è would not recommend spanx of any kind because it will show through

links_reviews_title: Fantastic fit and color. Got many compliments.
links_reviews_text: I wore without a bra and it was just fine. I went to dinner and was comfortable sitting for four hours

I didn't end up wearing this for the event wanted to leave a review to warn others to consider ordering a size up. Of all the size 4 dresses this one definitely felt the tightest. I was able to zip up but my chest was unflatteringly squished. Maybe this dress will be a better fit for smaller chested ladies.
I rented this for a med school gala, and it was PERFECT! It hit in all the right places, and the color would look good on anyone!
Amazing dress that fit perfectly and got all the compliments
Perfect flattering stretchy thick and lined. Absolutely gorgeous!

links_reviews_title: Everyone told me how gorgeous I looked in the dress.
links_reviews_text: Fits perfectly, you will definitely need heels with a platform for shorter women.

links_reviews_title: Makes you feel unique and pretty
links_reviews_text: Sorry - the evening was such a blur and I don't have personal photographs. I really liked this dress a lot. I wore my hair down with romantic not quite tight but not quite beachy curves. This dress is quite tight around the hips and booty for those of us that have a little love around our curves. So that is why I went up from a 4 to a 6. I read some reviews of those that complained about the sleeves but I didn't find it to be cumbersome at all. Just keep your shoulders back as my mom always says!
Gorgeous dress. Loved the design and color. Did not wear due to my belly button showing through the fabric and did not want to wear spanks.

Color, fabric, and cut are very flattering. The size 0 hit the floor for me (5‚Äô8‚Äù) while barefoot. The material is thick and provides a good structure, while still offering a lot of stretch. The only reason I couldn‚Äôt get away with the 0 was because the straps were too short for me and they dig into my shoulders. I‚Äôm hoping the size 2 becomes available for an event I‚Äôll be attending soon!

links_reviews_title: Beautiful Dress just ordered a size too small
links_reviews_text: This is a beautiful dress. Unfortunately, I ordered a size too small in hopes that it would fit. It didn't. I would try this dress in another size. I love the look!
I'm usually a size 6 and I ordered a size 6. When I put it on, I couldn't even zip halfway without looking like an overstuffed burrito. I would recommend ordering a size up.

Fit well, was actually a 10 and easy to zip since I struggle with the rib cage/bust area usually. I felt that the arms were just a little lower hanging than I like, so I didn't end up wearing it, I felt like I'd be annoyed with them (I have short arms). Beautiful color and my boyfriend loved how it looked, though!

links_reviews_title: Pretty, but not good with my skin tone
links_reviews_text: Perfect for hourglass shapes! Fit like a glove but showed my lower stomach a bit too much (and I don't have one). Would've worn if it was summertime and I had a tan!

links_reviews_title: If you have boobs, don't rent this!
links_reviews_text: I typically wear a size 0R or 2R. I rented a different dress in a 0 and it fit perfectly. I had an issue with the first dress, so I ordered this dress as a backup in the same size. When it came, I could not even zip it up because it was so small in the chest. Beautiful dress and color, but it is not meant for women with boobs. If you rent it, size up!
I could only pick one so I can't wait to come back and rent this again for another event!
This dress was absolutely gorgeous! I received compliments alllll night! Would deff wear again to another wedding.

I am 5'2 and the 4P looked like it was fitted / hemmed perfectly just for me! I was not able to wear any heels (which I did not mind) because of the hemming but did get away with dressy flat sandals that were mostly covered by the dress.

This dress was a blast to wear. I was concerned that the clay color would wash me out but I added some rose gold sparkly jewelry for just the right amount of glamour. The bottom of the dress had enough fabric to make it swing while the bodice fit to still look svelte on the dance floor. I did still have to buy some platform/ wedge heel shoes even though I got the petite version. I just didn't want to step on it with a cigarette heel. It made me feel comfortable at a very classy yet fun wedding. So glad i chose this over matronly looking lace dresses or dark colors. It photographs well which was a big bonus since I was included in the extended family photos at the wedding. Very well made, classic yet unique...just get this dress and be a princess for a night.

This jumpsuit is so soft and silky. I loved it so much I bought it. You could dress it up with heels or simply wear flip-flops. About it because we travel a lot and I like one piece outfit that I can pack and won't wrinkle and this fabric certainly meet those standards. The only negative is that the strap around the neck it's very thin and if you are full breasted it's a little tight pull. (A lot is pulling on that little string! Lol!) Again, I bought it so that should say it all!

Overall it was beautiful and I got quite a few compliments. The downside is that I have long muscular legs and a short torso so it rode up in the crotch area at times and it was short, hitting just above my ankles.
This jumpsuit is so cute and fun and the fabric is really soft. Only downside is the croch really rides up, even though I sized up.
I rented this to wear to a vineyard wedding. It ended up being 90 degrees that day, but the lightweight fabric was comfortable and the jumpsuit kept its beautiful shape without wilting or wrinkling.

This is super cute, fits great, feels expensive...love it! I wore it with flat sandals to the theater for a matinee, and it was perfect. It's not a great outfit for extended sitting, but it was fine. I'm a size 10+ in pants and a 32D top, the 10 in this was perfect. Will rent again.

links_reviews_title: Tall girls and jumpsuits...what are you gonna do?
links_reviews_text: The fabric is SO SOFT! Beautifully well made and it fit like a glove except for the length. I'm 5'10", so clothes are just like that sometimes. There's a little extra strap tacked in, so I was able to wear it after I freed it.

Rented this jumpsuit to wear for hosting Christmas dinner. It seemed unseasonal but the pattern was perfectly festive. I threw a black silk kimono over it to give it more of a winter vibe. Styled it sparkle socks. Stretch (some) good torso length. Accommodated a big dinner.
Very flattering and comfortable.
Beautiful jumper. Love it.

links_reviews_title: Pretty, but short in the torso if you're tall!
links_reviews_text: I am 5'9" and have a butt, and the 12R was juuuust long enough in the torso. Was a bit uncomfortable if I was slouching. I still wore it and after seeing the photos I think it was also a little too short in the legs. Basically, I wish there was a Long size, but there isn't. Wouldn't really recommend for anyone my height or taller.
Love this for a casual, elegant look. Fit true to size and very comfortable and slimming. Would rent again.
Love this jumpsuit - it was so stylish and I received a lot of compliments but the straps are not adjustable and ended up being actually quite painful throughout the night.
This was overall small. I'm 5"4" and rarely have trouble with a jumpsuit. This one was short in the torso. And fit very small. I'd recommend you size up.

links_reviews_title: I wore this to try something completely different, and it's very cute.
links_reviews_text: It's more comfortable on my body type standing than sitting. The bottom hem is perfect for me in flats, but would be too short with heels. It's a silk-like fabric that is lined.

These days I am finding myself between a size 2 and size 4. Considering the size 4 fit me perfectly I am assuming the dress runs small. There is very little "give" in this dress so make sure to get the right size. Overall the color, style, and quality of this dress would have been perfect for my friends wedding, but alas, it was cancelled due to Covid 19 so I ended up not attending with this lovely dress. I will definitely be wearing this dress for the rescheduled wedding in December.

links_reviews_title: Cute, festive & professional for St. Patty's Day!
links_reviews_text: Fit like a glove without being too tight or restrictive. The length hit mid-calf so definitely needed heels. Overall I loved it and was tempted to buy! The color is rich and the fabric is thick and high quality.
Love this dress. It's nice thick material and lined, so it smooths any imperfections! Beautiful color. Great fit on me.

Rented this dress for my sister's engagement party and loved it. I ordered the 4 and 6. The 4 fit like a glove, but decided I wanted a little more room in the waistband for the night so wore the 6. The color is really vibrant and I got a ton of compliments on it. The fabric has some nice stretch so it's easy to move around in and is substantial- not a flimsy, cheap feeling dress. Paired it with nude heels and earrings and it looked great. Highly recommend it!

links_reviews_title: I rented this for my civil ceremony
links_reviews_text: I originally thought I would rent this dress as something to wear to my rehearsal dinner for my wedding, but when we opted for a small, civil ceremony instead, this was the dress I had to have. It was beautiful. I was between sizes (10 and 12), but I'm glad I went with the 12 because I think the 10 would have inhibited my movement. I got a lot of compliments on this look, and there weren't too many people disappointed that I opted for a green wedding dress instead of a white one, which I think I owe in part to this green dress being so special.
Perfect fitting dress
Beautiful, comfortable....the color! Received lots of compliments.
I love this dress! It fit great, felt great, and made me feel great! It is fully lined, so I wouldn't wear it to an outdoor wedding. Other than that, this is a perfect special occasion dress

links_reviews_title: Compliments all day at the office
links_reviews_text: This was by far my favorite rental so far. It's a beautiful color in person, thick material, and comfortable. When I wore it to work, I received compliments all day. You could definitely wear this for a more formal occasion.

This dress is extremely comfortable, not too tight, not too short, and the material is very soft and felt good on. It's not an overly flattering cut but it's perfect for work or a summer party or wedding.

Didn't like the length of this dress on me. I'm 5'5 and this dress hit right at mid knee or right below knee. Prefer my dresses at or above knee length. Also didn't think the heavy fabric is appropriate for the summer. Did love the gorgeous green color and beautiful details on the dress. Overall would not rent again.

links_reviews_title: I received so many compliments on this dress.
links_reviews_text: The color and details on this dress are amazing! The fabric is thick, but even at a humid outdoor wedding I didn't feel too hot in the dress. The band is a little tight around the waist so I sized up. The skirt was fitted but had enough room to really get down on the dance floor. I would definitely rent this dress again!

links_reviews_title: I wore this dress to my graduation. It was very comfortable and flattering. Lots of compliments!
links_reviews_text: I would recommend this dress for any occasion. Very comfortable and flattering!

links_reviews_title: So many choices, but with unlimited I feel it's harder to get what I want due to availability .
links_reviews_text: This dress is gorgeous !!! I felt fabulous . So many compliments . Has some stretch except the middle area so I had to make sure I hade some good shape water to smooth my midsection . I will definitely rent this dress again .

Gorgeous dress, beautifully lined, vivid color - unfortunately it runs small and was particularly tight in the waist. Would have loved to have worn it to the 5 de Mayo event in Washington, D.C., but had to send it back.

I loved this dress. I wore it for an interview and for a conference. This one gets so many complements including people asking where they can get it. It's heavy with the lining but it didn't wrinkle terribly sitting. Didn't want to send it back.
The color is beautiful, material is great, I got a lot of complements.

links_reviews_title: Great Spring dress for the workplace!
links_reviews_text: The fit was great, although the band around the ribcage is a little tight. The dress is beautiful and the fabric is a nice thick material, although it doesn't have much give because of the band around the waist. The length is perfect for a professional workplace, and the green is a beautiful Kelly green that is great for Spring/Summer!

Good fit, great color, fabric is on the heavier side which was great for March/April. It's not the absolute most flattering for anyone who tends to look boxy without waist definition, and the nude liner under the patterned cut-outs made people do a lot of double takes! But overall a great wedding guest dress.
Fabric felt chic, it was very flattering.
Adorable dress. Great color for spring and comfortable fit. Perfect for a bridal shower!

links_reviews_title: Quality fabric, great fit -- I got a ton of compliments!
links_reviews_text: Great fit, as pictured.

I really loved this dress! I can wear a 12 - 16 depending on designer and have a larger bust and this fit just fine. I am glad I chose the 14 as it fit my chest well. The color is a true kelly green which I think is universally flattering on anyone. The dress was very well made - very thick material and lined. It's a little stretchy but not a lot of give right at the waistband, though I didn't have an issue with that. Actually, it made my waist actually look smaller. Would definitely rent again.

This fit well, was impeccably made and the color was beautiful. I was going to wear it for work but wound up wearing to my personal Christmas party at my home. I received so many compliments and felt great! If it wasn't so expensive I would definitely buy it because it is so versatile!

links_reviews_title: Photo doesn't do this dress justice
links_reviews_text: This fit really well and was a nice heavy fabric that held up all day at work and to a work event after without getting too wrinkled. The color was great and I got a lot of compliments. An 8 (my normal size) fit me perfectly.
Lovely, comfortable (slight stretch) very feminine, figure flattering.
This is a winter dress - heavy material, which I liked . I wore it to see my children in a theater production.
Had to give a big presentation for work and this dress was perfect to give me just a bit of an extra edge and confidence boost! The dress is well lined and beautiful. Love, love, love.

links_reviews_title: Beautiful color but not what I was hoping for.
links_reviews_text: I tried on the size 12 in the store and it fit but was a little uncomfortable so I ordered the 14 for my event. It was bigger in the shoulders but about the same fit everywhere else. I was really bummed because it was a beautiful color and a gorgeous dress but I was uncomfortable all night. Ultimately my fault I should have just run to the store and gotten something else.
Loved this dress- nice heavy material- beautiful color and cut is perfect for work- super flattering.
Fit was great! Heavy lining, very forgiving and comfortable.
Loved this color and design - good for work with a blazer
This dress feels and looks expensive. High quality. One of my favorite dresses I've ever worn! I will likely rent it again, if not buy it outright.
Thick material, no need for spanx.

links_reviews_title: It was beautiful quality- but it didn't wow me when it was on
links_reviews_text: Thick fabric, beautiful color, and I think it would be great on someone who is busty. It's pretty long in the waist so if your boobs don't fill the space (mine didn't) it will be a little baggy on the top.

links_reviews_title: Winter holiday parties are always a blast! Got to keep it a little conservative for a work event.
links_reviews_text: This dress is so comfortable that I didn't have to give it a second thought all night. I could certainly focus on having fun and being fun. The lining and thick material were warm and flattering. The knee length is a bit unflattering, but certainly better than too short, especially around the big bosses. The waist cut is not forgiving, but very flattering on an hourglass!
Fit was great - it looks so much better in person. Loved it.
Rented for work. Very pretty dress, but once I had it on it just didn't feel appropriate for the office.
Fit great and received many compliments. Dress is also well made and excellent quality.

links_reviews_title: I didnt have to worry about anything. The dress came in on time and it was perfect
links_reviews_text: Perfect fit. Just a little bit shorter than I thought it would be

I wore this dress for my college graduation. I love Herv√© L√©ger dress material. It is very thick and tight so it feels like built in spanks. The dress runs short, but I was still able to wear heels and feels comfortable with the length (however I was also wearing shorts underneath just in case). The sleeves were slightly tight around my arms.

links_reviews_title: Super cute and fun dress rented for graduation pictures!
links_reviews_text: I rented this for my college graduation pictures and couldn't be happier. Super cute and fun and looked amazing in the photos. It was a little short and rode up over my butt so I probably wouldn't wear it out but I'm super happy with the way it looked in photos. The material is such a thick and lovely quality and I loved the 3 dimensional design.
Cute, a little bit small in the arms
Heavy material so wouldn't recommend for a hot outdoor event but cute dress and fit well

links_reviews_title: White for the Bride to Be!
links_reviews_text: I wore this dress to my engagement party. It is a cute dress but it is very tight, so much so that I didn't need to wear a bra. Comfortable to move around in but needed help from a friend to zip me up (and out!). I tried to steam the wrinkles out of the lower half of it but to no avail.

This fit perfectly. The White isn't as bright as it could be, the skirt fabric had a little puckering, and it was too short to bend way over in, but I got lots of compliments and I enjoyed wearing it to my friends 40th "white" party.

Yes it's white but paired with red and gold shoes and a red and gold purse it becomes perfect to wear on a warmer December day - material is heavy and it was only fitted in the bust because of my athletic shape Herve never disappoints So cute will wear again

links_reviews_title: Super flattering - hugs all the right spots
links_reviews_text: Got a ton of compliments all night! It was flattering and was more hugging than "tight". The material is thick and very comfortable. The only con I would say is that the under arms area was a little bit tight for me - i could feel it all night.

links_reviews_title: Very flattering white dress. But quite short
links_reviews_text: I'm usually between a size 2 and 4 but the Small was not available so I wore the medium. It was quite loose around the stomach and the behind but because it flares out, it looked fine. It's quite short so it was a little hard to dance in becaus I had to make sure my underwear didn't show. I'd be interested to see what the Small looks like on.
Heavy for everydaybut great for any wedding

links_reviews_title: Fit extremely well and looked super flattering
links_reviews_text: The fabric was the perfect thickness to stay extremely fitted and comfortable. Absolutely loved this piece - I paired it with a leather jacket and suede booties

Love the brand and usually wear a size 4, but being 5'9, the dress rode up way too much. I could see my bottom coming out in the back. It was also way too tight. The arms were so small, it was cutting off my circulation, and I couldn't zip the dress. Wish I sized up! It's a gorgeous material and design, just really missed the mark on fit.

I actually got this dress sent to me as a back up for a dress that was unavailable. Thankfully this dress turned out perfectly. It does run small. I was able to wear a regular nude bra with it. The material is super thick as Herve Lager typically is so it hangs nicely, etc.

Love Herve!!! This dress is so simple, but so beautiful! This runs true to size, but we recommend sizing up for your backup. It is fitted at the chest, but the stretchy fabric allows comfortable room for hips. This may be worn with a standard bra and we recommend nude undergarments. This fabric is very stretchy! Pair this with colorful earrings or gold jewelry.
I love HL but this dress just didn't have that wow factor like most of their dresses. Wore to baby shower. Also the one sent looked old and dingy.

links_reviews_title: I rented this dress for my couple's wedding shower. I was complimented all night!!
links_reviews_text: I have a large bust so I needed something that wouldn't be super tight but enhanced my features. This dress definitely did that! I felt very flirty and sexy. The pros are that it hides stubborn tummy fat and is flattering on all body shapes. Cons- it stains easily and the arms are very tight.

links_reviews_title: Perfect dress for my bachelorette party
links_reviews_text: I got this dress when my first choice was unavailable and my backup option didn't fit properly. Even though the exchange was a bit of a hassle, I'm so glad I ended up with this dress! It made me feel beautiful at my bachelorette party, and the fit was very flattering. My only complaint is that the skirt was pretty wrinkled when I received it, and, because the fabric is pretty heavy, I wasn't able to get the wrinkles out before I needed to wear it. That was a minor issue though, and I'm overall really pleased with this dress. Note that it seems to run small ‚Äì I'm normally a 2 or 4 or a small, but the medium fit me perfectly in this.
Fit perfectly and was in great condition. Unfortunately I did not end up wearing it because of the way it looked with tights - I would definitely rent it again in the spring or summertime!

links_reviews_title: fits like a glove, yet work appropriate
links_reviews_text: Herve Leger knows what's up. This dress fit like a glove and was so figure flattering. I wore it to a trade show and received dozens of compliments. I had a weird tan line up top from my swimsuit earlier (woops) so I was extra glad I rented this one with a high neck line! The skirt seems shorter than it is since it flares out but it was definitely long enough to pass the fingertip test on me and I'm 5'5". I was comfortable standing and sitting, but I wore spandex shorts underneath for extra coverage in case I needed it. My only negative comment about this dress is that the arm pit area dug in a bit and after a 12-hour long day of wearing it, my pits were a little red, mildly irritated and uncomfortable. Next day they were fine though, so it wasn't an issue. I wish I could own a Herve Leger dress *daydreamy sigh*

Sexy, yet classy little white dress. Love the length and just comfortable to wear all day long. Wore it to a Labor Day Party and got compliments all day long. Dress can be dressed up or down. I went from day to night in this dress. Wore it with wedges during the day and with heels at night. I would definitely rent this one again. Herve never fails. Love it!

links_reviews_title: A new variation on a classic!
links_reviews_text: Beautiful Herve dress. A perfect variation of the very tired bandage dress. It was a perfect dress to close out the summer season!

I as so excited when I received this dress brand new with the tags! It is a thick stretchy material that looks expensive. It was very loose around the waist but tight across the chest. I received tons of compliments a ll day as I went from work to party and it was appropriate for both lengthwise.
Could barely get this dress on! Gorgeous heavy material but way too small :(
Body of it fit well but the arm holes were way too narrow and painful - couldn't wear it!

links_reviews_title: Nice form fitting around the waistline
links_reviews_text: The arms are a little small, so it felt like a small at the top and a medium below the bust, if you have larger than a C cup then perhaps go up a size

links_reviews_title: End up not wearing. Too tight around shoulders for athletic people
links_reviews_text: I really liked the style, and it fitted me nicely everywhere BUT my shoulders/arms. I think this short cut sleeve style is not so suited for people who are more athletic and have wider shoulders, some muscles. Sizing up could work, but then the waistline be loose.

links_reviews_title: Probably would fit great if didn't run small
links_reviews_text: I normally wear xs or s, so I went safe and ordered small size. I couldn't even zip it) probably if I would order medium size, the dress will fit perfect
Wore this for my Bachelorette. Got SO many compliments. Flattering and comfortable. Definitely a dress to WOW and party in with out exposing to much.
Great quality. Nice and thick. Just not my style. Was hoping it would it would work for me. Gave it 4 stars because it's a great dress and I can see how it would work for others. Just not for me.
The arm holes are so small I was uncomfortable within 5 seconds of zipping it up .It was squeezing my arms and don't have large arms by any means.
Loved this dress but there was zero chance of it zipping over my boobs. I will probably order again in the next size up because the quality is so amazing.

links_reviews_title: Beautiful, amazing. Couldn't zip it up.
links_reviews_text: Would have been perfect for summer evenings/cocktails. I usually wear an 8 or 10 but I'm quite busty. This was a large. It fit from the wait down, but I couldn't begin to zip it (nor could my husband when I asked him for help).

links_reviews_title: Fit was perfect for bridal shower!
links_reviews_text: Fit perfectly
tight under the arms

links_reviews_title: Love, love, love. This dress was perfect for a white nights party in Cartagena.
links_reviews_text: Herve Leger always runs on the small side. I usually take a 6 or 8 and the M was a great fit.
Tighter on top. Great looking dress.

links_reviews_title: Usually a S in this designer but not this time
links_reviews_text: Didn't wear

links_reviews_title: pretty dress but dress runs smaller. Size small feels like a size 0. armpit area is especially small
links_reviews_text: didn't wear it.
A bit tight but hugged my curves in the best way! Heavier weight was great for a winter date.

links_reviews_title: The top is absolutely gorgeous! I felt so beautiful out partying for my birthday!
links_reviews_text: #gorgeous
Loved this top beyond reason. Wore for NYE and got compliments galore. I'm a size 10 but for this designer I have to size up to 12.

I'm in my 30's and always what to wear out with jeans that's chic but age appropriate? This top is it. The sleeves aren't tight (I hate my arms) and proportions just right. It's a showstopper!!!! Stunning material and design
It's flattering but the material is lace so it has zero give. Luckily it fit perfectly.

links_reviews_title: Lovely blouse! One of a kind.
links_reviews_text: Prettier than in pictures a must try!! Lovely feminine one of a kind:)

Wore for thanksgiving with black pants. Shirt doesn't have much give but the 6 fit as expected. Wore without a bra. More comfortable than I was expecting for a lace shirt. The details on the back of the shirt are amazing. Everyone was complimenting. Did not want to return. As shown, it's definitely a little shorter at the waist so wearing with looser fitting pants is a must to avoid a muffin top!

Wore this for an anniversary dinner date and got compliments from my partner and multiple people at the restaurant! Gorgeous top with beautiful and incredibly unique details, as you'd expect from Marchesa. Unless you want to show a lot of stomach, make sure to pair with high waisted pants as it's quite short.

This was a great top. The cut was very flattering. Even though the fabric below the black waist is sheer, the pleats and design of the lace keep it from looking like a crop top. I felt really feminine in this top!
I'm 5'9", 142 lbs with D cups. I got the 10 size. Fit perfect. So pretty on. Shows your tummy. But ok with high waisted Pants.

Wore it for a fundraising event where the dress code was office or cocktail. Wore it with black leggings and got tons of compliments. It's gorgeous - I may end up buying it. It runs very small in the rib cage. I normally wear a size 4 top and the 8 was a bit tight. I had worried about the sleeves because my biceps are on the big side but there's plenty of room in the sleeves - it's more the ribcage area that runs quite small.

I am an Instagram blogger at @storyofstyle. I can't buy clothes all the time so rent the runway is perfect. This top is so flattering. I have no doubt this would look good on ANY body type. I'm 34C and size 4. It fit me like a glove. Very happy.

Material is pretty stiff so go up a size as directed. I'm a 32 DD and was able to go sans bra although there was probably just enough room if i chose to wear one. The part that flares out at the bottom is sheer so if you don't want your stomach to show, I would not rent this top. Other than the material being a bit stiff and sometimes itchy, I actually really liked this top and was able to pair with some black skinny work pants for a christmas party when everyone else wore a dress on a -8 degree night. A bonus for me!

I was worried about the sizing on this top so I ordered up from my normal size 6. The size 8 fit my like a glove. This top is beautiful and I received so many compliments on it. It was in perfect condition and looked very expensive. The length was a little short and the bottom of it was sheer. One of my favorite unlimited rentals so far!

links_reviews_title: Loved the detail! Lace & embriodery so pretty!
links_reviews_text: Love this shirt! Definitely runs a little small. The fabric doesn't really stretch at all. I wore a size 8 however A 10 would've been perfect. I am 5'8 & 125 lbs. Fabulous & feminine!
So sparkling & fun! Sized up because I know Marchesa can run small & I'm definjtely glad I did!
The lace detail on this top is gorgeous! I felt so pretty and elegant wearing it.

Not only was this stunning, people ran over to me at a huge concert to tell me how much they loved it. It's absolutely flawless in person and the back is beautiful too I'm pretty flat chested so it fit well and the small amount of shirring at the waist is very flattering.
I usually wear a much smaller size but got this because it was the only one available. Was a little big but still looked good. Got a lot of compliments! Stylish top, highly recommend.

I wore this top to go out on thanksgiving eve. It was a beautiful piece that could easily be dressed up or down. I wore with a black skinny leg pant. The detailing and embroidery was stunning and the fit was true to size. The material was a bit itchy from the embroidery, but nothing too bothersome. Also, its perfect for wearing a sleeve without the weight and heat of a sleeve (so if you're at a crowded bar or club, it'd be my go to top for not getting too warm in) Received tons of compliments!!
Gorgeous lace detail make this a statement or special occasion top.... couldn't wear a regular bra with this and with no stretch SIZE UP at least one size if you're full cheated

links_reviews_title: Runs Small especially for large chest women
links_reviews_text: Wore this for my birthday event and dinner. Tons of compliments. Hard to zip yourself. I sized up 2 sizes as I'm larger on top and that was a little tight.

This top is one of a kind. Absolutely stunning. I wore it twice. First time with black slacks. Second time with a dark green velvet pencil skirt. Worked well with both. The top has no give and does run a bit tight at the waist. I thought about buying it because I got so many compliments but decided against due to the tightness factor. That may be remedied by one size larger (I recently lost weight and am still trying to figure out my best size in clothes ).
This is one of my favorite RTR rentals! The top fits true to size. The detail is stunning and you will get compliments all day! I wore this to work with a pencil skirt and then out for happy hour!
Fit really well. Incredibly beautiful up close. Can be worn dressed up or dressed down.

links_reviews_title: This top is so hot! Love love love it!
links_reviews_text: High quality, no bra needed.
The ruffle is kind of weird once u put it on

links_reviews_title: Didn't end up wearing. Wasn't really my style. Though it is a pretty piece.
links_reviews_text: Runs small. Was too fancy for my event. Didn't wear.
It actually runs true to size if you want a tight fitted look. I wore it with stretchy black pants and over the knee boots and got lots of compliments at the office holiday party.

links_reviews_title: Tons of compliments. Really jazzes up jeans or nice for formal affair
links_reviews_text: Little snug but really pretty elegant too
I wore another marchesa notte top (red lace one) and it fit great but I went a size up on this one and it was still too tight. I couldn't get my shoulders in!
Ran too small. Details on shirt were very pretty.

links_reviews_title: Could not wear it, way too small.
links_reviews_text: Beautiful detail, but way too small.

links_reviews_title: The top is gorgeous but I literally couldn't get it on.
links_reviews_text: I was stuck with one arm in and the rest over my head. I tried several times; perhaps if I'd had someone else pull it down while I held my arms up it might have worked.

links_reviews_title: beautiful fabric good fit in waist but quite snug in bust
links_reviews_text: order one or two sizes up from normal size if busty
Gorgeous top! So many complements!!! Great for small chested girls!

I loved this top because of its' detailing and unique color pattern, got many compliments on it. It's definitely an eye Cather.. However, it runs a bit small.. Need to order a size or two up. I wasn't very comfortable in my own size. But overall it's a beautiful top.

This top is beautiful, the lace detail is gorgeous. But be wary it is completely sheer except for the bust. You might be going for that, but I sure wasn't! I thought when I selected it maybe the lace wouldn't make me look so nude...nope, you are pretty naked.

links_reviews_title: See my previous review on sizing
links_reviews_text: Overall small, sized up to a 4
I sized up so the 8 fit me perfect however I am typically a 4-6. This top is pretty fancy but also a little short/sheer which made it difficult to find a place to wear it. Wouldn't rent again

links_reviews_title: Lace detailing makes for fantastic design for this LBD.
links_reviews_text: This dress is amazing and I bought it. For some I'd imagine it would be a little itchy but it didn't bother me. I love the pattern on it it's so well designed and is something a little different for a LBD while still being extremely versatile. I can dress it up with pumps or wear it with my favorite Isabel Marant tan booties. It wears well with black opaque tights or no tights. I wore it with a leather jacket but I bet it would be great with a black blazer as well.
This was my backup dress that I ended up wearing, it was easy and comfortable and stylish. No complaints and would recommend.
I'm normally a size 8 and Medium. Glad I got the large, definitely runs on the small side. But lots of compliments and overall happy I rented this!

links_reviews_title: Lovely Christmas Party for a great company!
links_reviews_text: Dress fit great - I added black tights because it was end of December. Sleeves were a good length .
Great fit, beautiful detail and I got a lot of compliments!
Loved how the lace gave it a little bit of sexy but it wasn't too short to wear to a work function!

links_reviews_title: Not exactly a show-stopper, but I liked it!
links_reviews_text: This was actually my backup dress, but I ended up wearing it to the party instead of my main one! The sleeves do feel a tiny, tiny bit tight, but it wasn't constricting unless I was trying to put my arms all the way up (they're also kind of rough material). I wore it to a Game of Thrones themed party and didn't really get compliments from anyone on how it looked. I think this dress would be better on those with a bigger bust.

This dress was very comfortable. I taped some padding in the chest because I am extremely small in that area. It was a little "bunchy" in the boobs without the padding, but most people probably wouldn't need to do that. I loved this dress and would rent it again.

links_reviews_title: Great dress for a cocktail-attire gala
links_reviews_text: Very pretty details. Not much give. Strapless bra or no bra works.
Fit was perfect. I am size 6 typically. Dress was flattering and comfortable. Good quality. Highly recommend. I got lots of compliments.
I loved this dress however wish I went down a size. It has a little extra fabric in the sides around the hip area that kinda bulge out.

I wore this for a school fundraiser. I received tons of compliments! It was very comfortable and classy with a bit of an edge. It wasn't a dress I would have normally picked for myself, so I was glad I went out of my comfort zone.

The fit does not give, so order up a size, if problem areas are a concerns. My measure are 36C, 28 waistline & 38 hips. I wear between an 8-10 in dresses and 6-8 in pants. I ordered a size medium in this dress and it gave a polished sleek look.
I wish the arms were a little more fitted! Not as revealing as it looks on the model in the photo. I like this dress but the price is a little steep for the quality.

links_reviews_title: Lucked out with this Plan B Choice
links_reviews_text: This wasn't my first choice; my first choice came early and I was able to try both sizes on and found that I was exactly between the two sizes; I returned it and had slim-pickings for another dress to wear to my Work Holiday Party. Came across this number and was VERY pleased. Super comfortable, sexy and demure, but completely appropriate for a work event. Great winter dress for a cocktail party or semi-formal affair.

links_reviews_title: Didn't end up wearing but very pretty
links_reviews_text: Beautiful detailed dress and would of worn had I not rented 2 different dresses but this dress wasn't as flattering as the other. I ordered the small but it was a little loose and didn't really do much for my athletic frame. I think it would be verrrry pretty on a curvy frame. Sorry about the mess and child in pic, of course had to send pics to friends before choosing!
I usually wear a 4/6 and the Medium was slightly big, especially in the arms. It wasn't an issue though and I would wear this size again. I thought it was a pretty and classy dress. Recommend
Great LBD! Love the lace great details fits great
The dress is just ok. Not form flattering, stiff material. Only plus is that a bra is not needed.
This dress is so pretty. Felt amazing and had a wonderful evening. It is a little tight in the arms. Perfect fit otherwise. Not too short even with being 5'11!
I wore this for a wedding in late December and it was perfect. I am 5'4" 34DDD 135lbs and the small was a little tight around my chest-back-shoulders but I think a medium would have been too big.

I wore this to a work party and felt so great in this dress. Im pretty flat chested so I did wear a black strapless bra othereise I wouldnt have filled out the top. The top does have a deep V so the top of the bra peeked out s bit but it was not noticable at all. Im about 5'5 and 110 and it fit perfectly. I wish i coukd keep it!

I wore this for NYE. I absoutely loved it . I got so many comiments. It complimeted my body so well. I have a full chest and am thicker in the stomach area. It had plenty of room in both areas and made my waist look great! Almost wanted to keep it!

This dress fit well. It was a perfect solution for a black tie/cocktail event. I wore it to a coworkers wedding and wanted something age appropriate, yet fun and trendy. The fit and length work very well. You‚Äôll need a strapless bra and minimal accessories. The lace on this dress is accessory enough.

links_reviews_title: Work party appropriate, but super fun and i felt sexy!
links_reviews_text: The dress was not too short which made it work holiday party appropriate! So many compliments. Loved this dress

links_reviews_title: Charity Event- felt stylish yet conservative-
links_reviews_text: Slightly short but flattering shape and beautiful detailing. I wore T-strap heels but you could wear short boots as well for a more casual event.

links_reviews_title: Work party and family holiday appropriate!
links_reviews_text: Loved this dress - sexy enough to feel dressed up, but conservative for a work cocktail party and Thanksgiving dinner with the family. Runs large - I'm typically a 4, but wore an XS. Loved this dress and got tons of compliments!

links_reviews_title: The dress was amazing. I will totally rent again.
links_reviews_text: Fit is true to size, I normally wear a size 8-1 tops due to my broad shoulders. Just make sure to unzip it all the way, or at first when trying on, you‚Äôll think it doesn‚Äôt fit over your hips! While it has full sleeves, I was able to move my arms comfortably all night. The detail in the lace is a show stopper. My fianc√© wishes I could‚Äôve bought the dress!

links_reviews_title: Didn't do much for my body, could of work a smaller size
links_reviews_text: This dress didn't do much for my body so I didn't wear it. I just wasn't a big fan of it. I also could of worn a smaller size. It was lose in the hips
Cute dress, nice fit
Such a cute dress on, I just didn't end up going to the party I ordered it for. Otherwise, very flattering and would rent again for another event

links_reviews_title: Wore it to a wonderful charity event for Motts Children's Hospital.
links_reviews_text: Fit well and was very comfortable. Zipper in the back was very difficult to use--both to zip up and down. Still loved wearing it though.

links_reviews_title: Just okay, would work more for a funeral than a wedding.
links_reviews_text: This dress was a backup dress for me, I ordered in a L & M. I only fit the L and it didn't give any room to move, there is no stretch to the lace. The dress is cute, it's just really sad feeling, I assume it's because you are very covered up. I wanted to wear to an outside wedding in Maine in May, temps into the low 50's. I could have worn this, but it would have been very forgettable and felt more like a dress I should be wearing at a funeral and not a wedding. I passed on this one.

links_reviews_title: I felt good in my dress
links_reviews_text: It was sexy but modest at the same time

links_reviews_title: More conservative than what is pictured, so unfortunately won't be wearing for the event I planned.
links_reviews_text: Fabric is really difficult with the zipper!

links_reviews_title: Great little black dress, fit really well and I loved all the details.
links_reviews_text: Fit perfectly, not too long or too short. Wore it with a strapless bra but I could've gone without.
This is a beautiful, well made dress but as other reviewers also mentioned, runs very small. I'm a size 8/10 in normal clothes and the L just barely zipped. It was definitely too tight to wear.

I didn't end up wearing this dress for the wedding because I didn't order the correct size. I should have ordered a small, because the Medium was too large, especially in the hips (and I'm not small hipped). It was cute, but would look much better in the right fit.

Love this dress but due to a mix up on my part I was not able to wear it to my event (grabbed the wrong bag when I left town). I did have to plan to wear the size medium vs small. The small was just a tad too snug for comfort. I'd plan to go up a size, otherwise a great dress.
Great evening cocktail dress, runs a bit small

This shirt was perfect for my birthdag dinner with the hubby. It was flirty with all of its ruffles and polka dots, while being sexy with its deep cut front. I wore my sticky bra ans used double sided tape. Yet, had no issues with it after this. The material was soft and forgiving. The ruffles helped hide my post-dinner bloat! Would rent again.

links_reviews_title: I wore this fun top to a concert!
links_reviews_text: It was low cut and gapped a bit but fashion tape fixed that problem. It was fun for a night out at a concert and a perfect rental item!
This top is so cute but has a really strange fit. It has a snap closure in the chest, but it was way too high, so I made it work with a safety pin.
Super sexy and classy at the same time.

links_reviews_title: Great for Live Show during hot Texas Summer
links_reviews_text: Cute, preppy and sexy top. A little low cut even on a full bust.

Wore this to a friend's birthday party and I felt so chic. The straps were sturdy (perfect for a night of dancing) and the fabric was high quality. I paired it with plain black jeans but you could easily dress it down with a blue denim and white sneakers for daytime.
Fits great, perfect for small chested ladies. Unique tank, classy and sexy.

I have a 34C chest and the top did not fit, even though I'm 5'3 and 130lbs. I tried pinning with safety pins but it really is not meant for someone with a B cup or larger. The bottom portion is very flattering on the stomach and the material is great!
I absolutely loved this top, but it was too big for me to wear and I usually wear a medium. I needed a small. I'm returning and will rent it again a size down.
Fit across the chest looked very strange
Easy top, can dress up or down w whore or black dress pants/ denim. Took to Vegas , easy dinner option

links_reviews_title: It is a great top. perfect for jeans or pencil skirt. dress up or down, a winner
links_reviews_text: not sure why I ordered this size, as it is not my normal size, maybe in error. too big and no adjustable straps. I think in my size it would have been a winner. great pick up for unlimited shoppers, you could pair with so many outfits

links_reviews_title: Beautiful, comfortable top but the bust area runs a bit large.
links_reviews_text: I love this top! It's so comfortable. I love that it buttons & snaps on the inside to keep it closed tight. The straps were a little loose, I probably could have worn a smaller size.

links_reviews_title: Too small and too many fasteners
links_reviews_text: The shirt was super cute and I really wanted it to fit me, but I just couldn't make it work. It showed up with the tags on it. It is a wrap shirt so there are 2 buttons on the side that are rather close together so it doesn't really give you sizing options, plus there is a snap in the middle of the chest which is supposed to keep the top together, but if you are busty, the snap just keeps popping open. I tried to wear it with a camisole under it, but it just didn't have the same effect. I'm disappointed in that shirt.

links_reviews_title: Looked great with a white skirt
links_reviews_text: Great fit! My only complaint is that the straps were not adjustable. The shirt was also pretty long but was able to tuck in the shirt.

Rented this dress for a black tie optional wedding and loveddddd it, already sad to return it. It's tight but stretchy so not constricting at all and great for dancing. Looks more scandalous than it really is, the top isn't sheer but the middle part and bottom are so you can see through to your waist and legs (but not the top). Tons of compliments! Highly recommend.

I absolutely LOVED this dress. I got the XS and it fit me like a glove. It's also nice that it had some stretch to it, so sizing doesn't have to be super exact. It was also really comfortable. Seriously, I felt so good in this! I didn't end up wearing it because I decided to wear another dress that I loved equally, but would 100% rent again for another Black Tie Optional / Black Tie wedding. The only somewhat-con is that since the inside paneling is nude, it really does look like it's sheer/there's nothing underneath, so it came off as maybe borderline too sexy.
This is my first time using RTR. We went to a masquerade ball for NYE. This dress was sexy, yet super comfortable all night long. There are panels in all the right places to hold you in.
This dress hugs your body in all the right ways. I highly recommend this dress!
I rented this for a work holiday party. The material is stretchy so it will hug your body in all the perfect ways. I would totally rent this again!
Opted for another dress for my event but this one fit perfectly and is very flattering.
Nice material, stretchy - I wore an XS usually I‚Äôm a size 2 or S.
While I was able to get the medium on, it was skin tight.

I rented this for a fall wedding, and it was perfect. It's stretchy and comfortable to dance in, and worked well with 5" heels and the tennis shoes I changed into for dancing. Might be an awkward length on a taller woman, but it was perfect on me-- came right to the top of my feet.

links_reviews_title: Dress was very comfortable and easy to sit/walk/dance in. I got several compliments!
links_reviews_text: The photo makes the dress look more shear than it is -- the only shear part is the legs (other areas has nude fabric under the black). The dress runs small -- I typically wear a size 6 and wore a large in this dress.
Way cool dress. Not right for what I needed it for. Very comfortable tho.. lots of stunning angles. Great look with strategic coverage.
Such a cute dress. So comfortable and it stretch. Flows nicely when walking.

Top scared me at first because I didn't think it would zip, but the sides of this romper have an elastic cinch to make it stretch! The waist fit like a glove. Color is beautiful and very neon. Bottom half was so comfortable even though it was a romper and skirt layer. Straps were adjustable which helped. Light weight material. Great for dressing up for warmer weather occasions. Sorry for the weird pic... it was the only one I had showing the whole romper! ;)

This photo was used with a filter, but the color is true to the original picture on this app. I absolutely fell in love with this romper. I am for sure going to be wearing it again when spring heads my way again.
Awesome color pink very comfortable and flattering

links_reviews_title: This was the second time I rented
links_reviews_text: Love the color the fit everything about this romper!

The pictures don't do the neon color on this romper justice. It is so bright and fun to wear and really is the perfect summer piece. The cut of the romper is very flattering and I loved how it looked like a dress from the front. It is definitely on the shorter side but still a wearable length.

links_reviews_title: Great standout color. Perfect fit and many compliments. Wore this for my birthday celebration.
links_reviews_text: Very fitted. Not much breathing room but worked for me. This item is for a smaller mid section. No complaints on fit.
I typically wear a 0 in this brand but found this romper to be a bit snug. Gorgeous color and very fun to wear. Well structured so no need for a bra. My husband loved it

Loved this romper! Color was much more vibrant in person. Normally wear a 2-4 in dresses, and the small fit like a glove. I'm 5'8" and was nervous about the length being too short as other reviewers have mentioned, but I didn't think it was. And the straps were adjustable! Great for taller women. If you're between sizes, I would size up for the backup. Overall great rental.

links_reviews_title: The color is gorgeous and it‚Äôs very comfortable
links_reviews_text: Well made and comfortable. Nicely lined inside. Really liked that it wasn‚Äôt too short like some rompers. I didn‚Äôt have to wear a bra and felt supported. Would rent again

This romper has the perfect pop of color. It is a nice fabric and the shorts are lined. I am a busty girl, and this romper kept me contained all evening. I received a lot of compliments on it. I definitely recommend it!

Absolutely love this piece. The color is intoxicating and the fabric is fabulous. It's thicker, but still light weight and flattering. The ruffle in the front gives the piece a feminine touch to balance out the practicality.
Absolutely love this one. The ruffle detail was outstanding. Very perfect for a summer party.

links_reviews_title: Lots of compliments on this cute romper. Fun color for summer.
links_reviews_text: Fit like a glove. The only con was needing assistance with the zipper.

I rented this romper for my 27th birthday weekend and was so happy with my choice! I got a million compliments and it was comfortable, sexy, and fun. The color was definitely brighter in person but it was perfect for a hot & beautiful summer weekend. I'm looking to purchase this piece since I loved it so much!
Fit is comfortable and flattering. AMAZING color! It's bright, showstopper! The length is great, not too short. Wore this for my birthday and it was perfect.
This is one of my favorite outfits I've ever worn! I got so many compliments.

I got this romper to wear to a post toast (a party after a rehearsal dinner) and it was cute! I am typically between a small and a medium in rompers and decided to be safe and order the medium. I wish I had gotten the small because it was plenty long and roomy in my waist/ribs! The color was also brighter than I was expecting (more neon pink) but it was perfect for the event I went to! Overall, I would recommend this romper but beware of the color and sizing!
Super fun! Felt like a tennis outfit. Fit was perfect all round.

links_reviews_title: One of my favorite things I have ordered from RTR
links_reviews_text: This romper is so flattering! I also got it brand new which was really cool. The color is really nice for the summer. Can dress it up or down. I wore it to a rehearsal dinner and got lots of compliments!

links_reviews_title: This is a hot little romper. Great color!
links_reviews_text: Short but it worked bc I'm short. Great fit, super comfy. Definitely would rent again

links_reviews_title: Wore to a concert and it was so comfortable. Very flattering on.
links_reviews_text: Fit perfect. I am 125 lbs with 36C bust. 5'4 was not too short. Just the right length.

I wore this for a night out in miami and it's beyond gorgeous. Fits so well, has adjustable straps. I would say the color is more of a hot pink, and not coral as the photo shows, but who cares it's beautiful! I'm normally a medium and got a large. I think either would fit but if you are between I would go up

links_reviews_title: Neon color and super flattering short/skirt
links_reviews_text: This romper is an attention-grabber. The color was amazing and the front was cut to mimic a skirt, which helped avoid some of the awkward issues with riding up that you see in other rompers.

links_reviews_title: So cute and practical. Loved it.
links_reviews_text: I wanted to keep this longer. I loved the vibrant color. Was very small. Could have sized up but still wore it. Loved how it had shorts underneath since it was short. I would definitely rent again.
This romper is a beautiful color & nice fabric. True to size and reasonable length. I would rent again.

Literally obsessed with this romper. Fit perfectly. Color is more of a hot pink, I thought it would be coral. I got soo many compliments, literally people stopping me on the street. You will stand out in this! I will definitely be renting again

links_reviews_title: This dress is so flattering and fits true to size.
links_reviews_text: The color is great, it pops and is brighter than in the picture. Loved it!
I ordered a medium and a small. The medium sort of fit bit was tight and uncomfortable. The small was a no way.
This fit me perfectly! Love the adjustable straps. So cute and top has lining to keep your shape up top if you want to go braless
wish I could‚Äôve worn it. I just couldn‚Äôt zip up all the way. I‚Äôm a 36DDD, and needed more room up top. I‚Äôd like to rent again But I‚Äôd size up.
Very cute color. Super tight and short.
Bright cheerful color and super cute!! Lots of compliments!! I usually wear a 6-8 but the medium was too small. L was perfect and it's modest but sexy too!

links_reviews_title: I wasn't able to wear this romper.
links_reviews_text: Super cute but much brighter than the photos. The material is nice but the fit is a little short in the bodice. I am 5'7' and it was too short for me.

links_reviews_title: Best romper! A must-rent! Great color and fit
links_reviews_text: I contemplated buying this romper because I loved it so much but I took so many pic in it I decided not to. But, this romper makes you look so tan and the fit is perfect. So many compliments!
This outfit was 100% cute! Really bright pink, sure to get looks! Flirt city!!!
Runs a little small. Great color and flattering

this romper is super cute and fun. It is very short and looks like a skirt in the front so I wore it with flat sandals so it wouldn't look crazy short. It runs slightly small. I am usually a zero or xs, and the xs was very tight. I could still wear it but it was slightly uncomfortable.

links_reviews_title: I wore this for a celebration for work. Was very comfortable and flattering!
links_reviews_text: Worn in early spring for a celebration for work. Fabric was great, fit very well on my 5'4 frame with heels.

links_reviews_title: This dress has an amazing blend of comfort and style.
links_reviews_text: I got the small and the extra-small thinking I'd likely fit better in the small, but I was wrong -- either one technically fit but the draping of the fabric can sort of overwhelm a small figure, especially up top, for me. The extra-small just looked better. I got SO MANY compliments; this is a real stunner of a dress. It was also so comfortable that I wore it from 10am all the way to midnight for my day as a bridesmaid. Word to the wise: you might need fashion tape to keep the low neckline in check.

Picked this dress to wear as a bridesmaid in my sister's wedding as our dresses just needed to be pink. I was looking for one that was lightweight, pretty, but still covered a lot of my body that I was still self conscious about as I was only 3 months postpartum from having twins. This covered my arms and had a forgiving silhouette. Fabric was thinner so not exactly great for concealing underwear/shapewear lines. Haha but otherwise a gorgeous dress.

links_reviews_title: I wore this for my vow renewal in Hawaii. I‚Äôve been getting lots of compliments on the dress!
links_reviews_text: I have a large chest so I had to use fashion tape to keep the top closed.

31 weeks pregnant here. I'm 5'2" and it was a little long for me but I wore some wedges and it worked out perfectly. This dress was really comfortable! I felt good and it complimented the right areas of my body. The fabric was very flattering.
Simple yet beautiful and easy to wear dress. It's quite long, even at 5'6" with 3" heels. I loved how comfortable it was and it worked great for a fall wedding.

You can't go wrong with this dress! I rented it twice for two different weddings. My only complaint is that on the second rental, I rented the same size and it was about 5 inches longer. Not sure what happened. Still beautiful!
I rented this to wear for our newborn photos, and I couldn't have been happier with it! It's thin material and definitely needs to be steamed- but I loved it overall!! Also- very low cut!

So happy to find this dress on RTR for a wedding i was in!!! Fits like a glove, was a little long for my 5'1 frame but just tucked the waist into the belt a bit and it was the perfect length with my heels.

This dress feels like something out of old Hollywood--really glamorous. I am hourglass shaped, and the wrap style allowed it to fit perfectly and be incredibly comfy. I didn't want to send it back! Things to watch: Length. I wore heels and clocked out around 6', and still had to watch my step on stairs. The slit. There's nothing keeping it together below the waist, so watch out for wind! It doesn't photograph quite as beautiful as it looks in person (the textile just falls a little flat).

Rented this for a fall wedding and it was perfect for the temp. Sometimes I get worried with wrap dresses but this was never an issue with this dress. It was very long so I had to wear heels (never my go to when I have a long event :) ) but it was perfect otherwise. I loved the way it flowed and didn't want to take it off! Highly recommend!!

links_reviews_title: This dress was such a confidence boost! It fit amazingly.
links_reviews_text: Beautiful color and amazing fit. Very glamorous!

links_reviews_title: Careful not to forget your fashion tape
links_reviews_text: Could be problematic for larger chested girls if you don't pin it or tape it! It's also quite long! But I felt like a princess all night

links_reviews_title: Didn't get to wear, but loved how it looked.
links_reviews_text: I ordered this as an option for an outdoor wedding, as I needed a peachy-pink dress. I loved how it looked on me. It was comfortable, though I'm a bit small in the bust so it was a little large in the chest area. I didn't end up choosing this dress mostly because of the sweltering heat and opted for a shorter dress. I would consider renting this or a similar dress in the future.
Wore this dress on a date night. Great fit and colour. I am 5'11 and the length was perfect!

links_reviews_title: Love this dress! So many compliments!
links_reviews_text: I loved this dress! It was so comfortable and was perfect for the occasion. I dressed it up with some black heels and a black clutch. I received so many compliments on it. I agree with the other reviews though, this dress is very long. I am 5'7'' and wore 3inch heels and the dress was still dragging on the ground. Also, this dress wrinkles very easily so be cautious! Overall I'm very glad I rented this dress.

This is a beautiful dress, but WAY too high maintenance to wear. The dress is so low cut to the point my fianc√© had to remind me to adjust myself sporadically through our day of wine tasting. The wrap completely gapped up to my upper thighs when sitting, and I thought I was going to flash everyone around me when the wind blew. Not an enjoyable day with this dress! Too much pinning and taping required!
I received tons of compliments ! One thing is that it is quite long so I'm curious how it would fit comfortably on shorter girls since I'm 5'10". Otherwise, amazing dress !

Perfect for a Spring/Summer wedding. I loved the color and the fit with a few minor issues- like most wrap dresses, the top didn't close well so my bra was always at risk of showing. The material was pretty but you could sort of see the boning from my shapewear. The length was perfect with 100mm heels though it got caught easily on my heels on steps. Overall though im so glad i picked this dress!

I'm only 5'2" so this dress was exceptionally long on me. I wore it for family photos on the beach and it was perfect because it didn't matter if it was too long. The wrap stayed closed and the skirt was so flowy, it was perfect! It's a nice blush color. My only complaint was this fabric was impossible to keep wrinkle free in the garment bag it was delivered in. It was so outrageously wrinkled I almost didn't wear it. Do not recommend if you don't have your own steamer. I had to steam this in order for it to be wearable.
Tropical Wedding but this dress is deff seasonless

This dress fit beautifully. Be careful with the length though. I am 5'8" and had to wear 3" heels. Other than that, it was a perfect dress. I felt beautiful, formal, and comfortable all at the same time. I definitely recommend this dress!

links_reviews_title: Runs large and longer than expected
links_reviews_text: I'm not petite, 5'5, athletic size, I'm usually a size 2-4 so I ordered a S and XS. XS was still quiet long but it was the better fit. I ended up tying it in the back to dance, the top also runs large but cloth tape will do the trick. Lots of compliments nevertheless. One thing I wish I knew, the dress is very thin and flowy but also transparent-ish.

links_reviews_title: This dress was perfect for a formal wedding in the summer!
links_reviews_text: Absolutely loved this dress and would rent it again. It was a little long even with 3" heels, but not long enough that I was stepping on it.

links_reviews_title: Beautiful dress for an early summer wedding.
links_reviews_text: This dress is true to size but very long. I am almost 5‚Äô8‚Äù and wore 3 1/2 inch heels and the dress just brushed the ground. The material is nice and very comfortable, the bottom is very flowy. I got a lot of compliments on this dress. The upper back part of the dress is a bit see through, I wore a sticky bra.

links_reviews_title: Elegant wrap dress for formal affair
links_reviews_text: Gorgeous dress. Classic kimono sleeve. Fabric is heavyweight but looks light and flows nicely. The dress is long so if you're average height (I'm 5'4) you will need to wear heels or at least be mindful when you walk and hold the front up.
This dress was amazing. It was so comfortable and easy to wear. I received compliments all night from everyone at the wedding. Rent this dress, you will not be disappointed!

Loved the color (looked fab with Tory Burch pink tote), would have preferred a softer fabric, lined to knee and unlined in back but not revealing. I had to wear wedge sandals and it would have skimmed the ground at that, so I was limited where I could wear it. Fell open around legs when seated at bar, which wasn't an issue for me but might bother some (could be held, tucked, or pinned easily). Chose this picture because it best represents how the dress felt a little bit like I was wearing a robe...which happened to be super comfy but could feel frumpy to some, I suppose. Shorter sleeves made wearing at a meal possible.

links_reviews_title: If you're thinking about it, get it.
links_reviews_text: This dress was absolutely perfect, I didn't want to take it off. Day was hot, but this dress killed it. Super comfortable and light, while forgiving and gorgeous.

Felt like a goddess! Wore this to my birthday and couldn't stop twirling all night. This dress runs large at the top - but covers the tricky curves. It's a very beautiful pink color (doesn't photograph as easy)

Got so many compliments! So comfy and elegant, and that's hard to find! Definitely need dress tape to close the front, and if your 5'3 it drags the floor even with 4 inch Louboutins. Overall loved it!

I felt so pretty in this effortlessly flowy, feminine gown! I went with the XL because I like the way it flowed on the bottom better. I thought the L fit better through the waist and bust, but I didn't want to fight that slit all day at a breezy spring wedding. The XL was a better fit for me, I usually wear an 8/10 in dresses and gowns! Enjoy this lovely number!

links_reviews_title: Such a great dress. Rent it.
links_reviews_text: It was such a perfect color and length. I did have to use fabric tape for the deep v but it was a non issue. I wore it to a wine tasting dinner in Napa in the spring and it was perfect. I want to buy it! I'm 5'5 and wore with heels.

links_reviews_title: I rented this dress for our engagement photos. Needless to say it was absolutely perfect!
links_reviews_text: When I received the dress in the mail I was so excited! I immediately tried it on and it fit perfectly! The color of this dress is to die for! The fabric was very comfortable as well. Im about 5‚Äô7‚Äù 5‚Äô8‚Äù and I wore a one and a half inch heel with this dress and it was perfect! Felt so elegant in this dress! Highly recommend. I‚Äôm 5‚Äô7‚Äù 138 pounds and a 34d.

links_reviews_title: Pretty, Grecian-style maxi dress. Great for formal events, particularly good for bridesmaids.
links_reviews_text: I got this for a date but it's much more formal than that and sweeps the floor. Really pretty though! If I was going to something like a wedding this would be perfect.

This dress was perfect for a sweet garden wedding under the stars. Loved the color and flowy movement! A bit long so I wore a 4" heel to make sure it didn't drag. I felt beautiful in it and received many compliments :)

links_reviews_title: Perfect for an early spring outdoor Charleston wedding!
links_reviews_text: Fit was perfect. I am tall and the length was still great even with heels!
A stunning dress that fit perfectly!

I felt so beautiful in this dress and received many compliments. It easily transitioned from brunch to a show that night with a quick shoe change. Very flattering and forgiving. Super long so be careful. I am 5'7" and wore a stiletto boot and still had to gather the dress a few times to avoid tripping.

Dress has a deep V and high slit which would be good for parties. Typically would not be appropriate for work but since all meetings are via Zoom currently, it works. I typically wear 6R or 8R in dresses and the LR fit.

This skirt looked questionable when I tried it on alone but once I paired it with a bodysuit and knee high boots it looked fabulous. Great piece but needs that extra oomph and would've been too but if not for the fabric of my bodysuit underneath.
This fits true to size. I got compliments all night. Highly recommend
For was perfect with tight. May be too short without but since it's cooler now I haven't tried without.
So true to size. Classy yet sexy. My friends all died over this skirt and were convinced we all needed to buy it! I wore it with a simple black bodysuit and it was perfect and easy.

links_reviews_title: So cute, but impossible to wear!
links_reviews_text: As you can see in my pictures, it was beyond snug in the hips but just huge and spacious as it approached my waist. I loved it. The quality and look was amazing, but do not order if you are not the same size throughout the body.

This skirt is well made but short and thick. Made me look wider, let alone fitting a top under it. Almost didn't wear but it worked with a loose light top with the two-finger tuck. Not exactly my favorite rental.

So I think I could have gone a size down but this skirt was really amazing! While it was large for me wearing an 8, I would say this skirt runs small in general bc I am 4'11 and only somewhat curvy and not a true 8. So anyone with a curvier figure will need to size up and be aware the skirt can be really short. Will rent again!
The skirt itself is beautiful. Great sturdy material and great length. But while it fit my bum it was way to open in my waist - so much it didn't look well and I couldn't wear it
Cute skirt but way too big! I would recommending sizing down.

This skirt is well made and very cute, but it was too large. I am short (5'2") and I would have preferred this to fit on my true waist and hit mid-thigh. I would suggest sizing down if you're petite like me. Otherwise it'll hit you at a weird spot above the knee and possibly loose around the waist. I didn't wear it but will rent again in a smaller size. Perfect for fall.
too big!

links_reviews_title: it was a unformal date i wore the skirt with a black silk bandu and a jean jacket with pumps.
links_reviews_text: The material was very comfortable and had structure to it. It was so big that at certain points i would find the skirt to be completely discombobulated but it was my first time wearing anything from the site so now i know to get a size lower.
Large on the waist, but it made me look skinnier, so fine by me. Loved this skirt - details and fabric were unique and great for a 90s concert.

Loved the shape and material of this dress. It was a shiny black. It ran small. I usually wear and 10 and just barely squeezed in it. It's also on the shorter side if you're taller. Wore it for a night out and concert and it was perfect for the occasion
It's a nice skirt that sits on the hips, which I like. It is thicker material than I expected.
Fit well, great look for a night out!

links_reviews_title: I love the one pocket and it pairs well with everything!
links_reviews_text: A bit shorter than I expected, but loved the thick, stitched material. The fabric was also a bit shiny which I liked.
The waist was loose as other reviews stated and pretty short but looked cute with tights . Would consider renting again in a size down.

links_reviews_title: Design is gorgeous but fit is not
links_reviews_text: Pockets on side were unflattering and the waist of this skirt was really large, although it fit nice and fitted through the hips. Ended up not wearing this skirt bc it just wasn't flattering, especially with the thick fabric. A shame because it is adorable and I love the design.
