I love this skirt by Halston Heritage! Running true to size with no stretch, I recommend wearing your true size for your primary size and going a size up for your backup. This style is fitted throughout the midsection and a bit looser at the hips. I personally think that this skirt is versatile and can be used for many different outfits.
Skirt is flattering but the waist is huge but the hips are TTS.
WAY TOO SMALL AND WAY TOO SHORT. IF YOU'RE TALL THIS SKIRT WONT WORK FOR YOU!

links_reviews_title: Cute but a bit short for work
links_reviews_text: A little short for work wore w tights
I didn't wear-too tight in the hips

Neat fabric and a lot of artisanal touches, unfortunately the material is unforgiving and I felt too uncomfortable to wear it. Keep in mind that this is an architectural piece to be used as a statement, which is not evident in pictures. Not a funky corduroy skirt
Fit true to size, a bit on the short side if you have longer legs

links_reviews_title: Perfect skirt for a night out
links_reviews_text: Fit was great, material is unique but awesome. loved wearing this!!!
little big in the waist. I wore it high wasted and the pocket on the side made it stick out a bit
Loved the idea but it was stiff and totally straighten out my curvier bottom half in a bad way
Too small overall, I usually wear a 6/8 and the 10 barely fit, sent back without wearing. Otherwise very pretty and the material felt nice, but it was just way too small.

links_reviews_title: A black mini that's slightly different
links_reviews_text: Fit loosely and I could've gone down a size to 0. Looked great with high top sneakers and funkier sweatshirt for an edgier street chic look. Thicker fabric and the hidden side pocket on the right side of the skirt was a lovely discovery.
Love this skirt and will definitely be renting again. Very versatile and you can wear different tops to change shape of silhouette and style you want. PS it is on the shorter side but Love!

I wore this with a chunky knit sweater which i messily tucked in and some booties. It was very cute. Its an interesting almost quilted fabric. It didnt sit very well on my hips and it kept riding up throughout the day, so I had to constantly adjust and pull it down. But overall, it was cute for work.
The material feels oddly cheap and the buttons look cheap as well. The skirt runs really large and doesn't feel like there is much to it at all.

I wasnt sure how this would fit based on reviews, so I ordered up a size. It is pretty much straight up and down and in a structured, thick fabric, so I shouldve ordered my usual size. If youre curvy/ have hips this might not work or you might want to size up. I otherwise liked the skirt, though it's a mini and too short for any professional setting. I wore it with a turtleneck and tights and liked it, even though it kept turning because it was too big.

links_reviews_title: Wore the skirt out on a Friday night with knee-high boots and ugly Christmas sweater
links_reviews_text: Great material and a very trendy look; however, the waist of the skirt is way too large. I had to wear a baggy sweater to cover the 3" gap at the waist.

I gave this 4 stars instead of 5 because I sized up to a 2 based on the reviews and I wish I had ordered my normal size because the skirt was big. I ended up wearing it with tights anyway because I loved it so much! Will definitely rent again in my regular size! Note: It is quite short so definitely would recommend tights if wearing to work...

Great skirt! The color doesn't show well in the picture, but it is pitch black. It runs a little small. I ordered a 4, which is my regular size, but it was tighter fitting. If you want a little room or length, then order size up. Overall I really liked it

links_reviews_title: Super cute, loved the construction, but ran large
links_reviews_text: I did not end up wearing this. I was really excited about this skirt when I got it. The material is very thick and it was constructed well. But this ran SOOO large. I tried it on and it was probably 2 sizes too big. I may order again in a smaller size hoping for a better fit because I still think it's super cute.

Got lots of compliments on this skirt. It was a little small -- mostly noticeable because of the slickness of the fabric, which made the skirt ride up a bit. Paired with a black fitted turtleneck, black tights and knee high boots. Would definitely rent again.

Super thin piece of fabric, no lining. Ran big on top for me and made my hips look huge (I generally think I'm on the smaller side with a bit more of an athletic build - I have a bum). Fabric shows every stitch and hugs in all the wrong places. Did not wear.

I bought this for a formal event but did not wear it because the material was very thin. The back was supposed to drape down but it did not lay properly so it looked weird and awkward. The material is also not very forgiving. I wanted to like this dress.
I was super disappointed with this dress. the construction was awful, and the material was VERY thin throughout. It fit right around my hips, and was super loose in my waist.

links_reviews_title: This dress arrived just in time!
links_reviews_text: I did not get to wear this for the occasion because I rented something that I felt was better but this is still a lovely dress. It is very light weight and simple but still has a wow factor.
I am 5'8" and the length was perfect.

links_reviews_title: A dress you can dress up or down
links_reviews_text: I wore this adorable dress for my bridal shower with a jean jacket. This is one of my favorite rentals to date. There is no support in the bra area and wearing a strapless bra isn't really possible which makes it better for small chested females. The straps did dig into my shoulders a bit when sitting but didn't bother me when standing. I almost bought this dress because the fit was so perfect and I could see myself wearing this again.

I searched high and low for something to wear to my bridal shower and ended up renting this dress at the last minute. It's a beautiful, well-made dress. I'm larger on the bottom than the top, so while the Large fit on top, I needed the XL for my bottom half, which lead to the top being a little loose, but I was able to tie back the halter with a piece of string, and then it fit well. Got lots of compliments and felt comfortable for the whole day. So glad I found this one.

Loved this dress. Felt nice and heavy. Took away a star because the top bust area fit strangely‚Äîseemed to sag down a little exposing more than I would have liked. Maybe the straps were stretched out?
I loved this, it was a bit too much cleavage so I wore a denim over it but truly loved it, like a frilly frock!

I wore this to my rehearsal dinner and was so comfortable! I say that it runs large because I'm typically a size small, but even the XS has a little more room in the waist than I prefer. Regardless, I'd wear it again for sure!
The dress fit well below the chest but was to big to stay in one spot all night. I was afraid I would be showing to much if I wore it

This dress did not disappoint! Too many compliments, where did they stop?! I'm 5'0 even 110 pounds and it was made to fit my curves. Classy chic and high end quality. Paired with hat to add flare to easy flow ruffle trim. The entire process from start to finish was "simple" like we need additional complicated processes in our busy lives. Thank you and I rented another dress for an upcoming event, super excited for another great review!

This is a nice dress with a great shape, etc. However if you have a C cup or larger and/or gravity has started to take its toll on your chest, this dress just doesn't work as there isn't really any support. Earlier in my life perhaps!

links_reviews_title: Wore this for my wedding afterparty!
links_reviews_text: Great dress, beautiful details and fun fabric. Lots of compliments and easy to move around. Thin Straps dig in a bit but not enough to not rent this
What a beautiful dress! Not made for big natural breast. Stunning dress -quality material.

links_reviews_title: Great fit.. a little big in the bra area- but I am small to. Very comfortable and flattering on me.
links_reviews_text: Long and straight. Probably better for a taller person (I am 5'11).

I initially was worried that the dress was too small, but once I got myself in place and the dress was zipped, it felt pretty TTS. The lace is heavy, very similar to lace I've encountered in vintage dresses. No bra was necessary or really possible, in my opinion. Wore it to jazz night in a local hot spot and received many compliments, particularly of note is the back of the dress that reveals a strong back beautifully. Gorgeous and memorable garment.

The fit was great with the exception of the straps. I have a larger bust and at the end of a night of dancing and moving around, the straps almost felt like they had loosened, so I had to watch how I sat as not to flash anyone. Overall, would wear this dress again, but probably not to an event where I am doing alot of dancing, and maybe wouldn't advise for someone with a bust over B cup.

I love this dress! I wear between a 6-8. The MR was slightly loose but in a comfortable for big dinner way, not too big to wear. The one drawback: I saw some girls with larger chests had an issue with the top. I would agree in the reverse. I'm a small b cup. While I loved the low cut, I was constantly pulling up the straps when sitting to make sure I wasn't exposing boobs because the top was a little loose! Standing up straight, it was no issue.
Perfect for dinner in Charleston!! Loved it!
The lace and embroidery on this is gorgeous!! Really nice material, on the heavier side. I loved it! Wore to my bridal shower and also with a jacket and scarf to the office
Fit was true to size but not for women with natural breasts (pulled terribly on the straps and was unflattering in the chest). Would be lovely on a perky girl!

I didn't end up wearing this to my bridal shower both the small and extra small fit like a triangle swim suit with less support on the sides. I had side boob everywhere. When I bent over you could see everything. I tried all kinds of tape and inserts and pasty bras nothing worked.
Wore this for my bridal shower and it was perfect! I got so many compliments and I really debated buying this dress.

Pretty dress but extremely low. Rented it for a beach vacation and had to tie the straps together to make it a halter so it didn't fall down. The straps also feel too thin for the weight of the dress. Wouldn't rent again.
I wore this dress for thanksgiving dinner while on vacation - so I will say it was comfortable/breathable. The material is a little itchy, but not a big deal. Gorgeous dress! Would rent again

beautiful details on the fabric, fit like a glove except the cleavage area way to long so it seats funny on the breast area, so i had to adjust the straps a bit and was still a little large for me. Otherwise, it look great. my husband loved it :-)

Although I didn't get a chance to wear this dress I tried it on and liked it. It's cute and a change from your ordinary summer dress. It was a little longer than expected - the lowest end of the dress hit mid-calf.

This dress is so amazing, however, I wouldn't recommend it for girls on the bustier size. The straps do not tighten so I was hanging out a little too much. There is also a lot of side boob, which I am not against(!), I just didn't think I should show so much off at my bridal shower The rest of the dress is amazing!

links_reviews_title: If you have a chest, dont rent.
links_reviews_text: Gorgeous fabric but massive side boob and sizing up would get rid of the fitted look

Very cute dress, but I couldn‚Äôt actually wear it for my event. There is zero support in the chest area so unless it fits you there perfectly, you may feel very exposed and uncomfortable. Would‚Äôve loved this with adjustable straps.

Rented this for my wedding, just in case we went out afterward and I wouldn't want to wear my wedding dress to the club/bar. We didn't end up going out so I never wore it - but it is LOVELY. Definitely rent.

The bottom was so long and lots of fabric. The top was huge and I didn't fill it out. But it hugged me on my hips so I don't think I could have sizes down. Definitely lots of fabric that didn't feel breathable so I wouldn't have worn this to my event if it had fit me well.
Beautiful dress! Wore it for my bridal shower and received so many complications.

links_reviews_title: Very Pretty but very loose up top
links_reviews_text: This dress is beautiful and when I first put it on I loved how it felt and how I looked in it but then I sat down... the top portion is VERY large and it kept falling down, I had to use a clip on the back of it to keep it from not completely exposing me. It is a great dress but I wouldn't wear it again for fear of a wardrobe malfunction. It definitely runs big.

links_reviews_title: Beautiful!!! I might buy this one!
links_reviews_text: Sexy but not revealing. Gorgeous material, fully lined in like a mauve satin. Perfect eyelet lace

links_reviews_title: Perfect sexy but sweet party dress
links_reviews_text: This dress is fantastic. Great quality, design, fit, etc. Hugs all the right places and I would think so for any body type.

links_reviews_title: white on the water always works
links_reviews_text: absolutely adorable fit. fantastic dress. the bust was a bit large on me. not sure if the small would have fit better or been too small.

links_reviews_title: Very loose bust but great looking dress
links_reviews_text: I like the fit of the large on the body but the bust was enormous and hung down really low. I tried to rock it as a plunging deep V but it was obvious that the dress just didn't fit me. Perhaps a medium would've fit better.

links_reviews_title: Need perfect boobs for this dress
links_reviews_text: Super cute and playful, but the triangle top is super hard to pull off. Might work for an augmented chest! Not my naturally small and droopy bitties!

links_reviews_title: Loved it! This dress was perfect for dancing in!
links_reviews_text: Beautiful detail and was comfortable to wear! I don‚Äôt have perky tatas anymore so I wish the bust area had a little more support but I made it work..still kept everything in while dancing the night away
This dress was beautiful in person. It fit perfectly, and I received many compliments.

links_reviews_title: It was my boyfriend's daughter's graduation and dress to impress for sure.
links_reviews_text: Very flattering and sexy and crisp

This dress is gorgeous, however, runs very large. I was able to still wear the Small (my normal size) but the XS would have looked much better. You can tell the quality and workmanship put into this gorgeous dress.
too big
Loved this dress! A little tight in the chest but true to size otherwise.
I am glad I had my swimsuit on under this as it ran large and I would have been worried about wardrobe malfunction. It was beautiful though.

links_reviews_title: Gorgeous colors and amazing, corseted fit!
links_reviews_text: I rented this originally thinking it might be appropriate for a wedding. It was a bit casual for that since the material is cotton/gauzy so I wore it to my job's charity day and nearby Mexican-restaurant/bar happy hour afterward. It was a huge hit! I got tons of compliments. Would definitely rent again!

links_reviews_title: ADORBS...but go up in size if you're curvy
links_reviews_text: I've never worn a 2XL in anything but I'm very much in tune with my body and am aware that not many things are designed with curvy girls in mind. This dress has no stretch and has a lining. Over my lifetime of shopping and having this same body shape (no matter what my weight) I know what that means...go up in size and I still may not be able to get it over my hips. The dress angels were working in my favor with this one...got over my hips and wasn't too large at the top (which is generally the case). If you're straight up and down you may be able to get this dress in your normal dress size.
Loved the colors, a little tight for sizing around the bust, but other than that it fit perfectly.
True to size, nice dress. Liked it but didn't love it for me

links_reviews_title: This dress reminded me of Beyonc√© dress in her lemonade music video
links_reviews_text: While I am no Beyonc√©, this dress will make you feel like her. If you have a very wide back and are into between sizes in certain pieces you might want to size up! But otherwise everything else for perfectly. The materiel is a little thick so I wouldn't personally wear it on a super hot hot day.

links_reviews_title: Perfect for stepping out and finding something to get into...
links_reviews_text: #day2night
I wore this to a birthday party and I received a lot of compliments. It was crazy comfortable and I liked that there were multiple ways to wear it.

This dress is gorgeous! I sized up even though I definitely didn't need to. This dress runs a little large- especially if you're smaller in the chest area like I am. I had to belt the waist in order to keep it up! But overall I felt very cute while wearing it & got a lot of compliments! Perfect for a summer party!

links_reviews_title: Got a TON of compliments! It was fun and flirty!
links_reviews_text: Fit as expected.

I rented this to wear to an event and unfortunately, it didn't work for me. It just wasn't as posh as what I needed for my event. It's a cute dress tho- great cut and summery colors. Fit true to size.

links_reviews_title: Night out in the town in Mexico
links_reviews_text: The colors are gorgeous!!! It was a little small in the bust, so I ended up not wearing a bra, dress fit like a glove. I paired with white sandals a circle purse.

links_reviews_title: Super fun dress for vacation! Bright colors and statement piece.
links_reviews_text: Flattering for an hourglass shape. Didn't have to wear a bra and felt secure all night.

Absolutely loved the feel and style of this dress. So comfortable! Was a hit for my Mother's Day brunch. A little big in the chest, but still stayed up well with the lining. Will definitely rent again.

Cute sundress! Love the colors. Can dress it up or down. The zipper did stick. Also, the corsett had sharp edges that kept sticking in my midsection. It was very uncomfortable. Big downside to this dress. Otherwise, I love it.

links_reviews_title: I enjoyed the dress and received lots of compliments.
links_reviews_text: It fit well. Of course I was in between the 10 and 12 due to my bust size. Lots of compliments.

links_reviews_title: Fun colorful resort-wear for aquarium event. Adj tie at bust.
links_reviews_text: Fun colorful resort-wear for aquarium event. Adj tie at bust. Fitted waist then roomy at hips etc. Many compliments & looked classy (was worried too circus tent printed but everyone liked it). Nice length at 5'2".
I love everything about this dress....the colors, design and fit are fun! I received numerous compliments throughout the day. Very comfortable.
The fit was a bit tight on the rib cage, but absolutely worth it! I loved the colors and ruffles. It was absolutely perfect for my trip to Cartagena.

links_reviews_title: great vacation dress. Lot of compliments
links_reviews_text: colorful, and fun dress.
Beautiful dress, but there is no stretch at all and I couldn't zip it over my ribs. Should have ordered a small and not extra small. Extra small is for teeny tiny women, not just petite.

links_reviews_title: So small I couldn't zip it
links_reviews_text: I am always a size four on top. This runs about a two. Couldn't even wear it.
The fit was as described. The top was loose because I'm small chested, but the boning held me up. I probably could have sized down for a tighter less easy breezy fit. But this was perfect for vacay!

links_reviews_title: Didn't wear this dress -- didn't fit at all
links_reviews_text: This is a medium and I'm squarely a 6 - couldn't even begin to zip it up past the waist. Too bad because the fabric was really cute for summer.

links_reviews_title: So cute but so tiny in the rib cage and bust I could not wear. :(
links_reviews_text: Adorable easy dress for hot summer date nights. I am a size 4 , 5'10 130lbs and could not get it zipped! I definitely would size up. I am normally a small or size 4 and should have gotten a Medium.

links_reviews_title: Rented this for a trip to Bermuda but didn't end up wearing, as it was too small.
links_reviews_text: Fun and festive dress but ran a little small on the top. Would be so cute for a tropical vacation or cinco de Mayo themed party!

links_reviews_title: Very cute summer dress for dinner
links_reviews_text: Super cute but the "boning" in the dress was very uncomfortable and coming out.

links_reviews_title: I felt like Laura Ingalls from Little House on the Prairie in this dress.
links_reviews_text: Not comfortable. Felt like I was wearing a tent.
Stunning dress for vacation! Lightweight cotton made it easy to wear in Mexico. Very flattering shape, would rent again
I LOVED wearing this dress. It is very flattering, but make sure to size up as it runs a little small!
Great fit- stayed up the whole night- lightweight.

links_reviews_title: Fantastic, unique colors for casual day wear or dressed-up for a night out
links_reviews_text: I adore this dress which is fitted but flares a bit in the bodice. The colors are great, unlike anything else I've ever seen. Super soft fabric, casual + dressy options. Am considering purchasing.

I love the colors and details of this dress, and how lightweight the fabric is. This is perfect for a summertime wedding, a date, or for everyday. As a size 18/20 with a big bust, this barely went over my chest and definitely didn't make it past my hips. Bummed!
Cute option; couldn't wear it.

links_reviews_title: Extremely small ribcage and bust area
links_reviews_text: Normally wear a size 6; but couldn't get this dress to zip up unfortunately. Runs very tight in the bust n ribcage area. I recommend sizing up. Quality is decent. Love the colors. The bust area is constructed, so no bra necessary if you're B cup or smaller.

So cute for my annual birthday trip to Disney!! Totally renting it again for a future trip :) It was a little tight in the bust, so I had to forego a bra. I wore the jacket the whole time so it didn't matter that much.
Love the polka dots the pockets and the girly cut of this romper. However, the top is cut very small and the length is a bit short in back. This probably works best on a more petite girl.
Great fit and so many compliments

links_reviews_title: Wore this on a tour of the Biltmore in Asheville.
links_reviews_text: Very very cute. Comfortable and a perfect fit. Flattering on full chested women. Material is thick enough that you don't have to wear a bra. Lots of compliments.

This is the second romper I have ordered from this brand. In the multitude of colors this is perfect for nights out and vacation. Didn't wear with a bra and felt secure. Fitted in the waist very flattering. Would rent again!
So cute! Tight on top but good for a or b cup in size 2
Rented this for a bachelorette party. It fit great and I received a lot of compliments. Also didn't feel like I needed to wear a bra with it and still felt supported

links_reviews_title: I had so much fun wearing this!
links_reviews_text: criss-cross straps are adorable.
This piece was a head turner. It's a timber and flowed. It also has pockets. Cute for the beach.

links_reviews_title: Super cute and fun to wear!
links_reviews_text: It did run tight in the chest. I‚Äôm a 32D and it was a struggle to zip up.

links_reviews_title: I wore this to ComicCon for a vintage look and I loved it!
links_reviews_text: This was so cute and very flattering! I got several compliments...even among all the amazing costumes at ComicCon. It's a little short in the rise, but nothing I couldn't live with.
We live downtown and in summer I need easy to wear, flattering outfits - this one fit the bill perfectly!

So far I've received the most compliments with this romper. The color stands out in any room and the fit is perfect. I am always afraid of RTR pieces being loose but this was great on my frame. But for my ladies with a big behind may be a little too short!
Very flattering and for perfect.
Adorable, room for a tummy (like have). Might be tight if you have a larger bust

Loved the color of this romper. The straps were a little long on the 2 but the 2 was more comfortable on the midsection area. Recommend sizing up. I used pins in the back to hold the straps up tighter. Really liked how comfortable it was.

links_reviews_title: Modern polka dots in my signature color!
links_reviews_text: Fits amazing! So comfortable! Great cut with how the straps are designed and the flared shorts, just a cool fun piece. Im a 12/14 and the 14 fit perfectly! You don't need to wear a bra which is a plus! Love finding pieces that are cool and chic without being fussy!
Wore for cinco de Mayo with a fun headpiece - so cute! Fits true to size unless you have boobs - would run small in that case. Love the pockets!

links_reviews_title: Adorable almost sundress-like w/pockets. Size up if bigger than B cup.
links_reviews_text: Many compliments. Wore sticky Nubra. I think 0 would be too tight for me so glad sized up to 2. Bust small so size up if more than B cup or u may fall out. Straps were a little long on me (5'2") & not adjustable so safety pinned behind my neck & worked perfectly. Very comfortable & easy in & out for restroom. I added a belt & wore it both w/ wedges out & sandals at daughters activities. Also used a white blazer at a casual meeting. Comfortable light and lined fabric.

links_reviews_title: Perfect for the car show at Viva Las Vegas Rockabilly Weekend!
links_reviews_text: I loved wearing this romper, it is so cute! I paired it with a belt to define the waist. The bottom half is very forgiving, which made it easy to wear since I'm packing some hips! 10/10 would rent again.
So cute and fun. It fit great. I wore a band bra underneath, but a normal strapless will work too. It's a little short. Light weight for hot days. I wish I could keep this one!
Tight if you have longer torso

I was so excited about this because of the rave reviews but it just didn't work for me. I have a high waist and an hourglass figure and while it technically fit everywhere (bust, strap length), it just wasn't flattering. The pattern and color are really cute too but combined with the exaggerated hourglass shape it gave me I looked cartoonish and silly. Didn't wear it.

links_reviews_title: Vacation trip. I felt so beautiful with this outfit. I also knew no one else had this outfit on.
links_reviews_text: I loved this outfit. I got a lot of compliments.
This fun romper is everything! For a tall person the inseam to shoulder ratio was a bit tight but the overall outfit was a slamdunk! Very sexy on a larger chested woman.

Waist and chest run small; I needed help zipping it up because it was so tight. Recommend sizing up. Once on, it was cute and reasonably comfortable. I got compliments from strangers at the concert I wore it to.

links_reviews_title: Ran really large, didn't wear it
links_reviews_text: unfortunately ran way too big

links_reviews_title: I wanted so bad to love this!
links_reviews_text: This romper is so adorable....on the hanger. I felt much like Nacho Libre because when I tried this on, it went right up my cheeks! I am latin, I do have a big bottom....but it's not Nicki Minaj or Kardashian-sized. Unfortunately I was not able to wear this out or at all. But man it is freaking adorable!!!!!

Thus jumper ran very small. I had a hard time getting it over my shoulders. I got creative and kind of crawled through the straps. I finally got it on and it was but very high in the crutch area and would not zip up in the busy area. The material was nice as was the color of the jumper but the cut just wasn't right for me.

links_reviews_title: Did not get to wear it
links_reviews_text: It's so cute and a perfect fabric! If you have big hips, the large thigh opening helps balance everything out. Unfortunately, I didn't get to wear this as it just doesn't fit. I ordered a size 16 (I'm a 16/18) and I could barely get the shoulder straps over my shoulders.
Fit really well, awesome for thicker legged ladies like me. The straps and shape of the bust was really flattering as well.
bust area was to SMALL
It's fit everywhere perfectly. Loose on the bottom which looked great because the waist and top are a tighter fit.
Cute romper but I am curvy and it made my butt just look way huge!
Did not fit my shoulders, fit everywhere else.
Wanted to try something different. Wasn't a go. Very roomie in the front of the shorts.
Edged it up with a asymmetrical jean jacket and white sneakers. So many compliments. Fit great. Super comfortable and great quality!

links_reviews_title: It's cute but I didn't end up wearing it
links_reviews_text: The romper arrived with tags still on. I did try it on but I did not like the fit so I ended up not wearing it.
True to size and very comfortable to wear in hot weather.
Loved this dress. Fit well around the waist but was a bit loose on the bust. My 38DD didn't fill the dress out so the back ended up being a bit loose. Otherwise looked great!
This dress is fabulous! Fits true to size and is a sophisticated cut. The fabric is light weight and great for warm climates.
The material, fit, and sweetheart neckline all made for a super cute and flattering fit. I wore this like 5 times for the 2 weeks I rented it - will definitely be renting again!
I'm glad I read the reviews and sized down! This dress is so flattering and very comfortable!

This was a nice, cute and comfortable dress - I wore to work with a long cardigan over top. Only not-appropriate for work considerations: 1. The straps were a little loose so probably would have pinned to wear again; 2. The buttons are "faux" down the front ... EXCEPT for the last section at the bottom of the skirt, which caused an unexpected gap while I was seated. Didn't realize until I got in the car to drive to work so then was careful while seated at my desk. Otherwise, it was a nice appropriate midi length and not too tight.
Very light, cute design, it was a little big on me bc I'm a little shortie. The straps were a bit long.

This dress fits so perfectly. It's a little boobylicious for work which I though was better without a bra but honestly still too much boob. With a bra? Va-va-voom! I love that the buttons are actually false buttons (no awkward gaping). It fits nice and snug but with a slight bit of stretch so it's still super comfy. Loved.
I am obsessed with spaghetti strap dresses and Ts underneath. I wore this without a T-shirt, and it was way too revealing. But overall really cute
Very cute. The pattern is great. It fit a little big and stretched over the day... but under the buttons the opening is seen shut which I liked for a summer work dress!

I rented this for either a wedding shower or outdoor housewarming party. It's a great dress! It's a thicker lineny material so it was a little more casual than I expected. Perfect for a summer day time event with the buttons up the front. I felt it ran a little large I'm usually between 8&10 and the 8 the straps and bust were a little loose. Very flattering overall and comfortable!

links_reviews_title: Super cute but extra tummy fabric
links_reviews_text: This dress is super cute and comfortable. The fabric is great for movement and sitting. I wore it to a play and then to dinner. It is very sturdy, but the stomach does have some extra fabric and made me look like I had a pooch belly, but it was OK because I was sitting down most of the time. Wear a push-up bra if you are small chested!
The top runs a little large, straps falling down. If I owned it I would take in the top and straps. Very comfortable, flattering. Despite the sizing issue, I really liked!
This piece is well made, cut beautifully, and features a fun and playful print! Perfect for work or date night, this piece was one I'll definitely rent again!

links_reviews_title: Flattering fabric and style--but maybe not for larger chests
links_reviews_text: I was surprised by how much I liked this dress. I'm 6'0" and this was a great length on me. The chest might be a tricky fit for some. It works best without a bra for me.

Beautiful, summery dress that I wore to my best friend's wedding shower. Made from comfortable material that has a bit of stretch. I am a 34C and the size 2 fit perfect in the chest. Although being 5'2 this was a bit long on me.
I was really looking forward to this dress but it was way too big under the arms and too tight across the chest. I wasn't able to wear it.

links_reviews_title: Lovely dress, perfect for big busted women!
links_reviews_text: Loved this dress and the fit. Except I wish I had enough boobs to fill out the bust area. That said, I wore it at night and danced a bit without any wardrobe malfunction :-)

links_reviews_title: Husband begged me to buy this!
links_reviews_text: Cute dress lovely length and really gives a nice shape to your body.

links_reviews_title: This was such a flattering fit and great for everyday wear.
links_reviews_text: This was extremely comfortable and flattering, and I received a ton of compliments. It could easily be dressed up or down. I would have kept it, but $198 felt expensive for the material.
I really liked this dress, except it gapped under the arms. I couldn't wear a bra with it because it would have shown in the back. Would be just fine for ladies with a slightly bigger chest.

links_reviews_title: I ended up not wearing it because of the fit
links_reviews_text: The quality of fabric is okay
I ordered a 14 based on the reviews. This dress was huge. Wanted to wear this so Bad for my birthday dinner but didn't work out.

Husband loved the dress. It has a zipper so the front buttons are non functioning which is great for us busty gals. Wore a strapless bra but if your girls sit high you should be good to go without one. I'm long waisted so the length of the straps was perfect for me.
Kind of boxy fit. Didn't end of wearing it.

links_reviews_title: Lovely for walking around on a warm day!
links_reviews_text: This hit me at a really flattering spot (mid-calf) but was a little loose in the bust - I had some extra gapping around the armpits, but nothing too noticeable. Otherwise it was very cute and comfortable. A bit more structured than I had expected; I was thinking it would be closer to a shift dress. However, I really did like it!

links_reviews_title: Was not able to wear it, runs small.
links_reviews_text: It runs small.
I'm between an 8 and 10 and ordered a 10, which was a mistake. Straps are not adjustable so if you're smaller chested, sizing down would be better. Cute dress though!
This was a beautiful dress and the nicest fit ever! Tight but comfortable. It made me look so slim and tall! Loved it!

links_reviews_title: I got this to wear to my cousin's wedding
links_reviews_text: This was much too big in the bust, I couldn't wear it. It was gaping all around the top. Shame, because the print is so beautiful and the material was really nice.
Pretty dress but big in the chest. I'm 5'3" and a 34C and the top was unflatteringly loose on me.

links_reviews_title: Big in the boob area. Nice dress
links_reviews_text: Nice dress
Very cute but I am pear shaped and I could have used one size up. Size up on this cutie!
Didn't wear it

Nice dress for evening with heels or daytime with sandals. No stretch to the linen-like material but really well tailored for a flattering fit. 5'6" 34C 145 lbs, usually wear a 6 and the 6 fit perfectly. Could even wear without a bra.
Runs a tad large I would size down. I'm usually a 2 and wish I would have had the 0 it just didn't look right and was really big in the hips and waist.
Unfortunately, this dress runs small so I did not get to wear it. Otherwise, this is a lovely high quality dress. I recommend ordering up a size.

Wore this for a date night with heels and a day-time, outdoor birthday party with flats-worked great for both. Versatile and comfortable dress. The only downside (and main reason I gave this 4 instead of 5 stars) was the straps are long and non-adjustable so they kept slipping. Not a deal breaker; it's a great dress.

If this was a skirt, it would have been amazing. The fabric is beautiful with just a hint of stretch. The top of the dress is cut very strangely, though, and has a princess seam that absolutely didn't work for a large bust. It was weirdly too lose and too tight on top. Returned without wearing.
Very cute pattern and loved the length. It was a tiny bit big overall so I wore a belt with it

links_reviews_title: This dress was perfect. I have a slight belly from having a kid and I didn't have to wear shapewear
Beautiful dress, fit perfectly, received many compliments.
links_reviews_text: This was my first experience with rent the runway and it did not disappoint. The dress was beautiful, it fit me well, and was a great choice for the event (masquerade ball gala). After reading the reviews, I chose two sizes and went with the smaller one because I am smaller busted. The dress gave me no issues. I also loved the front slit. Not too revealing, yet sexy. Also want to mention that while others had an issue with the shimmers shedding, I did not. I would highly recommend this dress.

I want to buy this dress! I could have worn the 8 fine but the opening was a little too much with my shape. The 10 was great, but a little too loose on the top so I would definitely recommend fashion tape. It was extremely comfortable and I received compliments all night.

I picked this dress as a NYE back-up, but I loved it so much that I decided to wear it! Not the type of dress I would normally choose, with the plunging neckline & front slit, but it was so comfortable, and very flattering. Highly recommend!

links_reviews_title: This dress was great for NYE, has a little sparkle so it was perfect! Got a lot of compliments!
links_reviews_text: If you have big boobs, beware. This dress was great but was a little self conscious about my boobs falling out the whole night lol

I wore this to a formal Christmas party. It was comfortable and flattering. No bra needed bc there's padding. The dress also stretches so I ordered a size smaller and it fit perfectly. Not tight at all. Received compliments.

I love this dress. I wore a size smaller than normal because I did not want the maxi dress look for a winter holiday party. It worked out perfectly. The only issue I had was that the glitter came off everywhere. I had to apologize to everyone who hugged me because they left covered in glitter. Other than that, it was comfortable and stayed in place all night.

links_reviews_title: Gorgeous dress, very low cut bust
links_reviews_text: Absolutely loved this dress. Definitely shows the girls off though!

links_reviews_title: Dress fit great - flattering but comfortable, just the right amount of sparkle!
links_reviews_text: Wasn't too long, wore a low heel...dress flows nicely behind while walking I have a short torso and the straps were a little long for me so just pinned them down inside the dress Fit was a flowy style, not structured, great for dancing! Did wear a sticky bra underneath to help secure everything in!
Liked it but didn't love it, maybe a size down would have looked better.

links_reviews_title: I got compliments on the dress from strangers in the bathroom - always a good review!
links_reviews_text: I usually try on a 4 as a starting point, and if anything need to size up to a 6 or even 8 on occasion. Based on that, I was quite surprised that the 4R in this dress felt way too big on me. I wore two-inch heels with it and the hem still hit the floor (which I didn't want - I would've preferred a little more clearance, especially since I wore this dress to an event on a snowy night), and the v-neck came much lower down than I expected based on the picture. I had to use fashion tape to hold the dress in place. It's a beautiful gown, but I think I would have felt much more comfortable in a 2R.

links_reviews_title: Gorgeous, but not for anyone with boobs!
links_reviews_text: This gown is beautiful but definitely better for small chested women. There is zero support in the bust so if you need any this isn't for you :) I didn't wear it but did think it was a beautiful dress--just a little more slinky and not right for my body type.

links_reviews_title: So many compliments with this beautiful gown for a company holiday party
links_reviews_text: This dress definitely ran large for me. I'm 5'5" and 121 lbs with 32 bust, 27 waist, 37 hips. I'm usually a size 4 in dresses but I got a size 2 and it was an inch too big all around. Luckily it still draped nicely and I was able to pin the straps in the back a bit to bring the very low v-neck plunge up to an acceptable length. The slit in actually in front, though in the picture it looks on the side. It is sexy but still flattering. The glitter.....GETS EVERYWHERE. Be prepared. I had it stuck on my chest, in my arm pit, on other people very time I hugged someone. That was the only big problem with this dress. Other than that, it's lovely.

links_reviews_title: The dress sheds little black sparkles nonstop. They end up everywhere and stick to your skin.
links_reviews_text: The dress was beautiful though and fits correctly!

links_reviews_title: Super flattering, fits like a glove!
links_reviews_text: Fit like a glove, but went with another dress because the event was more formal. Will definitely rent for a less formal event in the future!

links_reviews_title: So easy to rent and return
links_reviews_text: Fit perfect! Very comfortable... hid the flaws

Fitted around my bust and hugged me at my waist to make the fit and flare dramatic! Plenty of room to eat and still feel fabulous at the end of the night! Trying to buy it online because I loved it so much.

links_reviews_title: Got so many compliments! Very flattering.. With pockets!
links_reviews_text: This dress was a perfect fit! It was a thicker material with some stretch. I felt comfy all evening at the formal event I attended.

I loved this dress so much I went online and bought it. I have gained weight recently (due to life's stress) and haven't felt good about clothes. This dress hid my new body issues. The fabric is stretchy and soft. Plus who doesn't like pockets in their dress? This dress was perfect for me.
Perfect fit, comfortable, well made, skirt is voluminous , but the fitted mid section makes it look perfect
Super cute and classy. I really like how it fanned out- great quality. Loved wearing it!
Really loved the upper half of the dress - cute neckline and goes in at waist. The skirt was too voluminous for me. Like skirts a-line but way too much fabric.

Formal enough to wear to work and then wear out to dinner and a show after. Great for people who might be worried about their middles (like me) this dress is made from a thick fabric and covers everything. Think it would flatter every shape. The large runs a little big in the back but aside from that it's a great fit.
This dress is great! It's comfortable, flattering, and has pockets. How can you say no?

Wore this to multiple client meetings. Material is thick enough that it looks professional (and I didnt have to wear a bra) but the cut is flattering. Threw on jewelry to take it to drinks after work. Gorgeous cut and can be transformed into so many looks based in accessories. Definitely going to buy this one!
It was a very flattering dress.
I have a petite frame so this actually gaped a little at the neck for me, super stretchy so I could have done an xs (hips are free). POCKETS!

links_reviews_title: Cute and stylish, but so comfortable to wear!
links_reviews_text: Bust is a bit small, but overall lovely fit.

links_reviews_title: the fit was perfect. Has great stretch to it so it's comfy
links_reviews_text: loooooved it! Fit perfectly; only returned to try new items out :) otherwise I would have kept it longer!

links_reviews_title: Ran too big for me to where I was swimming in it I recommend a size down if it's possible
links_reviews_text: Runs very big in size.

links_reviews_title: this dress was so cute and comfortable it made the night effortless!
links_reviews_text: Fits true to size, super comfy!

links_reviews_title: I wore this for a charity benefit where I was volunteering.
links_reviews_text: This dress is very comfortable. It has the right amount of stretch but is also thick enough to hide some bumps. The pockets were also a nice touch. This dress could be dressed up with jewelry or dressed down for a fun night out with friends.
Audrey Hepburn style embodied. Absolutely lovely and it has pockets.

links_reviews_title: Lots of compliments. Loved feel and pocket.
links_reviews_text: Very classy. Neckline a little loose. Will rent again

links_reviews_title: I loved this dress, I wanted to keep it!
links_reviews_text: This dress I'd very comfortable and the material is very nice. I wore this for my baby's Baptism and received many compliments. I needed a dress that would hide my post pregnancy belly and it did! I felt beautiful in it and I wanted to keep it. This dress is perfect for any occasion.

links_reviews_title: It was very comfortable and I was told extremely flattering. Gave a great figure line
links_reviews_text: The fit was perfect

links_reviews_title: Great LBD that can easily be dressed up with the right shoes and jewelry.
links_reviews_text: Fit and flare with pockets so no need to have to carry a purse if you don't want to. The fit is spot-on and true to size.
Loved this dress. Pockets were perfect.
And pockets! I was so great to have pockets! I didn't have to carry a purse!
prefect fit and flare fit. I'm normally a large but I went off the recommendations for a medium and I was very happy. I felt very classy and fun!
First off, who doesn't love wearing a Kate Spade! I wore this to a holiday party, the office and Christmas Eve church. It was easy to style, good quality and slimming!

links_reviews_title: Made me feel like a million bucks!
links_reviews_text: Such a fun and easy dress to wear. Does everything you'd want from a little black dress. You can accessorize in so many ways. Would definitely rent this again!
Fit perfectly! I'm a size 14 so the XL was a great size. Stretchy material. Fit very flattering for my body type. Great length! Very happy with this dress overall

links_reviews_title: The company event was classy and elegant, so this dress was a perfect touch.
links_reviews_text: The large had a bit of extra room in the bust, so I went with the medium. It was a perfect fit! And the pockets are an added bonus!
Perfect dress to go from a work function to my anniversary dinner.
This dress was ideal for work and also for a funeral I attended. Great fit and flare style.

links_reviews_title: Classic black dress with a fun skirt - love!
links_reviews_text: Love this dress, good quality fabric, love the exposed zipper. It's fun while also professional and perfect for work.
Cut of the dress is flattering and thick cotton fabric makes it easy to wear.

links_reviews_title: Best dress I have ever rented! Comfortable, flattering, and POCKETS. What more could you want?!
links_reviews_text: True to size, but thick fabric hides lumps and bumps when you are headed to age 50. Flared skirt is super fun and flattering. Pockets are the best.

links_reviews_title: Great dress! I'd love to own it
links_reviews_text: Loved the length, pockets, and figure flattering shape. Danced all night. Classic dress!

links_reviews_title: LOVED this dress - so many compliments! Gave my athletic body an hourglass! AND adore the pockets!
links_reviews_text: I am a size 6 - there was no S available for my monthly rent - so I got the M. It was fine but not perfect. I ordered the S for 8 day rental and it fits beautifully!
Great classic fit and flare LBD. Perfect for work. True to size in my opinion

I'm 59 years old, 5' and 127# and the small fit perfectly. Very comfortable. Material had some stretch to it. Wore with a string of pearls and black pumps and fit in perfectly at a black tie optional affair. Very pretty. Loved the pockets. Could have worn the xsmall, but would have needed some Spanx.

I adore this dress. Debating keeping it. The material is super soft and the dress is flattering (hides any problem areas) and can be worn all day. The best part - it has pockets. Perfect for work. Adore.
So comfortable but stylish, the details are amazing. Definitely rent this, you'll feel like a princess but better: empowered and strong. Just a little flounce, but not too flouncy. Gorgeous!
I loved this dress and wore it for multiple events and occasions! I feel like it might run slightly small, as I usually comfortably wear a 10 in this style garment, but the 12 fit really well.

links_reviews_title: Stylish lightweight dress with unique print
links_reviews_text: This dress appeared black and white from a distance, but up close, the print is a combo of black, frosted white and a green that looks to be a mix of forest green crossed with olive green. The material is lightweight (sheer on arms and lower dress), but the lining keeps it from being too revealing. The lower cut in front and square cut in the back add a very feminine touch to the dress. I really loved this dress. If not for the steep price, I would have purchased it.

The neckline on the dress really makes it special. There is a fairly open back on the dress as well. The bust area doesn't have much coverage so I don't recommend for larger chested girls. The dress overall is pretty stretchy and light weight. I loved it.

links_reviews_title: Stretchy but small - difficult zipper is easier if you size up
links_reviews_text: Update to below: the size 4 fits fine although that zipper is still a challenge to get up and down - it's always a problem imo when a zipper goes past a waistband esp a stretchy one like this. There's tons of stretch so other than the finicky zipper it's pretty flexible. The chest is a little wide so I'd try the 2 as well but it wasn't available this time. Wore with a regular nude bra and the strap tended to show on one side in the front because the dress was a little loose. My first review (about the size 0) This is a lovely dress but it fit a little too small so I sent it back without wearing - the waist is stretchy, but it has a side zipper that I had trouble with, I could not get zipped at least partially because of how tight the dress was but also possibly because the zipper stuck (I had a hard time unzipping it when the dress wasn't even on). It also wasn‚Äôt as ideal for my weekend plans as I‚Äôd hoped, a little too peasant hippie for what I wanted, and the fabric was very lightweight for the season, but I‚Äôll definitely try it again in the spring a size up. There are so many beautiful details in this dress, I will have a better idea of how to style it having tried it on.
I'm sure this dress would have been perfect for the bridal shower I envisioned wearing it for but unfortunately the zipper was messed up.
very pretty, nice material

links_reviews_title: Beautiful dress for work, everyday, or after work fun!
links_reviews_text: I love this dress. It's very elegant & the material is lovely. Very flattering. Will rent again!
This dress was unique, classy and very flattering. My only complaint was that the shirring around the waist was very tight. I wore this to a steakhouse dinner so maybe that was my mistake, haha!

links_reviews_title: Didn't wear - unflattering for anyone with a bust or large ribcage
links_reviews_text: Didn't wear - unflattering for anyone with a bust or large ribcage
beautiful

links_reviews_title: Loved the neckline and sheer sleeves
links_reviews_text: This is a beautifully made dress. I wore it to work and felt amazing. I loved the sheer sleeves, square neckline, and length. Would definitely rent again!
I couldn't even zip it up. Def size up

links_reviews_title: Not flattering on me, but the sleeves are lovely.
links_reviews_text: The dress is beautiful on the hanger but on my it looked a little bit like a sack. The shape does nothing for my figure (specifically makes my hips look a little wide). I love the arms and details around the neckline, and I wanted the neckline to be a bit more square. Also shorter than I expected. Overall: cute for someone else but not as special as I was hoping for.
The dress actually has a corset style, so it shows off boobs if you have them. I was able to wear it to work and then again for date night. I would definitely rent again!
For was fine but really tight through ribcage. Size up if you want to zip.

links_reviews_title: Just not cut for my body
links_reviews_text: It's a lovely dress and I wish I could have worn it! First - difficult to zip and the sleeve's buttons were challenging for me to fasten. Once on it just looked awkward with the elastic ruched part bunches up and the neckline askew. Maybe I'm long waisted? I don't know. It wasn't for me.

I loved this dress and got a lot of compliments, would've given a 5, but it has few issues. Overall fit is true to size, but had to play with the zipper a bit as it difficult to close even though it wasn't too tight. The back was definitely a little more more open than I'm used to wearing for work and probably wouldn't fit/would be too revealing if my chest was larger.

Pretty dress - but impossible to zip due to the fabric. Maybe I should have gone up a whole size - it is also hard to wear a bra with this due to the cut (shows straps). Bought for work, but was unable to wear!
This dress is gorgeous and high quality. The back scoops low but not too low that it shows your bra. There is a nice slip liner too so it's not see through. Very feminine and modern.
I love this dress. I can wear it to a work meeting and then to dinner easily. Also, you can wear it off the shoulders for a different look!
Was a little tight in wait.. and a smidge too long

I wore this for engagement pics and it looks great! However if you rent this know that finding undergarments is tricky. The fit isn't perfect everywhere and all blemishes definitely show- as well as all undergarment lines. That being said, it was good quality and felt nice. For engagement pictures it worked great.
Rents for my bridal tea. Fit great. Lots of compliments.

Loved this dress - surprisingly flattering for a white, relatively tight dress! The material is pretty good quality so anyone of any shape can really wear this dress. It's perfect for a bridal shower or engagement party! I was planning on wearing for my engagement photos but decided on something else, so hope to rent this again for one of the other upcoming festivities!

This dress worked great for engagement pictures and is a solid option for bridal party or rehearsal dinner! It's true to size but if you're between sizes I'd order up because the fit is definitely snug. Quality was great and it didn't wrinkle which I was nervous about!

This dress helped shape my body for that night lol. It makes your waist look smaller and it was lining at the entire dress. I‚Äôm usually a size medium, but I received the wrong size (S) and decided to wear it anyway because I liked this style and it fitted me, maybe the medium size would not have been as body shaping as the size small. Anyway, it worked perfect for my engagement party. The color is nice and is not see through at all. I would rent it again.

links_reviews_title: Extremely elegant. I received so many compliments on this dress.
links_reviews_text: Fit was great not tight, not loose- nothing super sexy but very classy. Less is more here!!

links_reviews_title: Wore it as a dress for my engagement photoshoot. The shoulders were tight. I wore a backup size.
links_reviews_text: The sleeves are tight and cut off your arm span. Dress runs tight, beautiful white piece.

Love love love this dress! The sleeves stayed attached no problem and were a good size around my arm. Spaghetti straps are adjustable (at 5'3" I had them as short as possible with the slider in the back). Hit about calf-length on me. Really flattering cut and I'd rent it again.

I wore this to my bridal shower and loved it. It was very flattering and fit perfectly. Also was very comfortable. My only thing is if you are short this dress might be long. I am 5'10 and it was the perfect length on me and I still wore high heels to add some more length. Would totally wear this dress again!
Loved this dress, it fit perfectly around my waist and hips! The length was a bit long but it didn't matter because I loved it so much!

Highly recommend this dress! There were no reviews on this dress, but I decided to take a chance and so glad I did. I received so many compliments on this dress! It fits very true to size. I‚Äôm tall (6‚Äô) so I really liked how the length hit me right below the knee. For most women, I would imagine it would hit a few inches below the knee. The arm pieces weren‚Äôt at all constricting, and the dress itself was fairly comfortable. It‚Äôs a structured dress, so it‚Äôs very flattering, even in white. You can wear a strapless bra, but I opted to go without and use nipple covers (you can see through without them). The straps are adjustable, so it will fit women with varying bust sizes, but I wouldn‚Äôt rent this dress if you are very busty. Overall, I love this dress! One of my favorites I‚Äôve rented! Perfect for the bride to be for rehearsal, shower, or bachelorette party!

Wore this dress for my engagement party - STUNNING. Gorgeous dress and fabric, the medium was a little too big in the waist, but the small was a little too tight for a family event! I got so many compliments and I would buy if I could!

links_reviews_title: I loved this dress! I wore it to my bridal shower. It fit just right.
links_reviews_text: It fit true to size. It was a little snug in the butt/hip area, especially when sitting, but other than that it was fine. I was afraid it was going to be see-through, but it wasn't. Very lovely dress.

rent it- it‚Äôs worth it. I was on the fence with it being white but it is amazing and everyone loved it. I wore it for a friend‚Äôs bday dinner and it was comfortable to stand and sit in. A strapless bra fit well under it (I have a full chest) and the adjustable straps were great. Wish I could‚Äôve purchased it!!
I am usually a solid size 4 but should have sized up with this dress. It has a lining which is nice. Good quality but ultimately I did not end up wearing. Just too tight.

I rented this dress for an all white party at a night club for a girls night out in Philadelphia. However the dress was a bit to formal soo didn't wear it. The dress runs large so I would have needed a medium instead of the large. It's a thick stretchy material. Was not see through. It was comfortable. I liked it but not sure where I would wear it certainly not a wedding. Maybe for engagement photos? Or a graduation or baptism Easter Sunday at church? It was a nice dress. Sexy but still classy.
This dress is adorable and well made. I did not end up wearing it because it was too formal for what I was looking for. It would be super cute for a bride

links_reviews_title: sleeves were uncomfortable material very thin, see through
links_reviews_text: I wanted to like it, however it was uncomfortable

links_reviews_title: Gorgeous fit, beware of the delicate sleeves!!
links_reviews_text: I loved this dress but the sleeves fell off!!!!! I ended up wearing it without the sleeves for my rehearsal dinner and it was beautiful.
This dress was adorable and looked just like the photos. The material was thick but soft and it seemed like a more expensive dress than it was. Fit true to size and comfortable.

links_reviews_title: Very pretty dress, but sleeves seem too long and dress runs small.
links_reviews_text: Runs small
Great dress, very fun and good for hot weather. Wore on vacation in the French Rivera.

Loved this outfit. It's certainly a little short. I had 3" heels on and if my memory serves me, I wore the XS outfit due to the small just being slightly large in the chest. But the dress was gorgeous and light not hot for a Memorial Day weekend wedding in St. Pete's FL
Rented this for a pre-cruise night in Miami and loved it! Very flattering and fun dress!

links_reviews_title: Super cute & different- slightly weird fit and not for big boobs!
links_reviews_text: This dress is adorable and very unique, but has sort of a strange fit- very tight at the top (I wear a 36DD and the XL fit me like a sports bra in the chest with no room for a bra underneath!), but does fit nicely in bottom as well as in length (I'm 5'9 and have difficulty with this when dress shopping!) Perfect for an outdoor summer wedding, and although I wouldn't buy it, I'm excited to wear it once.

I wasn't 100% sold on this dress until I saw it in person and tried it on. Loved it so much! Great fabric and it fit SO well!!!! Very slimming and perfect if you're smaller on top and have a little curvier booty!! I will definitely rent this again!!

I am a 6-8 normally and the medium fit great. I am on the taller side and I felt comfortable with the length. You have to do no bra or something creative as the back will not allow for a traditional bra.
Very tight in the chest but very loose on the bottom half. The print is fun and different but not for girls with large chests.

links_reviews_title: Was going to wear for a summer bbq
links_reviews_text: As you can tell from the picture that this dress was not made for someone with a large midsection. I was unable to wear it because it was very unflattering. The dress was really nice and unique, I wish that it fit me better.

I wore this dress on a vacation in Singapore, and the fit / fabric was perfect for going somewhere hot and humid! It isn't form-fitting through the body, so the small ran a tad large. The accent neon colors were also great!

I wore this dress to a rehearsal dinner party in Newport RI. IT WAS AMAZING! I loved the colors and how it was similar preppy like a Lilly Pulitzer dress yet unique in its own. Would definitely buy if it was a little less expensive!

I wore this for a day of wine tasting in Napa with a dozen girls for a bachelorette. Most girls went with the floral trend but I'm happy I went with this bright dress that many of the locals complimented. Paired with some pink sunglasses, it was perfect for a beautiful day in the California sun! I sized down for this because the arm holes were a little large for me and wore a simple strapless bra.

I'm pear-shaped and this was perfect fit. Has a bit of an a-line cut. A tad on the short side for me at 5'6". Visible wear/pilling to the chest/arm hole area but doubt noticeable to anyone but me. The accent fabric has slight metallic sheen but dress can be easily dressed up or down. I did have to steam out a crease on arrival but it did not wrinkle with travel and wear.
The dress fit like a glove. Really classic shape that was perfect for a bridal shower. It was light weight but the fabric was dressy. I would buy this dress!

links_reviews_title: Super fun dress that runs large.
links_reviews_text: I rented this for a bridal brunch for a June wedding. The dress was super cute, but RTR sent me a 1X and 2X. I wore the 1X, but I think the 0X that I ordered would have fit perfect. In my opinion, the dress is cut really large through the hips and thighs. I did not wear a bra. The back cut too low for me to wear a regular bra. Overall it was a fun dress. However, there was a faint stain on the dress I didn't notice until I was heading out the door.
I wore it to work but this dress runs really big on a petite frame. I had planned on going braless but ended up layering a tank underneath because the dress showed a lot of side boob.

Got many compliments! Looks like a piece of art! I was worried the fabric would be heavy for a summer dress, but it was just fine. Could tell the dress had been worn quite a bit, and dry cleaned quite a bit. Otherwise, I would have kept!

This dress was the perfect dress for vacation . The fabric is heavy and the colors are vibrant. the back of the dress is gorgeous! The dress runs a little large, so you may want to size down for back up. I lost count the amount of compliments I received in this dress. Perfect dress for vacation, an outdoor wedding or semi formal event.

links_reviews_title: Tight across the upper chest, but I probably could wear a size medium. Not the most flattering shape
links_reviews_text: See title

The fit of this dress was great! I loved how bright the color was. Cons-the dress was slightly worn and had notable pilling around the waist and hips. -the dress is tighter in the chest than in the body, may not be able to wear a bra. I didn't and I was comfortable.

I am a 4/6 in most clothing, and I was able to wear the small in this dress. My bust area is smaller than waist, so I'm usually able to wear a small in dresses. The top was slightly looser because it is not a form fitting dress, but it was perfect for my curvier bottom half. I received tons of compliments on this dress because of the beautiful fabric and detail of the material. Perfect for a spring wedding!
Rented this for a beach vacation with the girls and also wore it to a backyard luau.

links_reviews_title: Beautiful dress! Perfect and loose for a hot summer wedding. Received lots of compliments!
links_reviews_text: I'm 5' 8" and normally wear a 0 - the XS fit better in the arms and chest but was too short for a church wedding when I bent over or sat down, so I went with the S. It was loose but not obviously so, and actually worked out well with the hot weather. Overall, I definitely would recommend! The back was flattering and I could still wear a strapless bra!
Wore this to a casual wedding and it was perfect. Very flattering despite not being overly shaped. Perfect length for my height. Loved it!

links_reviews_title: This dress was so comfortable and I got SO MANY compliments, fantastic highly recommend.
links_reviews_text: Ended up not wearing a bra, fit much nicer that way
This was the perfect dress for a summer daytime look in New York City. It ran a little large but the back detail and understated elegance of the dress was perfect. Would definitely rent again.
This is a gorgeous dress, beautiful material, exquisite design. Easy to wear. Great length. It was perfect for a baby shower. I highly recommend this dress!

links_reviews_title: Perfect for anytime in the Summer
links_reviews_text: This dress is perfect for everyday! Right when I walked into my very casual office - everyone complimented how summery and fun my dress was!
The dress ran large so i suggest sizing down. Also I'm 5'7" and it felt a little short (for me). Overall a nice dress.

Rented for an engagement party held outside in August heat. The fabric was probably too stiff for this occasion- true shift dress feel. I received tons of compliments and continue to, but the dress in XS was far too large. Had I tried it on and had time to go buy something different, I wouldn't have worn it. The back is a fun detail, as well as the metallic threading. Will not rent this dress again- but again, received many compliments.

links_reviews_title: This was PERFECT for a Kentucky Derby themed Rehearsal Dinner!!
links_reviews_text: This dress was worn for a Kentucky Derby themed rehearsal dinner at Churchill Downs. Everything about the dress was perfect. The pinks are vibrant, the fit was true to size, & the back is amazing. Once again, I wanted to keep another dress I rented. #wedding #derbywear

This dress was great for an outside date in the hot Virginia summer. The back is gorgeous and the colors are different but they are really pretty. The fit is unusual, a regular strapless didn't work for me but I just went without. I was very comfortable, received a few compliments, my husband loved it. I had fun wearing it!

I wore this dress to dinner one night while on a girls trip to Rosemary Beach. It was the PERFECT sunset dinner dress. The colors were spectacular. The dress fit me very well up top and I'm fairly small chested, however it was a bit too loose in the waist area. For the pictures my girlfriends grabbed the dress from the back and took it in a little ;) But even thought it was a bit large, I would still recommend this dress for a beach vacation for sure.
This dress is small in the bust area but fit perfectly everywhere else.

links_reviews_title: This was a lovely & comfortable dress!
links_reviews_text: Well constructed dress was fun yet comfortable - felt like a 10 :)
Run small

links_reviews_title: Perfect Sunset Dress for a Sunset Wedding
links_reviews_text: This dress is made of very giving soft material. I was traveling for my nanny job and though I was not a guest I had to pick up the child I watch after the wedding to take him back to the hotel room for bed time. It was the perfect I'm not really a guest but I have to walk into this wedding for work reasons dress.
Runs large I'm normally a medium and a small worked for me. This was nice for work as it was sturdy material and lined well. Fun for a change didn't love it

links_reviews_title: Finding this dress for my bridal shower!
links_reviews_text: Great dress! Very comfortable and the fabric is amazing.

I love this dress; so perfect for warm days. My only negative would be the bust area - I'm a D and the chest area was a bit tight which caused the back area to appear tight at times. It did seem to loosen up a bit as the day went on. I'm not sure I could have sized up since the body would have been too big.
The back of this dress is on point! Was able to wear a strapless bra. Very comfortable and was perfect for beach themed grad party I attended!

Such a nice skirt! I was worried it would be a little too dressy for work, but it wasn't! The only thing is the slip would sometimes slip out and you could see it - but mostly when I was sitting. Very pretty!
Beautiful skirt. Tons of compliments. I have a round bottom so it was a little too fitted on my tush area.
True to size, fit great and beautiful skirt
Love this skirt. It is perfect for work or a date night, and you can dress it up or down in any way ‚Äî lots of compliments. Even had someone on the street stop and ask me where I got it.
This skirt is beautiful and so classy. I would definitely rent again. I got tons of compliments.
Beautiful fabric with lots of details. Runs a bit small.

Great skirt, got tons of compliments. Was a little tight at an 8 but still the size I preferred. I'm 5'3" and 160 lbs, hourglass. Fit my waist great, which is unusual because my waist is much smaller than my butt and chest.
Detailing on the skirt is very pretty. Material has a bit of stretch.
Really beautiful and the size 10 I received was in excellent condition. I'm usually a size 8 and the 10 is wearable, but snug! It's high waisted so definitely tuck in or wear a cropped shirt.
Perfect for a work function, I usually am 2/4 glad I got the 4. For as much detail there is in the skirt it was in perfect condition
Very cool
Perfect fit. Many compliments
I felt so sexy in this skirt! Fit perfectly. No stretch.

I rented this for a company holiday party for clients, but it didn't arrive early enough. It would have been festive for the party but I wore it to work (law firm) later in the week and it was a hit. I didn't feel like it was too glitzy for day to evening. The shirt was well constructed and light. The fit was true pencil skirt. I have a 35 inch inseam and the length was just a hair above the knee-- work appropriate. I got so so many compliments. I think it's best worn with a tucked in or cropped top so the design and embellishment at the top of the skirt shows.
The detail on this skirt is stunning. Received a number of compliments at work. It would be perfect for a holiday party.

I love this skirt. The details are to die for! I rented an 8 because I have a big butt & hips so my normal size 6 usually doesn't fit. I would have been ok with a 6 on this so it runs true to size. It's super festive so great holiday skirt!!

This skirt was probably too fancy for work. It definitely has a sparkle. But got so many compliments! It fit well and was conservative but still really interesting. The one small complaint was that the material caught at the back slit part and needed some manual adjusting but only after pulling the skirt up and down. Overall amazing!

The embroidery and detail on this skirt is to die for. I got a lot of compliments. The stitching and small sequin details are not itchy, nor are they over-the-top. I wish I had a better top to pair with it! I felt like it ran a bit large - I'm usually a 2 and though that size fit, I like my skirts to be a bit tighter and higher-waisted. I paired it with black heels (not for the photo) and was glad for lift because at 5'6", the skirt was slightly below my knees. Would rent again and try a 0 and pair it with a more fashion-forward top!

links_reviews_title: Great dress for a work event!
links_reviews_text: Sexy and formal pencil skirt. Loved it!
Wore to work but would soooo elegant for a date night. Intricate detail. Very unique and lots of compliments received!

links_reviews_title: End up didn't wear it - too small
links_reviews_text: This skirt doesn't look as good in person as in the photos, seems like it got a lot of wears already . It runs pretty small too and just too uncomfortably snug on my thighs to wear throughout the whole day. So I can't wear it.
Elegant, sexy, comfortable
Received lots of compliments. Skirt is made of thick material, quite smiling and hugs your body right!
Loved it so much I bought it!
It is beautiful and fits well, but I think I shouldn't wear shiny to the office. I hope to rent this again when I have an event. It is very, very pretty.

links_reviews_title: I wore this for a company holiday party with a plain black top and it really spiced up the outfit!
links_reviews_text: The skirt was gorgeous, it fits well and the pattern fit well on me.
Beautifully made. Very unique.

links_reviews_title: Stunning details great fit and quality
links_reviews_text: Fit was perfect as is length
Don't wear this skirt with stockings. The beading pulls them.

links_reviews_title: Never got to wear because it was too small
links_reviews_text: Nice looking skirt but never got to wear it bc it wouldn't zip all the way up
catches on everything. Sequence detail rubbed pantyhose to a pulp.

Beautiful, beautiful skirt with great detail is a bit square for the cut. I am curvy so I will probably rent this again in a size larger so that it doesn't ride up or gather at the waist while being tight on my bum. I wore it with a black leather sleeveless blouse and shirt black leather booties and felt great. Tucked in shirts would work better, though, so that the eye can focus on all the great detail in this skirt.

links_reviews_title: It's a beautiful skirt but runs a little small. I would recommend going up one size.
links_reviews_text: It fit a little tightly for my tastes, ordering one size larger would have been perfect.
It was beautiful, received compliments on it.

I'm almost sorry that I did not purchase the skirt, and may reconsider. It is absolutely beautiful. I wore a plain black silk shell with it, Jimmy Choo slingbacks, and no jewelry other than my watch, diamond studs, Cartier love bracelet that I always wear, and I LOVED it! It made a work day special and easily transitioned to dinner. Gorgeous skirt!

I was expecting more from this skirt. The fabric is very pretty but the skirt offers little more than that. The cute just didn't work for me. Usually, pencil skirts look killer on me but this one hugged my hips at a funny spot and gave me a dreaded pouch. Even with shapewear, it didn't sit just right. I feel like this skirt would work better on someone who is a smaller size with straighter hips.
Probably too formal for work but perfect for a work holiday party. Fits really well and looks fancy and sophisticated

I love this skirt! I wore it a few times. It's classy but not too flashy. Fits perfectly. I'm 5'8 and around 140 lbs and the size 6 was great. I wore this to work but depending on the top you pair it with you could wear it for other occasions

Nice detail, very pretty! Wearing it with a black crop top tank and black pumps for a holiday party. I'm between a 4 and 6 usually and this is slightly snug on me. Order a 6 for backup if you're a similar size to me.
Too tight and it's pretty but thought it would be more substantial.
Loved this dress! Might be better for people who are heavy chested however or maybe I could've gone a size down? It was a hit nonetheless
pajama chic, cozy enough to feel like a luxurious robe but put together enough to wear to a fancy night out, low cut so a pin is needed in front

This dress really does have the potential to look like a robe. It is longer than the style I was wanting so I folded some of the dress under at the waist to make it shorter, therefore it looked like there was a tie around the dress at the waist. (The dress ties so I folded some of the fabric of the dress up, under the tie and tied it really tight so that it wouldn't fall)
I know this dress technically covers a fair amount, but you just feel slinky in it. This is really perfect for a date or party. It's beautiful!

links_reviews_title: The material was really nice and complimented my complexion

links_reviews_text: I wish this was forever in my closet. Not only is it flattering but exceedingly comfortable. The fabric is so that you can't help but keep running your fingers over it. A nice spring piece but could transition into winter for its icey tones.

I think the dress runs true to size I was able to wear the large since it was a wrap dress, but I probably could've worn a medium easily. The dress is so classy and sexy. It's perfect for an evening event. Such a classic mature look.
Material is comfortable. Runs very large.

links_reviews_title: Elegant and flattering - wore with sleek pants and a trench
links_reviews_text: Thought this might work well for professional dinners and yet I scarcely had a chance to wear it on business trip to Portugal. Luckily, I wore it several times during my mom's visit to my hometown of San Francisco. It is a great piece for a night out on the town in cool spring weather and is best layered with a trench on top if needed -- so you won't look too bulky. I wore it to the theater with my mom and to meet up with friends for drinks. The color is subtle yet eye-catching while the cut is elegant and flattering. I wore with sleek black pants underneath as I think it would be a bit too revealing and uncomfortably short for us taller, curvier gals. It does beautifully accentuate an hourglass figure, which is a plus. Also, as noted by others, a safety pin may be needed to reinforce the closure.

Rented this for a baby shower. And I am obsessed. I ended up wearing the medium, I felt it ran a bit small and the small didn't provide enough coverage. I received a ton of compliments and felt super confident. Love the material

The waist is a little more snug that I expected, but nothing that isn't true to size. I wore this for a photo shoot and it served its purpose well in that regard, but it definitely has a bath robe look to it which would have kept me from wearing it for any other purpose.
I loved everything about this dress, especially the color and material. It's pj style but wayyy upgraded.
Gorgeous fabric and so comfortable to wear.
