I absolutely loved and will rent again. True to size. Great color and quality. Looks so high end.
Lots of compliments! Felt fab in the desert!

I think the idea is really chic. I wish there was another button to tighten it and make it less bathrobe-y but I think it's a great color with great fabric. I don't think I would rent again but I felt comfortable in this dress all day for sure and would rent from the brand again
Beautiful color. The fit and material make this dress super comfortable.

Runs true to size/ larger- it's a comfortable fit - additionally it's silky so don't drop any water on it but it'll dry okay. When you sit expect the band on your tights to show... it slit is very high when you are seated so maybe keep something on your lap

links_reviews_title: I wore this when I spoke on a panel and received so may compliments after!
links_reviews_text: The snaps are not strong enough and the dress kept unsnapping while I was sitting or standing or breathing. The tie pretty much kept the dress on me, but it was very nerve-racking to think my dress could fall open at any moment. If I rented this again, I would reinforce the snaps with safety pins. It's a beautiful dress!

Loved the color and the general design of this dress. However, there are only two snaps holding the dress together at the waist so you're looking at a whole lotta leg when sitting. Felt very high end - I received it new with tags. Surprisingly sexy.

This was so beautiful in the pictures I couldn't wait to rent it for a night out. However when I got it and put it on I couldn't believe how it looked exactly like my satin bathrobe! I can't believe I didn't realize this when I saw the photo. Anyways the fit is very strange sleeves are too long waist is too small just us to bag I ended up not wearing it because I Decided robe she was not quite the look I was going for.

This Nanushka dress is a BEAUT. I'm a fan of the brand from afar and was so excited to see a few items added to RTR. I snatched this one up and it arrived new with tags. It's a dreamy, silky, beautiful blue pseudo-wrap dress, that has two snaps in the front to hold it together and then a tie on the side that lets you adjust how tight the waist is. I got so many compliments on this dress and wore it twice: once to a cocktail-attire awards gala and once to work drinks and dinner at a conference. The length of the skirt makes it work appropriate, but double sided tape would be useful to hold the top together. It can droop while you sit, which you have to be mindful of. Overall fit true to size.

links_reviews_title: Gorgeous but beware of those snaps
links_reviews_text: I loved this dress BUT it is a wrap dress secured with two snap closures. The snap nearest the tie tends to pop open when sitting, breathing, walking or talking. So unless you're a mannequin, beware that you will probably be fixing that snap all day. You will also want to tape or pin the front to avoid too much chest on display. Regardless, I love the chic factor and felt amazing in it. At some point I gave up on that damn snap and just enjoyed being in a beautiful feeling garment. I would recommend it for a date (it makes an amazing end of night reveal). And not for 8 hours in the office.

links_reviews_title: Yeap, it looks like a bathrobe
links_reviews_text: I ordered this for a fancy night out, but it looked just like a bathrobe on me. Two tiny snaps hold it together around the waist, before you tie the side knot. The inside snap was a tad too tight for my waist and would stay shut, but I would still categorize this dress as TTS. Cuffs are oversized/loose.

I wore this for a work dinner and the snap that keeps the top closed kept popping open all night long. It was distracting to say the least. I am definitely busty so maybe it wouldnt happen on someone smaller chested but the snap would just not stay closed. Otherwise beautiful material and lines.

beautiful on, does look like a robe but i wore it tied higher on my ribs and looser across the chest and shoulders to reduce the robe vibe. received a lot of compliments but an FYI that it doesn't photograph that well if that's important for your event

links_reviews_title: Beautiful dress, short in the torso.
links_reviews_text: I wear between 6 &8, the Medium is a great fit but the waist hit at the bottom of my rib cage. So if you are shorter than 5'10", it is probably a perfect dress. No lining on the skirt so it is underwear sensitive.

links_reviews_title: Wore this for a work event and got a ton of compliments!
links_reviews_text: Runs VERY small, especially if you have a larger chest. The buttons wouldn't close for me to make it a wrap dress so I had to rock it as a blazer/coat type thing. It still looked great and is very beautiful/wonderful quality. No one knew it was supposed to be a dress so I pulled it off. Would rent again but two sizes bigger.
This fits like a bathrobe or a nightgown robe. I literally felt like I just rolled out of bed. Quality is great, fabric is silky. But there is no way I would wear this out of the house.
Great piece with great amazing fabric. Wrapped around my curves perfectly. Loved it.
The fabric of this dress is so lovely and it is very well-made and flattering along with being comfortable. One of my favorites!
Unfortunately I fell ill and was unable to attend the event I rented this for (so couldn't wear it), but I absolutely loved it. Flattering cut, beautiful color, fluid fabric. I will rent again!
When my husband came in the room he said "where did you get hat bathrobe." Wore it anyway. It's different and I liked it fine but the snaps come undone easily and it does look like a bathrobe.
Fit so well flattering and hugs body in all right places
Missing a button on the sleeve so couldn't really wear bc def need that Button. Got compliments for the small amount of time I wore it but had to quickly change out of it
This was a really odd fit for me. Trying to get it to look like it does on the model was a distant dream , a beautiful color though

links_reviews_title: I received so many compliments - people i didn't even know were telling me they loved the dress.
links_reviews_text: Very soft and silky - fits beautifully.

links_reviews_title: I didn't end up wearing this
links_reviews_text: This is a pretty color and a nice silk fabric, but it does definitely look like a silk bathrobe when you put it on. Also, you can't wear a bra with this.

links_reviews_title: Did not get to Wear to waist line
links_reviews_text: The dress was too tight around my waist and would not button aT waist Two small
Could have been chic, could have been a bathrobe. It was a bathrobe.
Super fun top! Will rent again.

links_reviews_title: Runs large - a very baggy arm!
links_reviews_text: Eh... the sleeve felt too billowy for me, overall a large fit
Fun, flirty top great for work events.
This top was tight up top and overly flowy in the middle, which is not flattering on my shape. Was just okay, didn't love it.
Great too. Very comfortable and you can wear a strapless bra without it showing.
Great top with enough unique-ness to keep it fun!
Wore this on Christmas Day. Very fun and cute top!
Top fit nicely, slightly large. I would rent again.
Great statement shirt. Light weight. Can be worn with no bra.
Perfect for a night out
Such a fun sleeve and looks great with a leather jacket too!

Floral, one shoulder, and ruffles? I love this trendy top by Tanya Taylor! This shirt is so incredibly flattering and is such a great transition piece as it gets a little chillier at night. You can definitely dress this up or down depending on your event but I would personally wear this with some black skinny jeans and some tassel earrings. Can't wait to wear this to my next night out!
Worn for dinner date with black skinny jeans. Print is bright and fun!
Ran too big- didn't look good
I enjoyed wearing this and would rent again !
Great fit and really comfortable!

links_reviews_title: Way too big but would have been cute
links_reviews_text: 12 in some RTR is right so rented 12 in this brand. Was absolutely swimming in it. Couldn't wear

links_reviews_title: Fun and comfy- perfect for date night.
links_reviews_text: This top is a fun balance of conservative and flirty. Loved the asymmetrical design- good transition piece between winter and spring too.
I love the one shoulder look. The bottom half is not fitted at all so not super flattering but over all it was a cute top.
Flowy, great colors and pattern.
Love love love this top. Fit perfectly

links_reviews_title: Such a fun and pretty blouse!
links_reviews_text: I rented this for a weekend getaway, and it's a great, light piece for Spring. It is a little shorter than I anticipated, hits at high hip rather than mid/low like it is pictured on the model. Still very pretty, and ruffle at the neckline worked, even with a larger bustline (I'm a 30F). Floral pattern is so pretty!
Pretty top

links_reviews_title: It was okay but I would not rent this again
links_reviews_text: Great print, love the detail on the sleeve, flowy, but zero stretch in the bust area.

links_reviews_title: This was super comfortable and very cute.
links_reviews_text: It is a little billowy through the stomach but overall fit well.

links_reviews_title: The other reviews said the blouse ran big so I ordered an 8 and 6. I should have gone with a 10.
links_reviews_text: Blouse is beautiful but does not run big, if anything I feel like it runs a little small across the chest area.
Fit large. It was so big I thought I ordered the wrong size. It was falling off of me.
Cute top in person, but wanted something with more bright colors. It was also a little bit loose, I probably could have worn the 4

I thought it was a very cute top. The size fit perfectly. I'm not too big in the chest area so it had plenty of room for someone who is larger than a b cup. I thought it had a great length and would definitely rent again.

I wore this to a party and got so many compliments. The colors were pretty and the one shoulder made it just a bit special. I'd say it ran a bit large. I'm a 6-8 and wore the 6. Paired it with black jeans and heels for a fun night out. Would definitely recommend!

links_reviews_title: Love this fun top. Easy to wear with jeans or faux leather pants. Got lots of compliments.
links_reviews_text: Fits true to size.
Super fun top that is very flattering. I was worried per other reviews @ the side being too large but fit perfectly. Wore it to a concert with jeans.

links_reviews_title: Got lots of compliments on this!
links_reviews_text: Beautiful top - I received lots of compliments! I'd rent this again.

links_reviews_title: Very pretty, flattering. Good versatile top
links_reviews_text: I actually didn't get to wear it out because of the (hot) weather but I tried on this top with white jeans and it fit really nicely and was very pretty. I would definitely rent it again.
This was a little loose on me but did not look too big, just extra comfortable! Great print and fabric!
Fit well, flowy, fun

links_reviews_title: Fun and sexy top. Be sure to size down.
links_reviews_text: Fun, sexy top for a night out. This one does run large, so I had to exchange original size 2 for size 0. The sleeve is also quite long. I am petite, so I did push the sleeve up a bit. I wore this with black skinny pants and black skinny heel booties. I paired the blouse with the Lele Sadoughi Wind Chime earrings, for a dressier look.
I really enjoyed this top. It is a snug fit. If you're in between go up.
This top was so very cute. I have a larger chest and it fit great. It was fun to wear with jeans and I wore it on a date night. I stayed warm in it and loved the sleeves. I would wear again!

I wore this to my birthday dinner with my boyfriend. I wore the 6 since I was wearing high waisted jeans but had I worn regular rise pants, I would have opted for the 8 because of length. Fit great in the bust and arm. Such a fun ruffled top that everyone complimented me on. I ADORED the ruffle at the wrist; so elegant and feminine. Great for in-between seasons too!
I LOVED this jumpsuit! perfect mix of sexy and comfortable. runs a bit small around the rib cage area so if you have large ribs or big chest size up.
I wore this to a Christmas party and it was flattering and comfortable. TTS. The sleeve is pretty big but I liked it!
Amazing cut fits perfectly despite my petite size

links_reviews_title: Love this black romper with pockets. Wore it to a welcome dinner for a wedding.

links_reviews_text: My first jumpsuit - obsessed. The shape and fit were flawless for my near impossible to wear a jumpsuit body type. I'm normally a 10, and wore the large, it wasn't tight at all, but the medium would have been too clingy around my stomach. Honestly, I didn't love the one shoulder detail but it made me feel chic and pretty!

links_reviews_title: This jumpsuit was fun and appropriate for a work cocktail event.
links_reviews_text: Slightly tight around my rib cage, but fit like a glove everywhere else. I have a decent size butt and jumpsuit can fit tight and weird because of it. This one worked perfectly for my arse. Was not long in my short legs. I tried the medium but it was baggy in all the wrong places

links_reviews_title: Not for girls with curvy figures and small bust.
links_reviews_text: I rented this jumpsuit for New Years Eve in 2 sizes, the 4 and the 6. Usually I am a 4 in most everything, but I always get a 6 to be on the safe side. (I have wider hips/butt). I really wanted to like jumpsuit, however, the fit in my opinion was totally off. If you have small bust, and any kind of hips/thighs this suit is not going to work for you. This is best for girls without hips. The 4 on me pulled at my hips and the top fit better, but still was not holding me in well. The 6 fit better in the hips, but the top was so large. Those with a larger bust may do well in this as they can fill it out better. I also wasn't a huge fan of the fabric, but at that point it didn't matter because I couldn't make it work.
Fit perfectly, no bra needed. Pockets are awesome! 5'7" 129 lbs, 34B, wore size S
If you are 5'10 and a size A cup this will be perfect. If you have anything more than an A cup this is not the top for you. And the bottom is weird in that the crotch is super long.

I wore the Medium as the small was pretty tight across my chest. I was worried about it looking too billow-y but it was fantastic! It was comfortable, easy to sit and dance and the unique shoulder set it apart from other black ensembles.

love this dress! the material is thin, but not sheer. Great for fall because of the sleeves and it's length, but I could also imagine someone pairing it with heeled boots for the winter. The black line going down the front and across the waist is extremely flattering. Buttons are hidden which I liked. I'm 5'8 and about an inch of the dress was dragging on the floor when I didn't wear my shoes / wedges.

links_reviews_title: This is the most amazing dress!
links_reviews_text: I'm about 5'1" and wore 3 inch heels and it was still really long but it's amazing!!!!!

I wore this soft dress wine tasting and got a ton of compliments! It's very unique and fit really well- the black cross defines the waist for sure! It was a tad long on the sides when walking upstairs, but other than that manageable.
I'm 5'4" and it just grazed the floor if I wore 4 inch wedges. The bust was a bit tight and I'm a 34B. Busty ladies def need to size up! Comfortable and soft fabric. Lots of compliments!
This is much better in person than pictured!!! Beautiful
Loved this dress - a different look but very comfy and flowy - wore for a bridal shower
The perfect long, long sleeved dress. I received endless compliments and it's so comfortable. The handkerchief hem necessitates heels for me at 5'5. It was such a great dress for early spring!
Dress was perfection wanted to keep it! Would not recommend for someone with larger chest but for me it fit great as a 34B It is long wore wedges .. so many compliments!

links_reviews_title: Nice flow, elegant and a little solemn
links_reviews_text: Feminine, length is a bit long and I am 5ft7 ... and I had to wear medium heel for it not to drag on floor

links_reviews_title: So many compliments on this dress
links_reviews_text: This dress was everything. Rented it for my sisters bridal shower and received so many compliments!! So flattery and great for spring events

Pros: I cannot overstate how incredibly comfortable the fabric of this dress is. Unlike most maxi dresses, this dress nips in your natural waist and highlights your bust in a flattering way. I wore this dress multiple times to work and on the weekends for brunch/lunch etc. Loved it. I would rent this again! Cons: For petite ladies, the dress may be a bit too long and may drag on the ground on the sides. This wasn't an issue for me ... I usually encounter maxis being a tad too short and hitting my ankle so the longer length was a pleasant surprise.

I've had unlimited for 2 years now and by far my favorite rental. So flattering. I am 5'8 and will have to wear heels so it doesn't drag but that's my only hold up. Beautiful dress! Love everything slate and willow. Want to buy!
This is perhaps my favorite rental. Great for a thin or athletic fame. The only draw back is the length. It is very long which required me to wear tall boots or my tallest pumps.

This dress was so pretty I wish I could've worn it but it was wayyyy too long (I'm 5'4, had 3" heels on and it was still piling on the floor) but also weirdly tight in the chest so I couldn't have sized down. Would have worked in a petite size.

This dress is SO comfortable. It was absolutely perfect for a cool spring day. I work in a modern art museum so there is a little bit more room to play with styles, and I had a lot of fun wearing this around the office. The only issue is that the sides are really long. I am 5'4" and had some platform heeled boots on, and the dress still dragged slightly. Still, worth it!

links_reviews_title: Too long even on a tall girl! Didn‚Äôt wear.
links_reviews_text: I am 5‚Äô7 and I tried the dress on with heals and it is touching the ground. Except for the length, it was very flattering but I did not wear it.

This dress is such a flattering cut. The material hangs so nicely. I'm a little broad in the chest and shoulders so it fit me just a tad snug up top, but not so much that it restricted movement. Perhaps with a bigger bust it might be tricky. But for me, this is perfection and I'm gonna have trouble sending it back!
The dress runs very small, my waist is 26 inches and an XL would of fit perfectly

links_reviews_title: Didn't love it, but could just be me
links_reviews_text: I'm typically into a flowy print dress but this one seemed less bohemian chic and more... prairie. But that could just be me. I wear an 8 and the L was slightly big (which is true to size).
I really liked this dress. It's very pretty and I wore it several times. It does run large though so definitely size down.
But the buttons in the medium were really happy for me. Sizing up to a large.

links_reviews_title: Too long and too tight around the chest
links_reviews_text: Couldn't wear. Loved the look of this dress but it pulled around my chest with gaping and was too long on parts of it to wear, even with high shoes.

Wore this for our son's Blessing Day (nontraditional baptism) and received so many compliments. My problems with the dress was this was the first time that a RTR dress looked worn or somewhat faded in color because of how many times it had been dry cleaned. I've been renting with RTR for years and a few times per year so this was certainly unexpected and upsetting. 6 months post partum I'm actually under my pre-pregnancy which is crazy but the buttons at my stomach were not taught enough.

The fabric on this dress is quite thin, it feels pleasant against the skin and moves well. However the hem is super long and drags on the floor, even with heels. Also the black stripes sit a bit weird on the body.
Even more flattering on than in the picture! Received numerous compliments. I loved the length and the vertical center stripe was incredibly flattering and slimming.
A little longer than shown in the photo.

You know that scene in Tommy Boy where Chris Farley tries on David Spade's jacket and he rips it? That's how this dress fits. There is absolutely NO give in the arms or bust! Not made for anyone with a size bigger than a 36 bust

The fit was true to size, I wore it with heels making me 5'7 in height. The tips of the dress almost touched the ground. If it had been raining, I would've been worried about the dress. So love it , very flattering on straight and narrow body!
Gorgeous movement to this dress. Hit the floor on me at the ends when wearing flats - I'm 5'8"

links_reviews_title: Beautiful dress rather for a special occasion not for an office
links_reviews_text: Very feminice fit, flowing fabric, pretty dress, true to it's size. I rented it for an office. But i rather wear it for a special occasion next time!
Top was too tight , wasn't able to wear because of the gapping. I wear 36C and it was too small.
This looks like it could be matronly, but it's anything but. It's extremely beautiful on
I liked this dress a lot. I wore it to a summer outdoor dinner party and it was very flattering, especially when you walk. It is a bit long on the sides, so I had to wear a wedge shoe with it.

links_reviews_title: LOVED this! Stylish, comfortable yet modest .. will be renting again!
links_reviews_text: Loved this dress!! The material is very soft and the dress well cut (slightly tight at the waist for me but nothing that a safety pin to secure the button didn't sort). I loved the fact that I felt fashionable and cool without it being super short/ tight/ revealing .. it made it a really good day to day dress, but I am sure that I could have dressed it up for an event. Best worn with heels as the dress was a little long for me, with flats the edges touched the floor :)
A little snug around the bra line! Would not recommend for people with more than a 34B. The medium was just snug enough and the large was too big. But I love the dress! Many compliments!

links_reviews_title: This dress is outstanding. I loved it, so comfortable and soft...
links_reviews_text: #summer fun
Great fit
I'm usually a 6, sometimes a 4 in dresses. The medium just fit, and gaped when I sat down. Next time i would size up.
Beautiful dress, true to size.

I rented this for work, and it ended up being perfect on a chilly spring day. That said, it runs quite long and large. I am 5'5", and even with 3" heels it dragged on the ground. I also probably should have sized down to an XS, as the waist is pretty generous.
Flattering cut though slightly small. Could have worn an XL and I'm 5'5" 140

links_reviews_title: Fun, versatile wrap dress good for various ocassions
links_reviews_text: The neckline is low so just to be safe, since I needed this for an event where I'd be presenting on stage, I wore a cami underneath. But this dress packs well, looks great, accentuates your waistline and the only thing I'd say that was a little surprising was it runs a little small.
The color, fit and feeling were amazing. It was windy outside and I had to hold the front down (it's a true wrap dress) but otherwise it was incredible! So many compliments given!

I wore this for my engagement pictures. I was trying to rent size L, but it was unavailable. Luckily since it's a wrap dress, I just tied it really tight around my waist. I did have to keep fussing with the top, so nothing fell out, but kind of expected since this was a size larger. If you have bigger arms, the sleeves may run tight. I'm not confident my arms would've fit comfortably in size L. But regardless, a really beautiful dress - super light and airy, making it a perfect choice for early fall engagement pictures. And much prettier in person.
Fit was great, super comfortable and firm fitting but not too tight. I wore this to a welcome party at a wedding in Cape Cod and absolutely loved it. Felt like the little flamenco dancing emoji.
I wore this to work during the summer, but would definitely be appropriate for a party or event. Sry pretty and flattering

Really loved this dress. The colors are amazing. The high-low hem is fun. I pinned the top to not be too revealing during the day and unpinned at night. I would buy this IF the upper arms and shoulders weren't so constricting. I'm petite athletic-ish and I could barely grab a ticket when entering a parking garage. But the dress made me feel pretty all day.
True wrap dress, which means you can easily adjust the fit!
Super cute, but way too much boob for this somewhat conservative dress so I didn't end up wearing it because I thought a cami would kind of ruin the look.

Loved this dress! Had to be a little careful with the wind blowing it open in the front, but overall wasn't too big of a problem. There is no stretch to the fabric so I found it to be a little tight in the arms/shoulders when I lifted my arms up.

links_reviews_title: Perfect for a day wedding! Got so many compliments. Obsessed.
links_reviews_text: Shows a lot of leg so if you aren't comfortable with that don't rent. Other than that, one of the best things I've rented yet!!

links_reviews_title: I had to buy this one!
links_reviews_text: Amazing fit and very flattering

links_reviews_title: The fabric on this dress is incredible!
links_reviews_text: This dress is sooo pretty!! I ended up buying it because I loved it so much! First off- the print is sooo beautiful and colorful! Second, the wrap style is incredibly flattering! I felt really pretty and girly wearing it. For reference- I am 5'6'' 130 lbs 34C and I wore a medium. Probably could have gotten away with a small but prefer medium
Perfect for our family holiday photos! Gorgeous, bright pattern that was just fun/bold enough. Felt very comfortable and photographed beautifully.

links_reviews_title: Love getting new styles every month.
links_reviews_text: Very colorful dress. Received lots of complements.
This dress is gorgeous and flowy, with a tie around the waist to accentuate! Paired down with sandals and up with wedges.

Pretty dress, flattering. Wore this to work. Def runs small. Also if there's even the tiniest breeze it reveals all. I had to hold it shut outside and on the subway platform. Indoors was fine though. I'm a full C cup and this was definitely a showy dress but everything stayed put.

I was a huge fan of this gorgeous Alexis dress! The colors were gorgeous. I wore this twice - once to a bachelorette party and once to work. It's very low cut so I was more comfortable wearing a tank underneath. To work, I wore a short black slip underneath. The dress is a true wrap dress (so it's adjustable!) and leaves a slit at the front, so for work I felt more comfortable wearing a slip and not having to worry about it showing too much thigh. The length is a bit shorter in the front and longer in the back which was super pretty. At 5'2, the longest part of the dress (in the back) hit me at my ankles. Loved this versatile dress!

links_reviews_title: I rented this just for the weekend for a brunch for my boss' birthday.
links_reviews_text: This was a very pretty dress! However, I am 5'11", 38C and in between a 12 and 14 and this dress did not fit me at all - way small. The front would not have covered up my chest at all. I love the print and it's well made, so instead of wearing it as a dress I tied it in the back and wore it just over a tank. The back was so fluttery and I got a lot of complements. I'm happy I was able to make it work in an unconventional way, because it really is cute.
Needed more prep w double tape

By mistake I received the XL, I made it work because this sexy dress needed to be worn! It's a wrap dress to I could adjust the fit but I would have loved a shorter length. Rent! So so bright and tons of compliments.

links_reviews_title: Absolutely gorgeous flattering dress! So many compliments!
links_reviews_text: I am thinking about buying this dress. I absolutely loved wearing it. Comfortable, flirty, fun, sexy! Absolutely stunning and amazing material! HIGHLY recommend!~
This dress is a beautiful color and very eye catching. Easy to wear and felt comfortable all day.

links_reviews_title: Such a pretty color and pattern!
links_reviews_text: I love this trendy dress by Alexis! Running true to size with some stretch, I recommend wearing true to size for your primary size and going up for your back-up. This style is fitted throughout the midsection and straight at the hips. It works for all cup sizes. You are able to wear a standard bra with this dress. At 5'3, the length hit tea length on me. Pair with some black heels and you're set!
This was a beautiful dress! The pattern was lovely and fit was great. The cut is fairly low cleavage so prepare for that.

links_reviews_title: Didnt end up wearing it to the party.
links_reviews_text: The bust and arms were too loose for me, but any smaller and the slit would not have worked properly.

links_reviews_title: A little big up top of small chest (34a)

links_reviews_text: great
Very sexy and comfortable!

links_reviews_title: The perfect day dress to make you feel fabulous and sexy, yet it's easy to wear.
links_reviews_text: The wrap is perfect, unlike DVF the v isn't so low that you have to wear a tank top. The slit in the front is quite high, yet not indecent. I wear it out for lunch with heels, to the grocery store with flip flops, it's literally the perfect dress.
Perfect work dress, got so many compliments and felt quite fancy tbh walking around

links_reviews_title: Runs small. Very tight in arms.
links_reviews_text: Runs small. Very tight in arms
It was a fun, flirty, and colorful dress.
I loved this dress, but didn't end up wearing it because it was too low cut and my chest was very exposed. Size up if you're busty.
Very flattering dress, hit my curves just right.
Didn't wear it, the sleeves were very tight. Cute pattern and cut otherwise.
Had to wear a cami underneath because it shows the chest

This is one for date night....but you may want to wear boy-shorts underneath because you're bound to expose yourself - as this slit is very hight. I had to hold it a lot, which I didn't like. I wish there was some kind of hook (sort of like what they do the the chest area on low cut tops) to prevent this, as it made me self conscious any time I had to get up to walk somewhere. Which is ironic, because if you have good legs you want to wear this dress and show them off - but I didn't want to show off 'other areas'!

At 5'3", the sleeves are more like long 3/4 sleeves and the length is to my ankles. I just rolled up the sleeves for a more casual look and it was fine. XS / 0 sizes tend to be a bit large for me (by length and width), so the fact that this fit me probably indicates that the dress is smaller than a typical XS / 0. I have broad shoulders so it was a little tight around the shoulders, but I'm a 30A, so the lack of boobage prevented the dress from feeling too tight.

Sized up per other reviews and glad I did so. Size was fine but did not seem to wrap in the correct place- felt my torso was too short for this dress. Fabric was pretty but fit overall was not what I hoped for.

links_reviews_title: In a sea of black dresses, it was nice to have chosen red. My people could always find me! :)
links_reviews_text: It fit well! Tight up top. I didn't wear any kind of bra because anything would have shown the edges through the fabric. I'm 5'9" 150lbs and 36C. It was a comfy fabric. This dress is all about that simple, bold color so went with turquoise accessories, shoes, clutch, earrings to keep the bold color theme. It worked, I thought.

links_reviews_title: Not great for hour glass shapes
links_reviews_text: It definitely runs small. I felt like the drop waist was unflattering on me. I am 5'4" and very hour glass shaped. The side boob is also pretty aggressive and the sides sort of puckered out. I probably could have fixed it with some tape and sticky boobs though.
Wore size UK8/US4. A little large on me in the chest and hip area
I usually wear a size 4 or 6 in dresses. I'm glad I listened to the reviews & sizes up to 12. The hip area was a little big but the the rest fit perfectly

links_reviews_title: Loved this dress, got so many compliments.
links_reviews_text: I originally ordered the 16R but it was to large, RTR was great and got me a size smaller within 2 days. Definitely cannot wear undergarments. The arm holes are lower than they appear. I found it very comfortable and easy to dance in.

Dress was perfect for a recent wedding. Received many compliments. Note that you're unable to wear a bra underneath due to the deep arm holes; I wore sticky petals. Otherwise very comfortable and a ton of fun to wear.

Absolutely loved this dress. It was comfortable yet beautiful! I would say it runs a little small, would have preferred to try next size but I ordered too late and wasn't available. I also had to fold the neck piece down because it was a bit bit high but if you have your hair down, it obvious at all!

Make sure you read the fit, because this dress runs true to size, but is UK sizing. The dress is a nice, thick material, and is meant to be tight. Be warned, you cannot wear undergarments, they will show, I wore nipple covers. I felt great in this dress and received so many compliments!

Love this dress üòç it fit perfectly! It does cut in far by the shoulders and with the open back a strapless does not work. But my sticky bar was great. The material is a nice heavy weight but doesn't feel heavy on. Got so many compliments that I wanted to buy the dress. Also loved where it was cut and being so tall that is rare!

I loved this dress! Due to the type of material I ended up wearing a size smaller than my normal size, which I would recommend because you want it to be tight. For anyone with a larger bust it shows a lot of side boob, so take that into consideration. I felt so good in the dress all night and my boyfriend couldn't stop complimenting it :)

links_reviews_title: Loved the color! Got a ton of compliments!
links_reviews_text: The material is stretchy, but looks tailored. The high/low bottom was just right for my height. Since I'm all booty and no bust, I had some extra room in the back of the dress, where it bubbled, but my hair covered it up. I felt like the dancing red dress emoji lady!

RENT THIS NOW! This dress is just fire. So flattering. I'm short and it didn't make me look short. (Short girls feel me) The side boob situation can be tricky but nothing a good sticky bra cant fix. The color is the most perfect red-orange. FYI Mac has a lip color that goes perfect with this called "Quite The Standout." I cant wait to rent this again!

links_reviews_title: Great modern red dress- size up!
links_reviews_text: I typically wear a size 4, maybe 6 in items that run small. I tried to size 8r dress and looked like a stuffed sausage. 10R fit perfectly! Dress was flattering, comfortable and I got so many compliments all night

I can't express enough how amazing this dress is. The cut is flattering and the wetsuit like material is comfortable and high quality. Wore this to an evening wedding and received a stupid amount of compliments.

This dress was simply beautiful, got a lot of compliments. It‚Äôs a little heavy on the material but nothing u can‚Äôt handle. This is my 2nd time renting dresses and I never got disappointed. See u on my next event

links_reviews_title: Great fit, the collar was a bit high for me, but I was able to fold it down to for comfort.
links_reviews_text: Worn for a wedding. Perfect attire for the occasion.
Love this free and the thick fabric and raw edge.
Probably would have fit better into a size 12.

links_reviews_title: Loved how unique the dress was, also loved the color. Received many compliments!
links_reviews_text: A tiny bit tight on my neck, and needed help zipping.

links_reviews_title: So unique, so flattering, so comfortable.
links_reviews_text: Wore to a black tie wedding; the material is thick, almost like a wetsuit, so it was perfect for the 60 degree weather. Stretchy but fitted. Loved it.

links_reviews_title: Got compliments on night on color & fit!
links_reviews_text: The dress runs big/runs true to size. I ordered the smallest available 4R, which equates to a 0 according to the size options. My normal size is 0, so that is why I say it runs true to size, also! The color & fit are beautiful. The material is quite thick, which is a double edged sword. It worked as it's own "Spanx" & gave me a great shape, but it was a little warm for the summer wedding (thankfully it was indoor). The high neck and low cut sides make it sexy & sophisticated & a perfect style for a formal Summer wedding. One thing to note, I could not wear a bra with it because the sides are so low. I used chicken cutlets (not pictured in my image) to give a little more fullness, but I had to position them really close so they wouldn't stick out on the side. I would recommend pasties if you are worried about nipples showing. Also, I thought I would be swallowed up in the dress because I am only 5'1", 115lbs and there seemed to be a lot of material, but it fit me perfectly! Would recommend!
It was a very flattering fit & the color was great for our summer formal gala. Danced the night away.

Definitely can't wear any undergarments with this but thankfully this whole dress is like one big spanx. My only complaint is that the neck is so high that the hook closure got caught in my hair a few times.

links_reviews_title: Nice dress, but I should've sized up
links_reviews_text: The dress is more an orange-red than a pure corvette red. Still nice, very bright, but not what I was expecting. A 4R (equivalent to a US 2) was too tight. I may have considered wearing this to my event I sized up.

links_reviews_title: Beautiful color and material - Lots of compliments, fun dress!
links_reviews_text: Beautiful color and material - did feel a little insecure about the arm crease area and definitely makes the hips look wide. Lots of compliments, fun dress!

This dress needs to fit like a glove so I sized down. I'm normally a 6 but got the 4( 8 in UK sizing). The 6 was too roomy in the hips and had weird points sticking out at the hips. It is a stretchy fabric that needs to fit very snug. Also, you definitely need to have a sticky bra (Nubra) to pull your boobs inward or else you have your boobs coming out the sides. It also shows everything so wear spanx!

links_reviews_title: IT was a perfect dress for the event and the fit was great
links_reviews_text: really comfortable and easy to dance in!

I wore this for a fundraiser. The material of the dress was heavy, very high quality. Fits like a glove. I am a size 6 in dress (have to put that 34C in) and the size 6 (10 UK) fits perfect. Depending on your chest size you might have a bit of a side boob going on (I did) but nothing than fashion tape cannot help with. Overall great dress, got tons of compliments throughout the night. Dress is more on the orange hue than red FYI.
Gorgeous color and fabric

Beautiful style and color, but this dress is very heavy and uncomfortable. The clasp at the top of the turtleneck as scratching the back of my neck and getting caught in my hair. Also runs small, wore a 14, usually an 8. A 12 would've probably fit better and hugged my figure, but it was not available.

Very odd fit- weird structured hips that stick out. The cut on the shoulders is also very deep and shows a lot of side boob. Unfortunately this didn't work for me. I am usually a size 0/2 and the size 4 was tight.

links_reviews_title: I got compliments all night! Great color and unique style!
links_reviews_text: It was a VERY comfortable dress! So much I didn't even change for the after party! There seemed to be a little bit of material that stuck out around the hip area, but it could've been because it was a teeny bit big. I meant to order the small size (10) but accidentally ordered a 14. So a 10 might have been a little more fitting. But the 12 still looked great!

links_reviews_title: The pop of red was great!
links_reviews_text: The dress is a nice and stretchy material, but was definitely right through the middle. I loved the high neck, but felt the arm holes were oddly large. I am not super chesty and was a little nervous about side boob the whole night. Length was great with heels for me. I am 5‚Äô3 and about 135. I carry my weight more in my hips and rear so I liked the flare out around that area.

links_reviews_title: Stunning dress! Would love in any color!
links_reviews_text: Don't like the clasp at the top of the dress- gets caught in your hair. Zipper is too stiff.
AMAZING! Color cut shape fabric every single thing is amazing. I felt amazing, giving my husband something to talk about!
Fits large in the hips and fitted in the bust/ I would not rent again and had to wear because it was my only option :(

I love this feminine and chic dress by Solace London!! Running true to size, I recommend your usual size as your primary and going one size up for a backup size. This dress is comfortable throughout the midsection and fitted at the hips, however it still felt comfortable/had some stretch. It works best for A-C cup sizes, as this dress is fitted at the bust. This style should be worn with a strapless bra. The cut of the dress is asymmetrical and hits just below the knee. I absolutely love the style of this dress, it is super flattering and fun! I would definitely pair it with nude heels (as pictured), a pretty, yet delicate pair of earrings and a statement handbag.
I have an average size body and this fit well

links_reviews_title: gorgeous fit and color, so many compliments
links_reviews_text: this dress has a gorgeous drape and fits beautifully. the arm holes arent too big at all, and the sideboob was tasteful :) i wore it with a pretty ruby pin on the right upper chest instead of a necklace. got so many compliments. would 100% rent again!
Perfect fit and so many compliments!
The dress is made of a scuba type of material that made the dress to fit like a glove. It made my waist look incredibly small and was perfect for my red carpet event.

The dress fits so well! It's stretchy material, super comfortable. I wore a size 8, but I'll be a six would have worked fine, too...the 8 fit wonderfully. I loved that I could wear a bra and that the full skirt fit my curves well. Definitely loved it!!
I love this dress. Easy to wear, comfortable and lots of compliments. It's very bright.
This dress is a stunner. The fabric is luxurious and falls flatteringly. It's tight on top and loose on bottom, perfect for pear shapes. But I'm 5'4 and it was a bit long on me.

Y'all I was feeling a little puffy this weekend and this dress totally gave me my confidence back. The material is pretty thick and does a good job of keeping the girls lifted while the skirt is just full enough to allow you to have second helpings at dinner. I'm sending it back tonight but I can guarantee you I'll rent it again before New Year's
Small on the top. Hard to get on especially if you already did your hair because there's no zipper.
Loved wearing this dress! So flattering. Classic. Stretch material. Did not need a bra, as it was fitted through the bodice. Very comfortable. Felt like a million bucks! Would rent again.

links_reviews_title: I wore this dress for my engagement pictures and I absolutely loved it!
links_reviews_text: This dress fits true to size! I am a size 0 and the 38 fit perfectly. It creates a beautiful shape and is incredibly comfortable. I love that there are no zippers - you just slip it on and go!

I LOVE this dress. Ok. Yes. First of all you NEED to step into this dress so thank you SO MUCH to the reviewer who got it NWT's and educated us all. Do NOT try to put this over your head. Now, that said, if you've got a booty like I do, it may look bleak for a minute there. Trust me, you can do this, pull that baby up. Now, don't your boobs look amazing? So much fun. Felt amazing. Would've bought if I could. Recommend. Pretty TTS but size up if you're worried.

links_reviews_title: Classy dress. Beautiful material. Perfect fit.
links_reviews_text: Step into this dress and pull it up. No bra or shaper garments required. The dress falls beautifully. I rented two dresses for a wedding and I ended up wearing the other one. But I truly wanted to keep this one. It would be great for so many occasions. Lovely but not too fancy. Could go from a wedding to a cocktail party to the Kentucky Derby. I will definitely rent it again.

links_reviews_title: Beautiful fit, fab color, high quality dress!
links_reviews_text: I love this dress so much, I could easily make this my uniform if I could buy one in every color!

links_reviews_title: Overall, easy to dance in and comfortable. Felt a bit like a pumpkin.
links_reviews_text: I was super excited about this dress because how often do you get to wear an $800 dress! The color is definitely bold and closer to rust orange than red. The fit is tight so I would recommend a size up. Its comfy and easy to dance in. Never had to worry about adjusting myself or the dress. That being said, it was a bit simple. no real wow factor. Overall would not rent again. For curvy girls this will make your hips look bigger but your waist look smaller.

This was a "wow" dress. The fit was pretty much spot on although maybe slightly tight around the ribs (just a smidge). The dress was unfortunately stained when I received it but otherwise I loved this one!
When I first got this dress out of the bag I was not a fan. But after a quick tumble in the dryer to smooth out all the wrinkles, it fit perfectly! Lots of compliments!

links_reviews_title: Liked the fit and material but a little long
links_reviews_text: I liked the fit and the material. The color was awesome and it was a super fun dress. I'm 5'4 and the dress fell at that awkward length where the widest part of my calves is. It'd probably be great and look amazing on someone slightly taller
This dress is a show stopper. Very form fitting. There is no zipper so I would recommend getting your true size. I didn't want to give this one back! Looks a little more red than orange.
Perfect fit, extremely comfortable and got lots of compliments
This dress was incredibly comfortable and I got tons of compliments. Photographs red but is more orange in person.

I felt so confident and comfortable in this dress! was complimented by so many people too! I let everyone know about how awesome RTR is :) My favorite part was how it gave me boobs! :) And the twirl of the dress was so fun!

links_reviews_title: Everyone loved the dress and it was incredibly flattering
links_reviews_text: The dress was very form fitting on the top, but in a flattering way. I was worried the skirt was a little too long (about mid-calf) but it ended up looking great with heels and I got a ton of compliments on it all evening!

links_reviews_title: Got this for forat dress fitting for my wedding.
links_reviews_text: Fiance calls it. Princess dress. Fots great looks great could maybe do size up. Anug through the chest amd im rather small chested. Accentuates my hips but overall i love it!!

links_reviews_title: Love this dress, but a little long for 5'3"
links_reviews_text: Very flattering and 10/10 twirl factor. Wore a camisole underneath since it was a little too much cleavage for work. But great dress.

links_reviews_title: Not quite what I expected, but still cute
links_reviews_text: Color was more of a dark coral and fabric is cheaper than it looks in the picture. But the fit was cute and skirt was twirly! I loved the pleats!
Another great dress by Ciarra Bonani. It's scuba material and falls perfectly.
Striking color and so comfortable! The material is light and has stretch and is very flattering- loved this dress and received so many compliments!

links_reviews_title: Perfect dress for a summer wedding
links_reviews_text: This dress fit like a glove. It was so comfortable, flattering and didn't even require a bra for me (and I'm pretty busty and nursing). The material is thick and stretchy and the cut highlighted my assets and hid my postpartum belly. I would rent this dress again happily.
Thick material

links_reviews_title: Incredible customer service and speedy delivery
links_reviews_text: I received my first dress and second style several days before planned. Sadly, neither of those looks worked out (too small/not flattering fit) and it was just days until my event. I was able to get replacement dresses in time for my event and I fell in love with this one! I got so many compliments and felt so amazing, I didn't want to take it off! It was so easy to put on with no fussy zippers, it made my first RTR experience amazing

links_reviews_title: Wore out to a matinee theater performance
links_reviews_text: Love the scuba fabric that hugs your body. 40 fit me perfectly. Requires no bra and creates a great waist and silhouette. Pull it over your head and put on deodorant after you put it on. Also available in pink.
The color is a gorgeous orange red and the flares skirt is amazing. The cut is super flattering. Didn't need a bra thanks to stretchy thick fabric. So many compliments!

links_reviews_title: The dress fit perfectly and I got several compliments that night!
links_reviews_text: It's a beautiful dress and color! It is a bit difficult to get on because there are no zippers, but once it's on it's very comfortable.
So beautiful. Usually a 6 (got a 42). Would order again and may do a 44!
Loved this dress - wore it to a Derby party. The color is vibrant and amazing. There is a lot of fabric in the skirt. But overall this was really flattering and stood out. Love!

I was pleasantly surprised with this dress. I rented this for my graduation. There are no zippers, so you have to pull it over your head, but the stretch in the dress makes it comfortable. I consider myself a bit "busty" and the dress amplifies your boobs quite a bit. The material is almost that of a thick swimsuit. I liked it so much I wore it out to the club. I'd wear it again.

links_reviews_title: Super flattering but is tricky to get on
links_reviews_text: Loved this dress, very flattering and comfortable. Only cons are that it's very tricky to squeeze on but once you do holds everything in place. Also quite plunging so might not be suitable for a very formal event (I wore nippies). Beautiful tomato red/orange color. I wore with a lilac colored Mackage handbag (also RtR).

Rented this for our Easter party and despite receiving multiple compliments I found that it wasn't very flattering (on me) in photos. Per usual, this brand did not disappoint in the areas of quality, construction and design and the scuba material does a great job of hiding ones flaws. Also, per usual for this brand- no zippers so you MUST STEP INTO THE DRESS AND PULL IT UP. Zero chance -unless you're a contortionist- anyone could get this on pulling it over their head. For reference I'm 5'11", 175, 36/38DD.

links_reviews_title: No zipper + Hip accentuating, but I still love it!
links_reviews_text: Stretchy, think material. Not advisable for those with larger breasts. I did not wear a bra and even with my small breasts, it was tight and there was a bit of boob muffin-top. Also, without a zipper, it may be difficult to pull on, so be warned. A great color and wrinkle resistant.

Love this ballerina skirt, thick scuba material. Top is snug - larger chested women keep in mind. I tend to be a 4-6 depending on the brand and a 42 fit perfect. Worn for Easter Brunch but great for spring wedding season

links_reviews_title: Super comfortable, got a lot of complements, great material.
links_reviews_text: Good material

Beautiful material, fit perfect. Decided to wear this rather than my first choice. Only downfall is that it is short. I had to wear flats with it or it would've been too short. Would rent again for a more casual affair with the flats.
The top was a little big and had to use fashion tape to secure it.

Rented for rehearsal dinner. The top and body fit perfectly (I have a smaller bust and the strapless top fit well despite my usual concerns about slipping.) The pants are on the longer side but worked well when paired with a tall heel.

Amanda Uprichard never fails - simplicity, elegance, great quality every time! I wore this to a rehearsal dinner and felt I could have dressed it up or down. Though the small was slimming and flattering, I'd probably size up to the medium if you plan on eating and drinking a lot in this dress, started to feel tighter throughout the night. The zipper in the back also makes it hard to go to the bathroom without a zippering partner. Overall it's a yes!
This was my second choice, but I really liked it. I'm usually a size 6, and this fit well. I'm 5' 8". If I was any taller, I think it would have been a little short. I wore flats.

I loooooved this jumpsuit. I ordered the XSL and the SR because the SL was not available for this weekend. The XSL was soooo tight. I usually wear a 00, but for this the small would have been more comfortable. But I couldn't wear the small because I am 5'6" and needed the longer jumpsuit because the regular was too short. I ordered two replacements that came in time but were too big for me to wear, so I decided to squeeze my tummy into the XSL and although breathing was a lil rough, this was so comfy and it stayed up so well and I loved how it flowed. My boyfriend loves it so much he wants to buy me the Small Long size! 10/10. This was my first RTR and it could not have gone any better, I am so sold. Amazing customer service!
I couldn't breathe because it was really tight on the bust line.

The fit was a little tight. I loved that it hugged my chest and I felt well supported, however that meant everything else was slightly tight on me. Overall, I received many compliments and was enjoyed wearing it for a night.

links_reviews_title: I loved this jumpsuit, it fit so well and looked expensive. I would definitely rent again
links_reviews_text: This jumpsuit fit very well, and the material had a bit of a stretch which made it very comfortable. I"m 5'9" and glad I ordered a ML.

I ordered the medium long and it was a bit shorter than I wanted. I'm 5'8 almost 5'9 and I had to wear flats or it would've been too short. I loved the fit though and it was comfortable, I wasn't pulling it up all night and I got tons of compliments!

links_reviews_title: I wore this to my fianc√©s law prom - great choice! Got so many compliments!!
links_reviews_text: I'm 5'6 (add a few more inches for heels) and the MR was still too long. I had to use hem tape/pins to make the jump suit work.

links_reviews_title: Love this / can't go Wrong w a black strapless jumpsuit
links_reviews_text: I think I'll buy this ;) I'm curvy and this showed my shape nicely . Easy to wear , no fuss , just zip and go . I'm still a hippie child of the 70's and love a jumpsuit . No bra, no shapewear . Pic doesn't do it justice. I'm about 5 6 1/2 and I can wear a lower heal - it's not long enough for my 3 inch or higher shoes . It's been worn a bit because the elastic in the top to keep it up is a little stretched : if I buy it I'll have it tailored . Oh- I'm long waisted , too, and this did not ride up my bum .

links_reviews_title: Did not end up wearing. A bit too big.
links_reviews_text: I maybe could have gotten away with this if I wore a padded bra instead of braless. The XSL was a touch too tight for comfort and too short. The SL was a bit baggy. Because it is black maybe could have gotten away with the bagginess but I decided to wear my backup which was another jumpsuit.
Fabric feels expensive and the fit was perfect for me. I dressed it down with a shrug and sneakers but it could easily be worn in place of an LBD.

links_reviews_title: This outfit is so comfortable, it's like fancy pajamas!
links_reviews_text: I've never worn jumpsuits because I never thought they would work for my body type, but I decided "What the heck?" and went for this one. The fit was perfect! I don't have a strapless bra but it turns out, I don't need one. The strapless top feels 100% secure. And I love the roominess of the pant legs. I have muscular legs and let's just say, pants are a problem...but no problems here. I rented this for an event / party and with the right necklace and hair, it's going to be perfect. Would definitely rent again.
The top part is a little too tight but anyways it worked perfectly and received many compliments
I am normally a small but I fit better in the medium so size up!
Amazing fit, comfortable, chic and timeless. Loved it

I LOVED this jumpsuit. It was comfortable and just looked gorgeous on! I'm a size 2 and the small fit perfect. I sized down for my backup, and the XS was way too small. So I would say it's true to size. I'm 5'1 and wore 4 inch heels and the length was perfect. It's a very flattering fit. You can dress it up or down, so it's perfect for any event. I wore it out to my birthday dinner and paired it with a sweater and it was perfect.
I wore this for a NYE party at a friends house and go sooo many compliments. I love the weight and feel of the fabric, it makes your feel supported while allowing for floweyness in the legs.

links_reviews_title: Trendy look and really great alternative to a dress
links_reviews_text: It does run small. I am 5'2 and 104lbs... if I had been at my higher weight (sometimes I am around 110 when my weight fluctuates) I don't think I would be have been able to zip it up my ribcage.
I am usually a bit short for dresses/jumpsuits, but the petite size fit perfectly. It was a too tight to wear with a bra, but that was fine. Overall would recommend, very classy.
Great quality of fabric but I could not zip up. The chest area was quite small, if you are a C cup or bigger this one is tough.

links_reviews_title: have worn this to 3 different events and I never repeat rentals--absolutely love it! easy chic
links_reviews_text: tight in the bodice but can be good because stays up? loved everything about it

5'7" and the MR was perfect length with 3in wedges. Wore for a work event, perfect since it did not show too much. Wore M, but usually wear a S. No give in the fabric so possibly size up if in between.

Pro: stylish Cons: the top fit like a corset and then pushed my lower belly out. The length was much shorter than I expected, I was anticipating a long leg like featured in some photos but I might have overlooked length.

links_reviews_title: Fun outfit, but unfortunately gapped at the bust
links_reviews_text: This outfit was so fun! It fit my lower body very well but gapped away from my chest. I could not figure out a way to close the gap, so I could not wear it. This will look amazing on the right proportions.

CT - not a cute look! Would have been super cute and easy to wear had it been longer in the torso. I never know with jumpsuits, but do struggle with the torso length due to a smaller size. Overall otherwise the size was great as well as length in pants. Small probably would have been fine for the torso, but then a bit too big every where else.
x

links_reviews_title: This runs small. I ordered the medium and had to return it. Then tried large and could not zip it up
links_reviews_text: Too small for anyone with a large chest.

I could have worn this, but I wanted a better fit and something more noteworthy. Top didn't feel secure enough without a bra, but with a bra felt too thick for summer. Snug in some places and too loose in others - maybe boning/more structure would have helped. Hips were too snug for a big meal event or to wear without shapewear, and that would have been too hot for summer. Sent back for something I could wear with more comfort and confidence.

links_reviews_title: Stretched out, easy to wear cut
links_reviews_text: Rubber band at chest stretched out. So, fabric slouched around lower chest/upper abdomen. Would not be able to wear due to this except it was black so not as noticeable. This probably needs to be retired from rotation due to general wear. Fabric difficult to iron. Steamer wouldn't get wrinkles out. Wide leg cut flattering and easy to wear. Easy to zip up back by myself.

links_reviews_title: Loved it. I'm long in the body so jump suits usually don't work for me. This one did :)
links_reviews_text: Fit great. I'm an 34A and the top stayed up without a problem. Got lots of complements.

links_reviews_title: It was too short in the rise, and pant length so unfortunately I returned it.
Very comfortable, perfect fit and style. Works for any occasion. Lots of compliments.
links_reviews_text: True to size love the wide legs.

This is very elegant and fits pretty true to size. The one thing I would say that's large is the bust. I typically wouldn't wear a bra with something like this, but it kind of sticks out and looks silly without some padding underneath.
Fit great and very comfortable!

links_reviews_title: Cute but runs a size small
links_reviews_text: Order one size up

links_reviews_title: Too short in the torso, could not wear
links_reviews_text: Too short
Looked cute, but too short!

This dress doesn't seem like much on the hanger but it is super cute once you put it on. The sleeves and ruffle on the bottom add so much to it. It is comfortable and you will get lots of compliments.
I loved the material and classiness of this dress
Dress was a hit! Flowy, light weight, and beautifully colored navy! Fun big sleeves! Adorable ruffles on the bottom!
This dress is so flattering and easy to wear. Love it. The elastic on the sleeves is a little tight.
Needed a dress for a very conservative ceremony. Felt pretty and fun while also appropriate.

I love pretty much all Halston Heritage and this was no exception. This easy shift has great visual interest thanks to the detailing on the billowy sleeves and ruffle hem. It's cool and great for Spring days. I paired with tights for a cool day and cooler office, but it would look great with sandals or heels.
This dress is super cute and easy to wear. Does run short so paired with tights for work. Beautiful blue color and cute ruffle and sleeve. Would definitely rent again.

links_reviews_title: I got so many compliments wearing this dress to work!
links_reviews_text: Very comfortable

links_reviews_title: Gorgeous quality, fit is as shown
links_reviews_text: Yes, this runs slightly large. I typically wear a size 4, but I wore a size 2 in this dress. Very relaxed fit. Great sleeves. Super comfortable. Able to wear all regular under garments. Perfect thanksgiving dress!

links_reviews_title: Pretty royal blue color; otherwise shapeless dress
links_reviews_text: Looked like a potato sack on me, and the sleeves were borderline too puffy. The detail on the hem was fun, I may have benefited from sizing down, but don't know if the chest would've been tight (I'm very busty). Material was nice, wish it fit better

links_reviews_title: My favorite dress I have ever rented
links_reviews_text: This dress is so classy and perfect for work. It is very flowy but it works well. I have rented this dress multiple times and I always get so many compliments. The color pairs well with so many shoes and it is a very comfortable dress.

links_reviews_title: Such a flattering dress, and a beautiful color!
links_reviews_text: This dress was a hit at a tea-themed bridal shower I attended. So comfy, and the color is beautiful.

I sized down since this dress is clearly flowy without a defined waist. Great choice on my part. It was really pretty. Although conservative, it was still sexy enough because of the length. I wore with black tights and black boots. Pair with a nice statement necklace for a great look.
This is such a cute dress! I loved the color. It was a little short though.
This was a backup dress sent when my first choice was unavailable. I was skeptical of the ruffle and the larger sleeves, but it is really cute on, not too short, and looked really cute with a belt.

Perfect for work! Wore it with black tights. I'm usually between a 4-6 and I'm really glad I went with the 4, it's very roomy and I think the 6 would have been way too big. Will definitely rent again!
This dress was nice for work but can transition to evening. It is roomy and not form fitting in any way, but I would rent again
Great color, very roomy fit but great design detail makes it look very polished and flattering. The sleeves add a great statement. This works for work and a night out -

I know that this style dress doesn't look great on my body type but I can sometimes make it work with a belt, wand I was able to do that here. High quality like all Halston dresses, but didn't feel as special as some of the others. Very short even on my 5'3" frame.
I love this dress. I plan to rent it again soon and buy it. It is a beautiful blue and will work for work or a night out. Or even something more formal.

Super comfy... The shoulder was a little small for me but the the I wore it was like windy so I wore it with a light jacket so it didn't matter.. but I think that would bother me about this dress on a warm day.
This dress is fantastic. The sleeves and hem give it great movement. The fit was perfect. I wore this to work and got tons of compliments.
This dress was a nice fabric, however it just hung on me and was not very flattering.

links_reviews_title: Lovely but didn't end up wear
links_reviews_text: Great dress just didn't end up wearing it
loose flowy

I loved this dress! It is so flattering, and the color is very pretty. I wore for work while I was traveling, and it does not wrinkle! This could be worn pregnant or not and still be very flattering. I wore at 25 weeks pregnant and could easily keep wearing for some time.

links_reviews_title: Intense navy color and accent sleeves.
links_reviews_text: A bit short for work.
There's details in the dress you can't see in the pictures that make it even cuter. Material is great, super comfy and light weight. Color is amazing.
Loved this dress. Got a lot of compliments

links_reviews_title: GREAT DRESS! Fit is cute and flouncy. May run a tad big, but I enjoyed feeling comfortable!
links_reviews_text: Wore this for a photoshoot and pictures turned out wonderful!
Really comfortable. Short which makes it sexier. My husband loved it. Great color. Can dress it up or down. Wore to a baby shower, date night, and work.

links_reviews_title: Cute but a little short in length and sleeves for tall girls!
links_reviews_text: Cute but a little short in length and sleeves for tall girls! Not 100% comfortable for work without tights...
fits well, loose but in a flattering way. I went a size up but could have worn true to size
Its a great dress you can dress it up or down , tights no tights etc really versatile and very comfortable

links_reviews_title: Perfectly flattering when trying to conceal early baby bump!
links_reviews_text: Lovely dress that is super cute. Fits true to size and thankfully not too short! I'm 10weeks preggo and not quite ready to tell work my big news, and this was loose enough to not show my bump, but also look flattering and lovely. Loved it!
I love Halston but this dress is a shapeless bag and looks super cheap.
Great
Loved the way this dress felt on. The small pleated hem was perfect. Wore this multiple times to work, events and out.
The dress fit perfectly, and the style allowed for movement. I wore this dress to tea and a baby shower and felt comfortable and fancy.
I'm 6'0 and it was long enough for me not to feel uncomfortable, but short enough to be sassy. Paired with chunky red heels - great party dress. The blue is more purple than navy... but it worked.
Light, cotton material. Really lovely
Fit great, kept me looking chic all day through lunch meetings to art show to dinner with friends. Fun dress to accessorize.
Very thin- no lining. Seriously a great fit and comfortable. Love it.

links_reviews_title: Amazing dress for a friend's wedding! Got a lot of compliments :)
links_reviews_text: I usually wear between a 6-8, so having a backup size available for a one-time rental was definitely a game-changer since the 6 was a bit too tight. The material of the dress is very sturdy, and the dress also has POCKETS! I received many compliments about this dress at my friend's wedding, and the style of the dress is also super flattering.

This dress was INCREDIBLE. It fit like a glove and the cut at the waist was super flattering. I'm small cheated and didn't need to wear a bra which is always a plus for me. Dress is super light material (with pockets) so it was perfect for a hot summer wedding

links_reviews_title: Was holding this for the right occasion - glad I did!
links_reviews_text: Agree with other reviewers that it was hard to zip but once it was on it felt fabulous. A little lighter material than expected so watch those westerly winds or maybe wear shorts underneath.
LOVED this dress!!! I'm normally an 8, per other reviews went with a 10 and was so glad I did. I have big hips and this dress highlighted my smaller waist so I felt ah-mazing! Size up, it's worth it.
Fit perfectly true to size. Very fun dress, lots of compliments, and pockets!

Order the size that will fit your chest the best. For instance I have a 35" bust and 28" waist and the size 4 fit me perfectly. I will say the hook and eye was a bit challenging to get hooked by myself but once I got it, zipping up was no problem. Really loved wearing this dress, such a cute comfortable fit!!
Tip is very small. Dress was beautiful but for a small chested woman.
Super cute

links_reviews_title: Gorgeous dress - RTR please get it in the new season's color!
links_reviews_text: I read a lot of reviews before renting this dress, because I was worried about the sizing. I have a 34-35" bust and 26-27" waist, and the 4 was too big on me in the waist (the only area it is fitted). Next time, I would go down to a 2. But I am rather unique in having a fairly 'super pear' shape. Regardless, the dress was gorgeous, super flattering, and very comfortable - pockets!! I got tons of compliments. Would recommend - just be careful on the sizing.
Didn't fit around my chest, never wore it

Rented this for an afternoon summer wedding. The cut and length were perfect: Not too revealing but still fun. I thought it ran a little large in the bust, and ended up using double-sided tape to keep it from gaping. You may also want to tape down the ruffles, as they have a tendency to blow upwards when moving or if it's windy.

links_reviews_title: Great Fun Summer Wedding Dress with Pockets
links_reviews_text: This dress was a great fit for the event and I was so glad with how light weight it was as it was a really hot day. The biggest bonus - pockets.
Perfect fit, perfect dress. I wore it for a rehearsal dinner and got lots of compliments. The fabric itself has a more casual texture, but the cut dresses it up.

I found this more casual than I expected. It's just an unlined cotton sundress. It's cute and was easy to wear, but i ended up wearing it to a brunch instead of the event I had planned. I also sized up per other reviews and felt it wasn't necessary.
Beautiful. Has zero stretch.

links_reviews_title: Fun but runs a little small
links_reviews_text: Will size up next time.

links_reviews_title: Beautiful Dress. If you're over a C-cup it's TRUE TO SIZE
links_reviews_text: The other reviews misled me into ordering a 4 instead of my ordinary 6. The smaller size was fine in the waist (though I suspect the 6 would have been fine as well), but the 4 was hard to zip up over my 34 Ds and committed the egregious sin of "boob squoosh" according to my hubby... lol. Anyway, don't size down if your girls are bigger than Cs--your boobs will thank you.

links_reviews_title: Don't size up it was too big. :(
links_reviews_text: This dress is fabulous. Between all of the reviewers warning to size up and RTR's recommendations when ordering, I listened and ordered the 10, but I need the 8. I had to send this beautiful dress back unworn. :(. Order your size unless you have a large rib cage or chest. My problem area was at the chest on the strapless side. It gapped a few inches and I was afraid if I moved incorrectly my bra (or more) could end up falling out.

This first me perfect. I am curvy and it accentuated my waist. Love love love the pockets. Wore it to a baby shower. Could easily have wore it to a wedding. Got lots of compliments. Want to keep it but have nothing else I can wear it to. Will definitely order again.
If you have a bigger bust size, this dress will not zip up. Overall, would have loved the wear the dress. Great quality, different style, and POCKETS! Will try a bigger size.
I'm a 12/14 and this wasn't close to zipping. Such a bummer.

Originally got a 2, which is my usual size in a-line dresses, and I could zip up but not wear a bra and not breath. So I switched to a 4, which is still on the right side, probably would have even been okay with a 6. There is no give whatsoever. If you have a larger chest, probably not the dress for you or size way up. Dress is super flattering and worth it. It makes my waist look teeny. I basically look for excuses to wear it and never want to return.

highly highly recommend. i'm typically a 2/4 and the 2 fit perfect. no bra needed. a touch tight in the bust, but i'm busty. no stretch at waist, but flows right after. love the one shoulder. nvr felt like i was going to fall out. gorgeous pattern, doesn't wrinkle, light enough to wear in summer, but wld work for fall/spring, too. hem hit around the knees. cannot recommend this enough!

links_reviews_title: Perfect Dress for a Summer Outdoor Wedding‚Ä¶ Compliments Galore!
links_reviews_text: I ended up wearing the 12R. I‚Äôm regularly between sizes 8 and 10 ‚Äì however, this dress fit extra snug in the ribcage area ‚Äì leaving the 12R sort of tight too. The dress is comfortable, flowing, hits just below the knee and it has pockets ‚Äì love pockets on dresses. The one shoulder was the icing on the cake, making the dress every bit elegant. The dress is black and if you see blue in this dress, it‚Äôs only in some of the flower patterns. I opted out on wearing a bra, wanted the upper portion of the dress to be as loose as I could get it. Lastly, I‚Äôm still not a fan on the side zipper and definitely not with this dress, needed help zipping it up. Loved this dress, even though it was slightly tight in the mid-section. Extremely comfortable, cotton material, flowing and perfect all around.

I rented this for everyday and that was a mistake: I ended up spotting it on someone else later at a country wedding and, despite the fabric, it really makes more sense in that kind of daytime formal setting. The dress runs small and honestly might look a little dumpy if you have any curves. All the frills and fabric were a little too busy on my 5'4 frame, but if you happen to be tall and skinny like the model in the picture it would probably look really cute!!

I was really excited to wear this dress to a summer wedding. The fabric was lighter than I expected, and it has pockets. Generally, the shape was flattering, but the neckline did not work for me. Though it fit perfectly everywhere else, I struggled to get it zipped over my chest. I am not that busty (36C). Once zipped, my chest was bulging out over the strapless side. Not flattering. I think this might be lovely on someone with a smaller chest.

links_reviews_title: Size up. Fabric more casual than I anticipated.
links_reviews_text: Love love love the lines of this dress but wasn't able to wear as i couldn't get it to zip around my ribs (I have a broad chest and shoulders). I'm usually closer to a 4 in dresses, and was taking a chance with the 2, especially since the fabric has no give. Based on the unzippable gap, I'm guessing I have to go up to a 6. If you're on the fence, size up. Also note, the pattern and lines are beautiful, but the fabric seems like a cotton and is more casual than I expected. Light and airy though. Arrived with some wrinkles than would easily steam out, but I would be worried that it would wrinkle pretty easily with wear. Still might try again in a larger size on this one.
Absolutely gorgeous fabric and style. I ordered the size 10, my usual size, and it's WAY TOO SMALL in the bust. Couldn't even zip it. Weird sizing.

Really nice material and loved that it had pockets, but way too tight throughout rib cage. I couldn't zip it up. I think it's because I have broad shoulders, but I'm a 34 bust and got an 8 and couldn't zip it up past my waist. I'm disappointed - I should have grabbed a size 10.

links_reviews_title: If it wasn't $1100-- I would have to buy this
links_reviews_text: This fits sooooo well. OMG, I LOVE it. One of my favorite rentals thus far

links_reviews_title: Perfect for a day at the museum! I definitely could've sized down. Tons of compliments
links_reviews_text: Cute

Easy jumpsuit to put on and take off (bathroom run friendly). The front is a bit low so it may be better to use some fashion tape. Love the ruffle sleeves and the fact that it has pockets. I paired it with a belt because I felt it was a little loose hanging without something at the middle. If I had a bigger chest maybe it wouldn't be an issue.
The fit was good, although with me being small chested, I had to tape the front from gaping.
Great piece that I wore to two weddings this weekend! It's definitely low cut so I would recommend a pin or fashion tape but it's super comfortable and cute.

links_reviews_title: Fun to wear to as the hostess!
links_reviews_text: I wore this great jumpsuit at my annual Kentucky derby party. It was easy to wear, easy to move around in, and still looked great all day. It could have used some fashion tape at the bust as it is pretty low cut but I managed to make it work. Loved it!

So cute, comfortable and effortless. I felt very put-together in this super easy jumpsuit. I love how I'll be able to wear it different ways: heels, sandals, casual, dressy. The V opening is a bit low cut and hangs open, but nothing that some tape or a cami can't fix. Loved it so much I bought it!

links_reviews_title: I was able wear the jumpsuit with flip flops and wedges!
links_reviews_text: I have a larger breasts so I needed to use fabric tape to keep the top part closed
Low cut, comfortable, good quality, light weight
This outfit rules. It's super comfy and very flattering. I pinned the top this time, but it worked open as well. The wrap gives it a great shape to complete the outfit

links_reviews_title: Awesome comfortable jumpsuit for daytime wedding
links_reviews_text: Rented this for a daytime wedding and it was great! The neckline is really low and I thought too risqu√© for daytime so I wore a tank underneath. The elastic waistband made it easy to take on and off and the fabric was really comfortable. Will definitely rent again!

Wore to an afternoon Bar Mitzvah. It was perfect for the occasion. So comfortable. Wasn't too low cut. Had pockets. Great color. Received tons of compliments. Easy to get on and off (in restroom) as there are no zippers so going to restroom was pretty easy.
I LOVED this jumpsuit. So cute, comfortable and flattering. It is low cut, so if you aren't looking for cleavage, might not be the right choice (unless you wanna wear a bralette). Love this!
