I rented this for a baby shower. Super comfy yet looked great! Received many compliments. Fits well. Loose in cleavage area as others mentioned but an easy fix with safety pin or cami underneath. Very slimming and flattering

links_reviews_title: Loved this romper, it was perfect for the party I went to.
links_reviews_text: Top was a little big but I paired with the right bra and it worked! Loved this fun romper for a SXSW event.

links_reviews_title: Felt glamorous at an opera matinee!
links_reviews_text: So thankful that jumpsuits have made a comeback! Nowadays, though, instead of the polyester flash of the 70s, jumpsuits are made with sophistication in mind. The navy blue was a lovely flattering tone and with the belt cinched, the jumpsuit hugged all the right places. I am considerably shorter than the model, so the outfit came down to right above my ankles (the model has the jumpsuit stopping right below her knees), but paired with my white mules, the length was totally fine. The front does open a bit and left me wishing I had pinned it since fashion tape didn't last long. I had originally ordered the 3x which is my typical size but given the stretchy, forgiving jersey material, a 2x fit better.

Fits just as you would expect! True to size. I'm 5'6" and The length hit my lower shin/ankle. The belt came in a separate bag which I didn't find until I sent it back so make sure you look through the entire shipping bag! I pinned the top part closed because, as other reviewers said, it can be a bit exposed.

links_reviews_title: Exactly what I was looking for
links_reviews_text: Wore it to my college ring ceremony and it was perfect!

links_reviews_title: Told I looked like I was on stilts...
links_reviews_text: Deep V (which I taped to my bra) was fine for the occasion. Because of the high waistline and my already longer legs for a short person, my friend kept pointing out that I looked like I'm on stilts. She was (kind of!) joking and I (kind of) took it as a compliment.

I didn't want to return this one! Wore to my friends rehearsal dinner and was so comfortable all night. Very flattering. L fit but went with the XL for extra room since it was outside in Houston during the summer. definitely would buy!
This jumpsuit rocks - will likely rent again in a smaller size. Many compliments and so comfortable, I loved it so much I may purchase if I can rent the correct size again.

links_reviews_title: First jumpsuit ever did not disappoint!
links_reviews_text: Loved this jumpsuit! It was lightweight and comfortable. I did have to safety pin the top because it's low cut and i don't have a lot up top. I paired with some sparkly earrings and cute shoes and it worked perfectly for a cocktail wedding.
Fit great! So comfortable and lots of compliments!

I rented this for a bridal shower and it just didn't fit right on me because of my height. The plunging neck line was too much for the event. I couldn't find the right shoes to wear with it because the hem got my ankle and the pant legs are very much a gaucho style pant leg. My romper was also missing the belt. I think this would've fit better if it didn't have pockets because they made my hips look huge. Really cute but just not for me!

Wore this while presenting at a leadership event. Comfy and great fit. No compliments which is always a bummer. I wore a tank underneath and also pinned the wrap to keep the girls tucked inside. Needing a pin made it even harder to undo for bathroom breaks. Regardless of no compliments, I thought it fit well and it made me feel good.
did not end up wearing - ran super big and was not that flattering. Maybe will try to rent in smaller size. color was nice and the style of the sleeves were cute.
I wore this for family beach photos. It's so comfortable and super cute! Fit true to size, did have to safety pin the top so the girls would stay in. Would definitely own!

Loved this jumpsuit! So comfy and received many compliments! Only complaint is that the front didn't have any sort of button or anything to stay closed so I had to safety pin it (due to my lack of boobs) other than that it was amazing!!!

links_reviews_title: Super comfy and perfect for a work convention!
links_reviews_text: Fit was great! I did have to pin the chest area since it was for work but I would have left it otherwise. Definitely would rent again.

I'm 2 months pp and needed something comfortable, fancy, post-baby bod friendly, and easy to feed in! This did the job WONDERFULLY. I got so many compliments all night. There's lots of room in bust, and the crop length is perfect. I did have to pin the top closed for some modesty but I will definitely rent again. I probably could have worn a small, so if you're in between sizes or have a smaller bust, I'd size down.

Very cute jumpsuit, fit well and I got a lot of compliments but a couple things made it difficult. As other reviews have said the top is big and cuts low, I had to pin to not be showing my low cut bra. Also it is very hard to get off and on, I almost dislocated my shoulder when I had to pee. Also I hate the way rtr tags the belt, twice I had someone tell me my "tag" was showing as the belt moved around a lot.
I had to wear this with a cami underneath, as it was not appropriate for work otherwise. But it was comfortable and cute.

Loved wearing this jumpsuit! If I rented again I would size down. I had to pin this in the bust because the girls kept falling out. I think even in a size down I'd need fashion tape or pins for the bust. This is comfortable and so cute on. I'll rent again in the size down.

links_reviews_title: Loved the outfit! Fit perfect for my 20th high school reunion!
links_reviews_text: Loved the outfit! Lots of compliments. I did have to safety pin the top closed but was easy to do and not noticeable.

Love the color, fit and length. The wrap top opening needs a hidden snap/hook closure. Gapes open so much! Even though I had a cute new bra on, I didn't want to show the whole office. Had to wear something to fill the gap since I didn't want to use a safety pin.
Love this. I have rented it multiple times. Wore it for work then out. I would definitely recommend it

links_reviews_title: Loved it---have to pin the top, though!
links_reviews_text: I really loved this jumper-everyone said I should keep it. I did wear the heck out of it for the time I had it, it was so comfy and worked beautifully. Even easy to slip in/out of to go to the bathroom (I hate that part of jumpers!) I don't see how anyone could wear this without pinning it at the chest. I definitely had to, I am not sure why it doesn't come with a hook and loop or button. But it is a great outfit!

links_reviews_title: Comfortable, loose and wide-legged, pretty ruffled jumpsuit
links_reviews_text: I wore this to work and it was great for a casual day with no meetings. I think the ruffles give the jumpsuit enough oomph to be deemed pretty and not just comfy clothes although it's definitely more on the comfy side!! The length was good for me to wear with 2-3" wedge heels.
the jumper is cute but definitely low cut. i'm a D cup and it was still too much for me.

Dress this up or down! Fabric has plenty of stretch, and does run a bit large at the bust. The belt has a tiny RTR barcode right in the middle which ends up on your back (upper waist) once tied, and it kept folding over, which I had to constantly fix to avoid someone spotting it. :/ other than that, it's a great piece!

Got so many compliments! I wore it to a graduation ceremony and to a girls brunch! It's cute and comfy and true to size! I did safety pin the top but you could easily wear a bralette or cute cami under it too!

links_reviews_title: Wore for my bridal shower and got tons of compliments!
links_reviews_text: It fit very well, was a tad big in the top so it was gaping when I sat down to open gifts. Would 10/10 wear again though! I loved it.
Wore this to a white party in Dallas! Just gorgeous

links_reviews_title: Very see-through and runs both small and large in different places
links_reviews_text: I ended up just wearing this for work, not as formal as I thought. It fit tight in the body and was see through, and then the arms were HUGE! Had to tie the straps.

links_reviews_title: Perfect dress for a white party!
links_reviews_text: Fun dress that easily transitions from day to evening. The top of the dress is really interesting and elevates the whole look. The fabric feels light but is surprisingly heavy enough to keep the bottom from flying up in the wind. Note the top is a smaller fit, it worked for me, but I am a 30 A and didn't wear a bra. Also worth noting that the sleeves are pretty restricting, not uncomfortable but if you are planning on dancing it could be annoying.

Pretty dress!! However, the spaghetti strap is crazy long and the whole thing fits kind of weird. I just wore it for my graduation photos and I think it photographs well, but if I had worn it to an actual event it would have been a pain. Pretty, but not particularly comfortable and a weird fit!

links_reviews_title: First time I did not have a good Rtr experience
links_reviews_text: This dress fit funny on me. It scrunched at the torso, wrinkled easily, the strap was too long. If you're not a busty woman I don't recommend. I liked it because of the unique cut but not flattering on me
I felt like a princess in this dress, it's absolutely gorgeous
Dress fits great and I love the white. Arms are a bit tough to move around. Very light weight!

links_reviews_title: Perfect Summer Rodeo Concert Dress! LOVED!
links_reviews_text: This dress was a stunning white- I got so many compliments on it. Perfect fit. Very fun for a night out at our summer rodeo kickoff concert paired with Black Tassled Cowgirl Boots! Highly recommend

Running true to size but with no stretch, I recommend sizing up for your backup size to allow for arm and and waist movement. This style is fitted throughout chest and natural waist. The skirt is loose leaving comfortable room for hips. The dress hit at knee length. This dress should be worn with a strapless bra but will work for all cup sizes!

links_reviews_title: Mother's Day Dress- Cute, but fit was a little off
links_reviews_text: The straps were really long. I was running late and did not have time to pin them, so you can see how it falls on my shoulder in the picture. It fit well otherwise and was a very cute and fun style that everyone loved.

links_reviews_title: A lot going on on top
links_reviews_text: Wore this for Mother's Day, but wasn't in love with it. It was too much on top for my short and petite frame. Would look better on someone taller with a small chest!

links_reviews_title: Versitile dress for day or night, casual or fancy
links_reviews_text: Great for a casual day outfit and can easily be dressed up for a formal evening. Versitile dress! Perfect! True to size, comfortable and easy to wear. Loved it. Got compliments from everyone.
very cute

links_reviews_title: I ordered a M which was a 4-6 which fit but it was snug.
links_reviews_text: The dress has the strangest fit. The strap on the right shoulder felt like it should have been 2 inches to the right. It was cute but I decided not to wear it.

links_reviews_title: Couldn't wear this but would have loved to
links_reviews_text: The thin strap is not adjustable and set way too long for me.
Gorgeous but couldn't even put it on!

links_reviews_title: Really small. I'm typically a M/L in dresses and this was no where close to zipping.
links_reviews_text: Really small. I'm typically a M/L in dresses and this was no where close to zipping.

links_reviews_title: Did not end up wearing this dress.
links_reviews_text: It's an OK dress. More casual dress-up than dress-up.

links_reviews_title: Dress got a lot of compliments.
links_reviews_text: Looks great. The strap is a little long but was a great rental.
Cute and casual. Nice for an outdoor summer party. Sadly didnt get to wear it though due to dress arrived damaged.

The dress itself is cute and could be adorable if it fit well. I'm not talking about sizing, it's the strap from the dress that falls off and the chest area is oddly fitting. If you have a XL torso without boobs... it'll be perfect, if not... it's a waste. :( too bad cause the rest of the dress is adorable.
So cute and fits true to size!
The dress is gorgeous, but the sleeves are very small and tight. Also, this dress is very short, if tired to put my arms up the dress would move up showing a little cheeks.
the arms take a little bit of getting used to- they stretch but you don't have 100% mobility. I got lots of compliments - perfect for a hot summer work day.
I did not end up wearing it because it was way too tight on the arms and chest area. Size up by 2 sizes.

links_reviews_title: Didn't wear, not for people with boobs
links_reviews_text: Ridiculously small... I am a 36DDD and my nipples were basically out. I couldn't wear it. Also, a wrinkley material.

links_reviews_title: I didn‚Äôt end up wearing this.
links_reviews_text: Probably my only least favorite among all my rentals here. Just a weird fit and the fabric is quite thin almost close to see through. The fit is a little awkward.

This definitely looks better on the model than it did on me. It felt like too much fabric around the top. The spaghetti strap was also way stretched out so the top portion of the dress fit me poorly. Good length though - about 1 - 2 inches above my knee.
Did not like the fit and fabric was see through. Sleeves/strap too big

links_reviews_title: So much cuter on the model
links_reviews_text: Really bad fit, and thing fabric
5' 8" and 148lbs. Fit perfectly besides the upper rib cage area. Gorgeous dress. Just a little too short for me.
The arm bands are really tight - and I have small arms. You may want to order up.

Wore this dress to a wedding in February that was unseasonably warm! The colored worked well for formalizing it, since the dress itself is kinda plain. Notable plus: it didn't wrinkle much as I drove to the wedding!

When I initially tried this dress on, I was not a fan. It's not very flattering- it's shapeless and made me look larger, especially in the top and shoulders. I ended up adding a belt at the waist for the wedding. It was fine! It's a pretty dress and feels fancy. It definitely wasn't my favorite but I ended up happy and feeling pretty!
This dress was so comfortable and easy to wear. I got so many compliments and wore it in both cold weather with tights and boots and warm weather with nude heels. Biggg fan of the dress!
Because it‚Äôs a swing dress it was generous but that was perfect! Our weather has been crazy and I was glad this was light and airy on a warm night! Loads of complements ‚Äî Thanks RTR!

links_reviews_title: Perfect dress for a very English wedding
links_reviews_text: This dress was beautiful. I am 5' 3" so the length was just to my knees. Plenty of room for dancing and cake and I felt comfortable all night. Went with statement earrings (also RTR) and a fascinator. Got compliments all night.

links_reviews_title: Pretty and flowy, but a lot of fabric
links_reviews_text: Really pretty dress - the sleeves are gorgeous. It fit well in the shoulders, arms, etc., but it was a lot of fabric everywhere else. That can be a good thing, if you are looking to hide problem areas! But I wouldn't say it shows off your figure. That being said, it is super pretty and feminine and I would rent it again.
I wore this with a jean jacket and flat knee boots to dress it down. Comfortable and flowy. Love the classic navy.

links_reviews_title: Nice, but size down if you're small on top
links_reviews_text: Very pretty dress, but I'd size down if you're smaller on your top half. I'm pretty pear shaped, generally an XS on top and a M on bottom. I usually get a small and split the difference, but I definitely could've got an XS in this. Looked a little tent-ish as is. Would definitely consider renting again a size down, though.
Did not wear this because I didn't end up attending the event I ordered it for. Otherwise trying it on it was very cute and fun! Flowy but flattering and work appropriate for sure!

links_reviews_title: loved this. other RTR customers noted it was shapeless. i think it's better on tall people. perfect
links_reviews_text: was perfect for work event - not too dressy, pretty color w blk hosiery and blk heels.

links_reviews_title: Great flow-y dress that is cute but conservative.
links_reviews_text: The neck portion of the dress was a bit stretched out making the dress look slightly sloppy - but other than this detail, dress was very elegant and most importantly, VERY COMFORTABLE to wear.
LOVED it. Fit is loose and flirty. Very comfortable and cool; great for summer/warm days.

links_reviews_title: I felt LUCIOUS in this dress (but in a conservative work way)
links_reviews_text: Wore this for work and felt v swanky and comfortable. Philadelphia summers are pretty volatile and this dress can handle it all! I brightened it up with some pastel pink/nude jewelry and pink mules to make it summery - but this dress is also a great fall/winter choice as well. The color is rich - the material is flowy and beautiful. I am usually a 6 and this looked totally fine - I will probably rent a 4 the next time if it's available (I never say this lol) because it is on the larger side and you won't lose space in the arms/anywhere else bc they are so flowy! But I would rent the 6 again if that was the only thing available.
Unless you are stick-thin, this dress looks maternity-like

links_reviews_title: Not flattering on any body type
links_reviews_text: Looked like I was wearing a navy potato sack. Was not flattering and ran large

links_reviews_title: Too large/unflattering... really wanted to love it though!
links_reviews_text: Great quality and the idea of it was wonderful. However, when I put it on it was very unflattering, boxy and shapeless. Tried putting a belt around the waist to help add shape but then it felt like just too much fabric. Really wanted to like this and wear it but it just did nothing for me.

links_reviews_title: Beautiful fabric and design , loved it !
links_reviews_text: Nice fsbric abd design , elegsnte and chic
Runs big
It was great professional wear for a conference.
I didn't get to wear this bc it was too big. I got this in size 2, but it's a loose fit so needed a 0. I am 5'5" and 130lbs
Looked like a tent very unflattering

This dress is beautiful. Classy, elegant, flattering. It runs large but not short. I wore to a dressy ladies lunch with thigh high gray suede boots to dress it down slightly. Loved it. Will rent again.
This dress was and easy dress to throw on and go with some high boots. Very comfortable. Loved the sleeves.
There is a lot of material on this dress. I am Tall and I felt it was too long too. I looked pregnant!

i'm typically a 2/4 but this was massive in the 0. room all around. i realized it's supposed to be oversized, but even the 0 was comical. this cld easily be a maternity dress. loved the semi-sheer sleeves, even though it made dinner a bit precarious. razor back bra is best. was a couple of inches above the knee so if wearing to work looks better w navy tights. not for girls a lot taller than me unless you are ok showing leg
Very comfortable

links_reviews_title: The detailing and color were beautiful but overall too big and lacked any definition.
links_reviews_text: I think this dress would look nice with a pair of tall heels, and on a person who is not petite! I drowned a bit in this dress and likely would not rent again.

links_reviews_title: Was a perfect New Year's Eve dress!
links_reviews_text: Complimented by baby bump !

links_reviews_title: Comfy, but looks a little bit like a maternity dress.
links_reviews_text: This dress was beautifully made. I did not wear it out of the house because I thought it looked too much like a fancy maternity dress.
Wore this to work. Good length. Super cute and flowy. It is pretty shapeless, but that's what makes it so comfortable. Will rent again. Sheer sleeves add a cute touch.
Received a lot of compliments. Very forgiving and flowy. Would've liked the neck line to be a little more form fitting but it was still great!
Runs huge!!!! Adorable dress. Just too too big!
I would size down about 2 sizes. This dress was also very long, down to my knees!
Runs large so size down. Still very flattering.
I didn't end up wearing this. Wasn't very flattering on my body shape - I'm 30d and it sort of looked like maternity dress on me. Cute dress just not the right fit for me.
Beautiful dress, too elegant for work
Very pretty, Hugh quality but sleeves too long and baggy and looks like a tent on me.
Beautiful material but runs large. I'm usually a size 2 or 4. This runs fairly large to the point where the collar of the 4 was falling off me rather than sticking up straight a bit as in the images.

links_reviews_title: Was a lot dressier feeling than expected
links_reviews_text: This is a cocktail dress. Not a dress you can wear to work or dress down easily. The material is beautiful and flows nicely, but the sleeves are the kind where you don't eat Chinese food family style. Lol what I mean is, it is hard to reach around food with this dress on since the sleeves and their ties dangle everywhere. The dress is very flattering on. It ran large and I could have worn it a size or two smaller. With strapped heels, this dress would look amazing ordered in a different size.
Very pretty dress. I will rent this again!

links_reviews_title: Wore this for a day time event and loved it! Beautiful colors and flattering fit.
links_reviews_text: Beautiful long dress, it was super flattering and fit well. I wore it for New York fashion week show and it was great. Loved it!

links_reviews_title: Colors are ever prettier in person!
links_reviews_text: Only con was that it was a little snug through the chest.
Perfect for a date night or formal event. So comfortable and the color was beautiful.
Color and fit appropriate for a Thanksgiving dinner with family and friends. Wore it with tall boots! Husband loved it! Another RTR success!
The fit was true to size, great for an hourglass body type. The dress is 10x more beautiful in person.
Very flattering and comfortable dress. Fit true to size and looks similar to the pictures posted. Would be harder to wear if you have a bigger bust but was fine for a B/C cup.

Rented for a Nov baby shower. It was ankle length on me which made it feel very formal, also very low-cut. It's also very fit it in the bust. No stretch . I would rent this for a winter wedding. Also the slit in the front could be very exposing on someone tall. Opened to mid thigh when I walked.. Im 5-2. Returned.
Beautiful fabric, beautiful dress

I am usually a true to size 6, but in a lot of RTR items I have to go up to an 8 due to having broad shoulders. I got this dress in a size down (38) and it was still unwearable. I think I'd have to go down one or two more sizes to even consider leaving the house in this. Renter beware...this really is an item you have to size WAY down in. Details are beautiful though!
Gorgeous pattern. Gorgeous colors. Very unique but runs extremely large.

This dress runs really large so size down as much as is available. I'd guess even the smallest size could accommodate a size 8. That being said, I wore this with the zipper down and a lace bralette outside of work. I had random people stop to ask about the dress. The material and colors are super unique and beautiful. Give it a try

I sized down as per reviews and it fit fine except sleeves still a tad long. Lovely colors. Comfy. Good for heatwave. Pockets. This dress is good for a day when you just want something that is loose and carefree.
This is so cute, but runs SO large. I'm normally a size 10, and this is a 4 and I'm still swimming in it. Got so many compliments

I absolutely love this dress, however it runs really, really large. Absolutely downsize quite a bit. I ended up using a vintage silver pin at the waist in the back and it looked fantastic. Tons Of complements. This dress looks expensive.

Super unique and different piece/pattern but y'all this was MASSIVE. I sized down 1 size and should have gone 2, maybe 3 sizes smaller. The sleeves don't come up to your armpit, they are sewn in basically at the waist which was odd. Didn't get to wear because it drowned me. Pros: beautiful pattern, stands out, and lightweight.

links_reviews_title: Ordering this in a much smaller size
links_reviews_text: I'm obsessed like this dress but I am completely swimming in a 38. I'm normally a size 4/6 and like an oversized fit, but this is way too oversized to be flattering. Returning this and ordering 2 sizes smaller!

Even though it's meant to be a loose fit, this was ridiculously big. The sleeves were so long they went past my fingers. I looked like a little kid wearing her dad's shirt or something, which is too bad because it was a really pretty dress otherwise

links_reviews_title: A beautiful dress with lots of interesting details
links_reviews_text: Really fun and comfortable embellished dress. Sleeves are super cool. The somewhat boxy but unstructured neckline didn‚Äôt work as well as I would have liked - the lace in the back wasn‚Äôt ironed flat very well, and either side of the placket in the front can sort of flap around a little bit so overall it‚Äôs quite a bit larger/wider and less secure than it looks on the model pic online. Great work dress and also stylish for low-key out-of-work wear too.
Runs very large, consider two sizes down.

links_reviews_title: I rented this for engagement pictures & it looks like an actual tent on me.
links_reviews_text: I seriously could have fit two or three of me in this dress/sack. i'm so sad because it's so dang cute. but HUGE...
Beautiful dress and very comfy but runs very big.
Excellent mumu. I also wore belted with combat boots for holiday festivities!
very large comfy dress....not at all flattering but very cool and different.
I got a size 40 or a US6 which is my typical size. This dress was about 6 sizes too big. It was huge and almost uncomfortable. The sleeves were so long. I ended up belting it to make it work.
This dress is so chic and looks so expensive...but it is MASSIVE. Size down unless you're going for the v. oversized look.

links_reviews_title: The unique print and style of this dress gave it an out-of-the-box and artsy "wow!"
links_reviews_text: Shapeless and light, its comfortable and breezy, perfect for spring/summer/fall. Received so many compliments on its unique style and felt like a true fashionista. This item runs very large. I am typically a 4/6 and ended up ordering the 2.

links_reviews_title: I wore it to work but felt uncomfortable having to adjust the sleeves all day.
links_reviews_text: Beautiful print but unfortunately I was swimming in this dress. I tried to roll the sleeves a bit but the fabric is white on the reverse side which made it look a bit unpolished. The sleeves were the main issue, otherwise I loved it. Definitely go down a size or 2 if possible.
ways to big for me, does not look good at all, maybe i am to short for it.

I had such high hopes of the pattern overruling the large sizing I'd read on the other reviews - I got the smallest size offering and the sleeves were a dealbreaker. Wish they'd remake this dress in a different shape! The fabric and other details were super cute.

links_reviews_title: Even though this dress runs very large. I ordered down a couple of sizes, I still loved it .
links_reviews_text: Even though it was oversized I was thankful I had rented it. The drape of the fabric makes you feel elegant. You can't fake quality even in the wrong size. The color block on the arms were an extra flattering effect. Just order several sizes down

This dress is so beautiful in the photo, but was a big disappointment when opening my shipment. The fabric is gorgeous but the cut and fit is just way too big. I even sized down 2 sizes after reading some of the reviews. My husband said I looked like an old lady in a kaftan. The sleeves also extended far past my hands. I'm not sure if the cut of the sleeves would ever be flattering. Bummer! If you can find a small enough size, I'm sure this would be a knockout.
Runs SO big. I got the 34 and was still drowning in it. Not sure how it even fits the model

links_reviews_title: How is this dress retail for almost $700?
links_reviews_text: This dress did not live up to my hopes for it and it went back unworn. Awkward fit. Sleeves overly wide. Seems much more Forever 21 then high end fashion.
Too big and was not a good look. Disappointed with fit

links_reviews_title: Great pattern and a new take for a shift dress
links_reviews_text: This print really stands out amongst the crowd of blacks and greys in my office. It is extremely baggy which would be my only negative comment. You can easily dress it up with black tights and stilettos to make the dress unforgettable.

links_reviews_title: Like wearing a hot air balloon, but that is insulting to hot air balloons
links_reviews_text: The fabric is beautiful, the dress is terrible. Going to need to try and return and rent a new dress for a client meeting this week. Will not be leaving the house in this. I thought from the reviews if I sized down it could be playful, but it is not.

links_reviews_title: It didn't, only got it for less than 12 hours...
links_reviews_text: It's huge, lovely design.
Great fabric and print, but be warned this runs big.
This dress was gigantic and not flattering at all.
Runs way too large. I am a 4, rented 2 and was impossible to wear it

links_reviews_title: Too big, RTR has the wrong recommended sizing
links_reviews_text: This designer is French and in researching size conversions I should have gotten a 38 or 40. Considering the 42 was huge, I think I will try the 38. The fabric is beautiful and I was so excited to get this dress so I'm hoping the 2nd time around will be better.
Didn't realize I sized up on this, but it's huge! Definitely go a size down -- super funky and cute

Really great top. While normally I would wear a small in general, in this top the medium was perfect (I would not have been able to wear a S). It's a little dressy with a nice light material, great print, and small details to standout (puffed sleeve, the black material used to create in the back). Wore high waisted dress pants and it was perfect!
Fabulous print and fit. Definitely cropped and low cut. I should have sized down but I didn't mind my black bra showing as I was out at bar in Miami Beach. Great for day or night.

links_reviews_title: Floral crop top for day to night wear.
links_reviews_text: Loved this crop top! I'm a DD and it was flattering around the chest and cropped just right (not too high and not to low) - the shirt fit nicely on the body also not super tight and was easy to put on. The material is nice and light. Loved it!

The cropped length, puffed sleeves and elegant neckline is incredibly figure-flattering. The light material and vibrant pattern makes it ideal for dancing & shimmying the night away. Rent this one for sure!

links_reviews_title: Didn't end up wearing but it's cute
links_reviews_text: This is cropped and really cute. Flattering with something high waisted. Very well made
I wore this crop top to brunch with friends and got many compliments. It's sexy but still very feminine. Fit true to size.
With high waisted jeans or a skirt this is a fun top! The v neck wasn't too low and the sleeves fit just right. Would definitely rent again

links_reviews_title: The cutest crop top! So chic
links_reviews_text: Absolutely loved the fabric and pattern and lace trim detail. Very well made and great quality. Could dress up or down. I'm a size 6 and 34C/32DD. The medium fit great. Not too tight and helped cover my stomach since I didn't want to show too much skin. Would rent again!
Was a great option in a tropical climate, wore it several times. Nice quality and light fabric.
Very pretty details. A little big around my boobs but workable. Def quite cropped, only really worked with high waisted shorts or pants. But fit nicely and pretty pattern
Well made, fun details, beautiful cropped top. Definitely on the dressy side.
Very cute top with fun print and sleeves. A little low cut but went perfect with high waisted pants for a bridal shower. Fit true to size!

links_reviews_title: Be prepared to show a little skin!
links_reviews_text: You definitely must be comfortable with a bit more revealing shirts if you're going to rent this! I paired with super high wasted jeans and it was great. As others have mentioned it's also a bit low cut, I had to use fashion tape to ensure my bra didn't peak out of the top. Overall this was a super fun and different crop top and I really liked it!
Adorable crop top! Love the colors and detail. Small was great if not a tiny bit loose but would rather have a little extra room in my crop tops :) front is lower cut but not too revealing IMO

Rented for a vacay, but didn‚Äôt officially wear it, because, COVID. Fit well in the chest and waist, but was too tight in the arm holes and across my back. Think I‚Äôll try sizing up. Definitely cropped, which will be a bit tricky, but with the right high-waisted jeans, might be able to make it work.
I enjoyed wearing this top, would be great for spring!
All around perfect crop top. Wore it casually during the day but also for a night out.

links_reviews_title: Wanted to love this with high-waisted pants
links_reviews_text: Really fun pattern. Unfortunately the sleeves were just a little too puffy, which made me look very broad shouldered so I didn't end up wearing this out.

links_reviews_title: Couldn't fit a large and it's such a cute crop top
links_reviews_text: Beautiful color and style

I wore this with ripped "mom jeans" and white closed toe mules- it was perfect for a night out. It was just the slightest bit low cut, but not unwearable by any stretch. Just know if you have a bigger chest it will be noticed. The pattern and material were also great- very versatile and will go with a lot.

links_reviews_title: This is the cutest cropped top with fun sleeves! I wore it on a night out.
links_reviews_text: True to size fit.. arms were a little tight but it wasn't uncomfortable.
I wore this on st Patrick's day and it was perfect. A little revealing, but still classy.

As I first saw the dress, I liked the vibrant blue color of the dress. The fabric, however is kind of scratchy and cheap looking. I was a little skeptical. And then I put it on...fits like a glove, nice low shoulder detail, good length, creates nice waist and the best part that it flows behind you. Felt like I was floating. Price was right, so this dress belongs to my closet full-time now. I recommend! FYI Gave a 4 for scratchy fabric, could have chosen smth nicer. Still love it overall!
slightly uncomfortable arms but overall a great silhouette, got many compliments on this one
Comfortable and flattering.

Snagged this for a quick weekend getaway to DC. The fabric is not a natural fiber so I was worried it would be really sweaty, but it worked out fine. Even wore it to the pool with my kids when I realized I'd forgotten my swimsuit. Be prepared to show some leg with that high split; and the color is way more cornflower than navy. Overall, cute dress.

links_reviews_title: Colorful, good material and great summer dress.
links_reviews_text: Material was not see through at all which was awesome. A breathable material too. Nice pop of color with the blue and fun off the shoulder sleeves added a nice touch. Also, the slit in the front wasn't too high which was great. I'm 5'7.

links_reviews_title: Cute dress, and the color pops!
links_reviews_text: This dress is adorable and very flattering. The color is beautiful and it hit me at the right place on my waist for a nice flattering cut. The arm sleeves were a little tight, so that's one thing to watch out for.

Couldn't stop reaching for this one. I only returned it because the weather cooled off. Such a great dress and really a head-turner. Great for tall girls. Really flattering in the waist area with forgiveness if you're out to eat. I almost bought it. Was not bothered by the fabric as another revier mentioned. It is the crepe fabric many are using now like Reformation, etc.

Very faltering, sits well off the shoulders, slit is a little higher then I expected but didn't feel uncomfortable. I wore this for my Anniversary date with my husband! I packed it up in my work bag that morning because I wanted him to think I was just going to come in my work cloths. When I pulled it out to hang up not a wrinkle! I love a dress that isn't too fussy.

links_reviews_title: this dress is amazing! it's comfortable, cute, flattering on everyone!
links_reviews_text: i wore it on vacation, it looked beautiful in pictures and i wore it in spain - so it was perfect!
Great dress. Vibrant blue color. Comfortable and flattering. Many compliments.

Wish I'd gotten a pic! Not my typical style but very cute and quite flattering. Looked great on the shoulder at work (casual atmosphere) and off the shoulder during the day. Paired with canvas wedge and a straw fedora for a fun summer look. Will rent again.
This dress has a lot of potential, but for apple shaped or fuller bust ladies, this dress just didn't work well with my body type. I did not end up wearing it.
This was a pretty dress. I loved the color! It was a little tight on my stomach.

This dress was cute, but a little costume-like. The quality of the dress was less than I am accustomed to at RTR. The polka dots are substantial and they were crooked at the waist, which made the dress appear a little lopsided. That's a quality issues, not a fit issue. It was fine for a quick dinner out, but I wouldn't have worn it anywhere important.
Dress was super comfortable! Love the fun ruffles--airy and fun to wear. The fabric made it a little less casual to wear to a BBQ (as planned), so I wore it to a dinner with a wide belt.
As in it would be if it's wasn't so expensive. But a great find in my opinion. Comfortable, unique, I'd rent this again.
Just eh. The color is pretty. The fit isn't flattering or unflattering- just not great either way. I don't regret renting it but I probably won't rent it again.

links_reviews_title: Wore for a presentation at work
links_reviews_text: Beautiful fabric and craftsmanship- true to Proenza. But the waist was big as other women said and it is heavily pleated. The top cut is very flattering for me because I have an athletic build and like high necks/shoulder cuts so it balanced the rest. My thoughts are this is for someone tall. Gorgeous bright bits of color!

This dress is pretty. It is just a little too big on me. And I'm not in love with tie in back. I like my clothing simple to figure out. Also, for 5'8", it needs to be a little bit shorter or just go full maxi to be flattering

For such an expensive dress, had very high expectations on the quality and fit. The neckline seems to be tight and lay higher than expected. The added strings tied in the back were a nice design, but didn't help alleviate the tight neckline. It's very forgiving at the waist/hip area, but fits true to size in the bust/rib area. I'd say it's true to size. Probably won't rent again.

Wore this to work and Keeping for Easter. Beautiful silky fabric with great movement and drape. Sad that the belt is missing, but I found a black grosgrain belt from another dress. It looks much better belted. Print is vibrant a modern.
Pictures online don't do this beauty any justice. Wear it and you will see!
Nice details on this dress. Ran a bit small. The front neckline was a bit too high to be comfortable and the lining over the hips was tight. Will rent again in a size 8.

links_reviews_title: Loved the pattern and how the dress moved
links_reviews_text: I rented this for an outdoor wedding in California (warm afternoon, cool night) and the dress worked very well. Very comfortable. It is a little flowy and all of the pleats add a little bulk (so if you don't want your hips to look bigger this dress may not be best). The pattern is great and the dress got a lot of compliments.

I wore this dress to a friend's baby shower. It was not my first choice, but when my original dress became unavailable I opted for this one as a back up. Although it came missing the belt (which I was notified ahead of time), I was still able to wear the dress. It was extremely comfortable, very forgiving and flattering. The only negative I would say is the length. I felt the dress was a tad too long for my 5'4" stature. Otherwise I did really love it and would rent it again!

This dress is so special and has so many little details that make it unique. This was surprising for a longer more modest dress. It is my husband's favorite dress I've ever rented, he even said "WOW" when I entered the room. He wanted me to buy it until he found out it was a Proenza.

I rented this dress for the last day at my job. The details are absolutely beautiful, especially the fabric and layering at the waist, and pictures do not do it justice. It's very comfortable and easy to wear. I usually am a 2, sometimes a 4 depending on designer. I got a 2 in this and it was a bit loose but very nice and flowy. Want to own this!
This dress looked better on than it did in the rtr picture. The material and fit are excellent and I enjoyed wearing it

links_reviews_title: This is the perfect work dress for spring/summer. Professional but comfy, too!
links_reviews_text: The waist isn't cinched quite as much as the pic of the model, but it's still very flattering. It's actually probably more comfortable because of that.

This dress has a ton of subtle detail that is stunning. Someone complimented it as looking like a work of art. I wore it to dinner with heels on a warmer night and then to work with tights, boots, and a blazer. The opening in the back and the high cut of the armholes made bra choice a little trickier than I expected. I would definitely rent it again!

This was a beautiful dress that I got lots of compliments on. However it is meant for a taller woman. The back bunched out on my petite frame. It ties at the neck and then there is an open section. Also, there was an area of sewing that puckered the fabric on the front, which I don't think you should see on a dress of this value. It was however very comfortable and flowy feeling.

This dress made getting ready for work so simple! I threw on a leather jacket and booties to complete the look. I like dresses that are easy to move in. The fabric was light weight. Received many compliments!

Fabulous blue dress by Proenza Schouler! We love how comfortably chic this piece is for everyday or a quick brunch. Running true to size we recommend going a size up for a back up. This dress is comfortable providing room all throughout with great stretch. The only fitted part of this dress is the waist with a draw string for an bow tie. Lastly this dress can be worn with a standard bra. Pair with your favorite heels and enjoy the day!

links_reviews_title: Fabric was interesting with rich details.
links_reviews_text: The flare hit a bit low on my hips for me and seemed to accentuate rather than flatter that area.

links_reviews_title: Love the feel and the comfort

links_reviews_text: I wore my regular size and layered this dress over a black turtleneck and tights for a really cold day in Boston. The dress was gorgeous, moved beautifully, and I received multiple compliments. Fits true to size.

This dress is cute and floaty, which I appreciate (floaty dark florals are my September-early October jam), and the shape works really well for me. A few cons: The skirt lining is a little snugger than the skirt itself - a true 12, I'd say - the back zipper doesn't come up high enough to quite cover my bra, and there's no bra strap loops on the shoulders (so a cross-back bra might be better). That said, with a cardigan this is a totally fine dress for work.

The outside layer of the dress fit perfect, but it almost seemed like the lining was wrong. The back of the dress pulled due to the lining being too tight, but the front looked exactly like it should have. Very strange. I wasn't able to wear the dress, which was otherwise very pretty.
Loved the fit, beautiful and understated
I liked the dress. Fit well. Pretty colors. Comfortable. Came smelling like patchouli though.

links_reviews_title: Great dress that can take you from day tonight in Miami or NY
links_reviews_text: Love the details on this dress. Wore it with tall boots in NY for the cold and strappy sandals in Miami.

links_reviews_title: Almost every single person I saw commented on the dress.
links_reviews_text: Fit great.

This dress was an absolutely lovely addition to my work wardrobe - conservative, yet intriguing. I wish I had a picture because I loved the unique details that are so common with Proenza Schouler. I'm fairly tall (5'10") and the dress still came to my mid-calf, which was great. The fabric is light and breezy, so this was a great option for a hot, summer day, but could easily transition into fall with tights and a sweater. I would definitely rent this dress again.
This one works for several different occasions. Got it for "every day" wear to office around the holidays.
Gorgeous dress. Incredible material. Runs small. I am 5'8, 150 lb and usually wear a 6 or 8. The 8 was too small in the bust. Will get a bigger size on unlimited ASAP!

links_reviews_title: Special Bra Required but so comfortable
links_reviews_text: The back is open at the top with a bow so you cannot wear a typical razor bra. I had a jacket on at work all day so it didn't matter. The front straps make it not possible to wear without a jacket with a normal bra. It was so comfortable. Not too tight around the waist and perfectly cinched in all the right places. I love the detail add one with the blue fabric. It is so, so comfortable, nice and was great for work.

links_reviews_title: Not good for a big bust
links_reviews_text: This dress came up as an option for full bust / 2nd trimester, but I couldn't zip it closed because there wasn't enough room in the bust. Plenty of room everywhere else, but anyone more than a 34C might have trouble with this size.

links_reviews_title: It was just okay, kind of frumpy.
links_reviews_text: I rented it for work. The dress is very loose and long. My husband said I looked frumpy and begged me not to wear it. I thought it was okay to wear it once. Not the most flattering dress out there, but good for variety.
Super adorable dress! Love the tie in the back!

I found the length (midi) and the cut from waist down to be unflattering and so I didn't wear. Also the neckline requires a strapless bra. It's very well-made and the print is beautiful. May be better on a less curvy person.

links_reviews_title: Print is cute, but overall, this was underwhelming.
links_reviews_text: Fit is just OK... the cut on the shoulders means you can't wear a traditional bra. I was hoping for something more special, but this just felt average.

links_reviews_title: Beautiful, but weird cut for pear-shaped
links_reviews_text: The dress and material were lovely, but the cut was not flattering. I have wide hips and a small waist. My thighs pushed out the side panels' pleating and the torso section looked boxy. Would HIGHLY recommend for Straight and Narrow ladies.

links_reviews_title: Definitely A Fall Or Winter Dress
links_reviews_text: Well made and wearable print, even for pear shapes like me. This dress was much too heavy for June or July temps and humidity. Would work well for October or November dressier events.

The dress looks great on my body type which is a slim fit. The way the waist stench created the allusion of a curvy figure. the material was light and flowy with exceptional to details that add to the sophistication. Amazing dress that I would order again and again. could be dressed up or down.
Beautiful pattern and texture coupled with a great fit!

This dressed hugged all the right places! Very form fitting but in a good way as it was forgiving in the right areas. It did run pretty small in the arms so you may want to size up for a looser fit. Overall, great dress!

links_reviews_title: Would love but very tight fit
links_reviews_text: Arms and chest were so tight. Needed to probably size up at least 2 sizes. Typically wear 2/4, the 4 was almost too uncomfortable. Did end up wearing, but arms were constricted whole night and didn't wear bra
This dress run very small! With that said once I found the right size it fit perfectly and I loved the vibe of this dress. It is perfect for a cold weather wedding.

Very pretty dress and flattering but it was so tight in the shoulder area I couldn't get it in and off by myself but what was worse was the neck line kept digging into my throat. Do not get unless you are narrow shouldered

Beautiful print but very strange fit with no give. I didn't mind that it was snug around my hips, but the extra fabric around the midsection made it very unflattering. Also way too tight around the chest & shoulders. Sizing up wouldn't have helped. Probably better for a "straight & narrow" body type.

links_reviews_title: Pretty dress- got away with it at 24 weeks pregnant!
links_reviews_text: I was able to fit in this dress at 24 weeks pregnant but it probably wouldn't have worked much later. The fabric doesn't have much give and I sized up to a 6, which worked but was a little large in the shoulders. I thought it was a beautiful dress though and would rent again when not pregnant.

I was so glad that I listened to other reviews and sized up. It is a gorgeous dress, but has atypical dress proportions. I am typically between a 4-6 in dresses. This dress, an 8. The dress was very small in the arms and chest area---and I have toned arms. On the other end of the spectrum, there was a lot of extra room in the butt/hip/stomach area. Also, the back zipper is difficult to zip, so an extra hand is helpful.
I rented this for a bridal shower and it was really long on my 5'2 frame. It also was tight in the shoulders and hips (especially a problem for curvy girls)

While this dress was a smidge too big in the hips (the fabric stuck out a little), it actually made my boyish frame look a little curvy (which is a plus in my books)! There is a bit of stretch to the fabric but be warned that long strides are not possible which was fine since I was wearing heels anyway. The dress overall was extremely flattering due to the heavier material that smoothed everything down. Would consider renting again!

links_reviews_title: I wore to museum social event. It looked good and was comfortable.
links_reviews_text: Excellent fit except the length for my petite height but that did not bother me. I liked the fabric and it looked good.
Love the cut and colors! I wore this dress for a couple of times and got many compliments.

links_reviews_title: A bit tricky on the stairs but fit like a glove!
links_reviews_text: I usually wear a 2 and the 4 fit really well. The cut/length does make navigating stairs just a tiny bit difficult, but it was great for work! Got several compliments on this one.
This dress is really pretty. It was a little big on me so I didn't end up wearing it. Fabric is great, length is great. Highly recommend.

Really nice dress that I wanted to wear to a rehearsal dinner. I'm usually a 2 but ordered a 4, so unfortunately a little too big to wear -- extra fabric in the stomach and the shoulders were too big.

links_reviews_title: Perfect dress for work to weekend!
links_reviews_text: I loved this dress! It's so versatile; it was perfect for work, but could also be worn with a leather jacket on date night. It's perfect for all seasons. It's very fitted, but the 6 worked well. A little extra fabric in stomach and sides. I'm considering buying it though, and if I do, it could easily be tailored.
Very tight! Definitely size up!
Great dress fits like a glove but flattering. Ended up wearing for daughters graduation

links_reviews_title: Fits like a glove and so comfy!
links_reviews_text: I loved this dress and got so many compliments! It was super comfortable and stretchy but so form fitting. In a perfect world it would've hit right at the knee, not below it, but you know... not a perfect world. Still looked great! Great for a fall or spring wedding.

Cannot overstate how snug this was, I am a 4/6 and getting into the 4 was torture. It looked incredibly nice for a day at the office though, definitely size up one or more, no give to the fabric and very narrow on arms and ribs

This dress is stunning. It hugs the curves yet is quite conservative. It runs super small. I usually wear a 6 or 8 in dresses. There's no stretch (3% spandex per the label), and the 10 was still restrictive. I wore it to teach in and did have a hard time raising my arms to point at things on the board. If I rent again for a wedding or a nice event, I'll probably get a 12.
Great looking dress. Very unique and fun. Snug across the hips, so I'm glad I sized up. Great experience.

I was a little nervous about this dress from some of the reviews, but it fits just perfect. There is quite a bit of stretch to the fabric making clig to your body as the design intends. I am pretty athletic so the only drawback is the tightness on my upper arm. Will rent again.
Arms were somewhat tight and, I hate to say, it looked better in person. Received compliments all day and felt great wearing it.

links_reviews_title: Can't wait to show this off!
links_reviews_text: Rented a 2 and a 4, as I found it hard to gauge which size to commit to. Ended up not squeezing into the 2 but the 4 fits like a glove. Despite there being zero stretch, i love the fabric. It hides everything. I was worried it would accentuate lumps and tummy but I was honestly very pleasantly surprised. Only downers were not being able to lift my arms above my head without the whole dress coming with me and the shoulders getting all square and weird, and the bottom is tight when walking up stairs, but normal walking is fine. I love it, I can't wait to show it off at the wedding tomorrow!

I loved this dress in the pictutes but what the other reviewers say is true: runs small. In my case to get it to fit my hips I needed a 6 but then there was a lot of fabric gaping at my waist (see pic). Also, if you have more muscular arms it might be tight. Mine are merely toned and the sleeves were tight with little give. If you have a smaller waist to hip ratio might not be as flattereing.

I loved this dress! Im normally size 2 but wore the 4 because on my baby bump and it fit great. I'm 5'2" and the dress hit right below my knees - perfect length. I wore this high heeled suede booties because it's winter. I would definetly rent this dress again!

links_reviews_title: Wore to a rehearsal dinner- winter wedding
links_reviews_text: So flattering! It does run a little small. I had a hard time lifting my arms higher than my shoulders because the fit was tight. But it was flattering and otherwise very comfortable- I didn't even mind! I wanted to keep it. Very classy. I recommend!

This was a beautiful fitted dress with great detailing on the shoulders, a great print and classy cut. I loved it and will rent again. I was only upset that since I wore it for graduation, it didn‚Äôt get enough attention under my gown! LOL However, I have to warn that it is extremely fitted, with no stretch whatsoever, even after hours of wear. The arms were very tight, and I consider myself pretty small. The next time, I will get a size 4, when I usually wear a 0 or 2. Length could be a inch or two shorter for a perfect fit on a petite.

links_reviews_title: Great dress to wear to a formal work event. Full coverage and not too tight.
links_reviews_text: Typically I wear a 0 (I am 5'3" and 115 lbs) however, I am curvier in the hips. I ordered a 0 and a 2 and ended up going with the 2. It was much more comfortable, however the sleeves were a little long so I had to roll them under (but no one else would be able to tell). Perfect dress but I'd recommend sizing up! The dress was made of a really nice, thick fabric.

links_reviews_title: Great Dress, Size UP for backup!!
links_reviews_text: This is a great dress- very conservative and exactly what i was looking for. Although the occassion i rented this for was a funeral it fit well, covered everything and was the prrfect length (mid calf). Dress is great if you always get cold like i do. Background of dress is black and flowers are slightly muted- not vibrant which was perfect. DEFINITELY size UPPP for your back-up. Ive always worn a zero and this zero was super tight (it would have been inappropriate to wear). The 2 fit wonderfully but was tight in shoulders...i by NO means have broad shoulders- but i was the only one who could tell it was tight in that area. If you have a bigger chest this dress definitely wont work. Although there was an issue with shipping- RTR overnighted me the same dress and same back up size as my original order and it arrived 11 am next day. Only complaint with this order is the shipping- when i placed the original order the app defaulted to my old address and im told there is no way to remove previous shipping addresses feom the system- so be mindful of this. Hopefully app will get fixed. Great dress-

Wore to work and paired with a black blazer for a very formal meeting, then wore alone in the office. I like the print and the overall design, but at 5'6", the dress was about 4" longer than I like. The fabric doesn't have give either so this will shorten your stride when you walk. Heed the advice of others with sizing - the sleeves and chest are cut very small, and the 4 was snug on me (I'm usually a 2). The lower abdomen / butt area was about 1" too big though so the fabric bunched up there a little. I'm glad I rented this dress but I wouldn't rent it a second time.

Beautiful dress but TIGHT. Was a little more formal than inexpected so it wouldn't have been good for work, but I would rent again for a dinner out, event, etc. Arms are tight but overall the dress had good shape and is a beautiful print. I didn't think it was too long.

I wore this dress for a daytime event at the White House in December. It was perfect for what I needed and could see it easily working for an evening event as well. As many of the reviews mentioned, the fit is small and if you have muscular or a larger chest, definitely size up! My arms are far from teeny but my chest is and it was a solidly snug fit in a size larger than I normally wear! I ordered the next size bigger as a backup but couldn't tell you have it fit because it never showed up. Overall, the dress was exactly what I was looking for for my event and I loved it.

This dress gave me a great silhouette and the length is perfect for work. I would recommend sizing up because it is extremely tight. And don't forget to put on with a buddy around. I had a lot of trouble zipping it up myself.

links_reviews_title: Very flattering, runs tight in sleeves
links_reviews_text: Great dress, very flattering. Runs small in sleeves, I have very large bust so 6 worked well. Very nice fabric, not much give so size up.
The sleeves were a little tight across the chest. Couldn't lift my arms high but overall fit well and would Highly recommend.

links_reviews_title: It was a very nice fitting dress.
links_reviews_text: Very little stretch if it doesn't fit perfectly.
Wore this to an evening wedding in December. Got tons of compliments. Was a bit snug but fit like a glove. Hugged all the right places.

links_reviews_title: Stunning dress, but a little uncomfortable.
links_reviews_text: I found that this dress fit like a glove and looked incredible on. I'm tall and long-waisted, and this dress definitely suits that body type. The material is surprisingly light, but has very little stretch. This is not a dress to wear to go dancing or to move freely - it's form fitting and constricting. I wore this to an event where I mostly sat and by the end of the day, I was happy that I didn't own it. The sleeves at the elbow were starting to dig in and the neckline was also rubbing uncomfortably at the base of my neck. Looks amazing, but didn't feel amazing after 6 hours.

I was excited to try this dress - it's so cute! Love the color, and button detail, but the fit is very odd. It is very big at the bottom, but snug around the bust. I expected it to be a little bigger in the skirt since it's A-line, but it is MUCH bigger. I may have been happier with a smaller size, but didn't have time to wait for a smaller size to arrive. Cute dress, just not the most flattering for my body type. Suggest sizing down if your bottom half is more narrow, than curvy.

links_reviews_title: Great dress, wish I could buy this one!
links_reviews_text: Loved this dress. I read that it ran big so I got the smaller size and it fit perfectly. Definitely needed the belt to create some definition. It runs a bit long, so I wore 3" heels to give some height. The pockets make the dress! I received a ton of compliments and wish I could keep this one permanently. Great rental!
I am usually a 4/6 and I rented the 4. 6 would have been okay too. It's thick enough you don't need a bra. I got a lot of compliments on the color. Also it is big pockets which I love.
I wish I could wear this dress everyday! A vacation favorite. Runs big, so size down about one size. Cool and bright and perfect. Dresses up or down effortlessly!

links_reviews_title: Great color, but just wasn't great in the bust
links_reviews_text: Fell in love with the color, was so vibrant and beautiful. But the fit just wasn't ideal. It buttons up and doesn't zip so you kinda bulge in the bust if you have a fuller one.

Received lots of compliments on this sunny, yellow dress. It fit perfectly everywhere except the buttons on the chest pulled a little. I'm Large chested and just made it work. Love the pockets, the length and overall fit for a day of appointments. Would definitely rent this again!
Even with a serious sunburn - this dress was so comfy!!
Dress was very flattering and lined, and fit everywhere except the chest. I'm a 36D/DD but would be better for smaller chested ladies (or gentlemen. I don't judge)

This was a nice dress. It's very daytime. It's a thicker material, but still breathable. It was a 90 degree day and I was okay in it. I am normally a 16 and I wore an 18 and it was a little big and realized way late that the straps are adjustable. The color is amazing! Great summer outfit!

links_reviews_title: Wore to watch fireworks for the 4th of July. Eyelets allowed to breathe in a hot Texas July!
links_reviews_text: I'm normally a 4/6, but the 2 was a perfect fit. Straps were a little loose, but wearing a light gray bra made the straps complement the yellow. Complimented from strangers everywhere I went! Even has pockets!

This dress was so pretty and I got so many compliments! Only thing is I had to wear a belt to cinch the waist since it runs large. I usually wear a size 6 and needed a 4 that was not available at the time I rented.

I'm typically a 0 or 2P at J. Crew in dresses and tops. The 0 fit well for me. He straps are adjustable with internal hidden buttons. I was worried about the length since I'm 5'2", but I thought it was cute! A little on the longer side, but I don't mind the midi look. It's a pretty heavy eyelet fabric and it is sufficiently lined, so even on a windy day I wasn't worried about any unintentional displays. I think this dress really needs a belt though! It doesn't hit at the slimmest point for me (the skirt seam is at my ribcage, not my natural waist), so a belt helped add some definition. Because it is a thicker fabric, that seam in particular is a little thick and adds some bulk. But with a belt it's perfect! There's a little room in the bust for me (32A) but it isn't unflattering. I do think the fabric can be a little uncomfortable against the armpits/upper arms, though. But it does look pretty. I got compliments from strangers when I wore this out on a sunny day - super cute and summery! The yellow is so cheery.

Movies with my husband? Check. Playground with my kids? Check. Friend's baby shower? Check. Casual workday? Check. This dress went everywhere. I loved the bright yellow. Length was great. Compliments galore. More comfortable in a regular bra than a strapless. Will rent again, thinking about buying!

Great fun dress for the summer! Loved the color and super comfortable! Perfect with sneakers or cute flat sandals. Would definitely recommend! I typically wear a 6 but got this in a 4 so I'd say it does run a little bigger.

links_reviews_title: Flattering, comfortable and easy to wear
links_reviews_text: I probably could have sized down one but I was worried about the bust fitting. This dress is just super, super flattering. I got so many compliments on it. I wore it several times after my son's birthday party.

links_reviews_title: wore this for a casual rehearsal dinner and got a lot of compliments!
links_reviews_text: Fit great and was flatter. Had to pin gap in the chest (breastfeeding problems)
I like how it buttons in the front, but it was still tight across the bust for me. It is a great color.

I liked but didn't love it. It looked just like the picture, but I felt it was a bit too high cut in the neckline, and a bit too long on me (I'm 5'4, so on me it hit mid-calf). I wore it once and wasn't very interested in wearing it again. But it's a nice quality fabric and great color, and gets an extra star for having pockets!

links_reviews_title: Brought a little color to a gloomy day.
links_reviews_text: This dress is simple and beautiful. I love yellow and the color and cut were both flattering. I copied another reviewers red shoe pairing (thank you) and received compliments on the entire outfit from many throughout the day. Would definitely rent again, could wear either a 4 or 6.
Fits true to size. Has adjustable straps and pockets! Perfect for summer

links_reviews_title: So tight on top I couldn't wear

links_reviews_text: I had to wear it racerback because it kept falling off my shoulder. Also, love the pockets!

links_reviews_title: Not for bigger chests, buttons gape
links_reviews_text: I should've listened to the reviews and not ordered this dress. Not flattering for bigger chested ladies, buttons gape at chest

links_reviews_title: Great color! I loved the pockets!
links_reviews_text: True to size.

I wore this dress out to a family dinner and loved it! Got so many compliments on the style and color. Loved the style and it fit well, just wish the straps were a little shorter for my body. I'd highly recommend this dress for summer!

links_reviews_title: Casual, romantic, and super comfortable all at once
links_reviews_text: I loved this dress. Super comfortable, but very pretty. The length was a little awkward on me unless I wore wedge sandals. Great for everyday errands, etc. Would consider renting again.
Straps were a little long, but the fit was very flattering. Wore it for cook outs, dressed up for showers, and a work event. Glad I extended my rental!
Good easy summer dres
Loved the color of this, the buttons, the style and fit -- everything! Felt like a ray of sunshine. Would rent again, but hope shipping won't take forever and a day again!!!

The fit on this dress is great! I probably should have gotten a size up to help the buttons around my chest a little bit. The yellow is the perfect shade of yellow for pretty much any skin tone. I'm super pale and blonde, so yellow isn't always great on me, but this was the perfect amount of bright while not being too bright for my pale skin. I also got a TON of compliments wearing this one. Can't wait to rent this one again!
I liked this dress. I'm short so length was a little long
Material is heavy so it holds shape well but on a hot July day the material didn't breathe and was a touch stifling. Great for a casual party or date.

Wore this for a daytime party and loved it. It was super comfortable and cool. I didn't have to wear a bra (huge plus!). Biggest bonus... the straps are adjustable which makes it easy for someone tall like me to wear or someone more petite. This would also work for a nursing mama since buttons are functional.

links_reviews_title: WAY too small in the chest
links_reviews_text: have rented / bought several dresses from J Crew which have fit perfectly (size 10) but the chest was WAYYYY too small. couldn't button any of the ones around the chest. i think even if i had gone up to a 12, it still would have been too tight in the chest but would have been too big anywhere else. super unfortunate because very cute and great color for the summer!
So many compliments. Will rent again:)
Nice color, pockets were great but it runs SO big.

This J.Crew dress fits true to size. The fabric is somewhat stiff and thick so there isn't any give in the bust area. If I'd been any bigger I don't think the top would have fit. The straps are adjustable so that's a plus. It's lined so no seeing through, and it was not low cut so I could wear it to work.

links_reviews_title: Cute fit, color and very feminine
links_reviews_text: Dress was a great fit. I'm not super curvy but it hit in all the right places. I didn't have to wear a bra as the fabric is thick and soft. I also was able to nurse in it since the Buttons were real. Color was fantastic too. Had 2 strangers approach me to compliment the dress at church.
Love the eyelet fabric, the buttons and length. I wanted to keep it!!! J crew tends to fit on the larger side for me so a 4 was perfect when I'm typically a 6.

This dress was great for a pleasant summer day. Such a good color and very structured material. With a larger bust, the front buttons always make me a little nervous. this worked out great and I even opted to go bra-less as some of the other reviewers also recommended.

Bad photo from the end of the night... I'm between 8/10 so I got the M & L. The M wouldn't even zip over my waist! L fit my body but was extremely snug around the arms all the way down to my wrists. No need for bracelets... That said, this dress was amazing. The deep V back turned heads and the sequins make it truly spectacular. I wore sticky boob cups (DD girls need a boost!) which made a difference in my silhouette. Fabric is thick enough for most to go bra less though.

links_reviews_title: I wore this dress for a prohibition themed party and got a million compliments!
links_reviews_text: The dress definitely runs small. I usually wear a medium and needed a large. But it's a great dress and fits like a glove when you have the right size!
I'm regularly a medium.

links_reviews_title: The dress was epic but runs small
links_reviews_text: The dress was epic but runs small

I was concerned if this dress would be too form fitting, but it was perfect! I didn't need to wear a bra (despite being 38DD) since the material is thick. It was a tad tight in the upper arms, but I also do CrossFit so I run into this problem often. Overall very comfortable, great length (5'8") and easy to match!

links_reviews_title: This dress made me feel like a million dollars!
links_reviews_text: This dress is a very snug fit, and its lined and warm (I wore it to a January wedding in New England). It's not too short, which I sometimes worry about bc I'm almost 5'8". we danced all night and the dress stayed put, which was great. Even though I'm small busted, the top fit perfectly, didn't look too big at all. I'm totally pleased with my RTR experience and can't wait to do it again!

Beautiful dress, thick quality material, no issues with the beaded detailing falling off as tends to be the case with these types of dresses. I said TTS because this might be the intention but it is tight for sure! The next size up wasn't available so hard to tell whether that would have been a better fit for me. Don't pass on this one!

This dress photographs so well! Worked great for my company Christmas party. The dress is form fitting and the material is thick enough to keep you warm in the winter. Also great for shorter girls who can't rent gowns. Loved it.

links_reviews_title: Got so many comments in this dress, it was very fitting and amazing!
links_reviews_text: Wore size small, I'm 5'3, 120 pounds. Was a little tight at first but after wearing it for an hour or two it stretched to body.

links_reviews_title: Firs Like a Glove, Lady in Silver!
links_reviews_text: Wore this dress for "The Eve of NYE Party"! A huge amount of compliments. This dress made me feel sexy and confident! The dress is think, high quality material and helps shape you beautifully! I definitely recommend this as a great party dress. Easy to dance in. Sexy and classy!

This dress was everything I had hoped for and more, if fit perfectly and hugged in all the right places, no itching from the sequins or anything. It was pretty heavy so it kept me warm, but with the short length I kept cool while dancing the decade away. I got many compliments on it and would definitely rent it again! I did order two sizes based on other reviews so I do recommend you size up.

This dress was a show stopper. It does run very small! I normally wear a medium and chose a large based on RTR reviews. It was still a bit snugger than I would have liked, thankfully there's some stretch to it. It's one of a kind, no one else had one like it for sure. Comfortable to wear, a tad bit heavy, and the sequins didn't really bother me.

links_reviews_title: Get ready for the endless compliments!
links_reviews_text: I‚Äôm 5‚Äô7‚Äù and almost didn‚Äôt wear because of the short length. Because it was NYE and the dress is long sleeved and high neck, i felt it off-set the shortness so i wore it. I‚Äôm so glad i did! My hubby‚Äôs jaw dropped and strangers stopped me left and right to compliment the dress. It‚Äôs comfortable and kept me warm on a snowy, windy winter night. I wore the xs. I‚Äôm 5‚Äô7‚Äù, 110 lbs and 32b for reference. I usually wear a size 0.
Loved this dress. It didn't stretch at all, so I would size up for your backup size just in case. My usual size fit perfectly though.
Stunning back, comfortable to wear, but can get a bit warm.
Nice thick material, fit great. Comfortable all night at a Gatsby party.

links_reviews_title: Nice dress. Fit nice. But thick and heavy.
links_reviews_text: I liked this dress. It fit well. Was snug and fitted. It did feel kind of heavy and bulky at times though, like I was wearing a coat of armor. Back was pretty, but I couldn't wear a bra. Just went without.

links_reviews_title: This is the best dress I have rented. I received endless compliments.

links_reviews_text: Beautiful dress for a fall wedding! The venue was outdoors at a plantation and the material was thick enough to keep me pretty warm, even in 50 degree weather. I'm usually a size 4 or a small, but the medium fit very snug and the arms were soooo tight so definitely size up. Still, the dress flattered and photographed very well!

links_reviews_title: This dress was AWESOME! It fit so well and I could not have been happier

links_reviews_text: I had to use the larger back-up size because it was tight in my busy area, but I still loved the fit and I received a lot of compliments.

Perfect for a wedding in Atlantic City. I felt so comfortable in this dress. No bra was needed, as it's impossible to see through the thick material. The design was stunning. I was told multiple times that I was the best-dressed there. Would have loved to keep it.
Wore it to a #wedding and got so many compliments. It looks so expensive. Very unique dress that no one else would be wearing. Warm enough for outside events. Stretchy so fits your body very nicely.

The dress is more beautiful in person! I read the reviews and went up a size (I normally wear medium/size 6) and the large fit perfect. I received many compliments throughout the night...it was such a great dress to dance in and celebrate our friend's wedding. The sequins never caught on my pantyhose or were itchy nor were they "too much". I can't say enough good things about this dress!
I really enjoyed this dress. It was really cute. Only compliant was it was kind of itchy but I would rent again!

Wore to a big speakeasy party in a museum and received a ton of compliments all night!! Can be jazzed up for the perfect roaring '20s look. There is some stretch but overall fit is v v tight. The sleeves are super long and were already folded under from the last wearer (I had to do the same); getting my arms into those sleeves was difficult but I felt ok once I got the dress on. I couldn't go bra-less but a bra with the band tucked into the sides of the dress worked perfectly!
If you are typically a size 4, a medium is better! A sparkles and received compliments all night long. Simply perfect party dress. 5'9, 135lbs, 34b bust.
Very comfortable!! I saw everyone's comments in regards it runs small so I got a large instead of a medium and it was perfect fit. #lovedit #mommyblogger #fitmomfitlife

The dress was stretchy and made well. The arms were alittle tight but overall the fit was good. I'm normally an 8 and I wore the large. I got compliments all night and it looked great in all the photos. Would rent again.

links_reviews_title: Got lots of compliments! Comfortable and great fit
links_reviews_text: #wedding

links_reviews_title: Glamorous dress for a cocktail party or a wedding reception
links_reviews_text: Fit was true to size. Dress is better suited for cooler temperatures as fabric is thick. Deep back which looks very glamorous. Got lots of compliments! Would definitely rent again.
Fit well and comfortable

links_reviews_title: This was a great, sexy, fun dress. I loved how it fit and felt very confident.
links_reviews_text: I wore this dress to an event I was attending and also photographing, so I needed something that looked awesome, but I could also work in. This was perfect. I have long arms and strong shoulders, so the length of the sleeves and shape of the neck were great for me. The sequins are a bit scratchy, so your date's hand around your back may notice, but you will not. It was not scratchy from the inside at all. I wore a strapless, backless bra, but it could be worn with a very low back bra.

At first when I ordered this dress I was hesitant that the sequins would be too over-the-top however it was the perfect amount of sparkle. The long sleeve and low back combination was perfect. the dress was comfortable all night long. I wore this dress to an event in the middle of February. This is a perfect winter dress. And definitely a piece that will be noticed. Would highly recommend renting!
Received so many complements on this dress! The fabric was thick which was perfect for a September wedding. Super comfortable, would wear again in a heart beat.
This fit great! I received so many compliments on this. I would definitely recommend this dress.
Fit is definitely small, but the medium was too big in the chest for me (I'm on the smaller size). Once on, the dress is sturdy and the compliments don't stop!

I loved this dress! Received lots of compliments. High quality fabric, was able to use a shaper underneath, and definitely had to wear a backless bra otherwise there was too much extra material gathering (as others pointed out). It was a tad short for my comfort level, but it was too late to intervene in the order. These real people reviews are spot on! I wish I had read more of them before solidifying my order.
