I usually wear a 4 dress. I should ordered the S and M. (Instead I ordered the S and XS- didn't even try the XS on) SO SIZE UP, so you have options.
The large was the perfect fit. Very comfortable and flattering. I usually wear a medium or a large. The dress is form fitting so ended up going with the large.

links_reviews_title: Feeling like every eye was on me when I walked in the room with this dress on.
links_reviews_text: First of all, my first (and not last) experience with Rent The Runway was fabulous. It‚Äôs one of those ‚Äúwhy the heck didn‚Äôt I think of that?‚Äù Having said that, I couldn‚Äôt have been happier with this dress. I read the reviews, and I‚Äôm glad I did because it definitely did run small (I am larger on the top and smaller on the bottom). It looks gorgeous! The way they ship and the ease of return is a massive benefit. I honestly couldn‚Äôt have been happier with my experience.

links_reviews_title: A night at Hamilton for my lady's birthday, topped off with this gorgeous jumpsuit!
links_reviews_text: This jumpsuit was perfect for a date night at Hamilton with my girlfriend. The material was thicker than I expected, but I was not hot at all. The cut shows off shoulders beautifully. I was surprisingly able to unzip and rezip on my own, which made bathroom trips easier than expected :) I typically need a long length, but the regular length was great on this jumpsuit paired with heels. The side cutouts were a little bigger than I expected, but sexy without being over the top. I loved pairing it with a leather jacket. It was tight around my wide ribcage, so I sized up from my normal. You'll want to size up for your backup size, as it's a fairly snug fit. Gorgeous jumpsuit, and would definitely rent it again!

links_reviews_title: Wish I would have worn it more
links_reviews_text: Not as cute as some of the other jumpsuits, but I still loved the look. I was comfortable all night and it looked so chic with a camel colored waterfall coat. I feel like I could have worn this to more things so I'll probably rent it again for a summer trip.

I wore it to my friends wedding. I didn't intend on wearing a blazer the entire evening, but it's very narrow in the upper back. If you lift a lot or do CrossFit, you might order a size up as it's clearly for someone who's never lifted in their entire life. It didn't zip all the way up, so I paired it with the blazer and wore my hair down. It was very comfortable through the legs and I got a lot of compliments!

links_reviews_title: This jumpsuit made me feel confident and sexy for the New Year.
links_reviews_text: Fit well and comfortable. Zipper was a little tricky.

links_reviews_title: Fun and comfy for bach bash!
links_reviews_text: This jumpsuit was great! Super fun for our all black bride tribe. Definitely runs small - I couldn't even try on my regular size. The size up was still snug lengthwise (I have a long torso), but comfortable and felt like it stretched the tiniest bit throughout the night. The material is thick and has some small waist detailing that doesn't really get picked up in pictures, zippers on calves, plus pockets! Wore a strapless bra with no problems. 100% recommend!

Loved this jumpsuit for a wedding celebration. I felt super cool in it and it is very flattering. Having a jumpsuit makes it so much easier to dance!! I am a 2 or a 4 usually in more mass brands, the 4 here fit but was ever so slightly snug.
Absolutely loved everything about this jumpsuit!! I could have worn a size down but it wasn't available. I wish I had a reason to purchase! Definitely recommend!

I could have worn the 6R or 8R but the 6 showed my curves better. The only issue I had with it was you have to take a buddy to the barhroom the help with the zipper. The zipper was hard to get up and down the first couple of times. Super cute cut out. Would for sure rent again.

I LOVED this jumpsuit, I felt so cool and sassy all night! rented for a masquerade ball in October and felt so comfortable all night! I will say the jumpsuit runs small on top, so if you are busty I would say size up. I squeezed the girls in and just dealt with it, but would have maybe been more comfortable in the size 2.

Super cute for a night out with my husband. He kept mentioning that girls walking by would check out my outfit. I love the cutouts. Wore the size 4 and the top felt a little snug to zip up but once zipped, fit great.

I rented this for a dinner out while on vacation. The material was thicker than I expected which was nice on a cooler evening. I found myself between sizes, the 2 was a little too fitted where the 4 was too baggy to look good. The zipper was hard to zip up and down so trips to the bathroom included a bathroom buddy. The torso in the jumpsuit was also rather short so I felt really constricted

Got this for a night out in Vegas. Normally a 2/4 but got 4 and 6, 4 gave me a bit of a camel toe and 6 was a bit big so depends on your body type I suppose. It was sexy and fun yet I was comfortable!

links_reviews_title: So cute and so easy for a fun night out!
links_reviews_text: I wore this for a concert in Vegas--I wanted to be equally stylish yet comfortable. It was so comfortable! I was nervous the first time I tried it on because it was REALLY snug in the waist (my size-up), so I brought a backup with me. The next time I tried it on, it seemed to fit a little better--and through the night, the legs almost became too loose. So I'd say it stretches with wear. For pant length, I would've preferred a petite, but I was surprised the regular just barely fit my short torso--a petite might have been to short in the torso! Make sure you have a bathroom buddy to unzip/zip, or feel comfortable asking a fellow bathroom stranger :)
Loved this jumpsuit! I typically wear a 10 but went up a size after reading reviews. It fit perfectly. You will need a bathroom buddy though.

links_reviews_title: Super sexy on very hourglass ladies
links_reviews_text: Hunter Bell: Dark Side View Jumpsuit Size 8R... It's perfect for very curvy figures. By curvy, I mean wide shoulders, medium chest, tiny waist and full booty. The jumper was a tad constricting, but the fabric stretched beautifully and I looked pretty awesome. If you have belly / waist "excess" this is NOT for you unless you're not self-conscious about it. I would say it runs a tiny bit small in the torso and chest but the 8 fit. For comparison, my super-athletic friend who is smaller butt than me (and taller) tried it on and it was NOT for her. Not flattering at all. I have more curves.

links_reviews_title: Love how comfortable this jumpsuit is!
links_reviews_text: Does run small and I'm nearly flat chested so the 2 fit like a 0. I did have to do a slight hem with some safety pins since it bunches a bit at the ankles if you are petite. Overall, I felt amazing and it is incredibly comfortable. A bit heavier in the material but it doesn't feel heavy nor does it sag if you put your phone in the pockets. You might get warm if you're wearing this in warmer weather.
Great jumpsuit and so comfortable! Very flattering. Sturdy but stretchy fabric for a great fit.

As other reviewers mentioned, it was a bit tight in the waist, but I managed to fit into the 2R. I had to cuff the pant legs (as I am very short)... But overall I LOVED this jumpsuit. Would definitely rent again :)

This jumpsuit is perfect for a night out where you just need a little bit of glam. It's for sure a nice change from a dress. As a leggy tall lady (6') the crop was a bit short, but I didn't mind. While it runs small, my back up size fit well. Since other reviews mentioned it, I can see the top being tight on those with larger bra sizes.

Wow-- at 5'3" and pear shaped, I've never been able to rock a jumpsuit -- until this miracle came along. The cutouts make it perfect for a night out and it fits like a dream. I'd say it's true to size, I'm between a 6-8 and the 6 was snug, but it fit. I don't think I'd size up because this piece looks better tight that loose. I hope I can rent it again soon!
Really comfortable, great fabric for a cold night, length was perfect, which is is difficult to find in jumpsuit.

This is the first time I wear a jumpsuit. I'm impressed by this one. I've stayed away from them because it's difficult for me to find one that fits. I'm short (5'3), thick from the bottom (normally wear size 8 pants) and small chest (32A) and this jumpsuit fit me like a glove. I got so many compliments wearing it and head turning!

Since I usually loveee dresses, I was worried about finding a warmer, yet still beautiful, outfit to wear to dinner with my partner on my birthday. Sure enough, he liked this one and so did I, and it was a perfect fit and stunning!! It is warm, stretchy material and extremely comfortable! Would definitely rent again.

I really didn't think I could pull off a jumpsuit but it worked. The fabric was thick, so the legs tucked under and stayed which was perfect because I'm short. The area for the cut outs was a little snug compared to the rest though. Baggier in the butt so the butt/thigh area would have been way, way too big if I sized up to be perfectly comfortable in the abdomen though. It wasn't unbearable so I just went with it. The only other issue is that I had to have a friend come upzip/zip me in the bathroom. Overall, would rent again if the occasion was right.

Wore this twice. Dressed it down with booties and jean jacket for a Fleetwood Mac concert and dressed it up for a holiday party with metallic strappy heals and big earring. So flattering and I love having pockets. Got tons of compliments. I would buy, but like a lot of RTR the zipper got stuck and was not easy to get up and down (not great when it's a jumper, but I found it worth it.)
Comfortable and stylish

Love this outfit. Wore: Size 2 - it fits a little snug & you may need some help to zip it up. I suggest to size up. But it still felt comfortable. I love how classy & sexy it looks. You can wear it during the day or night. I wore it to a ladies holiday brunch. I got great compliments with it. I would definitely rent this one again.

links_reviews_title: Loved the fit and lots of compliments. Great for a party night in NYC . I wore it for my bday dinner
links_reviews_text: Loved I could wear a regular bra without it peaking through the cutouts.
Wore this to a Backstreet Boys concert in Vegas. This jumpsuit fit great and was super comfortable. This almost 40 year old momma got hit on multiple times in Vegas!

I wore this outfit to a night out with friends. The jumpsuit fit my body really, really well. I think if your chest is at all big though it might be too tight. I am pretty petite on top in my chest and waist and it was perfect with no bra. Also, since I am a pear, I found this jumpsuit more forgiving in the hips and butt area - but also extremely flattering. The length was also fine. It was not a cropped leg on me (like it is on the model) but the length was fine. This was also my backup outfit so I was really happy it worked out as the 1st option didn't.

I loved this jumpsuit. The material was thick so I felt super cute and sexy in this outfit. It was perfect for an awards banquet for my work. It does run small, so I would recommend going a size up. I wore the 6 when I usually wear a 4.

links_reviews_title: Cute But Not for Petite Girls
links_reviews_text: I rented this as a back up for a work event at a Vegas Nightclub and did not end up wearing it. Pros: Pockets, cut outs are cute, very comfortable (kind of like wearing PJs), flattering on many different shapes Cons: Runs VERY small (I am 5'3" and 127lbs and the 6R was too small - I could get it on, but it was tight in the waist), Hot (fabric very heavy), runs very long (5'3" and it was pooling around my ankles) This was cute and I would definitely recommend for someone taller for a cool weather event. (Apologies for the photo inside my closet)

links_reviews_title: Work Party . Fun outfit, felt like a risk, but still covered.
links_reviews_text: Great fit
Until I realized my skin was poking out of the cut outs. Couldn't zip the back up on my own. Should have sized up.
I would size up. I usually wear a 6 and the 8 just fit me.
This looks great on. Even if you have a bit of pudge coming out the cutouts, it still looks hot.

I was nervous about the length (i am 5'1) but it was prefect with my 4 inch heels. Overall it fit perfect everywhere except right under my boob area it was a little tight. The material is very comfy. I was still able to sit, eat but by the end of the night I was ready to take it off. Overall LOVED the jumpsuit and got lots of compliments. If you are short, I would suck it up and stay true to size..but if you are taller size up.

I wore this dress to my birthday dinner. Great fit! I felt like I was wearing pj's while looking so stylish. I would definitely recommend this jumper. While I normally wear a 6, it was a little tight. So just for feeling at ease, I wore the 8.

After Reading the comments, I sized up. I am usually a size 4 but the six fit perfectly. If you are looking for an ideal party or casual wedding outfit, this is it! I have a long torso, so it is hard to find a jumper that fits right. This one was aaaaaamazing!

The pant legs were quite long and have zippers. I was able to roll the bottoms up inside so no one noticed. It is also difficult to go to the bathroom alone. It looked great and has pockets and fit well overall.

This is such a well made dress. I love the neckline and open back details. It does run large so the XS still had give, but material was heavy and it would not have looked good if it was too tight. I was complimented on it all night long. Since the dress was not tight I wore a spandex underneath to keep things in place and create form. Because of the open back, you can't wear a bra either so beware if you are busty. Overall I will rent it again and cannot wait to wear it throughout this winter.
I ordered XL but would have preferred large. Very comfy dress. Wore it on a road trip upstate wine tasting

links_reviews_title: RUNS VERY LARGE - I WOULD SIZE DOWN 2 Sizes
links_reviews_text: I loved the look of this dress, the flirty bow in the back that ties the shoulders together made it a conservative but flirty look....unfortunately the small swallowed me and even when I tried to pair with a belt the material was too much. Material is GREAT, and warm!

links_reviews_title: Loved the quality of this dress, - but did run big!
links_reviews_text: Super sexy and super comfortable, but i would recommend sizing down - lots of stretch!

I am usually wary of sweater dresses being too tight so I tend to size up. I wish I had sized down so this would have fit better. Next time I'll get the smaller size. The material is thick and the cut is very cute.
Runs large so it wasn't a flattering fit

links_reviews_title: Stylish yet professional for work event
links_reviews_text: Wore this to our hospital resident graduation. Felt great, stylish without being too revealing. Gave it 4 stars because it is very small in the waist and upper body. Size up!

I wore this out to dinner. Wanted to look stylish but casual and be comfortable‚Äîthis piece did all 3! The styling is great‚Äîcloth cover button front, stitched seams down the front of the legs and a silky stripe the fabric at the bottom of the legs gave it a polished feel. Very (!) long belt with buckle that I ended up knotting which I thought looked nice. I wore it this plats to be more comfortable but would look awesome with pumps. Top ran pretty tight through the ribs‚Äîa could have gone up a size. But hips fit great. I really liked this. Might try it for work next.
Gorgeous, great material, dress up or for work. TONS of compliments

links_reviews_title: So classy and fits so well
links_reviews_text: I love this and the fabric at the bottom

Pros: *Great length for shorties. Was able to wear flats. *Form fitting but not tight. *Good fabric. Cons: *No zippers. *Buttons make it difficult and time consuming to get in and out for bathroom breaks. *Belt is a good cute addition but function wise it did not stay tight. Buckle itself is flimsy.

links_reviews_title: Couldn't wear - so tight in the hips
links_reviews_text: I haven't tried the size up but the one I tried was super boxy but also so tight in the legs and hips. I sent it right back.
Fit everywhere nicely but snug at waist. Feel like a size up would have been too big. The covers on the buttons popped off.
Couldn't wear the jumpsuit. The bottom fit fine, but I could not close all the buttons at the top. Jumpsuits are tricky for me because I'm a 4 on the bottom and a 6 on top.

links_reviews_title: This is the second time I have rented this jumpsuit.
links_reviews_text: I love the fit, the fabric, and overall feel and look over this.

I saw that several shorter women posted photos, and the length was do-able with heels, but the fit was just off. Too tight around the waist, but the rise hung down too low. Belt too long. There is also a keyhole gap at the lower back that I couldnt tell from the photo. Actually looked ok from a distance, but just felt weird.
Too small and no belt sent
Love this jumpsuit. Beautifully tailored and expensive looking. Couldn't wear it because it was a little too short in the torso for a tall girl. I might re rent in one size up.

the fit is nice and tight on the top but the pants are very 80s and disco and a the length makes it seem like i bought pants that are a bit to short! I wore this jumper twice despite the length as I did like it- but didnt love it.

links_reviews_title: Nice if you have a small waist
links_reviews_text: I tried! I first ordered this in 0 and it was too tight, then ordered it in a size 2 and could have worn it, but it's snug in the waist and not so flattering if it fits that way. If you have a slim waist, go for it!

I had previously rented the 4 and it was too tight and my skin showed between the buttons, but the 6 was perfect. I wore it to work, loads of compliments. Like all rompers, the bathroom is a pain, but front buttons made it much easier.
did not care for the round buttons down front
Runs true to size, I wish it had let me select the size 2 to ship instead

I wore this to my birthday party and felt sexy in it but as other reviews have mentioned, the straps are loose. I had to have a friend safety pin them to tighten them and that worked for most of the night but was still a bit inconvenient.

This jumpsuit was ALMOST perfect. The material is almost a swishy jumpsuit material, and is so flattering. The only reasons it's not getting 5 stars is because the straps were really long. I felt like I was pulling them up all night. Also, the pants were a bit long for me at 5'4. I just cuffed them up and wore it anyway! The sacrifices were worth the compliments ;)

I rented this for a work event where attendees wore formal attire/dresses, but we had to wear something dressy with pants. Paired perfectly with a blazer! Super comfortable, flattering, received a lot of compliments. Only problem is that the straps are way too long and not adjustable, otherwise was perfect.
Lied this! Cute back lace detail! For me, the straps were too long, but I have a short torso. Super cute!
I loved how easy this look was and how the ruffled material around the waste hides any rolls. I wear a size 12 and wore a size 12 regular.

Y'all girls rejoice! This is a jumpsuit for you! It was long enough and didn't cause the dresses CT. The pockets are amazing and the peplum makes it super figure flattering. While it's conservative in nature, it definitely shows the girls off so be weary if you are bigger chested. I didn't want to send this back- so I didn't and bought it! Since then, I've worn it two other times and can see this going from winter to summer!
Rented this for a rehearsal dinner and it's my favorite jumpsuit. I rented a size larger and turns out I didn't need it so I think it runs true to size. Renting again for another wedding!
Rented for a bachelorette party in Atlantic City. Sexy and slimming. Would definitely rent again!

I rented this for a wedding, and whenever I put it on, the first thing I did was see how I could dance in it. It is super comfy and I was able to bend & move about with ease. The only issue is the straps aren't adjustable & are WAY too long. I ended up safety pinning them, and once I did that it was the perfect jumpsuit!

links_reviews_title: Only jumpsuit to ever flatter my body!
links_reviews_text: I have a curvy butt and thighs, and somewhat short legs, so it is nearly impossible to find a jumpsuit to flatter my body type. I was STUNNED how this one accentuated my waist line and the pants had just enough stretch to flatter my lower half as well. The eyelash lace detail on the straps is gorgeous. Like other reviewers, only complaint is that the straps were very loose- slipped off my shoulders a bit throughout the night.

Like others said, the straps were a little loose, but wearing a regular bra under the jumpsuit mostly fixed that issue. This was an amazing outfit, perfect for the bachelorette party I went to, and I got compliments all night!

As I read in the other reviews, the straps were a bit long but I made them work. I didn't have to wear a bra so I didn't worry about my bra showing and the straps stayed up pretty well. I felt so confident and comfortable in this jumpsuit. Got a compliment at the restaurant I was at by a woman when I was walking by. Would definitely recommend or rent again if I have another occasion for it!

Very cute and fun romper. I am a 12 and usually size up in rompers as I have a long torso but after reading other reviews I went down to a 10. It fit me really well, very sexy and I loved the peplum. Perfect for a night out in Vegas. Cons though, I could not get in and out of this by myself. I had to limit my drinking because I knew I wouldn't be able to go to the bathroom by myself, i needed my husband to help me get out of it as the zipper sucked.
I felt so chic in this jumpsuit! I should have sizes down a bit though.

links_reviews_title: Move over LBD this is the new must have for the closet
links_reviews_text: As a mom of four this jumpsuit was not only flattering but made me feel so confident. The straps were a little large so I had to pin them but the fit was fantastic for my best friends wedding. I also wore this for a dinner date AND another rehearsal dinner

This was a comfy and fun choice for a date night recently. I don't usually wear jumpsuits and I felt great in this one. The length of the pants is a little off putting at first but I got used to it. I also had to safety pin the length of the straps but that was no big deal. I think they ran a little long. Overall cute outfit.
Straps are big but everything else fits like a glove

I wore this for a vacation in NY. Was perfect for walking around during the day and appropriate for cocktails in the evening. The material wasn't my favorite as it is a little shinier than it looks in pictures, but I'd probably rent again.
Beautiful jumpsuit, the only problem is the straps, they are too long and not adjustable.

I loved this! So flattering and flirty!! I am a true 16 bottom, L-XL on top (depending on the brand) and this was definitely too large in the straps, and I had to wear a large bra to fill the top. But other than that I LOVED IT! So many compliments and I felt SO hot! Was great for walking around Vegas
Wore for a Bachelorette party and a night out. Straps are rally large and bottom was on the large side but top fit well

links_reviews_title: Very cute, but fit is a little off
links_reviews_text: I'm usually a size 6 to 10 depending on the style of the jumper. This was a six and it fit my hourglass frame very well. However, because it was on the small end of my range, I think this runs a little bit big. The straps are kind of long and the fabric has a little stretch to it. It's cute, but a little fussy, so I probably won't rent again. The great news is you can zip it up and down all by yourself!!!
a
Liked the style and design, but it was way too big. Could have loved it if it had fit!
I did not end up wearing this but would have had I not had my first choice dress!
This was a really good jumpsuit - was very comfortable yet was really cute; I got compliments all night. The only reason I would give this 4 stars is that the straps were too long/ran big!

links_reviews_title: This outfit has a strange fit. I'm curvy. 5'7".210lbs
links_reviews_text: I ended up ordering a 10 that for in my legs, then a 12 in my bust and a 14 for the area with lace. As a curvy girl that has boobs butt and bust it was weird where it gathered. Defiantly got someone with a pear shape

I am 5'2 so straps were a little loose and not adjustable also metal boning was sticking out under right arm but very nice fit and very comfortable. it was cold out and its low cut so I wore a white tee underneath

I am 5‚Äô8‚Äù, 175ish lbs, full in mid section and I normally wear a size 12, sometimes a 10 on rare occasions. I initially ordered a size 12 and it was so big that there was no way that I could wear it. I was able to swap it for another size (the RTR swap process was great) and size 10 was not available so I took a chance on size 8 and it fit perfectly! As others have said, the straps are very long and will easily slide off your shoulders. Straps are not adjustable.

links_reviews_title: Wore this jumpsuit for my college reunion - it was the perfect combo of flattering and fun.
links_reviews_text: The bodice of the jumpsuit ran a bit tight, but the pants (especially in the butt) ran large. As the material is stretchy, I recommend sizing down. The straps are way too long and fell down throughout the night which was annoying. The mermaid skit around the waist ensured the jumpsuit was flattering and I got a ton of compliments throughout the night! Definitely recommend for a party / date night.

links_reviews_title: Beautiful but not ideal for 5'3 height (too long)

links_reviews_text: As other reviewers mentioned, the top is definitely big. I had to wear a strapless padded bra to fill it out a little more and then it was perfect. I am a 34C for reference. Also, it does stretch out quite a bit in the pants which was slightly annoying, but the top was tighter, so I couldn't go down a size. I wore it to a dinner celebrating our anniversary. Overall I liked it for the occasion, but I wouldn't rent it again.
Super flattering & comfortable. More of a work/professional look than something I would go out in, & would totally buy it if it wasn't so expensive!
The top part of this jumpsuit fit GREAT! The bottom was soooo baggy and awkward. So much extra fabric, very bizarre. Wanted to love!!

links_reviews_title: This is cute and fit really well through the body- very true to size.
links_reviews_text: But the straps were either way too long for my body or they were stretched out. I ended up returning this becasue there was no way I could wear it with the straps hanging off.

This would be great for someone with a long torso. The straps aren't adjustable so it was too long in the crotch area but other than that it was true to size. I didn't wear it for the aforementioned reason.

links_reviews_title: Haven't worn yet but the fit was good especially for my height
Was not able to wear it
links_reviews_text: was not able to wear it, too big on me

highly recommend for work w blazer then out to dinner. i'm typically a small/2 and this fit well, maybe a touch large so if you're btwn sizes, def size down. even at my height the jumpsuit wasn't too long w heels on. if you're taller this still works as a more cropped jumpsuit. super flattering and the lace/mesh part is subtle. cannot recommend this enough!

I‚Äôm busty so things don‚Äôt always fit right. This is strange. The top was ok, straps are very long and the torso is so long the crotch sagged about 6 inches. Definitely not fitted anywhere. Size down and I‚Äôd say be longer through the torso.

links_reviews_title: Perfect fit and super cute and fun!

links_reviews_text: I rented this for new year's eve party. This dress is beautiful and fits like a glove - my heart broke when I had to send it back. :D Like other reviewers mentioned, fabric is a little thicker, but while I held off on renting it during warmer seasons because of that, it would've been just fine in spring and fall, even cooler summer evenings.

links_reviews_title: I got compliments all night from this dress.
links_reviews_text: I am 150 lbs, 5'2" and I wore a large. Fit really well. Most likely could have worn a medium, but I liked the way the large fit and it came to 2-3 inches above my knees (made it not too short.) The dress is soft and comfortable and still elegant.

Looks way more impressive in person. The heavy ponte cloth was very supportive and flattering in the skirt and held its shape well at the 60-s inspired asymmetrical neckline. It's an elevated LBD - the neckline can be pulled low off one shoulder, or rest higher for an Audrey Hepburn feel - and the asymmetric short/er sleeves are fun and fashionable - it's a sophisticated but fun look that makes the dress have statement. Love it. Went online and bought one as soon as i got home!

links_reviews_title: Great fabric, but fit was off
links_reviews_text: I loved the quality of the fabric and the cut of the dress in theory, however it was way too small. What appeared to be off-the-shoulder, loose dolman style top on the model ended up being just a boatneck, t-shirt cut on me. I have broad shoulders, 36DD chest and narrow hips for reference. Ordered a L and XL which fit about the same. Skirt was form-fitting which I would have loved if the top was loose and off the shoulder, but combo of t-shirt top and mini skirt was not a good look.

5'4, hourglass shape. 27" waist, 40" hips, 32D. small fits perfectly. the material is super thick and stretchy. it's really comfortable while being incredibly flattering. i can see this working for a large range of body types.

I wore this for an evening work event. It was very comfortable, flattering and the material was thick. I added a red leather obi belt because the dress does need some colorful accessorizing. It's a more casual dress that can easily be dressed up.
Lots of compliments on this dress from strangers. Very classy and flexible for date or event

Loved this dress!! I wanted a dress I could dance and be comfortable with a little bit of sexy... The fabric is thick, stretchy and very forgiving and felt very comfortable. I typically wear a regular size 12 or 14 in dresses but I wore a 3x because I wanted a good folder over by the waist seam and I didn't want to be pulling on the dress all night. It was the perfect fit. I think if you are well endowed at the top as I am, you want to go up a couple of sizes. The fit was snug on my hips but I did not have to keep pulling it down so that was good. I highly recommend sizing up depending on the look you are going for. I did an 8 day rental to make sure I had enough time to try it on and I am glad I did because my initial order was for the 1x and 2x and I had to re order the 3x that RTR sent over night thankfully! So it worked out very well. Oh and the icing on the cake... because I was a 1st time renter I got an additional free rental and I chose the super cute purse you see in the picture by Rebecca Minkoff! I got so many compliments and I felt so pretty!! Major win for RTR!! I will be back!

Really loved this dress! Rented the L and XL and ended up wearing the large even though the bottom was a little tight just due to the top being so big in the xl. Dress is stretchy though and had lots of give. Top does take some work to keep off shoulder if that's how you choose to wear it. Danced all night in it and received tons of compliments.
Wore to a work awards dinner. Tons of compliments. Stretchy fabric that is nice and thick/forgiving.

links_reviews_title: Hot but classy - perfect for a reunion!
links_reviews_text: Sexy dress but high quality fabric and cut make it very tasteful and sophisticated. Fit true to size and very forgiving, had a lot of stretch to it. Very flattering! Have rented it twice and would again.

This dress was a nice material. I think it looked a lot better than the photo does it justice. I had a hard time figuring out the right way to pose in it. I wore a Medium, which is usually my size. It was comfortable!
Perfect! Fits perfect, and stops above the knee.

links_reviews_title: Rented for a trip to Vegas, but I didn't end up wearing it.
links_reviews_text: I didn't end up wearing this because it was a little more "showy" than I wanted for a trip with work friends. I ended up liking the fit of the 1X, which fit like an XL/12. If you have curvy hips/thighs this will be snug on the bottom and pretty short. It is flattering though and a great sassy option!

I rented this dress for a work gala that I attended and this dress was the perfect balance between sexy and sophisticated, but was still appropriate for the gala. The gala was in the evening time and the dress code was cocktail attire. I received so many compliments and the dress fit me like a glove! There wasn't much option for seating so the length of the skirt worked for me. I think it would have been a bit short if I would have sat down. Love this dress... I would rent again!

I wore this for two cocktail events and people loved it! It's a perfect black cocktail dress with a flare that makes it different from all the others. The only thing I didn't like about this dress was that it rides up, so I found myself pulling it down frequently.

Rented this for a friend's 40th birthday party. Skirt fit perfectly and hugged in all the right places. Top was a little roomier than I would've liked, but it was extremely comfortable. Fabric is on the thick side and hides a lot! Would totally rent this dress again.

So I'm 5'0ft and 115lbs, small bust, 34 years old and have two kids (so I have a bit of a pooch). This dress was amazing!! Fell off shoulder beautifully! This was a thick material so def not for warmer weather. It hugged me in all the right spots and tucked away what I wanted hidden! I wore a small, I am Inbetween small and medium depending. So I feel it runs true to size!

links_reviews_title: This dress is comfy, stylish, different than anything you'd find in a store!
links_reviews_text: You can wear either side down. Super comfy, fun, and easy to put on!
Fit very snug on my hips showing my curves. Very comfortable and I will definitely rent this again.

links_reviews_title: I received so many compliments! I felt very elegant!
links_reviews_text: Paying attention to the other reviews that said it ran small, I ordered the medium & it was perfect. It hugged me from the waist down, yet still allowed breathing room on the top. With the slight bare shoulder, I felt classy and the fabric was forgiving in that it allowed me to bend & move freely without feeling as if I'd have to adjust anything. Being a super cold evening, I was comfortable without a wrap. I wish I could buy this one! I felt like a sexy star!

This was a fun dress. Thick, but stretchy material. Pull over your head to get on (no zips!). You can have the neck line in many ways depending on your personal style. I just let it fall where it wanted to. Loved the butterfly-ish sleeves. Would rent this again for a different function.

It was a dress that I would have not been able to find myself It was perfect that I could try it for an evening then decide to buy it. The dress had a great stretch. I'm bigger on the bottom. Hips are 47". Waist 36". So the bottom fit more snugly. Normally I go for garments that skim my body, nothing too tight. This was a bit tight. I don't think the material could have stretched much more. But, because it's a high quality material, it didn't ripple or look like it was stretched too far. It was elegant. With shapers it smoothed everything and I didn't mind my hips being the feature of the night. My date really loved the dress and couldn't take his eyes off me. :) Bonus: The top can be styled in different ways. You can wear it off the shoulder or centered on the shoulder. I recommend an OBI belt with a wide front to further accentuate the waist. (Not pictured here.)

links_reviews_title: LNO!!! A bit top heavy but still looked good
links_reviews_text: The fabric felt sturdy, I was able to pull it from bottom up on so it didn't get deodorant or makeup stains or mess up my hair. I usually wear M/L but opted for the XL for comfort. The larger size did make it a bit longer & top heavy. Still enjoyed the look & comfort! The only reason I gave it 4 stars instead of 5 because it had a strong scent, which I'd like to believe it was from being professionally dry cleaned as opposed to the previous persons perfume.

links_reviews_title: Perfect fit, like it was made for me
links_reviews_text: Loved this dress. Tight in the booty and loose for the girls. It was very flattering. I added a belt for some flair and everyone raved over this dress.

Great cocktail party dress. Bottom is tight and fitted. Top is loose. The top can go off one shoulder, both shoulders. Or not off the shoulder at all! Received many compliments on the style. I wear a 6 or an 8.. ordered this on a medium and it fit perfectly.

links_reviews_title: Edgy! Sexy! But you have to pull it over your head
links_reviews_text: The only reason I gave it 4 stars is because you have to pull it over your head and thats awkward. Plus, it leaves white marks on the black fabric from your skin (don't wear deodorant until after putting it on!) Other than that, this dress was super sexy, edgy and surprisingly comfy. Love the off the shoulder look and love how it hugged my hips.

links_reviews_title: So much more to this dress than what you can see in the photos!
links_reviews_text: I glossed over this dress a few times because even though it's cute, I didn't necessarily think it was something you would rent that is out of the ordinary. Very wrong! The fabric is substantial and gives the dress a much more sophisticated quality. The top of the dress can be styled a couple different ways and the possibilities for versatility are Endless! I wore with both heels and thigh high boots and the look is totally different. Highly recommend!

This dress is incredibly flattering and I received so many compliments on it. I agree with other reviewers that the bottom is cut smaller than the top and I felt the need to size up to ensure coverage. I would have been happier if the dress was a bit longer. #holidayparty #littleblackdress

The top was loose and forgiving, the bottom tight and form fitting. The material was thick and felt expensive. The neckline stayed put and didn't need to be constantly adjusted. I received lots of compliments!
Let it hang without trying to force it to stay anywhere. Hubby loved it!

links_reviews_title: Very comfortable, super flattering. stands out subtley
links_reviews_text: If you are apple shaped, this dress is your best friend. My body is shaped like a pregnant man. I have narrow hips, a very rotund midsection and broad shoulders. Dresses are normally a nightmare because most dresses are cut for women who are shaped like actual women. If you read the reviews of this dress from other people, their biggest complaint is that it is too large on top and too tight on the bottom. Their burden is my blessing. This fit so well. It does not have a zipper, so it slips on. Fortunately the fabric is thick and stretchy. I wore this dress to a "50s Prom" themed event in the late fall. Instead of wearing it with one shoulder exposed, I wore it balanced on both shoulders so the neckline was more of a sculptural bateau. Perfect.

links_reviews_title: rented for semi formal work event
links_reviews_text: True to size. Fitted in bottom half area. Thick material so hides things well. I would rent this again and even buy it. You can wear to formal event or just girls night out. Very versatile. Im 5,3, curvy, normal size 0-2. Wore xs.

links_reviews_title: Amazing dress! Wore it for my rehearsal dinner. People were absolutely stunned. Loved it!
links_reviews_text: Great fabric, a tad short waisted for me. Otherwise - perfection. I'm going to buy it!

I was a little nervous before it arrived reading other reviews, but decided to give it a shot. This dress is awesome! Sized down for my back up and so glad that I did! The top of the size small was way too big. Sizing down made the top less crazy voluminous and the bottom was tight but not too bad. The fabric is thick, perfect for an autumn party, but stretchy. I'm small in the busy so I wore a regular bra with one strap tucked under my arm. So many compliments! It's a fun, little bit sexy silhouette and I'd definitely rent again.

links_reviews_title: Sophisticated Dress rented for Client event
links_reviews_text: This is a beautiful sophisticated LBD. I rented this for a Client event. The fit was perfect. The material is a bit thicker but extremely comfortable. The way the dress drapes off the shoulder is sophisticated but sexy, in a very classy way. Everything about this dress was perfect except that is does not have any zippers so I would suggest doing makeup or hair after sliding the dress over your head.

links_reviews_title: Skirt runs small and top runs large - bad fit
links_reviews_text: I normally wear a size 16 in RTR which would be a 0x-1x. This designer runs small. I decided that I would size up 2 sizes, and order a 3x, but my plan backfired. The top half of the dress was enormous and sloppy. The skirt part of the dress still cling to my hips though, showing every bulge, despite going 2 sizes up. I wanted this dress to work so badly because I feel that the style is so subtly sexy and classy, but unfortunately, I will be returning it, unworn, with the tags still on.
I wish I had a chance to wear this dress. It fit well in the hips, and the off the shoulder fell nicely, not fussy.

I rented this for a date night. Just like other reviews, it is very difficult to wear off the shoulder as seen. The lower body portion is much tighter than the top. The top is very large even one rolled it does not work. I was not able to wear this I had to send back immediately. I would not rent again
A little right in the arms and chest but not awful, super fun piece!

links_reviews_title: Recieved many compliments! Perfect for a casual day event.
links_reviews_text: This was a gorgeous fun and flirty dress! I flows beautifully and it is super comfortable! Would also look great with sandals! I am only 5ft and it was perfect on me!

I have had my eye on this one for a while and finally pulled the plug. I wore it to an engagement BBQ. It was perfect - dressed up my Sperry's w/ Ribbons and was so comfortable. It took me a little to figure out the sleeves but just went back to RTR model photo and figured it out. It was a huge hit too - I couldn't keep track of the compliments. There's nothing like a complete stranger coming up to you and saying WHERE did you get THAT dress! I'm more than happy to share the secret too! I loved the pockets. This could be dressed up, the fabric is a nice thick cotton but breezy enough for the hottest summer day.

links_reviews_title: Loved this dress. So flowy and fun
links_reviews_text: Super cute fit. Very wide and flattering. You won't stop twirling
Worn this for the airport and I got so many compliments... very comfy! I'm 5'7 and 34DD bras size.
Received a lot of compliments - very comfortable. The material is very thick and it has pockets! Used this dress on my vacation.

Rented this to wear to a rehearsal dinner! It was such a different, but amazing dress. The style is definitely not for everyone, as it is a bit of a statement. Nonetheless, I loved how different it was and got so many compliments on it!
Seriously- what girl doesn't love a roomy yet stylish dress. And when you add pockets?!?! Winner!
It was tighter around the bust. I loved the way it moved. Very different dress.

links_reviews_title: Playful, chic, and easy to wear!
links_reviews_text: Comfortable fit, billowy by design. This is one of the easiest-to-wear dresses I've ever possessed. It was so much fun and effortlessly chic! More shots on IG: Chicagoings.

links_reviews_title: comfortable and elegant for a garden party
links_reviews_text: fits perfect. im busty and it wasn't restraining
Super fun design and felt great on! Flattering despite volume. So glad I rented this one!
Great fun dress!! Loved the movement! Sadly it's already cold out and I can't wear it more ‚òπÔ∏è

links_reviews_title: Roomy but still an flattering fit
links_reviews_text: Arms are tight but flows beautifully
This was a beautiful fresh addition to my "all dresses" vacation. I received tons of compliments! I loved this very much ! Fits comfortably, definitely a winner!
This is such a fun dress. The origami folds make it unique, the navy and white stripes are classic. It's so swingy and fun. (I wore it to my birthday party. )

links_reviews_title: Perfect Summer Dress for Outdoor Event
links_reviews_text: This dress was amazing. Great fit even with my growing baby bump. The fabric was flowy and cool perfect for the outdoor fundraiser I attended. I received many compliments.
VERY flowy but super fun and received more compliments than anything I've rented. It's very trendy and great for a party! I chose this photo so show exactly how flowy it is when the wind blows :)

links_reviews_title: Wore this to a friends bday party - super fun and preppy!
links_reviews_text: Loved it! Super fun and preppy - great for a casual bday party
Very cool and different dress. I liked the look of it with a thick belt. Sleeves were a tiny bit tight, so I'm glad I sized up.

Wore this to a hapoy hour event during the summer with flat silver sandals bit would have tried it with wedges or converse if i had more opportunities to wear it. Feels well made but the fabric was started to show signs of constant dry cleaning which is why it lost a star. Versatile, stylish, and fun!

links_reviews_title: You can eat a LOT in this dress
links_reviews_text: I wore this dress on a work trip to wine country (pictured with some blue velvet booties on a different day) and it was a good choice. I drank all day and the tent shape looked exactly the same at the end of the day. If you need to hide a food/wine baby (or, you know...an actual baby) this dress is great for that! OTOH, like all other things MGSM, there was no give and it was tight and restrictive under my arms (which I'd say are medium-framed. I am not very fine-boned, but overall am petite). Eventually, I just lowered the zipper by an inch to stay comfortable, because YOLO (by that I mean I did that because I was inebriated). Because this dress managed to be both too big and too small at the same time, I am going to say that it averages out to being TTS.

links_reviews_title: I have never received more compliments than when I wore this dress! It was a show stopper!
links_reviews_text: Wow, I have literally never had some many people compliment and ask where I got a dress. The dress is absolutely gorgeous. The structured top and interesting sleeves really compliment the full bottom. If I could, I would buy this dress. Love love love!

It was a bit hard to figure out the sleeves and I'm. Took a chance with the sizing but it ended up super cute. It has pockets and was comfortable and roomy. It's super different so I received plenty of compliments!

This dress was so pretty and very flirty! It was a perfect choice for a party in wine country. There was no need for a strapless bra. It fit perfectly and was very true to size. It is a perfect fit around the zipper area (around the chest) but loose-fitting elsewhere, so I'd say go with your regular dress size. I could eat whatever I wanted the entire day and not worry about it!
Wanted to keep it forever

One of my favorite pieces. I've rented it twice now. Wore it to work, brunch, and for my maternity shoot. It is a LOT of dress but definitely wearable. The fabric is on the heavier side so I wasn't too concerned about wind picking it up. Got a ton of compliments. Definitely bump friendly. :)

links_reviews_title: Great maternity wear for a non-maternity dress!
links_reviews_text: This dress was really comfortable and fit great for maternity wear, with the exception of the bust and arm draping. If you're pregnant, I recommend sticking to your normal pre-pregnancy size. If you're not pregnant, order a size down. I'm six months pregnant and it fit nicely all around the belly and hips. The fabric is lightweight and breathable, but not so lightweight that it's see through. I wore this for a luncheon and would consider it even for everyday wear. I read previous reviews and ordered a size down, but it didn't fit my growing bust from being pregnant. I couldn't zip it all the way, even without wearing a bra. I gave it 4 stars versus 5 because the sleeve cuffs were kinda awkward--I could only fit one arm through the off-shoulder sleeve and couldn't figure out how the other arm was supposed to fit draped off the shoulder like it does in the stock photo because it wasn't nearly wide enough to fit over my shoulders (and I'm not broad-shouldered or anything).

Breezy but fitted up top. A lot of fabric, but in a way that is somehow flattering. Sleeves are unique. Pockets! I had alittle difficult zippering up the dress on my own - the zipper helps keep it fitted up top so it's still flattering with all the fabric.

I wore this dress in New York during the day, for fashion week. I received SO many compliments on it. Its comfortable and picks up in the wind while walking around leaving a dramatic, but still casual and effortless impression.

links_reviews_title: Easy, breezy dress for rehearsal dinner in Louisiana
links_reviews_text: I rented this dress for my friend's casual rehearsal dinner in Louisiana. I wanted a dress that was comfortable and fun because of the Louisiana heat and humidity. It was perfect! I recommend for anyone looking for something trendy and loose.

links_reviews_title: Loved this dress! Photographs so well.
links_reviews_text: Great style for maternity. Unique dress which got tons of compliments. I am 8 months pregnant in picture. Runs small at bust, size up one.
I thought this dress fit perfectly no issues at all. It was so comfortable and yet so stylish, got loads of compliments.

links_reviews_title: Very fun, with plenty of compliments!
links_reviews_text: I was a bit worried since everyone posted about how it was great for maternity, and I'm not pregnant. Lol. Many reviews mentioned that it ran big, so I ordered the equivalent of a size 6 & 8, when I normally get an 8 & 10. There was no need for that. The only part that was too tight for the 8 was the arms, they weren't as drapey as I would have liked them. One arm was tight, and was bothering me by the end of dinner. It was a wee bit tight across the top. I'm pear shaped, 5'10", 160 lb, and a 36C. Regardless, I had fun in it, it was super comfy, plenty of compliments, and it had pockets! I would rent it again.
This dress is incredible. Billowy but light enough for August in New Orleans. So comfy, I was able to eat all the BBQ I wanted without worrying about busting any zippers. Also, pockets!
Very fashionable, fun and feminine! Wore to a casual dinner but could've been worn with heels and out to a trendy night out. Great dress!
Received multiple compliments all day wearing this dress! Absolutely beautiful. Definitely can size down , unless you are top heavy or broad shoulders. (Dress zips on the side)
Beautiful dress it's so unique and playful - I can't return it yet ! I want to wear it all summer long - it's comfortable and it's beautiful material
Wore this amazing dress for brunch. I am in love with it. Ran small in the arm sockets and I couldn't lift my arms but the dress was lovely.
Super cute, comfortable dress! I received many compliments. Seemed to be a little long but overall a great dress!

I wasn't sure how I felt about renting this one because it's not my typical style. But I kept coming back to it and finally went for it. As soon as it arrived, I knew it was perfect. Super comfortable, loved having pockets, and the cutouts were perfectly placed to give the dress an extra kick. I wanted to keep this one for sure. Only one small negative (which wasn't a big deal) was that it was really warm to dance in. Rent this and you won't be disappointed.

This dress was true to size. I didn't wear a bra, which I kind of regret now, but not a super big deal. I'm 5'2, 130 pounds and I wear a 36C. It was perfect for the red carpet event I attended. It's super warm which was perfect for a December night. I got lots of compliments and felt lovely and elegant.

Absolutely obsessed with this dress. My favorite rental to date. It fits like a glove, and the fabric has a nice thick lining--to cover any little tummy you might have. Cutouts are perfectly placed so as to be flattering on most body types. The lace is of amazing quality. Wish I could live in this dress.

I usually wear a 0/2, but wore the 4 in this dress. The waist is smallest part of the fit...the bust and skirt were a little large in the 4. Loved the pockets and cutout detail. Won't be able to wear a bra with this one. Overall, a more fun LBD.

This dress was super fun. I wore it for a bachelorette party. So many compliments on this dress. It's August so it was a little warm for a long dress and long sleeves. The material is high quality but the dress is overall pretty heavy. Styled it with black pointy heels, a black clutch and black long earrings!
I got so many compliments. This dress is so cool! I didn't want to take it off

links_reviews_title: Love how different and cool this dress was.
links_reviews_text: I sized up because of everyone's reviews but the 8 was way to big. Got a 6 last minute luckily.

links_reviews_title: for a camera-shy girl, i can't stop looking at myself in the photos
links_reviews_text: delicate details but so well-made i didn't worry about tearing it while tearing it up on the dance floor. kept me warm enough, didn't sweat, breathable, comfortable, if you're worried about a full-length dress fitting a petite body, don't!it's the perfect length and sat surprisingly well on my hips and waist. paired with a 3/4 sleeve-length, hip length cocoon coat and ankle booties. OH AND YES THE CUTOUTS! AND POCKETS. ok, I'm hyper, obsessing, but not going to purchase - definitely a one-time event dress to me. PS have to brag that i got low got low, jumped around, pulled off a few handstands...it stayed on without riding up, maintaining full coverage.

links_reviews_title: Unique approach to a high-neck lace dress!
links_reviews_text: I would not have chosen this dress off a hanger, but it truly changed my mind one I tried it on. It looks conservative in shape, but is young and edgy with the lace overlay and cut outs. I wore this to a rocker-chic Grammy event and received tons of compliments! Pros: True to size. No need for extra jewelry because the high neck and sleeves are already great details. Keeps you a bit warm with the lace overlay...it's something for cold nights. TBD Pro / Con: Classy under-boob? Up to you, ladies! Cons: The clasp on the neck makes it quite tight.

links_reviews_title: Perfect remix of the the LBD!
links_reviews_text: Wore this for a dinner party and it was an absolute hit! It fit like a glove, beautifully made, AND it has pockets:-) What more could a girl ask for?

links_reviews_title: Stunning! My favorite rental to date!!
links_reviews_text: Simply wow! Received tons of compliments all night. Love the elegance of the fabric, the classic silhouette and the edge of the cutouts- such a perfect combo!! Would love to rent this again! Note: fabric has zero stretch making the dress a bit constricting and very challenging to zip by yourself.

I wore this dress to a NYE wedding and although many other people wore black, it really stood out. I received compliments all night long, and felt great! I recommend going one size up from your regular size, because the dress doesn't have any stretch. If you're a smaller bust size, you probably won't need a bra, which makes it more comfortable. Loved this look and will definitely rent from this brand again!

links_reviews_title: Runs a bit small; but incredible dress!!
links_reviews_text: I was a bit nervous, as this was my first rental from RTR and my original dress came in ripped. However, the customer service was amazing and they overnighted me (this) replacement, as my original dress was out of stock. There weren't many reviews, but this is a STUNNER. it's gorgeous in person (the pictures don't do it enough justice) and incredibly comfortable to wear all night long. It is a bit small, I'm usually a 2R in dresses and went with the 4R for this dress. Can't recommend enough. Only complaint is the pockets do stick out a bit, but only noticeable to the wearer.

I'm obsessed with this brand and own a few pieces. I was so thrilled to see self portrait get added to RTR. The quality of Hans dresses are unbeatable. Thick lace, modest with the right amount of edge. I loved the cutouts and length of the skirt. I am usually a 6 or an 8 but for self portrait I always go for an 8 because the under layers can run a little small and there isn't a lot of give. This dress is a 10
The detail was amazing. Formal but stylish. Got compliments the moment I walked in the door.
Perfect fit . Gorgeous dress

links_reviews_title: Great dress for an evening wedding. I got lots of compliments-fun but sophisticated!
links_reviews_text: Dress fit well-slightly on the small side. I am generally a 2-4 and got a 4R in this dress, and it was just right. Only thing that bothered me were the pockets-they stuck out from underneath the dress and made it look a little bumpy.

links_reviews_title: I received compliments all night on my dress.
links_reviews_text: It was so tight that I had to wear the size 4, and it was still uncomfortably tight. I was also paranoid about the skirt underneath due to it being very short.
This dress was perfect for our engagement shoot. We were going for a classic and fashionable look. Loved this dress!
Dress is beautiful, kinda difficult to zip up alone. The cutouts give it a very sexy vibe. Length is slightly long for someone like me I'm 5'3

SO detailed!! This dress is truly like no other. I would definitely say it ran on the small side and has no stretch, so size up! Works best for cups A-C since the bust is fitted and lace. The cutouts in the stomach/waist area adds some spice to the dress without it being too revealing. Will definitely be renting this in the future!
It was so tight that it didn't look good on me. Will be ordering the next size up. Beautiful dress though.
Fit well!

This was true to size in that a size smaller would be too tight and a size up would be too loose. But it just wasn't very flattering on me- it was very tight in the chest (and I do not have a large chest) and a little loose in the waist cut-out area. I could've worn it in a pinch, but it didn't make me look my best.

Very interesting dress with a hidden sexy appeal. However, I felt that the sleeves were super tight and I had a hard time putting my hands and arms through. The lace was thick and a bit itchy as well. The rest of the dress fit super well though.
Originally this was a backup, it was the MOST AMAZING dress. Much better in person than in pics.
Dress had a gothic style to it and made my chest look extremely flat. It was also received with a noticeable hole directly in the center of the abdomen.

links_reviews_title: Strange. It was long and large. The cutouts fit more along my lower abs than where the photo shows.
links_reviews_text: Would only recommend for tall gals with long torsos. I'm 5'4" and the cutours hit in all the wrong places. The dress was also very large and the material was stiff. I'm sure it looks great on a select number of tall, medium sized gals who can fill it out in the right places. If you are petite, I would avoid.

links_reviews_title: Overall you will get tons off complements!
links_reviews_text: there is a lot of black so i wore bright earrings to contrast. it is perfect for winter and summer because it has sleeves that are long but the holes allow some ventilation. super flattering without showing too much!
Very little coverage in chest, and not great if you're tall or have a longer torso. Lace is pretty heavy and stiff.

links_reviews_title: The design is really outstanding. It looks great in person.
links_reviews_text: Definitely could have sized up in this from a 2 to a 4 as my big butt kept the liner riding up but all in all a very beautiful dress of substantial weight.

links_reviews_title: Wore this to a winter wedding and got compliments all night!
links_reviews_text: I am 5'2" and 105lbs. Usually wear petite size clothing but the 0R fit great. I wore this to a winter wedding and at first was unsure whether or not the dress would be too revealing with the cutouts. I ended up choosing conservative accessories (black pumps, pearls earrings, minimal jewelry) to class it up and am happy I decided to go through with wearing the dress. I received compliments all night and it was also very comfortable to wear! I would definitely rent this dress again!
did not wear

I got lots of compliments on this dress, but despite going up a size, it was still too tight in the arms, chest, and shoulders. The details of this dress are great and so is the quality; it's really well made. Definitely made for a small bust, though. By the end of the night, I felt like it was suffocating me.
Didn't wear. It was too small.

I rented this for a date to the museum. I knew we would be taking pictures, and the dress really shows a lot of detail with all the different textures. I didn't wear a bra with it, but you can probably get away with a black or nude strapless bra, although it may show a little. It was definitely a fun dress to wear.

So the fit was all over the place for me. I think my bust was too big for this because they fit, kinda but the rest was too big. There was no shape to the dress honestly and I loved the way to the top part and the arms looked but the rest was just blah for me.
This dress is beautifully made if you are 6 feet tall and weigh like a model. It was NOT flattering at all!!
The slip underneath is a bit short. It was too short for my figure.

links_reviews_title: Beautiful but small in the hips
links_reviews_text: Love this dress, ordering the next size up. Not sure if the labels are UK or US.
This dress was perfect for my event. The length was good with 3" heels (I'm 5'7"). I am normally a size 6 and the 8 fit almost perfectly.
5"2 110 lbs and the 0r fit perfectly except in length. It was about 2 inches too long with 4 inch heels. Still gorgeous dress.
This gown was perfect for the event. I vary between a size 6 and 8 and did need the larger 8. It was very flattering and I received many compliments! I wore 3" heels and the length was just right.
Dress was great. Easy fit, not too tight and draped perfectly. I was very comfortable. I am 5'5" and it was a bit long.
This dress fit perfectly and was very comfortable. The length was perfect for heels. I didn't end up wearing it, but I did love this dress.
I LOVED this dress. It was a gorgeous color, with beautiful simple detail. It was super comfortable. Perfect for a gala! True to size.

I was looking forward to wearing this dress but the virus got in the way. It is a beautiful color, lovely material, fits true to size. Only flaw was a little of my strapless bra peeked out the sleeveless side, but fashion tape would have fixed that real quick.

The color of this dress is beautiful- a deep rich teal. The fit is great, but I should have ordered the long. I'm 5'9", so it looked a bit short with 3" heels, but still okay. Overall, a beautiful, TTS dress. My one complaint is how thin the fabric is. It bunched in the back a little, which wouldn't be an issue if the fabric were a bit thicker.

I rented a 12 regular and it was too small all over (which normally in a 12 I just find the midsection to be tight as I carry all my weight there and have relatively narrow shoulders/rib cage). The color was very pretty. I am 5'-8" and probably would have preferred a long size if the dress had fit, which I wish it had because the cut of the dress is VERY flattering in the stomach area.

seemed like the day I was looking there was not much available in my size, do decided to select this. Out of the 4 I requested, this was the only one I held onto. I am 5'6" and the length is perfect with heels Good fit in general. Looks more elegant in person that in the photo.
The dress was just ok. This was my first time wearing Rachel Zoe and I expected very nice fabric. The fabric felt thin and unstructured. It ran true to size, both in size and length.
Too long for 5'4" with 1 1/2 heels. Loved the dress it was beautiful! But too roomy in the bust for me 34b. I think maybe a size smaller may have fit better. Lots of compliments!

I rented it as a back up for a formal affair -- It was slightly too big for me (5'5'', 135lbs) in the top so my friend ended up wearing it. She's 5'2'', 140lbs, and with a nice pair of heels it worked perfectly. She could wear a strapless bra under the dress and she was comfortable all night. The slit and the draping are classy and sexy and the way the drape hangs in front of you hides any 'imperfect' areas you may be worried about!

links_reviews_title: Did not wear to Black Tie Wedding
links_reviews_text: Gorgeous color!
Dress was beautiful and flattering, and I probably would have worn it if it was in better condition. However, the bottom was stained and the fabric itself is pilling.

links_reviews_title: The wedding was absolutely beautiful. My dress was perfect.
links_reviews_text: I was pleased

links_reviews_title: Lovely color,nice simple style, not fitted
links_reviews_text: Didnt end up wearing, ran a tiny big I'd say. Still long for a petite but with heels it would be fine. Color was beautiful. Just didnt feel like it was super high quality. Would prefer a bit more fitted...liked the slit in front

links_reviews_title: I felt like a goddess in this dress.
links_reviews_text: So flattering to a smaller chest and athletic shoulders. Forgiving in tummy area. I honestly have never felt more glamorous.
Beautiful dress, was a bit too wide and worn out at the hem
This dress is sexy, unique and forgiving. Win/win/win!

This was a super easy fun rental. The dress is a nice thick material and I love the halter. I will say because the material is so thick you should size down. I tried on the medium and there was a lot of extra fabric so the small was a much better fit.

The original dress I wanted to rent was unavailable but I was allowed to select this one in a pinch. I was happy with this decision. This dress feels and looks like a dressy sweater dress. Very comfortable and form flattering. Adhesive bra was worn with outfit.

links_reviews_title: The dress arrived before scheduled date and it was super easy to return!
links_reviews_text: Simple yet sexy! I received many stares and compliments all night long!
Great cut, material thick. Runs a little big but very stretchy
This dress does the impossible. It is comfortable and cute.
Thick, stretchy sweater fabric that really hugs your curves. The slit is high, which I looooove. Because the fabrics is so thick, it's pretty forgiving.
Fun and sexy dress. Hard to keep from riding up when walking but looks great when standing and sitting.
If you're thinking about renting this dress do it. Structure material, easy to wear, stunning.

This LBD was absolutely perfect! It hugged all the right places but the material is thick enough to not show any unwanted problem areas. I didn't wear a bra, but a strapless would work. I love the way it fit snug around the neck but had an elastic stretch! Wanted to keep it forever!

links_reviews_title: In love. So comfy and the slit is perfect for easy walking.
links_reviews_text: Runs big, I am usually a medium and I got a small instead

This dress is absolutely perfect for a wedding or special occasion. Definitely plan to rent it again for future events. I used it for an early May wedding, but I would wear this year round. Highly contemplated buying it and HIGHLY recommend!!
This dress is awesome and I got so many compliments. You can wear a bra if you get creative and the slit sometimes moves , so be careful but it's worth it!

I got this for a bachelorette party. Didn't end up wearing because we went more casual but it was an amazing dress. It bunches up and little though and the slit was a little high for a normal night out
This dress does magic things to your body, y'all. It's a magic dress. Rent it. Love it. You will not regret it.
Nice material, not too thick, not too thin, just right. Comfortable, hugs all the curves, sexy and classy. Haven't loved a rental this much in a long time. Tons of compliments, no cons from me.

I'm generally a size 4-6, but the Small was extremely tight, and the Medium wasn't much better. It's a knit material, so it's basically just a clingy knit dress. RTR sent me the large, which might have worked, but there was an odd lump in the hip on that dress -- couldn't figure it out, maybe it was stored on a hanger oddly before it got to me. Potentially I could have gotten away with the Medium, but I just wasn't quite comfortable in it for my event. If I was going out for a super swanky evening I might have reconsidered, I just needed something not quite so form fitting.

links_reviews_title: Runs a little bit big, size down for the true bandage dress look. SO CUTE!

links_reviews_text: Dress rides up a bit but is super flattering. Loved the neckline. Would rent again!
Its definitely made for ladies with a very slender figure. Im more of an hourglass and it just doesnt look flattering on me, it looks a little vulgar. Im 145lb and 5'6"
Slightly Stretchy material, elegant dress for the holidays

Love the cut and style of this dress but I ordered a size too large. I can usually still make bigger clothes work but the fabric is on the stiffer side and doesn't hang on your body. So I will need to reorder in a XS.
This dress was perfect for my vacation in Paris. It's so chic and it fit me like a glove. I received so many compliments! :)
I have rented this dress multiple times now. Definitely a go-to and hides what it needs to! If you're thinking about renting, do it honey!
I would size down for a more fitted look next time. My husband loved this dress, but I felt it could have been more snug, especially in the chest and upper back.
Everything about this dress was great. Rent it!
Liked the fit on this dress and got lots of compliments - but the slit was even higher than I expected. Had to be careful. Not very carefree for dancing.
It was skin tight. Not the material I was expecting. Neck was the most part tight. I didn't end up wearing.

links_reviews_title: This dress it cute. Heavy material but fits as shown.
links_reviews_text: This dress it cute. Heavy material but fits as shown.

links_reviews_title: The dress was so comfortable and a classic!
links_reviews_text: Lots of stretch. Could likely go own a size if you want a tighter fit. The split in the front was just right and not too high up. I wore this for my birthday dinner with black pumps and some red earrings for a nice pop!

I rented this for a date night out, was looking for something form fitting but not too form fitting. This was just okay. The ribbing was heavier than I anticipated, and while it fits great waist up, the ribbing at split had this weird border to it, that made it tug at the ends. This area did not hold its shape as well as I expected it to. I would not rent again.

Very fitted but flattering, and the slit is a nice touch. Bit tight around the neck but wasn't too uncomfortable. Wore for a late April wedding in NYC with a faux fur coat and got lots of compliments.
I ordered one size up because I was worried about the body-con look. It was too large. Definitely order your true size.
Didn't suit by body style.

In general I loved the dress. Its tight but not uncomfortable, very flattering. The only thing I didn't like was the sides of the slit kind of curled out (the fabric) and I couldn't fix it with ironing.
I love this dress. It's sexy and comfortable. Unfortunately, I went by the reviews and sized up. The dress was too large. I am reordering my usual size in hopes that it fits!

links_reviews_title: Tons of compliments. Really nice fit!
links_reviews_text: True to size
Cute, stretchy, but the split is wider than I thought.
Fit really well! Fabric is a little thicker so might not be the best if you're somewhere warm. Love this dress and would definitely rent again!
This dress is gorgeous and so luxurious. Can't wait to wear it to an event someday! Runs small though so next time I will size up.

This was my first RTR experience & it was great! The dress did feel a little tight around the bust when sitting down, but I didn‚Äôt mind because it helped me feel more secure since it‚Äôs strapless. I could tell it was well-worn due to some stray threads & the tag was halfway torn off, but very minor & barely noticeable.

I absolutely LOVED wearing this dress and I got so many compliments! I wore this for a wedding during the winter season because it is a quilted material. I loved the hi-low detail and it was so elegant! Definitely one of my fave dresses I have worn! And I rented black beaded dangle earrings from RTR to pair with!!

This dress is comfortable and gorgeous! Was the perfect choice for our gala, I received so many compliments throughout the night. It is a heavy, quality dress so the top needs to be fitted. I always wear a 0 but luckily had the 2 as the back-up since the 0 was very tough to zip and I'm not even very busty!
Felt like a Barbie Doll
Lots of compliments when I wore this to a fashion show. Very beautiful and the pockets were a nice touch. It is a bit long, so if you're 5"4 and under high heels are a must
Very little give in the top. My husband used pliers to pull the zipper up! Gorg though, so totally worth the corset-like experience.

links_reviews_title: Love Love Love this dress! I got so many compliments!
links_reviews_text: The colors are so rich, and the pockets are clutch. If I were to rent again, I would try and get the 2P. While the 2R fit, it was a little long and didn't get the true high-low hemline effect, but either way it was a wonderful dress.

links_reviews_title: I love this dress! It fit perfectly!
links_reviews_text: The material is thicker and I was worried as I was attending an outdoor event, however it ended up being cooler and the dress was perfect! I am smaller chested so I needed to wear stick on cups to help fill out the dress. I did love the pockets and I received many compliments about the dress!!
Normally, I would wear a 6, and the 8 was snug. Worried it would drag, but no issues with 3-inch heels. Compliments all night. First RTR order, and I'll rent again!
I usually wear a small/4/6. I couldn't get the zipper to close. I'd recommend sizing up. Initial feel is like wearing a blanket or quilt since the fabric is thick. Love the pockets. Photographs well.

links_reviews_title: I loved having pockets and I literally told everyone about them who complimented me.
links_reviews_text: It really runs small!!! I‚Äôm generally a 2/4 for dresses and I read a lot of reviews about this dress running small, so I tried getting 4/6 P since I‚Äôm only 5‚Äô1, but 2/4 P were the only ones available and I didn‚Äôt want to have a dress that dragged too much on the ground. The 4 P I ended up wearing to my prom with heels still hit the ground, so regular would‚Äôve been bad! Anyways, 4 P was super small on me and to zip it, I had to do it below my chest and didn‚Äôt eat much in preparation to wear this dress. I would highly recommending ordering a size up since this dress was super tight around my chest, I‚Äôm a 34 C. I loved wearing this dress to my prom since it‚Äôs so unique and I really stood out which was my goal! The pockets were great and I was able to hold people‚Äôs phones and keys in them. Overall, this dress was amazing and comfortable, but definitely order larger than your usual for a better fit.

This dress was absolutely beautiful. The cute and shape was lovely. There is boning which is a little uncomfortable, but I did not need to wear a bra because it was held up so well. The fabric is a bit thicker, so I wouldn't recommend for an outside event.

links_reviews_title: This dress was so unique and a show stopper.
links_reviews_text: I rented a similar dress to this in the spring of 2018 so I was ready for the waist to fit more snug. That dress and this dress were both so beautiful and jaw dropping! I was a bit nervous on this one because of the difference in length but it was perfect! I would highly recommend opting for your second size to be a size up - the material is thicker. I'm usually a size 6 or 8 and I opted for an 8R and 10R and wore the 10R. I'm a DD, around 167 lbs.
This dress was fun, pretty, and easy to move in. Got several compliments on it.

This dress was fabulous. The color and quality were amazing. I got so many compliments. As other reviewers mentioned, you will need an extra set of hands to zip it up. Oh, and I almost forgot to mention the best feature‚Ä¶POCKETS! I highly recommend this dress and RTR!

links_reviews_title: This dress received so many compliments! I wish I could own this one in my closet! Definitely rent!
links_reviews_text: It fits true to size so I probably could have used a size up just because I'm top heavy. The length was perfect

This gorgeous dress does run small. I'm typically a 4, and could not breath in it. The 6 was still snug, but much more comfortable. I enjoyed the heavier fabric of this dress for the wintertime gala that I attended!

I got a lot of compliments on the dress! It was good for dancing and twirling around. The fabric is thicker, so I wouldn't wear it for the summer and probably not spring either, but it's great for fall or winter! The pattern is really great. I paired it with a purple shoe to complete the look!

links_reviews_title: So many compliments on this dress! Fun, different, not something I would normally buy!
links_reviews_text: Runs small, I am a 25 in jeans normally + 5'7" tall, wear a 32D in bra, athletic build. I did not ent up trying the 2R even because the 4R was tight on the bust.

This dress was not flattering on me at all. Something was wrong with the zipper-so that didn't help. But it just made me look short and stocky. I did not end up wearing it. Plus, it seemed to run a size small.

This was the perfect dress for a black tie New Year's eve event! The colors are so vibrant and rich! I got so many compliments on it all evening! Fits true to size and the high low is very flattering! 100% recommend

links_reviews_title: This gown is fun and beautiful!
links_reviews_text: I was a little nervous about finding the right fit for my first RTR experience. I spent a long time reading reviews and looking at photos of my size doppelg√§ngers on the app. This gown was my back up and I loved the color, fabric and fit. The entire process of choosing a trying dresses made my event even more fun. I will use RTR again!

links_reviews_title: Everyone was gushing over my gown
links_reviews_text: I LOVED this dress! From the moment I put it on, I felt so elegant and classic. I wore this to a formal wedding and got compliments all night!
