I originally ordered the 2P (I'm 4'11), and got the backup in 4P because of reviews that I saw about it running small around the bust. If you're a true 34B you're going to want at least the 4P, because the top has no give. I ended up wearing the 4P, and it did touch the floor a bit (I was wearing 4" inch heels), but it wasn't long enough that people stepped on it a ton. It was great for dancing, and although it's heavy fabric, it was breathable. I would rent this dress again and again! If you have a high tolerance for flattery, you should rent it, too

links_reviews_title: It has pockets, and it feels so good the weight is great. Couldn‚Äôt wear it but loved having it on !!
links_reviews_text: The or was to thought, and the 2r was to big! But omg this dress is gold and I wore it around the house and took selfies with the dogs!

links_reviews_title: Felt like a celeb. Someone even said I looked like one! :)
links_reviews_text: Chose this for a red carpet holiday party and it was a hit! I got tons of compliments and felt like a starlet. I loved catching glimpses of my reflection in windows as I walked by; the dress would catch some wind and billow and flow behind me. The pockets are a nice bonus! I didn't need to carry a purse and my belongings felt secure even while dancing. The color and texture are gorgeous. This is definitely a photo-worthy dress! 1 star docked because, as others have stated, the bust seems to run a bit large so I was pulling it up from time to time. Also, I could feel the wire boning poking me a bit on the side. Hope that gets fixed!

Loved the dress! Beautiful thick fabric! Got tons of compliments throughout the night! Fits very true to size, the zipper is not a one person job, you will absolutely need an assist on the zipper! Dress has definitely been worn a ton and the metal supports in the front around your busy are very bent. Still amazing, no one can tell those small details. Would rent again!

I rented this to take my senior pictures outside the symphony center!! I also used this picture as my professional headshot. The dress fit wonderfully. The hem was luxuriously heavy but the top was definitely a little snug. would rent again!

I've never received so many compliments on a dress! It is a little bit darker in person compared to the model photos, fyi. I wish I would have sized down because I had pull up on the bodice throughout the night (I have a small chest, though.) But that mild annoyance was so worth it for the dress. AND it has pockets so I didn't need to carry a clutch or anything. I 100% would order this dress again!

I loved loved this dress. Rent the runway always makes me feel confident and beautiful. And the endless compliments from other wedding guests really solidified that feeling! The wire on the inside did dig in my side a bit, as other reviews stated. Left a mark for a couple days...but I enjoyed wearing this dress so much I'll still give 5 stars! It stayed up all night with no issues! I have a smaller rib cage though, so keep that in mind when fitting your body type.

This dress was gorgeous! I am 5'3, so I was afraid it might drag on the ground, but it was perfect with a little bit of a heel. I'm pear-shaped, so I thought my usual size (8) would fit since the bottom is so loose, but it wouldn't zip. The 10 fit almost perfectly, so definitely size up! It was perfect for a cooler night, as the fabric is thicker. I got so many compliments and felt really beautiful in this dress.
Great fit, comfortable and forgiving!

links_reviews_title: Most compliments I‚Äôve ever gotten for a dress! Made me feel comfortable and beautiful!
links_reviews_text: Maxing dress! Great fit, reviews said it was too tight for busty girls but I was able to wear my usual size without an issue. It is a bit hard to zip up as the material is quite thick but it is very comfortable and great for an autumn formal event. The color is stunning! This dress is a must!

This dress is gorgeous! I got so many compliments throughout the evening. I wore the 4R, and it was pretty snug around the bust. Just for reference my measurements are 34C and 28 in waist. The 4R worked, but in the future I'd size up to a 6R.
This dress was super special. Very comfortable and felt like a princess. Tons of compliments.
Loved this dress. Beautiful vibrant rich color abs thick fabric that makes the dress look expensive.

Loved this dress! The boning was a little out of line, but nothing noticeable in pictures or too annoying throughout the night. The material is very thick; great for a fall event. I received so many compliments wearing this dress; would highly recommend.

links_reviews_title: Love the hi lo hem and the fabric. This dress really helps make statement
links_reviews_text: I typically wear a 4/6 especially in dresses that fit in the waist. I wore an 8 and was a little snug. IT IS WORTH THE MENTAL BLOCK OF GOING UP A SIZE OR TWO. This dress was show stopping. Received so many compliments

I wore the larger size due to there being no give to the fabric. I loved the dress. I was given many compliments and felt it stood out in a sea of black dresses. I will say that the boning was quite uncomfortable in the bodice. In the size 6 that I wore, the boning was quite bent out of shape and even a bit twisted. This is probably due to normal wear and tear. It didn't affect the look, just the comfort level a bit. I love that it has pockets! I carried my phone and lipstick around in it! I am 5'11 and the long was perfect, even with 3' heels.

links_reviews_title: Beautiful detail on the dress but not the most comfortable.
links_reviews_text: I actually ended up wearing my backup style to my event instead of this dress because my husband preferred the other style and it was more comfortable. I really liked this though. I was afraid of how the quality would be based off other reviews I read, but both sizes I received were in great shape and did not dig into me as some others had experienced. The back was a little tight though in the 6 and was way too big in the 8. Also the zipper on the 8 was VERY difficult to get to move. I loved the pockets but the dress was a bit wide looking. I also loved the detailing and coloring of the dress.
Perfect dress! So flattering and got so many compliments on it. The back was a little big but nothing to worry about. I love this dress!

This is perfect for curvy girls. Although my booty was a little bit tight in it. So I recommend sizing up or expects to have issues sitting down. I wear a large which is typically my size but it was tight in the bottom. Overall a great dress that's sexy and classy at the same time. Loved the lace and long sleeves
I wore this for my birthday dinner in February. It is comfortable and stylish with the perfect amount of sexy. I felt great in it!

This dress is so pretty, but I had to wear black tights because it was so short I was afraid I was going to put on a show. (I am 5'4"). This dress also runs just a little snug through the shoulders so there was no over the head arm dancing ha! Overall a beautiful dress and I received may compliments. RTR for the win, again!
Loved the dress! Got several compliments at the party.
I loves this dress . It buttons in the back at the hip so it was a little snug but still fit . So pretty love the open back . I wore this for family pix

links_reviews_title: Pretty but not loving the back
links_reviews_text: Pretty dress but the lace around the neck in the front doesn't stand up straight so it's a bit awkward since the lace around the sides and back of of the neck are up ... also not a fan of the back . The shoulders have a bit too much fabric so it's not completely taut in the back

The open back fits kind of weird. It hangs open. But I'm guessing if you had very large breasts, it would pull the front fabric and the back would fit better. I'm a 34 c and it didn't do the trick. It's also very short. When I sat the bottom on my butt touched the seat. Oh well! I didn't sit much! Dress was cute, but not a huge fan.

links_reviews_title: I wore this dress for a work event at NYFW.
links_reviews_text: Fits great! True to size, comfortable, easy to move around in. Got many compliments on it at NYFW so, win, win!

links_reviews_title: Such a sexy, fun dress to dance the night away in!
links_reviews_text: Fit true to size, but may run a tad short for taller gals.
The dress was beautiful, elegant and yet the open back added a sexy touch. I loved it so much but the dress was a bit big on the top

links_reviews_title: LOVE.LOVE.LOVE! The dress, earrings, everything was perfect.
links_reviews_text: The dress runs large up top. I felt the length was perfect.

links_reviews_title: It was the perfect dress for a fun night out. Many compliments and it was so comfortable.
links_reviews_text: It fit really well. I would keep this one in my closet if I could.
Beautiful dress!

This dress is beautiful and fits true to size. however, the gap in the back of the dress is too large for the dress size and it made the side gape open and we had to tape the hem down to keep it laying flat. For someone who has a wider rib cage area or midriff The dress would prefer that you perfectly!

LOVED. THIS. DRESS. and felt so confident in it. Wore it in Vegas and it was perfect... it's a short dress, but the long sleeves and high neck gave it a perfect balance of sexy and classy. Got compliments all night long in it - and my husband loved this one!
Really tight around the waist, chest was fine with a good bra, underskirt was super short! Overall it looked fantastic with some flaws

This dress is really fun for a night out. It is a short dress, I woke recommend wearing boy shorts underneath. Some wore tights but I felt like it was too much black with tights. I am 5'9 and 140lbs. I received a ton of compliments on this dress. Open back is very sexy.

I really loved this dress! The lace was gorgeous, and the sleeves were so fun. The open back was perfect and it was no problem with no bra- however the dress was SUPER short. Barely covered the backside, but fit really well other than that.

links_reviews_title: This dress looked perfect with my black tights and pumps! I stayed quite warm during Iowa's January
links_reviews_text: #nye
Wish I could buy this dress! Only issue I had was that the collar would not stand up. Received compliments all night. I'm a 32 D and wore a sticky bra but could have gotten away without it.

I rented this for a New Years wedding and it was perfect! The lace is so pretty and I really liked the high neck and long arms. Like other reviews the under slip was pretty short and ran up when you sat down but I wore tights so it didn't bother me too much. Both sizes did fit but I liked the look of the small 100 times better. It was a littler harder to get on but I'm small chested so although the medium was longer and little more comfortable I had way to much room around the chest. Wanted to keep this one!!

links_reviews_title: Can't go wrong with black lace!
links_reviews_text: Beautiful and comfortable dress. My chest is small so I had a lot of extra fabric in the back that rolled... Also it bunched in the front.

The dress fit my 5'8" 150lbs body like a glove except the back....it definitely gaped but nothing crazy. It was definitely because I am small-chested and didn't wear any bra. It is super short but that's what I was going for.

The top of it was huge and gapping while the bottom was tight. The slip underneath the black lace was extremely tight and kept riding up all night. It was cute and I got a lot of compliments, I just wish it fit better.
This dress was absolutely beautiful , fit perfect , the back of the dress has an opening which gives the dress a little sexiness to it !
Couldn't really tell much of a difference between the small and medium

links_reviews_title: Nice dress but didn't love it on me
links_reviews_text: The dress fit true to size. I feel like there was just too much going on. It would probably look much better on someone taller than me. It wasn't very flattering. I didn't love it so didn't wear it.
Bottom half of this dress fit great, top half was too big and gaping on me. I'm 5.3" 128 lbs and bra size B

links_reviews_title: Beautiful dress. Received TONS of compliments.
links_reviews_text: I absolutely loved the lace detail and the bell sleeves were a great touch. The nude slip underneath was very tight and short however. It would ride up with just walking a few steps. Overall, would recommend and would rent again.

links_reviews_title: I rented this dress for my birthday dinner which turned into me getting engaged
links_reviews_text: The fit of the dress was great. It was a little snug around my hips and rear but it was fine. I had the medium as well but it was a little big. I received a ton of compliments on the dress. This was an excellent choice

links_reviews_title: Always happy with the dress I receive and received in timely manner as it says.
links_reviews_text: Perfect dress for a fall wedding. Very comfortable and flattering. I chose to wear the large since the medium was too short.

links_reviews_title: This dress was incredible! I received compliments all night!!
links_reviews_text: Fit was great!

links_reviews_title: Odd fit, tight waist but huge back gap.
links_reviews_text: Very odd fit - waist was tight but the back felt huge and frumpy. I have broad shoulders and I still couldn't fill it out. Collar was loose and floppy. Ended up not wearing it at all.

I'm 5'6 , curvy, 34C and wore the size Medium. I ordered both small and medium, and the small would have worked except the chest area was a bit tight so I opted for the medium. Loved it! Perfect for an October wedding since it has a sleeve but is not hot to wear outside during the day.

This dress was perfect for my Halloween costume! The top & bottom don't seem like they were made to go together- with the bottom slip being very snug & the top area being way too wide & large- but i got it to work out & it definitely served its purpose!

links_reviews_title: A night out with my girls
links_reviews_text: I rented this dress to go out in NYC with some girlfriends. It was really cute! I only rented the L, no back up. It was a bit tight but that was definitely to be expected. I am usually a 12 so it was smaller than my regular size so whereas I was able to zip this up but was still tight, I would say this runs true to size! I did not get any photos of me on the night of but took a few in the mirror the day before. I went bra-less but wish that I had those stick on cups because the fabric wasn't all that thick. The slip underneath was very short so I had to wear this dress with some black tights. It was business in the front and party in the back! Very elegant but very sexy.
Fit true to size, but was big in the chest. I'm a C cup but still needed a sticky backless bra to fill up the front of the dress.

links_reviews_title: Very cute and modest but still sexy.
links_reviews_text: This worked well. The event's theme was "western chic" so I added some boots and it was adorable. No bra and no worry. I love the open back because it still makes it sexy.
Length, fit and style were perfect! Many compliments and had fun dancing the night away!

links_reviews_title: Amazing fit! Got lots of compliments!
links_reviews_text: Great option for rehearsal dinner or wedding

Even though it's black, this is definitely a statement dress! It was probably a bit much to wear for just a normal day in the office, but I enjoyed wearing something that felt "special." Only complaint it that the tags were really itchy.
Fit perfectly
Cute dress, stylish, but fits very small around the waist.

links_reviews_title: I didn't wear it. Nice material and pretty dress.
links_reviews_text: It was tight in the rear, but bunchy in the back. Cut for a longer, less curvy person!
Way way too small in the hips. Size up 2 sizes. I'm a 4 and got a 6 and still too small
The fabric is so high quality, the ruffles make the dress so special. In. Love. Sized way up and the fit was perfect even for a gal with a very big and inconvenient chest
This dress was stunning! It's a bit tight around the hips if you're more pear shaped. The material is gorgeous. I would definitely rent again. Would maybe size up so that the hips weren't so tight.
Fits amazingly and very stylish
LOVE this dress but runs small. I'm typically a 10 in almost all sizes and the 14 was too small in the hips. This dress is fantastic though!
I loved this dress. Very comfortable at the end of the first trimester. The zipper in the back stops before the hip bones so you'll have to wear it from the top. Bike proof. I'll rent it again.

links_reviews_title: A bit too tight in tummy area, if you have any stomach it gets accentuated- did not wear
links_reviews_text: Do not rent if you have belly - even small
This dress was comfortable. I thought the hips were a little more narrow than I would have liked, but even with the skirt details flaring out a little, it looked very sharp.

links_reviews_title: Different in a sea of sequins
links_reviews_text: I rented this for NYE and liked that it was different from what all the other girls were wearing. In hindsight this probably wasn't the best fit for me because I have curves and it didn't do anything for them. The material is also really warm which is good for winter but not for a packed party.

links_reviews_title: I love this dress! Super cute! I almost bought it!
links_reviews_text: True to size, comfortable, doesn't wrinkle, and got lots of compliments.

I picked this up at the RTR store, and then let it hang in my closet for a week before even trying it on. It is comfortable, and cute. It's great for every day, but also for date night. I liked the length and the fit. The color was kind of boring even with the subtle shimmer, but all of my coworkers kept telling me how much they loved it.
Got so many compliments. Very festive, but not very forgiving. Very comfortable.

links_reviews_title: A very forgiving and fun party dress
links_reviews_text: The puffy shoulders were my favorite!
I wore this to the premiere of "Frozen 2," and it was so comfortable. Flattering, too!

links_reviews_title: Super cute and comfy for work!

links_reviews_text: If you are over 5'9" don't rent this. It was too short for me to wear.

May run a little on the large size but maybe true to size? I wore the XS and am usually between a 0 and 2. Was super comfortable and the inside slip is warm enough to make this dress work in cold weather. Failed to get a full body picture of me in the dress but it was super cute!

links_reviews_title: LOVED! So many compliments an so comfortable, but wish I had sized down.
links_reviews_text: This dress is so easy and so fun to wear. I love the high neck, the sleeves, the cut. The length offers the perfect amount of leg with the top being so full coverage. Its so comfortable and I got endless compliments and danced my booty off. I would have liked the Medium better, for a little more of a fitted look, but it was still great and I would def rent again. I think this would work great on many body shapes!

I loved this dress and got so many compliments! It's modest but still wild. I wore it with sheer black tights and black booties and sparkly drop earrings. Only giving it 4/5 stars because the material is thinner than I expected even with the liner and was pretty clingy and showed every lump and bump -- I definitely felt self conscious without shapewear but once I put that on it was super cute.

links_reviews_title: When I was able to comfortably eat whatever I wanted.
links_reviews_text: Perfect holiday office party dress. Not too short. It can be a little clingy and show all the curves you want and even the ones you don't, but it's extremely comfortable to wear all night long.

links_reviews_title: Pretty, but not ideal for petites
links_reviews_text: The 38R was a bit big - mostly just very long. I have a long torso and I still felt like the waist hit surprising low. This is pretty, but it wasn't super flattering on my petite frame. This was ankle length on me (5'2"). For me, this dress didn't look like it was worth the retail price - it was pretty, but nothing spectacular.

links_reviews_title: Great dress. I liked this so much more than I expected
links_reviews_text: very flattering fit, comfortable forgiving knit fabric. I am 5'4" and it fit like a maxi, went almost all the way to my ankles

So beautiful but runs large and I had to get the size up. Next time would try 42 or even 40. Some Missoni runs small but this is definitely generous. Lovey colors, perfect length and flattering, not too revealing for work. Felt really good and that's not always the case being 7 months post partum. Will rent again
Love this colorful sweater dress! Easily can be layered with a button down shirt.

links_reviews_title: Pretty colors. Super long dress (I'm 6') otherwise nothing special.
links_reviews_text: Cute casual dress, but wasn't amazing.
This dress is stretchy and roomie so I wish I had ordered a size down. It looked fabulous and I got compliments from strangers. Highly recommend.

This dress is beautiful and comfortable. I've kept it a while because I like it so much! It's perfect with flats for work and heels to dress it up. The fabric drapes nicely and is a bit on the heavier side. For that reason, I was able to throw on a black cardigan and make it work on a cooler day. The only one non-perfect area is the top. It seemed a bit long-waisted and so the top didn't lay as nicely as you might hope.
I kept this dress for awhile and wore several times. Great fit, very flattering, just perfect!

I loved this dress! It is well made and the fabric is the perfect weight for spring. I paired it with a denim jacket for work to dress it down and plan on wearing it on Easter. It was slightly large in the chest (32C) and the length hit a little above my ankles (5'7). There's no zipper but it was easy to get on. Will rent again!
runs large under arms and across bust

I really wanted this dress to work. It's beautiful colors and would have been a great early September transition dress. But the opening on top needed to be pinned (i'm small on top and don't like low cut). It's also see through - thankfully I tried on with natural sunlight and you could see my legs through. I couldn't find a slip that worked for me and so sadly the dress went back.
I mean, that pricetag should tell you a bit about the Quality! Fabulous, comfortable, and conservative but sexy!

This is exactly the item of clothing that RTR unlimited is for! Got loads of complements on this dress. The colors are beautiful. You can wear this to work, a picnic party, or a formal event. I did to all three. It's beautiful and versatile.

The dress fit great! I received tons of compliments on it. Just needed to be careful how I sat in meetings. I have a tendency to lean forward when sitting and since I didn't fill the top part out too much it gapped a little.
Just ran a bit big so I wasn't able to wear
Gorgeous special material. Conservative cut Not super flattering but still lovely Great dress if you want something special but don't want to be sexy or body conscious

links_reviews_title: Large, frumpy fit. Nothing special - looks like a knockoff.
links_reviews_text: The colors are pretty but that's about it. The dress I unlined so the knit is uncomfortable against bare skin after a few hours. It runs large and hit a few inches above my ankles, even though I'm 5'9. I was really disappointed.
Beautiful dress that got a lot of compliments
Comfortable and cute.

I really wanted to love this dress!! It felt great on & Made my waist look slimmer. It was also the perfect midi dress for my height. However, the top half was not flattering at all and made my chest look bigger! I wear a 34G bra and looking bigger in the chest is never something I am looking for.

Dress is very beautifully made, like all Missoni fabrics. Runs on the long side, like the picture. I sized up from a 42 to 46 to fit large bust and it was a bit loose. I could have used the next size down or maybe even the 42. Super comfortable and looks great.

This dress fit true to size. I have a wide chest (not bust) and it was perfectly fitted, so it may be harder for bustier women to wear. The length for my 5'9" height was above the ankle, kind of mid-length, which looked nice. The bell of the dress was not too wide. It had a great flow to it and was very comfy around the waist since the dress was A-line. The fabric is also thick and heavier than I expected, which allowed the dress to stay in place when standing, but not too heavy to allow it to move nicely when walking. It was also lined, which was an added plus. It was very well made and I enjoyed wearing it, although I most likely won't rent it again.

Pros: the material is really soft and the skirt flows in a really pretty way. It is also versatile. I thought that I would wear it as a summer dress, but then we got an unexpected cold front. So I just put a turtleneck underneath and added some boots. Cons: There is a risk that this comes off as a craft project (grandma's doilies and a glue gun). Not sure how others received it. But I was comfortable, so I didn't care.
Big in the body.

Thou I didn't wear this dress. I did try it on, and loved it! It's a bit unusual with the pattern, but different enough to be appealing. The material is beautiful and it fit very well. I just couldn't wear two dresses! I would rent this dress again.
It's a little bit of a dress a school teacher might wear, but a little fashionable. Great everyday dress. Really comfy and attractive. Lots of compliments.

links_reviews_title: Couldn't bring myself to wear this...
links_reviews_text: This dress was flattering but I just couldn't bring myself to wear it. Every time I put it on, I felt like a home-Ec project gone astray with the appliqu√© doilies.

links_reviews_title: Too long for the average gal.
links_reviews_text: Material is heavy and length is too long --I am 5'4" and found it to be very hot for the middle of summer. Wore out to dinner once. Wished I had not kept.

links_reviews_title: I received many compliments on this dress. Very flattering for my body shape. I enjoyed the dress.
links_reviews_text: This dress is slightly fitted and a great length for my 5'8" height. I loved it!
I wore this to work. It's true to size for non-busty women, but if you are busty, size up so you can give the ladies some breathing room.

links_reviews_title: This is not an every day dress
links_reviews_text: For some reason, I thought I would wear this as an every day dress. I was wrong. This dress is quality, heavier material, and meant for a formal event. Ran a little large for a size 6.

links_reviews_title: Beautiful dress, but waaaay too big
links_reviews_text: The dress is beautiful and I wanted to love it but unfortunately it runs really big. Ordered my usual size 2 and it was a good four inches too big around the middle, the shoulders and top were too big as well. Sadly, I have to send this one back
True to size and flattering for a curvy figure.
Perfect dress
This dress is really soft and comfortable and has great, elegant, movement thanks to the way the bottom is cut. I was worried it would look frumpy because of the doilies but somehow it all works.

links_reviews_title: Fun, comfortable and great to dance in
links_reviews_text: Lots of compliments
Flattering dress for everyday wear
Embroidery was beautiful, hung perfectly.
A little big in the waist.

links_reviews_title: Very flattering dress, comfortable fabric. Runs large, I am normally a 6 in Tory. The 2 fit perfect.
links_reviews_text: Large fit, flattering fabric, easy to dress up or down.
Fit as you see- wore with a red jacket for work- great look.

links_reviews_title: Returned this because it was absolutely huge. Probably 2 sizes too big.
links_reviews_text: I am a pretty standard 2 or 4 in dresses, and I was surprised how large this size 2 was! Would have kept it had it fit. Nice that it still had the tags on it.

Wore this dress during our Toronto trip. This dress is flirty, fabric is soft and print is fun! It was a little short, but covered everything that needed to be covered (I am 5'9"). The bust area was definitely loose on my small chest and could easily fit large breasts. Had to wear my biggest push up bra. Enjoyed wearing it!
Rented this to try on in the summer and ended up renting it again for Halloween this year. Love the fabric and silhouette on this one. Will rent again.

Absolutely LOVED this dress for game day! I'd say the large fits true to size but I definitely could've worn a medium because I like it a little snugger. I was worried the silky material would be too hot for a 90¬∞+ game day but it wasn't bad at all and didn't show any sweat. Love the cut and print of this dress bc it made it a statement piece and it made me feel fun and flirty because of the ruffles. Would definitely rent again!

The length of the dress and fit seemed to be perfect except for the bust. For some reason the chest part is huge!! I safety pinned about an 1" of the sleeves down on both sides. Bc of the ruching of the fabric it wasn't noticeable from the back, and it helped me keep the dress up properly but the chest area still looked too big from front.

links_reviews_title: I felt like I was a character in Euphoria
links_reviews_text: This dress fit like a dream. I appreciated the extra room in the bust, that's typically where I need it. So I would suggest this dress for chesty folk. Also, it would bunch up at the waist-- so I would have to pull that down occasionally. All in all, an amazing dress-- I got compliments all night.
Super cute! Loved wearing this. It's a little fitted in the midsection in case you are self conscious about that. This was so much fun and very comfy!

I got this dress just to wear out in the summer. It's super cute but between the fabric, which is much shinier and cheaper than you would expect, and the fit, it comes off a little costumey. I ended up wearing it to a themed party which was great. Probably wouldn't rent again just because I have no where else to wear it. That being said, if this is what you're looking for it is adorable and I felt great in it.
This dress is gorgeous! The dress is cut perfectly and is so flattering and easy to wear
Super soft; very comfortable but top fits waay too loose. Still wore it and felt very sexy.

Rented for a dinner date. I'm usually between 2-4 and there was so much room in the bust I could barely keep the top up. Definitely size down if you're a cup or smaller in the bust!! That said, the bodice was tighter in the waist so if you don't want to show off that area, this may not be the style for you.
I am 5'7 and loved this dress other than the fact that it was way too short to sit down in.
Cute date night dress, the breast part is a little large though.

Cute idea, but the fabric looks and feels really cheap. The bust doesn't hold its shape. Nice fit around the waist and body. Good length - not too short (I'm tall). But I didn't want to waste a spot on this for a whole month so exchanged before wearing.
Could have sized down, the sleeves kept falling off. Received tons of compliments. Fun dress for a dinner or to go out in.
I wasn't able to wear this at all. The dress runs large and true to size at the same time. The top is massive and I'm already kinda busty but the skirt runs more true to size.

Fabric was super shiny and tight around the lower tummy and loose in the bust so it was not supportive while you can't really wear a bra. I wanted to wear for fun and casual night out with boots but returned without wearing it. Disappointed.
Fabulous dress! I wore this for my wedding. It looks so much better than any of the photos. Loved it so much I bought it!!

I rented a size 2r in this dress and would have liked a 2p if it was availible. The length was too long for this 5'1" girl. The fit was baggy. The top kept falling off my shoulders and there was a giant gap in the armpits. The only decent part was my behind. The back did look nice, but even then a more snug fit would have been more flattering. I did not wear this dress to my event, too many cons.

links_reviews_title: This dress made me feel beautiful and it definitely stands out in a crowd of the typical black.
links_reviews_text: I adored this dress. It is heavy enough with the sequins to skim over any flaws and still feel curvy. The length was fine with modest heels. It feels very glamorous from the front and a little daring in the back. It is not cut as low as it feels in the back-I wore strapless shapewear for bra support and it couldn‚Äôt be seen from the back with just a little fashion tape. Even with the little bit of length in the back, I was able to dance just fine.

I rarely get a chance to dress up so fancy and I felt amazing in this dress! I attended a Valentine's ball with my husband and this was perfect. The front is a little more modest than I typically choose but the back makes up for it! It fit like a glove and still allowed me to eat to my hearts content. I would definitely recommend this anytime you can get away with wearing a white ish dress to a formal occasion
I got so many compliments on this amazing gown. It was form fitting and the perfect length with 3" heels. I opted for a size 8 and it was great with shape wear underneath. I felt like a princess

links_reviews_title: Flattering dress, rented it in the past in green as well
links_reviews_text: Slightly long for me (I'm 5-0), but still able to wear the dress without tripping in tall heels.

links_reviews_title: Overall, a very classy and sparkly dress
links_reviews_text: The dress was beautiful, but there were no long options for sizes 0 or 2. I fit the size 0 perfectly, but wore the size 2 because it was a tiny bit longer. I would have loved the dress to fully cover my shoes with a more elegant look.
Form fitting and flattering. I got several compliments, particularly on the back of the dress. Perfect for a formal event.
Beautiful dress with lots of compliments. It's sexy but not revealing and easy to move around in!

This dress resulted in so many compliments! It fit great and made me feel even better. Like other reviews, my under arms were sore from the sequins but worth it. I'm 5'10 and like other reviews, it could have been longer but wasn't a deal breaker.

links_reviews_title: Incredible. Dress. Felt like a Princess.
links_reviews_text: Wore this to a high profile fundraiser and got compliments all night long. Stunning dress. I am 5'5", wore 2 inch heels and the 4P was the perfect length. More dimensions: hourglass, 32B bust, 28" waist, 32" hips, the 4P fit me perfectly, not too tight, not too loose.
Never thought I would love sequins so much. Elegant sulphate, but the length was a bit awkward and short. Amazing dress. Felt like a star!
The dress fit great and was perfect for the occasion.

It fit very well. I'm a curvaceous 5'1 woman. The back is slightly longer than the front - with short heels, I liked how long it was. The built in slip kept the sequins from being scratchy, though the sequins would snag easily. It's stunning yet subtle. Highly recommended!

The dress fits perfectly. I'm 5'2" tall and weight 106 lbs. The length of the dress was perfect with high hills. People were stopping me during my husband's company black-tie party to compliment me and say how gorgeous the dress was.

I wore this dress to a military ball. You can tell that it is a high quality dress, and it will definitely make you stand out. I received so many compliments on this dress. The back did not come down as far as the sample pictures make it look, but it is still dramatic. Another thing to be aware of is that this dress is skin tight! I‚Äôm under 5 ft and the regular length was only a tiny bit too long.

Absolutely loved this dress. It was very true to size and not too heavy, it was a little shorter than I was expecting but still fit great. The back is so complimenting. I received compliments all night long. It definitely made me feel confident and beautiful. I would definitely recommend this dress!!

links_reviews_title: Gorgeous new years eve dress that fit like a glove!
links_reviews_text: Perfect dress for new years eve black-tie event. Fit like a DREAM even post holiday food binges- the material was stretchy enough and the sequins did a phenomenal job hiding my post-Christmas food baby. Wore spanx just to be safe. Length hit just at the floor with 3 inch heels- seemed a little longer in the back but nothing that was too bothersome. Couldn't recommend this dress more!!!!

I rented this dress for my annual Christmas party. I got SO many compliments all night long. I ordered both the 2R and 0R. While the 0R fit better it wasn't quite long enough for my taste. The 2R still fit beautifully and wasn't super tight. My only complaint is that after hours of wearing my under arms, about an inch from my armpit, started to rub and chafe. That being said, I would rent this dress again in a heartbeat. I felt beautiful in it and was sad to return it.

Wore this to a holiday wedding and felt amazing and so festive! Very flattering, comfortable and fun to wear. I got compliments all night, many from strangers! I'm 5'6" and wore 2" inch heels - glad I got the long based on other reviews. It was still a hair short in front but worked fine.

Pros: sparkled in every light, fit like a glove but had a lil wiggle room in the right places. The back is the best part, difficult to wear a bra but spans can still be worn and not seen Cons: did loosen its fit after a long night of dancing but only a little in the shoulder areas (after 5 hours of dancing :)! )

The results are in and I loved this whole process!! For the dress I rented 2 different sizes same dress different colors (6R & 4R). The 4R fit amazingly. The dress does have a great stretch. I have been receiving compliments nonstop. My body shape: I'm 5'4 & 135lbs. I'm a mother of 3 so my stomach has some excess plus I had lost over 90lbs a few years ago & don't have much of a butt. I worn a shaper underneath which also had some padding for my rear. It was perfect.
The fit is perfect and I had many compliments.

links_reviews_title: It really was easy to navigate the process and shopping was so much fun!!
links_reviews_text: This dress was gorgeous and was very comfortable. I'm 5'4" and about 140. The length was perfect for me with a low heel. I felt like a princess

I originally ordered a regular size 6, but after reading reviews I decided to go with a 6L. I am 5'10 and about 140 pounds, I wore 2 inch block heels. The 6L didn't cover my feet all the way which I was a little upset about but it was definitely workable. The dress was stretchy and fit me like a glove! I used breast petals, but would recommend a sticky bra. I saw at least three other women also wearing this dress and they all looked fabulous. I loved it! üòä

links_reviews_title: Sparkled all night! Baby got back!
links_reviews_text: I am 5"8, 145lb, with 34 DDD bust and the 8L and 6L both fit. For length and comfort I wore the 8L. Didn't need a bra which was great! The back really makes the dress. The Long still showed my shoes and with heels felt short but not too noticeable. Would definitely recommend!

I loved wearing this dress and received many compliments. I'm 5'9" and generally an 8 and wore the 8L in this dress. The L length was needed. Even when I took off my 2" heels and switched to comfy flats for dancing at the reception, the length was fine.
This material is a bit stretchy which made it very comfortable. I received many compliments.
This dress fit beautifully. I am normally a 12 in dresses like this but that size was not available. I only wore it for pictures but even with it being a bigger size it was still a great fit.
I wore this for my elopement in the forest and it was lovely! The 4R was a little large but it still wore well. It does run short. I would have been better off with a long, in my 2 inch heels.

This dress is gorgeous! Comfortable! I'd wear this again for sure!!! I kept getting compliments all night long! I wore a shimmery sheer gold modesty shirt underneath as I was at a religious wedding. this was amazing!!!!!

I wore this as a bridesmaid in a friends wedding. It fit great and it was so comfortable. I wore 3" heels and the length was perfect (I'm 5'4")! I received so many compliments! I loved everything about this dress!

links_reviews_title: It's an incredible dress, comfortable, elegant and an eye catcher!
links_reviews_text: The dress has a lot of stretch in it so if you want it to be fitted then you want to size down as it will hug you in the right places to show off your figure, I didn't even need to wear a bra. If you don't want it too snug, some shape forming under garments are recommended. Go the long too if you plan on wearing heals!

links_reviews_title: Beautiful dress for our military ball
links_reviews_text: I received compliments on this dress all evening! I am 26w pregnant so I needed something that would be flattering over my bump. This dress was perfect. Pre pregnancy I'm a sz 2 and based on other reviews I ordered the 2 and the 4. I ended up wearing the 2. It fit like a glove! The only complaint I have is that the shoulders were a little big. I would recommend this dress to anyone needing a formal gown. It will not disappoint!!

links_reviews_title: Dress was amazing, size 2R had a quarter size of sequins missing. Also needed a little sew touch up
links_reviews_text: Beautiful dress, fits great even a bit stretchy! I ended up getting a regular, but should have gotten a long. Wanted to wear with heals and was too short for those. Just my preference. Sequence rubs on my arm a bit and made a little discomfort.

links_reviews_title: Great dress. Would love it to be just a little longer.
links_reviews_text: Just a few cm too short. I am 5'7" and wore heals. Otherwise was perfect.

links_reviews_title: This dress made me and the bump glow at 31 weeks pregnant!
links_reviews_text: This dress was phenomenal for a third trimester rental. So many compliments! It is so stretchy and comfortable. I had tried a couple of other dresses, but finding something that fits a 31 week baby bump along with everywhere else can be difficult. This dress was perfect! I'm 5'5 and was a size 6 or 8 and 140 lbs pre-pregnancy. Third trimester and have gained 18-19 lbs (pretty much all in belly and hips) and the size 12 fit like a dream. Seriously comfortable and I felt gorgeous all night. I would definitely recommend this dress to anyone, maternity or not!

I tried this dress on last year and immediately fell in love with it. When I was recently invited to a black tie event, I knew I had to have it! I have a difficult time finding dresses that fit well due to my hourglass figure, but this was perfect. There is some stretch to it, but the dress hugged my curves just right. The sequins and the gorgeous draped back make this dress a standout! I felt beautiful in it and received a lot of compliments! The only thing that I didn't like was that I had to wear a backless "bra." For a larger chested woman, there is really no such thing. I ultimately found a decent one and made it work. If you are smaller chested, you could definitely go without a bra as the top is form-fitting and will hold you in. Would definitely rent this again!

Loved this dress for our vow renewals in Vegas by Elvis. It was a very light champagne color so not overly traditional which was perfect for the occasion, and omg the sparkle of it!! Very classy with a sexy open back. Fit true to size.
Great material, although it did wrinkle a lot. Perfect fit. Awesome colors for the 4th of July or a summer wedding. Would rent again.

This is the perfect dress to celebrate 4th of July . It's very comfortable , easy to wear, and very cool for hot summer nights. Received tons of compliments . Wore it so many times including a photo shoot. If you have a little bit of belly fat, this dress will hide it really well :))

links_reviews_title: Bold print, but not for me
links_reviews_text: This is a lovely, well made dress with a big cool factor. I found it boxy for my figure and too short for any occasion when you'd have to sit down (I suspected this before renting!). Perhaps better on a younger person ;).

links_reviews_title: I wore this to a luncheon in Tampa. I felt confident and comfortable in this dress.
links_reviews_text: I am only 5' tall, so the length was good on me. If you have long legs, it would be pretty short. The dress was very comfortable. The neckline is attractive but I had to wear a strapless bra because my regular bra straps were too wide. I would recommend this dress for a daytime event in a warm climate.

I wore this dress to a summer work party and got so many compliments on the bright colors and design. Style is meant to fit to fit kind of big-- think shift dress. I wore it with a strapless bra, but I easily could have (and should have) worn it without one. At 5'1" this dress hits about 3" above my knees. I did not need to wear jewelry because the dress makes enough of a statement on its own. Paired dress with a royal blue leather Tory Burch bag from RTR.

I loved this dress! Beautiful print and I loved the modern silhouette. I ordered a size up according to the other reviews and I'm glad I did since I think it would've been a bit tight across the hips in my usual size. It does cut in at the arms so you'll likely need a strapless bra.

links_reviews_title: Creative, unusual pattern for summer work and events.
links_reviews_text: Short! I'm only 5' 3'', but this was well above the knee. Unique pattern and high-quality material. Wore strapless bra since neckline cuts in.

links_reviews_title: Cute dress, doesn't do much for the figure, but doesn't hurt it either!
links_reviews_text: The print is really fun. The dress runs short (I'm tall), and it doesn't do much for the figure (It is a shift dress). It is just a fun, comfortable, summertime dress! Can't ask for much more.

The fit is forgiving. The length is short but not too short. I could have sized down to a 2 and been comfortable which is funny because I wore the same cut of a Milly dress last week in a sturdier fabric and 4 was perfect. Red white and blue is fun but not too obvious if you wear it outside of the holiday. I'm 5'3" and 120 lbs

links_reviews_title: Baggy and tight at the same time
links_reviews_text: I wore this to my friends bridal luncheon and spent the whole time wishing I was wearing something else. I wore the 2 even though I'm normally a zero. It was way too loose in the waist and way too tight around the hips. I am more curvy so it might work for someone with a different frame, but for me it was very unflattering.

Loved this dress but it hugged my butt and thighs. I'm an athletic built and it was tight only at my waist. I am also 5'6 and I felt the dress was a bit too short for a wedding especially since it was also tight.

links_reviews_title: Tall People - it's short but cute!
links_reviews_text: I am 5' 8" and the dress came pretty high up my leg! I got compliments on it being cute and unique, but I had to be careful sitting because people could see my panties if I wasn't! I kept a napkin on my lap to prevent a blunder
Daytime dress for tennis finals! Simple and easy, yet beautiful colors and fit!
True to size and so comfortable. I wore this to a wedding and got compliments all night long. It is perfect for any formal event or wedding. The dress fell right above my knee.

links_reviews_title: Perfect for honey moon to beach, colorful and trendy
links_reviews_text: Perfect and good length!

links_reviews_title: very cute -- but a bit tight around the hips
links_reviews_text: In my mind, I think I was envisioning more of a looser fit, but it was loose in the stomach area and tight-ish in the hips. I'm usually a size 4, but sized up to a 6 and glad I did -- i almost think I could have gone with an 8 and been extremely satisfied with it. I have a bit of a pear shape -- smaller chest, but hips -- so I'm thinking this might be great for a more straight/athletic body type. Overall I was satisfied and even received a few compliments at the bridal shower I attended!

Love love love. My first RTR rental and I'm beyond happy. This dress can easily be dressed up or down. I layered a plain tee underneath to make it more playful w/ some sneakers. I also wore it with some black heels for a date night which made the dress stand out on its own. I'm usually a size 2/4 but I ordered a 6 because they didn't have a 4 available, so the 6 ran big on me. If they did have a 4 I'm certain the fit would have been perfect and true to size.
Super comfy, super cute, runs true to size!

links_reviews_title: I'd buy it if it were less expensive!
links_reviews_text: Beautiful, silky shift. Rented through Unlimited with the Helmut Lang Tux Blazer (pictured here). I paired these two pieces for graphic design interview, and just hoped for the best when they arrived--honestly wasn't sure if they'd match up well. THEY DID! I really wanted to stand out and this did the trick. PRO TIP: Rent a size up in this dress if you want the length to be office appropriate (that's what I did).
Flattering cut in shoulder and forgiving waist. Worn for bachelorette instead of just plain white. True to size.
Cut at the top was unique and colors were beautiful. Comfortable and nice material not see through at all.

I was afraid the conservative cut of this dress would take away the abstract feel and make it seem preppy... but paired with brown leather boots it achieved the 'cool girl' look I was going for! This runs a size small so order up, although there is slight stretch.

I loved this dress! It skimmed me in just the right way. Sometimes sheaths can make you look bigger but I think this slimmed me down. The length was perfect for a party or wedding, a little short for work though. I didn't wear a bra but the fabric was thick enough. No need to wear much jewelry either. I would love to own this!

links_reviews_title: Amazing easy to wear dress, would definitely rent again
links_reviews_text: Loved it fit true to size

links_reviews_title: Great fitting shift, perfect for everyday
links_reviews_text: Fit was great, lined so not see-through, good length for my 5'5" frame so I was able to wear to work with a conservative shoe and blazer and out with the husband with a more fun heel sans jacket. Will definitely rent again. I received so many compliments!
It is roomy but I have to order a size up because I'm so busty. My 9 year old son even said it was a "cool dress". I wore it for work and would rent it again.
This dress fit perfect! Can be casual or dressy! Perfect for vacation
Wore this to an engagement party and legit turned heads in this. Best dress I've rented. Only thing is the cut is a tad awkward. Strapless or no bra is best.

links_reviews_title: Made packing for a weekend with friends so easy!
links_reviews_text: Friends bachelorette party at the beach! Was a bit short but very comfortable and fun!
Basic shift. Comfortable. Flattering and unusual. Artsy. #wedding

links_reviews_title: Fun colors for a summer party!
links_reviews_text: Standard fit. Wasn't too short

This dress was great. It is a shift dress so not much shape, but I thought that worked very well with the short length. I wore it several times, once to a nice dinner with heels, once to a party and again more casually with flat sandals - it worked well for all occasions.

links_reviews_title: Solid shift dress. Lots of compliments
links_reviews_text: Great for work, comfortable, breezy, beautiful and sophisticated. Loved this dress!

Wore this from work to drinks and dinner with friends. Absolutely perfect summer dress. Compared to other Milly dresses, I felt like the fit was more generous in this style - which I definitely appreciated on a hot day! Would rent this again for everyday wear or a summer wedding/rehearsal dinner.
My boyfriend loved the style and design of this dress. The colors are so vivid and it definitely stands out amongst the crowd. The shape doesn't do much for my body but I still loved wearing it.

links_reviews_title: Beautiful color but not the most becoming shape. My fianc√© loved it though!!
links_reviews_text: Playful, colorful and lots of fun!

links_reviews_title: Perfect colorful and short silk dress for any warm weather event
links_reviews_text: Fit was true to size. I would have preferred one smaller because the 2 was a little wide around the bust, but then again I'm small there. Since it's not fitted I think you can be more flexible with a size. Great length for those of us 5'5" and under.

links_reviews_title: Colorful dress for spring. Interesting shoulder cut. Beautiful fabric.
links_reviews_text: I was really looking forward to renting this dress, but it didn't fit how I expected. Usually a shift is tightest at my chest (widest part) and then falls freely. This dress was roomy up top, but more narrow through the hip. It was slightly snug at the bottom, which was a little concerning due to the stretchy white fabric, but was easily fixed with a little shape wear. The shoulder cutout detail is really flattering. I needed to wear a strapless bra since regular straps showed. The material is soft & luxurious, but it does wrinkle in the hip area after sitting for a little while. The paint-like strokes are beautiful and bold. Perfect pattern for warmer weather. Paired with Lizzie Fortunato Tahitian Flower Earrings. Rented as part of my unlimited subscription.

This dress was super comfortable and I loved the bright color scheme. The dress hit me just above my knees, so a great length for shorties like me! Because of the cut and also maybe the brand (this is my first Milly rental so I don't have any other comparison), the dress seems to run large. I usually wear a size 10 but ended up wearing a size 8.

I loved the colors in this dress. I am pear shaped and really liked our I had room for my hips. Typically that is not the case for shifts with me. The cut is very flattering and this is perfect for a night out or fun dinner. You can really dress it up or down. If I were to rent a back up size, I would size down as a second option.
Such a cute print. Dress seemed stiff though. So many compliments (wore it twice). Shorter in front than back. I am 5'10 and the front wasn't too short. Would rent again!!

links_reviews_title: Fun summer/spring dress but dark colors make it more versatile.
links_reviews_text: The trim is beautiful! Especially the sleeves. Lots of compliments.
I wore this dress to an event I was hosting and it was a huge hit! So many compliments and it was super flattering (I'm postpartum + it hid the baby bump). Really loved it!
I love this dress. One of my all time favorite rentals. The fit is great and the dress is beautiful!

I loved the overall statement of this dress. It was a little flirty. The embroidered designs reminded me of a Latina inspired piece and felt sophisticated. It was unique and I could finally wear my bright yellow earrings to make the yellow in the dress pop!

Such a super cute dress and it literally works for everything it's dressy enough for an event while still being casual enough for work! I am in love with this dress! It's very easy and comfortable to wear too.
Super cute and comfy to wear at work all day. The sleeves are a bit larger than i thought they'd be but I would rent again.

links_reviews_title: Great for a day full of wedding appointments.
links_reviews_text: Great quality, fit like a glove for a true size 2.

links_reviews_title: I love the pop of yellow!
links_reviews_text: The first Shoshanna dress I wore that didn't run small and tight! I love the pop of yellow color and the embroidery!

This is a fantastic dress. It's great quality and looks fabulous on. For work, I did layer it over a white tank, because the keyhole goes relatively low. However, I could definitely see myself wearing this to a casual event outside of work, too. I've rented this twice and will likely rent again!

links_reviews_title: A lot going on with this dress
links_reviews_text: While I've found I sometimes have to size up in the Shoshana dresses this one is an exception. I'm usually a 4 and I ordered the 6, it was huge on me. It photographs nicely but in person it's almost too much going on. The embroidery is beautiful, but combined with lots of fabric and generous sleeves and the hi/low hemline, a lot is happening here, to the point it felt a little costume-y (like you could drop me right into a Ricola cough drop commercial). Would be more suitable for a special occasion than for my work. I don't plan to try it in a smaller size. Exquisitely made, but not for me.
I love, love, love this dress! Compliments all day!!

links_reviews_title: Wore to my 20 year high school reunion
links_reviews_text: Such a cute dress, love the asymmetrical hem line and all the detail. Received lots of compliments. Easy to wear. Only needs minimal accessories because there's a lot happening in the pattern.

This fit loose on my upper body and was loose at the waistline. The stiff fabric sat away from my body and made me look larger than I am. But... beautiful dress. So nicely made, but this is one of the dresses that "wears you." Didn't love the hi lo hemline and thought it added to the cutesiness of the look.
I love this dress. I love the embroidery in yellow and white, the cut and length. I love a blue dress!
Nice dress, really pretty. I wore it with a cami underneath. I unbuttoned the neckline because closed it accentuated my bosom too much.
I wanted something that would breathe but had a little edge. This was still very professional and got compliments right and left!

This dress is so charming. The slight high-low hemline, the gorgeous lace, the fun pop of yellow... it all works. My only "complaint" is the waist and arms are slightly tight. It wasn't all the comfortable, as my arm movement felt constricted. I could have sized up, but worried it would look too bulky. Even with that, I really enjoyed wearing this dress.

links_reviews_title: Love this dress! I feel so chic, polished and professional when I wear it
links_reviews_text: Fits well. Good for large chests. Length is perfect for work. Could also be great for a wedding, bridal shower, or general daytime event

links_reviews_title: I love this dress so much I never want to take it off my body.
links_reviews_text: Seriously, that's what I said once I tried the dress on. It is so cute, very flattering at my hips/waist. Perfect for the office or a brunch date.

links_reviews_title: Top 5 favorite rental of all time!
links_reviews_text: For my job I do live food demos so I am always looking for a fun and colorful outfit to wear on set and this 100% delivered! It is so soft and comfortable. The appliqu√©s are super feminine and the waistline very flattering. The sleeves are the best part! Nice high neck and back making it work appropriate in my conservative office. Highly recommend! The only negative is the sleeves are little restrictive in terms of reaching up.

links_reviews_title: Worn by my 14 yr old for middle school dance....
links_reviews_text: My teenager selected this dress to wear for a middle school semi-formal-ish type dance. She loved it and said she received several compliments. As a mom, I felt like it was mature looking but didn‚Äôt make her look like a college co-Ed.

links_reviews_title: perfect dress but not for a larger but line.
links_reviews_text: tight on chest

links_reviews_title: Perfect last dress of the summer
links_reviews_text: This dress is a little longer than I expected. Beautiful colors and details.
Cute, but didn't love the fit and the material is cotton that felt heavy. Didn't wear it.

links_reviews_title: Wore it to a work event
links_reviews_text: When I first put it on, I was a little surprised by the material. However, I loved it! I felt so pretty in it.

links_reviews_title: I wore this to a rehearsal dinner.
links_reviews_text: I really enjoyed wearing this--the cut is very flattering and the dress feels high-quality. The detail on the sleeves and bottom help give the dress a fancier feel, but, since the event was more casual, I dressed it down with a denim jacket.
Not too breathable

links_reviews_title: I wore this for everyday and this was an ok dress.
links_reviews_text: The material was itch but the design cute. It cut a little tight across chest. I just wish it was more comfortable and probably would have been a keeper.

links_reviews_title: I received multiple compliments on my dress!
links_reviews_text: I love the dress but felt the sleeves were a little too puffy, but I still enjoyed the cut and style.
Super cute & fun dress. Very comfortable!
This dress was just lovely. The high waist helps cover a tummy you wish to hide. I wore this on a crazy long day, and it still looked so nice at a 7pm meeting. Very happy with it.
Wore this for work and it was nice to have the pop of design. Good for hourglass shapes because the waist is a bit narrow.
Beautiful detail. Loved the cute. Loads of compliments!!
Dress fit really well and was beautiful!
Totally worked with my 19 week bump! I absolutely loved it!

links_reviews_title: Beautiful dress, runs small in waist
links_reviews_text: No stretch for people with some waist. Love the dress though!
So fun to wear to work and dinner after. It was comfortable and flattering on my athletic build. Typical size 4
I loved this. I felt confident wearing it and the detail is beautiful! I wore this true to size but also could have sized down if my true size wasnt available.

links_reviews_title: Great work dress, flattering in all the right places!
links_reviews_text: Arms are a bit snug, but overall great dress for summer.
Size up. I normally wear small in tops and had to go with a large. The cut doesn't allow for a bra.

links_reviews_title: Would look better on larger chested ladies
links_reviews_text: This top was beautiful and sexy; however, my little mosquito bites got lost in the fabric. I had to tuck some of the extra material into the bodice :P I loved the structure of it, though! Definitely recommend for my larger chested friends!!

I wore a medium, though I'm usually a small, and for a second I was afraid it wouldn't fit when I started zipping it up, but it fit very well. I couldn't wear a bra with this, even strapless, but it's more so because in my bust size it's really difficult to find anything cut low enough for the front cut (my girls are also too heavy to even bother with adhesive bras). I got a lot of compliments on this top and I felt great in it.
Loved this top

links_reviews_title: I got this amazing pic with my hubby.
links_reviews_text: You need a skinny waist for this one. Luckily it fit ok for me but I really needed to be careful to suck it in!

links_reviews_title: Wore it for my 40th birthday and loved it.
links_reviews_text: This shirt is flirty and fun.
liked the style but didn't work for my bust. the gap was too large and even though i almost filled it out, it seemed a bit too much cleavage
Similar to other reviews, the fit was off for me. The front hole was too big and I didn't have appropriate bra, which I needed for support.
Beautiful pattern and quality...a strapless bra with a low front is recommended as the keyhole on the front has a tendency to gap. There is no stretch to the bodice.

A lot of the reviews mentioned the fit was weird, but it was such a cute top I ignored the advice. DON'T!! It is the weirdest fit ever. I have a very small busy, but I would imagine that it would fit improperly for any size.
So cute! I got so many compliments on it and was perfect for 4th of July weekend.

links_reviews_title: I never wore it because it didn't fit. :(
links_reviews_text: It's a beautiful blouse! My bust was too large for the fit. I wear a 36 C usually but I"m bigger right now because of nursing...

I wanted to love this top but the way it fit left the cleavage very open from your collarbone all the way to the top of the ruching (6-7"). It was fine when it was completely taut (while standing) but as soon as you bent over or sat down it would just fall open (way too much slack). You definitely would need fashion tape to make this work but I didn't end up wearing it.

High neck halter low cut slit requires a low cut bra which can be difficult with this neckline. Sexy, yellow tan with bright flowers summer orange, vibrant medium blue. A little in the shorter side but not too short for petite. I wore size Med. zips all the way down back for easy removal and entry but may require assistance getting on. I did manage on my own with a little wiggling and inching on while partially zipped. Really cute. Can't wait to wear it.

Really pretty top, just kind of strange cut. Not quite short enough to be a crop, but not long enough for a typical top. I got the large, as a size 8 and it fit my waist perfectly but the. Since it goes a little bit longer than waist and I have much wider hips than waist, that's when things went astray. On the plus side, it definitely had enough room in the chest (and I'm a D/DD). I think I could have made it work but the cut isn't ideal and I didn't have bottoms that worked with the weird cut.
This dress was so beautiful and fun. It is snug in the hips because there is no stretch but was fine.
The dress was a tad snug in the bust, and I was annoyed that the ribbon straps wouldn't stay tied in a bow. Other than that is was a great date night dress that felt sexy and sophisticated.
Loved the dress it's tight in the hips if you got full hips.... I do not and it was a bit snug still! But over all loved the full
I had a different problem then most of the reviewers. For me it fit nicely/loosely everywhere except the chest area was too big and gaping a bit but not enough to cause a problem. Great fabric!

The perfect fit- not too much length , but not too short in the slip underneath. The straps really accentuate the boobs and can be adjusted for a more conservative effect. Just overall, an incredibly comfy piece due to the forgiving material

links_reviews_title: The dress was really sexy and edgy/cool at the same time. My boyfriend loved it ;)
links_reviews_text: Im super flat chested so I prefer to not wear a bra most of the time. I had a little gapping on the side seam at the bust, but hard to notice and I had a leather jacket over the top for some of the night. The ribbon ties on shoulder made it extra special. Loved this one so much.
i restyled the straps to make it more fitting but it's such an odd shape. you can make it work tho

Loved this dress - so slimming and sexy. Yet sophisticated due to length and dress structure. I will rent this 100 times again. Wore in Miami out for the night received compliments from men and women alike. Light enough for spring or summer nights.

links_reviews_title: Not a forgiving fabric, but worth it!
links_reviews_text: This dress does NOT stretch at all. So if you wear it to dinner and eat risotto, it WILL be uncomfortable (speaking from experience). But the piece is beautiful for a 1 time special occasion wear

The lower half of this dress fit my 38" hips perfectly but the top half (35" bust) was a little big. I ended up criss crossing the straps in back and that helped although I needed someone to help me tie the straps so they would lay better. Great fabric, very light weight. No support up top so I wore a stick on cinch up backless bra, wasn't too bad.

I read other reviews that mentioned how small this dress ran, but I thought if I ordered a size medium with a size large back up, the dress may work for me (I‚Äôm 5‚Äô4‚Äù, 135 lbs). Unfortunately the only way that the large would zip up in the back was if I moved the dress up by tightening the shoulder straps, but then the bust seam hit too high and there was gapping on the sides of the bust. I ended up not being able to wear the dress, which was disappointing for the price and how pretty it looks on the hanger!
The lining of the dress is much smaller than expected. This was a normal dress size that I wear, and I wasn't able to wear this dress. Probably better suited for someone with a more athletic figure!

links_reviews_title: fun fabric but runs way too small all over
links_reviews_text: I wanted it to fit- even sized up to the large. This dress is for the completely flat chested .

links_reviews_title: Beautiful, but slim in the hips
links_reviews_text: Surprisingly beautiful fabric in person. A sexy cut but still modest enough to sport without feeling over the line. But it's quite slim in the hips, I could barely wriggle it past my bum, none the less sit, breathe or walk... so this beauty got returned. If you have curves or a pear shape, it's worth trying but don't bank on it.
I wanted this to work so bad, but the butt and hips area was so tight

links_reviews_title: A bit too snug around the waste
links_reviews_text: The reviews said it best - it's such a fun dress and is made of great quality.... however runs a bit small. Traditionally I wear a size 6-8 and this medium was too snug around the booty

It ran small. I was able to zip it up but there was no stretch at all. Also, as a person with a small bust I experienced gaping on the sides. The only way to solve it was to tighten the straps but then it moved the seam detail too high.
Beautiful, but for 39" hips need to try L, as urs no stretch in fabric
The sizing of this dress was a joke, couldn't even get it on properly. Size way way up, especially if you have a full behind. Didn't wear.
It didn't fit my hips :(

links_reviews_title: Super cute ties for the staps
links_reviews_text: Cute - I am pear-shaped and this was tight in the butt!

links_reviews_title: Silk straps don't hold larger chest
links_reviews_text: The shoulder straps tie and that's all that holds the top in place. It's not the best situation for a larger chest and I didn't end up wearing this. Also the lining inside the dress is super tight and unforgiving making the dress feel like it didn't fit when it actually did.
I wanted to wear this dress so bad but it was too small. Couldn't get over my hips. Will size up for next time.

links_reviews_title: Looked great on hanger. Too small and couldn't wear
links_reviews_text: Looked great on hanger, well made. Couldn't wear because it wouldn't zip all the way in the back

links_reviews_title: Gorgeous dress, no stretch, tight in hips
links_reviews_text: This dress is gorgeous but I would recommend sizing up one or two dress sizes.

links_reviews_title: Didn't end up wearing. Chest runs small and was not able to zip
links_reviews_text: Gorgeous dress and upset that I couldn't wear. The dress has a built in slip that is very short. The chest runs very small. I sized up and it fit perfectly everywhere other than the top.
This dress looked beautiful on the site, but unfortunately was not build for an hourglass build! It fit but was less than flattering.

links_reviews_title: Unfortunately, it was too small for me to wear. Definitely, size up if you have a butt!
links_reviews_text: Unfortunately, it was too small for me to wear. Definitely, size up if you have a butt!

links_reviews_title: The dress is for a very particular body type.
links_reviews_text: It runs a bit small in the hips but baggy in the bust.

links_reviews_title: Sized up and still didn't fit
links_reviews_text: I wouldn't particularly say I'm a curvy girl, but I would say this dress does not fit all body types especially any that are a little curvier is the lower half. I was so excited to get this dress but read reviews that it fit tightly so I sized up to the next size, a large, unfortunately that did not help and instead I looked like a squeezed can of biscuits. I loved the idea of this dress but the fit was just poorly done.

links_reviews_title: Love this dress but runs small!
links_reviews_text: Small in the hips
Should have sized up, could hardly zip.

links_reviews_title: Gorgeous dress but runs small-size up
links_reviews_text: Gorgeous dress but was too small. I'm a perfect 2-4 and couldn't even zip up.
Very pretty dress but not for the curvy. I am a true 6 and I could not fit this down my hips. It's made very narrowly! Would have had to order 2 sizes up to fit.

links_reviews_title: I didn't end up wearing this.
links_reviews_text: It was very small and tight in the hips.

So badly wanted to make this dress work. I think I was most excited about receiving this piece than any other in the mail. But it was the most ill-fitting dresses I've ever tried on! I'm a usual 4 but the medium in this (size 6) would just not allow my hips to move and my bust could barely fit. You also couldn't tie the straps until the dress was on you so you could control how high or low you want the dress to be. Trying to get both straps tied at even lengths, while the dress is on you, is no easy feat! Ugh, I couldn't wear this dress at all. Even if I sized up, it'd look too off.

links_reviews_title: Wanted it to work but didn't
links_reviews_text: I rented my regular size and it was the right one, but the fit around the bust was odd and unflattering. Maybe it was too wide around the busy/rib cage, but it stuck out on the sides in a way that didn't look good while somehow flattening out my chest at the same time . Other than that it fit well, if tight. The straps are a really interesting detail - not sure how well they'd hold up for a full night but they look glamorous.
I really like the shape and fabric of this dress, especially with the ribbon ties, but it is too tight in the stomach/butt areas. I didn't feel comfortable wearing it out bc I could barely sit in it.

links_reviews_title: Lovely fabric. Not enough fabric at top for bra and zero support. Returned immediately.
links_reviews_text: Beautiful dress. Ribbons were awkward. The girls were not OK.
Tiny busy big waist
Such a beautiful dress, I felt like a model in it. It's very flattering, showing off curves in all the right ways. You will need a low cut bra!
Super cute, very comfortable, and I got a lot of compliments on this dress! Highly recommend.
Generally a flattering fit. Was a little big in the chest area for me. Loved the design.

links_reviews_title: Love! But bust area is large! Use dress tape!
links_reviews_text: Beautiful dress. Received lots of compliments! Neckline is plunging and was a bit big. I wish I had dress tape! Made it work though and glad it did.
This dress was a HIT. I got so many compliments and it fit like a glove. I'm 5'8 and usually a size 8-10 and the 8 was perfect. It was so comfortable all night. Highly recommend this!

links_reviews_title: Great for a wedding; glad I read the reviews!
links_reviews_text: The Pros: I felt pretty and feminine in this dress - especially on a warm day, the cutouts allowed for the dress to breathe and be comfortable in. The dress hugged my curves in the right places and I received many compliments. The Cons: The dress has a VERY low cut front. I like cleavage, but this was too low and loose. The only option to make the dress work was a black bandeau top. If this was a dress I owned, I would have had the straps taken up/in and could have gone without a bra, but no amount of pinning would have made it work on its own. The zipper was tricky to get started and difficult to zip up without assistance.

links_reviews_title: Perfect fit! Elegant yet fun! Best dress I've worn in a while
links_reviews_text: Pros: - Great fit - unique style but perfect for a wedding - comfortable, even when dancing - pictured well Cons: - zipper was a bit stiff but still worked well - if flat chested the top can feel a bit big!

Very elegant and unique dress worn to a formal summer wedding. Makes a statement without being flashy or over the top. I am a bit more pear than hourglass so it was too big on top, though quite fitted on bottom so not sure if smaller size would have worked (I tried to get a replacement but there was a delivery snafu.) It is not a stretch fabric but I did feel it 'relaxed' after a short time and was looser on bottom. The ventilation was unique and subtle. I'd try it again in on size down.

The 6R fit perfectly although you can't wear a regular bra but with pasties and some tape, the dress stayed put and I wasn't worried about a wardrobe malfunction. Lots of compliments and I felt great in this dress!
Bust ran big, though. Would have done better In a 2R!

Loved this dress! It was a bit more blue than pictured which I personally liked (don't want to wear white with the bride!) Only thing that bothered me were the straps because I'm not too busty so maybe didn't fill out all the way! Would wear again!

Fit true to size, and was pretty perfect for the hot Tx weather (98 degrees that day). The cut is pretty low so I used tape to keep the dress from exposing anything. Received lots of compliments, definitely would recommend.

links_reviews_title: I wore this to a charity dinner. The quality and fit were great, it runs a little big.
links_reviews_text: I normally order a size 2 & 4, but after reading the reviews decided to get a 0 & 2. I ended up wearing the 0 as it fit better in the waist and bust than the 2. I'm a 34C, 36-26-37, and the 0 was a little snug on the hips but fit great everywhere else. After about 5 minutes of sitting in the car, the hips weren't snug anymore. It needs a U-bra or tape and you can't wear a slip under it because of the sheer panels, but the lining is perfect. I ended up not wearing a bra because there was too much cleavage for my taste. No bra made for a more natural and less in your face decolletage for a charity function. Lots of compliments and very comfortable!
The 8 on across the hips was a little tight if you're curvier. Great fit to the dress & pretty! I am 5'9 & the dress was middle of the calf for me so if you're on the shorter side it may be too long.

links_reviews_title: Standout dress but be prepared to use double-sided tape!
links_reviews_text: I rented this dress for a Saturday evening wedding that wasn't quite black tie but still needed to be formal. Got tons of compliments all night and felt fabulous wearing it! Couple things worth mentioning - the top of the dress is large, based on my experience and other reviews the dress could stand to have an inch or two less of fabric in the straps. Because of this I absolutely used double-sided tape (tried to go without it but realized I wouldn't enjoy a second of the evening if I was constantly adjusting and checking for coverage). Once I made that fix the dress was perfect! Also, the fabric doesn't have a TON of give due to the thick lace work, which I am always wary of because I have wide hips and larger thighs, but my usual size of a 4 still worked out fine, though if the top of the dress hadn't been so large I probably would have opted for the 6 to have a little extra breathing room.

links_reviews_title: There's a reason so many people have borrowed this dress!
links_reviews_text: It is one of my favorite rentals ever! Fit me perfectly and garnered a million compliments. Comfortable, despite the neckline plunging lower than I would usually select. Wore it without a bra or tape and it didn't budge. Love, love, love this dress!

links_reviews_title: I felt amazing in this dress. I got a ton of compliments. Used double sided tape for the top!
links_reviews_text: True to size, flattering pattern and fabric. Top does tend to be a little big, especially when you sit, so I'd recommend taping it down.
FIT SO WELL. Incredibly flattering. True to size. Make sure you tape your girls up, though (or have a good bra for them) beautiful dress. Love it & considering buying it soon!
