I wore this dress for my rehearsal dinner and it was absolutely perfect! Fit was great- sexy and classy. If you have larger boobs it might be a little revealing (I'm a 34B) I also used double sided tape to keep the deep-v from puckering. Loved this dress- I will definitely be renting again!

Both the 2 and 4 fit, but the 4 made it easier to sit and move around and didn't look as scrunched since it's tight in the hips. I love the low front and the shape of the skirt. I was getting compliments all night. It looked and felt lovely and was really fun to wear.

I loved the way this looked on me. Because I have a small bust, every time I moved or sat down the top of the dress would gape open so I sadly had to change my dress mid wedding reception as I feared I wouldn't be able to dance and have fun without flashing people.

links_reviews_title: Perfect for a cocktail / dinner event! I got lots of complements
links_reviews_text: Loved the fit and length of the dress with my hourglass shape. The print was fun without being too wild and I loved the see-through details!

This dress is absolutely beautiful. Unfortunately for me, the dress material had no stretch and wasn't made for a curvy girl like me. I am 5'7, with an hourglass figure 36/27/40, and a bubble butt. It was loose around my waist and tight around my butt/hips, so it wasn't the most comfortable or flattering fit. The low cut clevage area wasn't a problem with my 32 D's. The girls stay covered all night. Despite the dress not being a perfect fit, it wasn't too noticeable given the embroidered material, so I wore it anyways. It was a show stopper. I received multiple compliments on this dress.

The print on this dress is absolutely amazing. Keep in mind that the cut is a little low so if you're a little unsure about having your girls on display this might not be for you. I'm more pear than hour glass and since the fabric of this dress had no give or stretch it was slightly snug around the hips, but not uncomfortable. I highly recommend this dress of u want a dress that makes a statement without having tons of colors

links_reviews_title: Fun, unique dress and super comfortable!
links_reviews_text: Loved the dress and for was great! Danced the night away.

Just to start, this is one of my favorite RTR dresses! Fits like a glove. Hugs the curves without being too tight. Love the low cut of this dress. Used double sided tape just in case and it worked just fine. Love the see-through details on the waist and knee area. The print makes this dress look expensive. Wore it for New Years party and got multiple complements. Recommend to rent!

This dress was classy and really a gorgeous design. I received multiple compliments. The detailed material was my favorite thing about the dress. I only wish that the chest wasn't so revealing. It cuts very low; past the area where a bra would show. This part of the dress was a tad big also, so if it were appropriate for me to where it with full chest exposure, it still didn't fit the best, and I am a 34C. I ended up using safety pins to pin the v-neck together about 2-3 inches up. At least that worked well without jeopardizing the look. I really wanted to avoid having to wear a shirt underneath.

links_reviews_title: Felt sexy without it being tight. Wore sweater bc it was too low for work
links_reviews_text: Like most rtr, the zippet does not zip smoothly but felt like a million bucks

oh my gosh I loved this dress! looks so so pretty in person, and I feel like the shape would be flattering on so many. I am pretty small and the 0 fit super well.. I like how it gave me curves I don't really have! the quality is top notch and the dress was totally comfortable. I wore it to a black tie optional wedding and it fit in perfectly. this was my first experience with RTR; can't wait to rent again!!

This dress was such a hit! I got so many compliments and people asking wear I found it. Used tape in the bust area just to have peace of mind. It was tight enough and I have a small bust where I would've been fine without tape. The bottom area of the dress was pretty tight and I wish had a little more stretch but that's my body type. For my ladies with the larger bottom half of the body I would size up.

[Review from my daughter, who is 26-years-old and 5.8"] This dress is gorgeous. Fit like a glove and I had compliments all night. The chest was a bit big though, even with fabric tape, and I had to pull the dress down pretty consistently or avoid leaning over too much to avoid a nip slip. Otherwise perfection.

links_reviews_title: Love! Fits like a glove! Complements all night!
links_reviews_text: Fits true to size, used fabric tape to tape down the deep V and worked like a charm.

links_reviews_title: Perfect dress for a fall formal wedding in Baja!!
links_reviews_text: This was my first rent the runway dress, and I couldn't be happier with the service and quality of the dresses. I ordered 3 dresses for this wedding, and this dress was the one that fit the best. I am 5'7", 135lbs, 34DD, and I got a 6. It fit perfectly. I would say that the dress would fit loosely up top for someone with a smaller bust because as I wore the dress, it felt a little looser by the end of the night. I got many compliments, and I felt very classy in my dress.

This dress was so fun to wear and very flattering. It was difficult to keep the bust tapped down- that would be my only con. It also had a slip that kept peaking out at the bottom. However- I was super happy with the overall look so just minor details! You'll love this rental!

links_reviews_title: A touch of sass and a touch of class!
links_reviews_text: This dress is gorgeous! A bit of elegance and sexiness. I didn't think the plunge neckline was too bad and no slips happened. Another great experience with RTR. The zipper did break while I was trying to get it on but I don't take away points from the dress for this little mishap. Glad I went with the reviews to size down. Even sizing down the dress was a bit big in the chest area and not as tight as I expected on the backside, but that's just my body. I can see a more curvy gal finding the fit to be small as there isn't any stretch to the material.

Dress fit great especially since I'm top heavy. Definitely better for those with bigger chest but aren't afraid to shoe the girls. I did feel a lil self conscious at a few times but still thought it was beautiful. May rent again and try with bralette. Zip was kinda funky and felt fragile. Beautiful construction and material

This dress is absolutely stunning! I got so many compliments all night. The cleavage is low, so if yuh are comfortable with it, this dress is perfect. I didn't wear any tape, the sizing was perfect. The lace is very thick and of great quality. I would rent it again

Loved the midi length for a formal work event. Got lots of compliments. Fit great. Easy to walk and move in. Fit true to size. The v in front us deep but was able to clip it to make it more appropriate for work event.
Awesome fit great for black tie, low cut
Fit TTS. Definitely tight around the waist but in a flattering way. Very revealing up top.

Slip dresses are in and this one was very cute and it's a beautiful bright color! I wanted to make this a bit edgier so I wore it with combat boots and all black clothing. It was chilly as well so it's great to layer up and wear leggings underneath.

Wore this dress with a fitted black turtleneck for my anniversary date night at a French restaurant. Felt cool and fashion forward. I sized up because I wanted a looser fit on my hips. The silk is thicker than I thought and it is lined. Loved this dress!

links_reviews_title: Love the color...perfect for casual Friday
links_reviews_text: I was thinking to wear this dress for my bday but the cut in the chest is too low and I would be showing the ladies, so decided to follow the style of the other girls reviews and wear it for work...everyone loved the color and the style!
Wore this out on a Saturday night. Very flattering and I thought the look was chic and sexy with a black fitted turtleneck and chunky black shoes.

This slip is a DREAM. The pink and material is beautiful. The material is thicker than a lot of slip dresses I've tried on, which I love. The slits aren't too high. So comfy and pretty. Size fit perfectly. Would rent over and over again.
Comfy & hung perfectly, loved where the hemline hit and the thickness of the material. So easy to dress up or down and make an impact!

I rented this dress for Halloween to be Jenna Rink from 13 Going on 30. I would normally wear a 14 in a dress that's straight through the hips like this one, but they only had a 12 so I tried it out. It was a little tight through the hips, but since I had a jacket to go with it, it was fine. I definitely thought the straps were too long, so I think this would be hard to wear as just a dress because they kept falling down. The color was gorgeous and it worked for what I was looking for!
Sleek and beautiful. Was longer than I would like and not as silky as I would want, but still beautiful.

I have been eyeing this dress for a while, but wanted some more reviews, before trying it out. I was disappointed when I only saw people wearing it casually, but decided to get it for a wedding wknd anyways and OH MY GOD THIS DRESS IS EVERYTHING. Not only is the fabric surprisingly thicker than I thought making it look way more expensive/formal than a night gown but the fit is just beautiful. It's not clingy, but not too loose where it would continue giving off a night-gown vibe. I received several compliments all night and felt amazing, get this dress NOW!

links_reviews_title: Rent This!!! You will not regret it
links_reviews_text: It's that good: silky but substantial fabric, skimming fit, on trend & comfy (good walking with the two fairly-modest side slits.) Wore it casual with a t-shirt, belt bag & black platform sneakers but you could wear with square-toe, strappy black sandals, long sparkly earrings & be the best dressed person at any party. You could also wear with black leather moto jacket & Doc Martens should if you are feeling that look! I felt special wearing this. Wish I could afford to keep.
AMAZING piece ! Beautiful and you look great in it!So many compliments from my coworkers! I wasn't sure if the 8 would be too small but size was perfect!

I loved this slip dress. It is an easy piece to dress up or down depending on where you are going. Wear it with a tee for a casual look, or keep a bare chest for a date look. The dress looks expensive.
The fabric is a beautiful. color, and the weight is nice as well, but the straps just would not stay up! I did not want to have to deal with that ALL night long... so it went back to RTR

links_reviews_title: Straps run a little long for the less-busty
links_reviews_text: I'm a petite size 0 with a smaller bust and found the straps to be a little too long. I was already planning to style it layered over a tee when I ordered it, but I actually HAD to in order not to show any signs of a bra. I was in a rush the day I wore it, but if I had a bit more time I might have tried to pin the straps to be a bit shorter. Color and fabric were awesome though, and I'd consider renting again.

links_reviews_title: This dress was so fun! If you have curves, you'll need to belt it.

links_reviews_text: This dress is very flattering and comfortable. The straps are not adjustable, so if you don't have much going on in the chest area (like me - ha!), the dress will fall pretty low on your chest. I ended up wearing a thin tee underneath, but it was a good look and I got a ton of compliments.

links_reviews_title: Great dress for a concert event
links_reviews_text: Wore this to a work event: a concert weekend in Las Vegas. Paired with a denim jacket and black mules, having the coat kept it from showing too much skin or cleavage around my colleagues! The material wrinkles easily, so it doesn't travel well, but it's also thicker than silk, so it feels more substantial. I had to go commando in it due to all panty lines showing visibly, so be warned! Would still rent again.

links_reviews_title: I didn't wear it. It reminded me too much of a slip. Not much form....didn't feel flattering on.
links_reviews_text: Fit fine. Just kinda hung there.
I wore this to work with a blazer, as it is backless. I love the look of a jumpsuit. This fit me everywhere except the torso was slightly too short for me.

I was so excited to wear this jumper but was disappointed that my torso was a bit too long. The crotch was high so when standing up straight, it rode up in the front and back. Maybe I could try a long in the future to see if that helped.

This dress was just perfect, colorful, fun, unique and so perfect for a formal night at the Regent Beverly Wilshire. People were so sweet and kept complementing the colors, to me it just made me so happy to wear this dress and not go with a LBD.

I loved this dress so much! It fit perfectly and was very flattering. I'm not as confident with my midsection and upper back, but in this dress I felt more than confident! I didn't have to wear a bra, which is a first for me. I received compliments all night! The colors are more vibrant in person. I have a longer torso, so I think the mesh straps at the top fit really well on me. Overall, I would definitely rent this dress again!

links_reviews_title: Absolutely stunning dress, a must rent!
links_reviews_text: I wore this dress to a wedding last fall, and received a ton of compliments. It's by far the prettiest dress I've ever worn. The quality and ombr√© of colors is even more stunning in person. Because of how many colors there were, it's really easy to style with jewelry and/shoes. I personally found a strappy purple pair of shoes from DSW. I would 100% recommend this dress to anyone, you'll feel like a million bucks!

Wowza, this got a lot of attention at the wedding I wore it to! Don't let the stock images fool you, or even out of the bag, you just need to try it on to see how cool this dress is. Wears easy and is super comfortable. Paired with nude heels. Very elegant, a hit!
Love this dress! Was worried the taffeta would be itchy but it's super comfy and great for dancin'

I got compliments all night long! The dress runs true to size, and was fully lined, so I didn't need to wear a bra (always a plus, LOL). It's got a layer of crinoline under it, which creates a nice fullness, without being too puffy. I'm 5'8" and wore 3 inch heels, and the dress hit just above my ankles. The mesh at the neckline was a bit scratchy, but nothing unbearable. I had so many people come up and rave about the dress. The colors are amazing and it is a gorgeous, unique piece. Loved it!
Felt like a princess in this dress! The colors are incredible! Ran true to size! I wore it to a wedding and loved dancing in it all night long!

The dress is gorgeous. I wore it to an 80s prom event, but it's wasn't costume-y. I would wear the dress normally, it just happened to work for this event. I got lots of compliments on how pretty it was. The lace details are beautiful, and I loved the colors. Fit was true to size. I'm usually a 4-6, and both worked. I went with the 6 for extra comfort.
Wore this as a wedding guest. Absolutely loved the detail of the embroidered lace and the ombr√© coloration was stunning.
Gorgeous!

links_reviews_title: I didn‚Äôt want to send this back! I got so many compliments and it was so pretty and comfortable.
links_reviews_text: First-time renter. I rented this for a black tie wedding. Besides my own wedding dress it was the most beautiful dress I‚Äôve ever worn. I thought the sleeves would bother me but they didn‚Äôt. I‚Äôm 5‚Äô4‚Äù and I don‚Äôt wear heels so the length was perfect, and I didn‚Äôt have to wear a bra, which was great. I couldn‚Äôt believe how comfortable this dress was.
This is probably the prettiest dress I've ever worn! The embroidery shines in the light. The fit is true to size and it so comfortable. Rent this!

links_reviews_title: Perfect Dress for a Photoshoot in Paris
links_reviews_text: I took this gorgeous dress to Paris with me for a dream photoshoot. I absolutely love it. It's so comfortable and fun to wear! I really want to own it. The fit was pretty much true to size. I probably could've gone down a size but this one was breathable and not uncomfortable. The colors are so vibrant.

links_reviews_title: This dress is a MUST RENT
links_reviews_text: I got tons of compliments on the dress (including from the bride! The colors are really vibrant, especially in well lit areas, and the skirt is super fun for dancing. My only issue was that it was slightly big! Honestly - rent this dress - it's a stunner!

links_reviews_title: So many compliments on the colors!
links_reviews_text: The dress fit well. It a bit long on me being 5'2", almost going to the floor but with heels it worked really well. The colors are vibrant. Loved it.

Got a ton of compliments on this dress. Loved it! Did not have pockets and looking at the photos, makes my arms look a bit wide. But, I felt amazing in this dress and it was so unique and colorful! Love, love, love.

links_reviews_title: The endless compliments on my dress all evening
links_reviews_text: This dress fit like a glove! I was nervous because I am usually at 14/16 dress size but this was perfection.
This fit like a glove and was so comfortable! The colors are brilliant even better in person. Received many compliments.

I rented this to wear to Phantom of the Opera on my birthday at the Pantages because it reminds me of Christine's Masquerade dress (pictured)! The fit was so perfect, I might take some more photos before I give it back! It made me feel so glamorous & I got so many compliments!

links_reviews_title: Better in person than in photos
links_reviews_text: This dress hits curves in all the right spots and is super comfortable. The only downside is the colors are so vibrant in person, but less visible in photos. The off the shoulder design makes the dress look unique and the threading is well done throughout. I would rent this one again.

links_reviews_title: this dress made me feel like a million bucks. so many compliments. LOVE LOVE LOVE
links_reviews_text: Fit was great- its a heavier dress so i may not have worn it if it was super hot but it fit perfectly and i honestly felt like a princess. Win all around!

links_reviews_title: This dress was utterly perfect for a Mexican wedding in Puerto Vallarta! I got SO MANY compliments!
links_reviews_text: I'm very much pear-shaped, so the full skirt was perfect. I'm small on top (34B) so the size 6 worked well. I didn't need spanx and a strapless bra kept everything neat. You don't need anything more than some simple diamond earrings, the dress is the star of the show!
This dress was perfect! Colors are so vibrant in person! My favorite RTR ever! Got so many compliments!

links_reviews_title: Beautiful dress for opening day at Churchill downs
links_reviews_text: Glamorous stand out dress.
This dress is so gorgeous and the colors are stunning. I received so many compliments. I am so glad I selected this one.

links_reviews_title: Gorgeous dress, I received so many compliments on it!
links_reviews_text: I‚Äôm 5‚Äô6 and around 135, the size 4 fit perfectly

Just an absolutely stunning dress. Wore to a black-tie wedding, and had flashback moments to wearing my princess Halloween costume everyday when I was three years old (i.e., I wanted to do something similar and make this dress my life's uniform). I paired it with my own cheapo emerald-green costume earrings to bring out the green tones at the base of the skirt, and the Kate Spade glitter sima clutch. The colors of the dress don't look SUPER vibrant in this picture, but they absolutely were in real life, as well as in the professional photos from the wedding taken with flash. I didn't wear a bra, as I can't bear strapless bras, and the bodice was fitted enough to provide some support. You'll definitely want to wear heels with this dress regardless of your height due to the tea-length. It's very fitted in the waist, but very generous in the hips with its full skirt.

links_reviews_title: Looked and felt amazing! So much fun to wear.
links_reviews_text: My first time trying RTR and I‚Äôll definitely be back. Dress arrived quickly in perfect condition. It is SO pretty. I‚Äôm a hippy hourglass shape between 12 and 14 depending on the cut of a dress. I got the 14 because the 12 was unavailable and it was a little roomy on top but looked great and was super comfortable. A 12 would‚Äôve probably would‚Äôve looked more fitted but felt less comfortable. Wore it to a celebrity awards concert and got so many enthusiastic compliments from so many random strangers. Felt like a million bucks.

links_reviews_title: Absolutely in love with this dress
links_reviews_text: I picked up this dress in the RTR store & was a bit nervous to wear it since it's a bit out there for me. However it was so so worth it - so many compliments & the colors were absolutely beautiful. It was perfect for a black tie wedding... especially because it's not a full gown so I didn't have to worry about dancing and going out with my friends after. I'm a true 6 because of my butt and chest and had originally settled on a 6R which fit me well at the store. But when I went back a week later, there was only a 4 available. I'm glad I went with the 4 because it gave me a bit more cinch in the waist without being uncomfortable. It also let me go braless with zero problems! I'm in love with this and am considering buying it! Definitely a showstopper.

links_reviews_title: This dress made me feel like a princess!
links_reviews_text: The color of the lace is just as vibrant as in the photos. The bodice fit well, and I was able to go without a bra. I agree with other reviewers about the sheer top fitting strangely, but it wasn't a huge issue. It is also pretty long, even with heels. Overall, I loved it for the color, the lace, and the ombre. If I could buy this dress to keep it, I would.

links_reviews_title: Wore to an Oscar's Viewing party
links_reviews_text: The most beautiful dress. Mesh lining on top and tulle under the skirt.

links_reviews_title: Stunning! Best Dressed!! A Must Wear!
links_reviews_text: This dress is STUNNING!! I never felt more confident, comfortable, or received more compliments in a dress!! I was really nervous about this pick. I had a not so great experience with my initial dress picks, but the Lu at RTR was TOP NOTCH!! She helped me go thru dresses, made suggestions, and ultimately sent me this dress on a whim because I was cautious of size. I would say the top runs large as my bust is bigger and that's where I generally have issues with size 12 dresses. This dress fit like a glove, top to bottom. I didn't have to wear a strapless bra or undergarment. It was tight enough to keep me secure, but loose enough that I was extremely comfortable all night long. The dress is not as bright as pictured, but vibrant and beautiful! The fit and design of this dress was flattering and hit me in all the right spots. The stitching and workmanship of this dress is impeccable. I truly was the best dressed lady at our event. Strangers kept complimenting how amazing this dress was. Don't second guess it, just rent it! I wish I didn't have to send it back!! I cannot wait for my next rental!

links_reviews_title: Unforgettable that my husband got nominated for his work!
links_reviews_text: I can confirm that this dress is comfortable! I seem to bounce between a size 8 and 6 and ended up wearing the 6R, the mesh is also wonky, tack it down if it really bugs you, I LOVED the colors, they're so bright!

links_reviews_title: This dress got so many compliments!! Would absolutely recommend!!
links_reviews_text: #party #fundress

Very pretty and well made dress. Worked out well for my formal work event. My 3 year old daughter told me I looked like a ‚Äúmommy princess.‚Äù I was able to wear a normal nude bra and it belended right into the mesh.
This dress fit like it should in all the right places. I wore a standard strapless bra. The only downside was no pockets, but the colors of the dress made up for it. Constant compliments. Loved it!

Can't express how amazing this dress was!! The colors are out of this world, the design is unique, and the length is perfect for being formal while still really manageable. I wore it to a masquerade NYE ball and got sooo many compliments. You absolutely won't regret renting this!

Had so much fun wearing this special dress to a fall wedding. Felt substantial without being heavy and the details were so fun and different! The colors are so rich and vibrant. Got me hooked on RTR!!

links_reviews_title: Marchesa NEVER LETS ME DOWN! This dress was vibrant, elegant, and flattering.
links_reviews_text: First of all, I didn‚Äôt want to take it off at the end of the night, but alas, I had to. Pros: vibrant colors, so well made, the body of the dress fit really well, got compliments all night, made me feel fabulous. The only con was the mesh on the chest/neck area was a bit loose and didn‚Äôt fit tightly but it defiantly wasn‚Äôt a deal breaker. Would recommend this dress 100%.
This sequin skirt is so amazing!!! Loved it so much! It fit a little big and I think a small would've worked great.
It fit great & was true to size. I wore it with a body suit & added a cardigan as it was for a baptism & formal party after church. I got lots of compliments!
Fun skirt, super comfortable, very sparkly and runs true to size. I'm short (5'3-4") but the length was good without being frumpy.
Love this beautiful, versatile sequin skirt! I wore it to the theater and loved it! Ran TTS
Versatile to dress up and down. Was surprised at how comfortable it was! It didn't snag or scratch at all.

links_reviews_title: Perfect standout piece for a reunion
links_reviews_text: I wore this to my friends 20 year high school reunion. It was perfect. The skirt was heavy taking it off the hanger but I didn't notice the weight while wearing. It wasn't scratchy or uncomfortable. The colors were vibrant and beautiful. I got tons of compliments. Also, customer service was a dream to work with.

links_reviews_title: Perfect choice for a sparkle themed bachelorette
links_reviews_text: The fit was perfect. The waist is elastic so sizing was pretty versatile. I got so many compliments on this skirt and it was fun and comfortable. Good for any body type...I am 3 months postpartum and was able to wear this confidently!
I loved wearing this skirt. It has a lot of material and is very long so worked really well with a midriff bearing black top (also from rtr). Loads of compliments.
Wore this around the office and it was super comfy and everyone loved it!!!

links_reviews_title: This skirt is all the good things!
links_reviews_text: Fit around my waist perfectly and wasn't too long. I felt amazing in it and got so many compliments! Can be dresses up or down

links_reviews_title: Viva Las Vegas disco ball chic
links_reviews_text: Comfortable and fit well. Loved this statement piece
Got a million compliments on this skirt, but, I'm wearing it up over my boobs -LOL. I loved it as a midi but it was too big.

Wore this for a friend's 30th birthday brunch. It looked great paired with a black crop top and heels. It was perfect for brunch where I was mostly sitting but may have been heavy if I was doing a lot of walking/standing. Got a ton of compliments!

I LOVED this skirt! I manage a charity gala so I needed something that is comfortable and work appropriate. It's a long day/night on my feet and this skirt was perfect. The theme was "dance" with lots of color, glitz, disco balls, etc. and this skirt fit the theme brilliantly. I received so many compliments. I rented a Small with the Medium as backup. The Small fit, but I ended up wearing the Medium as it had slightly extra give to it. But I would have been fine in the Small. The skirt fell past my knees, so it would look great with heels (I just needed flats for running around). The elastic waist band adds to the comfort and the sequins were not itchy as I expected them to be. I only wish it had pockets, but it really was one of my favorite rentals so far.

Loved loved loved this one. So i bought it. Wore xs and I usually range between 0-2. If anything, I could've stood for a bit smaller but it totally worked with the elastic band. It's comfy and fun and my boyfriend was in love. Soooo many compliments and will be great for pride, Marco gras, so many things!

This skirt was EVERYTHING. I was so sad to send this back and tried to justify keeping it longer. It was so perfect and I am obsessed. The weight was not heavy at all. The sequins were also not itchy and there was a perfect amount of stretch. The wedding was in Vegas and this was perfect. I received a ton of compliments and definitely want to wear this everyday.

links_reviews_title: I wore this for an anniversary date with my husband. Can be dressed up or down with sneakers.
links_reviews_text: The fit was a little smaller than I expected. I wore the medium, which fit, but the waistband is a little tight. I really liked the sequins and the way the skirt moved and sparkled. I dressed it down with sneakers, but you could definitely wear this to a dressier event with heels. Would rent again!
In LOVE with this skirt! Wore to a work party at the Tabernacle and I was a human disco ball! Got a lot of compliments and so comfy!
#fun #glittery
Wear this skirt and you become an instant party! So fun! Can dress up or down.. either way you will receive endless compliments!

Rented for a Mardi Gras Party and paired it with a black tied T-shirt. Received many compliments throughout the night. As other reviews said, the band doesn't lay flat, so I suggest wearing the smaller size so that it doesn't make you look wider than you really are!

links_reviews_title: GORGEOUS, statement piece for sure, but got a million compliments on this skirt!
links_reviews_text: Fits perfectly, all eyes were on me when I wore this. I used it for a blog post, but also wore for work and it was always the topic of conversation. Would definitely rent this again.
Wore to a Vegas wedding. Went great with a my black crop top! Would definitely wear again!

links_reviews_title: So beautiful and comfortable! Compliments all night!
links_reviews_text: I'm obsessed with this skirt. I'm usually between a 4 and 6, and I ended up wearing the small. I could have worn the medium as well, but because I'm pretty short (5'2") the small worked better for me. Midi skirts are tricky for us short people, but this one was perfect. I have a small waist and bigger hips, and because of the waist band I was able to wear it a little higher for a more flattering fit. It's also incredibly comfortable and forgiving. You could easily dress this up or down depending on your needs.

links_reviews_title: The dress code was "Dress like a million bucks" this definitely fit the bill
links_reviews_text: Pros- fun and lots of compliments Cons- I was adjusting the waist band all night because it kept folding over
Loved it. It is very comfortable and true to size. I received many compliments!

I rented this for my best friend's bday and dressed it down with a velvet tee and suede ankle booties. The layers of the skirt and the tee were a little bulky on the hips, I'd recommend a body suit or something thinner and/or control top tights. Got stopped a million times while we were out dancing. I'd like to try the similar dress version next!

This skirt was fun and totally different for my usual work attire. Everyone LOVED this skirt, and it was easy to make a little more casual with booties and a basic sweater. I had a hard day at work the time I wore this, and it made my day a little brighter.
this skirt was so fun! Tons of compliments, very comfortable. Would buy if I had more occasions to wear it to
Such a perfect skirt for a party! Loved the sparkle and color it added. Plus, it's super comfortable and stretchy, so no worries about indulging on snacks!

This was such a great rental, as usual. I got a medium, which fit perfectly with an elastic waistband that was super comfortable all night. I wore this for a 50th anniversary party and got many compliments on the skirt. I am not usually someone who loves the glitter, but I loved this! The colors were great and it was just sparkly enough to feel like $1000! Paired great with a nice black shirt and flats!

links_reviews_title: Was an attention grabber and received so many compliments.
links_reviews_text: I wear a size 8 and the medium worked perfectly.

I loved the details and sparkles of this skirt. In the light it was really cool to see the sparkle on the wall. I had so many compliments on the skirt! It was a great birthday. I would get an XS next time because the skirt is heavy and would slowly weigh the skirt down so what started on my upper waist would go down to my lower waist.

Absolutely loved this skirt. It was super comfortable and great for the fancy work party I wore it to! I'd say it runs just a bit small. I usually wear mediums, but opted for the size L back up -- the waistband is a little thin, so it cut into my waist a little more than I would've liked (spanx helped with this!). Also, on a short person (I'm 5'3"), this skirt will hit you around the calf area, so I'd recommend wearing with heels. Overall, this skirt is amazing, and I wish I could've kept it :)

I rented this skirt for my corporate holiday party. Everyone was green with envy. I received so many compliments calling it fun, flirty, and magical. I wore the medium (I'm 5'8", 145 pounds). The small fit as well but was a tad tight in the waist band.
Such a cute skirt. Got it for my Grad School photos and I am so happy with it.

links_reviews_title: A little loose in the waist but the material is amazing
links_reviews_text: I wanted to love this skirt but it was a little loose on my waist (24). The material is incredible though. The sparkles look so good.
I had so much fun wearing this skirt. It is not my typical wardrobe style but I needed something with a little sparkle. The material is not itchy and it is comfortable to wear.

links_reviews_title: stand out with color and sparkle
links_reviews_text: got lots of compliments all night. very comfortable. wore it with a simple black tank, several people thought it was a dress. loved the longer length for a change, as i feel like i'm usually always in a mini.
Loved wearing this skirt. Tons of compliments. Wore with a black velvet shirt tucked in, but could also be dressed down. Perfect fit- more high waisted. Loved the look!
Fits really nicely and didn't even need a belt!
Loved this dress! Renting again. It's sexy but classy. Super short! Not form fitting but hugs your curves.

links_reviews_title: Need to add a belt to make it work
links_reviews_text: The fit is loose. I added a belt and it completely made it much better looking. It's short.
Wore this to my engagement party! Loved the fit. Not too tight in the middle but still tailored in a bit and just the right length. Also super silky soft material.
Not super flattering but stylish. Length was perfect (not too short). Tons of compliments.

links_reviews_title: So fun and different, got tons of compliments both times I wore it!
links_reviews_text: Overall great piece, but a little short when you raise your arms for dancing

A little loose but easy to wear. Hugged me in the right places. Material is thin and feels a little cheap, but the dress is cute overall. Got lots of compliments. Perfect for a date night. Paired with olive faux fur jacket.

Loved that the material was very thin, so I didn't overheat in the long sleeve dress. it's a bit short, so I paired it with over the knee boots. I'm a size 8, but I think I could have sized down to a M (wore the L). It was a bit large in the underarm, and loose in the mid-section, which I didn't mind.

I was nervous about the cleavage & the length because I have basically no boobs and I'm 5 feet tall. The dress fitted like a glove! I wore some nipple covers but do recommend to add some tape to hold in place as well! The length made me look taller than I am. I got so many complements and felt like Jlo lol

Rent it, wear it, love it, live it. Super flattering. Super comfortable. Super bright. Showstopping. I taped up the ladies and it was magical. Don't ruin it by wearing a cami or something. Either do the damn thing or rent something more conservative. If you want to own the room, this is for you.

links_reviews_title: This was a knockout dress. Beautiful cut and color
links_reviews_text: Im usually a 4 but I wore a 2 and it fit perfect! Very flattering (from the right angle). The color was dynamic and definitely stood out. I would rent this again. The only con was it appeared to have been overworn by others and had stains on the elbows.

I took a leap of faith with this dress. I've never worn anything this revealing BUT once I got over the initial shock I realized I could rock it. I received so many compliments! The color, and fabric were very high end. If you are curvy like me you will definitely needed boob tape !!
I love this dress, very sexy and stunning
Believe all the reviews. This dress is amazing. Sexy but sophisticated and extremely flattering no matter your body type. Rent it. Grab some double stick tape and stop the show.

I rented this dress for a friend's rehearsal dinner and it was an absolute stunner. I am relatively busty so I was a bit nervous about it, but it draped perfectly in the front and felt tasteful yet also sexy. I honestly didn't even need to use tape, but I did end up putting some on for additional peace of mind. I got so many compliments! It definitely made me appreciate my figure and remind me to celebrate all of my curves. Success!

links_reviews_title: Fun, comfortable... compliments all night long
links_reviews_text: I normally wear a 4 which did fit but ended up wearing the 2 as I felt more secure up top. The dress felt like sweatpants.

Lime green just as the photo! Loved this dress and super comfy if you‚Äôre going to a dinner since the fabric is stretchy. The cleavage is super low so I added a leather bralette which madr it look a lot more chic.

links_reviews_title: Dancing with my hubby in this hot ass dress!
links_reviews_text: Love the fit and low plunge. Was a bit self-conscious at first but when I realized the stares were a good thing, I let it go and had a great time! Only issue is boob tape didn't work well since the fabric shows every little bump. I wore "chicken cutlets" instead and they worked out fine!

Fav dress rental over the last two years! The deep v was fitted but the dress had stretch. It was perfect for dinner and a night out in Vegas. Everyone stopped me to compliment the color and deep V. A MUST RENT!

links_reviews_title: Rented for Miami bachelorette, because where else would you wear this?
links_reviews_text: So was supposed to wear bright absurd things for bach trip to Miami, did not end up actually wearing this b/c I just couldn't, even in Miami. Posting the photo so someone larger can get a sense of what this looks like...but yeah I could not pull it off.
Fantastic quality material and an extremely flattering cut. Wearing it for an anniversary trip and can't wait to show it off to hubs!

links_reviews_title: Can I wear this every day?
links_reviews_text: It's a showstopper. True to size. The low cut top plus the tight long sleeves plus the folding over the tummy makes it basically the most flattering dress ever? Rent it. Period.

links_reviews_title: Sizzling plunge. Not for the faint of heart!
links_reviews_text: Super sexy dress. Best for smaller busts. I'm a 34C and I felt VERY exposed in it. The girls were out there but I just pretended I was wearing a turtleneck and that not everyone was staring at my cleavage. Lots of compliments and stares all night. Definitely a "look at me" dress.
The material is so beautiful and comfortable! I was able to size down as this dress runs large and is very stretchy. I loved everything about this garments. I will rent it 1000x again!
Fit well but the challenge was finding something to wear on the inside without lines showing.

I have an hourglass figure so things tend to be tight in the bust and butt. I usually wear a 4 and a 2 was baggy. I wasn't a fan of the fabric. If the bottom part of the dress was Tailored to be a fitted dress I would like to more: instead it seemed to drown me. The cleavage area also was unflattering as the fabric didn't sit flatly and gaped in certain areas

This dress was super comfortable and flattering. The color was beautiful, too. Perfect for a birthday party! I'm usually between a size 6 - 8, and I sized down in this. The cut and style of the dress make it more forgiving.
Color is amazing- loved the fit. Very provocative and sexy dress but overall great fitting. Length hit mid calf for me (I'm 5'3")

links_reviews_title: Stunning and very eye-catching. Truly flattering piece.
links_reviews_text: Gorgeously vivid color, compliments galore.
It was a little bright and low cut for my taste, but it was amazing for the 80s party we went to

links_reviews_title: Loved the cut, not crazy about the color
links_reviews_text: This dress fit beautifully (if on the smaller side) and was very flattering but the color was very loud. Could be amazing for another event but I chickened out from showing this much cleave at a farm wedding with my dad in attendance.

links_reviews_title: I rocked this dress for a jungle themed evening event at the Zoo. Channeled the python vibe!
links_reviews_text: I initially chose the 10 but it was unavailable, the 12 zipped nicely and the dress was extremely comfortable. My 15 year old daughter taped me up (check Kim Kardashian youtube vids) with medical/sport tape and it was very striking as I'm a 34DDD. I felt very secure as the dress stayed put without fashion tape. Wore Spanx power short from Zappos as couldn't get anything high waisted because plunge so low. I saw other RTR options that I had considered but they blended in with the other 5,000 people. Compliments all night on this standout python number!

links_reviews_title: Will def rent again a size down
links_reviews_text: I've been eyeing down this dress for weeks and it finally became available. I ordered the size 10 and although it fit when I stood still, any time I'd move my arms or sit, my chest would slip out. The fabric was so soft and it was such a flattering fit but not even fashion tape kept me safe so I'm going to try the size 8 next.

links_reviews_title: Y'all this is a serious plunge
links_reviews_text: Look, I saw the description and the dress and read the comments but WOW this is a serious plunge. This is about one size bigger than a perfect fit, but still works - that being said, the plunge goes all the way down to below my ribcage. It's sexy as hell and perfect for my trip to Vegas. Even if you have no boobs like me, you're going to need fashion tape - if I'm not sitting up straight, the fabric around my tots loosens and the ladies pop out. Great color, super comfy yet spicy, and fun longer length.

links_reviews_title: Material is stretchy so def able to size down. I was comfortable all night!!
links_reviews_text: Perfect dress for a wedding! It's stretchy and I was able to size down. I was never uncomfortable or felt like I was falling out of the dress. I received a ton of compliments and the color is loud and fun

The fabric shows every bump, bulge, fold. Even though my dress was not wrinkled, you could see the lines of the lining underneath. The color was beautiful. The dress was comfortable. It did fit larger than expected.

links_reviews_title: Absolutely beautiful color and beyond flattering
links_reviews_text: Fabric was so nice, it was super comfortable. I don't think there was anything unflattering about this dress. I would definitely re-rent again.
Material was not that great and it was very short and sort of frumpy.

Dress is tts. The plunge is very low and not for the faint of heart. LoL. Loved that the color is bright and it makes an entrance. Would def rent it again for the right occasion. Very comfortable to wear. Got so much compliments from people.

Very low cut I'm more a 4 but this fit fine it has a slight stretch to the back so it worked. Very very plunging I have fake boobs so it wasn't a problem but it would have been hard to wear if I didn't there's no way to get support

Love love LOVE this dress. So easy to wear, so comfortable. Came with a great slip. Outer part has a great thickness, you can tell its expensive. (so expensive I couldnt keep it‚Äìtragically). Belted it to drape over my tummy. Will rent again!
This dress is so pretty. I wore it casually with Tevas and flip flops but it would be great for dressing up too. I'm 5'8", 32D and usually a size 6. I wore this in a medium.

links_reviews_title: loved this dress. wore it on a saturday just for fun with the family and it was great.
links_reviews_text: great dress. casual or dressed up. great for everyday.

links_reviews_title: I didn't love this dress on. It runs big, very confortable but I didn't wear it out.

links_reviews_text: Perfect summer dress, and I loved that both the slip and dress (which I thought were two dresses at first) have adjustable straps. Very thin material but with the slip you have coverage. Just a bit too loose on me - would order again in a smaller size.

I wore this at least 3 times - to work and out - and got lots of compliments every time! It's a great, easy summer dress that also makes a statement. It was a little long on me but I used a belt to help pull it up a bit.
Loved this dress. Super comfortable and sexy at the same time. Fits very nicely.
So easy to throw on and such a great, vibrant summer color.

Silky, comfortable, glamorous. so much fun to wear. can be dressed up or down, can be worn to a party or, with a blazer or cardigan, to work. I loved this item. it's light purple, not white, which wasn't obvious to me from the photo online.
Omg this dress. It's easy and beautiful. The color is great and it's so comfortable The fabric hangs so nicely and it can be worn so many different ways. Rent this. Trust me
While it is a very comfortable dress with nice breathable fabric, I felt like I was in my pjs so I wore this only once inside my house
It's two separate dresses that you layer on top of one another. Cute but felt more like a fancy nightgown, didn't end up wearing it.

links_reviews_title: The color is to die for
links_reviews_text: I really love this dress. The color is so pretty and different and I got a lot of compliments! As someone curvy and petite, I definitely needed a belt because otherwise it's a little tent-like and overwhelming. It is a bit snug in the bust so keep that in mind re:sizing.

links_reviews_title: Beautiful dress that can be dressed up or down!
links_reviews_text: Easy fit with elastic! Beautiful dress that I wore more than once. Follow on IG to see all the ways I wore @saidbymelissa
Super easy and comfortable dress for a hot wedding in South TX. I'm 5'3" and it hit right at the ankles so I didn't have to worry about tripping. Elegant and fun. Definitely recommend
I like this dress, but didn't love it. It's really comfortable and the print is nice, but the tiers make you look heavier than you are.
Wore this dress for my sons baptism. It was easy to nurse in, totally forgiving figure wise, and super stylish. Loved it and would totally rent it again.

Absolutely loved this dress. Wore it for a Summer wedding near the water. It was light and airy and comfortable in the hot weather. This dress is very flattering - I thought the ruffles would make me appear larger but it was not the case. There is no zipper, only elastic holding the top up so it is not stiff at all. I think this dress could be dressed up or down and was perfect for a wedding!
This dress was great - accentuated the right parts and hid the bad parts. Got a lot of compliments

I love to dress so much! The material was very light great for summer day very airy. The fun pattern and ruffles definitely made me a little bit more feminine and worked well with my oversize denim jacket.

I ended up wearing this to a floral themed bridal shower, then to lunch and a brewery with my husband. The fit was true to size for the most part, but felt like I could Have gone down a size for a better overall fit. I am Very short (5‚Äô1), and the length was perfect with heels, but the bottom DID catch on them a few times so be mindful of this (a platform or chunky heel would probably be best). I found That I liked the dress best with no accessories - just paired with a fun clutch! The movement of the tiered ruffles is so fun, and I got a lot of compliments!
Usually a S but an XS fit great. Really comfortable and easy to wear.
Dress was super comfortable and flowy for a warm outdoor spring wedding! Wouldn't recommend it for larger busted ladies as the ruffles made everything look a bit bigger than they actually were.
This dress is soo beautiful, especially in person. I wore it for Easter mass and brunch. It was very comfy. The fabric is soft and it's more lavender/purple.

links_reviews_title: Perfect for an outdoor Spring wedding!
links_reviews_text: So comfortable and flattering fit! I'm 5'3" and with the large was able to wear flats, which was amazing because I have littles to chase around. This was first dress rental with RTR and I was not disappointed!!! Will be renting again.

I love this trendy maxi by MISA Los Angeles. Running true to size, I recommend going one size up for the backup. This style is fitted to the midsection and loose at the hips . It works for all cup sizes. You are able to wear a strapless bra with this maxi. Love the floral print! Pair with flats or wedges to dress it up or down.

links_reviews_title: Can't get enough of this dress!
links_reviews_text: I absolutely love this dress- so much that this is my second time renting and I'm debating just buying it at this point! The layers are fun, pattern is gorgeous in person, and the silhouette is very flattering. It's very comfortable and a great length. Love everything about this dress!

This dress makes me feel like I should be in a garden. It was light weight and perfect for a sunny day. AS the temperature decreased into the night I paired it with a worn jean jacket for a more casual look. You would think this dress may make you look bigger with the layers but it was surprisingly slimming. The colors aren't too bright but the dress stand out and is an easy slip on and slip off for those who dont want to be bothered with zippers et al.

I wore this to a wedding rehearsal on the beach when I was 28 weeks pregnant. The material is so lightweight! I probably would've been fine in a small too but the medium was great. Ended up wearing it for a brunch later in the week because I loved it so much. It felt so good on!
Easy. Elastic. Comfortable
Beautiful layered dress that compliments any body. Made me look effortlessly put together

links_reviews_title: was ok just so many layers it felt a looked a little bulky
links_reviews_text: Really beautiful just not my favorite on me

links_reviews_title: This was a great dress! Very comfortable and true to size.
links_reviews_text: There was a slight tear in the hemline, but it was not noticeable

Great for short girls, as I could wear this without a heel! Definitely doesn't do much for your shape, but still a fun wear! I sized down to an xs, and glad I did. There's no zipper or anything, so easy to slide on!
easy to wear, looked great

links_reviews_title: Was wondering why I was getting so many looks
links_reviews_text: I love this company and I loved this dress until I realized it is completely sheer!! I would recommend it as long as you have the proper undergarments!!
Fabric is light and airy, perfect for a summer wedding
Perfect fit for 8 to 10
Love that it is so cozy yet elegant. I didn't need to wear heels with it, was just above my ankles. I am 5'3".
Overall, this was a nice dress. It was comfortable and fit true to size. It just wasn't something I was particularly interested in wearing again.

This dress was cute, easy to wear and dress up/down. The material has some stretch underneath the ruffles so it hides and bumps, etc. I wore it few times as it felt just right and wish I could keep it!
Super cute dress, I have larger breasts, so i was worried how this might look. Definitely needed a bra, I wore a bandeau and it looked great! Received many compliments, would def rent again.
Ruffles made me look "fluffier" so I did not end up wearing this item. It fits well and the pattern is nice but the fit is unflattering.

links_reviews_title: The dress moves as you walk and its lovely
links_reviews_text: Fits well! I thought it was flattering and I loved the movement of the tiers
loads of compliments

links_reviews_title: The dress is big and flowy and comfortable.
links_reviews_text: The dress runs a bit big, but it's okay because it's cut really well. I didn't realize there were side cutouts, but I liked this feature. It's impossible for me to not wear a bra, but I didn't feel uncomfortable with the back slip. I got a ton of compliments.
It was alright. Very pretty but wouldn't rent again.

I picked this up in-store. Usually 6-10 in RTR but size 2 fit perfectly. Great lightweight fabric for summer heatwave. Split in back and side cutouts. Still in good condition despite being on RTR for a couple of summers now. Prefer this same design in the brown/gold stripe version.

Very big, ordered 2 sizes down and still swimming. Wanted to like it because of the pattern but too shapeless. Also! There is a cut out at the back and right under breasts to the side, which makes it inappropriate (for work at least) without an undershirt.

links_reviews_title: Perfect for when you want to look like you gained 100 pounds.
links_reviews_text: Possibly worst I've ever rented. Print looks cheap. Back slits show back at top of hips --why??? My husband laughed out loud, could not stop himself.
I went down two sizes and it wasn't enough. The dress is pretty, but even being 20 weeks pregnant it felt really big.

This flowy kimono style dress's pattern and colors are great! The size however is huge. I sized down 1 size but I could have definitely went down another size for sure. I ended up threading a belt through the cut outs in the back to make the front look a little more tailored and less mumu. Super comfy and would be great for travel, just size down!

OK, this thing is huge, but I am all about it. I'm usually 10/12 and definitely could have gone to an 8 (a size I haven't actually worn this decade). From the front, the dress is very glam sack, but as I tried to demonstrate in this awkwardly positioned photo, there's actually some form in the back. Be warned that the back/side cutouts are big but easily made work appropriate by wearing a dark cami underneath (and the sleeves cover a lot too when you hold your arms down). Fabric is beautiful and flows, lightweight and very comfortable. I'd definitely rent this again for vacation, and maybe for work in a size down.

While I would never believe this is $1295 retail, I wasn't altogether disappointed. I have yet to wear it, but think it will be cute with tights and heels. It's huge, and I think it's meant to be oversized, but, whoa. Despite how large it is, you can see from the photo that it hangs quite nicely and even somehow manages to accentuate my waist. I do actually think I'd rent again, but in a smaller size.

links_reviews_title: Unique, pretty dress - suggest reading reviews for sizing
links_reviews_text: Based on other reviews I sized down to a 0 (normally 6) and it fit well, although the style is still loose. I belted it and wore a navy tank under due to the cutouts. I took a risk ordering and ended up liking it more than I expected. The pattern is pretty and the dress is unique. I received a lot of compliments.

links_reviews_title: Airy and cool for third trimester
links_reviews_text: Looked good and with no wardrobe malfunctions at 33 weeks. Very comfortable and print was fun and flattering.
Lovely dress. Beautiful print. Super comfortable. BUT the cape sort of back with the cut outs makes it tricky to sort out what type of bra to wear

This dress was so comfortable from the second I put it on! It is one of my favorite dresses ever! The fabric is light, but not too light. I did wear to work, so I threw a black tank under it because the back is open and the sides as well. It also has pockets! Love this dress sooo much!

Dress runs a bit large and the fit is loose and comfortable. Has to wear a camisole underneath for work because of the cutouts in the back. Very flattering, received lots of compliments, would definitely rent again!

I love when style and comfort meet. Wore this dress on a busy summer Friday, from a business breakfast to happy hour. I wore a nude cami underneath since the back and sides were open. Super flowy, so definitely size down if you are concerned with shape. I appreciated the beautiful print and low pressure vibe. Paired with a chunky heeled strappy sandal; tons of compliments. Would rent again!
Super comfy! And I got tons of compliments. I didn't realize there was a slit in the back and peek-a-boo cutouts on the side.

links_reviews_title: Kimono type dress is super comfy!
links_reviews_text: Tons of compliments all day when I work this to work! It is by far one of the more comfortable pieces I've rented. Runs large. I was comfortable in the size I got but definitely could have gone down a size. Kimono sleeves. I sure a tight fitting Cami underneath.

This dress was one of my favorite rentals yet. The material is silky but not clingy and was perfectly breezy for a hot day. I wore it to work work with slides (seen in photo) and then changed into slingback heels for a birthday party that night. Just a quick word: there are cutouts in the mid back and at the back/sides of the waist. I loved them, but I work in a creative office where dress code isn't really an issue.

Really liked wearing this dress. It's different and has a pretty pattern. It's big and loose, which I think it's supposed to be, but I felt like I was wearing a robe at times. This was any second time renting this item - the first time I wore to work with a black shirt underneath to cover the cut outs and I think that works for this dress, though it's cuter without something underneath.

this dress is fabulous! i got it for everyday use, but i would absolutely wear it to somewhere glam. the fabric is luxe, and the print and colors are beautiful. there are also pockets (who doesn't love pockets on their dress?). note that there are two cutouts on the back, which are not apparent unless you raise your arm, and a slit down the back, which would expose your bra if it were windy: the dress has lots of loose material so these body-exposing details are not obvious, which is kind of nice, kind of a surprise, kind of renter beware. also, it is rather low cut in the front, and because the dress is loose-fitting and silky and therefore moves around, at one point, i noticed the front had mysteriously shifted over and down to expose part of my bra cup. oops. BUT, even before and after that, the dress got lots of attention! it is easy and beautiful, and i would totally rent again (possibly purchase if the discount were deeper!). i wore it with copper-colored flat sandals.

I thought this dress would be cute and boho chic, but it was not. Length hit just below my knee, which is not flattering. The pleat on the front of the dress made me feel like my belly was sticking out, the sleeves were oddly shaped, and the cut-out parts on the back were strange. If it weren't for these cutouts, I think I could have worn a belt for a better fit, but with the cutouts, the back of the dress poked out around the belt. The only positive thing about this dress was that it was comfy. I felt like I spent the day in a housedress.

This dress is a great combination of super elegant and super easy - the unusual draped back and the length make it dressy and yet I would be more than happy to wear it lying around on the sofa. In the end, I only gave it four stars because I'm personally not that big a fan of the print and colors, but that's the only reason. The fabric is quite thin and the back is open (a long slit from neck to waist as well as cutouts at the sides of the back) so it's definitely better for warmer seasons. I wore it with tights and heeled booties to make it work since it's unseasonably cold but it would be nicer when it's warmer. In terms of fit, it's draped and not fitted, but it does nip in loosely at the waist and in my opinion the thin fabric drapes nicely to give a sense of the shape of the body without swallowing you up. If you are short this may be trickier (the length was to the bottom of my knee) but if you are comfortable with this kind of silhouette generally, it's a flattering oversized shape. It would be safe to size down rather than up if you are between sizes as even at the waist it's not really tight.

I really loved the cut and fit of this dress. I did wear a tank top underneath because it was too low cut in front and open in the back. The fabric is very light so this is a better warm weather piece.

links_reviews_title: Super flowy (almost mumu esque) with oddly placed cutouts
links_reviews_text: If you're not trying to suck it in, man is this your dress. I opted for the smaller size I normally get, and it was still huge. Also there are cutouts basically along your back side, and my bra was very obviously showing. So if you plan to wear to work make sure to wear a shirt underneath. It was also fairly low in the front. I did like the pattern though!
Such a beautiful dress! The hubz LOVED it!

links_reviews_title: Super comfy and cute, but not figure flattering. Great for wearing around the city in day time.
links_reviews_text: fit was large, but comfortable. back has cut outs and is open so not for office. great for day time in city or even a coverup.

Super lovely fabric and it is an interesting design, but it is enormous, as stated. I ordered two sizes down and it feels like i could have ordered four sizes down. But... what is this dress actually supposed to look like on? The gaping in the back around the waistline was unworkable.

Got this as a maternity option. Yes you can totally wear this as a maternity dress but you will look very big in it. This also has open are holes to the back that I must have missed in the pictures so I couldn't wear it to work without a tank underneath it.

I wore this 8 months pregnant and sized up from my pre-pregnancy size, although I might not have needed to. Definitely runs big. Super comfortable and work-appropriate length. The back detail gives the dress a cute shape, despite being a baggier style dress and not so overwhelming with fabric. I did wear a cami underneath when I wore it to work, but did not when I wore it to dinner on the weekend.

LOVE this dress and have worn it multiple times. The fabric is lightweight and perfect for warmer weather. The little cutouts on the sides are an interesting feature. The kimono style is so comfortable - and...it has pockets! One of my favorite rentals this season.
This ran really big and had weird cut outs on the side - couldn't wear to work. I ordered a 4 (normally wear 6) and could have easily gone down a size or two. Didn't wear and returned the same day.

links_reviews_title: Cut outs on side and in back.
links_reviews_text: Wore a tank top and it worked

I rented this for a casual birthday dinner and absolutely loved it. I am 5'3'' and while it was oversized, I believe it fit true to size based on the style (I was expecting to be swimming in it and wanted to be swimming it!). The material is light and flowy, and the pattern is beautiful. I thought the cutouts made it special and were perfectly placed - they showed sexy hints of my back and sides when I lifted my arms, but weren't over the top. I discovered the Tome brand through RTR and I am thoroughly obsessed.

I absolutely love this dress! I wore it for running errands and out to dinner a few times. It's easy to wear in the heat and simple to dress up or down. The cut-outs in back added something special IMO and I just wore a cute bra and went with it.

Like everyone said, this dress runs SO LARGE. I am always a 10 and the 8 was baggy. Also, the images don't do a great job showing the slits in the back. There's a vertical slit down the center (normal) and then two horizontal slits where the top of the dress meets the skirt. I wore a cami so it didn't bother me at work, but it was odd. The pattern was gorgeous and the dress was comfy.

Completely bizarre. Armpit holes?! Also, the back is open. Without a belt it made me look truly obese. My boyfriend said he can't get the image out of his head. It was laughable. If you're daring and willing to give it a shot, order AT LEAST two sizes down. Or, if you want a $1,300 housedress, it's super comfortable.

links_reviews_title: wearing it right now, even it feels a bit to large.
links_reviews_text: should have rented size 2, but, is actually ok, easy to wear, goes well with black high heels :)

This dress fit very large! I probably could've worn at least one to two sizes smaller. Very comfortable and perfect for summer with its light weight materials. Dress needs a slip underneath so it's not see through, but it didn't come with a slip.
I didn't realize it has large cutouts on the sides. It's cute in the front but hangs incredibly weird behind. It's too bad because it has some promise but just doesn't deliver

I rented this dress for work. There are weird slits in the back that exposes the sides of my body. I did not feel comfortable to wear it to work. It does run large. I norally wear a size 10 and ordered an 8 and it was still too big. Would look better if paired with a cute belt because it is boxy.
Loved this dress so much! You can tell it's a high quality, expensive dress. The detail is so beautiful. I received tons of compliments.
I received SO many compliments on this dress. It is beautifully made, and very unique. I felt comfortable the whole time. Was a little short when sitting - but wasn't inappropriate or uncomfortable.
Perfect dress for wedding rehearsal! The details of the lace and the unique cut make this dress a stunner.
This dress is a showstopper, although not the most comfortable. Recommend for date night!

links_reviews_title: Wearing white after Labor Day. Touch√©? No way!
links_reviews_text: I just loved the uniqueness of this dress and waited to wear it on a date in Scottsdale in September (after Labor Day). I should have gotten an XS but the S still worked. I would absolutely rent this again for another date night or party!

Wore this dress for engagement pics, detailing is perfect. Back is beautiful. Inner layer is really short though, and dress starts to climb to the front which makes it a weird fit. Wish it was all one length with lower inner layer. Could see a lot of leg
Fit like a glove.

links_reviews_title: Quality and comfort. The details set this dress apart
links_reviews_text: Wore this to a wedding rehearsal dinner in Hawaii. Tons of compliments! It was comfortable but also flattering. Can't stand not wearing a bra. I couldn't wear a normal or strapless bra with this. Instead I wore nipple covers and the tape that pulls you up. It wasn't tight enough on its own to be supportive for me. I strongly recommend this dress.

I love this dress its super cute and girly while still looking sophisticated and classy! It looked absolutely gorgeous and you definitely will not look like everyone else, which is a huge plus! The only issue I have is that the zipper is pretty obviously poor quality and hard to zip up/gets stuck easily.

links_reviews_title: Wore this for my rehearsal dinner, and it fit really well and was such a fun design
links_reviews_text: I ended up wearing the large, i felt like it ran a little on the smaller size
Great fit! Beautiful dress!!!
I wore this for my reception/after party dress! Gorgeous!!!! So many compliments! 6/15/18
I wore it for my Birthday Brunch. I got a lot of compliments on it. This is such a beautiful girly girl dress.

This dress was loose in the waist. I went with the Large as I'm currently a size 8. A little room in the waist normally doesn't matter, but this is thicker fabric with multiple layers so we don't want too much more padding. One downside was the nude lining is very short and I had to pull it down a bit. The hook and eye was broken on mine I think because there was no eye on the top strap. A lovely dress indeed, wear it!
Felt so beautiful!

links_reviews_title: I got so many compliments on this dress!!! I love it so much I want to keep it
links_reviews_text: Fit perfect. Prettier in person!!
Looked not so great on me. Hips and waist were baggy but bust fit perfectly. Made me look like a LEGO block. Just no.
Loved this fun Alexis lace dress for my rehearsal dinner. It was comfortable, flattering and true to size. Highly recommend!
Very cute dress. I love the back and the detailing is gorgeous! Very comfortable!
Fits perfect.

links_reviews_title: Perfect dress to celebrate my 34th b day!
links_reviews_text: Absolutely loved this dress and recommend it to everyone!

I went to a RTR store near my house and tried on a similar dress by the same designer. I fit in the medium and ended up ordering the M and a L for backup. The medium was a perfect fit! This dress was so stunning in real life! I received so many compliments! I wore it for my tea party/garden themed bridal shower. It was an unforgettable dress!!

links_reviews_title: Mother daughter tea and his dress was perfect!
links_reviews_text: Gorgeous fabric and texture! Fits where it is presentable but still sassy! Does feel short where it lands but is fine because of the lace adornment. I received so many compliments! I would absolutely rent again.
This dress is short but amazing!! I loved the thick fabric and details. The back is stunning!

I get so beautiful in this dress. Received so many compliments! I was worried about the helpline being too short but honestly it wasn't too bad! I was comfortable in it all night. Highly recommend it. Great quality, sturdy dress.

I rented this dress for a baby shower I hosted. I absolutely loved it and it turned out to be the perfect dress for the ocassion. Everyone loved the dress and I received so many compliments about it! He fabric is super high-end and it makes you feel like a million bucks. I'm a fan of tight-fitting dresses and this one was a but lose around the waist so I wish they has an XXS size HOWEVER, I would've rented it again and again.
Worn for husband dinner, beautiful lace and shape is feminine look so classy but open back and its sexy too

links_reviews_title: I was going to a white party, with a Mexican theme. This dress fit the bill perfectly.
links_reviews_text: I'm 5'5" and 130lbs. I usually wear a medium or a small. The medium fit but I preferred the tighter fit of the small. This dress is completely open on the back so I wore it without a bra. It was comfortable and beautiful and I loved wearing it. The ruffles are plentiful and beautiful. I was worried it might be a little "much" but in person, it's just gorgeous. I highly recommend this darling, pretty dress!

links_reviews_title: Beautiful dress! I didn't want to take it off - fit like a glove.
links_reviews_text: This dress is awesome! Beautiful details and the back is so fun. The top closure around the neck is a little tight but it did not bother me. I wore it with cowboy boots for a theme event but it looks great with nude heels. (The comments on this dress were insane!) I am 5'7", 109lbs, 34C. I highly recommend this one!
I had seen other people wearing this dress and liked it on them. I didn't end up wearing it because the fit was off.

Beautiful dress! No bra needed. I'm short (5'2") so see through lace bottom of dress was fine but could be something to watch on someone taller. From Valet to hostess to everyone in bathroom of restaurant...endless compliments on this dress! Rent it!

The dress is beautiful but does run small. I chose to stick with wearing the medium instead of the small because I wanted the emphasis on my waist. This dress fits in all the right places and compliments my shape. The zipper is poorly made and was hard to zip up whether the dress was on or off. I just loved this dress.

This dress is absolutely gorgeous, and was the perfect dress for my bridal shower. I was skeptical at first because I was worried about not wearing a bra (34C) but the fit is so nice I didn't even notice it. The material is super high quality, and not one stitch was out of place. RTR hit the nail on the head with this one, most compliments I've ever received! So so gorgeous. If you're in the fence, just do it and trust me! So happy I did. I felt absolutely beautiful!

This dress is fabulous! I wore this for my bridal shower and received tons of compliments from both friends and strangers! I usually wear a M but rented this dress in a L as it was the only size available at the RTR store. I believe this dress runs small as the sheer piece under the dress is not very long at all in the back and barely covered my booty. The dress however extends past the sheer portion so you won't feel self conscious!
Normally I'm a small but it was slightly too tight and I wanted to be comfortable . Great detail and color!
This dress is a show stopper. It is however. Very very. Very short. But beautiful

links_reviews_title: Not the best fit for my body type
links_reviews_text: Gorgeous dress, great quality but the cut is not great for me. Made me look like I had no curves or waistline. Made me look heavier on the top which I don't need since I'm a 32 DDD. Had to go up to a medium because the small was too short and because it has no give, my bust didn't fit. Medium did fit but it really did not do anything for me :(
Adorable!! Small on top and more true to size below, but ruffles work it all out beautifully. A million compliments from strangers on the street.
Size was as expected.

I wore this dress to my bridal shower, which was held at a winery. I felt amazing and I got compliments all day long! Everyone was asking for name of the designer. The fabric on this dress is amazing. It's the perfect mix of styles. Classy, a bit sexy (the back) and just simply stunning. Brides, rent this one!!
True to size , fit very well . Length isn't too short or too long , got compliments from different age group too .
Fun, holiday dress. Wore it to a dinner party and my company holiday party. Very flattering and fitted. I love the sleeves!

links_reviews_title: Such a classy and stylish dress
links_reviews_text: Vibrant color, flattering fit. I have a troublesome middle and you would never know it with this dress. It's classy yet fun and flirty.
Loved this dress! Runs a little small- sized up and it was perfect. Very flattering for petite figures!
Perfect fit. All the compliments.
I received so many compliments on this dress! It was too cute to only wear once so I ended up wearing it to work one day

Rented this for a fall wedding and truly had so many people tell me how good I looked ;) I am generally right on the border between a 4/6 in most brands and I'm glad I sized up as this dress is pretty fitted throughout. Short enough to be sassy but long enough to wear to a church wedding. Loved this dress!

I will say that I am between sizes but the top of the dress runs small imo. I'm maybe a full C or D and the top of a size 4 was too snug. I didn't wear this dress bc I wanted to be able to dance and I wouldn't have been able to do that in this dress. The length was great and the color is just as pictured. If I would have gotten a size 6 I might have had my desired range of motion.
Got so many compliments on this dress. Perfect for the occasion. Perfect fit.

links_reviews_title: The color and style of the dress!
links_reviews_text: Loved the neck and sleeves on this dress. Rented for parents weekend event. Loved the color!! However, the shoulder area was a bit large. I would size down next time.

Cons, you need a second hand to help zip it up and latch the collar around the neck. Other then that all pros. Lots of compliments on trending style and color. Not too short, very classy dress. Fits like a glove.
Fit beautifully, form fitting, but not too tight and a great pop of color!

links_reviews_title: The color is stunning! The flare is so much fun!
links_reviews_text: Very very comfortable. Great length. Not too short. Moves with you. Thick material but stretchy. I'm usually a 2/4 and I wore the 2. It was form fitting but not tight at all. Loved it and received compliments all night long!
True to size, good length for shorter girls, thicker material

Could work for a cocktail party or an event where you need to look more professional. I wore it for a conference banquet, but also almost wore it to a college cocktail party. Seriously loved the dress and almost bought it!! Wore a regular bra. Perfect, appropriate length for tall girls. Paired with dangly gold tassel earrings and nude block heel.
Cuter than the photo. Great shape. Flatters hourglass. Quality is just so so‚Ä¶ Fairly flimsy. But nobody will notice but the wearer! Very likely will rent again.

links_reviews_title: So many compliments! Love this dress!
links_reviews_text: Super cute fit! Great for a dress needed February in Colorado. I loved everything about this dress. Super 70s vibe. Loved.

links_reviews_title: Great dress, loved the bright red!
links_reviews_text: This dress was the perfect length, I definitely didn't feel it was too short or too long (I'm 5'6"), and the red color is on point. The sleeves and high neck was perfect for the fashion show I wore it to. I ended up going with the 6, instead of the 8, as the 8 definitely was a little baggy and made me feel more frumpy, but I guess that could be how you like your dresses fitted. I personally like them a little more fitted. This dress was awesome!

I really loved this dress. It was super cute and fit really well. I sized up based on reviews and that was accurate. I got many compliments on it and it was pretty comfortable to wear all night! I would recommend I am 5'5'' and 150 lbs. Fairly athletic build and the 10 fit well. I usually wear 6-8 in pants/dresses!
This dress was perfect! I received so many compliments all night. Nice thick stretchy fabric which was very comfortable and perfect for dancing! Would buy this one if I could!

links_reviews_title: Perfect dress for a date night!
links_reviews_text: Got the dress for a valentines dinner. The dress fit perfectly! Got a size 2 and 4 because I wear either depending on the dress. Ended up wearing the size 4. Perfect date night dress. This was my first time using rent the runway and I will do it all the time now. They made everything so easy!
I didn't love the fit of this, the material was very stiff and not comfortable to move around in. I did like the length and color.
Loved the fit of this dress! Compliments all night. Very classy yet still sexy. Highly recommend.
A bit short! but i'm very tall 5'8. Material was stretchy so it fit well! :)
A little large and a little long but overall great!

links_reviews_title: So many compliments on the color, cut, and sleeves!
links_reviews_text: Fits true to size. Classic cut with a fun twist from the color and sleeves
Loved this dress! Was perfect for a formal holiday date night. Runs TTS
