Great dress for holiday work party. Cocktail attire. Lots of compliments!
The sleeves were so fun! It was fitted but not too tight at all or too short. I am 5.2 and 110. The size was perfect.
This is a simple and classy dress. The color is what makes it stand out. The fabric has stretch and the sleeves are belled. I wore it for a speaking engagement. Everyone loved it.

links_reviews_title: No one had a dress like it:)
links_reviews_text: Super comfortable and made well. Lots of compliments on it:)

links_reviews_title: Dress was delivered three days earlier than expected!
links_reviews_text: The dress fit amazing and got so many compliments! Only negative was that I wasn't able to get down on the dance floor not much dancing room.
The dress fit great, it was a little tight in the chest area and arms (that's normal for New when sleeves are invovled!). Overall it was a great dress!
Dress was very comfortable and stunning on! Lots of compliments. It was the perfect holiday dress!

links_reviews_title: Simple dress perfect for date night.
links_reviews_text: Simple but perfect for date night. The cute bell sleeves and high neck make the mini length not seem trashy. The color is beautiful and really stands out. Runs a bit big so size down.
Loved wearing this dress. The red was perfect and the bell sleeves are fun just a little hard to eat dinner with. The shoulders are a little big.

Dress color was amazing! Size ran a little small, so size up. Also had to wear a shaper underneath as the fabric showed all imperfections, bra lines, etc. Nonetheless, dress was beautiful. Many compliments.
I felt like a stuffed sausage - this grabbed on to every lump, bump and line. Color is more of an orangey red than what I got from the photos

links_reviews_title: It was my favorite RTR dress yet!
links_reviews_text: Fit perfectly, and the dress was in perfect condition! I loved it!! #Homecoming

links_reviews_title: I hit a casino jackpot in this hot red dress so I think it gave me luck! :-)
links_reviews_text: I ordered a 10 first. But it was very tight across the bust. Then I ordered the 12. It was slightly big in shoulders but I had to go with that. I wore this to New Orleans for my anniversary dinner with my husband. Fabulous color! Great dress! I was very pleased.

I rented this for a cherry blossom maternity photo shoot and received several compliments on how beautiful the print was from passers by. It's comfortable, forgiving, and easy to wear. I gave this one 4 stars instead of 5 because I found that the off the shoulder fabric and overhang combined with my pregnant belly made my middle look larger and heavier than it actually is.

Rented for our spring family photos. Absolutely love this dress, the style and coloring of it! The fit of the L was great. I'm 5'3" so it was slightly long with flat sandals on but not bad. Our pictures came out great so it was definitely a successful rental. I'd recommend for any spring event where you need a nice dress but not to be formal.

Wore this for my bachelorette wine tasting. Was very light & airy, comfortable, with a fun pattern. Wore the XLR, but should have probably sized down to the LR. It still fit fine, just had to adjust my shoulders a little more frequently. Length was great too, wore with sandals. Overall, really happy with this rental!
Gorgeous colors, nice flowy fit. I'm usually a 4/6 and the medium fits great. I could have probably also gone with a small. Can't wait to wear this to my cousins wedding!
At 22 weeks this dress was very accommodating and comfortable. Wore to an outdoor wedding and had lots of room and wasn't too hot. Would definitely rent again.
Used this dress for my engagement shoot. It worked great for most of the pictures, but because it fits a little big, it could look baggy from some angles. Overall I really liked it!
I wore this to a bridal shower and it was absolutely perfect! Comfortable and fit well, plus looked great. Wasn't too fancy or too casual. Would definitely rent again!

I got this dress for a trip to Napa and it was perfect! So many compliments and it's a silky material, I'm 5'7 so maxis are usually short on me but this one was longer I was pleasantly surprised! The slit in it is very flattering as well and makes it more sexy.

I loved this dress! So comfy. It was effect for the barn wedding I attended, put on a shawl and a pair of 3" wedges and I was good to go! It can work as a maternity dress too- I rented the navy version when I was 5 months pregnant. It is on the long side so need to be worn with heels.

Wore this to a wedding. Very comfortable. Has a shoulder and waist elastic band that's stretchy. No need to wear a bra thankfully cause it's so flowy. I'm on the shorter size so it was a bit too long even wearing heels. Wish there was a petite version.

This fit great and was gorgeous in person! I ended up not wearing it because it was a little more formal than the event required. Very comfortable, go a little smaller for a more form fitting flattering fit.

The fabric of this dress is soft and pretty and would be very comfortable. I'm not sure why RTR said this was a third trimester dress as I'm 36 weeks in this picture. The seams on the side didn't hit right since my belly didn't allow the dress to fall to my hips the way it was meant to. The slit in the side then goes pretty high for the same reason. I'm sure this would have been very cute in the second trimester but I would avoid after that!
Rented this gorgeous maxi for an outdoor wedding and it was PERFECT! It's a silky material so perfect to help with the heat, especially at 32 weeks pregnant! Loved this dress so much!

links_reviews_title: Wore this for an engagement party
links_reviews_text: Lots of compliments! Very comfortable and flowy. More flattering than expected
Loved this dress and got so many compliments on it- it was light and airy and perfect for a summer wedding. It's definitely long so you'll need to wear a healed shoe
Beautiful colors, I didn't like the top frills as much but better with a belt, wore for a baby shower and was great
Wore this dress to a family dinner and it was so perfect! I may even buy this one!!

This dress was perfect for a summer wedding, took off one star as the dress was a little long and I kept stepping on it! I'm 5'9" , so I tend to wear flats, but if I had worn a heel it may have been fine.

Beautiful dress. I'm probably a 4 in most dresses and wore the XS. I'm a curvy petite woman. The small fit, but the XS showed more of my figure. I will say the dress is super long. I had a hard time walking up stairs and once I took of my heels I kept stepping on the dress. So 5'4 and under order petite. It definitely is pretty and photographs well!
I received so many compliments and felt so beautiful in this dress! Would definitely rent again. True to size. I was worried I would be bothered by the elastic off the shoulders but not bad at all.

I loved this dress. The pattern is more beautiful in person as are the colors. It is silk which I wasn't expecting from the photos but which made it feel more luxe. And the sleeves stay down well. Loved it

Loved this dress! Super comfortable and true to size. Easy to dance in all night. I wore it to an outside beach wedding. Can't say it was 'breathable." However, It was super hot outside so I think I would've been sweating in anything I was wearing!

The dress is so pretty in person. I usually wear an XS but sized up for being 31 weeks pregnant at the time. It fit perfectly. The length was great for me with heels on. My only complaint is that it arrived super wrinkly and had a stain on the top. The stain was hidden by the way the dress sat and I was able to steam the wrinkles out so no big deal. But the dress does wrinkle very easily.

I rented this as a backup dress, and I'm so glad I did! Definitely size up if you are in your third trimester, but the fabric was nice and light without being see-through and there was plenty of space for my growing bump while still showing enough of my figure I didn't feel like I was wearing a tent (like most maternity dresses). Only down-side is the dress wrinkled pretty quickly while sitting, but they came right out with a little wrinkle-release spray from my purse.
The fabric is not exactly luxurious but it looks beautiful and was comfortable for my 7 months baby bump. I could have worn the small but chose the medium for a little extra room.

links_reviews_title: I received so many compliments on this dress!
links_reviews_text: I loved the color and the fit of this dress. The material was great for a hot day and was comfortable all day. The dress did a great job staying off the shoulder and didn't ride up hardly at all. This dress flowed really nice and I would highly recommend.
Wore this dress to a wedding and loved it! It fits great and is very forgiving but I wouldn't say it runs large. The material is so soft and the print is beautiful. I got tons of compliments on it!

Wore this to an outdoor semi-formal wedding. Flowy, beautiful, and just gorgeous. I'm 5'8, 130lbs and the extra small was great with flats. It also leaves a little extra room for food and drinks, which is always a plus! I would definitely rent this again.

I rented the LR and MR. I tried the Large on and a friend of mine suggested I try the Medium on and I'm glad she did! It fit so much better! I was apprehensive because the M said 4-6 and I'm an 8 but it was great! So comfy, lightweight and I got a ton of compliments at the bridal shower. I would 100% rent this again!

Loved this dress. I got so many compliments. It is however polyester, so it is not breathable. It is perfect for the early spring wedding but I would not rent this for a summer wedding. I also had to bring my steamer with me because the dress was wrinkled when received. It wrinkled fairly easy. Overall I would rent this again because I felt comfortable being pregnant and I felt beautiful in it.

This dress is beautiful, I didn't want to send it back! It's so light and airy. I rented it for family pictures but would be great for an outdoor or beach wedding. I'm 5'8" and I wore heels and the length was perfect. The elastic around the chest stayed in place. It's slightly see through if the sun catches it just right so I would recommend wearing a slip underneath. I found it to be true to size. Lovely, lovely dress!

This is a beautiful and high quality dress. The silk material is very nice and the print is gorgeous! The only drawback was that the bottom of the dress fell straight down from the largest part of my belly, making me look huge unless I had a hand under my stomach to provide definition. I decided this was okay for a maternity photo shoot (see picture) but didn't want to have to worry about this during my shower, so I went with a different dress from the shower. Overall happy with the dress but I might recommend it more a photo shoot or earlier in pregnancy (1st or 2nd trimester).

links_reviews_title: I loved this dress! It fit perfectly and I received so many compliments!
links_reviews_text: The fit was true to size. I'm 5'4" and wore a MR with 3 1/2 inch heels... it hit just above the ground so the length was perfect.
Wish I had somehwere else to where this. Was a smidge too long but made it work with wedges. Loved it!
It's a pretty dress and I probably would have worn it if it wasn't so long in me. Even tried wearing tall heels with it and it was still too long. For reference I am 5'3"

Every time I wore this dress strangers stopped me to remark on how beautiful I looked (!!). It definitely has an elevated feel to it, like when you walk in with this party has start-ed. Overall very flowy and flattering fit.

links_reviews_title: Very comfortable and flattering at almost 27 weeks pregnant!
links_reviews_text: I got a lot of compliments...fit great and loved the color and the floral pattern! Very comfortable especially at almost 27 weeks pregnant!
This dress was so soft and comfortable. It was actually long enough for me and fit perfectly.
Beautiful dress, but it was way too big and long on me. I'm size XS and ordered XS, it felt it was a small or median.

links_reviews_title: Beautiful dress could be worn for date or shower. Off the shoulder gives it a more dressier feel.
links_reviews_text: Very Comfy!

The fit was perfect from the waist down. I'm a 34 F in cup size so there was no amount of tape to keep the twins in with this plunge. Wish there was a size 8 available for possibly a better fit but this dress is so popular you need to order at least 3 months in advance. Such an absolute beauty though!
Love love love. I'm trying to figure out how to not send this rental back because I want to live in this dress. Great for the small chested!

links_reviews_title: The dress to set you apart
links_reviews_text: Got so many compliments on this dress all night. I usually wear a true size 8 but really glad I upped my size to a 10. Snug in the waist but fit perfect everywhere else. I also suggest buying dress tape to help keep your chest in when dancing!

This dress is stunning! The embroidery was done so beautifully, and the colors of the design popped on the navy. The material was thick and felt rich. There was no worry of gaping around the low neckline, since the top was made to be tight. I needed someone to zip up the top as the material made it difficult to raise my arms to zip the top myself. A lot of fashion tape was needed to hold everything in place so that I didn't look completely flat-chested.
This dress was made for a tall person. While you need to be comfortable showing skin, I found the sizing to be accurate and I loved how it looked on me. Amazing material!
Beautiful dress for a rustic wedding! Definitely size up if you are curvier on the bottom, the dress has no give

I wore this dress to a grad school formal. I originally ordered this in a size 2 and an 8 (there were limited sizes available the weekend I wanted to rent the dress). I am 5'7", 130 lb with a 26" waist and normally wear a size 2-4, so I was hoping the 2 would fit. The 2 was very tight and was very short, so I opted for my backup 8. The 8 was definitely a little too large (especially in the shoulders), but it was the better option. I have a small chest (34 A) and I felt comfortable with the deep V with a little fashion tape. Not sure if I would have felt that way if I was a little bustier. Overall, loved the dress and it was so unique. I got a lot of complements and comments on how pretty the pattern/colors were. Definitely would recommend for a formal or winter wedding!

links_reviews_title: Perfect for Vegas for a night out!
links_reviews_text: I rented a 2 and 4 of this beautiful dress! The 2 fit like a glove, however was a little too tight in my shoulders and upper arms, and I wanted to be able to play craps and dance the night away! The 4 fit very well, but having a smaller chest I was about it looking and feeling too loose. I used a little fashion tape to ensure the girls didn't pop out or if bending over people couldn't see in. I was able to throw dice, dance, and be comfortable all night long!
Really low cut so be careful, but it stayed in place, I wasn‚Äôt afraid anything was going to pop out. 145lb 36C
This dress is getting a bit worn. Cleavage will not work due to lining. And watch out super wide and low cut chest. A small cami is a must.

links_reviews_title: The dress runs extremely small. I suggest sizing up or avoiding if your bust is larger than 34.
links_reviews_text: The dress is absolutely beautiful. I measured the bust area on the size 12 laying flat pit to pit and it measures 16 1/2 inches which is a 33 inch bust. The waist on the size 12 was 30 inches. The size 10 is a 1/2 inch smaller. Reviews mentioned small sleeves but I had no issues with 14 inch sleeve width. I suggest you have TWO dress choices ready. They allow you to request two sizes on each dress but they don‚Äôt mention that additional back up dress until ordering. So if your not ready with that second choice at time of ordering you will end up paying shipping charges for that free second choice if your not happy with first choice.
I received complements all night long! The dress fit like a glove and I was sad that I had to return it! I have a small chest so I did not worry about any accidental flashes.

links_reviews_title: absolutely loved this dress for my birthday.
links_reviews_text: fit pretty true to size. I wore the 2 verses the 4 because the top part on the 4 ran a little big and wouldn't stay in place.

links_reviews_title: I received a lot of compliments on the dress!
links_reviews_text: I was sent a 6 ( my normal size) and an 8. The 6 was too small and the 8 fit like a glove. I am not use to such an extreme neckline. That took a bit for me to feel confident.

links_reviews_title: Beautiful dress, but didn't really lay well
links_reviews_text: I'm all about taking fashion risks, and if you choose this dress you'll def get some head turns! My favorite part was the color and fabric. So beautiful and perfect for fall/winter. The plunge is DEEP I mean like shows your stomach deep. You have to use boob tape 100%, which was challenging especially because the neckline showed allot of the shoulder as well. The most frustrating part was the edge of the fabric on the plunge part of the dress. It wouldn't lay right! The hem kept turning out. I tried to use fashion to keep it down but it didn't work. Although I had the confidence to rock the dress, I constantly felt self conscience and aware that it just wouldn't lay right and I kept fixing it all night. I'd also suggest getting a spray tan for this one too.
Loved wearing this beautiful dress. A million compliments!

This dress is beautiful but all the reviews are spot on - you need heavy artillery to manage the deep V cut. I'm 34DD and bought Gaffer Tape, Scotch Double stick tape and had to YouTube how to tape the ladies up and back. Once taped I had no concerns about falling out but you have to feel super confident in yourself with such a revealing front. The sleeves (and tape) made it impossible to lift my arms above my head. Photos don't capture the beautiful fabric - I received many compliments throughout the night.

I got so many compliments all night long. Such an amazing dress. But size up. I am usually a 4-6 and the 8 was pretty snug. This dress worked perfect for A Midsummer Night's Dream themed gala. Definitely recommend!

I'm so happy I sized up. I'm normally a 00, but this 2 fit like a glove. I had to be careful still though because the front is very wide and the shoulders are very tight. The dress itself is comfortable and gorgeous. I love the sheen and embroidery.

links_reviews_title: Even your grandmother loves this dress.
links_reviews_text: Fit to size, but I have no butt/hips/slim arms/minimal boobage. If you need any extra room at all in any of these places, there is ZERO give in this dress. I def needed a little "encouragement" from the BF to get into the 2, but once in, I think it fit perfectly as intended. I could eat, drink AND breathe all night. Sized up definitely would have looked sloppy. Order your 'reach' size and your 'safety' size. Definitely make sure you have someone to zip you in, regardless. I'm a 34-36B, but despite the very open neckline & low cut, absolutely zero boobie issues for me. No engineering or tape needed. I didn't feel exposed or immodest at all. The reviews? Yea. People love this dress. All people. Rent it. Paired with some (very) fast fashion Christian Siriano for PayLess (which also got great reviews!). No need for more. The dress does all the work. :)

links_reviews_title: Beautiful dress! Made me feel attractive! Husband loved it!
links_reviews_text: I wear anywhere between an 8 and 10. I rad many reviews and this dress wasn't even my first pick. My first choice wasn't available in the size I needed so I went with this style which the hubs also helped to pick out. I definitely do t regret it or feel like it should be ranked as second choice because the dress fit and flattered and was exactly like the reviews said it would. I didn't give it 5 stars bc some of the stitching was frayed (like it had been worn a lot) on both the dress I wore, size 8, and the backup size 10. Must get double sided tape to prevent anything from showing you don't want seen, and the lining was also a bit worn out so had to reapply tape to keep dress neckline in proper place. Waistline runs tight just like mentioned in other reviews. Overall though I would rent this dress again though because I felt awesome!
True to fit, low cut so plan on that!

links_reviews_title: Perfect for a fall wedding! Tons of compliments. Sophisticated sexy
links_reviews_text: Loved this dress! Did run small in the waist and definitely wear tape.

links_reviews_title: Beautiful print/fabric but wayyy low cut
links_reviews_text: This dress was beautiful but I can't imagine how its possible to wear without a bra or cami. I'm a small 32C and my chest was hanging out of it... so I opted to wear a navy blue lace bralette which made it more appropriate for a wedding.
Needed to be pressed but other than that this was such an awesome dress and I received so many compliments!
The neck line was too revealing for the function I was attending. I recommend maybe a vacation dress. It was still beautiful.
Beautiful design and quality. Couldn't wear a bra, and it is low cut, so you should be comfortable with showing some cleavage.

I'm in between an 8 & 10, and saw that this had no stretch so i went with a 10. It fit perfectly !! No need for fashion tape but i was super careful that i didn't expose myself . I'm 5'9" so this dress was soooo short on me but i still felt comfortable. Love it. Rent it.

Gorgeous colors, beautiful details and comfortable, not scratchy at all.. but damn ladies. I can't tell if it's been shrunk or mis-categorized because even sizing up from a 6-8 to a 10, this wanted to show eveeerything to the world. It's a shirt. I have 34Cs, so it's not like my boobs ruined it!

This dress felt perfectly tailored to my body. I wanted desperately to wear it but it just came down to what I felt more comfortable in. We were attending a charity event and it felt a little risqu√©. Definitely size up. 5'7 138 lbs.
Loved everything about this dress! Glad I chose a size up because it was a little tight though the shoulders. LOVE LOVE LOVE

links_reviews_title: Felt so sexy yet classy in this dress. Adore!
links_reviews_text: Fit like a glove and compliments all night!
I wore a two but I couldn't life my arms very well. Otherwise it fit well.

I rented this dress for my bachelorette party in Chicago, and it was stunning. I have a small chest, and thia dress was definitely low with a wide v-neck--might be tough for larger chested ladies. I'm 5'11", and this dress was still long enough to be sexy and not smutty. I am also incapable of cleavage, so this dress worked wonders! It did seem to run a bit small, but I made it work. Would absolutely recommend--I wish I owned it!

I usually wear a size 0, but all RTR had ready to ship was a 2. It was large in the shoulders so A LOT of double sided tape was used to keep the dress in place. It was dinner and dance proof (with the tape of course). I also got so many compliments! Dress was a hit and I would definitely rent again.

links_reviews_title: Showstopper dress, lots of adjustment and tucking
links_reviews_text: this dress was amazing! felt like a million bucks. only thing is rhat youDEFINITELY NEED FASHION TAPE. keep the boobs secure. little hem of fabric pops out on the color lining of the dress sometimes but nothing too obvious. great fit. loved it!

I loved this dress a lot! There was one fit issue - I said above that it runs true to size, but with some caveats. I'm normally a size 6, but I also have broad shoulders. After reading on here that the dress ran small for a lot of people, I ordered the size 8 as my backup. I found that the dress was small in the shoulders for me in both sizes and I did not have a full range of movement in either. The size 8 was a little more comfortable, but it still was small in the shoulders and also fitted way too loose everywhere else. So in everything but the shoulders, the 6 was true to size for me.
Wore this out for mh birthday. It was so fun, and got so many compliments. The sleeves are tight, but otherwise fit like a dream. Boob tape is a must!!
This dress was so fun! It fit great and was the perfect length. I wish I didnt have to send it back! The pattern is even prettier in person.

links_reviews_title: Total glam factor if you're comfy in your own skin!
links_reviews_text: Pros: The dress had a total wow factor and if you are comfortable with the deep V, rent it! I'd suggest a spray tan and double sided tape for the bust and shoulders. Great dress for a night out and the material was very glam. I ordered a 4 & 6 and both had a similar fit around the bottom but the 4 was a snugger fit up top so I chose the 4. I'm 5'6", 135 lbs and 32D. Cons: Both dresses arrived with a torn seam and I had to have a seamstress fix in a pinch.
I wore this for my birthday dinner / night out. As you can see, it is revealing for those of us with a large chest but it was sexy! Loved it!

It definitely runs large, so size down. I originally got my usual size 4, but had to send back for the 2. Even the regular is very long. As a short person, I had to have high high heels. It's best for standing events. I was a little self conscious sitting at the restaurant.

links_reviews_title: Never Thought I Could Get Away With This!
links_reviews_text: Thought my days of wearing something so sexy were long gone! But the wide legs, soft but defined waist & miraculous "plunging but not bare" neckline made me feel so aweosome. I looked at pic (selfie) & thought "That can't be me!" I wore with nipple covers but no bra to wedding reception. It will probably not work for anyone over 36C unless you are a confident women! My black Stuart Weitzman sandals showed a bit, but the length worked (I am short-waisted.) Not terribly difficult in the bathroom. Wore it to a 100 degree wedding reception in Brooklyn. Recommend this rental.
Wore this to a formal dinner. It's a classic without being boring. Thankfully I didn't have to hit up the bathroom often. It was a doozy to take off.
Sexy enough and comfy to the max! Also length was PERFECT
Fits TTS, and I received so many compliments all night! Highly recommended for a date night or a formal affair. I felt confident wearing this romper.

links_reviews_title: Perfect anything but basic black jumpsuit
links_reviews_text: Great jumpsuit! Plunging neck and open back are so flattering. Satin tie waist keeps it from being boring. Length was perfect for my 5'8" height with a low wedge sandal. Would rent again!

Loved this jumpsuit! First time wearing one and I'll definitely try again. The fit was comfortable and true to size. Definitely be prepared for lots of cleavage. Overall loved this and would totally rent again.

This jumpsuit is gorgeous. I wore this to a v fancy restaurant for my birthday dinner. It fit perfectly and was so flattering. With heels, it was not too long for a 5'4 gal. I wore pasties in case of a nip slip since it's pretty low cut, but didn't really need them. The top was just tight enough that the fabric was against my skin but it was still sexy. It's definitely fitted in the waist but not uncomfortable. It's snug to give you a figure but then loose on your stomach so it doesn't show any tummy imperfections. I felt amazing in it! Got compliments all night. If you're considering this jumpsuit, just do it!! Paired with a Zac Posen bag from RTR as well!

links_reviews_title: Felt super sexy. Couldn't find my tape but felt secure nonetheless.
links_reviews_text: A lil long for a 5'4 gal. Make sure you have some heels!
chest area is a bit big for small chest women

Super cute Jumpsuit!! I will definitely Rent this jumpsuit again. I would recommend you going up a size for back up. This is very fitted and straight does not hug. This jumpsuit is floor length so if you are short like me (I'm 5'4) I would recommend wearing heels.

links_reviews_title: Very flattering, wore a tank to cover to much cleavage for the wedding.
links_reviews_text: A little short since I am taller so would be better worn with flats, but I was feeling myself! Gave me a very flattering shape.

The jumpsuit is snug around the torso but full on the legs. I chose the 8R since it fit better in the leg. Due to the nature of the event, I wore a lace camisole under the top. It was a hit and I got lots of compliments. My husband even said to rent this one again!

links_reviews_title: A comfortable formal option if dresses aren't for you.
links_reviews_text: The fit was true to size. It was fitted at the waist but nothing too tight. All around, the garment is very easy to move around and breath in with ample room for the hips. This is great for any bust size but I would recommend using a nude bra or going braless. At 5' 10" with heels, this hits me at a tea length.

Rented this for a wedding, but ended up wearing it the next day for my anniversary dinner. Length was great with heels (otherwise would have been too long on my short frame), and the plunge is very low - so be ready for that. The "belt" on mine was only one piece, not two that could be tied, so I couldn't really figure out what to do with it, and I just wrapped it around me and sort of tucked the end in. If I had been dancing a lot I don't think it would have stayed.

links_reviews_title: LOVE this jumpsuit! I felt like a rock star all night!
links_reviews_text: Fantastic jumpsuit. Comfortable and easy to get in and out of when going to the restroom. Felt like it masked my trouble area (upper tummy) really well! I did wear a bandeau underneath because the "ladies" would have been falling out all night. But that didn't damper the outfit at all to me. One downside was there is only a few stitches holding the fabric together at the top in the back. Sadly, the stitches ripped while I was taking it off to use the bathroom. I don't at all knock the jumpsuit for that though. Danced all night while feeling glamorous!

links_reviews_title: Such a flattering jumpsuit! Lots of compliments!
links_reviews_text: I wore this jumpsuit to a rehearsal dinner at Top Golf, and it was perfect! Very flattering and extremely comfortable...I even hit a few balls while we were there! I used fashion tape to keep it all together, but it worked great! I would definitely rent this jumpsuit again!

This jumpsuit was PERFECT for a formal charity benefit! It fit perfectly and very true to size. Halston Heritage also makes this style in a floor-length dress, which I've worn before (a great goto for a more formal, black tie affair). The sash ties right below bust and has a nice shiny side for extra detail. Im an A cup and while there's a deep-V cut, I was well covered. I'm 5'8" and the legs came right to the floor. I wore a 4" heel, but a smaller heel would also look great. Highly recommend and would definitely rent again!

Overall this is a nice design, a few things to note. 1. The plunge is very low, I wore a bralette in black lace. If a plunge is desired, get fabric body tape. 2. Side zipper is tricky, you need help to zip this! 3. Pockets would have made this an A+ 4. Length was not long on me, I am 5'7.

links_reviews_title: Comfortable, sleek, and loads of compliments!
links_reviews_text: I ordered the 10 (my usual size) and got the 14 as a back-up (12 was out of stock). The 10 fit perfectly, but the zipper was so hard to use, even on the hanger, that I ended up wearing the 14. It was WAY too big, but the drape on the legs camouflaged the size pretty well. I wear a 34 G and the top was still baggy enough that I had to pin it closed. Do be aware that it is VERY low cut. The legs also run short but in a way that seems to be on purpose. I'm 5'6" and with a 3.5" inch heel they were hanging around my ankles. Once we switched to flip-flops (as seen in the picture), the legs hit right at the tops of my feet. Something to be aware of if you're short. All that said, I got tons of compliments and have never been so comfortable at a wedding before.
I loved this look but had to get a bralette to wear under it because it was low cut. Not recommended for short women as I had to wear tall heels. Overall it looked great.

Loved the look of this jumpsuit, but more difficult to get in and out of than your average jumpsuit. Additionally, it needed fashion tape which needed to be fixed up after using the restroom, and the bow is very long, which is hard to keep off the floor in those situations as well. I'm fairly short, but was able to get by with medium height heels in this. Overall, great look - sophisticated and sexy, just a little annoying.

links_reviews_title: Heartbroken at not being able to wear this!
links_reviews_text: Gorgeous jumpsuit that was just a little too sexy for this particular event. Plunging neckline- but a classy piece. Loved it. Perfect for black tie event or similar. Will rent again when the opportunity comes up.
Unfortunate the jumpsuit runs super short. I'm 5'7 and even without heels it's super short. The fit around the hips is a little weird as well and not that flattwring

links_reviews_title: This jumpsuit is so flattering. I got numerous compliments on it.
links_reviews_text: It fit very true to size. I have a small chest but wide rib cage. It may not fit as well with a large chest.
Does dip low in the front requiring a cami.

links_reviews_title: Fashionable without too big a statement
links_reviews_text: Wore this to my first singing gig in my new city!
Would recommend a long for anyone over 5'8, but i was able to get away with it with casual sandals...would not have worked for dressier events.

links_reviews_title: Couldn't wear it. Looked like a clown because it wasn't long enough.
links_reviews_text: If you are 5'9 or taller, the regular size will be too short on you.
Too low cut for work

links_reviews_title: Perfect for a fun night out and dressed it up with some colorful jewelry.
links_reviews_text: Fit perfectly, however, just a little long.

links_reviews_title: I rented this for a recent trip to Vegas and it was so fun!
links_reviews_text: Ran very true to size. I am 5'10" and it was long enough I could wear with a 3 in. heel. I was worried because I wear a 34DDD and petals aren't a thing for girls with big boobs! This actually fit amazing and I felt confident without a bra on. It's booby though, so you should be comfortable with that. Little difficult to get in and out of, so thankful I didn't have to pee all night! Definitely going to rent again!
too loose
I really wanted to try a new look for me and rented this jumpsuit. It was a bit big in the chest and waist unfortunately. It was a bit short for me too. Didn't have a long option.
I am 5'6"... this rode up the crotch. Trying to get it on, I scrapped my head. If I did wear this for the night, I would never have gone to the bathroom...

links_reviews_title: This jumpsuit was super comfortable and I really wish I could have worn it!
links_reviews_text: Everything fit great except the deep v, unfortunately there was not amount of fashion tape or low plunge bra that would ever make it appropriate for wearing to an event where I'd be interacting with work colleagues. Would be great for a night out in the city where you don't know anyone!
High end material and fit.

Very deep V. Since I have a long torso, it was a little snug in the bum, but it fit well elsewhere. Next time I will try a jumpsuit without pleating in the pants to reduce bulk. Missing one of the sashes though so didn't wear.
Perfect for pear shape ladies!

links_reviews_title: Very cute idea, but not the best execution.
links_reviews_text: I thought that the lace around the turtleneck part would be very fitted but it was not so it just kind of felt floppy. Maybe I should've got a smaller size but then I didn't want it to be too cramped.
Cute well made lace top. Nothing fancy or special fits well

links_reviews_title: Cute enough to go out and comfortable enough to play basketball
links_reviews_text: Ran large but was super cute

This shirt gets four stars instead of five because it is short in the torso. You need either a cami underneath or high-waisted pants (or to just be okay with your stomach being out). I'm sure this is a tall girls' problem; petite folks will be good to go.
Love this designer and the lace. Completely zips up back. Would definitely rent it again.
Neck was a bit tight but it's very beautiful

I wore this with jeans to a variety of parties and after-work events. It went really well with blue and black denim. I'm sure it would pair well with skirts, too. Fun top with lots of details and good for winter as it's short-sleeved but covers your chest and neck. I'd rent again.

The blouse fully unzips in the back, making it easy to get into and out of. Loved the fit, the collar, and the lace placement. Perfect for work under a blazer and transitions well into after hours drinks.
Made birthday wine tasting delightful, fit nice and just a classic look. Wore with jeans and black high boots

links_reviews_title: Many compliments and detail of top.
links_reviews_text: Would love to rent again - it was perfect!
Great top that could work for an event, work or date night. Zips from the back but if flexible you can zip / unzip on your own. Lol
Very elegant top. Wear on a date or to a party. Fill zipper on entire back is a cool feature too.

Absolutely LOVED his shirt. It fit absolutely perfectly. Did have to wear a black bra, but it blended beautifully and looked like pet of the shirt. Back zipper was very easy to manage on my own and made shirt really well. Such a cute top!

I was sure this wouldn't fit my huge shoulders and the size 10 was perfect. Had a some room in the waist, which was fine with me. Tons of complements during a long night in New Orleans . Ran into a girl in the bathroom who said " I live that top!" I said , " It's RTR -and your dress is super cute too!" She laughed and said " It's RTR".
Both the skirt and the top were awesome. I wore this outfit to one party and then paired the top with a pencil skirt and wore it to work.

links_reviews_title: Very chic and well cut top!
links_reviews_text: This top fit perfectly. I am normally between a 6 and an 8, but since this was a zipper top, I went with the bigger size to make sure there was room in the bust - I wore the 8. This zipped up easily and the two buttons around the neck just made the top sit well all day. The lace is beautiful and the cami doesn't ride up much. I paired this with gray ripped jeans, a black leather moto jacket, and strappy pumps - perfect for work all day or a night out! Loved it and will certainly rent again!
Received a lot of compliments, fit perfectly.

I adore this top. I work in the tv industry and we require a lot of what we call "Show blacks" and I wanted to find something a little prettier than what I usually wear. This is going to be perfect! It fits beautifully and the details are just stunning. Would likely rent again, and could easily be worn out for drinks or on a date.

links_reviews_title: The zipper back made this top my favorite ever
links_reviews_text: I love love love this top. I was SO tempted to purchase. It fits really well, clearly high quality, and is a great top for work. I wore it with skinny pants and wide leg pants and it worked well with both. It zips all the way down in the back which made getting ready in the mornings great. I have a small chest and honestly could have sized down to a 2, but the 4 fit just fine.
Very pretty and flattering. I thought jeans would look great with this top, but preferred it with a pencil skirt.

I love this blouse! The lace is thick so it provides coverage but is still sexy classic and goes with everything. Jeans for a date or night out. Skirt for a more fancy affair. I threw on slacks .. perfect for a more dressed up work day! The details are stunning and it's very form flattering. Shows off an hour glass shape nicely! 5 Stars!
This is a really cute top that I wore to work. I wore it with jeans and received a few compliments from coworkers on it. I will definitely be renting it again. Fits true to size.
It was perfect for work.
This top was great for day to night. The shoulders are sheer so depending on how conservative your workplace is, might not be appropriate. I wore under a blazer for work.

links_reviews_title: Very pretty, very easy to wear
links_reviews_text: Easy to dress up or down, a little big in overall fit. Loved the high neck, and the lace detail is beautiful.

links_reviews_title: Loved it so much I bought it!
links_reviews_text: I love this top! The fit was perfect for my curves and was very flattering. The lace and high-neck gave a very sexy-Victorian look. I wore it with jeans to a party and with black pants and heels to a meeting. You can dress it up, or down...boho or formal. Love it.
Made really well. Runs a little large I would go down a size but I'm a little smaller on top. Usually I'm about a size 6
This top was great! It fit beautifully and the lace details on the bottom were beautiful

links_reviews_title: This looks cute in the picture but I had fit issues.
links_reviews_text: Shoulders were a bit too big and the shirt was a little shorter than I was expecting.

links_reviews_title: Sexy but still work-appropriate. Great lining
links_reviews_text: The one con is that it's actually pretty hard to zipper on your own! There is a full zipper from the very bottom to top of the blouse.
Such a great top! I'll be renting it again. Fit perfectly, and just the right amount of sexy without being revealing.
No give so If you are bigger chested as I am I would recommend going up a size.

I rented this top for a holiday party. I wanted something a little special, without being over the top. I wore this with black skinny pants and black flats. The top was cute. It was fitted without being tight, but it was a little shorter than I thought it would be. It hit me at the top of my hip, I wish it had been slightly longer. I would consider renting again for a date night or night out.
Quality top. Zips All the way up in back. Wore with black leather pants for NYE party with friends. Slightly boxy look. Sheer lace overlay requires strapless bra. Pretty top.
Very pretty and comfortable
Loved this top. It zips all the way in the back so helpmis needed getting dressed.
OMG love this top and got TONS of compliments
Fits well - true to size. I wore it once. It was flattering but a little conservative.

links_reviews_title: Ive worn this several times to theater and dates. It's elegant, comfortable and easy with jeans.
links_reviews_text: great
Very feminine and great fit. I would have given it 5 stars but the lace was torn under the arms, however, it's not noticeable to others.

Excuse the photo taken in a window - room didn't have a full length mirror! Loved this effortless dress for a Miami evening work event. Slightly big on top for me - my bra straps kept peeking out when I thought they would be hidden - but the waist has no give so go with what you feel is true to your waist size vs sizing down for a small bust. Got so many compliments on this classy and breezy dress!

links_reviews_title: Wanted to love but not the most flattering
links_reviews_text: As others said, the waist of this dress is particularly snug. It barely fit in the waist for me but fit well otherwise. I didn't love the cut of the dress up top either--wasn't flattering. I loved the flow from waist down, though, and the print. Not a slam dunk but fun.
This dress is beautiful. The flow is so nice. The top was big & the hook in the back would keep coming undone which made the top even looser. Other than that- good dress

links_reviews_title: Well I got engaged in it, so....!
links_reviews_text: I rented this as part of an assortment for a weekend in Baltimore to see friends & family, as well as to pin my boyfriend to Major. This was the dress I chose for a day of coordinating the pinning ceremony, possibly carrying boxes/coordinating family members, and heading from hotel to ceremony to lunch to drinks. It's comfortable and head-turning, and the skirt is glam but only long on the sides so it's not bulky. I couldn't be happier that this is the dress I wore as he proposed later that day, and we stayed out all night with family and friends. A memorable dress, great photos, and a perfect day!
Love the color and flowy dress! The top was larger than expected

Absolutely fell in love with this dress. One of my favorites I've found through RTR. Wore it to a cocktail festival/garden party. Would love to buy it but unfortunately it's $$$. Perhaps the price will go down a bit over time.

links_reviews_title: Gorgeous dress, very adaptable, and beautiful movement!
links_reviews_text: This dress was too roomy through the shoulders for me (but my shoulders are very narrow), but it was so beautiful in person that I made it work anyway! A quick twist of the back before hooking and it fit perfectly. I ended up not wearing it on vacation, but wore it twice to a work event and a date night!! Threw a belt and sleeveless blazer over it for work and a T-shirt over if for a casual date. Never thought I would love a yellow leopard print dress so much that I didn't want to give it back! The silk is so breathable and has beautiful movement.
So comfortable. Easy to wear as casual work or to dress up with heels. Luv, luv it

links_reviews_title: Marigold moment for a day to night look but deff drama
links_reviews_text: Gorgeous dress! Chose this for a fun Friday look at work. The bust felt a little awkward and it was big around the arms--had to wear a denim jacket (not my first choice lol!) over to make more work appropriate. Got rid of the jacket for a more elevated night look, but overall, wish I had saved this for a more upscale occasion. Could have styled and felt way better in this had I been going to a wedding or fun party. TLDR: be careful if larger chested, beautiful but dramatic, not subway / commute friendly.
I paired it with a white shirt under just to mix things up and I received so many compliments. I felt so great in it and flowed beautifully with the uneven hem. Great summer dress!

The color and pattern look very nice! I never wore yellow before but this is a very flattering and eye catching yellow. Lots of compliment! It's a signature summer piece for sure. However, the chest part was loose so you can definitely see part of my bra from the size but because it's a casual dress, with a black bra it's not a huge problem. The was it was just right so I couldn't have worn a smaller size.

The dress was an odd fit for me. It was very snug at the waistline, but extremely large and baggy in the chest area (to the point that I could not wear it). This dress may be a better fit for real hourglass figure, as the waist is quite small. Too bad for us ladies with smaller chests, as the fabric is really beautiful and flowy.
This dress is a fun pattern, but is weirdly cut. The top is very large, but the waist is tighter
Great fit!
Wore this on Mother's Day and felt amazing. I usually don't like myself in yellow but somehow this one worked for blonds. Fit was great - better if you can go braless. Lots of IG compliments. <3

links_reviews_title: Such a fun attention grabbing yellow!
links_reviews_text: Fit wise it was great! One of the back closure clips liked to come undone a lot but it wasn't that big of a deal. I loved the movement of this dress when walking, it flows so nicely!
This is one of the nicest items I have ever rented from RTR. An unforgettable dress, so flattering and unique. Fits well and feels amazing.
Love the happy yellow. Fun dress to spin in lol. I wore it to work and I'm gonna take it with me this week to wear in Hawaii. Perfect for that weather too!

links_reviews_title: Perfect party dress. Flirty and fun.
links_reviews_text: I got lots of compliments on this dress at a Kentucky Derby party. I Felt very feminine and comfortable. It was a bit loose in the bust/bodice area but otherwise fit very well.

I really loved the color and cut of this dress. I wore it to a rehearsal dinner for a wedding in Cabo! It did run a bit large in the top. The arm holes and bust fit on the loose side which is saying something because I am a 32DD. The waist did fit true to size though so it would be hard to go a size down. I wore a strapless bra because the straps are a bit narrow in the back. Overall, would rent again! Very fun dress and could be dressed up or down.

links_reviews_title: Rigid waist seam and gappy arm holes
links_reviews_text: I wanted to love this but the waist seam had no stretch and the arm holes were gaping, I wore a Jack over my arms to conceal the poor upper body fit. Normally an 18 and wore the size 20.
Gorgeous, but be careful that the waistline is tight! I barely had enough room to zip!! Loved the hemline and bright color

links_reviews_title: Volunteering at a style show, feeling very stylish!
links_reviews_text: Empire waist a little strange fitting at first, but you get used to it. Hangs very nicely.

links_reviews_title: Perfect for someone who likes animal print
links_reviews_text: The top was a little loose but overall it was cute. Definitely my style.

The top of this dress was very ill-fitted and did not fit my body type at all. Perhaps if you have narrow shoulders and a smaller chest, it could work for you but it's an odd cut. It's a shame that it didn't work because the bottom half of the dress is beautiful. I wouldn't recommend taking a chance on this one.

links_reviews_title: i wore it for every day dinner out with girlfriend & to a fun luncheon. perfect, easy & comfortable
links_reviews_text: I love this dress - if your are between 2 and 4, the 2 might feel a tad snug but can still work. I belted it and each time I wore it I received many compliments - a pretty, easy dress.

I wanted so much to like this dress, the color is amazing and it SHOULD have been a great cut for my hourglass frame.... But the empire waist situation made my hips looks HUGE!! And the chest area was a bit too big even though I'm a DD so I think if I tried to size up it would have looked too baggy. Sad!
Didn't wear this....armholes were gigantic so your bra hung out...the bottom was cute
Like the yellow, not neon.
Fun but ran really large for me. Had to tie a shirt around it and wore with booties

links_reviews_title: Color is great and well made
links_reviews_text: Very tight in the rib cage
Vacation, resort wear, fancy daytime dress that easily transitions to a dinner dress.
The dress was airy and colorful. The major issue was I ordered a size up, but it was still very tight in the waist and I couldn't wait to get it off at the end of the night.
Rented in update and wore once for a black tie optional gala. Was unique and great for the event

links_reviews_title: Photo doesn't do the color justice. Really vibrant goldenrod color. Gorgeous!
links_reviews_text: Runs large, especially under the arms.

links_reviews_title: I was unfortunately unable to wear this dress at all.
links_reviews_text: The fit was extremely weird on this dress. The waist line was too small, but then in the shoulders, it was way too large and I had too much loose fabric. I couldn't go down a size because the waist wouldn't have fit, and I couldn't go up a size because the shoulders were already too big. I was unable to get a replacement because of my travel arrangements so ended up just having to figure something else out last minute.

links_reviews_title: I had to return this before I wore it.
links_reviews_text: This is a great dress but I needed a bigger size. The top area is very unforgiving and the zip is super tight. I would like to rent it again but will go up a size.

links_reviews_title: The dress is beautiful but too small on the waist and too big on the chest. Couldn't wear it.
links_reviews_text: Fabric is nice to the touch and color and print are very nice for spring summer. But fit of the dress didn't suit me.

The neckline is hard to deal with, so it's not great for work, but for a day-long date, I was comfortable wearing this in the car for travel. I wore it to lunch with a denim jacket and gold sandals. Then, I swapped accessories for an afternoon gathering, then a concert. This dress looked right all day! Compliments from strangers + comfortable and versatile!
I really wanted this dress to work but it didn't compliment me being too hippy. But it did for. Also a little shorter than on model for me.

Loved this jumpsuit but it was definitely on the smaller side. I should've worn a size up for extra length especially. Got away with it by wearing over black tights with flat black booties. Super busty also, would recommend tape to hold everything in ;) REALLY cute though!!

This romper was great! It was comfortable and stylish! The cut was a bit too low for me so I did pin it so my bra wouldn't show. I was able to wear a regular bra and with the pin not see anything. I received so many compliments and would definitely rent this again.

links_reviews_title: Perfect for a cold night out
links_reviews_text: I wore this to a friend's birthday out in Washington D.C., and loved it! It's really well made with thick fabric. This works well especially if it's on the colder side, you can pair it with tights and booties or over the knee boots. The one thing that I would watch out for is that it's pretty big on the shoulders.

This romper was beautiful. Just be warned, the material is heavy and has no give. The medium was too snug in the torso and the large was too big. I had to pin the front but it ended up working beautifully for a Studio 54 themed party.

This was much warmer than I thought! It was lined so the romper was comfortable and warm with thigh high boots, perfect for a night out. I'm small breasted so the top was a bit big for me, but everything else fit true to size.

links_reviews_title: It's the romper you never knew you needed
links_reviews_text: Loved it. The waist is elastic and you just step into it. The only downfall is the neckline that absolutely HAD to be safety-pinned to keep together. It wasn't too short and the material was heavy and of quality. If it wasn't almost $500, I'd have kept it :)

I had some credit and this ended up being almost free. Fun, super cute. I had gained weight since I rented it and it was a tight fit for me. I'm large busted so I bought and wore pleather tube top. I then belted it, as it was short waisted on me. It turned out cute. I wore it out in a snow storm (pardon my hair) with seamed black stockings and black booties. It was cute and sparkly

links_reviews_title: This was a hit for our holiday party. I had so many compliments!
links_reviews_text: I did need to safety pin the front to keep the girls covered.

I rented this for my 21st and loved how fun it was- I got compliments all night from friends and strangers alike! However, the reviews on how this is big up top are no joke- you can't wear a regular bra because of the v in front and back so I had to use safety pins to keep it together. I wore the small but the top half felt more like a medium or maybe even large. It was a great piece but I had to be constantly adjusting the top and even safety pins/fashion tape didn't totally help cause it's thicker fabric than it looks like in pictures. May be better for girls who can fill out the top!

links_reviews_title: Great romper, but too low cut and short
links_reviews_text: Pros: cute, good quality, great for disco theme, decently comfortable Cons: way too low cut, could barley safety pin the top, tried to use fashion tape to keep my bra/boobs from showing, very short, not for formal event, not for a non dressy/dress up event, heavy fabric, big on shoulders, for large on top (small chest or not), itching, and dealt with some chafing
The romper falls off the shoulders easily and the waist runs big. I belted it and pinned the chest and it was perfect for the party

links_reviews_title: I celebrated my 31st birthday covered in gold sequins!
links_reviews_text: The romper fit well over my belly. Even though I have pretty large breasts, it was very roomy in the chest and shoulder area. Instead of fighting it, I decided to wear a fun bra!

this romper was PERFECT for my golden 26th birthday! it was a little low cut so we pinned it so I still had some clevedge but the girls weren‚Äôt poppin out! it was also a little on the shorter end for me but my legs looked great with it! seriously it was such a showstopping piece I had a hard time sending it back! thank you RTR!

I really appreciate a good quality heavy sequin and this was perfect. The shoulders were a bit big on my body frame but nothing a few well placed safety pins couldn't fix. I got numerous compliments. The shade of gold is beautiful!
Love love LOVED this suit for a special concert!! It was so much fun! Only downfall is the front is wiiiiiiide open!! You have to pin it or your entire bra would be exposed!
Super comfortable! Who doesn't love a shiny romper...made dancing the night away super easy!

links_reviews_title: Wore this romper for my bachelorette weekend in Las Vegas, and it was the perfect!
links_reviews_text: I ended up wearing the medium for the length purposes, top part was a little big and kept opening up so I had to pin it. Other than that it was super cute!

This romper is so cute and fun! I love the color of the gold sequins. You would be best off wearing no bra with this because the deep V can go pretty low, but definitely need to use fashion tape to keep the neckline taped to your chest. You can get away with wearing a regular bra if you can fashion tape the two sides together high enough to hide your bra. This runs true to size but is a little bit short so size up for your backup size.

Rented this for a "70's disco glam" birthday party. Was torn between the XS and S... the XS top fit better, but the shorts were shoooort. Ultimately went with the S and pinned the top a bit so the shoulders wouldn't accidentally fall down. Didn't experience any scratching from the sequins. Very comfortable and very fun!

This outfit was amazing quality. It was negative 15 degrees the night I wore this, and not once was a cold! It's thick and the sequins aren't scratchy like some can be. I have narrow shoulders and got an XS, I had a really hard time keeping it up, but wore a bralett under it to hide my cleavage. A long necklace would also look nice! The color is gorgeous, and just as expected. Loved this romper!!!
Loved the romper. Very comfortable although runs large. I usually wear between size S and M. i took the XS and it ran large around the chest. Very cool look and great pictures!

links_reviews_title: All that Glitters is this Gold Romper!
links_reviews_text: My best friend wore this romper to match me at my 22nd birthday dinner and she stood out! I tried it on first and the other reviews were right, it runs large especially up top. Normally she is a small and I am an xs. This was falling off of me, I would have had to have worn fashion tape to keep the shoulders up. She even had to wear fashion tape to keep it up, even though she wore the xs. Also better on taller people, it may look a little frumpy on more petite because of the length. Overall, great dress to stand out and party in!
This is exactly the look I was going for. I did have trouble getting it to stay on my shoulders, so I had to pin the piece in the bust. Other than that, it was confortable!

Rented for a disco party but in both sizes my butt cheeks were hanging out so I couldn't go through with it! Other wise overall fit was pretty good/ similar for both sizes (XS/S) and would have been great for the occasion
really cute, but have to pin the front as others noted. also, if you are petite and short waisted you lose shape with this number. still really cute though and pretty comfy for sequins!
Super short! It runs small if you are tall tough to wear.

This was cute and really comfortable. I was surprised that it had an elastic waist so it was easy to pull on. But while it fit on the bottom (tiny shorts so big booties be warned, your butt will be hanging out of it), my top was SWIMMING. I couldn't even keep it on my shoulders. It also wasn't as sparkly as I thought it would be - more of a mustard sequin than a real gold. I still would have worn it if it had fit!

links_reviews_title: Short with boobs - this one's for you
links_reviews_text: I wear a 2 or 4. The S was enormous on me. The XS fit in the hips and stayed on my shoulders, but was short in the toosh had I been a half an inch taller my cheeks would've been coming out. Thankfully, it's heavy enough that I wasn't in a constant wedgy situation. As other reviewers mention, know that the sleeves hang on the edges of your shoulders. The wrap/cross is high enough that my boobs were never in jeopardy of coming out (I had on pasties from the dress I wore earlier in the night). I wore this while drunkenly roller skating -- I fell and flailed on more than one occasion -- with no slips. The sequins are a little scratchy but that's par for the course.

I rented this dress for my daughters sweet 16 birthday party and the bottom of the romper fit well but the top was huge. She would have had to wear a cami or tank underneath so she didn't flash people all night. Ultimately, she was not able to wear this.
I wore it backwards because the front did not fit me well.
oh my. adore this romper. the chest area is loose so get some fashion tape ready. i got complimented all night long
The fit was a little loose on the bust, I tried to use fashion tape but struggled to keep it closed. Overall it was very cute and I would rent again.

links_reviews_title: This is VERY low cut and heavy fabric with very little stretch in the arms/torso.
links_reviews_text: It would have been great if I had rented it for a cold weather event. The fabric lining and sequins make the garment very thick and I was overheated immediately.

So I never wore this out because it was wayyyy to hot for a Florida vacay in late June. The small fit but the neckline was too large. I think fashion tape would work, I like the deep V look so didn't want to pin it. Any smaller and it would've been too small on the waist, hips, and legs. Will try to rent again when it's cooler (and with a ton of fashion tape!!).

Pros: high quality, thick fabric. Pretty color. Sequins not scratchy Cons: fit was terrible. The shoulders were SO big, you needed a ton of fashion tape just to keep it on. Also had to tape up the front to keep it from falling open. Even on a D cup, it was huge. Wore to dinner and then took it off. Would have been impossible to use the bathroom with the amount of tape I had on this.
Nice fabric and a good price. Didn't fit. I almost always fit a small. I might rent it in a medium another time instead.
I have broad shoulders and this was way to big. Material was really thick and heavy too, did not wear.

links_reviews_title: Lower half fit well, top off was too big
links_reviews_text: Top was falling off - unable to wear.

I wore this for my golden birthday and it was a big hit! I need lots of safety pins though, as the top was falling off my shoulders. We safety pinned the back of the romper to my bra and had to close the V in the front with safety pins.

links_reviews_title: Way too big on top, even ordering a size down & short on bottom- my bottom was showing.
links_reviews_text: After reading the reviews I decided to order a size small and medium. Both did not fit well at all. The top is huge, even pinning it and the bottom was way too short...as in you could see the bottom of my butt- not the look I was going for. I returned it immediately.

links_reviews_title: Unique dress. Great for a night out without being overly revealing
links_reviews_text: Love the colors and lace details. Not too short. Paired this with a jean jacket for a comedy show and worked perfectly.
Bright colorful dress, perfect for the outdoor wedding I attended
I was very happy with this dress. I would rent it again. The colors and embroidery are exquisite. It was comfortable to wear.

links_reviews_title: A great flattering find for a wedding!
links_reviews_text: I rented this for a fall wedding. It was a bit chilly out, but this dress has surprisingly thick fabric, so this and a pashmina kept me warm! It's very flattering for those of us with a small chest and broad shoulders, but I think it would be good on anyone! The waist runs small, so I wore a 4, when normally I'm a true 2. (I kinda wanted to eat that night.)
Easy to wear. A little short on me, I'm 5'6". Not bad enough to keep me from wearing it though

Size 2 fit perfectly - I‚Äôm 5‚Äô3.5‚Äù and 118lbs. It was super comfortable, perfect length and I got tons of compliments on it. Really beautiful. The size 4 wouldn‚Äôt worked but was a bit loose and I probably could‚Äôve made the size 0 work but it would‚Äôve been less comfortable.

I'm 5'2", 140ish lbs. i ordered both the size 6 and size 8. Both fit, but I ultimately went with the 8 for comfort. I loved the colors and the fit was overall very flattering, despite some awkward bunching around the chest area (hardly noticeable). I received many compliments all night!
Very pretty and comfortable dress. Fits true to size. Perfect for a fancy party or wedding.
Loved the fit and length of this dress! I loved the way I felt in it. And the color was just beautiful in person.
Fit was great. Colors were vibrant. Perfect for strapless bra. Comfortable. Excellent quality fabric. Wish I could buy it- SO many compliments!

Loved this dress!!! I am 5'8 and 150 lbs. I received an 8 and 10. The 8 fit perfectly but was a bit tight on the top. I have a 1 year old son that is have to be picking up all night so I didn't want to rip it open. I ended up wearing the 10 and it gave me a bit more room. The color was beautiful and so was the detail. I would definitely wear this one again!!

links_reviews_title: Perfect dress for a summer daytime wedding or event
links_reviews_text: Beautiful dress that was true-to-size. I normally wear a 0 and this dress fit perfectly. I'm short (5'2") and the dress hit just above the knee. I received many compliments and wish I could keep this dress!
I wore the 2 -- it was a little snug in the rib cage but the 4 was too large in the bust. Good length for a petite frame. Very comfortable, tons of compliments!

This dress ended up working great for me. I ended up wearing the 10 as the 8 for but was a little tight around the band and tight from the shoulders to the under the bust. I am at least a 36 band size and long from shoulder to under the bust. The 10 was a little big and a little baggy in the bust as I'm an A cup, but not noticeable. I received lots of compliments and the colors were beautiful. Lining and lace were comfy

links_reviews_title: Many compliments received, from family, friends, and compete strangers!
links_reviews_text: I am 5'4" and 145lbs with 34DDD cup size and the size 8 fit very well. The zipper was a bit sticky so it took me a while to zip up and take off the dress.
Fit perfectly, could wear a strapless bra with no problem; Fabric was super breathable. Would rent again!

This dress was great for derby day - it went perfectly with my hat. It's special and fun. I went back and forth between the 6 and 8 - settling on the 6 as the top fit better. I wish it was 1 to 2 inches longer, at 5'7" this was as short as I can go. Overall loved it!

Wore this dress to a charity event. I usually wear a 4 but because other reviews said the waistband was tight and inflexible, I went up a size. The dress was very comfortable and looked great. I received several compliments.

links_reviews_title: I loved how the colors in this dress popped
links_reviews_text: This dress fit great but was a little loose in the bust. I partied this dress with the jacket from RTR as well as a fuchsia clutch from RTR. I felt great in this ensemble from RTR!! Definitely would rent again.

links_reviews_title: I felt great in this dress.
links_reviews_text: The sizing seemed a little on the small side, fortunately my back up was one size bigger than I thought I needed. The dress looked like a high quality product. I felt classy yet dressed for the occasion, a rustic-glam wedding.

links_reviews_title: Liked it! Great fit and quality
links_reviews_text: Cute! Was happy to have this one
Size 4 fit beautifully. This is a comfortable dress, too. I wore it to a rehearsal dinner and enjoyed it very much. I'm a bit over 5'4", 117 lbs (well, maybe more now!!!!), 34 D.
Ordered the 6 and 8 and wore the 8 - the lace pulled weirdly across the front when the dress was together. Overall loved it, comfy and unique

links_reviews_title: Dress was good quality and unique
links_reviews_text: Fitted in the chest but not at all restrictive and overall true to size.

links_reviews_title: Great dress - got so many compliments!
links_reviews_text: Got this dress as an emergency backup as my originals were not able to be shipped. Loved it - got so many compliments. Was very comfortable. I'm usually a 12 but ordered a size up just in case and it was a little loose up top but you couldn't tell. Love the color and style!
Beautiful colors, so comfortable & many compliments! I wore this with fun magenta earrings & strappy sandals. I would definitely recommend this dress!

The dress wasn't too short. The dress was true to size although it fit a little big on top because I am not top heavy. The lace detail was very pretty and gives the dress a more elegant touch. I was comfortable and felt the dress was forgiving around the stomach area. I would recommend this dress and rent it again.
Tons of compliments

links_reviews_title: Very complimenting fit, color, and length
links_reviews_text: This dress was extremely comfortable and very true to size. I received so many compliments, and it was a perfect dress for the non-formal wedding reception we attended. I am very fair-skinned, so the colors were perfect for that! I wasn't embarrassed to be the only one without a tan ;)

I normally wear a size 6 but the size 4 looked better (probably because I have a smaller chest- B cup). The dress was comfortable and photographed really well. Lots of compliments. Would highly recommend renting this dress.

Gorgeous embroidered lace on this dress. The color is vibrant and really stands out; it looks unique and expensive. I rented for an Indian wedding and didn‚Äôt feel out of place among all the intricate and detailed saris. There is no stretch and the waist was a little tight on me in size 2, but I still have some post-baby weight. I felt a little uncomfortable at the end of a long night, but size 4 was too loose in the bodice and unflattering. Good length and proportion for petites.
The fit was perfect. Details gorgeous. I'm 5'5" - hit right above the knee. Loved it!

I was looking for a dress that was elegant yet made me feel young and beautiful for my sons wedding. This dress did just that. Great quality and great fit! This exact dress has a bit of a sticky zipper but all in all it was perfect.

This dress was nice. I got the 4 since that was what was in stock, but a 2 (my usual size) would have been better. The dress is true to the picture, but not one of my favorites I ever rented - no huge wow factor in my opinion
This is a very pretty dress, perfect for a summer wedding. It was a little more form fitting than I was expecting but I still enjoyed wearing it. Received many compliments!

I loved this dress! I was nervous to rent my normal sizes after reading reviews, but it fit great! I'm normally either a 2 or 4 depending on the dress. I opted to wear the 2 as it fit better around my waist. It was a little tight in the armpits but it wasn't apparent nor did it bother me. Great dress!

links_reviews_title: I rented this for my husband's white coat ceremony for Chiropractic school. It was perfect!
links_reviews_text: Fit well everywhere. I am a B cup, and I would think that if you were anymore than a C cup, the bust area would be tight.
Fit nicely, beautiful colors. Received lots of compliments.

I wore this for my bridal tea and it was perfect look. There is just enough flare to make fun for a tea party without making me feel like a cupcake. The lace doesn't have a lot of give but it does run true to size. The middle band is not lined but is a thicker lace so it was still appropriate for my more conservative family.

Dress embroidery and color are even prettier in person. The fit was very comfortable but the embroidery is itchy anywhere there isn't lining behind it. So your shoulders might get a bit itchy and also your legs when sitting down. For me the bust area was too loose and not flattering. It was still a beautiful dress and I wore it out to a nice lunch with my family. Would probably not rent this again.

So the blouse is beautiful in idea and overall design but the execution is just downright oddly constructed and poorly fitted. I was able to throw on and be on a video conference but it wouldn't zip even though I ordered a size bigger than usual. The cross back zipper makes it a top you will definitely need someone else to help get you into. I'm tempted to order 2-3 sizes bigger and try again.

I loved this top! All the reviews are spot on about the fit. It is tight through the shoulders but not uncomfortable. I received tons of compliments. It's definitely a statement! One of my fav rentals so far! Loved it!
This is a unique top. I really liked it. But it's cut super tight across the back, but seemingly normal elsewhere. Couldn't zip it up. Felt like being caught up in a straight jacket.

I really wanted this to work. I love the idea behind it, but I'm cringing at the pictures looking back:( Just as others mentioned it does have an odd fit at the shoulder. It's very narrow in the shoulders and it keeps it from laying nicely. It also is SUPER tight at the breasts, I would not recommend it for anyone > C cup. I was struggling and I think in turn it made my breast look very awkward.

I could not get the neck to lay against my neck and the tag would not stay down. Reviews were correct that said this isn't for larger chested women. The fit was so weird, I couldn't wear it without something over it.
It was hard to zip up

Thought this top was really cool on the website. I ordered a size 4, my usual size in tops. It was really tight around the chest and I couldn't wear a bra which was fine but I'm a 36B so someone with a bigger chest might feel really restricted. The arms were really long (covered my hands) and the asymmetrical neckline made it difficult to move your arms. I loved the knot front and side slit but this top was just too hard to actually wear.

Really liked this shirt but it's definitely tough to get to sit right. The back of the neck gaped a bit. Also, the slit up the side went pretty high, so you need to wear high waisted pants oh wearing it to work in order to avoid flashing some mid-drift. Overall, liked it though. A stylish take on a traditional item.

I wore this to work on casual day and loved the look. Like the other reviews though it was constricting through the shoulders. Also the back where the tag is kind of stood up so you could see the tags all day.

I love this stylish top. The photo shows it with jeans but I ended up wearing it with black leggings and black wedge booties. It was true to size but it's hard to zip by yourself. It feels tight across the back and a little constricting, but I would definitely rent it over and over. I got a million compliments when I wore it.

Since this arrived with tags on and zero reviews I felt an obligation to help my fellow fashionistas out! I have an hourglass shape and wore this top with a strapless bra. It was uncomfortably tight in the bust and shoulders. Memorable with an interesting silhouette. Would look great on a lean girl!

links_reviews_title: I really wanted this to work
links_reviews_text: I love funky food like this and really wanted it to work. But not only was it a really odd cut, it was also incredibly restrictive: it was so that across the shoulders I couldn't zip it all the way up. Such a bummer...
Unique but not particularly comfortable or easy fit. Wouldn't wear again.

links_reviews_title: beautiful blouse, I got so many compliments. I would definitely order it again.
links_reviews_text: the fit is tight in the arms and breast area.

links_reviews_title: Love the unique cut - very flattering
links_reviews_text: Hard to zip up without assistance but worth it. It fits like a glove and dresses up or down
the fit of this shirt was so strange i can't definitively say if it ran large or small i just knew there was no way in hell i was wearing it in public.

links_reviews_title: Runs small! Had so much potential though
links_reviews_text: Definitely runs small. Even taking it out of the bag, my 12 looked more like an 8. Maybe I could have gotten away with it if I had smaller boobs? Unsure but super cute top, sad I couldn't wear it to the boat party I wanted to!
Love the fabric, the print and the unusual style, however, it does not fit well in the neck or breast area
bought a 6 then an 8 to size up and still could not get this to my shoulder, get concept but execution was a problem at least on me. I really wanted it to work I love an asymmetrical top

links_reviews_title: Asymmetrical look went too far it wouldn't even fall on me correctly
links_reviews_text: Terrible

links_reviews_title: So many compliments at a networking function.
links_reviews_text: Pros: easy fabric, sleeves add drama but don't get in the way, slimming at torso for my figure Cons: tag area at the nape of the neck kept drooping. I pinned the shoulder together to take care of the extra fabric and to keep the neckline from falling backwards in the back, which worked okay.
The off the shoulder fit wasn't exactly right. The tag kept standing up.

I needed a size 6 as I have broad shoulders and it was tight bit fit well in the body. I love the color and that it was unique and different from other shirts. It is extremely flattering. I will order again but in a size 6.

It was not fitting properly and that's a bummer since I loved the design. And there was a rip at the bottom of a zipper :( If items will be coming in this kind of shape it's just a waste of my time and money!
strange fit, tight in bust
I couldn't wear the top, in large part because I couldn't get it zipped up by myself! Troubles of being a gal living alone!! Would've been adorable had I been able to zip it.

links_reviews_title: Lovely piece, but not could not wear it.
links_reviews_text: The fit was wrong for my body type. Sleeves were too long while shoulders too narrow.

links_reviews_title: I am usually a 8/10 - rented the 10 and it looked like a 4! So tiny
links_reviews_text: Runs shockingly small
Flattering cut (eat as much as you want and still feel stylish!), lots of compliments, the cut on the neck is a little weird and didn't fit me perfectly, but overall didn't look bad.

It is really a cool shirt, but also very inconvenient. The sleeves get in the way of most things, even after i pinned them up. The neck line is has a very interesting structural look, if it stays in place. The shirt is more interesting in person and I thought it was flattering. Definitely a statement piece, but generally between the sleeves, the small shoulders that ride up, and the back of the neck that folds over, it is a pain. Good for a rental, not to own.
Very flattering love the puffy long sleeves
