This shirt is so cool, but fits soooo odd. I wore a 6 once, then an 8 next time and a 12 this time, and honestly all three fit odd. Shoulders are beyond small, narrow bust, something is just off with this design and fit. But it is cute if you are super narrow shoulders and small bust or can just stand feeling slightly uncomfortable all day.
This fit at the shoulder weird. It was too big in the back. It was awkward when I moved my arms.

I should have listened to reviewers who largely reported that this shirt was not cut well. It's a phenomenal concept, but the execution is incredibly poor. The proportions are terrible: it's very tight through the shoulders and chest, and this is not because I have an especially large bust or any other proportions that would explain why a garment fit here but not there etc. If the picture of the model wasn't a still, I have a feeling even she would look bad in this.

links_reviews_title: I really wanted to love this shirt
links_reviews_text: I really really wanted to love this shirt. I rented it for work. It fit well around my waist and chest, but the sleeve length was way too long. And the slit up the side showed part of my torso and I didn't feel comfortable wearing it to work.
Could not wear because the top of the arm was too tight and the sleeves way too long for me.
If you have a large bust, go up a size or two. I normally wear an 6/8...but went up to a 10 because of the girls and the shirt was still tricky across the bust.
Runs a bit small
So cute, but runs VERY small.

This was definitely fine size-wise. The fit was just awkward. The sleeves were long and different too, which is different for me to complain about because I typically love longer sleeves. Just didn't work for me.

links_reviews_title: Beautiful dress for large chested women!
links_reviews_text: This dress was amazing!! It is one of only a few dresses that I can wear without a bra, and I also don't think it's a dress you can pull off if you have a small chest. Be prepared to have everyone staring at the girls, because they are out there in full force! Ha! But it's seriously gorgeous, luxurious fabric that can only be truly appreciated in person. Plus it has pockets!! Definitely size up if you're in between or unsure.

WFH renting continues... This gown is absolute knockout stunner: gorgeous deep color, rich fabric, incredibly flattering fit. I typically wear a size 4 but the 2 fit great. The length was perfect and just skimmed the floor. I worried that the cups would gape without an undergarment (I'm only just a 32B), but they fit great. And it has pockets. It's literally the perfect dress.

This was a dress overnighted to me because my first choice got damaged by the previous renter. I did not like this dress but since the event I was going to was such a massive event- everything EVERYTHING ELSE- was sold out in my size. So I didn't have much of a choice. Surprisingly, I loved it. You do need to buy the sticky boob covers off amazon because it drops so low in the chest your bra will show. Through the night it stretched a bit and I felt I should have gotten a 2L instead.

I rented 4 different dresses for prom, I didn't wear this one but it is beautiful! Very true to size. I am 5'7 with heels on in the picture and the length was perfect. It fit a little loose in the chest and I'm a 34C. Would rent again for a formal event in the winter

links_reviews_title: Great pick for black tie event
links_reviews_text: Very glamorous and elegant, received so many compliments

I am 5'7" 160 lbs and 34B/C. This dress fit perfectly! I did use petals (should've done the Gaffers tape) & body tape to be sure not to flash anyone during the night. I wore 2" heels & definitely preferred the Long over the Reg length. Even able to dance, though the bottom slightly hit the floor. It's a beautiful deep purple color (NOT burgundy). The pockets were great for my phone. I was nervous about the low cut but it was lovely. Lots of compliments!

I loved this dress! It fit me so well. I have a rather small bust so keep that in mind. 36a/b but there was room in the cups for small chicken cutlets if you need them... lol. The waist fit but you should know the zipper was a bit hard to manage. Just keep pulling and it should work. I loved it!

links_reviews_title: So many compliments and very flattering!
links_reviews_text: I ordered this one last minute because the one that I was supposed to get, did not get returned in time. They only had a 2L when I'd feel more comfortable with a 0 or 2R. Went for it anyways and it was so long because I'm only 5 2. But I also had shoes to make it work! Other than that the straps were a bit long for me so they kept falling off but I didn't really mind, it just made me check my posture. Very pretty neckline and just the perfect amount of poof in the skirt. Rent this dress!!

Comfortable and easy to wear - this dress didn't require spanx. I wore no bra (sticky boobs) - or else the band around the ribs would've been tight. I had on 3" heels (2L)... and it has usable pockets!!! I received so many compliments from women on the color and the style. Double sided tape may have come in handy, but I forgot - so I just made sure I didn't slouch. Great dress!

links_reviews_title: This dress fit me very well and I'm usually a petite.
links_reviews_text: Fit was perfect, including length. It does dip down quite low in front and my bra showed a tad but I am pretty much an A-B cup so it might fit someone else differently. Loved the pockets. I felt great all night long.
I didn't realize I selected long, but with a nice chunky heel it fit like a glove! So many compliments especially when my hands were in the pockets! Perfect for a gala!

links_reviews_title: Just perfect for a White Tie event.
links_reviews_text: Pockets made it relaxed and cool.

links_reviews_title: It was fun to dress up in a beautiful, fancy and comfortable dress.
links_reviews_text: This was my first purchase from RMR and I was very pleased. This dress was BEAUTIFUL and perfect for a formal, but snowy and chilly January wedding. I'm 5'8 so I'm relieved that I ordered the long. The v-neck is very low, but tasteful. I would recommend buying fashion tape to secure both sides of the dress. The zipper was a little questionable, but it did zip with assistance. I didn't wear a bra, but purchased from amazon the silicone breast lift pasties with lift tape, which worked all night. I received compliments all night.
Gorgeous dress, but not suited for my figure. I needed the 12 in length and shoulders, the 14 in the waist, and the 16 for the top inch of the zipper.

This was a back up I had to decide on last minute because my first order was sent in the wrong size twice! Thankfully it fit wonderfully. I'm almost 5'9 & the reg length just grazed the floor with flats. The detail on the dress is beautiful. My chest is smaller so I'd recommend tape if you cannot fill it. It's snug around the rib cage so if you have a larger rib cage I would size up! Very flattering in the midsection area. I would rent again!

links_reviews_title: Beautiful Dress, Quick Shipping & Great Accommodation!
links_reviews_text: I loved wearing this dress! I was comfortable all night and I felt beautiful and elegant. It displayed a bit more cleavage than I was comfortable showing at the wedding I attended, but I just wore a body suit underneath for an easy fix. I had also had an issue with incorrect sizing (my error - not RTR's), but RTR came through and shipped me two replacements at no extra cost that came in when they said they would even though it was the day after Christmas. I will definitely be ordering again!

links_reviews_title: Beautiful and unique plum color! Lots of volume in dress
links_reviews_text: I am 5'6" and 116 with a size A / B chest and the 0R fit perfectly and graced the ground with my 4" heels. This dress dipped down into a lower "v" than I was expecting, but going braless made it feel more classy than if I added additional padding. The bottom of the dress was very voluminous and worked perfectly for the white tie affair!

This dress fit me like a glove. Received compliments all night, it was easy to dance in, and I wish I could have worn it forever! I would have purchased it if it were cheaper but overall I'm so happy with this rental and will definitely rent it again if I have another party like this to attend!

links_reviews_title: Honestly I got compliments on it all night! I'm pretty sure I won best dressed.
links_reviews_text: It fit absolutely perfectly! It also gave my size C/D bust the perfect lift! I did not need any tape or silicone covering because it just fit so perfectly. The dress has pockets! I was able to keep my phone and lipgloss on me all night which is such an underrated treat. Going to the restroom made me feel like Cinderella. You have to be careful and lift the whole dress. You can't go wrong with it!

links_reviews_title: Such a beautiful dress for a formal event!!
links_reviews_text: This dress is so much more beautiful on, then on the hanger! I would say it does run pretty small in the chest and rib area. I wore 5 inch heels and the length was perfect. It also is thick! I wore this in 50 degree weather and was starting to sweat!

This dress fit like a glove. It wasn't heavy, didn't weight me down, nor feel too big and puffy. I still felt gorgeous, however, and perfectly outfitted for the black tie occasion. I would highly recommend this dress!

Wore this to a non-profit gala, where my husband and I were getting a recognition. The top was slightly "gappy" (fabric tape might have helped if I had some), but overall a beautiful dress. The plum color and fabric is high quality and stunning. I felt like a princess and got lots of compliments.

links_reviews_title: Beautiful dress - felt amazing and received so many compliments.
links_reviews_text: Gorgeous thick fabric with a nice texture. A bit of crinoline for body. Low cut in front so i recommend standing straight and a bit of double-sided tape.

links_reviews_title: I love the way my husband looked at me all night
links_reviews_text: This dress was extremely flattering! I wear a size 6 jeans, but ended up wearing the size 8 dress, and it still kind of smooshed my rib cage. The good part was it created some lovely cleavage I don't usually enjoy! I also did not need a bra because of the thick fabric (and it was a cold night!). I loved the pockets for walking around the party with my phone nearby. And the flare of the skirt was just right on my pouchy stomach. I felt like a princess.

Loved this dress. Fabric is heavy so great for winter event and I adore anything with pockets. Why this isn't a 5-Star: I'm 5'5" and got a size 2 and it was waaaaay too long. Even in outrageous heels. So I had to pick it up all night long.

I'm 5'7, 198lbs, 38E, and usually wear 14. This dress highlighted all the right parts of my body and hit my waist perfectly, accentuating my curves. Although, it looks like I may fall out of the dress, I was very secure, and had no issues.

I honestly should have sized up. I miss judged my postpartum body. If I had gone with the 10 it would've been slightly loose in the chest area but would have fit better around my ribs. Other than the sizing, the dress was incredible. I got many many compliments on it. I would definitely rent the dress again.

links_reviews_title: A dress with pockets should be a given
links_reviews_text: I loved how this dress fit!! It felt so good and I loved that it had pockets! It was very comfortable and even with my small chest it looked great on me and it was big just like I liked it. It was perfect for my work gala and everyone loved it!

This dress is AMAZING. Definitely chesty but I adore it. I am 5'9", 180lbs , 36DD. I rented a 14L but I could have sized down to a 12L (my regular size). I had a recent injury and I've gained some weight so I sized up to ensure the dress would fit. The 14L is a hair longer than floor length with no shoes. With small heels it was the perfect length. I was so comfortable the whole evening, ate a ton at the buffet with no insecurities of my belly because the dress hides it great.

This dress was a blast to wear to a masquerade charity ball I attended. The dress has pockets! And let's be honest, who doesn't love pockets? I wore a 10L and it was a bit snug even as my back up size, so I would definitely consider sizing up. The cut was a little more daring than I'm used to, but it still looked pretty classy. Loved this dress! And given a chance I'd be thrilled to rent it again.

the dress was super comfortable! i didn't have to carry a clutch because the pockets were so deep. i fit 2 pairs of slippers, phone, wallet, and lip gloss! the top was a bit loose on me, but even without wearing a bra, i didn't have any 'incidents'.

links_reviews_title: Loved this dress! Classy and simple
links_reviews_text: I loved this dress and received so many compliments. It fit perfectly and was very comfortable. Loved that it had pockets. I felt like a princess. I also thought it had the perfect balance of showing cleavage without being trashy or too much. Would definitely rent again!

I had a pretty formal graduation party. I wanted a purple dress as that's the color of alma mater and this dress color was perfect. It has pockets!! Fits really well at the waist, shoulders, and bust. The skirt is very full but not heavy. It was long on me but I'm short. Really liked it.

I‚Äôm 5‚Äô6‚Äù and 165 lbs, and the 10L fit me right with nearly 4‚Äù heels. The zipper isn‚Äôt easy to zip, so have patience. I used lots of tape to keep it from gapping since I‚Äôm pretty short-waisted. Even with the very low neckline, it was a very elegant choice that got me lots of compliments at our gala dinner. Beautiful material, and a nice alternative to black!

links_reviews_title: This dress is magical!! PERFECT for my husbands USAF ball. I‚Äôve never gotten more complements. ‚ô•Ô∏è
links_reviews_text: I wore this yesterday to my husband military ball and it was, hands down, the most beautiful dress there. I had at least 10 ladies walk up and tell me it was stunning. We live in Hawaii and it was warm outside and the event was at a beach-side venue, but the dress was lightweight and I didn‚Äôt ever get hot. And the girls.. the girls were perfectly perked up, but still classy. I didn‚Äôt use tape and didn‚Äôt wear a bra.. everything was snug and contained (I‚Äôm a 34DD). I literally can‚Äôt say enough good things about this gown. ALSO, IT HAS POCKETS!! The whole night I had my lipstick and my phone safe and sound while we danced the night away. I added a second tulle petticoat for extra ‚Äúpoof‚Äù and that gave it the perfect ball gown look.
Gorgeous!!!! The material is not too heavy and very rich looking. And pockets. I mean, it was perfect!

links_reviews_title: Another winning rental from Monique Lhuillier :)
links_reviews_text: For reference, I'm ~5'10", 36 D, and 190 lbs. I'm a 12R in ML dresses. I don't typically play the heel game and was able to wear flats with this dress allowing the hem to fall at a perfect height. Beautiful material that holds its structure nicely throughout the night - it's a bit heavy and can get a little warm when bustin' some moves on the dance floor, but it's worth the wear regardless. I chose to forego the bra with this dress, and I will say that for any of my fellow well endowed ladies on top...this dress is definitely va-va-voom-y. If you aren't comfortable with the cleave, this dress isn't for you. All in all, this dress is a classic...fun to wear, comfortable, flattering to the figure, and will get you compliments all night long. P.S. If you're looking to add some fun flair, I paired it with the NOCTURNE Parure Lapis earrings and they were a great accent to this dress.

Finally got a rental with a size that fit! I'm usually a size 10 in the real world. Couture world I'm a 14-16. XD No shame though. This dress was gorgeous! This was actually an overnighted replacement dress that was a different choice than I originally had. I got soooooo many compliments on this dress! It was a real stunner. I'm 5'2" and with heels the dress JUST touched the ground.

The dress fit wonderfully! I have a small busy so it was great to have a dress that made my girls look perky. It has pockets which is always a plus and the material was not so heavy it was uncomfortable at a summer wedding. I felt like a queen at a ball.

links_reviews_title: Loved this dress for this event
links_reviews_text: This dress was my backup but I loved it so much and it ended up being a perfect fit for the event I was attending. I typically wear a 16 and the 16 fit me snugly but comfortably. I wouldn‚Äôt wear this if you‚Äôre very flat chested or very busty. For me it worked well. Definitely no bra because it‚Äôs so low cut. But I taped my boobs up (ala Kim Kardashian) and got so many compliments. I held the straps in place on my shoulders with fashion tape. I went with the 16R even though I‚Äôm 5‚Äô9‚Äù because I knew I wanted to wear flats and it was the perfect length, just grazed the floor. I wore sparkly silver jewelry, gold would also look nice. I‚Äôm not sure I would wear this to a wedding or any place I planned to dance a lot, but for my specific event this dress was a winner.

links_reviews_title: Looks incredible but a little constricting
links_reviews_text: I wore this to a holiday party and concert afterwards. For a few hours at the party, this was awesome - the dress was beautiful, I got lots of compliments, and I felt great. But wearing it all night at the concert, the arm-holes felt constricting, the front was so tight it became uncomfortable, and sitting down wasn't the best. I know part of this is that I sized a 0 - I go between zero and two and I think it was meant for someone with a little less bust.

links_reviews_title: Loved the color and gave me curves
links_reviews_text: I wore this for a conference banquet and got lots of compliment.

Work this to a work event. It's fitted but thick, stretchy material so it was comfortable. The shoulder/arm area was a little baggy on me and I had to safety pin it so you couldn't see my bra. The neckline was beautiful though as was the color. I probably could have worn a 4, but that may have been a little too tight for a work thing.
I'm usually a 6 in dresses and this was just a touch tight. If you're between sizes, def size up. Great length for work!
Wore it for work. Lots of compliments... very snug but hugged my curves. Would rent again
Love the color & neckline detail. High quality material as usual by black halo. Fully lined.

links_reviews_title: This dress is hot (in a really classy way)
links_reviews_text: I felt so sexy, yet absolutely office-appropriate, in this dress. The neckline is gorgeous and can be worn with a regular bra. This is the perfect piece for a workday followed by a date or time spent with friends. It looks super expensive and chic. I lived this green color and hope to try out the same dress in black sometime in the future! Come check out all of my rentals and outfits on my YouTube Channel- I also talk tips and tricks for RTR. Channel Name: Pointe Boutique

I love this dress. By far my favorite rental so far. The fit was amazing for an hourglass shape. It fit like a glove and showed off my figure amazingly. I felt so good wearing this dress. The color is amazing. I'm definitely going to rent this dress again and again.

links_reviews_title: This dress fit like a glove! Incredible material, feels expensive. Great length.
links_reviews_text: Love the fit and quality of this dress! I rented it intending to wear it to work, but ended up wearing it on Mother's Day. I got the ultimate compliment: approval from my mother that I looked nice!

links_reviews_title: This was an excellent choice for a professional formal affair.
links_reviews_text: The sheath style looks excellent if you are wearing the appropriate shapewear. I am normally a true size 8 but went up to the 10 to give my thighs more room and less pull lines when posing for pictures. The collar and neckline is structured enough to stay in place, but looks relaxed and classy. I received many compliments on this dress! I wore it with a simple gold chain necklace that accented the color well.

links_reviews_title: Great work dress - amazing color and cut
links_reviews_text: Comfortably fitted dress in unique cut. Sized up as others recommended and this worked well.
fits great true to size. perfect for bridal shower

This dress is one of my favorites that I've worn. It's very figure flattering and the neckline makes it a little more interesting. The color is a dark hunter green that's still feminine. The fabric is comfortable and it sat well; I didn't spend the day pulling the dress back into place.

links_reviews_title: Not a fan of the stretch!
links_reviews_text: The spandex in the material makes the dress look cheap and a little scandalous. Not appropriate for work event. Felt like a kardashian.

This is an interesting style and would be great for work but I found it was just too small. I sized up and was still uncomfortable with how fitted it was. Perhaps going up 2 sizes would work better, although I fear the top would be too large. A miss!

links_reviews_title: This was sent as a back up dress when not much else was available last minute on a holiday weekend.
links_reviews_text: This is a winter dress. I live in South Florida....I am 5'8 but the length was still a little too far past my knees and it was a bit dowdy. I did not wear it. The fit was not great, it was not sexy and the material was way too thick for outdoor S. Florida party.
The dress is beautiful and an amazing green color. The neckline is exceptional. Would have worn it however it was just too snug. Make sure you size up~

links_reviews_title: Great dress. The neckline was not as flattering on me as I had hoped. Great Color
links_reviews_text: Good fit. Great color

links_reviews_title: Ladies with hips need not apply
links_reviews_text: The dress was great in every respect - color, quality, and draping - except around my hourglass hips. I feared I was going to burst a seam if I moved. I will envy any slender girl I see in this dress because it really is exquisite.

links_reviews_title: Gorgeous color. Good fit. Beautiful dress for a Fall Brunch in Texas bf it got cold.
links_reviews_text: LOVE THIS DRESS!!! Will rent again!

links_reviews_title: Was for Rosh Hashana, at synagogue and dinner at a friend's home. The color was the best!
links_reviews_text: I got comments all day wearing this color. As a redhead with green eyes, the color was wonderful for me. The dress was a little snug and I wanted the 8 but it wasn't available. Everyone said it ran small so I was not even sure I could zip the 6 but I did and it was worth wearing it. My bra showed slightly at the point in the front, so maybe an 8 would have shown more. I could not pin it as the it was pulling all over. Gorgeous dress and real quality fabric and feel. It is fully lined.
Runs small. As up if u don't want it form fitting. Great dress
Size 10 is usually a safe size for me across the board. This dress ran small. I sized up 2 sizes.

I borrowed this dress to wear for a business conference with cocktail reception. It has a gorgeous fit and color. The neckline is great and I was able to wear a normal bra. I find all Black Halo dresses to run about a size small. I'm size 6 95% of the time and almost always an 8 in Black Halo. Definitely would rent again!
Sliming, great color, perfect length for work
Very nice dress, comfortable and classy. The light is perfect but runs small. I read the previous reviews and ordered 2 sizes bigger and it was perfect.
This is a beautiful dress. I don't think you can look bad in it...unless you are 6 ft. Tall, then everything is in the wrong place and too high. Runs big. Size down.
Runs small. Probably a little tight for work unless you size up. Gorgeous color and cut.
Too tight
Great dress. Am a big Black Halo fan. In terms of sizing, I'm a 14 generally (in Ann Taylor and Banana Republic most times, occasionally a 16 in BR though) and I'm always a 16 in Black Halo.

Great work dress! It's very flattering and with the neckline it's got a little bit of edge. I've rented this dress in black as well. Black Halo usually runs a little small for me (could be bc I'm curvy) so I sized up (I'm usually an 8). Definitely recommend!
fabric is nice fit hangs nice

The curves in the dress just didn't fit the curves in my body. Sad, because it is a beautiful dress and I really wanted it to fit -- but it was loose and tight in all the wrong places for how I am shaped.

links_reviews_title: Great jade color, classic silhouette, sexy-but-not-too-sexy neckline
links_reviews_text: Loved the neckline detail. Perfect fit on the bodice, the skirt was a touch too tight around the hips (but the 12 was too big)

links_reviews_title: Fits very well if you have a small upper half and bigger bottom.
links_reviews_text: For me the fit was perfect. I have a big butt, small waist, and boobs (my upper body is smaller than lower body)
TTS, interesting neckline
Great work dress. Memorable neckline. Would be an interesting choice for a professional headshot if you didn't want to wear a suit. Great for redheads.

links_reviews_title: Runs small and long but it's a lovely dress
links_reviews_text: Great material, lovely color and really interesting neckline. I rented a size up based on the comments that it ran small and I'm glad I did.
The color and cut are really nice for the office. I had several compliments. The hem is a little long on a petite frame, hitting just below my knee, but it looked great with heels.

links_reviews_title: Didn't end up wearing out of the house.
links_reviews_text: Too tight for work, I loved the color and collar.
This dress is a definite head turner. It has a very comfortable fit, as it has give and stretch to it. It definitely is short, however at 5'3, it was okay for me. Got so many compliments!
This dress made everyone turn heads. Very pretty and a gorgeous shade of pink sequence.

links_reviews_title: Awkward fit but SO cute!!! The chest was tight (I'm a 32DDD) but the waist was baggy (hence the bag)
links_reviews_text: Super comfy, super fun! I would've sized down if my boobs would fit in there but they barely fit in this size lol. Doll super fun though
Cute mini dress! Color is great, sequence is comfortable. No arm scratches. Didn't need to pull up the dress all night or anything! Would recommend

links_reviews_title: The color was one of a kind!! Show stopping!
links_reviews_text: I loved the fit of this dress! It stayed up perfectly and hugged my body! It was also very comfortable. The sequins easily flipped over which was a little annoying ,but I loved the color so much that it didn't bother me that much!
This would be super cute on someone shorter. I'm 5'11 and my cheeks were hanging out.

links_reviews_title: Beautiful color! All eyes on you
links_reviews_text: Pretty short but true to size, I should have gotten a size 4 for a tighter fit but the 6 was comfortable. Paired with leather jacket

I was worried it was going to be too big but it worked out great in my normal size. The top has sticky stuff that helps the top stay up. Even though I thought it was a little big it still worked and I didn't have to pull it up all night. Felt like a million bucks in this dress. Compliments galore!!! It wasn't too much either in terms of the color. I loved it! I turned 40 in this dress and felt young and sexy still!!!

links_reviews_title: NYE standout in a sea of black sparkles!
links_reviews_text: Short. I wore black Spanx-like boy shorts underneath. The top stayed up really well and no bra or pasties were needed. Super fun! I would rent again.

This was one of my favorite rentals! So sparkly and fun! I felt like a princess! I wore it for my birthday. I got so many compliments. It felt a little big. I'm usually between a 6/8 and the 6 was even loose, especially in the top. I had to keep pulling it up. It's also really short, but not too short to wear. I would pick your true size and size down for back up. It was comfortable and I would recommend and rent again!
Loved this dress. It fit great and it was soo fun to wear!!

I rented this for an 80s prom murder mystery and it did not disappoint. I received compliments all night long. The dress is very comfortable. I would have liked it to be a little more form fitting but it wasn't falling down so it fits pretty true to size.

I rented the dress for my birthday and loved ittt!! It was shorter than it looked on the model which was ok with me. I hated that I kept having to smooth the dress out but nevertheless it fit amazingly,

Night out in Vegas for Cardi! This dress was SO flattering! I haven't worn a strapless dress in a while but this fit beautifully and stayed up all Night without me pulling it up multiple times. I have a smaller waist and it accentuated it without being too tight. Very comfortable for over 10 hours. The sequins did start hurting a little towards the end of the night but WORTH it!

My husband got a last minute invite to a gala fundraiser, and the only guidance they gave on the dress code was that it was James Bond-themed. What exactly does that mean, and how do I come up with an outfit with less than a week's notice?? Rent the Runway to the rescue! In my mind, Bond Girl = sequins, so I went for this pink sequined Jay Godfrey number. One cool thing about this dress (that you can't really see from the model photos) is that the sequins kind of "swish" back and forth and make a cool design/texture. Only a size 0 was left and I was concerned about it being a tight fit based on previously Jay Godfrey rentals, however the 0 fit me fine and actually felt more like a 2. The size 0 was very short, however, so that is something to consider. This probably wasn't my favorite rental, but it did the trick on short notice!
I'm 5'4", 118lbs. Got the 2 and 4. Wore the 2 but it did fit a little loose on the bottom half but I'm pretty straight for body type. It was comfortable to wear for 6+ hours!

links_reviews_title: Super fun and sparkly. Perfect for a fun night out.
links_reviews_text: Runs a little large. I would size down.

links_reviews_title: This dress was stunning!!! All eyes on me the whole night and I received a ton of compliments!
links_reviews_text: Okayyyy, this dress was amazing! I usually wear a size 4 (27 in jeans), but I ended up wearing my back up size 2 because the 4 was wayyy too baggy for my liking. Actually, I wished I‚Äôd gotten a size 0 just so that it fit like a glove! I loved this dress. Yes, it was short but I didn‚Äôt mind at all. It‚Äôs a very attention-grabbing dress so get ready to have the spotlight on you. And, yes, the sequins did flip back and forth, but I didn‚Äôt mind at all. I wore this to my birthday dinner and everyone loved it! By the way, I am 5‚Äô2‚Äù, 130 pounds, and a size 34C (I wore a strapless bra with this but I didn‚Äôt have to pull at the top of the dress to keep it up).

links_reviews_title: Wore this dress for my birthday! Loved it so much!
links_reviews_text: Loved everything about this dress! Fits true to size! Would recommend to everyone!

Loved the bright pink color! This dress is an attention-grabber. It's sexy. Perfect for the club. I classed it up With a floral blazer since I was going to dinner first but after the restaurant, I took it off.

links_reviews_title: Such a fun dress for my bachelorette!
links_reviews_text: True to size, very stretchy/ comfortable to wear.

links_reviews_title: This dress is super cute. The sequins are amazing. If they are down the dress is pink, up purple.
links_reviews_text: I wore the size 2. This dress was short on me and I am 5'0. This fabric does not have a lot of structure, it clings to you. Overall a great dress, I just prefer more structure/shape in my dresses. Tons of compliments on it.
This dress is pink pink PINK! Fit was spot on except a little tight in the bust. With the right undergarments, however, it was no problem. I got tons of compliments and felt amazing.

links_reviews_title: The color is beautiful and the sequins give it an extra pop!! So fun for my bday
links_reviews_text: Loved this dress! I got the 10 and 12, and ended up picking the 12 for the length. The 10 fit better in my chest area, but 12 was fine with a strapless bra. Wore to a casino to celebrate my bday! So fun and I got compliments all night long!!

Slightly darker color than pictured but I loved anyway, great for an 80's themed benefit. Fit my 34A bust and 27"hips but a little baggy in the middle (even though I'm athletic and am straight waisted..so I normally need things a little larger in that section)
The dress is stunning but runs larger so I wish I got a smaller size.
Bright, comfortable, and fun although a little scratchy on the inner arms like most sequined dresses. Plenty of room in the waist and hips. Wore a stick-on bra. I'm 5'4", 125lbs, 32D.

links_reviews_title: The pink color of this dress made me stand out among everyone at the formal
links_reviews_text: I normally wear a 0 but this one has about 3 inches extra that i could have pinned back if able to. Other than the fit this dress was a hit at my sorority's formal! Everyone loved the bright pink and sequins and wanted to feel the dress all night.

links_reviews_title: Sexy and comfortable! Mini but doesn't ride.
links_reviews_text: I have 34G and hip, wear and 8 usually but the 6 was perfect. The stomach can be loose.
Fit was tight, but not too tight. Color is more purple than pink. The only problem was that I had to keep pulling it up all night. But it definitely stood out and I would rent again!
Fit true to a 0 and was comfortable and had a phenomenal color. Added neon orange stilettos to complete the look!

links_reviews_title: Wore this for a Valentine's Day sorority event and got compliments all night!
links_reviews_text: I'm 5'7 and it was very short on me but still worked for the event I was attending

links_reviews_title: Such a cute dress that goes with so many occasions.
links_reviews_text: Fit really well! A little loose around the hips, but was really flattering.

I can't tell you how many people came up to me and said they loved my dress! My friends said random people would be talking about it when I walked by. It was SUCH a fun dress. Very short, but I am also very tall. It's comfortable to dance in and I did not have to pull it up! Love this dress. (it says im 5'6, but im really 5'11)

links_reviews_title: Great color - Perfect for Valentines Day Party!
links_reviews_text: This dress is super cute and I got tons of compliments but it is VERYYYYY short. I usually wear a size 0 but had to go up a size because my butt was literally hanging out. This dress is more of a straight line and not as form fitting as it looks on the model. I have a fairly small chest so I had to fashion tape the dress to myself but overall, I'd say it was a success!
This dress is a standout and ton of fun! The circumference of the top was very tight, but the rest of it fit normally. I would size up if you have a bigger chest.

links_reviews_title: Rented part of Unlimited, didn't end up wearing it but super cute!
links_reviews_text: This dress is super cute and sparkly! Great pink color and perfect for bachelorette or Vegas etc. I got it as part of my RTR unlimited because it was so cute but didn't end up using it. Only a size 4 was available and while it fit, I probably could have worn a size 2 because the 4 was loose. It's a short dress too so keep in mind! But would be a great dress for a specific occasion!

links_reviews_title: Beautiful pink stood out at our post destination wedding party!
links_reviews_text: The fit was perfect but it is a heavy dress so I had to pin it to my strapless bra so it didn't slide down. Other than that, I got loads of compliments on it and it was great in pictures.

links_reviews_title: Rented this dress for a photo shoot for my blog, and it fit perfectly!
links_reviews_text: I'm a true size 2, and it fit true to size. Super sparkly and fun!

links_reviews_title: Me and my friend wore the 0 and 2. Everyone loved it.
links_reviews_text: It was so comfortable, everyone wanted to touch it cause the sequins went both ways on the dress. Got loads of compliments. A little more purple than the pictures let on but still great.

This was a fantastic outfit to watch the Saints game. All the compliments. Extremely high quality. Each of the sequence are perfectly stocked and sturdy. No weird strings or dangling cheap sequence. Also, surprisingly very warm!
I LOVED this jacket! Unfortunately I was planning on wearing it in Arizona and it is a very heavy jacket and would've been too much for the AZ heat.

Worn to a country western concert put on for a corporate event in Las Vegas, had just the right bling. I wore it unzipped and the fit was great. Especially nice that the sleeves were just the right length for a taller person. A quality piece all around for fit and appearance. So nice to hear positive comments about it from other guests.

Although I did not end up wearing this, I really did love it! I wish I could of rented it longer to get the chance to wear it. It was for my 21st birthday, so it felt a little bit too professional for the occasion. Beautiful jacket though!!
Fit as expected. Very festive but kinda warm for the start of spring/summer. The sequins change from black to silver when you wipe them up
I wore this to work and a happy hour in DC and got so many compliments! The sequins weren't itchy and the fit was perfect.
Very fun and flattering. Perfect for Vegas night out!
Super cute! Fun! Edgy!

This jacket is wonderful! It's beautifully lined so it's not itchy and the fit is perfect. The cut is incredibly flattering and feminine. I felt like a sparkly badass all day! I wore this for a brunch themed bar crawl event and got compliments everywhere! I am going to hate returning this beauty!

I rented this jacket for the JT concert, and it didn't disappoint. I received numerous compliments, and even had a stranger ask me for the specific brand. It was a hit! The size 4 was even a little big, which I didn't mind.

links_reviews_title: Lots of sparkle, light weight jacket
links_reviews_text: Loved this jacket. So easy to throw on for an event and could be worn formally or casually. Light enough that it's not too much to keep up with, but heavy enough to keep the wind chill out. The sequins can be pushed up and down for alternating silver and black looks.

links_reviews_title: I wore this New Year‚Äôs Eve and to the Sugar Bowl on New Year‚Äôs Day!!! Love Love Love it!
links_reviews_text: It runs true to size, people were stopping me and asking where I got it.

links_reviews_title: Very urban chic, a real attention getter.
links_reviews_text: You will turn heads and receive compliments from strangers in this one! Only reason I didn't give five stars was not super warm night in NYC (but it's made out of sequence so could I expect?) and the zipper was not easy to work.
Great jacket for a fun night out or date night. I wore it as a blazer. i has wished it was slightly more tailored, but overall was a great jacket.
Great fit. Amazing cut and was perfect to wear outdoors and continue inside.

links_reviews_title: Perfect special piece for date night
links_reviews_text: Went great with LBD. Dressed it up and made outfit fun. Would rent this again.
Amazing material and perfect with jeans or with this Theia Black Matte dress! Great quality and kept me warm the whole night.
This is definitely a head turner. Loved this jacket! Perfect for any high fashion event or just a fun night out.
Wore this for a party and got so many compliments. One fellow member couldn't believe it was from RTR!

links_reviews_title: Nice flair to the usual black dress
links_reviews_text: The jacket was a great spin on the usual simple black jacket. The sleeves also have zippers on them

links_reviews_title: super fun! it is not overhwelmingly sparkly but quite subtle and the cut is fantastic.
links_reviews_text: love it!
So so so cute! Perfect sassy jacket!

links_reviews_title: Wore to a concert, absolutely gorgeous jacket
links_reviews_text: I usually wear a size small but sized up to a medium (8) because I am 20 weeks pregnant. Gorgeous jacket, sequins are soft and not scratchy at all. Super cute with skinny jeans and a black tank. Loved this jacket.
Such a great jacket to pair with causal or dressy. A little smaller in the arms, but comfortable and a pretty sequin. Wore it with a black jumpsuit and was perfect to spice it up!

didn't like how the sequence had silver in patches. one on shoulder and one somewhere else i forget looked strange like it had been torn or damaged and they didn't have the correct color to fix it. I think this may have been the style but looked so odd.

I got this jacket as a free rental for another time being out of stock. Wow I can't wait to rent this again in the future! The shoulders are so chic and the cut is perfect. Do yourself a favor and make this jacket the perfect fun accessory to your next party!
This jacket was so much fun to wear! It is pretty heavy, and very warm. The zipper was also really rough. will totally rent again!
Fit perfect! Looked awesome the dress I ordered.
This jacket is super bulky and definitely ran big. Sleeves were too long and had an overall boxy look instead of the tailored fit I was going for. Definitely size down.
fit was ok, seemed a little big, could have gone down to a 10
Didn't end up liking the way it looked in person.
I loved this fun jacket, but wasn't able to wear it as the shoulders and upper arms were uncomfortably tight. Recommend sizing up if you have an athletic build.

links_reviews_title: You cant help but be in a festive mood when wearing this jacket. Perfect for a night out.
links_reviews_text: This beautiful jacket has a formal look but looks great dressed down with jeans too. Very well made. It is a little heavy from the sequins but not at all uncomfortable.
Super attractive jacket that can dress up anything
This jacket are for those nights when you want to be the center of attention, the life of the party. Now, if only I went out more often to warrant owning this jacket...

The jacket seems to be sized well, but I think the combo of silver sequins and gold zippers is a little weird. The sequins are very flippable, so you're always going to get some of the silver peeking through (which I think is cool, but again, cooler if the zipper was also silver).

links_reviews_title: This piece made me stand out!
links_reviews_text: Super well made and sexy. I sized up just in case but I think my normal size would have worked as well but it still looked stunning!
Little small in arms/shoulders

links_reviews_title: Paired it with black satin pants and heels for a cruise dinner. Loved it!
links_reviews_text: It does not open up at the bottom as the zipper zips from both ends. I'm a 36dd and it for great, just a little difficult to get off. No need for a tank or anything underneath and actually really comfortable.

First I will tell you there are no pictures because I rented this jacket as a PRE-DATE try on test run before my real date night with my boyfriend. Let me tell you, it is absolutely gorgeous. I cannot wait until my real date night comes in April when he is performing in NYC and I'll be joining him as his date at his performance. I'll be so proud to be on his arm and feeling like a million bucks wearing this amazing jacket. Updated review with pictures to follow!!!

I wore this dress to my company's annual meeting awards ceremony in Las Vegas. It was absolutely perfect! I received many compliments and felt super confident. The only complaint I have is the lining in the top, which is a bandeau. I wore a regular nude color bra, which was fine. I have a large busy and there was some under boob. It was very noticeable and did not change my love for the dress.
I wore a size up, but it still worked and was flattering,

links_reviews_title: This dress made me feel like a million bucks!
links_reviews_text: Rented this for my cousin's wedding. It was elegant yet casual. Got so many compliments!!! Would definitely rent again.

links_reviews_title: Great for hippy gals! I got compliments all night!
links_reviews_text: This was my first RTR rental and I loved this dress. I wore it to a wedding and got compliments all night. I'm quite hippy (like size 2/4 on top, and 6/8 on the bottom) and the medium worked perfectly for me. I wore a regular nude bra because you can't really see the straps through the lace. The top rode up a bit, some fashion tape helped, but it wasn't too noticeable. Overall great first rental!
Wore this to a work lunch and got so many compliments, it's tight in the bodice which I loved and flattering overall!

I was super comfortable wearing this dress to a wedding in New England at the end of Sept. The quality of the fabric was, of course, great and the body not too form fitting. Lots of material at the skirt made it great for eating whatever and dancing. Looks of compliments thanks to its uniqueness.

This dress was so cute and looked amazing. I loved it so much that I wore it twice for two separate book events. It's just so darling and so cute but still had a little edge to it. Just gorgeous. The only con is that the zipper was very difficult to maneuver. I had a tough time getting it up and down but besides that--- the best!

This dress is beautiful and classy. It fit well overall, at the waist for me it was def big but you couldn't notice. I wore it for a bridal shower and i got quite a few compliments. I would definitely rent this dress again.
Fabric is super thick and scratchy. I can't stress enough how horrible this dress is on a woman of my age. I had no business even trying this on!

Loved this dress - wish it fit! I rented this for a trip to Nashville. Based on reviews I rented a M. I am normally a 4 on top and 6 on the bottom. There is no way I could have gone smaller on the top - I am a full C and the band of material covered me perfectly. However the bottom area was huge! I am already hippy so I don't need more material. I would rent this again but I don't know if I could go smaller in the top? The quality though is amazing. Great colors and beautiful dress. Really bummed I couldn't wear it. Looks so cute on everyone else! Planned on wearing it with boots. It was a little short on me so would have looked great. Might try a S since I have an unlimited membership.

It is an amazingly made dress with a lot of embroidery and detail, making it feel a little bit like wearing a costume, in a good way. The skirt hangs very well, but the dress is tight around the chest, even at a size L. Didn't realise from the pictures that the ribs and upper abs are exposed under the top embroidered fabric which looks sexy, but makes it inappropriate for the office.
This was a compliment magnet! I could've went down a size but you couldn't tell because how much was going on! The dress is heavy.
The dress fit PERFECTLY. I'm a 6 and I wore a Medium. Got compliments all night. Even prettier in person than in the photos, thick material so no need for a bra! Loved the color! Will rent again

Wore this for a love-themed engagement party and it was perfect. The bra was a little tricky given the size of the light blue panel on the chest- definitely a little underboob action- but was not a huge issue. Surprisingly comfortable given the fabric. Size was perfect for me. Would rent again!

links_reviews_title: My huns finally realized why I do rtr. He approves of the dress.
links_reviews_text: Careful lifting arms as it will show your bra. But great fit. Classy cute and girly
You don't have to worry about wearing spanx! So flattering and fun. Highly recommend.

links_reviews_title: Cute but a little too conservative for my tastes
links_reviews_text: The dress is cute but more of a dress you wear to church. I was looking for something a bit on the sexier side. The boob area is a bit small. I'm a 34DD and it was pretty tight just on the boob area

I wore to work- it was amazing. Loved all the flattery I received all day long - photos do not do this dress justice - the ONLY issue I had was - since I didn't wear a bra with the dress- didn't think of wearing cups or strapless bra- lol- the more I moved - the more my breasts wished to slowly fall from the top position - so every few hours - I would adjust- no biggie for me- worth the fashion statement- but now that o reflect- could have been solved with cups or a strapless bra

links_reviews_title: Very well made dress. Really liked it
links_reviews_text: Wore for a Christmas party. Confortable and beautiful dress

It was so well-made and beautiful. I got so many compliments. The colors are so unique and easily make it an all-season dress. I didn't have to wear a bra with it because there was enough structure to it. However, as a 32DD, I did have to lift and readjust a few times. Luckily no wardrobe malfunctions! I wore nude ankle strap sandals which worked perfectly. I didn't want to part with it!

links_reviews_title: The dress was so unique flirty and fun!
links_reviews_text: #perfect
Super beautiful dress!

links_reviews_title: I loved this dress and got many compliments! Very comfortable too!
links_reviews_text: Fit was true to size, great length and comfortable! Lots of great feedback and would recommend it.

Wore to my sister's fall bridal shower. I felt great in it! The dress is such high quality and gorgeous material. I got compliments all day. The flare skirt feels girly and fun. Didn't want to take it off!

links_reviews_title: I had more compliments on this dress than any other I've worn. It's really unique and flattering.
links_reviews_text: Fits true to size. The zipper was a little tough. Overall it was amazing.

Absolutely LOVED this dress. The fabric, color, and pattern was so unique and memorable. I had read the arms were tight, but I didn't really find that to be the case. The material is fairly thick and heavy though, and it took up a lot of space in my suitcase. That was really the only con!

This dress was very flattering and sexy. I wore this to a bridal shower and it was snug in all the right areas and flared in all the right areas. Sometimes the zipper is tough but if you have someone to help you zip it up it is well worth it. It's a perfect party dress for fall because the material is thick and the burgundy on it is so rich and beautiful. I would probably rent this again!

links_reviews_title: Loved this dress and fit perfectly! So many compliments!
links_reviews_text: This dress fit almost perfectly! I wore this to a rehearsal dinner that had a dress code of "Mexican flare." I got so many compliments on it and it was really comfortable. The only issue that I had was you could kind of see some under-boob because I have a larger bust, but the crocheted fabric was thick enough to hide it, so you did not really notice. I tried on the S and it was too large around my waist, otherwise, I would have worn it as it fit my chest. The XS was a little small, but not small enough to size up. A little tip - I would air this dress out as soon as you get it. The fabric is really thick, and the dry cleaning smell clung to the dress because of this. I sprayed some fabric/wrinkle release spray on it to help with the smell as well.

I ordered the large because thats what was available and was worried it might be too big but it worked out great especially for my bust. Still had a little bit of room but glad I went with this size. Wore a regular bra underneath and it worked just fine. Received my compliments. Color is perfect

I ended up having to wear the L bc I could not work the zipper on the M, it was in-moveable. But... the L fit Ok and I was able to use a little bar soap on the zipper to lube it and get it to move on the L. It was a very flattering dress, super comfy and very classy!

Work this for a work event at the track. Got a million compliments! This dress is gorgeous! The red, blue and white really stand out. The dress is heavy, so a muggy summer day may not have been the best choice :/ and you cannot get in/out of this by yourself. But this dress is stunning and I would rent again. It ran a little big - but there is no stretch so I would stick with your normal size.

links_reviews_title: I rented this dress for the Preakness Stakes and it was the perfect blend of classy and fun!
links_reviews_text: This dress runs true to size. Like other reviews mentioned, the zipper is really hard to move but if you just take it slow and have someone to help you, it isn't a problem. There is absolutely no stretch to this dress so if you are busty, the top will be tight. I was able to wear a normal bra with this but I did find that the blue lining in the top would ride up throughout the day. The pictures do not do this dress justice! The colors are beautiful and it is a sturdy, well-made dress.

Amazing fit, gorgeous detail. Only issue is that I'm nursing and my chest is rather large at the moment. I had to wear a nude bandeau bra so my boobs didn't hang out of the bottom of the fabric covering them. Might not work for anyone larger than a large C/ small D cup.

This was my first time using RTR - therefore, I was a bit hesitant. After mulling over the reviews I finally pulled the trigger! I couldn't have been more pleased with my first rental - I received tons of compliments throughout the night! I am rather petite (4'11" and 100 lbs) and usually wear 00 in most items of clothing. Therefore, the dress was slightly large on me - it hit me right at the knee and was a bit roomy in the waist/hips. The material is well constructed but thick/heavy - probably not idea for an outdoor summer wedding. Overall I would highly recommend this dress!
Wore this to my brothers rehearsal dinner and it was a hit. Fit like a glove. Did not wear a bra because you could see it in the lace.

Fits true to size - I am a 2/4 in dresses and I got a small and it fit perfectly. The color was great and the lace was very classy with a hint of sass since around the stomach and shoulders was not lined. Loved it

I had read someone's review that said it flattened their chest so I got a large instead of a medium. I'm a 36c and it did slightly flatten my chest but overall this dress was so cute, so comfortable, and I got a ton of compliments on it

links_reviews_title: Awesome dress and fun to wear
links_reviews_text: I loved wearing this flattering dress and received a ton of compliments.
Loved everything about this dress ! It fit perfectly and very figure flattering

I love this short romper! Very cute and sassy. Colors a vivid. I wore it for my Social Distancing Music video and audition chats! Big hit! Plus, I don't usually look good in rompers but this one works amazingly!
Really liked this and the vibrant color. A little low cut and loose fitting up top.

Runs a little small (I usually wear a S or M) but I sized up based on reviews and it fit perfectly. It's super well made and not too short. Slightly tricky getting the zipper down to go to the restroom because it goes all the way up the back but I managed and it was so cute I didn't mind.
Super cute, flirty, fun and casual romper! Loved it.

Beautiful colors! Very flattering, but very short! The plunge is also deep, so I used an adhesive bra, that worked great. This is not a modest romper, so be in a setting where you are comfortable with a "sexier" look. I wore during the day with cork wedges for "pre-dinner" drinks- it could easily be dressed up for an evening event- or down for a beach vibe- my husband loved it!

This romper accentuated all the right places, which can be hard to find! The shorts are a little short for larger backsides and will definitely ride up in you bend over. But I was completely satisfied with the fit!

links_reviews_title: Great the color, material, and design!
links_reviews_text: I wore this to a party at my local zoo with wedges and got a lot of compliments. I really liked the fit of the top portion. It was not too low cut and it fit well around the waist. It is very short! I do not have long legs and still felt it was very short. If I was any taller, it would not have fit.

Loved this romper. Would definitely rent again. Beautiful colors and fit, although a little snug worked out for a nice dinner on vacay in Mexico City. So cute a little big in chest area but loved it anyway!

I usually hesitate to wear rompers because they aren't normally flattering, but I felt great wearing this piece. My only critique, which I suppose you would have with any romper, is the front wedgie you get when lifting your arms.

I was so disappointed because this was such a cute romper, but it was way too small. My waist is pretty small, but there was no give here and my butt made the romper seem way too short. I should have gotten a large, but I'm not sure even doing that would have cured the problem.

links_reviews_title: extremely tight in the ribs/high waist. Not conducive for curves
links_reviews_text: Super cute and felt slimming but unfortunately I could not eat or sit down once zipped in, despite the shoulders and bottom fitting great.
This romper fit like a glove and made me feel so sexy. It was comfortable and easy to move around in and also go to the bathroom! Will definitely rent again!

I love the romper but it runs so small! I usually wear a 0/2, XS, or 25 pant, and I rented this in the small. I could barely get it zipped. It looks great but it's so tight around the rib cage/waist. There's no stretch at all, it's really structured, which I love, but it's too tight to sit down in. It's one of those standing room only rompers. It looks great in the chest - deep enough V to be fun, not so deep that it's inappropriate to wear during the day time. The length was perfect on me but I'm only 5'4. Ultimately, I didn't wear it because it was just too tight, but a medium would have been too large everywhere else.

Really liked the material and look of this romper...the waist and top fit great but the shorts were too short to actually wear! Could see my underwear at any position other than standing straight up without wind. So disappointing since many rompers are too big at the waist for me and this one fit well there. I'm 5'5" with short legs and a long torso as a reference.
Super cute but also super small!!'

links_reviews_title: Super cute romper you can dress up or down
links_reviews_text: It's cheeky, so don't wear if you're hoping for something more conservative. The front is also very low cut so I either taped it down or I wore a bandeau underneath on more casual day

links_reviews_title: It's really cute but I am 5'7 and 155 and it was to small so I was not able to wear it.
links_reviews_text: Runs small

links_reviews_title: Too tiny to even fit on. I ordered my standard size and I could barely get it over my hips.
links_reviews_text: Fabric was more stiff than it appears in the photos, and the shorts were way shorter than I expected. Even if I had been able to zip this all the way up, I think it would have been too revealing to wear to a restaurant or bar.
This was cute and fun to wear. The v was too low for me so I just used s little dress tape and it was perfect !

links_reviews_title: comfy and cute for hourglass figure
links_reviews_text: example of why i like RTR...an opportunity to try wearing something I would never buy!

I am a true size 4 or small and I could not zip up this romper. The waist is small and has no give AT ALL. Also, the crotch seam is tight. I do have a long torso but have not had issues with rompers from other RTR brands. Twice now with Keepsake!

I wore this on vacation in Mexico. It's not quite dressy but it definitely is good for daytime bars or for going out later at night. It is very short in the legs and deep v cut. My bra fell out a little bit but I didn't have anything else to wear under it so I just let it be. It was definitely a comfortable fit and the loose legs and arm were good for a very hot night.

I did not end up wearing this, though I really loved the romper. Only concerns was that the shorts are very short and if worn outdoors, a breeze could definitely have you showing more than you may want. I think this would work best for more petite girls where the length may be more fitting.

links_reviews_title: DID NOT WEAR BECAUSE IT DID NOT FIT ME WELL
links_reviews_text: CUTE BUT DID NOT WORK

Super cute romper for a night out on the town. Fair warning, I am a short woman (5'3'') and this was short on me, if I bent over it was little cheeky. I would not suggest for a taller person. My husband always made fun of the romper style and this made him a believer that rompers can be sexy. Definitely will rent again.

links_reviews_title: Loved this but it is cut short for a long torso
links_reviews_text: Too small for a long torso. Will try a large if it's available.
Haven't worn this yet, but I keep trying it on because it's so so pretty! Unfortunately, I have a bigger butt and this is very short!

links_reviews_title: Cute style, but not for a long torso
links_reviews_text: I'm 5'4" and these rode up really high. I love the sleeves, color, and general design. I just wish there were some give for those of us with long torsos.

links_reviews_title: Comfy & Easy to Wear, but NOT Overly Flattering
links_reviews_text: This cute shift snakeskin print dress fits fine (running on the large side), and is comfortable to wear...but it is a true shift dress that is shapeless and does nothing to flatter your figure.

links_reviews_title: Snake print slithered right into my closet, for good!
links_reviews_text: I'm 5'2 and feeling a bit curvier than normal during the holidays so this was a great lose fitting piece that doesn't look "too big." Paired this with a sweater and boots. Works well with tans/neutrals as well as black accents... casual or dress it up. I loved it so much I bought it :)

links_reviews_title: Bought this, I loved it so much.
links_reviews_text: You can't wear a regular bra.

Rented for a birthday dinner out. My daughter is 5'7" and a size 2. This dress was a showstopper! Tons of compliments all evening. She chose to keep the dress and wear it to a friend party the next week. Loved it! Will definitely rent again. It is short but super cute.
I liked the loser fit and the snake skin print. The back is low cut, very cute. I got a lot of compliments on this dress.
Great dress! Back falls pretty low tho so I just put a black cami on underneath so I could wear to work. Paired with white high tops for a more fun feel, but would be great with some OTK boots too
Runs a little big but received so many compliments!
I didn't end up wearing this dress because it was a bit too large on me and looked like a sack. I'm often in between sizes and sized up and shouldn't have.

links_reviews_title: I loved it so much that I bought it.
links_reviews_text: This is the perfect little dress for when you want to look put together but want to be comfortable. My husband loved it on me and thought it was sexy. Shows plenty of leg. I love it because it is not form fitting, easy and cute.
Great dress! Wore with tights and booties.

links_reviews_title: Cute, fits me like a tunic
links_reviews_text: Very cute, if you're tall this fits more like a tunic...a cami would be necessary given the arm opening is rather large. Would look great with leggings
Flip flop or heels.. it so versatile!! Thinking about buying!!

This was ultimately too hard to wear. You can't wear a normal bra because the back is so low. But you definitely do need to wear a bra because the arm holes are so big that you can see right into them. The low back didn't sit close to your body so you could see down it. All around weird fit..

links_reviews_title: Loved the colors, not the fit
links_reviews_text: I was so excited to wear this to a conference banquet at Disney. The cut of this dress didn't work for my pear shaped body. It was tight across the hips but too loose under the waistband, so loose that It looked weird unless I added a belt to cinch the waist and give me shape. I think that even with me sizing up it still wouldn't have worked. Cute style, just not for short women with wide hips!
The sequins are not scratchy and the dress was comfortable. Had an awesome time at my disco party!
This dress grabbed the attention of everyone at the party! It fit great, I was comfortable all night and the sequins did not grab onto things. The perfect dress for our Carnival Gala!
I loved this dress! Wore it to a fancy girls night out and it made the night extra fun while being comfy. (I went with the blue heels ;) )
I wore this for our Under the Sea company party and it fit the theme perfect, was classy, but still fun!
I rented this dress for a Sequins & 70s themed holiday party and it was perfect! Very flattering and comfortable to wear and the colors were great. Compliments all night!

links_reviews_title: So many compliments!! Obsessed with this dress such a great rental.
links_reviews_text: I usually am wary about tight fitting dresses because I don't always find them flattering but I felt so great in this. Super flattering. Ordered an 8r and I'm usually between 8-10.

links_reviews_title: Great dress!! Totally fun for a black tie wedding
links_reviews_text: Got so many compliments on this dress! Very comfy to wear and loved how unique it was. Would absolutely rent again. Better to wear in cooler climates though. When I got hot it started to ride up and had to adjust. The slit is pretty high so if you're not comfortable with it, takes some getting used to, but you're going to look fab so you will definitely love wearing this one!

links_reviews_title: This dress is stunning, unique and super fun! I got a ton of compliments & I paired it with boots!
links_reviews_text: Fits true to size and I wore without a bra because I didn't need one

links_reviews_title: This dress was a true show-stopper.
links_reviews_text: At first I was unsure about the fit with the top portion being a bit roomier, but quickly realized that was the intended fit/look. I'm still receiving compliments on this dress and would highly recommend this dress to anyone that wants to turn heads and rock a 70s disco glam look.
The dress fit perfectly. Very comfortable and I received a lot of compliments. The bride and groom requested sequin dresses at the last minute and I was so happy I found this dress on RTR!

Rented this for a friend's 30th in NYC. Wasn't sure what the dress code "city chic" meant, but the birthday girl informed me that I killed it. Uploaded this photo because I was pleasantly surprised by how the dress was able to stretch and move.

This dress was perfect for a cocktail party. My only complaint is that I couldn't get the little tie straps to do right. I ended up just tucking them in and wearing it like a strapless dress. I got many, many compliments on this dress and I'd definitely wear it again!

links_reviews_title: Head turner! All eyes will be on you!!!
links_reviews_text: Beautiful dress! One of a kind! I typically wear a 2 but size down to a 0 since it kind of slouches at the waist. The dress may be difficult put on. There is no zipper, but elastic at the waist. The dress is the straight from top to bottom, meaning it may not be the best for wide hips (no room nor stretch). However, it was perfect dress for my event. Minimal accessories were needed. I wore royal blue tassel earrings to match the straps and clear heels. I got compliments throughout the night!!!
Only the 10R size was available and it fit but was very snug and I would have been more comfortable in a 12, but I received many compliments and it was a fun, party dress.
TTS, the 6 fit great. It has stretch to it and is very flattering.
Total and complete head turner. Loved the fit and the suit. It looks like a birthday dress and wore it NOT on my birthday. Definitely a special dress that catches anybody's attention.
A must rent!!! Super comfortable- not tight at all! I love the sequins and stripes of this dress. Also the midi length is on trend!

links_reviews_title: Lots of compliments - this dress draws a lot of attention!
links_reviews_text: It tends to be looser around the waist but then tight at the hips so for a curvy body type I would recommend sizing up. I have a small torso and wide hips so it looked a little baggy in the belly - overall it was a fun dress, but I think the fit is for a more slender body type.
Loved the colors and slit but it bunches at the waist which for my body type just wasn't flattering but I can see this dress looking amazing on straight and pear types
You will sparkle from every direction, just a little heavy.

links_reviews_title: Fantastic dress,great first RR experience! Even at a gala with lots of sparkly dresses, it stood out
links_reviews_text: Was worried about the length on someone short, but it was perfect. Straps slipped a bit when dancing, and yes the slit is high. Still, loved it.
Not made for Women bigger than a size 6! The top is baggy, and very unflattering. Somehow it manages to fit a 36D chest, but be baggy and tight all at the same time. Very weird fit.
The dress fit true to size. The sequins fall off throughout the night, but overall, happy with the dress. I got a lot of compliments throughout the night.

links_reviews_title: Fit was pretty snug. The slit on the thigh is very high! Way too high on my 5‚Äô10‚Äù frame.
links_reviews_text: Fit was pretty snug. The slit on the thigh is very high! Way too high on my 5‚Äô10‚Äù frame. Had to return

links_reviews_title: RECEIVED MANY COMPLIMENTS ON MY DRESS
links_reviews_text: I can sometimes wear an 8 however I have picked up some weight so the 10 was perfect and the fabric even gives a little.

links_reviews_title: Not a dress for curvy body types.
links_reviews_text: Hated the material, too thick for my liking.

links_reviews_title: Cute & innocent. Has perfect lining slip
links_reviews_text: This is a modest, cute dress. Completely ideal white cotton eyelet. It has a built-in white slipI tied a pink grosgrain ribbon as a belt. The slip's bust (not so much the dress) felt tight across my chest, but i'm a bit busty. The look was still smooth, comfy, and not too tight. Lovely and sweet dress, so summery
Pretty dress, comfortable, I sized up due to my big bum and the lining underneath. Would rent again!

Pro: form fitting and great shape. Personally love the midi length. Con: doesn't come with a slip as pictured so it's completely see through. Even if you wear nude under garments. Unfortunately, didn't have a white slip of my own. Was not able to wear out in public

links_reviews_title: too tight across belly and chest - didn't wear it.
links_reviews_text: I love this dress but it was a bit too tight - I knew that at some unfortunate moment while wearing it, I would pop a button or experience unfortunate gapping. However, with a spanx slip underneath and a nude bra I felt it was decent and not see-through.

Really cute dress, but it didn't come with lining. Fortunately I already had a white slip to wear under it. The material was a little stiff, probably due to the dry cleaning process (seemed like starch was added). I steamed it before I wore it. Loved the pockets and the fit. I would rent again!

links_reviews_title: Great dress, no-slip! I had to go to three stores to find a slip to go with this dress.
links_reviews_text: Totally see-through. I was annoyed that it was shipped without a slip. It is not wearable without a long white slip underneath.

links_reviews_title: I wore this for a summer day outing and it was great. Nice and classic.
links_reviews_text: Good fit, nice, classic piece.
This dress is fairly nipped in at the waist, and even though there was a belt, there was no slip, so it is entirely see-through.

This dress is so pretty. It was easy to wear, and it can easily be dressed up or down. There are a few things about this dress that make it less than ideal: the liner is super small, and it's only sewn in by one hook on the left sleeve, so putting yourself in the dress can be confusing. The hook and eye closure at the waist only has the eye left, so to make the dress lie flat, you'll have to put the hook through the one of the eyelets. There is also no sash with the dress even though it has belt hooks, so you'll have to wear a belt or sash of your own. Despite all this, though, the dress is still fun and perfect for a variety of events.
This is a lovely simple and classic dress. Very comfortable and perfect for a hot summer day
This dress was great for day or casual night. Nice fabric and cut. Fit true to size and was really pretty.
Slip underneath ran small and was too short! Wear your own slip underneath

Wore this to my sisters college graduation. It was a hectic day so I couldn't find the belt while getting ready that morning, but it was still very pretty and perfect for the occasion! Such a great spring dress.
The waist is somewhere between empire and natural and it looks weird With the sash. The underlayer rides up so that you're basically wearing a sheer dress if you don't pay attention all the time.
This dress came with no liner or slip or anything making it unwearable because it's completely see through with the eyelet fabric.

links_reviews_title: Flattering, comfortable, lightweight, and easy to dance in!
links_reviews_text: I wore this to my junior prom in 2016 and it is still my favorite dress I've ever worn. I am very tall and the long was the perfect length. The cleavage was a little low for high school, so I just safety pinned it together for the night and it worked great. The dress really accents your waist and hips so if you like a small waist/wider hip look its the dress for you!

The picture was taken without great posture however it was a beautiful dress on. I did need to use double sided tap as the top/bodice was a little baggy on my smaller bust. Also the zipper was difficult to pull up past the lower ribs so had to opt for pre-zipping and pulling over my head, but it was worth it. Very comfortable and the perfect length with 2-3 in heels. You dont see it in the pictures but there is also a slit up the front left.
Fit well. Need to be prepared if small chest for how to cover and tape the girls. Beautiful to wear, so many compliments, true to fit.

links_reviews_title: We had a formal awards night we were being honored in, I chose this dress as it was nursing friendly
links_reviews_text: This BY FAR is my most favorite dress I've ever worn. This picture 100% doesn't do it justice. There was cleavage showing & Im more modest. But honestly if any cleavage is showing, out was the most tasteful on a gorgeous, elegant/classy gown. I had compliment after compliment. I would love to OWN this dress as I just loved how it even felt on my body & as I walked. Oh other fun note, there's a cute slit up the left leg I didn't notice until I walked. It's very tasteful.

In learning to love and embrace my postpartum body, this dress made me feel empowered and beautiful. Even though I have a long d√©colletage, I still needed to pin the front so as not to gape open and show everyone the goods. Would 100% rent again.

links_reviews_title: Got a lot of compliments and stood out wearing this bold color
links_reviews_text: The dress fit was great except for the top. It was very open. I used tape to hold it closed. I'm 5'10-5'11 and got the long size. I wore heels and it was the perfect length.

links_reviews_title: This dress fit perfectly on me. It was flattering exactly where I needed it.
links_reviews_text: I typically where a size 10L but in this dress I wore an 8L. I am 5'10", so if I wish to wear heels in any capacity I must have the extra length. It was a tad loose in the bust as i'm no the biggest busted and it is very low cut, but some double sided tape secured it with no problem.
The dress fit great but the top was large. Be ready to use some dress tape!

links_reviews_title: Perfect dress for an engagement shoot!
links_reviews_text: I wore this dress for our engagement photo shoot. It was beautiful and flowy and the fit was great. The only con was how low cut and loose the top was -- I used body tape and it worked for the hour I wore it but definitely would have needed to try something different if I planned to wear it for longer.

Great option for a formal event. Wore to a black tie wedding and received many compliments. Amazing color. Great fit. The slit is barely noticeable but fun to play with. The neckline is PLUNGING! I had trouble even with a plunging bra and had to use a ton of fashion tape. If you're large busted, give yourself enough time to get ready. Overall a great dress and would wear it again

I rented this dress for the Marine Corp Ball and it was a hit! Being short and busty. I was worried about the chest size and length. But it is as perfect in length and actually large in the chest. I used some dress tape to hide a little bit of the cleavage. I truly loved this dress and wish I could've kept it

Wore this to a fall wedding. As mentioned in other reviews, the top is very loose and low cut. I ended up using fashion tape and pinning the straps up, but it was still a lot of cleavage. The dress is a very pretty orangey-red and draped well. There is a slit up the left leg. The petite length was perfect for me with flats on but a little short when I put on heels (I'm 5'5").

Dress fit well except for the top. As you can from the picture. The back was also hard to zip up. I would say size up but the chest would be way to big. With that being said. I would rent this again. For my body type it was very flattering. Lots of complements.

This dress was amazing. The material was flowy but not clingy, I had tons of compliments on it. My only complain would be there is a band right under my chest that the zipper didn't want to go up through, it took 3 of us to get it zipped - I was afraid it would break. It wasn't tight on me, that is not why it wouldn't zip, it was the way it was made.

links_reviews_title: It was a style dress I normally wouldn't buy for myself but it was fun to swear something different!
links_reviews_text: I felt so classy in this dress and got a ton of compliments!

links_reviews_title: My boyfriend's father got knighted by the country of Malta
links_reviews_text: We had to tape up the shoulder area so it would fit me better

links_reviews_title: Received lots of compliments (after I pinned it)
links_reviews_text: Added extra pics to show how it looks pinned... yep even more cleavage without pins, tape wasn't able to cover it sufficiently. After it was pinned I felt a lot more comfortable & confident- plus was able to relax and now always checking. Could have pinned more but didn't want to ruin the pleats even more.

links_reviews_title: Dress was beautiful and comfortable! Many compliments!
links_reviews_text: Stunning dress ! Felt amazing on!
I loved this dress! It fit me well and color really suited me. I did get double sided tape and pins in the mix as it is truly as low cut as other reviews say.

links_reviews_title: Stand out color and easy fit
links_reviews_text: I loved this dress!! I got so many compliments on the color and cut. I used toupee tape to keep the fabric of the deep-v secure. It worked like a charm. You definitely need something to hold the fabric in place to keep yourself worry free.

links_reviews_title: Went to a friend's wedding with my husband. As a mom of 3 littles, its so fun to get dolled up!!
