links_reviews_text: The color is gorgeous and vibrant! The waistband of the dress I would say fits true to size, but as it says in other reviews, the top is loose and flowy. Taped up the girls and a couple strips of fashion tape to keep the top in place and we were good to go. Tons of compliments and turned heads. The bride said on her invites to dress fabulously, and that's just how this dress made me feel.

I wore this dress for an evening outdoor wedding. It was definitely a showstopper! The fit was great, I rented a long I am 5'8 and wore about a 3inch wedge and the dress just hovered the ground. I am also 168lbs and have an hourglass body shape and I rented both 10L and 12L. I was able to fit in the 10L but wore the 12L so I was comfortable in the waist after a meal. üòä It is low cut but there was a lot of fabric to play with to keep it more modest if you want. I actually left it as it was and I'm a DD and has no issues. If you are contemplating between this dress and another, GET THIS DRESS! I've never received more compliments in a dress than I did in this dress. The flow and the color and breathtaking! I was told I looked like "Miss America". I wish I owned this dress! I would rent again!

links_reviews_title: I felt this dress was classy and fun! I received a lot of compliments.
links_reviews_text: Like all the other reviews I would suggest a good quality fashion tape to hold the fabric down. The slit in the skirt was fun. The band around the middle is fitted. the length even with heels was a little long for me.

links_reviews_title: Perfect for hiding a baby bump
links_reviews_text: Rented this for a cruise as a backup dress and it turned out perfect. It perfectly covered up my baby bump and looked fabulous.

links_reviews_title: I've never had so many compliments in my life!
links_reviews_text: This dress was PERFECT for a black-tie wedding I attended. So many compliments!! The dress was extremely comfortable and made me feel so good about myself. I used some fashion tape to help hold the dress in place in the cleavage area because it is low cut but the fashion tape did the trick! Highly recommend this dress for your next formal outing!

Pros- The color was vibrant, the material flowed beautifully and hugged in all the "right" places. Thick straps = no strapless bra required! Cons- DEEP plunge + thin material made it hard to secure. I added dbl stick fabric tape to keep it in place but with the slightest move, it would unstick. I have large bust, so, may not be an issue to some.

I wore this dress to a cocktail party for my 10-year college reunion. I received a ton of compliments about how great I looked so this dress was absolutely a success. I will echo what everyone else said, though: the bust is far too big. I found the rest of the dress to be true to size, though, so I would caution against ordering a size down. I tried on the smaller size and it was too tight everywhere except for the bust. I used fashion tape to secure the top, but it took more tape than expected so I spent the first half of the evening adjusting the top until I could get more tape. My advice: Don't shy away from this dress; it's beautiful and everyone will tell you so. But do take plenty of time to make sure your pinning and/or taping is secure before heading out so you can enjoy yourself (and the compliments!) worry-free.

Fits true to size everywhere EXCEPT the bust, which is huge. Beware that you definitely will need fashion tape or pins to pin up the top (I would recommend fashion tape). Otherwise, this dress is a showstopper and was worth the extra trouble with taping the top to stay in place. I received many compliments and felt so glamorous and beautiful!!!!

links_reviews_title: Arrived on time and fit wonderfully!
links_reviews_text: This dress fit wonderfully! It was quite the eye-catcher, and I got a ton of compliments. I loved the way it swished around my legs as I danced...I felt like a princess. And the peek-a-boo slit was the perfect touch of sexiness. I had to pin the top quite a bit, but that's because it was amore modest affair. Would highly recommend!!

Felt so glamorous in this dress. It was very comfortable and breezy/flowy. Top was a little big, loose, and the cut was very low. I'm pretty well endowed so I just pinned it together a little to make sure there was no wardrobe malfunction! Ha!

I rented this dress months in advance. It was way too low cut and nowhere near enough coverage for my large bust. I couldn't wear it, returned it the same day I got it and went to a high end department store to purchase a new dress. Dress is beautiful but an awful fit for me.

links_reviews_title: Pretty dress, wrong style for me
links_reviews_text: I did not wear this one. I wanted to love it so much! The color is amazing, the flow of the skirt is so pretty, but the top is HUGE! I usually have a problem with tops being too tight. Maybe my torso is too short for this style? Skip if you have a short torso or don't want a lot of cleavage. Otherwise, go for it!

I rented this dress for my engagement photos and it was perfect! The color is rich and definitely stands out! The V neck and wrap style of the gown is so flattering and gently dramatic. I am 5'3 and 130lbs and this fit true to size. It was also super comfortable and just fun to wear! The photos came out great because this dress makes you feel so beautiful.

links_reviews_title: I LOVED this dress -- yes I wore two in one evening! Bell of the ball w/many compliments!
links_reviews_text: 5'2'' 195lbs 36B 3 inch heels The chest was way too big and I had to pin it. Double sided tape would have been even better. There is a slit up the side you don't see in the online photos and that made this a very flirty and fun to dance in dress. I should have tanned my lower half though! LOL -- Everyone LOVED this dress on me. It's not a true red more red orange but absolutely stunning!

links_reviews_title: Beautiful dress - the color is amazing!
links_reviews_text: Ended up with the 18L because the waist of the 16 was too tight. The waist was high, around my rib cage which was great because it made my boobs look like they were sagging. But overall loved the dress! very pretty layers that flow when you walk. Def need body tape to keep the girls covered, very low cut. But actually worked well with my large chest since it was pulling.

links_reviews_title: Will wear in the future; previewing dresses for events!
links_reviews_text: I wore another of the four dresses sent on my unlimited account, that better suited the formals theme; however, this dress is just as beautiful. This dress is dreamy and romantic with multiple layers of light material. I may rent for upcoming balls, galas, or formal holiday parties. The fit would require 5 inch heels and pinning at the bust. This dress is on my to rent list for upcoming events.

I tried this dress on at the Rent the Runway location in DC so I knew the 4 would be a perfect fit - and I knew how much I loved it - but after spending a night in it, I have to rave about this dress! The whole night I felt like I stood out in the best way, even hearing a, "wow, lady in red!" (which I'll take!) I embraced the very low cut (out of my comfort zone) with the help of a plunge bra I Amazon Prime'd. The dress was a little hard to zip up, not because it was tight but because of a kink in the zipper, but we eventually got it, and it fit like a glove. The dress was comfortable to eat, drink, move and dance in; I ended up spending about 11 hours in it and never thought "ugh, this is too tight, this is too long," etc. I went with a braided updo (courtesy of a talented friend of mine) and simple gold jewelry, with gold heels, to let the color pop. Highly recommend this dress!

links_reviews_title: Felt like a $1M and got so many compliments!
links_reviews_text: Definitely had to pin the top but otherwise it was a great fit! Loved the high slit ‚ù§

I loved this dress! As the other reviews said, you'll likely need to pin the top (I used fashion tape and it worked great) but don't let it stop you from renting! I got compliments all night and it was very comfortable to wear. I would caution sizing down because the band around the middle is fitted.

You must need Pamela Anderson's body for this outfit. Huge boobs, tiny torso. I read reviews that it had made a nice maternity dress, but I didn't think so. It was so tight around the waist and too big up top. I had to pin back and fashion tape the front. Note: my photographer altered the color to better suit our winter shoot.
Love this top! It is soft, pretty, and flattering.
Shirt runs really big. Straps kept falling.
It was too wide for me to wear

links_reviews_title: Life is a party, dress like it.
links_reviews_text: The ruffled layers are super flattering, I felt great. I received loads of compliments. Wore it to my family christmas party- we get dressed up to sit in the sala. This top was fitted and reminded me to not over indulge. I would rent again.
The shirt fit a bit snug in the busy area. Other than that, loved it!

Yes this top is a show stopper. Yes it fits. Yes it is amazing... BUT... it is challenging to zip by yourself. Wearing without a bra, which is fine, but it is on the smaller side. This would not be a top I would (or could) wear all day, but for date night or for a few hours, it's fine!
I wore this to a Kevin Hart comedy show on a date night. It was perfect. I had a XL backup size but was able to wear the L. I would rent again.

links_reviews_title: I loved this top! It fit very well, super comfortable and I received lots of compliments
links_reviews_text: Loved it, very comfortable and flattering.

I got tons of compliments on this top at my work Christmas party. It was very comfortable and easy to pair with any pants and some cute heels. It was fitted through the bust that even though I normally can wear an XS I wore the backup Small. I probably could have zipped the XS but when I tired it felt tight and the Small got perfectly.
I usually wear Med but have gained a few recently so got Large for the back up and went with the Large. The top is beautiful. I did get lots of Complements all night! I wore it to a party on my Bday.

LOVED this top! Paired it work leather pants and booties for a NYC wine event and received compliments all night long. I have broad shoulders and the medium was pretty fitted, but not too uncomfortable. The bust was about as tight as it could be for me though, no room for a bra, but didn't really need one bc it was right enough to hold me up. I'm 5'7" athletic 148lbs, 32DD, 29" waist and the medium fit like a glove.

links_reviews_title: I got compliments all night on this top!
links_reviews_text: I wanted to be comfortable and not have to worry about adjusting my outfit all evening at a work party so I paired this top with black skinny jeans and it was perfect. My natural waist measures at 34 inches so it perfectly fit into the XL.
This top was BEAUTIFUL. The lace was detailed yet casual. The top is fitted and formed so I didn't need to wear a bra which was idea for the shear portions of this top. Will certainly rent again.
Great top -- either with jeans or a skirt. Flattering. Received a number of complements!
I love this top! I wore it to two different events in one week. It is a perfect top for a night out paired with jeans and heels.

I wore this when I hosted Christmas dinner and the compliments kept coming. It's so feminine yet edgy. I'd rent this again for sure. Important note; this runs a tad small so size up for your backup. Either way, any renter would be quite happy with this selection.

This blouse felt too good to be true. It was stunning from every angle, the quality was exceptional, and the compliments were endless. A note about sizing: I am normally between a Small and Medium. I managed to get the Medium on and it looked great, but it was certainly tight. I had the Large as a backup but went with the Medium anyway. DO size up for your backup. (Another tiny piece of advice: I wore the blouse with the Precious Poppies Earrings from Kate Spade, and they were a PERFECT match!)
This blouse is perfection. There is no give so order your true size or a little larger. I am a 34 bust and the small was snug.
I am a 40D and this shirt wouldn't even fit over my bust
This shirt, as many others, are not made for women that have ample breasts. It fit everywhere except for the chest area; it's truly for small-chested women.

links_reviews_title: Love this top! Very flattering and cute
links_reviews_text: Runs small, such a cute design
This runs SMALL! I wasn't able to wear it, but it's a lovely top.
Way way way too small. I am normally a medium and couldn't get the Large over my head
runs small
Could NOT put this over my 36dd chest, despite renting a L. Disappointing.

links_reviews_title: I dressed this down with jeans and heels for date night and it was perfect
links_reviews_text: Fit was perfect

links_reviews_title: This shirt got me SO MANY COMPLIMENTS! super beautiful but really runs really small.
links_reviews_text: Runs small. Really great quality and very stylish

links_reviews_title: Surprisingly modest... Funky & fun for a wedding cocktail night, but too small
links_reviews_text: This felt fun and unique, but it was too small (about 2 sizes). The fabric is a bit delicate and maybe a little itchy if I wore it all night. It was surprisingly not that revealing, even on flabby bits which you might have expected to show through the sheer. I would've enjoyed wearing it if it had fit.
It was a beautiful shirt but could barely get it over my head.

I ordered this as my backup and did not end up wearing it. I'm typically between a S-M with a 26inch waist and 34C bust and I wasn't even close to being able to zip this up. I like that the top is tight because it means you don't need an undershirt/bra, but this was SO tight. Definitely size up. Cute top, just didn't fit.

links_reviews_title: So flattering and fun to wear!
links_reviews_text: Loved this top, worked so well for a date night. The style is super flattering and I would definitely rent this again! It does run a little small so it was a squeeze to get on and I couldn't wear a bra.
Loved the shirt, but runs VERY small. Size up, twice!
Runs small. No give. Zipper up the back makes it cumbersome to get on, and then you need someone to zip it. No stretch. Ran short on me and I'm short waisted.

Fits like a glove if you get the right size and very flattering!! Make sure to go up a size, I had to go up 1.5-2 sizes due to the shirt being on a zipper. I'm heavier chested but going up a size fit both my chest and waist!

links_reviews_title: Super cute but tight across the chest
links_reviews_text: I loved this shirt but unfortunately it runs small across the chest and made it too small to wear.
I wore the medium to a concert, but was uncomfortable most of the night. The fabric has no stretch, so you don't have much room to move/breathe/etc. Very cute! Just be smart about the sizing
I wanted to wear this top so bad! It's beautiful! But this designer runs extremely small. I am usually a size 12 and the extra large fit like an 8-- I could barely pull it down past my boobs.

links_reviews_title: Super excited to wear this top
links_reviews_text: Such a beautiful piece but be warned it runs small especially through the bust and waist. Fabric does not have give. Looks great under a jacket and with pants.
Such great detail. Adorable on

links_reviews_title: Beautiful but too small for me.
links_reviews_text: runs small.

links_reviews_title: Perfect flirty top with an edge!
links_reviews_text: This top is so cute with a little bit of edgy and was perfect for my 30th birthday dinner and night out! Highly recommend trying it out for a semi-formal event. I would definitely rent it again!
Was a bit tight getting on and off, but otherwise great for a bachelorette party!

The shirt is just ok. Nothing amazing, but it was good for work with a blazer over it. You could tell it is starting to get a little worn from rentals. Fit was relatively true to size/ slightly tight in the bust area. Good for day wear, but I suspect it may be uncomfortable to wear for over 8 hours (it's a little tight and the material could get uncomfortable after too long). Not sure if I'd rent again.

I wore this shirt 3 nights I absolutely loved it. The reason I gave it a 4 star is because it's very tight on the chest and doesn't have much room if u pull your arms out... Watch out for nip slips if you lift your arms :)

links_reviews_title: Great piece for a formal event without wearing a dress
links_reviews_text: The straps are a little long but overall great fit.
Seriously adorable top, and the body fit great, but like everyone else said, straps are huge. I safety pinned them in back and was all set!
Like others have said, the shoulder straps did fall down a bit but overall this was so cute and fun for a casual weekend

I wore this top with a black mini skirt to the Taylor Swift concert and received a million compliments! I also felt like hot stuff. It's not the most mobile top ever but it's so cute that tbh I didn't care - if you have a larger chest also beware of your bra peeking through the see through parts of the top but you can make it work - loved it!
Really cute and fun, straps fall down but does not change the outfit - if anything it might improve it!
Cutest top, got tons of compliments. Agree with the sleeves, fall down often, but worth it.
This was so cute- I got so many compliments! The only thing is the straps are not adjustable so they were down most of the time unless I pulled them back over my shoulders.

links_reviews_title: I love this top, so pretty and lots of compliments!
links_reviews_text: I got a L because M wasn‚Äôt available, but both would have worked. Very pretty shirt!
I loved the top, the fabric is comfortable and got lots of compliment.

links_reviews_title: I wore this to a party and loved this top!
links_reviews_text: I loved the shape and fit of this top. However, the shoulder straps were a tiny bit loose so if I wore this again I would get an xs.

links_reviews_title: Wore this top for my birthday. Super fun and festive!
links_reviews_text: Really well made, fits nicely to the body. I couldn't lift my arms easily however, but it was worth it for the cute photos! I pulled the two straps down personally.

Fits true to size, my only complaint is that the straps weren't adjustable since IÔ∏è have a rather short torso. Wore I‚Äét to my birthday brunch and got so many compliments on I‚Äét! Perfect to dress down or dress up!

links_reviews_title: Shirt was flattering but did not stretch.
links_reviews_text: Fit somewhat snug but very cute with black jeans
Very unique and got compliments. Only problem was that the shoulder straps slipped off throughout the night

I didn't end up wearing because I didn't like the fit. I felt restricted in the arms (couldn't fully raise my arms). Also I could see the bottom of my bra in the sheer section. May have worked better with a smaller bust. The straps didn't stay up, but you can easily tuck them in/hide and I actually think it looks cuter as a strapless and wouldn't have minded this had the torso/arms fit better.
The detailing in the shirt are more beautiful in person. Great fit, very, and sexy shirt

links_reviews_title: Size up if you have a bigger bust!
links_reviews_text: I wanted to love this shirt, it was one of the first items I hearted when joining RTR. I ordered a small, which I typically wear, and wish I got the medium. You have to wear the right strapless bra and keep your shoulders down to make this shirt not look funny. I might rent again in size M. I saw the appeal, but it also seemed a bit worn out.

links_reviews_title: Perfect blouse for a night out!
links_reviews_text: Even better in person, really pretty lace details. Fits true to size, maybe runs a little small so size up if you are questioning. Only complaint is the straps don't stay in place that well
Fit well
Looks even better on than imagined! Great for date nights, immediately makes you feel sexy
Doesnt fit well on the shoulders

links_reviews_title: Super cute for a night out
links_reviews_text: Super cute top!! The straps fell down a lot, but think that's just Bc it was a medium and i normally wear a small. Would've bought it but it was too pricey!
Perfect fit. It is short.

links_reviews_title: I loved the idea of this top. I wish the waist was a bit more fitted.
links_reviews_text: I really wanted this top to work. The style was so cool and it was such a fun idea. The waist wasn't as fitted as I would've liked, it was a bit boxy. I don't think I could've sized down because I'm an hourglass shape. It was too big around my waist making me look larger.
The sleeves were a little tight and the shirt was really uncomfortable. Felt very cheap
Elegant and sexy
Straps fell off but very fun.

links_reviews_title: This is a great shirt for dinner.
links_reviews_text: The fit is tighter on the sleeves so it makes it difficult to move in.
It was pretty cute but the straps up top were loose.
Super cute and I got tons of compliments in this little number. The one minor flaw was that with a super small chest, the straps are a little too long and you can't adjust them.. but it still works

links_reviews_title: Feminine and sexy - a must rent
links_reviews_text: Wore this with a leather skirt for a girls night out - felt sophisticated and sexy. I highly recommend this!

links_reviews_title: Goes well with jeans or a skirt.
links_reviews_text: Its really fun and good quality. same little drawback everyone else said, shoulder straps keep falling, which is a bit annoying. But glad I rented it.
NA
Great minus the smell...

Normally can wear a medium or small, but I ordered the medium on this one since I didn't want it to be tight to my skin (which it wasn't at all in the M). Probably could have sized down, but the medium was true to size. Such a cute statement top with jeans and sandals that easily went from day to night. Highly recommend.
Makes you look like a clown and was itchy

links_reviews_title: Beautiful shirt, but the zipper broke (and it wasn't really tight) halfway through the night.
links_reviews_text: Could wear a regular black bra with it (didn't need a strapless).
I am obsessed with the lace trend! Beautiful top that shows some skin, but still looks classy! Another RTR hit.
Beautiful & Fun top! So great for a night out :)
Good quality! Loved the sleeves & all the colors. Great fit. Received a lot of compliments.
True to size and comfy. Very feminine and glossy, got lots of compliments.

links_reviews_title: Perfect dress for a Fall wedding!
links_reviews_text: The quality of this dress was spot on, and I especially loved the embroidered floral appliqu√©s! Definitely trust the reviews that say this dress runs small. I'm normally a 4 and, while it would have worked, it was just a tad bit too tight in the ribcage. The 6 was way more comfortable.

I wore this to a bridal shower and thought it would be a good daytime option for cooler weather. I don't know that I'd rent it again but I got lots of compliments and felt good in it. Tip: wear some spanx to smooth out your stomach and be very careful not to snag the lace material!
This dress was for an evening wedding event in the country. I loved the cut and the embroidery really made it "pop"!

links_reviews_title: Fabulous fit and flow; made me feel super feminine while still professional
links_reviews_text: The velvet band creates a great waist. I‚Äôm short torso‚Äôd and have a hard time with dresses. The velvet band will also require that your order true to size. If you‚Äôre athletic but busty you should still have room. I got tons of compliments, and loved throwing my personal black blazer over it for a more office-style look. For shoes I ended up wearing my black glossy jellie sandals.

links_reviews_title: I never wanted to take it off!
links_reviews_text: This dress fit like a dream and I never wanted to take it off! It was so flattering and the perfect length, which I was worried about because I wanted it to hit tea length and I'm short. Also, I really wanted a 2 but only the 4 was available, and I'm so glad I had to get the 4 - I think the 2 would have been to small around the waist. I wore it to a wedding and it was great for dancing! Only issue worth complaining about was the zipper is really hard to get past the velvet strip around the wait, but such is the case with all the best dresses, right? I just had a friend help me zip.
Light weight and comfortable dress for work. Fits true to size.
The dress fit perfectly, except for the velvet band right under the bust area. That was super tight. I'm about 32" around there and it just fit. Guessing a size up might have worked.

links_reviews_title: Beautiful embroidery and a great fit!
links_reviews_text: This dress was so flattering! My husband liked it and I got several compliments. The embroidery is so pretty and vibrant. The high waistband gives the illusion of a small waist. I'm smaller up top than on the bottom, so the a-line skirt is perfect for me. The top is very fitted and I'm small busted so it worked perfectly. A winner!
Fit was perfect and dress was comfortable, though zipper was a little sticky. Got so many compliments on this dress I wanted to buy it!
This was super flattering, comfortable, appropriate, and so pretty! I loves the lace flutter sleeves and overlay. It was perfect for the occasion.

I sized up from my normal size to fit into this dress, and the waistband was still very tight. I am large-chested, so this dress may not work for someone with that body type. It may be better for someone with an average-small chest size!

links_reviews_title: Perfect dress for a spring bridal shower
links_reviews_text: Got so many compliments on this dress! It was a little tight across my ribs, but had no problem zipping. Really flattering, and paired it with a leather jacket
Fits a bit right across the ribcage.

I liked this dress a lot. The belt is a little felt strip which I didn't love, but it's still a super pretty. The fit was really flattering. I'm not super comfortable with my arms and this was a great cut to make me feel not-too-conservative but also comfortably covered.

This A-line style was a perfect fit for my curvy figure. It was so easy to wear and comfortable all night long! The neckline is high enough that I wore a regular bra; the straps showed through the lacy sleeves, though, so if that bothers you I recommend a racerback. Length was tea length on my 5'7" frame. I got a ton of compliments on it!

It fit true to size, but there is a small velvet band around waist that is a bit tight. Needed spanx on for it to be comfortable. Normally, I get tons of compliments on my dresses from RtR, but not so with this one. I felt confident, but it didn't feel "special".

links_reviews_title: Fit like a glove and got tons of compliments. Great for an early spring wedding.
links_reviews_text: I wore this dress to a 5:00 mid-March wedding and it was perfect! It's great to transition from winter to spring. And it was super comfortable! I wore it for about seven hours and could have worn it for many more. Overall, this dress is the perfect combination of style and comfort. Definitely recommend!

links_reviews_title: LOVE IT! Gorgeous for spring, comfortable and just plainly beautiful!
links_reviews_text: I love this dress! Didn't want to return it! The kind of dress you can wear to any occasion, and feel and looks fabulous! Go ahead and RlRent it!, You won't regret it!

I am 5'9", 32C and wore this dress for my engagement photos. I typically wear a size 0 or size 2. For this dress I wore a size 2R. I also wore this dress to a baby shower the same weekend and felt beautiful. This is a dress worth owning.
Fit great, got lots of compliments!

This dress was a bit snug around the waist. The ribbon band has ZERO give to it. However, the rest of it was comfortable and even a little roomy. The band stretched a little throughout the night. I am usually a 10 so if you are between sizes, size up. That said, this dress was GORGEOUS on me and I got compliments all night long. I am keeping this one for a while!!!! Love it!

links_reviews_title: Awesome dress for a work party!
links_reviews_text: I wore this dress for a formal work celebration. It was light enough for a warm humid evening and great quality. I loved the midi length, flutter sleeves and embroidery. Received lots of compliments. I could have worn the 4 or 6 but opted for the 4 as I liked the way the sleeves lay in the 4.

links_reviews_title: Perfect for an October Vineyard Wedding
links_reviews_text: Loved this dress for a Friday night Vineyard wedding the first wee of October. The floral overlay was so pretty and was fun to dance in. The cinched waist was super flattering as well. I think the length is a little hard. I'm 5'6 and it hit an an ok length. I wish it had been a little higher on my calf, but would be perfect for someone 5'8 or above. I think you can dress this up or down which makes it really versatile.

links_reviews_title: Loved this dress so much I want to keep it!
links_reviews_text: I wore this dress for a church ceremony and it was super appropriate but also fun / flirty for the reception. I have a curvy build and if fit me like a glove. True to size. Tons of compliments! ...beautiful material and lace.

I was honestly unsure about this dress when I took it out of the bag because it's on the more conservative side, but it is an amazing dress! I am so glad that I rented it for my cousin's wedding; it was absolutely perfect. It fits true to size, is flattering, and is really comfortable. Would recommend to anyone considering renting this dress and would even rent again!

Wore to a LDW black tie optional wedding- fits at the natural waist beautifully with subtle bell flare at the bottom. Lace is great quality, can wear a regular bra, and compliments from many through the night. Loved it.
I loved this dress so much. The midi length is great and on trend, the cut is flattering. The colors were bright and fun! Recommend!!

links_reviews_title: Great dress that hides everything yet leaves you feeling great.
links_reviews_text: I went to conservative wedding and this dress was great! I really liked the length as well as the v neck at the top. The embroidery was great and I received many complements on this dress. I would definitely rent it again

links_reviews_title: Beautiful embroidery and lovely flattering fit.
links_reviews_text: This dress runs very small in the waist although I did still wear my regular size. I didn't think it looked terribly expensive, that was my biggest concern. Overall, a lovely, feminine and romantic dress. Good shape.

links_reviews_title: Wore it for an afternoon wedding shower.
links_reviews_text: Definitely runs small. I've never worn a 12 in my life but was fortunate to have the larger backup size. The material is a little shiny, and it doesn't look that way in the photo. The black band at the waist is velvet, which I was not expecting and made it look more appropriate for winter. Overall, a pretty dress.

links_reviews_title: I ended up not wearing this in favor of a more formal dress.
links_reviews_text: It fits true to size, however, someone with more cleavage might have liked the neckline more than I did. It is lose at the neckline. Otherwise it is a lovely dress.
Loved this dress, the colors and details were amazing, and it fit really well. Would love to rent again!

Wanted to keep this dress - the fit was comfortable and the colors & design on the fabric were stunning. Lots of compliments, and classy enough for lots of different events and settings. Highly recommend.

I love this dress and it got so many compliments. THE REVIEWS ABOUT THE 12 BEING SMALLER THAN THE 10 ARE ABSOLUTELY TRUE. When I tried on the 12, I was worried that the dress would be too tight for me to wear, but I followed the guidance of other reviewers, and the 10 fit perfectly. I don't know if someone altered that 12 or what. Besides that, the dress is lovely. It's obviously black, but light weight enough for a summer wedding in Texas. I may get this dress again!
Loved this dress. Fit great. Loved the style. Very comfortable to dance in at a wedding.

links_reviews_title: Beautiful black lace midi dress with floral embellishments
links_reviews_text: I love the fit and quality of this dress and the floral embellishments are beautiful! Definitely would rent again
I really loved this dress! It fit perfect the color and detail in the dress are very beautiful!
Absolutely perfect fit, didn't even have to wear a bra (I'm a 34D). Very comfy and good weight for a summer event!

I wore this for my best friends engagement party. I am 5'9" and this dress was very short. But that's my style so I LOVED it. Just don't bend over. It was so much fun to dance in!! Tons of compliments!
I rented this for NYE and it was such a fun dress to wear!

This wasn't my normal type of dress I wear (I like modern, simple silhouettes), but being in Vegas I wanted something a little more flashy. At first I was self-conscious about all the boobs, but once I got out of the room, I got compliments left and right! The billowy bubble sleeves make it easy to wear along with the frill skirt. I could have used some Spanks for the tummy since the material is thick, but it was fine. My chest is on the larger side, and while it showed a lot of cleavage, they fit nicely inside since there was some stretch. The sequins weren't too itchy...totally wearable.

links_reviews_title: Loved this dress and received so many compliments!
links_reviews_text: True to size, sparkly, great for a party event, long sleeve great for winter! All around must!
I ordered size 2z The size is slight big on me but it doesn't bother me too much. Great for party and photos and especially for those who would like to stand out ! #shinelikeastar

This dress was fantastic. I got lots of compliments and loves it with the high boots! Fits well and very comfortable I am 5'2/ 150 lbs/ 36G - I wore a large perfectly. I was worried about the length and being to right across the top. The boots made the length flattering and it was not right across my top. Perfect for a little party dress!

links_reviews_title: All eyes on me kinda dress
links_reviews_text: Rented for a fraternity date party and was not disappointed. The dress fit great it was short but not uncomfortably. No bra needed! I got tons of compliments and stood out from the crowd!

This is the most beautiful dress ever! I will be renting it again for sure. I am super picky bc I have kinda a bigger chest and smaller waist, so it's hard for me to find dresses, but this dress was perfect. It's short and very flirty with a little ruffling at the bottom. It's the perfect amount of cleavage. The sparkle is beautiful!! Love love love!
This dress was so beautiful and I received many compliments throughout the entire party. I would definitely wear again, but if you're tall like me (5'10) it may be pretty short.
Loved this dress! The inside material is smooth so it's not itchy with all the sequins.

links_reviews_title: LOVED this dress! Got so many compliments on it!
links_reviews_text: LOVED IT!! After reading all the reviews about the length I went with the large instead of M. Glad I did bc it left me just enough room to stay comfy all night long. Got a ridiculous amount of compliments on it too! Also, even though its full sequin it was not heavy either which was fantastic. Showed perfect tasteful cleavage too. I definitely recommend this dress.
This is a wow. Just a bit short so I wore stockings...
I felt like a disco ball in a good way in this dress. Super cute and fun. It's short but still feels classy with the long arms.

links_reviews_title: BEAUTIFUL sexy dress! High quality loved it.
links_reviews_text: A bit short but I'm tall, 5'9
This dress is short, I am 4"11 and it was above my knee. I received so many compliments all night long.
The way it catches the light is amazing, super comfortable if you're looking to dance the night away

links_reviews_title: Loved this dress! It does run a little short but it was perfect for the fundraiser gala. comfortable
links_reviews_text: I ended up wearing the medium because i thought it was a little longer. I was afraid the neck line was going to be to revealing but it was classy. I would rent this again!
Very short, too small for me. I'm 5'2" and couldn't bend over. I wish I would've sized up!

This dress is my favorite. It is so cute, flattering on the chest, not too short, the sleeves are perfect, and it's comfortable. My only complaint is from my friends who said that the sequins were scratchy and hurt them when I danced but whatever- I looked cute!

links_reviews_title: Wore to a gala. Dress is a stand out! I received compliments all night.
links_reviews_text: Very comfortable and fun to dance in.

links_reviews_title: The dress was fun and flirty
links_reviews_text: This dress was perfect for my birthday. It was a fun, flirty, and just enough sexy for a friend/family event. I rented a small but in hind sight should have got a XS, the waist area was a little loose but I still felt it looked great and wore it. I am 5‚Äô5 and weigh about 118-120lbs, 32DD.
Rented this dress for a disco party and it was PERFECT. the lining is soft and it's a darker silver glitter than you normally see so you'll be sure to stand out.
Wore to a sorority formal, true to size except I found it a little short but I am also pretty tall - tons of compliments & photographs well
Not too tight. The sequins did all of the work. It was just adorable. "Classy" cleavage.

links_reviews_title: Perfect for our sparkly bachelorette trip!
links_reviews_text: True to size-- only medium was available and since I usually wear a small it was a little big. But it worked for the specific occasion I needed it for. It's tailored enough to give shape. Loved the blouson sleeves. Great quality!

links_reviews_title: My boyfriend took me out for my birthday and this dress ended up being perfect for the occasion
links_reviews_text: Not as flattering as I thought it would be. It was very comfortable, but I would not recommend for short torso gals (like myself) out there! If you are looking for something in between fun/classy/party I think this a good choice!

links_reviews_title: The fit was way too short!
links_reviews_text: The skirt length was far too short to wear.
Comfortable and flattering
Was a little low cut, but still looked really good and not too risqu√©. My husband loved!
Was too tight on my body (normally an xs-s) so I'd recommend sizing up, had to return

links_reviews_title: Great dress! Very comfortable and such a statement piece!!!
links_reviews_text: Size small was a perfect fit for my size. Lots of Cleveage on display I wasn't expecting, but it was still perfect!

links_reviews_title: Was awesome dress! Received tons of compliments. I wore size small as I wanted a little less fitted.
links_reviews_text: Short and tight, recommend wearing bra with it unless a size B cup or smaller.

links_reviews_title: Wish I had somewhere to wear this!
links_reviews_text: This dress was gorgeous. The fit, the material, the color- everything. Unfortunately, it was a little over-the- top for the event I was attending so I sadly had to send it back. Hopefully I'll have to go somewhere soon so I can wear it!

really wanted to love this, as it is gorgeous, but swallowed me up a bit. The sleeves are gorgeous but a bit too blousy for my t-rex arms. Really pretty though and would slay on the tall ladies for sure!

links_reviews_title: This is beautiful dress and fits just right . I love it and receive so many complements .
links_reviews_text: It's a true fit of size and short . Love the color and how it shapes my body .
I loved wearing this dress it was so well made and so comfortable too!
Love!!! Just simply sexy! Not to low cut, not to short, the sleeve length was perfect! It fit like a glove! I would totally rent this again!!
The reviews said it ran short and I should have listened! It was really short, but fit great, so I paired it with faux leather leggings.

So I know all of the reviews said this dress was short, but I'm only 5'1" so I figured this with black tights for a work gala with a silver theme would be super cute. The L fit fine, but it was SO short. There was absolutely no way I could wear this to a work event. Sadly, I couldn't wear it.

links_reviews_title: Super flattering and fun! Great for cold weather due to the long sleeves.
links_reviews_text: VERY SHORT! I wore with tights so it was fine but I am only 5'3 so I was surprised how short it was!

I absolutely loved this dress however it did require 3inch heels to keep the train off the floor, so be prepared to suffer on the dance floor! The waist runs a little tight, so ideally I would have sizes up to a 12 R. Otherwise it was perfection!

This dress was beautiful, I felt elegant & received many compliments! I'm 5'2" and wore 2 1/2" heels, the train was a little long in the back but I didn't trip on it; the neckline & lace detail is beautiful. First time using RTR and I'll definitely do it again!
Dress was easy to wear and perfect for black tie event. Made whole evening fun.
The bust area runs small. The detail with the lace is fantastic
I received so many compliments on this dress! It fit perfectly with my shape and frame. Plus it was comfortable to wear!
There is no give to the fabric, so I would recommend ordering your normal size and a size up. The fit and the cut were perfect!
Fit perfectly, loved it! Wish I could keep forever, made me feel so beautiful!

Rented this as a back up for the Emmys. It looked great. It's dark navy with black lace. The zipper, which was slightly warped, was a real challenge and almost won't zip up. It took several minutes and multiple tries but it finally zipped.

links_reviews_title: Beautiful, fun dress with lovely details, great for dancing
links_reviews_text: This was my first time trying RTR and I have to say overall it was a wonderful experience. My order came with plenty of time to try on and figure out shoes/accessories. The fabric has a nice solid weight to it without feeling heavy. I was worried about wearing this to a summer wedding but the fabric breathed well, and the flowy nature of the skirt helped with ventilation. The 8 fit perfectly, didn't have to wear a bra to fill it out (a worry with many dresses), the front hit right at the perfect spot, just snug enough at the waist to give me shape without being tight, and no issues eating in the dress. When I fit put on the dress I was worried about the length of the back as it trailed on the ground, but with the platform I never stepped on it. I received SO MANY compliments!

links_reviews_title: This dress is unbelievably beautiful! I felt amazing in this dress and I got a ton of compliments!
links_reviews_text: I‚Äôm 5‚Äô5 and wore the 10r. My husband is only slightly taller than me but this dress requires high heels. Thankfully my husband didn‚Äôt mind but I was definitely taller than him.
Beautiful elegant wedding dress. Nice rear train draped elegantly. Embroidery and fabric were beautiful. Cut of the dress fit comfortably throughout evening.

links_reviews_title: I was comfortable and I had several women stopping me and asking where I got my dress.
links_reviews_text: Being 5' 10" the back of this dress was right length for me. I felt like a princess all evening. I don't think this dress would work well for a petite woman. I had the 10 Regular and it hit right at the perfect length and it never got in the way. Beautiful dress, so glad that I rented it.

Was able to wear without a bra, nice material. Love the black and navy combo. A little long in the back I'm 5'2" but wasn't really a problem. Paired with yellow for a fun punch of color. Many compliments.

links_reviews_title: I wore this dress to the Navy Submarine Birthday Ball. I absolutely loved this dress!
links_reviews_text: I am a very tall woman, and this dress just barely hit the floor whic was amazing! If you under 6 feet, I suggest getting the regular length. Highly suggest getting a stick on bra as the cut on top is more triangle. All in all, this dress was amazing and would HIGHLY recommend if going to a formal event!
I loved wearing this dress at a formal professional event. I had to try a few different sizes and lengths to get the right fit. I'm 5'4" and the regular length worked best!
Runs a bit tight in the waist and large in the just. Would get one size up and your usual size.

links_reviews_title: Unique design, too large on top.
links_reviews_text: This dress does not have a built in bra like most formal dresses. Even with a strapless bra I did not fill it out enough, I'm a 36B. The only downside of being a pear shape in this case is that the top was too big while the rest fit fine.

links_reviews_title: Looks great on a baby bump as well!
links_reviews_text: I rented two dresses for a ball. My friend who was also attending the ball is pregnant. Originally I planned to wear this blue dress which was stunning and so comfortable, but my friend's dress didn't fit her new shape. I let her wear this dress instead which she absolutely loved and felt so comfortable in. So - this dress looks absolutely adorable on both your normal body, as well as super flattering on a bump! The only caveat - her date kept stepping on the train of her dress which is lace so it can't be hemmed - but that was the only downfall.

links_reviews_title: I have never had more complements on a dress before! Absolutely gorgeous!!
links_reviews_text: For perfect! Great for a formal wedding or event!

I love this elegant dress by ML Monique L‚Äôhuillier! Running small with no stretch, I recommend wearing a size up for your primary size. This style is fitted throughout the midsection and loose at the hips. It works best for A-C cup sizes. You are not able to wear a standard bra with this dress o you should wear a strapless bra . At 5‚Äô5, the length hit knee length on me. The high low cut of the dress is absolutely stunning and is definitely a fun style. Pair with simple heels and a black clutch to complete your outfit!

The fair was almost perfect the waistline did not give any slack so throughout the evening I felt like it kept getting tighter and I could not breathe very well I was very uncomfortable. If I did not eat anything or have any alcoholic beverages that might not have happened but it's not Realistic. The dress was extremely flattering however I love the color and the shape. I'm usually a size 6 long so I'm just surprised that the 8 Long was super tight on me towards the end of the night

links_reviews_title: The timing of delivery was key, dresses were ready to wear, and rental cost was reasonable
links_reviews_text: Would have preferred a petite size but the high low look made the tail flow
Very beautiful dress. Felt very glamorous. The top part was a little loose for me. The back of the dress also kept getting stepped on (I'm 5'7" and wore 3" heels). Would rent again.

I wore this to a "retro 60s-70s-80s" work party, thinking with the lace detail and shape it had a 60s-ish Mad Men vibe. This was a backup style, and I ended up loving it. I'm 5'3 and even in heels I was dragging on the floor, but the skirt flowed out when I walked which made it feel very princess-like. I recently went from a DDD to a C, so I think bustier girls might want to go up a size, this fit me great and I didn't need a bra or feel like it was obvious I didn't. Highly recommend this one. Lots of compliments.

This dress was perfect for a NYE party that was black tie. It was classy but had a bit of a fun twist with the halter top and high/low cut. The only tricky part was navigating a crowded party with a train.

links_reviews_title: The compliments received and the elegance of the dress flowing behind me
links_reviews_text: Went with the 6. I‚Äôm 5‚Äô4‚Äù 140lbs with an athletic build. The dress is stunning. It was snug at the top and waist but ran true to size. I did have to be mindful of the length, a few ppl stepped on it. Received a ton of compliments. It‚Äôs a dress meant for taller girls but my 5‚Äô4‚Äù self was able to pull it off with some 3 in sling backs.

Found out last-minute that I won tickets to our arts center's black-tie fundraiser. This was only one of a few dresses available and I'm SO happy I rented it! Rented the 10 & 12 and ended up in 12 for more breathing room. A little big on top, but not noticeable by others. I'm 5'5" and wore ~3" heels - the back skirted the floor beautifully! Dress is a frosty-navy color with black lace. I received many compliments and would totally rent again for a formal affair!

I loved it! I got complimented all night. I will say the bust fit tightly, so I'm grateful there was a free larger size with my order. The train also was VERY long, i had on 4" heels and i still found myself tripping on the lace a lot. The fabric was thick enough that you don't really need to figure out an awkward bra situation. Totally would rent this dress again!

links_reviews_title: Crying about returning this! I LOVED IT!!
links_reviews_text: I am in between a 10 and 12. I went with the 12 bc I had more room up top to put a strapless bra underneath without feeling like I couldn't breathe. I'm 5'8 and wore a 3 inch heel. I got the regular length. I can't imagine who would be tall enough to pull off the long. Make sure you measure your shoulder to the lowest point of the gown as I can imagine this being too long for many women. For me this was perfect, fitted up top and flared. No shape wear needed for my mommy tummy. I felt comfortable beautiful all night and received lots of compliments. It was perfect for the gubernatorial inaugural gala we attended.

I absolutely LOVED this dress! I rented it for my friends black tie optional wedding and it was PERFECT! I received so many compliments on it all night! Didn't want to send it back The ONLY thing was that the bust was a little big for me, I tried to wear a strapless bra but found it uncomfortable so I ended up taking it off during the wedding and was fine without one!
Everyone loved this dress. It was gorgeous and classic yet modern.

links_reviews_title: Strap is too long, I was it was adjustable

links_reviews_text: Gorgeous dress but could not wear because the bust was too tight
Great quality, true to size fit. The dress was awesome!

This dress was gorgeous! When I tried it on it fit really tight in the top was not very comfortable. I would have needed to go up 2 sizes from my normal size. I loved the high low look and the lace detailing. Ultimately just was not meant for me.
Top fit well and I could wear this without a bra. Flattering cut. I had on low heels and the train was quite long so people did step on the train several times. I was pleased with this rental.

links_reviews_title: Great dress - very fun to wear to a black tie wedding
links_reviews_text: The top of the dress has very little give, so definitely order a size up as your back-up. I ended up wearing the bigger size and it fit perfectly.
This dress is perfect for anyone with a full bust when you are trying to be more modest. It was forgiving as well the stomach area, very comfortable!

links_reviews_title: Couldn't wear it - it was too tight.
links_reviews_text: It was too tight. I normally wear size 6 & 8 but this was too tight, I couldn't wear it.

This dress fit well through the body. I'm between a 4 and 6 and got the 6, there was room but made it comfortable. The regular was quite long, I'm 5'8 and wore a 4 inch heel. The back was very close to touching the ground.

links_reviews_title: Great dress but small on the chest if you are a bit busty. But shows great lots of compliments!

links_reviews_text: Formal or dress it down with denim. Silky, perfect fit, fun details. Such a lovely pattern! Hosted a meetup at a podcast comedy show. Easy to find me in a red dress in a crowded place.

links_reviews_title: Touch and go with zipping up but once it was on, LOVED
links_reviews_text: Hard to tell if it was a busted zipper or too small but after 3 pairs of hands got me zipped up it was one of my fave rentals. Even in heels, not too short which is a rare feat at 5'9.

links_reviews_title: Photographs well but big in bust
links_reviews_text: Rented this for a girls trip - the length was good on my short frame (just above the knees), and the color photographs so well. I couldn't wear a bra with it bc the front v is so deep, and my small chest didn't fill it out, so the bust looked really saggy on me. Also the back hooks at kept coming undone bc I didn't fill it out up top, so I had to be vigilant to avoid flashing anyone! Larger chests will wear it much better than I could.
This red stands out so well and the skirt hits just above my knee, and I was in this the whole day and didn't feel uncomfortable at all, and the beautiful blue button details is just so sweet.
The fit on the dress was great and the design details were beautiful. I didn't end up wearing the dress because there was way too much cleavage for me :(

links_reviews_title: Will not rent this dress again
links_reviews_text: I loved the pattern and fabric of this dress even though it has bright colors. I thought i could pull this off for an every day dress, wear it to the office. It is too low cut in the front so i had to use a tank top of mine to conceal my cleavage, the sleeves are too poufie for me and it fits weird below the waist. I'm not going to rent this dress again

I wore this for an awards ceremony and loved the color, really made me stand out. Puffy sleeves for sure and could be seen by some as a but short but I felt comfortable. I got a 10 and it was a bit loose in the front and a little too low cut for my taste but overall a fun dress! People were even messaging me the day after to see where the dress was from!

I absolutely LOVED wearing this dress! (So much so that I wore it to two different wedding welcome parties) - Pictured here in Mykonos. Rent this dress for a semi-formal affair and let the compliments roll in ;)

This is a U.K. 6 and US 2. It fits true to size. I'm usually between a 2 and a 4 ( probably more towards the 4 right now) and it fit but was a bit snug in the stomach. I received many compliments from women and my husband. It's a very attractive pattern and color. The detailing in the front is a little odd and not that flattering in my opinion but overall it's a cute dress.

links_reviews_title: Even more beautiful in person, but the sizing messed me up!
links_reviews_text: I normally wear an 8 or 10 and I would rather it be too big than not be able to zip it at all, so I ordered the 10. When it came in the mail it was a UK 10 and a US 6!!!!!!! I was mortified! I ended up being able to zip it up (it was a little tight in the boob/shoulder area) but overall, considering it was two sizes smaller than what I thought I ordered, it was so gorgeous and comfortable and I would rent it again! Got compliments all night.

links_reviews_title: So sad to give it back! I wore it to a wedding in an artsy, trendy venue and it really popped!
links_reviews_text: I loved this dress! It was super flattering, skirt wasn't too short, V-neck wasn't too revealing, fit was true to size; it was perfect for dancing and kept me relatively cool in a toasty southern wedding setting! My only critique would be maybe the fabric being a little taut in the shoulder area, but it didn't stop me from partaking in a hora chair lift or dancing the night away! Would definitely wear this again - I wish I didn't have to give it back!

links_reviews_title: Very flattering but a little lower cut than I'm used to
links_reviews_text: Great dress. I thought about buying it after I wore it because it was comfortable, beautiful colors, and was very figure flattering. It was a little lower cut than I'm comfortable with (34D), at least for work. The clasps on the back are tricky to do on your own so you may need some assistance. I'd wear a different bra next time because I had to keep adjusting to be sure it wasn't showing. Overall, great rental though.
This dress is so forgiving and flattering. Arms were a little tight.

links_reviews_title: Loved this for an evening wedding
links_reviews_text: I'm crazy about this dress. I wore it to an evening wedding with a cocktail dress code and felt so comfortable. I usually wear a 4 in dresses and the size 8 (UK) fit perfectly. Seriously thought about keeping this one!

links_reviews_title: I felt like Snow White in this
links_reviews_text: The material & structure of this dress is outstanding. It's honestly the most beautiful dress I've ever put on.
Runs big

links_reviews_title: Never wanted to take this off
links_reviews_text: So obsessed with this dress. It fit perfectly and the silky texture felt so good to wear. Never wanted to take it off - perfect birthday dress!!

Gorgeous red and navy dress. The level of detail from the puff sleeves to the buttons on the waist are all really elevated. Fit was true to size but may be a little tight on chest if larger bust. If you're sensitive on your shoulders looking wide, this may not be the best choice because of the puff sleeves. Overall would recommend !

I've been a longtime fan of the brand Self Portrait and I was super excited to wear this fun dress! It fits my hourglass shape like a dream and gives me the perfect amount of cleavage that makes it flirty but still tasteful. The top is fitted and the skirt is a-line and the perfect short length without being TOO mini (I'm 5'9"). My favorite part is the puffed sleeves, so adorable! I would definitely rent this dress again.

The dress is so cute and the pattern is so pretty! I love the feminine details. It's a little tight/constricting in the shoulders and the dress zipper was a little stuck where the frill was. I do have wider shoulders though. It was flattering to wear for just a day!

links_reviews_title: Beautiful color and material but short for tall girls!
links_reviews_text: I loved the vibrant colors of this dress, the cut, and the colors. The top part fit so well. The problem for me is proportionally it was way too short and it looked cartoonish due to the length. If I had a couple more inches this dress would have been a winner. Sad it didn't work.
Such a fun color and style.

links_reviews_title: It's a very Moulin Rouge look but I loved it! I had SO many compliments on this dress!
links_reviews_text: I'm normally a 2/4 but I rented an 8 and it fit me perfectly
I wore this to work on my birthday! Got so many compliments and I absolutely felt glam! The capped sleeves are so fun and colors are beautiful! Great detail on the dress!

links_reviews_title: Standout cocktail dress color and pattern for summer wedding.
links_reviews_text: I'm petite- usually small/medium, US size 5,6,7. I wore the backup UK size 8 and it fit fine. Size 10 fit slightly looser and the sleeves were puffier. Dress length was an inch or so above my knees, perfect length, not too short or long. One downside for me- I have slightly broad shoulders and the v-neck helped narrow down the look of my top half, but since dress sleeves are puffy, it made my shoulders look even wider. V-neck plunged a bit lower on my chest, so definitely needed fashion tape and a push-up bra helps; it's revealing but wasn't inappropriate for outdoor wedding cocktail attire. Overall fun and comfortable dress. Color and pattern really pop out - and looked great with a red lipstick/red earrings.
It's a bit shorter than I typically feel comfortable wearing and the neckline was a bit tricky. I couldn't wear a bra, so body tape was a must. Good dress for spring. I'd consider renting it again.
Anniversary dinner

This looked super fun from the model's photo, but the material is slightly shiny in real life, making it look cheap in my opinion. Also the bust was too large for me so it looked a little saggy in that area
Gorgeous dress wish I could buy it. It runs a little big

links_reviews_title: Too youthful for me, but very cute if you like that look
links_reviews_text: True to size
I regularly wear a size 10 but I got a 14 in this dress and it fit me perfectly. Cute dress but I ended up not wearing it.

Didn't wear. The cleavage was too much for the event I was planning to wear it to. I also didn't find the dress to be flattering. It was tight up top and across the back and poufy in the bottom. Pass.
Like the length

links_reviews_title: This dress is gorgeous. The fabric is luxurious and drapes nicely!
links_reviews_text: Fabric is lovely The back clasp comes undone Easily

I love this dress, but I ordered a size way too big. I overestimated what size I may need being 21 weeks pregnant. I was sad I couldn't wear it, but the fabric is so pretty, and I love the cut of the dress.
The dress is beautiful! The colors really are amazing! Overall so happy!

I didn't realize the material was so silky. It was a little dressy for daytime but I dressed it down with a cropped denim jacket and wedge espadrilles. It was nice to try out, very different from what I normally would wear.
tight in the chest, I'm a 34B/C and the girls were squeezed in pretty tight.

links_reviews_title: Not sure how my size would have fit.
links_reviews_text: Accidentally ordered several sizes too large but due to stretchy material it still had a decent fit and was fun to wear.
I think a belt would jazz this up more. Its a little baggy on me in some places but once stylized i think it'll be good!

Wore for a NYE party and concert, where the guys were all in tuxes. This was a fantastic choice. I paired with a cage bra and lots of fashion tape! Front zip made for easy bathroom breaks. I'm 5'7" and wore flats - hem hit me right at the ankle. The neckline is super adjustable with a belt - fully buttoned would have shown just a hint of cleavage, but I wanted maximum impact. I am a 36B and a store size 6. Jumpsuit was roomy enough to layer on top of a shirt if desired, waist and hips were roomy but not excessively so. I originally rented a small because the medium wasn't available, and the small was way too small in the thighs and torso length. Pockets are large - no need for a clutch with this one. Torso is a teensy bit short - long waisted gals should steer clear. Jumpsuit had clearly been worn a few times before, as it was missing some sleeve buttons, but wasn't super noticeable. With the right accessories, this could go from date night up to black tie. Highly recommend as a dress alternative!

links_reviews_title: Great for work AND date nights!
links_reviews_text: I wore this jumpsuit on a date AND also to work one day. I undid the inner button so it shows just little more skin and it was just enough hotness I wanted. For work I completely closed up and looked pretty professional X)
A bit cropped at the leg. Felt like the crotch was a little too high. Very simple look but quite versatile.

Perfect for my work convention! Trendy but also professional. I'm 5'8" so it did kind of push the limits of a wedgie...BUT nothing a little spanx couldn't alleviate. Such a great outfit! I was so tempted to buy it.

links_reviews_title: I felt small, powerful and beautiful. This jumpsuit shows off my curves perfectly =)
links_reviews_text: I loved the way this fit but it needed something for the middle to break up all the black so I added a gold belt. I wore this to party and people stared all night long. This fit true to size. I have no complaints!
Looked great, but bunches up in the tummy area. In addition, the torso area was short leaving me pulling it down all night so it didn't ride up. Overall, I loved the look!

links_reviews_title: Probably better on a girl with curves
links_reviews_text: Too big in the bust and bottom (I don't have any curves, so maybe this would work on someone with a curvy shape). Looked dumpy on me.

links_reviews_title: High class without the price tag!
links_reviews_text: I loved this junpsuit!! I wore this to a work event and got stopped by almost everyone and showered with compliments. It hugged and fit all the right places, the length in the arms and legs were perfect. I was just glad I didnt need to raise my hands above my head because well, it wasn't gona happen if I needed to lol!

I am 5'3" and weigh 105. I love this jumpsuit so much!! It fit perfectly everywhere but the length. It hit me about a 1/2 inch below my ankle bone, which some may like but I wanted a little shorter look. I ended up just rolling the hem up and it gave it a little more character and looked really cute! I got so many compliments on it!

links_reviews_title: Loved this jumpsuit so much that I bought it!
links_reviews_text: I was scared to get the XS but I'm really glad I did. The waist was elastic and had enough give to be comfortable throughout dinner at an Italian restaurant for date night with my husband. Had I ordered the S I'm sure that the top and shoulders would've been too loose to wear as a plunging neckline. Another wonderful thing about this jumpsuit is that I didn't need to use hem tape like I usually do with jumpsuits because at my 5'2" height, even with 4" heels jumpsuits have always ALWAYS been too long for me. I loved the different options for how to wear the front, depending on how I wanted to fasten the buttons. For date night, I wore it fully open for the plunging neckline and wore a lace bodysuit from Victoria's Secret so that I wouldn't have to worry about double sided tape and an accidental peekaboob all night. The zipper is in the front, so taking it off to use the restroom felt familiar like pulling down jeans. Even though I still had to take off the top to pull it down, it was so much more convenient than the typical jumpsuits that fasten and zip up in the back. I bought this piece because it can easily be dressed up for a formal event, but I can also wear it the conservative way to work, or as the plunging neckline with a white button up, v-neck tank, or scoop neck tee. Paired with different shoes, belts, and bags, I'm excited for what other looks I can create with the same exact jumpsuit. Thanks RTR!

links_reviews_title: I ended up wearing a different RTR outfit, but would rent this again because it screamed Boss Babe!
links_reviews_text: Fit: Very tailored - I normally wear a medium because of my larger bottom, but I wanted this to be slightly more fitted and the small was perfect. The material wasn't quite as stretchy so I might pass on it for a wedding, but it would work well for just a nice dinner event or work. I used my own belt to allow for a more open plunging neckline, but it looks great all buttoned up and professional as well.
Jumpsuit fit very snug! Although you can‚Äôt tell from the photo, it was way too tight in the stomach and butt area. The jumpsuit didn‚Äôt stretch, I wouldn‚Äôt order it again.

links_reviews_title: Got rave reviews. Beautiful piece and easy to wear. You may want to order up for maximum comfort.
links_reviews_text: Wore it to a bridal shower and it was perfect. Easy bathroom process. Everyone complimented me. Classy look overall.
Loved this piece! I wore it to the symphony. It was a little bit long, however I am 5'1". I really enjoyed the zipper being in the front. Very classy yet Chic. Highly recommend

I'm in love with this trendy style by Greylin! Comfy and classy! It runs true to size, and I would recommend sizing up for backup. It's a stretchy fabric, with comfortable room throughout the midsection and hips. It's great for any cup size, and can be worn with any standard bra, NuBra, or no bra! From work to dinner looking fabulous!
I changed the way I wore the top part to show a bit more cleavage which I loved so much more!

Love this! So happy to finally find a designer that put the zipper in the front so it doesn't take 10 min to use the restroom!! Very comfortable. May want to wear something under for work as it's a bit low cut.

I rented this jumpsuit to host an awards ceremony. Loved the fit! It's true to size and has enough room in the torso to make it comfortable. The top fastens with a button to give it a wrap top look with no worries about the neckline coming open. I got several compliments. Oh, and it has pockets!!

links_reviews_title: It was beautiful and so comfortable!
links_reviews_text: I had to tape the top down, no matter which way I buttoned it. But, overall, gorgeous.

This jumpsuit was super fun for nye. I ended up wearing as more of a plunging neckline with a belt. I'm usually a 4 and The SR JUST fit. Was a little snug in the thighs but that's where I carry my weight. For anyone with a long torso this would be uncomfortably short in that area.
Super cute and flattering but not great for those with hips and a big butt. It really restricted my movement!! #bigbootybeware
Super cute, but just not made for me at 5'10.

links_reviews_title: Classy, but hard to move in
links_reviews_text: This was my 1st choice for a Gala I worked but ultimately I wore my back up. If you have shape (as in curves, butt & thighs) SIZE UP. I am usually a 8 and expected the medium to work. But, it hugged my thighs, tummy & butt too much. The large was more comfortable and actually slimming with the fit. Because it's 1-piece, any arm movement can be limiting.

links_reviews_title: Perfect in every way...except my job.
links_reviews_text: I rented this to photograph a wedding in - it fit perfectly and felt AMAZING. I returned it immediately only because there is no way I could have full range of motion in the arms, and as a wedding photographer, you kind of need that. Was sad to send it back!

links_reviews_title: My teenage daughter hates dresses. Was the perfect alternative.
links_reviews_text: Glamorous and stylish.
I'm pear shaped. It was a bit tight on the legs. It probably wouldn't work for someone who has a long torso either. Super cute though.

links_reviews_title: Fit was right, length was not.
links_reviews_text: The length was much longer on me than the pictures led me to think (I am 5'6"). It hit at an awkward spot on my ankle. It looked cheap from the back because of the way the elastic is sewn in. I chose to wear something else to the event instead.

links_reviews_title: I wasn't able to wear this to the event as it wasn't long enough for my height.
links_reviews_text: I have long legs but an average torso and I was not able to stand up in this jumpsuit. The size (LR) fit everything else but the length.
The MR was too short in the stride for me.

links_reviews_title: Really fun concept, just a lot of fabric with no shape
links_reviews_text: It's a really fun jumpsuit, but there is no shape to it and is so much fabric. Reminded me of a scuba suit. Very conservative. Not sexy / flirty.
Didn't get the right size, major camel toe!
The torso length was too short along with the overall size.

This was my back up and when I put it on I realized it wasn't dressy enough for my event. Mostly because the medium I received looked tired and worn. Particularly the lapel. It was also quite short waisted. But the front zipper is a brilliant idea for a jumpsuit.
Fit was great overall but the front around the tummy was not flattering and a bit bulky looking.

links_reviews_title: This was a great jumpsuit and I loved the top, but the bottom was less flattering.
links_reviews_text: This is a gorgeous jumpsuit! The top worked beautifully on me (I'm a 5'0 girl who tends towards slim and small around the waist with some curves); however, the lower half was definitely looser on me than I would have preferred. It was also a few inches long on me, which I expect being my height and would have been easily solved if the other fit issues worked.
I am 5'6 and 137 lbs. this was a little short in the torso which was uncomfortable in the legs and crotch when I moved my arms

links_reviews_title: I couldn't wear it because it was too short in the torso.
links_reviews_text: Could not wear it because it was too short in the torso.

links_reviews_title: fit well with the 20's them of the event
links_reviews_text: Body fit well, but sleeves and pants were too long. bunched sleeves as I could, and ended up tacking up the hem. Would have been nice if this came in a petite. Also, the satin collar was very wrinkled. Would have been nice if that material were more substantial. Front zipper made it less of an ordeal to go to the bathroom!!!
Wore for public speaking event

links_reviews_title: I literally got so many compliments as I walked in Vegas from random strangers loving this dress!

links_reviews_text: Wore this out to a club in Vegas. Usually a 6 but an 8 was all they had- it still looked great and I liked how it draped the body. The color is a gorgeous red and the fabric is amazing. I was worried it would be a little too low cut/raunchy but it was perfect. I didn't wear a bra (small chested). The fabric was thick enough and it held in place fine up top, though I couldn't bend over all the way (could've used fashion tape). Would definitely recommend for a night out!

links_reviews_title: Love this dress, but sad I didn't wear it.
links_reviews_text: This dress fit perfect and it stayed in place when I tried it on. Unfortunately, I didn't end up having an event to wear it to.

links_reviews_title: This dress was very sexy and comfortable.
links_reviews_text: I had zero problems with this dress, with the exception of finding the right shoes (I went with a wedge heel, nude, open toed). I wore this to a New Years Eve party and I felt confident, sexy and dancing was easy. This is the type of dress that I did not have to worry about slipping, sliding, scrunching, all night. I can't remember a single time I pulled, yanked or adjusted anything. I will measure all future dresses against this one.

Wow! What cannot I not say about this dress! Perfect for a small busy and wide(ish) hips. Material is heavier than I would've expected but it's a good thing! Won't be see through and won't show underwear. I felt so sultry while still feeling classy. It's a deeper red than in photo. Rent this dress and be a head turner! (Red lips recommended.)

links_reviews_title: Not for those who get shy easily
links_reviews_text: WOWZA. Wore for NYE in San Francisco. Fabric tape was a MUST.

I wore this for our 1 year anniversary dinner. My man loved it and just the right amount of tasteful cleavage. I felt sexy and comfortable! I would definitely recommend this dress and will probably rent it again.

This dress is SO awesome! I thought it was going to be more orange, but it's RED. The material is thicker than I thought, so it held the girls in and everything else in place perfectly. Definitely not too indecent. Loved it!

You've got to be comfortable showing a LOT of skin and most of your boobs. Not much room for tape and no chance of any other kind of support not showing. Snug around the hips. Nice length. Easy to sit in.
This was the backup to my backup and HOLY CRAP what a great choice! The dress fit beautifully and I received many MANY compliments. 10/10 recommend

links_reviews_title: Beautiful but Top runs large needed to get creative to make dress work tastefully.
links_reviews_text: Size down. (You must step into dress or overhead, no zipper but fabric has stretch). This dress is a gorgeous red and makes you feel like Marilynn Monroe. But the Top runs large. I should've rented a 0. You need the top to fit tight and since I am short at 5 '2" I had to get very creative to make this dress work and not show my chest! I used a clear rubber band to gather the dress behind my neck to take up the extra fabric and wore my hair down ...was completely unnoticeable. Then I pinned The two straps that are the top to the waistband to make it tight and just wore sticky petal covers underneath (no bra possible). I also used some double stick fabric tape just to be safe. It was quite a bit of work to make it all work out but it was totally worth it and compliments for my anniversary and my husband loved it.

links_reviews_title: I rented this for a party that got cancelled, but will hold on to it anyway.
links_reviews_text: The red is a rich red, and due to the fabric, the fit is forgiving. I rented a 6, but could have gone with a 4 easily. I think the sizing should have been small/medium/large type sizing due to the range of sizes this 6 could fit. If you're not sure how it'll fit, just get your usual size and don't worry. It's fairly magical in fit. You might want to use fashion tape though, unless you're daring like me. :) This is a dress where you will risk sharing. Also, nipple petals will be needed if it's chilly and you don't want to beam your headlights at the world. If you do, cool. It's a sexy dress. The world won't end for it. For me, I'll use petals when I do wear this, hopefully for a date next weekend.

links_reviews_title: I did not wear this to anything. Shipped back immediately.
links_reviews_text: Too big in waist and hips. Just hangs. Not flattering on me.

links_reviews_title: Beautiful garment, not meant for us busty ladies!
links_reviews_text: The fabric was beautiful and from the photos I was expecting this to be a little more tastefully revealing. It's a sexy little red dress but just didn't lay as nicely as anticipated due to have a smaller waist and bustier top.
That's what I was going for. A great sexy dress for a sexy date. Shows off the cleavage and if u have butt it's confirming in the waist and hips to show off curves

links_reviews_title: I wore this dress to an Opening Night party of a Broadway show and it was perfect!
links_reviews_text: I added a little fashion tape to adjust the neckline higher. The dress fit perfectly and felt so comfortable!

links_reviews_title: Cute and comfortable. Looking forward to wearing it at an upcoming beach wedding!
links_reviews_text: Straps are adjustable which is nice and overall it‚Äôs a comfortable and flattering dress.

I wore this to a summer formal party. The dress was extremely comfortable. The colors of the dress are very nice. When walking the dress is stunning and moves very well. I received compliments all night about this dress!

Had flat on and still nice perfect long length but didn't trip at all. Felt light and airy on, lots of compliments. The waist was little tight but not uncomfortable. I actually ended up crisscrossing the waist tie in front twice and then tying it in the back and not the front. Great California night time wedding dress.
Such a beautiful and comfortable dress. Top fits just right. Adjustable tie straps. Back is just the right amount of low cut.
Dress was super flown and fun!! I got a ton of compliments! It did run small in the rib cage. If you have a wider rib cage, then definitely order a size up as it's pretty snug.

I wore this to a friends wedding & I felt so great in this dress! It is absolutely perfect for tall girls (I'm 6 feet tall as reference). I ended up wearing flats with it. I felt that it did run a little small. I usually wear a medium, but ended up wearing a large because of my curves. Overall, I loved the material of the dress and the length! I got so many compliments on it.

I wore this dress to a yacht party in NYC. The dress flowed beautifully and looked amazing with the wind blowing. The dress is VERY long. I'm 5'7" and had on 3.5" heels and it still hit the floor. I found the zipper very hard to get up and had to get my best friend to help get me in it. Overall I loved the dress. I got lots of compliments and felt beautiful in it.

links_reviews_title: Wore it for my bridal shower! Felt beautiful and most of all - comfortable.
