links_reviews_text: This is great if you have a big bust. The straps tie, so you can adjust to fit your shape. Classy cleavage. The bottom flows and the floral is such a nice design. I definitely had to pull it over the top, as opposed to stepping in and zipping up, but it fit very nicely. Lots of compliments! Would rent again!
Very comfortable. Great overall fit in busy and hips. Straps are ties, so it was nice they are adjustable. Very long - has to wear 3 inch heels.

links_reviews_title: Beautiful and comfortable dress for a formal summer wedding!
links_reviews_text: The reviews said this dress runs small, so I rented the two biggest sizes. I'm glad I did! The straps are adjustable because they tie, which gives you some flexibility. The top was structured enough (but without sewn-in cups) that I didn't have to wear a bra. I wore this with three inch heels and it kept the dress about an half inch off the ground - probably not the dress for you if you are below 5'6" and don't want to wear crazy heels. I got so many compliments and would definitely recommend renting this dress!

It fit extremely well and I felt very comfortable in it. I loved how flowy it was and I received lots of compliments at my friend's bridal shower. The lower back gave it an extra fun side but you're still able to wear a normal bra. I'm 6'0 and the length was perfect for flats!

The fit was very comfortable with adjustable straps. I would be careful about the length...I definitely needed my 3" heels so I wouldn't trip! Overall very happy with this dress and received lots of compliments.
This dress was absolutely perfect for a beach wedding! It was super light and flowy and for a floor-length dress, it was easy to dance in. I almost didn't want to send it back!
This dress was super long as everyone mentioned, but so pretty. Surprisingly flattering! Loved it!

This dress absolutely fit true to form for me. I thought it was fine in the bust, and I'm a busty for sure. Great fit in the rib cage and I didn't find it too long at all! I wore a small wedge heel and that was perfect. It was flowy and perfect and so fun to dance the night away at a wedding. I highly recommend!

The dress was gorgeous, comfortable and adjustable! Lots of long fabric for dancing on the dance floor but also lightweight material to hold so not the end of the world. Would recommend. Wore to a beach wedding!

links_reviews_title: I felt really cute and received many compliments!
links_reviews_text: Very flowy and kept getting stuck places, but not a big deal!

overall a great dress but very long. I liked that the straps were adjustable but they were kind of annoying and needed to be very tight or else they would fall. I got so many compliments on this dress. it looked fantastic and was super comfortable for the Beach club wedding I wore it for. The negative is that I'm 5'2 and the dress was SO long. I used safety pins to do a makeshift hem at the bottom and i was wearing 4.5 inch wedges in this picture and you can see how its dragging on the floor. RTR really needs to get some petite dresses for us shorties. overall I recommend this dress!

I wish I could have kept this dress. It fit so nicely and I like that you could tighten the straps. I got so many compliments on this dress and I was sad I couldn't take credit for the dress being mine

links_reviews_title: Such a fun night, and I felt amazing!
links_reviews_text: Loved this dress! It was light and easy to wear. The ties on the shoulder straps were perfect for me since I have small shoulders and could adjust them to fit perfectly. I was worried it would be too long but it ended up being the perfect length with the small wedges I wore. If you're looking for a fun, flattering gown that's comfortable and easy to wear, I would definitely recommend this one! I loved it so much I rented it again for another wedding.

Wore this to a baby shower I attended. I was 14 weeks pregnant and was loose enough around the belly that it was very comfortable. Very pregnancy friendly! The length for me (5'6'') was perfect with sandals. The colors were beautiful and got many compliments!

This was an amazing fit and I loved that you did not need to wear a bra with the dress. Unfortunately, towards the end of the evening one of the straps broke! The dress is very long so make sure you're comfortable wearing a higher shoe with the dress. Everything about this dress was a wonderful minus the broken strap. I received many many compliments and felt a very formal and feminine.

Perfect for an indoor/outdoor summer wedding! I wore the small (fit my small chest great, no bra), and was lonnng. I got to wear 3" heels, and at 5'8" that's rare. I loved twirling in the dress on the dance floor and the way the dress flowed around me. The straps are adjustable (they just tie to your desired height), so no worries about straps falling. Lots of compliments, definitely recommend.
Super flowy! Loved the look and feel! The only con was that it was a little long, but I made it work with a trendy knot.
Very long, but flowed beautifully. Adjustable straps. Ran small
Pretty floral dress for an outdoor wedding.

Very flattering shape, got a ton of compliments. The straps are adjustable which is nice, and the length was perfect with a heel. The XL was actually my backup size (I am normally a L), and it fit perfectly. This definitely runs small, especially if you have a full bust like myself.

I loved this dress! I was hoping I could wear a normal pair of heels with it, but I needed much more. I ended up wearing 5.5 inch platform wedges just so I wasn‚Äôt walking all over the dress. It was forgiving to my soft, postpartum midsection and roomy for a curvier hips/bum.
Flowy and light, fun florals, adjustable straps - it was a big hit all around. My only complaint is that all dresses should have pockets. It hurt a little to give this one back!

I wore this dress for an outdoor wedding. It was great! I was comfortable and felt beautiful. I didn't wear a bra with it, which is something I never do. I can't recommend this dress enough. BUT it was long so I had to wear heels. Keep that in mind.

This was a backup dress because the dress I choose was unavailable. I wore the XLR to a brunch wedding. The colors were pretty. The dress was comfy. Only issue is I'm 5'4" and I kept tripping over the dress because it was so long. And if you have larger than a size C chest, this dress isn't for you. I had to keep tucking my boobs back in. Overall I would definitely recommend!

Such an insanely gorgeous dress. I rented it for a casual weekend and didn't think it could be worn for fancier occasions but it can be! I think this dress would be fabulous for a spring wedding. The dress fit me fine and I like that you can adjust and tie the straps to your liking. I'm 5'4 so the size small was a bit long on me. I had to wear extra high heels to ensure I wasn't constantly stepping on the dress. Even with the straps tied to my shoulders tightly it was still a bit long. Still I felt like a floral goddess in this dress and I was really sad to have to bring it back.
Couldn't even kind of zip it up. I'm a 14-16. I was sure they'd send the wrong size. Alas!
Slightly tight in the bust and long but worked well with platform shoes.
Love this dress! Fit awesome except for being way too long. Trendy knot, as another reviewer mentioned, for the win!

I loved this dress. The top was very complimentary and I didn't have to wear a bra with it. Loved the tie straps. The only thing I didn't love is the waistband. It had no give and got quite uncomfortable. The dress was a bit long for me so I had to be careful when walking in it but higher heels would've fixed that. It's beautiful and high quality!

Very pretty dress, but very poorly made. The top is only meant for smaller busted women. The straps aren't even and the side of the dress looks totally different on one side - leaving a lot of open skin on one side with the other side covered up too much.

links_reviews_title: Wore it to the wedding rehearsal dinner as a guest.
links_reviews_text: Fit perfect very comfortable.

links_reviews_title: Pretty Dress for a Pretty Day
links_reviews_text: I loved this dress. Probably my favorite RTR so far. It was flattering and simple. It was perfect for a backyard wedding. Definitely runs small so size up!

links_reviews_title: Beautiful dress, very fitted on top, too long for women of average height.
links_reviews_text: I received a ton of compliments on this dress, however I am 5'4 and had to hold the skirt up when I walked, even with my highest heels on. Also, the bust is very fitted. I would recommend getting a size up if you are bustier, however the length may be a problem.

links_reviews_title: Good blouse for work or for date night
links_reviews_text: Easy to wear, doesn't wrinkle. I love the lace sleeves.
I wore this top to dinner with my family. The fit was flattering and true to size. I usually wear an 8 and the medium fit well. Not a show stopper but a good rental.

I rented this super cute top for work. The see-through sleeves make it feel a little sexy but it's not revealing/inappropriate for the office at all. The sleeves were a little short and the top was a little tight across the back of the shoulders but it didn't bother me for a one time wear. Would definitely rent again!

Loved the delicate lace details and sheer sleeves! The v neck was a good height and I didn't need a cami underneath. The sleeves and over all top length could have been longer. Probably would have purchased if it was longer.
Very pretty, zipped on the side. If you have a small chest- this will not stay up and you will wind up flashing some bra as I did. I would have felt better in a XS or a bigger chest LOL

links_reviews_title: Black silky see thru arm blouse
links_reviews_text: This blouse has a lot going on with ruffles around the neck see thru patterned arms lower cut but not too low. Fitted at the right places under chest. It is stretchy enough and comfortable to get on and off. Has a side zipper for extra on/off room Hides a lot. Would work for early maternity I think. Roomy in the chest and belly areas. Had a little too much extra fabric in the chest for me but still liked it.
I'm a 36D so this was a little tight in the chest but overall a true Medium fit. This was a great party shirt!
Fit well, very delicate and flattering. You can dress it up or down. Good staple fir the cold season.
Loved the sheer sleeves and fit of this top. I wore to work but it could have been easily transitioned to a night out top.
go from work to drinks with this top
This was really cute for nights out. I'm smaller-chested but it didn't show too much cleavage, so wore it to work a few times. The sleeves are really fun and I got lots of compliments.
it's very cute top for everyday, work, date night. runs slightly small though. was expecting it to be little loose but it was tight around my waist.
Fit was odd and sleeves ran short. Super cute style though.

links_reviews_title: Pairs well with jeans for a casual dinner with work colleagues
links_reviews_text: Nice enough top that dresses up a pair of skinny jeans for a casual dinner.
Tight in the chest, but I have a large bust.

links_reviews_title: I loved this top-- very versatile! I wore to work w/ black pants and also jeans w/ heels.
links_reviews_text: True to size. Drapes nicely in front and not too tight in the waist.
Wore this shirt to work then on a dinner date. It was comfortable but beautiful. No issues on fit.
This fits perfectly true to size and works for many different occasions! I received so many compliments! Adorable!!
Fit perfect: If is fitted yet flowy in all the right places

For those of us who use both medium and large tops, go with the large. Although the bust, sleeves and hip area were perfect, it was tight at the waist on me and I could not zip the side zipper without risking a tear. Mediums should go large. Loved the sleeves so will order again.
Kind of boring. No pizzaz.
needs an undershirt
Went well with jeans and heels for work.
I wanted to love this shirt, but it's just okay. It fit well, but there was nothing super memorable about it.
Sleeves were a bit short for my height but overall fit well
loved it
Very frilly and see through all over

I got this for a birthday dinner out with friends and absolutely LOVED it! Fit was true to size. The fun lace and ruffle details added a little pizzazz to what is basically a simple, place top. I have looked to purchase it, but can't find it online!

links_reviews_title: Too small in the shoulders and armpits, wish I got an XS
links_reviews_text: Too small in the shoulders and armpits, wish I got an XS
Really wanted to love this top but the sleeves were way too short. I am tall and tend to have longer arms but it's usually not a problem with the brand

links_reviews_title: I didnt wear, but was a cute top.
links_reviews_text: Just fit me
The top runs more true to size than the other comments led me to sizing up. There is some stretch in the band under the chest, runs longer than expected. Loved the sleeves!
Liked this shirt, got a compliment, was comfy.
Good for a short torso and narrow shoulders.

links_reviews_title: I didn't wear it- too small.
links_reviews_text: It was pretty but unfortunately too small. It was a bit too snug in the rib cage. I could have worn it but I would have been very uncomfortable.

The sizing of this top definitely felt like juniors. The piece of fabric that is meant to define the waist cut right across the busy. The sleeves were way too short. The length was newly midriff bearing. Maybe this would be cute on a petite frame? If you are tall, skip this shirt. I am a true medium and could barely get the large on.

links_reviews_title: This blouse is perfect for a night out.
links_reviews_text: I wore this blouse for a dinner date. It was perfect and very flattering. It would be perfect for work too.

This blouse is cute, but I would say nothing too out of the ordinary. I wore it with jeans on a date night. I typically wear an XS, but the sleeves were a bit short and the torso part was tight. A small would have worked better. I suggest sizing up. I like the detail with the sheer sleeves and flat ruffles. There is a side zip to make it a defining fit.
I got so many compliments on this and just loved wearing it! It was so fun and pretty. Very comfortable!
Multiple people asked where this top was from! Super fun for a barn dance I went to and felt like it was the perfect fall vibe. Fits TTS and is perfect with boots or booties.
Such a fun top - great for any occasion.
I am 5'5" and 130# athletic body type. Paired it with jean shorts and some sunnies/summer purse and it was perfect for an outing to the pier with my family! Would definitely recommend.
Fits true to size! Wore for a Cinco de Mayo party - very cute and festive!

I loved this top! It stayed put in my shoulders, and was a good length. I wasn't worried about raising my arms. It's a nice lightweight material and the ruffles (although big) made for a fun statement. It's definitely boxy but I liked the loose fit

This top got sooo many compliments I am seriously considering a purchase. The red gingham is so cute, and the ruffle details are chic AF. I love the big sleeves, and they have a bit of elastic at the bottom to keep from slipping around too much. Despite the top being very *romantic* it's actually quite structured! The off the shoulder moment is so flattering, and didn't slip up or down throughout the day/night. The fabric was light enough that you could wear well into the summer months.
While cute in a picture, this felt too costume-like for me to actually wear. Also of note, this top is on the longer side so I had to tuck it in.
This stop is such a statement. I was obsessed the moment I put it on. Fit true to size, only slightly baggy in the middle but I liked the fit!
Not usually one for ruffles but this was super cute and not annoying farm girl. Good fabric, liked the breathing room in the body and arms.
This shirt is fun if you want to add some flare to your wardrobe. It came with tons of compliments and was very comfortable to wear.
Love the architecture

links_reviews_title: I wore this in Savannah and Got so many compliments . Wear a bra or it will make your nipples raw.
links_reviews_text: It was so cute. It's meant to be baggy. That's the style. I wore it all day to explore Tybee Island and then wore it into the night in Savannah.
Love this piece! Makes Fall's outfit pop! Fit true to size but it can looks a little large on a petite frame. I love it!

links_reviews_title: Statement sleeves and ruffle was perfect for a birthday brunch.
links_reviews_text: Fit true to size and was blouse-y. Strapless bra was perfect. Def popped for a special girls outing.
This top definitely makes a statement! There are a lot of ruffles but not overwhelming. I got the extra small by mistake instead of the small but it fit just fine.

links_reviews_title: Wore it to a team party in Nashville at the Wildhorse Saloon - perfect!
links_reviews_text: love the sleeves - fits great.

While I would never think this top would suit me, I saw it on someone else on Instagram and fell in love. It's super flattering, memorable but easy to wear. I'm a little over 5'9 and the medium fit perfectly!

links_reviews_title: Straight out of the RTR fitting room
links_reviews_text: I loved this so much I wore it out of my fitting apt. Goes great with jeans or white pants or a jean skirt! So fun and summery!
Ruffles are much larger in person, long so I def had to tuck in, true to size. Gingham print actually has blue/black in it which you can't tell online.

Unfortunately I only got a pic of the back of this gorgeous red stunner! So many compliments and perfect for the 4th of July! I didn't even wear a bra and you couldn't tell with the busy pattern... very comfortable!
I wore the size medium because the small was not available and it was a bit big, but perfect to wear. The shoulders stay in place and are comfortable.

This is seriously the coolest top. It was sooo fun and comfortable. Non stop compliments. I wore it for the Fourth of July. It looked great tucked in and out. It is definitely on the larger side but that is the style. I want to wear this literally every day!!!
Fit perfect and was a huge hit!
Loved it, fit perfectly!
So comfy!

links_reviews_title: Over the top, but SO CUTE!!!
links_reviews_text: This top is extremely well made and has so much fun detail to it! I felt it was a little overpowering for my barely 5' body, but I got a lot of compliments and thought it was really fun for my sisters graduation. I'd say it runs a little big in length overall though, so I'd recommend sizing down...I'm normally a small or extra small and I could have gone for an xxs if it had of been available. I just ended up tying it up to streamline all the billowiness from the sleeves.
So cute and thick, everyone loved it and it held its shape all night long at a hot sweaty concert!
I weigh 200, and this top is a little tight on the tummy, but still made me look great; and thinner!
Beautiful spring top that looks great with denim. I loved the billowy sleeve detail!
I wore it with a pair of jeans from RTR.
This top is so cute, comfortable, and trendy. I absolutely loved it!

links_reviews_title: Be prepared to make a statement!
links_reviews_text: I was nervous that this would over power my petite frame and people would think I looked a little silly..but I received constant compliments! It is such a statement top and fun to change things up! The quality of this top is amazing so the ruffles never "drooped." Would definitely recommend!
I saw this top and thought it was absolutely precious but when it came it was way too big! The length was fine but it slide right off my shoulders.

links_reviews_title: made a pair of white shorts or white pants into an outfit
links_reviews_text: Nice fit, a bit poufy but overall fun look with white shorts, white pants, denim shorts or jeans. Makes a bit of a statement which is outside my normal style but didn't overwhelm though I am petite.
A little baggy but super cute

The shirt is adorable and the fit was good. However, there were a couple downsides that would keep me from renting this shirt again. One, the loops where you hang the shirt from the hanger-there are two long ones in the back of the shirt (one on each side), and two tiny ones in the front of the shirt (one on each side). The ones in the back can ride up and come out of the top of the shirt. The ones in the front are too small to tuck in the shirt! They stick out from the top of shirt! The orientation of those loops make it impossible to tape them down with fashion tape so they stay tucked in. So basically, if someone gets close to you, they can see these two little loops sticking straight up on each side of your chest/neckline. It's embarrassing. Second, the sleeves easily get into food while eating, so you have to be careful of that.
The material felt light. Perfect for a toddler mom on the go.

I got so many compliments from wearing this top to a Western theme party. I felt great in it and it fit great. The ruffles on the top weren't laying flat, it was kind of droopy, when I received it, but after laying it flat and pressing an iron on it, it was great.
Was a heavy fabric that did not breathe especially well, making it a very warm outfit. Fit was cute and my husband liked it - but I felt a little bit like a girl in a clown outfit.
I loved this dress so much I wish I could buy it!

Of the three gowns rented for fancy wedding weekend, this may have been the most flattering (photo taken morning after so excuse the exhaustion). The "under" material is basically like a big spanx so it was awesome. Very comfy to wear and the rooshing (sp?!?) was quite helpful also. Looked the five pounds thinner I had planned to be.
Comfortable, flattering, even a small pad for coverage and shape with the bust. MUST RENT.

Very comfortable. Tight fit but the fabric is stretchy and forgiving. I‚Äôm 5‚Äô5, 118 lbs. and the 38R fit well. I am a 34D and needed no bra since the dress was very supportive. Length was good, I was able to wear a 2.5 inch heel. I got many compliments.

links_reviews_title: Comfortable evening gown for 7 months pregnant
links_reviews_text: I rented this for a formal event. I went with the larger size to accommodate my 7 month pregnant belly. I'm glad I did. It fit great in the belly area, but was still small in the bust, which was surprising. The cup liners did not fit under the bust, but instead were short and visible through the front of the dress. I don't know that others would have noticed, but I was self-conscious about it all night. It was long enough overall with a nice little train, and it was very comfortable.
Perfect dress for a gala. Flattering and figure fitting. Didn't need to wear a bra as there was enough support in the dress. Danced all night long and still felt glamorous at the end of the night.
Dress is beautifully made with a flattering silhouette. Chest was a bit tight but overall a great fit. I am 5' 7" and usually wear a size 0-2.
Wore for a gala. The material was very stretchy which made it fit like a glove. Can‚Äôt wait to rent it again!
The dress fit wonderfully! I received so many compliments. I would definitely recommend it!

links_reviews_title: Wedding of coworker and friend out at Camp Lucy in beautiful Dripping Springs TX
links_reviews_text: This dress fit true to size and like a glove. No bra needed and no shapewear ! The ruching in the back makes it extra special. I‚Äôm 5‚Äô9‚Äù and opted for the long length which was perfect with a nice heel. Multiple compliments on this dress all night !

links_reviews_title: Wonderful gala and the dress was a perfect fit!
links_reviews_text: Extremely beautiful dress that is very flattering and comfortable. I will definitely order from RTR for my next event!

links_reviews_title: Fit like a glove and beautiful!
links_reviews_text: For like a glove very true to size and length. I'm 5'7 so with heels you will need a long. I am a full 36D and it was very classy. Showed just enough. Not too plan either. Would so rent again. The fabric gives so it covers all the places you want to hide ;-)
I absolutely loved this dress, it fit perfectly, was very flattering and easy to stand and dance in. It was a bit long even with heels, I'm about 5'5" and my heels were about 2".

Wore it for my husbands formal banquet. The dress was a heavier material, but that made it lay smoothly and looked very well made. I wore the equivalent of a 14 long, it was stretchy but tight enough in the bust I didn't have to wear a bra. Tons of complements on it and I was very happy with it.

links_reviews_title: Very pretty for a black tie wedding
links_reviews_text: This dress was very pretty and it fit very well. I received a lot of compliments on it at the event. Very stretchy material which made it very comfy as well. My only downside was even though the waist in my smaller size fit I was forced to wear the larger size due to my chest. There are small pads in the chest and even the larger one didn't fit perfect but wasn't noticeable like the smaller size.

links_reviews_title: Flattering, simple and reliable black dress for a black tie wedding
links_reviews_text: This dress doesn't even have a zipper or buttons and yet it's one of the best fitting rentals I've gotten from RTR. It is flattering and will make you look thin and accommodating of any bloating around the stomach area. Was a great pick paired with dramatic earrings for a friend's black tie wedding. The train can be a little annoying but also makes it fall nicely.

links_reviews_title: I absolutely LOVED this beautiful dress!
links_reviews_text: This dress was perfect in every way. I rented it for a upscale black tie wedding. Fit perfect! Very stretchy and comfortable. True to size! No need for a braw with the added padding, which was a bonus!
I felt very beautiful in this dress! Fit great and was very flattering. I wore this to our Marine Corps Ball. I'm 5'7" and about 150 lbs and the 44L fit perfectly! Would definitely recommend.
Fit well, comfortable, slid on and off - no worries about zipper
This dress fit like a glove and the fabric hid any unflattering lines. I felt absolutely gorgeous and would rent this dress all over again!

links_reviews_title: Loved this beautiful and comfy dress!
links_reviews_text: I absolutely loved this! The material and it looked and felt very high quality. It has a bit of a stretch which is nice. I am 5'10" and so I had to wear the long. I'm always a 12 in dresses and this fit great!
True to the reviews- you feel amazing in this bc it holds you in in all the right spots! Perfect length for a great heel! It's a stunner!!
Fit was perfect. Tailoring in back was dynamite. Love this brand! Stretchy, comfortable fabric, & easy to pack. Unfortunately, didn't get to wear due to change in plans. Will rent again.

I wore this for a black tie gala. I was specifically looking for dresses that would allow me to wear my normal bra. Overall this dress was great. Only concern was there is a bit of padding in the chest area, so I had to work to minimize the appearance of the padding since it was smaller than my chest. If the dress weren't black, it might have been too noticeable to be wearable.
I loved this dress! It was super comfortable and easy to wear. It doesn't require a bra as wires are built in. It was tad longer than I would have expected, so higher heels were necessary.
Gorgeous dress that's very comfortable and flattering. Only downside is that it's difficult to tell the top part is sheer so it looks a little plain.
Simple yet elegant. I paired it with a stunning necklace and scarf it wasn't hot or itchy. It flowed well and felt good to wear all night long.

This dress is true to size and very stretchy. Totally forgiving and flattering around the midsection; that combined with the trumpet style balances out your hips for a very sliming effect! I highly recommend!
I wore this for our engagement shoot and it was so comfortable, easy to get on and very flattering.
Great dress! Comfortable and fit perfectly. I didn't want to take it off

Th European cut is not as generous as American designers. If you have a large bust you may want to size up. The rouching is very flattering and the fishtail is stylish and elegant. I was very happy with this dress. I was very comfortable and this dress great for dancing.
Very flattering dress worn to formal wedding in NYC. Overall very comfortable! Runs true to size.

I wore my back up choice because this gown was just a little more formal than I needed. I plan to rent it in February for a black tie event. I literally felt like a movie star walking around my house. It‚Äôs stunning!

links_reviews_title: Simple, elegant & flattering! Perfect for a black tie wedding
links_reviews_text: I'm a bit obsessed with this brand. I own several dresses by them & thrilled it's now available on here. Wish they made a shorter version for upcoming affair. Love the fabric as you don't need spanx. The neckline was flattering. Didn't need to wear a bra which was a bonus. I ordered the regular length & found it a bit long even with 3 1/2 inch heals but it worked.
It fit perfectly. Was very happy with this dress. I wore it to a black tie gala in NYC. I'm

links_reviews_title: Perfect dress for black tie wedding.
links_reviews_text: Fabric was very thick which made it hot but helped accentuate all the right places.

The stretchy material and cinching created a very flattering fit for my body, and I imagine it would look good on a lot of body types. I was complimented on how "elegant" my dress was and certainly felt elegant all night. The dress is quite long & looked perfect with my 4-inch heels. No complaints!

The dress looked beautiful and was perfect for the wedding we attended that was black tie optional. The only thing I didn't love was that this isn't a "tall" so waist hit a tad high and I had to pull it down regularly to help it to sit where it should at the waist. This is the reason I gave it a 4-star instead of a 5
Very flattering and perfect for the black tie wedding we attended. Ruching is a nice accent. Super comfortable too!

links_reviews_title: Stunning dress. The color really stands out.
links_reviews_text: No stretch so get your size correct.

I ordered another dress that I really wanted to wear but customer service called and said the person before damaged it. Everything was super last minute but they did everything they could to correct the issue and I ended up with this dress. Wwwaayyy better than my first and I received a ton of compliments. I'm a larger girl so I ordered the largest size and it fit perfectly. A little long due to my height but it worked great and it was comfy!
Loved the color and fit of this dress! Really comfy. Wore 3 inch heels and had to lift the hem occasionally.

links_reviews_title: Gorgeous dress that gets a lot of attention!
links_reviews_text: This dress made me feel amazing! The color is vibrant, the dress is well made and very flattering. It runs really small. I'm 5'2 and weigh 135 and wore a 14R. I received tons of compliments the whole evening and even the next week at work. I loved it so much I wanted to buy it! Definitely recommend!
It fit me perfectly. Dress was a little longer h than expected. I'm 5'6" but with heals the dress barely touched the ground.

I wore this to a wedding and received so many compliments that I'm considering buying it! The silhouette is so perfect and the dress flowed really well when I walked/danced. I read reviews and many said this dress ran small/the number sizing was strange. I'm normally a 6, but I went with a 10R and that was perfect. I'm 5'7" and from my photo you can see that the dress touched the ground a bit even with ~2.5" heels, but I didn't mind. The most cinched part of the dress was a bit higher up on my torso, which was great because I didn't have to worry about the dress being too tight after eating at the reception. I will definitely be renting this dress again (if I don't buy it)!
Felt like a million bucks !! Compliments throughout the day !! So happy that I bought it

The color and shape of this was STUNNING! It runs small. I wore a 12, and probably should have worn the 10. Normally I'm a 4 in dresses. The top was a little big on me, but the waist fit well so you couldn't tell! It's very long! I'm 5'7" and with heels it still touched the ground. Would highly recommend!

links_reviews_title: This was the perfect dress for a summer wedding - Fit perfectly, flattering and good for dancing
links_reviews_text: Love love this dress - if I could I would buy it and wear it to every event. Flowy and comfortable great for sitting and dancing. No worries of it riding up or bunching up. Got compliments all night

This dress is stunning. I received so many compliments on it throughout the evening!!! Be sure to review the sizing chart in order to know how to convert your regular size to the UK sizing. It is a little long, but I felt it was fine with heels...the little drape on the ground was pretty.

links_reviews_title: Stunning dress. Too small on me so daughter wore it!
links_reviews_text: The color and cut of this dress is absolutely stunning. It was too tight on me so my daughter got to wear it. She is 5'2 and 105 pounds 32DD

links_reviews_title: This dress made me feel like a rockstar on and off the dance floor!
links_reviews_text: I LOVED this dress! Receives so many compliments and is perfect for a night out dancing or wedding. I did order one size up from what I would normally wear, however I found the sizing did not run as small as other reviews. I am normally a 4 and ordered a 6 (a 10 in U.K. sizes) and it fit great. I also have a wide back so I was surprised how well it fit! I am short, 5' 2.5" and the length was perfect with some heels. I danced for several hours and never once had an issue tripping over the dress due to its length. I am really tempted to purchase this dress after this rental. It was amazing! If you are in the fence about this one, go for it! I promise you will not regret it.

links_reviews_title: Obsessed with this dress, wish I could keep it!
links_reviews_text: I was so nervous this dress wasn't going to fit when I read that it ran small! I am currently wearing a size 8-10 and ordered the 14R and it fit perfectly. Zipping it was actually a bit of a struggle, but once we got it it was perfection. I got SO many compliments and it was perfect for the event I was attending with a "tropical formal" theme. It was comfortable, flattering, and that swishy skirt made it fun to dance in too. Wish I could keep this one as I think it would be suitable for lots of future party, cocktail and formal events! Will most likely be renting again!
Fit like a glove. Was in prestine condition. Received compliments all night.

The color and fabric and cut of this dress was such quality. Compliments all night and it was so comfortable! Exactly as expected and fit true to size. The size chart coversion was accurate. I'm a size 6 and wore the 10R.

This is the best dress I have ever rented from RTW. Received many compliments from complete strangers, and was told many times I could be a super model (I've never been told that before in my life). It made me look tall, lean, and curvy in all the right places. Order one size up since the material isn't stretchy and you need room for food / drink. Not too long. Might have some trouble if you're busty (I'm not).

Wore this RTR dress to an outdoor summer formal event. It was GORGEOUS. It was a very flattering fit, and very comfortable. The orange was a beautiful vibrant color and perfect for a summer event. I would rent this again in a heartbeat. And thx to the other reviews, I knew this dress ran small. I am normally a size 2 or 4 in dresses (J Crew, Ann Taylor, Nordstrom brands), but I ordered and wore the 10 R (US size 8). It fit perfectly. However, I will also note that it was extremely long. I am 5'6" and wore 3" heels, and still had to safety pin the longest part of the asymmetrical hem so it didn't drag the floor. Other than that, dress was perfect!!

links_reviews_title: It was perfect for a summer wedding.
links_reviews_text: Fits way smaller, had to size up a bit. The color is standout. The cut is very flattering.

links_reviews_title: Stunning dress, tons of compliments but runs small and is quite long
links_reviews_text: I wore this dress for a very elegant black tie wedding and received so many compliments on both the color and the style. Do read all of the reviews though because the dress runs very small. Though I had no trouble zipping the size 6R, my ribcage was pretty sore by the end of the night. This dress is also surprisingly long. The model on the site must be at least 6' 1" because even in four inch heels the longest point of the dress had at least 2" of fabric dragging on the ground. I managed to "hem" it up with a very small safety pin.
Definitely size up! I am 5'3" about 110 and the 6R fit well. Great color and fabric!

The event had a Paris theme which included a stroll down Champs Elyse'es, the color was absolutely perfect. As a 70 year old woman, I was prepared to make statement, and needless to say I succeeded. The 8R (UK12) was only available, I lucked out, it was perfect!!

Pros: The color is gorgeous! It‚Äôs between red and orange (closer to orange), but was so beautiful. The flow of the dress and fabric was perfect for just about any event. I received so many compliments all night! Cons: Zipper was a challenge as it stuck in the same spot each time. The dress ran a little small in the top, so if you get two sizes go up one!

I absolutely LOVED this dress. I wore it to a wedding at a California vineyard and it was perfect. I had so many people I didn't know stopping me to tell me how gorgeous the dress was! As for fit, I was torn between the sizes. The 12 fit my waist better, but was a little roomy in the bust. The 10 fit my bust, but was tight in the waist so it would have been too uncomfortable since the material doesn't have any give. In spite of the sizing issues, I would totally recommend this dress!

links_reviews_title: Loved the look of this dress and so did everyone else! I felt beautiful in it.
links_reviews_text: Fit: I'm glad I ordered up a size like others said. Even the 8 was snug on my rib cage and was tight on the breast even w/o a bra. I'm 5/'5 and wore 3 inch heels; the long part of the dress touched the ground. Look: Stunning. Looked and felt high quality.
Perfect fit and exactly what I was looking for. Not too long even with heels.

links_reviews_title: No one else has this color. Showstopper.
links_reviews_text: This runs really small. I got a 8 and it was hard to zip so a 10 would have been perfect. Got compliments all night on it. 5'6. 135lb 34B

links_reviews_title: Beautiful dress for a wedding in the Bahamas. I got so many compliments! It was a show stopper!
links_reviews_text: Fit was a little snug around my ribs.
I didn't get to wear this gown because I didn't end up at the event it was intended for, but it fit great. Super-flattering for busty girls in a Greek goddess way. Will definitely rent again.

Normally wear size 0 but because of reviews I ordered sizes 2 and 4 (US sizes). I called and size 0 was overnighted to me just in time for event. Thank you RTR!! Dress was stunning. Color and fabric amazing. It is definitely long as I'm petite even with 4" platform heels the longest part of asymmetrical hem grazed ground but still worked out.
Wore the 0. Best dress ever.

This dress commanded attention with both vibrant color and unique cut. Easy to wear with the flowy bottom and very flattering one shoulder. The zipper was a little difficult and the dress is quite long (I'm 5'7" and the length was perfect).
Amazing dress. I typically wear a 2, but all the reviews said it ran very small, so this is actually an 8 but fit like a glove!!! Best dress ever as long as you get the right size.

links_reviews_title: Tangerine dress fit like a glove, was unique, got tons of compliments & was formal, flirty and fun.
links_reviews_text: This is an attention getter and it was so beautiful on. I ordered a couple sizes up from what I normally would and glad I did as the 10 fit perfect. No need to wear spanx, it had some loose ruffle like layers on the bottom/tush area which made it easy to wear. I loved the asymmetric flowy base, it was so fun to dance in. I got more compliments than ive probably ever gotten on a dress. Light material but thicker in wait and bust. It looks great with tan heels. It was classy but also sexy. LOVEEEEED. I was comfortable but could picture it getting hot if used for a hot outdoor event. Snuggish in the waist so pay attention to your sizing as Fabric will not stretch. :) loved it!
Beautiful color and luxurious material. A definite standout! The top was a little tight, so if you have a large bust size up.

links_reviews_title: This is a showstopper, for sure!!!
links_reviews_text: If you're familiar with European sizing, then you know that things tend to run a little snug compared to American sizing. That is true of this dress. Glamorous, beautiful, stunning, all true. Snug, tricky zipper, no give in the waste, runs kinda long for petites, also all true. If you're 5'2" or shorter, hope you have 4 inch heels. Plan to receive TONS of compliments, just don't plan to be super comfortable for too long.

links_reviews_title: Bold, beautiful and fun. So many compliments
links_reviews_text: For a summertime cocktail party celebrating a 50th wedding anniversary this dress was a show-stopper. So many people stopped me to say how much they loved the dress. It was comfortable, flowy, sexy and sophisticated

Once the dress was on, I had no worries the remainder of the night. Very comfortable and designed in a way I didn't have to worry about trying to suck in my stomach all night. Was expecting to wear the 10, but easily got into the 8. Needed a little assistance with the zipper (snug), but no huge deal. Wore with a strapless bra, but can totally be worn without. Received many compliments. Awesome color! Would 100% rent again. Great experience for my first rental.

This is a great dress! The color is stand out and the fit is comfortable, for the most part. Solace always fits me a little small. I wore the UK10=US6 and I'm a solid US4. The ribcage is small and it was short waisted on me. The chest was slightly large and I'm C borderline D. I received lots of compliments, especially on the color. I wore malachite Elizabeth Cole jewelry and funky green/orange Weitzman platform sandals that helped with the length.
I am 5'3" and 115lbs. Slightly long for me, but fit was beautiful. I would absolutely rent it again! My favourite rental so far.

Gorgeous dress! Fit was as expected (just keep in mind the the primary sizes are UK sizes, and the material of this dress isn't stretchy). With my measurements, was a bit looser in the waist than what would be ideal, but it was still super flattering and comfortable. Plus, the material is sturdy and the draping is super well done ‚Äì even though I wore this to a ball with lots of waltzing, didn't find that I was having to constantly adjust the dress to get it back to a flattering position, which I often have to do at dances! Also, LOVED the color on the dress. Definitely a statement color, but very rich instead of being straight up neon. One thing to keep in mind is it's longer than one would think, based on the model photos ‚Äì for a reference point, I'm 5'8" and wore 2" heels, and the longest part of the dress was just barely off the ground and sometimes skimmed it (lifting it up in the photo included, because didn't want to get it dirty outside haha)

links_reviews_title: potential option for bridal shower. Pretty short & tight but a thicker material to keep ya together

links_reviews_text: Wore for a black/white party... so many compliments and so flattering!
So many compliments on this one! Definitely form fitting though - after cake I wanted to change into something else!

links_reviews_title: Wore this for my bridal shower and it was perfect
links_reviews_text: So many compliments

Rented this dress for engagement pics, loved it but went with a different one in the shipment that was more flowy. This is a beautiful dress, great material and fits well. I'm 5'2" 105lbs and 32DDD, ordered size 0. Will definitely rent again
Fits like a glove and comfortable to walk around in. I paired it with sneakers for functional purposes to walk around NYC and it worked out perfectly.
This dress was amazing. Great fabric, high quality, stretchy, and an amazing cut that is very flattering. Was cute and sexy in one.

This was a back up that came for my bridal shower. I'm usually a size 4, and sometimes a 2. This dress is on the tighter side so I would've wanted a 4 to feel comfortable. Although this dress fits on the tight side, it's made with thicker material, which I prefer because I find it more flattering and with it being a white this dress it was not see-through at all. This dress is also a bit short, but very beautiful. I ended up wearing the original dress I chose, just because this one was a tad tight and the other dress went better with my shower theme. Although, I would definitely rent this dress in the future.
Very flattering and fit perfectly! Looked lovely on. I am 5"7, 34 DD & 155 lbs and I wore a size 8!

The fabric was great quality and thick. I did size up to the 14 which is one higher than I normally would. However, I'm fairly hippy and curvy so the smaller size fit but was a little too short for me. I got lots of compliments and felt very pretty in the dress for my bridal shower.
It arrived wrinkly in the front lower half and a tiny spot on the rear, but so incredibly flattering that I wore it anyway. It's a great dress
Really liked this crisp flirty white dress but unfortunately too tight in bottom half even though I sized up one. Another size up may be too big in top but would be curious to try.

I rented this dress for graduation - at 5'9 it was on the shorter side, def flirty and not meant for any super serious occasion. Fit like a GLOVE. I could of sized up if I wanted to, but it was perfect. Not crisp white, more of a cream. Very thick and flattering material

The RTR photo doesn't do this dress justice. I ordered it not expecting to even like it, but it's absolutely adorable on...I wore it for a baby shower and got lots of compliments. Definitely recommend!

links_reviews_title: Perfect Dress for a Summer party
links_reviews_text: I loved this dress, it is very comfortable and is stunning.

Hotttt dress. This dress was tight and I couldn't wear much underwear, but the quality was so good that it didn't matter. Perfect the a hot Miami night on the day before my wedding. I danced all night in this dress and got tons of compliments. It was a little tight in the chest but I was OK with that. Looking back, I would size up if you don't want to show every little curve. Love this dress. Would rent again.

links_reviews_title: Wish I had worn the white one!
links_reviews_text: This dress was much cuter in person. I ordered it as a backup and should have sized down. It is definitely true to size and I was afraid it would run small. The material was heavy and forgiving. It didn't show any cellulite or imperfections. It is a great dress if you want something out of the box for a cocktail party. Wish I could keep it!
This style is adorable but unfortunately a 6 is a bit too snug on my stomach for my liking. I plan on ordering a size up, but I think then the entire dress will be too small.

links_reviews_title: Wore this for my bridal shower-super cute and lots of fun to wear.
links_reviews_text: I'm short, and the size 4 was a little short on me when I sat down, but overall, very cute dress for a bridal shower. Comfortable fabric and the ruffles were pretty.
tight all over

links_reviews_title: I love the dress but it definitely runs small. I normally wear a 4-6 and I need a 8.
links_reviews_text: form fitting, shortish (on a 6 ft frame) super cute though!!

I rented this for my Bridal Shower. I have wide hips and a short torso, hour glass figure with D boobs and this hugged me in all the right places. The material is fantastic and doesn't show your undergarments. I didn't need a bra (what?!) and I wore a nude spanx. It was skin tight but somehow didn't feel like it and it was super comfortable! Absolutely loved it!
Just the right length to be short without being uncomfortable. Material is more structured than I thought but this keeps the ruffles and pleats in place. Got many compliments!
great fit, loved it.
Nice heavy fabric, hugs your body in all the right spots.

links_reviews_title: So adorable and I love the off shoulder look.
links_reviews_text: I didn't wear this dress. It runs very small and I could barely get it on.

links_reviews_title: Wore this for a friends birthday/retirement party in Napa. I loved this dress! Fits like a glove!!!!
links_reviews_text: thick fabric, super nice fit. Perfect length. I loved everything about this dress.
This dress was so cute, but too big on the shoulderless side. Fit was great at the waist and hips, but the one side kept falling down. Sadly, I wasn't able to wear this.
As others said, this is snug. I recommend sizing up! It was short but with a size up it would've been appropriate for a party!
It is a great dress for a night out.

This dress was so fun to wear! It was super comfortable, and the floral pattern is beautiful. I got so many compliments on it. The front does go very low, so as long as you have a way to keep yourself situated, you'll be fine. I wore a deep v bra (because I just can't make myself go braless) and was good to go. The length was perfect with flats on. It brushed the tops of my feet. I do wish I had gotten the 6L because it was very cold, and I ended up wearing wedge boots, so it was a little short.

I felt glam in this dress, didn't need to wear spanx because it's so flowy. There is a ton of fabric - my guess is that short women will not like this dress as much because they may feel like they're drowning in it with all the fabric! This dress is definitely great for tall women. Would definitely wear again. I am tall and was able to wear 4 inch platforms with the 6L.

This dress was perfect for my engagement photos and made me feel amazing! The print went wonderfully with the gorgeous fall leaves and made for some pretty outstanding photos. The only thing I was not thrilled with was how the bust was cut. As many of the other reviews have said the dress is very low cut making it hard to wear a bra underneath. I used a lot of gaffer tape and double sided tape to prevent me from being completely scandalous and to keep my 40 DD bust from looking super saggy.

I rented this for Fall family photos with my daughters- it was really flattering & beautiful. It's TTS, but was a bit snug in the chest area- so size up if you're busty. It has a deep V, but a cami underneath would look nice for a more conservative look. The slits were also a nice touch. One of my favorite rentals.
Loved it!

This dress was incredibly comfortable and flattering. It had so much movement with the slits! I felt like I was dressed to the 9's in that low key, I barely tried, kind of way. Got tons of compliments, even from people who weren't at the party!

links_reviews_title: Perfect for a Bay Area Fall wedding!
links_reviews_text: This was 100% the boho chic vibe I was looking for at an outdoor wedding in Northern California in early fall! Many of the reviews said the dress ran long and large in the chest. I am 6' tall with size A36 chest and I found that it was actually true to size, maybe even a bit small! The 10L wasn't available so I got the 10R and it was fine especially since I wore flats and danced a lot but still would have preferred the 10L. No problems with the chest. I was able to wear a strapless bra no issue. When I raised my arms up the shoulders sometimes fell off. Also, a couple times the bell sleeve got caught in the zipper of my purse. Other than that it was great and super flattering! Highly recommend!

links_reviews_title: AMAZING for a warm summer wedding.
links_reviews_text: The slits on this dress might not work for all weddings, but I loved it and got so many compliments. I have large upper arms and this dress was not tight there which was amazing. One thing is that shapewear with built in shorts will likely poke through the slits - so you'll need to use double stick tape to close the slits a bit. But truly I loved this dress. 100% would recommend.

links_reviews_title: 4 Star rating based solely on look and fit, BUT...
links_reviews_text: I absolutely loved everything about this dress. It fit me perfectly, was flowing and comfortable, and a perfect balance of beautiful and sexy. I received nothing but compliments. HOWEVER, I will be hesitant to rent another dress from RTR! I received the dress, briefly tried it on to ensure that it fit properly, and hung it in my closet. It must have been a combination of the amount of time I had it on while ensuring its fit, and the fact that both times I put it on, I did so by stepping into the dress (as the wide neckline allowed this) that I somehow was unaware of the condition in which the dress was sent to me. Unfortunately, i didn't realize until it was too late (while stepping out of the car at the event on a breezy day) that the dress wreaked of body odor! The smell was so pungent and concentrated that it was unbearable! There is NO possible way that this dress was properly laundered/dry cleaned between rentals. The smell coupled with the realization that I was wearing a dress that was at one point obviously soaked in someone else's sweat, made the situation even more disgusting. As much as I hate to say it, I don't know that I could confidently rent a dress again without the uncertainty of whether or not I would be receiving a clean, non odorous dress. Such a terrible and disappointing experience!

I wore this to my future sister-in-laws wedding reception. She had an Indian wedding, so I wore traditional Indian clothes for the ceremony, and then wore this for the reception. It was very lightweight, even with the long sleeves and floor length. I LOVED the slit up the thigh. The dress does have a deep plunge, but because it's so lightweight, double-sided tape worked really well with it. I received so many compliments on this dress, and now I'm obsessed with this style. I wish I could afford to buy it!
Perfect fit. True to size. Felt like a million bucks. Should have bought this one.

This dress was super comfortable and has a really pretty floral pattern. Only con was that it didn't fit totally through the shoulders and the sleeve kept falling down. I had on a bra designed for low cut dresses and every time the sleeve fell down my bra showed. My husband was constantly motioning to me that my bra was out so I felt like I was readjusting all night. That's the only reason I gave it 4 stars, otherwise great dress!

links_reviews_title: Gorgeous dress - just a little tight
links_reviews_text: If you have hips/chest- may want to get a size up. My chest was out there but it was still appropriate and not over the top.

links_reviews_title: The flowy fabric and sea breeze made the perfect combo!
links_reviews_text: Great length, needs dress tape as cleavage was hard to contain. Fits a little large, if it would have been available I would order backup size. Fabric was beautiful, perfect flow for dancing and beach breeze. I was mother of the bride and thought it appropriate for our venue, but not if held in more formal or faith based ceremony. Loved the dress!

links_reviews_title: Beautiful and comfortable! Would rent again!
links_reviews_text: This dress was perfect for Easter. I had to wear a camisole under it to make it Church appropriate. I got tons of compliments and was comfortable all day. I would buy this dress if I could!
Fits true to size. Definitely low cut but can be helped with fashion tape. No issues with length for short girls if worn with heels. One of the best rentals I've ever done!
Runs a little big in the waist area and cut a little low

links_reviews_title: I‚Äôve never received so many compliments in my life!
links_reviews_text: This dress is to-die-for! It fit so perfectly and was so was light and flowy that I could dance and not feel constricted or get too hot. I was stopped repeatedly and compliment on it. Perfect spring wedding dress. My only regret is that I can‚Äôt keep it!

I felt like a goddess in this dress. The size 14 was a perfect fit, but beware, your boobs will be out! I used a pin to tuck them in a little. The length was great with a three-inch heal and the pop of leg was super fun. I wore this to a Kacey Musgraves concert and was probably the most glamorous woman at the Ryman (besides her, of course!).
The zippers are always so difficult. This one is on the side so it's much more manageable otherwise great fit!
Wore this out for an evening in Vegas. Got many compliments. Fit almost perfect except under bust which was too tight. Still, one of my favorite outfits from Rtr ever
Great fit, style and fabric. I'm 5'9 and 12L was perfect!
LOVED this dress - way prettier in person. Only problem was it was a little too big, but made it work. Pretty low cut and high slots, but perfect for a sexy yet low-key look.
Love this. Fitted in the rib cage. Amazing flow and cut. Low in the front, I wore a tank under for less cleavage. Silk base, great fabric.
I can see why everyone loves this - it's very drapey and bohemian and quite lovely. But on me it was just too big and shapeless and revealing. Very long! Would've had to wear 2" heels to wear this.

Scene stealing dress that I wore to afternoon party...lots of compliments. A bit low cut in the front-so be ready to show a bit more. Flowy and open but still pretty comfy. I ordered a 4 instead of a 6-(wasn't paying attention)-still fit-but tight in my chest area.
I rented this dress for my boyfriends birthday dinner. Fitted and flowey in all the right places. Fabric was substantial enough for December. Would rent again!

I felt very feminine in this dress. I wore it at home for Christmas Eve with my family/parents. The sleeves are beautiful but was really worried I'd catch fire trying to cook in them. I kept having to hold them out of the way but I doubt too many others would try to cook in this!! I went bless which made it uber comfy but I will say it fit me a little more like a mum than a fitted maxi. The "waist" is a band just below the bust but it was pretty big (even for the rib cage) and didn't add much form to the dress. The skirt is also VERY full and adds a few inches across the hips as well. I don't think a size down would have fit length wise as the chest length was barely long enough. At 5'9" the 10R fit perfectly with flats so roller girls definitely need the Long if you want to wear this with heels. It was a great dress for a "home for the holidays" dinner but I doubt I would have worn it out. Very feminine but too much of a mumu for my taste to wear out. really pretty though!

links_reviews_title: This dress was GORGEOUS! It flowed beautifully and was perfect for a winter California wedding.
links_reviews_text: Fit is to size on the waist. You will need double sided tape to make sure the top doesn't gape open too much. A little on the long side, I am 5' 4'' and wore 3 inch wedges and the dress just skimmed the floor. I felt sexy, comfortable, and beautiful!
This dress is true to size and absolutely beautiful. Got tons of compliments on it.

This dress was perfect for a winter wedding. I got so many compliments on it. I am 5'7, 125 pounds and ended up going with the size 0. It was slightly tight around the bust area and I am small chested but other than that, it fit pretty true to size. All in all, this is a great dress!!!

links_reviews_title: 5 Stars! A classy but sexy head turner
links_reviews_text: I wore this on vacation in Jamaica in December. Even with the long sleeves it was still perfectly comfortable in the 70% humidity because the fabric is so light and airy. I wore it twice in 1 week I loved it so much. I would have bought it through my unlimited membership if I lived in a place where I could wear it more than once or twice a year. It fit basically true to size, maybe it runs just a tad big but not by much. I'm usually an 8, which would have fit fine but I went with the 6R and it was just snug enough to fit my chest area well without making me self conscious about by my stomach area. I highly recommend you rent this dress!

I loved this maxi. It is so flattering and gorgeous and not too long on my 5'2" frame. It did run a bit small, I typically wear a 16/18 and I should have sized up to the 20. It would be a great dress to wear to a wedding but with flats, you can pull it off for day to day as well.

I really wanted to order this dress, the only available size was a 12. I'm normally a 10 so I knew it would be a little loose on me. Even if I had gotten a 10, I still believe the top would be too loose for me. I used fashion tape to help with the front. It is long--and I'm a tall girl, heels are a must with this dress. I got many compliments this night!
I wore this for my Bday weekend to go wine tasting. It fit like a glove and I felt beautiful. 5'7", 155lbs. 34/B cup.

I got this dress as a surprise backup from RTR when my original choice wasn't available, and it was SO much better than the one I would have picked. It's insanely flattering. I was worried it'd be too summery for a November event, but the colors are autumnal and the fabric heavy enough that it worked perfectly. The sleeves are so fun -- I was singing at this wedding and felt like I'd gone full Florence & the Machine. The way the silk flows makes you feel like all eyes are on you, even when you're just walking to the buffet. If you feel comfortable going braless (I did), the cut is perfect, though I did use a little tape on the shoulders. And the print is bold yet simple enough that you could go minimal or maximal with accessories -- I went with sea-green earrings and a simple necklace. I'm 5'8 and the 6R just brushed my feet, so I wore flats; if I'd wanted to go for heels I'd have liked a 6L, but that's such a minor issue. I got compliments on it from wedding guests across every age and gender spectrum. I loved wearing it so much that I refused to take it off even after I went home, just swanned around my apartment in it for a while. Returning it was a wrench. Thank you, RTR stylists!
This dress is the epitome of perfection. It's soooo flattering and fit like a glove. And this is WITHOUT a bra because it's designed that well. This is what a well designed dress looks like. Bravo!
Worried it would be too light for November but has several layers of silk and fall tones in print. It's gorgeous
Perfect for my hourglass shape. The sleeves have little buttons at the wrists, which keep the fabric from falling into your food! The outer fabric is silk, which breathes beautifully.

I absolutely love this dress! It is generous in the breast area, and for a top heavy woman this was perfect. I knew it had a deep plunge, just be prepared to have to tape the ladies in because they will come pouring out if not! It was loose and flowing everywhere except immediately under the breast area where it is fitted. Just know you'll have to have help with the side zipper.
I am 5 ft 3 inches, 140 lbs and the size 40R fit me perfectly. The top area reveals a lot but the cut of the dress makes you look polish. I loved this dress is very pretty!

The dress is lovely, colors vibrant, but the upper bodice just under the breasts is very tight. A size up could help but then I fear it would have been too large in the bust. It was great for the few hours I wore it but I also couldn't wait to take it off.
Flattering fit, straps do run a little long and are not adjustable. Overall very happy with this dress!

links_reviews_title: One of my favorite RTR finds
links_reviews_text: This is my idea of the perfect dress! The colors a beautiful, it fit like a sleep shirt, but the twist tie on the bust is the ultimate feminine touch! I'm honestly thinking about purchasing it!
I adored this dress immensely. The way it fit me was like a glove. The fabric is 100% and feels so light and rich. And IT HAS POCKETS.

This was a fabulous rental. It photographed marvelously and was very flattering. It was a bit low and the straps can't be adjusted, but I didn't need to wear a bra, which was nice considering it was slightly tight through the chest. Overall, a great dress that I would definitely rent again.
Wore this to a semi-formal brunch and again for my birthday lunch - received so many compliments! Very flattering on an hourglass figure. Am considering buying it! Love, love, love!
Love this dress!! It was so comfortable and easy to wear. The 34 fit me but I ended up going a size up for comfort!

I rented this for a steamy July 4th rehearsal dinner and got a ton of compliments! The pattern and cut are fabulous, and it‚Äôs a nice light weight cotton perfect for a hot humid day/evening. The straps were just a hair too long for me (at 5‚Äô7‚Äô‚Äô) so mostly stayed in place except when seated. I wore the 38r as the 40 was too loose at the waist/ribcage.

Gorgeous dress (with pockets!), easy to dress up or down. Was a little roomy in the bust for me but even so felt fun to wear. Needed a slip underneath as every undergarment could be seen beneath the skirt. Wish I owned it!
Truly an amazing dress, pinned that straps but it other then that it was a perfect dress for Pride weekend and beyond.

I wish it had fit better. The fabric was nice and light, the pattern was eye catching. Pockets are nice. But the fit was terrible for me in the chest and shoulder area. The straps were too long and were not adjustable. The bodice area should have had some additional structure built in to accommodate for the non-adjustable straps - at least some built in cups. I am a B cup and given the thin, pliable nature of the fabric, I kept having to pull up the straps and ending up wearing a white sweater over the dress to insure no slips as the fabric in the chest area can flip down easily.
Boobs for days! The top is a bit tight but the tie in the front allows for some room for your chest. Great and flattering silhouette. I ate a lot and still felt cute!

links_reviews_title: Very Bright dress for the Happy celebration
links_reviews_text: Perfect fit, hugged my body perfect üëå the pockets are a bonus. The only down is the straps to long, but was able to tide them & looked perfect. Overall dress was fun!

I wore this to a concert and loved the bright,colorful flowers. This dress looks GREAT on hourglass bodies. As others have mentioned, the straps aren't adjustable which is a bit annoying -- didn't mind when I was standing, but kept getting nervous I would reveal too much while sitting. Plus, the dress has pockets!
Beautiful dress for vacation. Had to use a clip to tighten the straps which were way too long. If I owned this dress, that's the only adjustment I would have made.
Love the printed and material. A little snug but totally outstanding and a complete showstopper! I wore this to my best friends bridal shower. Love, will rent again!
Took it with me for a trip to New Orleans and it was cool, light and cute!!

links_reviews_title: So cute, comfy, feminine and pockets!
links_reviews_text: LOVED this dress. It was so comfortable, pretty and feminine. I received compliments from strangers on the street. It loved the colors and it fit like a glove. Wish I could afford to buy it! Would 100% rent again.
perfect in every way.

This was a great lightweight dress; perfect for a backyard summer wedding! Very colorful and airy. Got lots of compliments. Straps are long and unadjustable but I have a small chest so it was a nonissue.

The fit on this dress is perfection, especially if you want to accentuate an "hourglass" figure. Super lightweight, so fun to twirl in, and received endless compliments from friends and strangers all evening. Though it fit like a glove, next time I rent it I may go up a size so that post meal and dancing I'll have more room for movement in the very fitted bodice. I wore this dress to an evening farm wedding, but can imagine wearing it to a dressy brunch, during the day with a denim jacket, or even with a fitted sweatshirt over it and Nike Cortez sneakers for a feminine city look!
I loved the fit and length! It was a little tight on the chest but I made it work. I'm short and loved the length.
It was quite revealing on top but it looked fine. I felt like Marilyn Monroe!

links_reviews_title: This was the first dress I‚Äôve rented, and I love it. As my friends said, ‚ÄúThis is Erin in a dress.‚Äù
links_reviews_text: It‚Äôs bright, happy, and comfortable. It was perfect for my bachelorette. And, most importantly, IT HAS POCKETS, y‚Äôall. Like, real pockets that can fit a phone, not those dinky pockets you can put a quarter in. This came to mid-calf for me, and the waist hit me at just the right spot. I wore this with a pair of slip shorts and it was incredibly comfortable - not too big, not too tight. The only thing I didn‚Äôt like is that the straps aren‚Äôt adjustable. They were really long on me, and I felt like I was constantly adjusting so I didn‚Äôt flash someone. I had a friend safety pin some of the slack for me and it was fine after that, though.

links_reviews_title: Perfect on brown skin, displayed my cleavage like sin
links_reviews_text: At first, I thought the pattern was too bright, but I realized that I just saw a paler girl try it on and it was her skin tone that washed out the dress, not vice versa. I looked like tailor-made 2018 Disney princess. I feel sorry for those who cannot cannot experience the glory I exemplified in this perfect frock.

This was such a fun sundress! I wore it to Sunday brunch and received so many compliments! It's a great fusion of a traditional and sexy, with a full, midi-length skirt and an almost bustier-style top. It could have been a little revealing, but a little double-sided tape helped prevent any wardrobe malfunctions. I would definitely rent this again.

I rented this as a backup dress for a wedding but decided I liked the other dress better. This dress felt a little too casual for me. I wouldn't mind owning it for a normal weekend sundress though. The tie in the front took some time to get right. It initially kept rotating awkwardly so that it was vertical rather than horizontal. The only downside about the fit for me is that the straps aren't adjustable and kept slipping off my shoulders. I would shorten them if I owned this dress.

links_reviews_title: Great dress for my graduation party.
links_reviews_text: It was a little tight around the torso.
Wore to an outdoor wedding it was so cute and dainty loved it sad to see if go
This is a lightweight dress perfect for vaca! What lovely colors, too.

links_reviews_title: Fun print, light fabric, and has pockets.
links_reviews_text: This was perfect for wine tasting on a hot day. Fit like a glove, I'm 5"9, 36C. The fabric was very light and it would blow in the wind...in a good way. It's cotton, but the print hides any mild wrinkles. The bow on the top adjusts if need more or less room in this area.

Love this dress!! The colors are fantastic and the light weight fabric is great for warmer temps. The bust is a little snug but not uncomfortable. The length fell mid calf, which I loved. I do agree with other reviews that the straps were a tad long but I was able to make it work and still feel great. If you're thinking of renting this dress, go for it!

I rented this dress as a possible outfit for one of my bridal showers but ended up wearing it to a concert and out on a date. The dress is so beautiful but very low cut. I mostly wore it with a chambray button up tied at the waist which looked so good! It's also a bit tight in the chest but i couldn't go bra-less because the fabric was too thin. It certainly provides some lift if you wear a bra! If this was cheaper I would buy it in a heartbeat. Wholeheartedly recommend!

This dress fit amazingly and it was so fun! I wore it on a date and it was perfect! Only problem was that the straps were verrrry long and no way to tighten! I had to get creative and make a bow in the back with a ribbon.

links_reviews_title: Cute Dress but straps way too long
links_reviews_text: Loved the pattern and pockets but wish the straps were adjustable
Fun! Shows a lot of cleav. But great for a day of wine tasting.
Feminine and flirty, this dress was so fun to wear. I felt really confident wearing it and would love to rent again!

links_reviews_title: Summer fun in the sun!!!! LOVE IT!!!!
links_reviews_text: This was the 3rd item i rented from the 3 for 1 special during Memorial Day weekend. I am so pleased with my choices, they all were gorgeous and fit. This dress i wore for a brunch date. Very flattering and it has pockets whcih is a plus. Although i am short, i didn't mind the tea length at all. if you are big on the bust you may have to size up cuz it's a bit snug there. Absolutely NO padded bra, Go braless if you can. I will rent again it's such a fun, bright and easy dress. Perfect for dressing up or down. I wore it with Flip flop cuz we went to a brunch by the water i didn't wanna overdo it. L O V E!!!
Paired this beauty with bright earrings and pastel stilettos to really channel spring fever. It's a fun and happy dress that everyone loved

links_reviews_title: Spring colors and great fit equals lots of compliments.
links_reviews_text: Loved the colors - the fit - and, the sleeves.

links_reviews_title: Perfect for a fun party or rehearsal dinner!
Perfect fit and fabric, sleeves are dramatic but not over done; i would buy this!

links_reviews_text: This was perfect for the event and Palm Beach location. I'm tall and it wasn't too short. Runs true to size. Sleeves add an extra fun detail. I wore with nude strappy heals like the model.
This was my first time renting a Lily Pulitzer dress and I loved it so much I bought it.

Immediately loved the pattern. The colors are beautiful in person and much more blue. I wore this dress to a Disney World wedding in December. The sleeves provided the perfect transition from afternoon to evening. The fit was true to size. I'm 160#, 5'9" and an athletic build. I found there to be a lot of fabric in the stomach region, and would have sized up for some more room in the hip area, but found the 4 to look better. I could not raise my hands over my head otherwise it was too short.
5'3 175 lbs. great fitting dress. Felt beautiful in it all night.
This lily works for spring and fall as well. When it's not quite so sunny and hot anymore. Fit and sleeves are cute and I love the print
Loved this dress! It fit perfect and was very comfortable.

links_reviews_title: Fun and colorful dress for a September wedding!
links_reviews_text: This dress was comfortable and colorful! It was one of those pieces that you put on and don't have to think about. (No straps to fiddle with or short hemline to be concerned about.) This was my backup dress, but I ended up liking it more than my first pick. I do wish I had a size 4 to try on, but the 6 worked for me. The sleeves were a bit tricky to keep out of the sink and the buffet line, but they were really fun on the dance floor.

This was the most comfortable dress I've rented so far. The 4 fit perfectly and I still felt comfortable dancing. The pattern is bold, but not too much. Even though it had sleeves, I didn't get too hot since it is very good quality fabric.

This was perfect for a summer wedding, wasn't a heavy fabric even with the sleeves. I usually fluctuate between a 6 & an 8. The 8 wound up being the more comfortable option since the fabric doesn't have much give.

I rented this for a rehearsal dinner, and absolutely loved it. It fit perfect. The dress is a slim-loose fit, it hugged my chest, but was a perfect looser fit from there down. This fabric does not have any stretch, so I recommend reading reviews to ensure you're ordering the right size for the fit you want. I'm glad I didn't have to wear spanx with this one! I loved the sleeves and the bright colors.

Absolutely loved the colors and the material, perfect for a summer outdoor event. I was able to move but it was a tad snug around my waist. It accented all my curves, even the least favorable ones. If I had gone one size up, I would have been all set. Nevertheless, no regrets here. I looked and felt great

links_reviews_title: I wanted something fun but classy for a wedding rehearsal dinner and this was a great pick!
links_reviews_text: I am 5' 3" and was so happy to fit into a size 2 comfortably. I could have easily worn the 4 as well but the smaller fit was more flattering to my athletic build :) I wasn't sure about the sleeves at first - they were perfect length and made the dress! This was my first time using RTR and I couldn't have been more happy!!
Just a great dress. Many compliments.

This dress was so fun. The print was bold and perfect for an outdoor summer wedding. The sleeves were larger than I expected (took a dunk in the salad dressing at the buffet). But it was easy to dance in and comfortable.
Wore this to an outdoor wedding. Was light weight and easy to move around in. Loved the sleeves!

Wore this for an outdoor wedding - it was July and about 90 degrees, but even with the long bell sleeves, I didn't feel uncomfortable because they were so flowy and the fabric was so light weight! It was short but not too short - I could dance and not feel like I was revealing anything! I loved how bright the colors were in this dress and would definitely recommend!

I wore this for my bridal shower and got so many compliments. A few friends said I just HAD to buy this! I felt as though I could have worn a size bigger just because it was pretty snug but I did feel comfortable in it for the most part. Paired with gold jewelry but could go either way. Wore it with nude heels.

links_reviews_title: Such a fun and flirty spring dress!
links_reviews_text: I wore this dress to a Kentucky Derby party and loved it! It fit very well, true to size. I did wear Spanx but only because I felt more comfortable; I don't know that they were needed. It was a light enough fabric to wear outside and not get too hot. I would definitely recommend for a springtime event!
Perfect dress for daytime or evening occasions. If you love Lily this is great. Wore it to church this morning and got stopped by a lot of people. Fit was perfect
Lots of great compliments about the dress. They love the color and it's beautiful.
After reading the reviews, I decided on this Lilly. Got the back-up bigger size but didn't need it. I got soooo many compliments. This dress is comfortable too!

This dress was amazing and I am tempted to purchase it for my closet. I received SO many compliments on it. It was perfect for my sister-in-law's baby shower. It fit true to size and was super comfortable and not restrictive at all!

I normally wear a size 4, but I ended up going with the 6 because I'm still nursing and wanted a little extra room up top. The fabrics got a little bit of a stretch to it, so it's really forgiving and comfortable. Wish I owned the dress - the sleeves were really fun too!
The only downside to wearing this to a wedding was the wide arms flapping around when I danced, but otherwise.. it fit great, it was comfortable, and I got a ton of compliments!
