links_reviews_title: Easy to use. Loved the dress
links_reviews_text: Perfect fit

links_reviews_title: Loved the bell sleeves! Tons of complements!
links_reviews_text: Wore this to my college reunion. It was a big hit. Was able to eat, drink, dance, and even bounce in a bounce house in this dress! The bell sleeves do hang so be careful if you‚Äôre reaching across a table or washing your hands. The dress runs a bit small and I ended up wearing a size bigger than normal. There is no stretch to the dress but it is comfortable and breathable.

I love my Lilly dresses, but this one was so unique and flirty! I ordered a size 2 and 4, but the 2 fit like a glove so I didn't need to go up. Fit TTS. So many compliments! The bell sleeves were gorgeous but LONG. My only complaint was that they did get in the way of the buffet table a bit, but they were still manageable. Not a stiff dress. Light and airy. Perfect for an outdoor wedding in late spring!

Because my rental arrived 6 days early for the wedding for which it was intended, I had time to "interview" it and wore it to dinner with hubby. Love the fit, style and colors of this beautiful Lily! I'll be renting again.
Rented for my daughters HS graduation. Comfortable, flattering and nice for a special daytime occasion. Would rent again. True to size

links_reviews_title: Very fun dress for a spring event ! Felt great and got lots of compliments
links_reviews_text: True to size. I‚Äôm 5‚Äô2, 125 lbs, 36C and size 4 dress fit like a glove.
Loved this dress and everything about it. I was comfortable all night. Plenty of movement for dancing. Tons of compliments! I'd definitely wear it again. Fit true to size.

links_reviews_title: Comfortable and very fun!! Beautiful color combination. Soooo many compliments all evening!
links_reviews_text: Only thing I would add, it was relatively snug across the belly. I almost wished I had gone up but with spanx it was not an issue.
Loved this one more than I thought I would. Loved the sleeves and it wasn't too short which can be an issue for me.
Very cute Lilly dress. I received plenty of compliments
Gorgeous colors. The fit is tight enough to show shape but doesn't cling to you. Love the sleeves!
Got a lot of compliments! The fit wasn't my favorite but it was comfortable enough. Love the print!
This dress runs small so I sized up when I rented it. It is really comfortable and I love the sleeves. I wore it to my godson's christening and received many compliments.

links_reviews_title: Military Dining Out; an unforgettable night ( & dress)
links_reviews_text: Ordered the size 10 , my normal clothing size & it was snug. We could zip it, but it was terribly unflattering at the top- sausage casing, s8nug. The 12 wasn't available, so I ordered the 14 as a back up & it was a bit loose, but I had plenty of room to drink, laugh & dance and the dress still fit well enough I wasn't trying to pull it up. But the 12 would have been perfect I wore 3.5 inch heels and the back was still sweeping the floor.

I got the size up because all the reviews said to. It was a little bit big, but it was my back up dress anyway and I didn't need it after all. It had a long mermaid tail that I think would have been stepped on all evening. However, it was a very fun dress and I'm sorry I didn't get to wear it anywhere. The top was very loose around my chest and I would have been worried about falling out
This fit me like a glove. I have a larger butt and thighs area so sometimes things can be too tight in that area, but this fit perfectly!

This dress wasn't my top choice from those I rented but I am very petite and this is the only one of the 4 that fit me, despite being a little long in the back. A very unique dress, I felt like a painting, it was form-fitting, comfortable and flattering! I wore the dress to a gala and received many compliments.

Wore this 4 months pregnant and needed a bit of shapewear. The lining on this particular dress has worn away the gripping so definitely need to be filled out on top to help keep dress up. The boning is not very strong. Length was good for my height as high low created a small train with 1.5-2" heels. Sized up due to pregnancy, but I'd definitely order the back up a size bigger. Overall really beautiful dress, but not necessarily great for those without curves.
I wore this dress to a wedding and it was perfect! Fit so well, was good for dancing, walking, sitting, pictures, etc. I got a lot of compliments on it as well!
Glamorous dress, loved wearing... a bit stuck between the 4 and 6 so would have been more comfortable if I'd sized up, just looked best as a 4.

Fabric is yummy with nice weight and satin feel. There is some stretch so if you are well endowed but smaller in the waist I'd go with smaller size to fit your lower half. It was too long but I gathered and pinned the sides for a shirred effect. 4" heels. Didn't trip on the back at all!
Comfortable. Easy to wear. No problem selecting accessories. Highly recommend if you need a formal dress.

Loved this dress!! It was comfortable and fit very nicely. I'm 5'4 and the train was just a tad long but it didn't really bother me too much...people stepped on it occasionally but it was worth it! Such a fun dress!

This was a very flattering dress. I have recently gained some weight and I really needed something that felt comfortable for me the way the dress flares out at the bottom is super nice. This event was a wild event and everyone wore wigs. This is a dress that can be very sophisticated or it also has enough colors to have some fun with it and a wig!

links_reviews_title: Fun pattern for a formal event
links_reviews_text: While the 4R ran true to size it fit snug through the bodice. The little train in the back gave it such a fun flare. I wore this for a black tie gala and felt like a million bucks!

links_reviews_title: An absolute show-stopper for an artsy gala
links_reviews_text: This dress fit like a glove and I felt like a movie star. I ordered the 8 and a 10 as the back-up based on other reviews but ended up wearing the 8 with no issues. It's lightweight, flowy and forgiving! I will say, I am not at all "hippy" but the cut of the dress definitely gives the appearance of hips--just something to keep in mind.
Got a lot of compliments - the dress creates a nice curvy shape on my otherwise petite frame . Dress flowed a bit in the back (on the ground) but did not cause tripping and made an elegant entry

links_reviews_title: My first black tie wedding at a museum was perfect with this piece of art for a gown!
links_reviews_text: Very nice to have to wear a bra and still feel supported. Was stretchy around the hips and I felt amazing!
The fit was amazing , the style was awesome , it was comfortable , and I loved wearing it !! I highly recommend this dress to anyone !!

links_reviews_title: Comfortable and classy! Lots of compliments!
links_reviews_text: Overall, I'd say the fit was spot on. It was comfortable and didn't feel restrictive and didn't require Spanx. Great dress for tall ladies because of the raised front. I wish I could rent this dress in multiple colors and prints!

links_reviews_title: Fit like a glove... compliments all night long!!
links_reviews_text: I wore this dress to a black tie optional wedding and the high-low length was perfect! It fit beautifully! I was able to dance all night without needing to pull up on the dress (which is usually the case with most strapless dresses). I didn't need to wear a bra either because the material is thicker in the chest area. Compliments all night long! For size reference I am 5'4", 120 lbs, fuller C-cup and wore a 2R.
I loved this dress fit perfect!! Never had to pull top up!! Got many compliments!! I'd wear it again. Thanks RTR!!

This dress was beautiful and the material felt beautiful. It fit perfectly except for it cut low on the sides of my boobs so it didn't go straight across my bust, but dipped before my armpits. This made my boobs look bigger than they are (which might be good for smaller breasted ladies), but I was worried about the constant adjustment. Also, people have mentioned this- but the garment straps are close to impossible to keep inside. If I were to pick this, I would probably do a single stitch on the inside of the dress or physically tape them down.

links_reviews_title: Wedding in Philly. SO fun catching up with old college friends!
links_reviews_text: Overall I loved wearing this dress! I normally wear a 12, but since that wasn't available I had to go a size up. It was a little large, but I was still able to enjoy dancing and fun at the reception!

I'm usually a 4 plus a 32G but got the 4 & 6 for safety. Ended up wearing the 6 with some shapewear to fit my boobs because the mermaid fit is definitely tight were it not for my chest i probably could have done the 4...but I felt like the (2nd to the bride) most beautiful person in the room. Quality is incredible and I was very happy!

links_reviews_title: Loved this dress- had compliments all night long!!!
links_reviews_text: Only negative was hanger straps kept popping out...otherwise fit was great!

links_reviews_title: Beautiful, low maintenance, on trend dress.
links_reviews_text: Very flattering dress that stayed up well for being strapless. I wasn't pulling up the top all night. Dress fabric it a good quality but not too hot, the high low at the ankle allows for good air circulation.

links_reviews_title: This fit so well! Got tons of compliments!
links_reviews_text: Fit perfectly all around. Strapless but stayed up with my strapless bra underneath it with no problem. I'm 5'5" and it was a little long but my heels did the trick.

links_reviews_title: I love this dress. It was perfect for a June garden wedding.
links_reviews_text: PROs: Beautiful, unique, received many compliments. CONs: Torso is a little short, the dress rode very low on my chest, which was a little risky on the dance floor. The hips are also very wide in relation to the rest of the dress. Overall: LOVED IT.

links_reviews_title: It was one of the most beautiful dresses at the gala. I was very pleased and would wear it again.
links_reviews_text: I am a 40 DD so it was pretty tight but doable. I am 5'9"". The rest of the dress fit correctly. It's better to be tight on top so you dont fall out when dancing. I loved this dress.

links_reviews_title: Perfect for a southern black tie
links_reviews_text: This dress was so comfortable and I received so many compliments. Light weight and perfect for 90-degree weather!

links_reviews_title: No one had a dress like this!!
links_reviews_text: Great fit and the high low was something I've never tried for a formal event before. Literally there were MULTIPLE people wearing the same black rhinestone dress with nude cutouts. This dress was so unique and being able to experience with fashion is one of the many reasons I love RTR.

Got so many compliments on this dress all night. Loved the high-low look, however only being 5'4", the back was still pretty long on me, even with 3"+ heels. Was still very comfortable, good stretchy material.
Sized up after reading reviews! Loved it!
Loved this dress and got lots of compliments! I'm 5'8'' and despite wearing heels, the train was still a bit long and I tripped over it occasionally.

links_reviews_title: Told countless times how great the dress was! Hanger straps come out a lot, so maybe pin them inside
links_reviews_text: If u r curvy, order a size up due to the straightish cut through the hips!

I wore this dress for a formal event. It was a perfect fit. I'm 5'4" 115lbs. I order the 2r & 0r for back up. Both fit, but the 2r had a little more room in the hips. A lot of the reviews said this dress ran small. I didn't find that to be the case at all. It fit pretty true to size. Loved this dress!

Nice fit, true to size. As with any dress with a train, people will step on it all night. It wasn't too long though and I am short. The front flap is a little strange as it doesn't lay down flat. I'm not sure if it's supposed to fold in one of the spots, but it was odd. Nice dress for a one-time wear.
It kept twisting and I kept tripping on the back with my heals

The dress fit as expected. Secure on top so no worrying about having to keep pulling the top up. Corset-like on top then flares out a bit. I wish the corset fit went down lower because it ended right at my lower stomach which tends to stick out (mother of 2). Easy to dance in! I had so many compliments from strangers and acquaintances alike about my dress! I seriously debated purchasing it to keep. I had a great experience with RTR and will use them again for sure!
I rented this for a wedding where we were asked to wear florals - it was such a hit!! It fit true to size, was very comfortable and such a beautiful design. Would totally rent again!
I'm a 6 in street clothes and the 8 fit perfectly. Glad I got it.
This dress fit perfectly around my hips and the pattern was very flattering. Paired it with nude pumps and pearl earrings for a gala.

During the pandemic I had my 50th bday. I stayed home but tried on all the dresses anyway. Love the color on the dress and that's about it. It was very old and didn't fit right. Time to retire this one..

I'm so glad I paid a little extra to get this dress as a back up. My first choice was way too big. This dress is beautiful with the asymmetrical neckline. It's very tight, but the material is thick enough that it is flattering. The high low hemline allows it to work on a variety of heights. Love this dress!

links_reviews_title: Loved this dress! Loved the dress. Loved the color, loved the fit.
I felt glamorous in this dress! Wore to Charity Gala. Color theme was neon.. *neon*hair extension
links_reviews_text: Great fit! There was a little stretch that the material which made it very comfortable to sit, stand, dance. Color was a gorgeous blue & I received many compliments. Loved how this fit on the "backside" very shapely& flattering!

While I got numerous compliments about this dress, I didn't love it. The ruching is great around the stomach area but on the backside it stuck out in a weird way. I tried to post a photo that shows this (see bottom ride side of the dress). I tried to iron the dress before wearing but that didn't seem to help. With that being said, the color is amazing and the material is very thick and comfortable.

links_reviews_title: I got A LOT of compliments on this dress and such a beautiful color.
links_reviews_text: It was a form fitting fit but loved that it had some ruching in the midsection which was really nice to hide imperfections! This was my first time ordering from RTR. And it was so easy from start to finish! I could have worn the smaller dress but felt more comfortable in the larger size!

links_reviews_title: True to size. Very form fit, but easy to move around.
links_reviews_text: Hugs the body. I had no problems with the sleeves throughout the night. The color really pops!

links_reviews_title: I received so many compliments on this gown - especially from my husband!
links_reviews_text: Snug fit but that made it more flattering. I normally wear a size 4 in a dress but the 6 fit better. The color was pretty and the style was unique compared to other formal gowns I have worn. I felt very confident in this dress.
The color and the style of the dress is perfect. The ruching is perfect to cover trouble areas. I felt like a million bucks. A great combination of classy, sexy and comfort.

I wore this to a 125th Anniversary Symphony Gala. It was very comfortable and the neck line stayed in place all night which surprised me because I did not have anything to hold the gown up. The only negative thing I could say is that the zipper sticks and I was worried trying to zip it up that the zipper would break. Other than that I loved this Nicole Miller gown!

I got compliments on this dress all night. The material was stretchy, but hugged. I loved the cut. I wore spanx underneath and felt comfortable. If you want to wear spanx, I'd definitely go up a size. The petite was PERFECT length on me. The bust was tight but not uncomfortable. I felt super sexy and classy!

I rented this dress for a winter wedding. The royal blue made me stand out in a sea of black and the structured off the shoulder was a sexy, subtle touch. I was worried about the dress slipping around the shoulders or needing to readjust but it was not a problem. Would definitely rent again

Fabric is thick enough to hide any lumps and bumps. The pleating and rouching are in all the right places. I received numerous compliments. I was thrilled with the color as it is between royal blue and purple.

links_reviews_title: Amazing dress! So comfortable but elegant
links_reviews_text: This fit like a glove. I usually wear a 4 or 6 and went with the 6L

links_reviews_title: Never felt so gorgeous and elegant
links_reviews_text: This gown is a definite showstopper. I was nervous to wear it because it's completely out of my comfort zone as form fitting as it is. The neckline is so flattering, showing enough shoulder to make you feel sexy, but not exposed. The fabric is thick and has great stretch. It held in my "mom bod" perfectly, but did not restrict my movement. At 5'10" the long length was perfect with 2 inch heels. I heard a million compliments and have never felt more beautiful!
Wore this beauty for a work Christmas party. It fit perfectly. Was happy with the length. Got stopped all night with compliments of the style & color of this dress!

links_reviews_title: Great color, comfortable and easy to wear
links_reviews_text: I wanted to rent the 4R but only 6L was available on short notice during the holiday season. I decided to give it a try and it worked. The ruching allowed for it not to look loose and adjust the length a bit so not too long. I'm 5'5" and was able to make the long work although the regular length would have still been fine with heels bc I could have pulled it down a bit. Very comfortable and no adjustments needed during the night. Highly recommend

Beautiful, vibrant color! I loved this dress. True to size. Length was great. Material is thick and felt expensive. Loved the angle of the top/neckline. Simple and classic, but not boring. My only complaint would be the fit across the belly as I thought the ruching would be more forgiving, but going to the gym and a pair of spanx would help that! :) I would rent this again!

This dress is conservative but gives a statuesque silhouette. My issue was with the shoulder area: there is rubber piping that's meant to keep the dress in place but the fabric folds over so it was exposed. The back also tended to gap showing the interior of the dress. Possibly better for a larger bust or shoulders. I received this dress with tags still on :)

This dress was a stunner! It was so incredibly comfortable and the perfect length. I'm 5'5, 148lbs. I wore 3 inch heels. The only con I would have is that the back flipped over sometimes, I'm guessing due to wear the rubber sticky part didn't stay in place. It wasn't a deal breaker though!

This dress was beautiful. Very classy and comfortable. I was getting compliments all night my husband (who doesn't care about fashion at all) kept telling me how great the dress looked on me. Beautiful tailoring and was forgiving in all the right places. Perfect length and gorgeous color.

I'm 5'0" and 125lbs, I wore the 6R. It was a bit long, so if you're on the shorter side be prepared with very high heels to keep from dragging. Stretchy material makes it an extremely comfortable dress. Very form fitting so recommend a slip for a smooth look. Highly recommend!
Heavy material to hold you in in all the right places. Perfect length for heels. Stand out in a sea of black dresses with this gorgeous blue. Compliments all night!

I went up a size because that's all they had available in store, but this dress is definitely true to size. Easy to wear to a wedding or any other fall/winter formal occasion. I'm 5'10 and the length was perfect! They have short and long lengths available to order online, but the regular worked for me.

The customer service was amazing!! I had some rough travel days and they were able to send me a replacement because my first dress didn't fit right! Was so impressed with the options they picked and the timely manner of it all!
Wore this to my boyfriends Navy Ball! Felt beautiful. Sturdy & stretchy, nice material. Pretty long, which is great for me. A little big up top personally, but still worked well

This dress runs EXTREMELY SMALL. I usually wear a 4 or 2, and I probably should have ordered an 8 to be comfortable in this dress. Every time I sat down, it bunched up and needed adjusted. And the neck line kept needing adjusted. The only 2 pros- it was flexible and I was at least able to get up stairs moving my legs fluidly, and the color was gorgeous. Overall, if you are perfectly fit and have a wonderfully toned body with zero flaws, this would be the dress you'd like to wear. Also if you have a bigger chest size you might do better as well.

links_reviews_title: The dress fit well and I received multiple complements on it.
links_reviews_text: Very happy to receive two sizes. Would have preferred the 12 to be a regular, not a long but it was not available. Overall it worked out with the shoes I wore. The material was very strong and durable and felt it held my mom body in well. No UPS store open on Sunday when I needed to return, but the bag fits perfectly in a UPS drop box. I really don‚Äôt like shopping for dresses especially when I am probably only going to wear it once. This was my first time using rent the runway and if needed I will definitely use it again.
Ordered as a back up dress - did not wear. I did not like the fit.
Great color, not forgiving, very sexy.

links_reviews_title: I‚Äôm small everywhere except my tummy so I try to get things that hide it
links_reviews_text: Would look great on stimone bottom And too heavy but not stomach heavy

links_reviews_title: Beautiful! But too sexy for a work gala
links_reviews_text: I loved this sexy blue dress. It fit true to size and even for me being short, 5'2", the arm length was great and with heels this dress would have worked. Sadly I was attending a formal work gala and the slit was just too revealing for that kind of party. I went with another dress. But if I were attending an event with my husband this would have been perfect!

links_reviews_title: Great night at Father - Daughter dinner dance!
links_reviews_text: Great color, stretchy high-quality fabric, kept me warm but not too warm.

links_reviews_title: This dress was a BIG HIT - I stood out in a sea of black and the fit was amazing. Super comfy too!
links_reviews_text: The back rolled down a tiny bit due to over wear but it was manageable. I got so many compliments that I lost count. It's truly a show stopper! The fit slightly large but overall was amazing and hid all the places I wanted hidden. The length was longer than I thought it would be but a quick switch to higher heels and I was good to go.
The color and silhouette on this dress is stunning but it ran a size small and was a bit awkward on me.

links_reviews_title: This dress was great, except for the elastic in the back
links_reviews_text: The dress fit great, but I had to buy fashion tape for the back part that wouldn't stay flush against my back.
I loved this dress for a black tie wedding; however, was very disappointed to discover two holes on the seams, making the dress unwearable.

I ended up wearing my back-up dress for this order as the cut of this dress was far too HOT MOMMA for a wedding. Even when I went up a size the dress stole the show too much. The rouching placement, especially on the rear, is made for a statement. Fantastic dress, made me feel like a 1,000,000 bucks - but not right for my event.
Gapped a little at the top. Flattering. Warm.
This dress is amazingly gorgeous. Compliments all day, from literally every person! If you're considering it! Rent it!
This seemed a bit roomy for me, and not just in the height department. It was overall comfortable and I might get this one again in the future!

links_reviews_title: Fun and unique dress for NYE!
links_reviews_text: This dress was a lot of fun-I ordered it for NYE, and while I do think it ended up looking a little more summer-y than I thought it would be, it was very cute and comfortable. I think it would be especially great for a bridal shower or rehearsal dinner.

Wow! Another great dress. This was my second time renting. I wore it to go out to dinner and see the Nutcracker. The fit was perfect and the length was just right. A really comfortable dress overall! Would rent this dress again because of all the compliments I received!

Wore this to a holiday party. The 6 was perfect in the waist, but tight in the bust and shoulders. Would have gone with the 8 if it was available. I got lots of compliments and the dress has a lot more gold than what it looks like in the photos.

I wore this to a Formal Christmas party for my husband's work. It was a great comfortable dress. I did fit into the 6 better which was surprising but since the hips were a more flowy area of the dress (I have a wider bottom) the 6 was perfect. Got a ton of compliments and everyone kept telling me to buy the dress because it was so cute. Great dress!
The only thing that would have made it any better would have been pockets! This dress is a perfect cocktail, black tie, comfy, classy dress! You will not be disappointed!

I wore this to my husband's company "white" holiday party. I wanted to feel sexy but obviously had to be appropriate for the event with colleagues. This dress was the perfect combination of sophisticated and elegant but still really fun and interesting. It is SUPER comfortable - I danced for hours. The texture and details are really eye catching. I got compliments ALL NIGHT LONG.

links_reviews_title: Perfect for High Tea at the Ritz!
links_reviews_text: Fit perfectly and looks like snowflakes for a winter wonderland dress. Wore a white lace bra underneath and it was totally covered by the cut outs.

This was my second choice for a work event, so I wasn't thrilled at first. However, it ended up being a HUGE hit and I felt really good in it! For me it ran a little big, but was doable. Overall I loved it and wished I owned it!

I normally wear a 16 and size up for my chest as needed. I sized down for this dress and it was a tiny bit tight in the ribs but would have been too big in the next size. I wore it for my wedding shower and was in love. It's so so cute! It's also very forgiving of flaws since it's a A line!

I REALLY almost bought this one! It is so unique, and I received so many compliments. Fit like a glove, I felt so pretty! I wore it to church. The only thing that kept me from buying it was that it is white (and gold), so I would feel that it was inappropriate to wear to someone else's wedding. It would be perfect for a wedding dress actually! It was beautiful!

I loved wearing this for our rehearsal dinner! I received so many comments about how beautiful the dress was (and that my wedding gown the following day had some big shoes to fill). There was some extra room in the waist, but it still looked and felt very tailored.

I wore this for a summer charity event that I co-hosted. I wanted to look extra special since I'd be getting extra attention. It was a huge hit and I felt so comfortable. I love that I was able to wear a real bra and the girls were well covered. Highly recommend this dress!

links_reviews_title: The dress is really comfortable and looks even better in photos!
links_reviews_text: I was a bridesmaid in an "dress-in-all-white" beach wedding party. The dress was comfortable, had pockets and looked stunning in the sun.

links_reviews_title: Great looking dress; lots of compliments! Perfect for a white & gold gala party (work event)
links_reviews_text: The size 4 fit, but was tight in the armpits, so I wore the size 6 instead. It fit great and was very comfortable. Be advised, this is a long tea length (hit about mid-shin on me) so I think it looked better with heels. It was light and comfortable for an outside summer party. A former coworker even rented the same dress for the party (I am on the left)!

This dress was beautiful and I received endless compliments on it! When I originally rented it, I didn't realize there was both gold and ivory dots on the dress (I thought it was all ivory) but I loved it even more with the gold! It gave it great dimension and style. The dress itself was very comfortable and fit true to size. Definitely recommend this dress!

I loved wearing this dress and received many compliments! I generally wear a size 12 and the 10 fit perfectly so I recommend sizing down. I wore the dress for graduation and drinks afterwards - probably 6-7 hours total - and was comfortable the entire time even in the heat and humidity of the Midwest. I did wear a strapless bra because even nude straps could be seen through the lace on the back and shoulders. I loved the cream and gold tones of the dress and I felt very confident while wearing it. Would definitely rent again and highly recommend!

links_reviews_title: I LOVED this dress! I felt like a Queen & received compliments all over town!
links_reviews_text: I loved everything about this dress!!! True to size, comfortable & beautiful!

I rented this to wear to a White Party fundraiser but went with another look. The dress fit great and was super fun. I had it one with a muse standard bra and you could just barely see the straps through the dots or you could go strapless. Would be great for a party or shower!

links_reviews_title: My event was great, I don‚Äôt wear this though! Just tried it on!
links_reviews_text: Again, I think I am too short for this length of dress. I am 5‚Äô 4‚Äù. Also, I ordered a 10 and it fit and usually I am a 12...
I rented this dress for my bridal shower and it was a hit. The dress is however very long but nonetheless it looked amazing for my special day. I highly recommend
Fit well, and got lots of compliments. Great for small busted people and was tea length

links_reviews_title: Tea for two at Adare Manor
links_reviews_text: We were traveling to Ireland and having tea at Adare Manor. I picked this beautiful dress to wear. I kept it in the plastic when packing. It fit perfectly and was perfect for tea.

links_reviews_title: I have NEVER received so many compliments on anything I've worn before.
links_reviews_text: It fit perfectly. I'm a 34A and the 0R was so comfortable in the bodice and the length was great - tea length felt a bit elegant - something different. I wore it with a gold shoe which I liked because of the subtly gold-toned parts of the fabric. Honestly, I had my first compliment when I stepped out of the car and it continued all evening. Amazing.
I am 130, 5'8", 34 C bust and the 4 reg fit great. This dress takes great pics bc of the shimmer. It feels ladylike and is very comfortable.
This dress is beautiful, rich material, nice detail. Runs a little big, and it was a bit long on me ( I'm 5'3 ), but received compliments all night long. Would rent again
I wore this for Easter Sunday and LOVED it. Super flattering and very fun. I almost kept it. Ha!

links_reviews_title: Work gala and the dress was perfect!
links_reviews_text: I am smaller on top so the smaller size was better for me. I got tons of compliments.
Exact fit. I loved it and had many compliments.
Loved this dress! It's great quality and a pattern! I received many compliments at our afternoon tea party.
I loved this dress. It is is sheer yet covered, with beautiful and modern lace. I wore it to my son's birthday party and received compliments galore. Really a great find.
Dress had a good fit but was a bit longer than I would have wanted.

links_reviews_title: I loved this dress, and felt so good in it!
links_reviews_text: I got many compliments on this dress. Getting a tan beforehand if you have light skin can help with the contrast a bit. I wore one size smaller than I normally do in dresses, which was nice.
This dress was beautiful! Fabric had a shine/sparkle to it. It was flattering and comfortable.

links_reviews_title: This dress is beautiful and unique. Many compliments.
links_reviews_text: Fit true to size. Love the length for my age (68) and not frumpy. It was really comfortable to wear. It does not need much jewelry and you can wear many types/colors of shoes. I have never gotten so many compliments. Great choice!
I loved this dress! It was so pretty, nice quality, and figure flattering. I'm very fair skinned so oftentimes crepes are hard for me to pull off, but this color looked great

Can be frumpy if you are not tall. Perfect for presentation I had to give at very conservative event. Dress is white and gold metallic which isn't evident in photo. Can accessorize with a thin gold or white belt but not necessary. Wore with nude and clear acrylic high heels, large gold wire hoops, vintage white ostrich handbag with bakelite handle, white open weave cardigan which helped make it more contemporary. Dress runs large so I wore a 6.

It's hard to tell, but this dress is two tone. The goldfish hue has sparkle to it and so it's prettier in person than in the photo. Fit was great. I got compliments all night at my office holiday party. I loved this dress.
This dress is extra comfortable. The fabric design is glimmering and unique. It was great for a fancy dinner.
Wore for Galentines dinner. Everyone wanted to know where I got the shirt. Wore with black skinny jeans. Side zipper little hard to zip up alone.

links_reviews_title: Top was beautiful with white cropped pants.
links_reviews_text: Fits a little large. I usually wear an 8 and it was a little loose on me. Loved the length.
Fun top to wear for a night out.
The top is starting to show it's wear but still looks nice. If you have larger breasts, you'll need to size up. the size 2 for me being a 34B was perfect. Perfect chic top for a night out in Paris.

links_reviews_title: The red color really popped and made this very special awards recognition even that more special
links_reviews_text: Fit was perfect, I paired the top with a pair of tailored Zara pants and gold strappy heels. I still wore a strapless bra for added comfort. Perfect fit, perfect color, perfect selection. I'm 40 yo, 5'6," 135 pounds, athletic build
I rented this then didn't really have a reason to wear it but I LOVED it. I would have purchased it but $175 for a shirt seemed steep.

I ordered this for a fun party and wore it with pleather leggings. It is very structured and the tailoring makes it a fabulous piece. I got tons of compliments the entire night. This one was a hit for me. It fit me true to size if not a little big, but I am narrow in the shoulders. I would probably size up for a larger bust/shoulders. Rent this!

links_reviews_title: Many compliments.... the top made a "red hot" statement !!!
links_reviews_text: Not tight but a relaxed fit . Quality fabric too

Wore for a double date in Williamsburg (Xixa) - my husband loved it, my friend asked me where it was from, and I got a ton of positive comments on Instagram. Would absolutely rent again. Comfortable, unusual, worked for freezing winter but I could see wearing it any time but the hottest of summer days.

This is teh 2nd time renting this top. First time I rented a size 4 - it fit but was a bit tight overall. Size 6 was perfect! I am usually a 2 or 4 in tops. The hot red color is awesome. Love the styling and the fabric drape in front - hides those tummy imperfections! : ) It is a heavier material. Showing a bit of wear but still looks amazing. Received tons of compliments at this Porsche event!
This blouse was a hit for date night! Pairs with skinny jeans and nude heels and big gold earrings. Didn't wear a bra with it. It was perfect

links_reviews_title: Bright burst of color for summer night
links_reviews_text: Beautiful top with unique cut. Received compliments from both of my male friends that evening. This could be dressed up or down.

links_reviews_title: Amazing vibrant top that makes a statement!
links_reviews_text: I wore this to a friend's bachelorette party and I loved it. It makes a great statement and isn't too form fitting so you can eat and drink in it without feeling fat. Got a ton of compliments on it, and the piece is incredibly comfortable. Will definitely rent again
I'm small chested, so if larger bust size up

Super cute, fits true to size-I sized up because I'm never sure about the bust with off the shoulder styles ...but could have went with a size 6 and not needed a bra. Very versatile, wore with jeans and also to work with a skirt. Very flattering and easy to wear. Definitely recommend!
The fit was absolute perfection, couldn‚Äôt take two steps without getting another compliment. Would love love loved this top

I wore this top for a business award trip in Florida. We had dinner at a nice restaurant and I wanted to wear something nice, but not too dressy. I felt like a million bucks in this top. It's sexy, but not revealing and it's flattering. The front of the top drapes in a way that will hide any tummy pouches, especially after eating. I normally wear a size 6 in dresses, but often a 4 or smaller in tops. The 6 was a little big, but I made it work. I used a bit of fashion tape on the sleeves side to avoid any gaping and just for the psychological comfort of knowing that it wouldn't slip down. I would definitely rent this again.
Great fit, true to size. I loved the cut and the detail! It's a heavy material so it worked great for an early spring party.

links_reviews_title: Wore this on Day 1 of a work conference and got a ton of compliments!
links_reviews_text: Very stylish and great color. Needs to be pulled down occasionally to lay as intended.
comfortable fit, strong fabric, classy. I wore it to several occasions, including my work Christmas party, a date, and a friend's holiday party.
Top fits well and is a great, thick fabric and color. Wore it for a night out and definitly would rent again.
Love this top - got a lot of compliments! Also the way the shirt is made, it hides the stomach, which was helpful for me after a huge meal.
Clung to my love handle a little awkwardly but I really loved the way I felt in this shirt.
Great top and rich red color. I received several compliments throughout the night. It was fun, comfortable and flattering. I'd wear again.
This is a great top and is very flattering

This top wore gorgeous, comfortable, rich red, hid my imperfections. Was trendy and understated elegance all at once! Would definitely love to own. Can dress up as I did or easily dress down for a date night with jeans or leather leggings... super cute
The 0 fit perfectly without being too tight (which I was afraid of - I vary between 0 and 2). Fun cut and beautiful, bright color. Different and interesting. Would rent again!

Very unique and flattering! This runs true to size, but we recommend sizing up since it is fitted. This is great for any cup size, but should be worn with a standard bra. The fabric is very stretchy! Wear this with black pants for a great work look!

links_reviews_title: Loved the top - very different. Perfect for a professional work event. Very classy
links_reviews_text: Looks exactly like the photo. I got a lot of compliments. The look is just different and stylish/classy. I wore this to a work event. Fits nice.
Love the color and different shape
Fit well
I got a lot of compliments on this top. Wore to Vegas on a relaxed night out to dinner.
The fit was okay and with my large breasts, it didn't look right without a bra. Fabric didn't look expensive either.

links_reviews_title: Not the level of quality expected
links_reviews_text: This top looks so gorgeous in the photo but it was very deflating in person. I unpacked it and put it right back into the garment bag to send it back without trying it on. The material looked like cheap polyester, not at all what I was expecting from this designer or price tag.
Fit is as expected.
This was beautifully made and it fit well, it just wasn't my style. I think it's better for a taller person, it seemed to be wearing me instead of me wearing it... so sad because it's gorgeous.

I wish I could have worn this but only the 2 was available and I ordered this as a replacement. I was surprised I needed the 0 as it was a designer piece. It's a great red and the draping and fabric are so pretty.
Fit like a glove and hugged all the right places.

Super cute but tighter than the picture lets on, especially around the chest. Once it was fully zipped up my side, my arm fat bulged out and I couldn't wear it :( will try ordering up a size next time.

links_reviews_title: Great night in this show stopper red shirt!
links_reviews_text: Could be worn with or without a straples bra Very high-end fabric so the material does not cling. Is fitted but does not show any lumps/bumps of a belly
Loved everything about this: color, fit, shape. I'll probably buy. XS was perfect on both top and bottom (and I'm more pear shaped).

links_reviews_title: Loved it so much I bought it!
links_reviews_text: It's a part of my wardrobe permanently now so I guess that tells you how much I liked it!

This is one of the most flattering cute and colors of a dress that I have worn in awhile. I wore it to a charity event for the symphony board that I am on and I felt so comfortable yet put together all at the same time.

links_reviews_title: Fun yellow dress to brighten up the work day!
Love it love it. Wore this for my 40th bday dinner.
Didn't wear the dress and had to return the next day
links_reviews_text: Front has too much material
Great rental for everyday wear or date night. Fit was TTS, and the dress had a button at the bust so it wasn't too revealing. Would be great for work as well, I will rent again!
I loved this dress! I wore it to work and i had a photo shot to do that day and this was the perfect dress!

links_reviews_title: Great easy to wear work piece! More of a dark mustard yellow (not as bright as the photos)
links_reviews_text: This fit well - was a bit tighter in the arms/shoulders than I would normally like but was still an enjoyable outfit for the day. The color is great - more mustard than the yellow shown on the site. No problems wiht the front gaping open either.

links_reviews_title: Colorful multi season dress, good for curves
links_reviews_text: I rented this dress for everyday at work. I wore it with wedges and a jean jacket. Could easily be dressed up for not a fancier occasion or worn with boots and tights for a cooler season. The fabric is a good weight, not too thin in the skirt like some similar styles. I have a large booty and bust and this dress covered them modestly. I wore a cami underneath to avoid a wardrobe malfunction.
Top is a bit baggy but over all super cute. I am a M/L, got a L but should have got a M. Had to use some safety pins to keep the top closed. Got lots of compliments.

Amanda Uprichard are always fabulous. This is a tough color but one I got it on, I started liking it more and more. I thought the bottom it well, but the top is a little baggy. I've still gotten compliments!

Decent for work with a cami and some discreet tape at the bust line. Nice color, would pair well with either a strong blazer or cute cardigan. Would probably do best with a tall pair of heels for a night out, but doable with some tights and boots for daytime. 4/5 because fabric a tooch clingy and dress overall tends to ride up during the day.

links_reviews_title: Beautiful color, great fit - exactly what I was looking for!
links_reviews_text: I ordered a dress for a work cocktail event, and the dress didn't work out. The first time that has ever happened for me with Rent the Runway. Contacted their customer service and they were awesome and offered to overnight this dress to my event in GA (I originally ordered in Portland, OR, where I live). The dress made it in time, and it looked awesome! They didn't have my normal size, which would be a small, but the XS fit fine. It was a little tight in the arms, but it still looked really good, so I was super happy. Great customer service for the win! :)
I wore this today and got so many compliments! This is the best shade of yellow and the fit is flattering on all body types. The dress was a bit short so it pairs nicely with tights or leggings

I wore this to work. Wore with black tights and knee high boots, statement necklace. If you have a larger chest, the bust may gape a bit, but it worked fine for me. Flattering with the elastic waist. Length was perfect... not too short or too long (reference I'm 5'8").

links_reviews_title: Stylish for work - love the color
links_reviews_text: The top closes nicely, making it fit for work. Love the quarter sleeves. Even though the band sits at the hip / below the natural waist, it's not an awkward fit. Looks very flattering. I'm curvier at the bottom so the dress just gets to be a tiny bit short, but I wore with stockings and it was perfect. Love the color! Rented the blue one too. Wore this multiple times and will rent again.
The dress is easy fit, thicker clothes than I thought so good for fall and even winter. The skirt length is a bit too short for me but with tights I can picture me to wear this at work.
Great color that you can rock in winter or summer. I paired it with black tights and black booties and loved it! The only issue - it's rather baggy. I wear a 0 or 2 normally and this felt pretty big.

links_reviews_title: Too short for work (I'm 5'6") Pretty for a dinner out
links_reviews_text: Couldn't wear to work but pretty color. Top part is def large for an XS

This is a gorgeous dress, but don't rent if you have hips/a butt. It was overly blousy on top, hid my waist, and wasn't too flattering in the hips. If you have narrow hips and a tummy or are larger up top, I can see it being a better match. The fabric is luxurious and thick, and the strategically placed snap at the chest is a nice touch.

I rented this dress for my birthday brunch and ended up wearing it out to a 'smart casual' restaurant the night before as well. The color was fantastic and the fabric draped so nicely and felt expensive. I'm 5'6", 144 lbs and a 32D, and I wore the small. It fit quite well, was a little tight in the arms but nothing that bothered me greatly. It was too short for work, hitting me several inches above the knee, but was perfect for a celebration!

links_reviews_title: Got tons of compliments on the dress. Perfect color for a fall wedding.
links_reviews_text: The dress was so comfortable and fit great. Loose and flattering in the right places. Loved the color
Wore this to the church part of a wedding. Perfect for the occasion. Would rent again

Love this dress (so much so that I also rented it in navy). It's easy for work or for a casual event. My only complaint is that it's pretty low cut, so I did need to add a safety pin to the cleavage area. I wish it had one more button. Both dresses also came pretty wrinkled and needed steaming.

Was worried it would be tight in my butt/hips but it fit great. Was a bit loose in the chest, but nothing excessive. For a B/C cup, in this style, I'll take it! The color was a nice change in winter :)
This dress was beautiful. The top was a little bit loose so it was not formfitting Perfect for work with a cami underneath

Loved it so much I had to buy it. The first time I wore it nearly everyone I ran into commented on it. It just fits so well, and the color is fantastic. So comfortable. Dress it up, dress it down. Had to keep this one!
This dress goes from day to evening. Its short for a tall girl like me, but looks sexy and sophisticated. I would buy it!

links_reviews_title: Nice on a cool spring day
links_reviews_text: Wore this to a family memorial where we were all told to wear yellow as it was the favorite color of the deceased. I didn't have any memorial appropriate attire that was yellow and would also account for the unexpected cool weather so I was happy to find this at a good price.
I have lean arms and it was very snug. The length is perfect and awesome color.

links_reviews_title: This arrived while I was away so I didn't get to try on until too late. Too short & arrived wrinkled
links_reviews_text: Really nice dress, short, but flattering cut.
Didn't wear as was too big. Color is really nice but I wouldn't say the fit or cut is anything to write home about. Order a size down.

links_reviews_title: Short dress with a gaping neckline... not the best work choice for me!
links_reviews_text: The neck was so low, I was adjusting it all day. I should have pinned it shut. It was also on the shorter side. It would have been nice with tights.
Fits great and comfortable

It's very flattering which surprised me. The color is vibrant but still professional. It does run short - I'm 5'2 and was pulling it down. The top clips closed and opened once, but I could have used a safety pin and didn't.

Trust the reviews, this dress is a weird fit. If the top part of the dress wasn't so poorly constructed; actually stayed closed; and was sized in proportion to the rest of the dress, this would have been an easy piece to purchase. I love the color, the material, and the sleeve length...but the top part made it an uncomfortable wear and a one-time rent.

links_reviews_title: Very comfortable and flattering! Can be dressed up or down, will definitely rent again!
links_reviews_text: Wrinkles pretty easily - but still pretty.

I felt great in this dress! I added another safety pin at the bust just to be sure it kept closed but you may not need it as it already has a button clasp. Surprising color that was really flattering. I'm 160 lbs 5'2'' with Full chest.

I was between a M and L and went with the large for more length. Very comfortable dress. Material on the skirt portion is very thin and wrinkles easily, so I took off a star for quality. I used fashion tape to keep the top from opening, though there is a small snap. I wouldn't have needed the tape if I'd worn the M. Great rental and would have bought if the skirt was lined and/or better quality fabric.

links_reviews_title: Received glowing reviews and compliments for this disarmingly simple but elegant look.
links_reviews_text: Absolutely loved the length, texture, fabric, and cut. Bonus for pockets! It made quarantine more fun. Dressing up just for the mood lift.
It was a lovely gown and the skirt had a very cool fabric and pattern. It was a little long for me (5'3") but high heels made it just right.

This dress was beyond beautiful in person. And so comfortable! I didn't need Spanx, just control top pantyhose which was a treat! For the first time at a black tie event, I didn't want to go home and take my dress off! It is a bit lower in back than I expected but I still wore a standard bra and no one seemed to notice (or care) that my bra strap was visible. And it has pockets! Just a wonderful dress to wear.
A fun, flattering and comfortable dress! The low back of the dress meant no bra, but it totally worked from the front. As a bigger woman, I felt great! Loved!

I rented this for my husband's company party. I loved the fit except for the length, although it was not a dealbreaker. I am 5' 4" and I'm wearing 2 inch heels in this picture. As you can see it hit the ground and I had to lift it up when walking. This did not surprise me because of the other reviews saying the dress was a bit long. Really enjoyed wearing it and I got many compliments. Love the pockets.

This dress was a lifesaver! I added it to my list on a whim, not thinking it would work out. Only to have my other dresses deliver and none of those worked and this ended up being my last resort. Luckily I tried it on and it fit like a glove! Super comfortable and loved having pockets while on the dance floor. The cut is flattering and I was able to wear a normal bra with it. I added my own little cardigan sweater and a long black petticoat I found online for $10 to give it extra poof.

links_reviews_title: Fun dress for a fun night!
links_reviews_text: Fits true to size. Came super wrinkly. Had to spend about an hour steaming out the wrinkles. There is a little slit at the waist that the bow slides through. Took a while to figure that out. Huge perk that it has pockets. I'm 5'6" and with a little wedge heel, the dress hit the ground perfectly. Nice that you can wear a regular bra with this dress!

The theme for this party was glam to grunge. The plaid skirt was perfect. I did some styling hacks, tho. I thought the plunge back looked better in the front; more modern. So I wore it backward. It was also too long for my 5'4" frame, so I tied the sides in knots. Worked perfectly to accentuate my converse sneaks, and made it a little more grunge. Compliments all night.

fit really comfortably; the closer in the back was a touch confusing at first (it sort of wraps around and tuck into the skirt then comes to the front to be tied into the bow). skirt length was pretty long -- needed 4 inch heels for this one (I'm 5'3). the back also cuts a bit lower than I thought, so you could see a bra strap -- just FYI to plan accordingly. otherwise was super comfortable to wear and got lots of compliments at the holiday party!

links_reviews_title: Magical dress for a magical night in the city!
links_reviews_text: This dress was so fun to wear and a must for the holidays. It's easy to wear a regular bra and honestly, I could have ditched the spanks! I did find the belt/ribbon a bit confusing... it was like a wrap dress with small slit at the waist but when used like this it puckered awkwardly in the back. I ended up just wrapping the belt without the using the slit. Bonus: it has pockets!
I wore this dress on Christmas Eve for a candle light service. The velvet top and plaid skirt made this dress both elegant and festive.

links_reviews_title: So classic and perfect for Christmas Party
links_reviews_text: This dress was just what I wanted! Looked elegant and yet definitely had showstopper appearance. The top was soft velvet and the skirt flowed and had pockets. Loved it!

The dress fit true to size and was very comfortable. Since my Sister came for the holidays, she was able to wear the second one you get free and we loved it. I would definitely rent this dress again. We love Ralph Lauren.

links_reviews_title: I felt like Christmas all night!
links_reviews_text: This dress was so comfortable and lightweight and the pockets were a bonus. I received compliments all night long about how beautiful and unique this dress was. I even had several people tell me I looked like Christmas. I would highly recommend.

links_reviews_title: This dress was everything I could have hoped and more! So elegant.
links_reviews_text: Fit well on top and wasn't too tight across the ribs. Easy to wear a normal bra underneath as the straps had snaps to hold to the bra straps and the back wasn't too low. The skirt is full and has wonderful pockets. I loved this dress and which I had a reason to wear it often!

The petit length was still a little long for me (w/ 2" heels) but got many compliments on it! Has pockets which is of course the best, but the skirt is unlined so it was super staticky for me the whole evening. Would definitely consider renting again, as long as it's not too dry out.
Loved it. Wore for a wedding and even the guys kept complimenting the skirt. Wish the top was a little different but it is super comfortable and easy to dance in.
I liked the skirt but not the top part of it.

links_reviews_title: Couldn't wear it, but it's gorgeous
links_reviews_text: I really wished I got a size smaller, it's a stunning dress. The back part was too big on me but overall beautiful dress!

links_reviews_title: What a great dress. I wore it to a Robert Burns night for a Scottish Society with my husband.
links_reviews_text: The fit was perfect especially for a bustier person like me. I always have to go up sizes for dresses to fit my chest but then are too big in the waist. It was perfect and i could even wear a regular bra.
little on the long side and I am 5' 7.5" tall wearing 3 inch stiletto.
Flowy & comfortable fit! Enjoyed dancing all night in this dress üëó

I usually wear an 8, but saw it ran big and ordered a 6. I think I could have used a 4! If it fit properly, I am sure it would have looked more like a dress and less like a tablecloth on me! Glad I had an alternate dress!
Fit nice and was elegant.

This dress arrived brand new with tags. It is subtly Christmasy and so flattering. It was perfect for a December wedding. I was comfortable all evening, dancing and swishing through the crowd. The velvet bodice is lux. I paired it with a black shawl for some warmth. Very classic and lovely. Lots of compliments
So beautiful. I would absolutely buy it if it was more than 10% off!
A beautiful dress. I received many compliments. It‚Äôs a comfortable dress but does run long. I wore a 3-4 inch heel and it just hit the floor. My height is 5‚Äô4‚Äù. I would rent this dress again.

links_reviews_title: A perfect dress for the holiday season!
links_reviews_text: I loved this dress! I wore it to a fundraising gala and received many compliments from complete strangers. The dress fits true to size. It was brand new when I received it, with tags still attached. The top is velvet. The skirt is much more full than the picture shows. The zipper was extremely smooth (I've had issues with other zippers on gowns/dresses in the past). I'm 5' 7" and the dress came right to the floor. With heels, it was the perfect length. And the best part, it has pockets! The only negative thing was that there were small snaps on the inside of the straps that dug into my shoulders. I covered them with small pieces of tape and it was fine for the entire evening. I highly recommend this dress. It was my back-up style and I'm so glad that I added it to my order at the last minute!

You need to be tall. I am 5'2" so it is difficult for me to rent gowns from RTR however sometimes I can tape up the hem. Too much fabric in this case. The dress is beautiful and feels like silk taffeta but I was not able to wear.
This dress made me feel beautiful and classy! The color was great with my complexion and red hair. Very comfortable, too! Would definitely rent again!

links_reviews_title: This dress was fabulous, I received compliments all day from my co-workers.
links_reviews_text: I think the dress runs a bit large, I typically wear a 10 but could have probably went with the LR on this one. The fun floral pattern was spot on and not too outrageous.

This dress is very flowy, but the elastic accentuates the waist. I'm short so the dress was a bit long even though I was wearing heals. I got many compliments throughout the night, so I'll definitely rent this one again :)
Comfy and cute!
Very forgiving fit great for pregnancy
Easy breezy summer dress! It's super long, I paired it with my Marc Fisher Wedges and it was still grazing the floor. I recommend a wide belt at the waist.

I rented this dress for an outdoor wedding in Arizona. It was perfect! The dress fit comfortably, but still flattered my figure. I was happy with the length and was able to wear 3" inch heels with the dress. This dress is definitely a bold fashion statement. I stood out at the wedding and received multiple comments. Would rent again!

links_reviews_title: Lots of compliments. Felt amazing in it.
links_reviews_text: Fit perfectly. It‚Äôs very long, so paired it with wedges. Wore it with the opening to the front instead of back. Would definitely rent it again
Loved the material on this dress, it is kind of sheer with a dotted texture on top. The lining is stretchy but the layered skirt moves nicely. Would rent again!

links_reviews_title: Beautiful dress, flattering style, bright colors
links_reviews_text: Glamorous dress, runs too big, worked ok with high heels, XL was too big and too long .

You're kind of a human pinata in this dress. The pattern was interesting, fabric was nice quality and hung well. You definitely need confidence to pull this one off though, there is so much fabric and it's a pretty bold fabric.
Loved this dress! I wore it while traveling on vacation and on an evening out with friends. So comfortable and the waist is very flattering- hard to send this one back!

I am a size 10 so RTR sent me an XL. I really needed a M or maybe a L. It was big and frumpy, especially in the chest (and I'm a 34D). Fortunately the design is loose so I don't think it was terrible but a smaller size would have been more flattering. The material is cool - light and comfy - and wrinkles are not noticeable.
I got lots of compliments and it felt very feminine. Not a dress I would usually buy, but fun to try a new style for a weekend

This dress is so light and floaty and such a gorgeous color! I wish I could give it 5-stars, but it runs fairly big and definitely very long. I'm about 5'4 and even in 2 inch heels, the XSR was still about 3-4 inches too long. I fixed the skirt length issue by pinning the dress up underneath the first tier of ruffle (worked perfectly!), but there wasn't anything that could be done about how overly big/long the blouse part was, so sadly the top looked a tad dumpy. Loved this dress but wish I could have sized down.
Gorgeous flowy dress. Comfortable. Fun.

links_reviews_title: Runs long and not great on curvy girls
links_reviews_text: I think you need to be tall and athletic build to really rock this dress. It brushed the floor even with heels for me. It's a fun, contemporary boho dress but I felt a little dowdy in it with my body type. Nice dress just not my style.

I rented this dress for my birthday. I am 5'8 and it was long enough to wear with a 3 inch wedge without dragging on the floor too much. I wish I had gone a size down as I feel like it was a little too large in the chest but overall it was a great dress and I would consider renting it again!

I love this feminine by byTiMo! Running true to size with some stretch, I recommend wearing your true size for your primary size and going up for your back-up. This style is fitted throughout the midsection and loose at the hips. It works for all cup sizes. At 5'0", the length hit floor length on me. This dress was super cute but way too long for me to wear at my height even if I paired with heels. Pair with strappy heels and a cute accessory to complete your outfit!

links_reviews_title: This dress was SUCH a hit at my friends wedding recently. Such a fun pattern. Gorgeous.
links_reviews_text: Fit was perfect - I got an LR (I'm 5'9'', 165). I wore heels and rented black dangly earrings to complete the look.

I love this dress! I wore it 3 times before returning it (out to brunch with friends, to a family dinner, and to work). I love the print and the material. I felt comfortable and chic at the same time. This is a great dress that you can get a lot of mileage out of. And it fit like a dream!
Tiered, fun print, unique fabric. Very flattering fit!

links_reviews_title: Beautiful dress but fancy and long
links_reviews_text: I'm 5'6 and needed to wear heels with this dress. Got a size M and couldn't wear it with flat sandals so was too dressy. This is dressy enough for a wedding - had bought it for a casual event so didn't end up wearing it.

links_reviews_title: Perfect for dinner and pretty much everything.
links_reviews_text: Pretty and very comfortable.

links_reviews_title: So pretty, but way too long.
links_reviews_text: I love this dress. Wish I could have dressed it down with flats, but it was too long.

links_reviews_title: Ten years out of college and we can still boogie.
links_reviews_text: Though long the material is light weight and breathable. I was very comfortable in it at the evening garden party I attended in it (about 65 degrees Fahrenheit and humid).
Cute outfit for a rainy chilly Mother's Day. I wear an 8/10 and could have gotten away with a medium, but it fit enough for me to wear. I am 5'7 and it was long enough for heels

Loved everything about this dress! Wore it to a wedding in March and it was a weight for outside. The bright red is gorgeous. I am normally an 8 and 8 regular fit my body and I wore it with a wedge heel that was perfect.
A little bit too much fabric for me.

I love maxi dresses, but they are frequently too short. This dress came in long length option and was perfect! I ordered an XL to make sure long enough and think I could definitely done a large. It is a very light material. The cuff seams are a bit frayed, but not too noticeable.

links_reviews_title: So much potential, but not a flattering neckline.
links_reviews_text: The neckline did not do this dress justice. Fabric and layers were cute, but neckline needed to be a little less drapey.
Dress fit me perfectly and perfect length at 5'4" (I did wear a slight wedge). Super comfortable too.
Beautiful dress and would've been perfect for my event. Unfortunately my waistline hates me. The cut did me no favors in that area so I won't be able to wear it :(
Good holiday maxi
Nice fit. Very comfortable. Wore to church. Lots of compliments.

This was a wonderful flowy casual dress to wear during the day. It fit really well and was forgiving in the curves. Looked elegant and unique. I little long, I'm 5'7" and it came down to the floor. Nevertheless, I wore it with both flats or heals for lunch dates, shopping, and a family brunch. Don't have any pictures but will try to take some in the future!

I wore this for my students' recital and it works great for musicians! There's enough room to move arms around. My only disappointment is that the color is not as vibrant as the photos. It's more of a faded light red. Completely fine to wear comfortable undergarments without worrying.

The dress fit great- it was slimming and elegant and had a lot of style for the simple silhouette. The colors and pattern were vibrant. I wore the SL at 5'-10" and it skimmed the floor in flats. I would highly recommend for a special occasion

The dress is really easy and comfortable. Works well with flat sandals or heels. I rented for a weekend in the hamptons. I got a bunch of compliments so I kept it for an upcoming event. Instant outfit just add earrings and go.

Received so many compliments on this dress! I loved the color and fit. It gave a an hour glass shape and showed a little cleavage. Wore it to a wedding and I was still able to dance all night long in it.

This dress was absolutely perfect for the Gala I attended! The color was beautiful, and the cut/style of the dress is very flattering. For reference I am 5'4, 115lb, and wore 3.5 inch heels! I Typically wear a size small/2 but followed other reviews and ordered an XS-regular length in this dress and it fit perfectly!

I felt sexy from the first time I put this dress on. The weight of the material is comfortable and forgiving. My only issue is the cups are awkward and not made for DDs.If you are busty you will need a special plunge bra or else you may have to go without. Straps are adjustable but even then they still needed to go further. Still a showstopper. Definitely curvy girl friendly. I could've gone down a size but I had to drive and wanted to be comfortable.

links_reviews_title: Perfect for a Mardi Gras Ball!
links_reviews_text: The adjustable straps were perfect for a smaller chest. I opted for the MR instead of the SR for more leg room to walk/dance the night away! Would definitely recommend for a wedding or formal event.

I rented this for a work party that was prom themed. It was very flattering with the exception of some extra fabric at the hips that hung a little weird. I also felt a tad bit too busty but otherwise - gorgeous dress

links_reviews_title: I got so many compliments on the color and the fit!
links_reviews_text: True to size, very comfortable, flattering

links_reviews_title: Fit like a glove and beautiful color
links_reviews_text: Great dress for a charity event. I was surprised the dress was nicely lined because it was a cold evening. Simple and elegant.

links_reviews_title: The color of the dress is beautiful! I got so many compliments and it fitted me!
links_reviews_text: I am 5'4" so the length is long, but with 4 inch heels on it was a perfect length!

links_reviews_title: I wore this dress for a Black Tie New Years Eve Wedding and it was STUNNING!
links_reviews_text: I'm 5'4, larger chest at 120 lbs. This dress, if you're a similar build to me, is absolutely stunning. I cannot say it enough. Order it now!

Gorgeous dress, great material. I could have worn a size xs but the small worked. The top was just a little big in the chest (I'm a 34B) but nothing that looked too crazy. I did need fabric tape to make sure my bra didn't show. Overall loved this dress and would rent again
This dress is stunning. I received compliments all night. I'm 5'6 140lbs and the small regular fit just right.
I thought about keeping it, but would have so few occasions to wear it. The medium fit like a size 6, and was perfect for my Halloween costume as Gaia, goddess of Mother Earth.

links_reviews_title: Simple, elegant dress in a beautiful color.
links_reviews_text: I wore this dress to a family wedding and I felt so elegant! It fit really well and the material was thicker than I was expecting and very soft. I'll definitely keep this in mind for future formal events.
This dress was pretty comfy. I loved the color and fit. It was a little loose in the hips but I receive so many compliments!
Love the color but the fit was baggy in random places, didn't end up wearing it
Fit is true to size. No bra needed for smaller chests. Overall loved the dress and would definitely rent again!

I absolutely love this dress and am going to have to buy it. It fit so well and was very comfortable the whole night. Didn't need a bra which is always a plus. It skimmed the ground so I would suggest as high of heels as possible if you're similar height, I think mine were 3.5 inches

Felt beautiful in this dress! Easy to move around from the cocktail party to the dance floor at a NYC formal wedding! I received ed compliments throughout the night and boyfriend said I was the second best dressed‚Äîbehind the bride of course!

This dress is stunning. I got compliments all night, my man loved it, I felt like a sexy old Hollywood starlet and wedding appropriate. I would highly recommend this gown. I was worried about the seems and thought they would make me look big but I think they gave my curves the perfect amount of attention.

links_reviews_title: Simple but impactful. I received a ton of compliments on this dress.
links_reviews_text: Fit well everywhere except the chest. I wish it had been a bit snugger up top.

links_reviews_title: I felt gorgeous in my dress!
links_reviews_text: Despite being form-fitting, this dress made me feel confident and comfortable. I loved the green! Being a bigger busted woman, this dress is a little tight, but the adjustable straps made it easy to adjust. Re-rent worthy!

This dress fit exactly as expected - not too tight, but still accentuated my curves. Very thick material, which was perfect for a holiday party (plus no bra needed!). Super comfortable to wear all night and the color is absolutely gorgeous - very true emerald green!
Compliments all night. Paired this with gold shoes and accessories for a fall indoor wedding. Absolutely loved this dress, might rent it again.

links_reviews_title: Gorgeous, gorgeous gown! I received compliments all evening. Will definitely consider RTR.
links_reviews_text: Dress was very comfortable and material was soft and a bit silky feel. It was a bit loose on the hip area but worked great to hide my imperfections!
GORGEOUS Dress. Fits nicely & naturally gives you curves. So flattering! Perfect length for petite (i'm 5 ft)

links_reviews_title: Cute but large in bust area.
links_reviews_text: Cute dress but way to big in the bust area, seems like it's meant for a full breast.

This dress was a bit big, I should've gone down a size but it was all they had available at the time! I love it! Wore it for a Valentines Date with the hubs & son! It is super comfortable and believe it or not I wore it to go go cart racing!!!!
Loved the fabric and fit - super flattering and comfortable! The red color is as bright as it appears in photos.

links_reviews_title: Great dress for Winter Maternity Photoshoot
links_reviews_text: I rented the dress for my maternity photoshoot. It's not a maternity dress but is stretchy and fit well.
Rented as a backup to another dress. Didn't hate it but it was a bit too conservative. Fits nice. The slit is kind of odd.

links_reviews_title: Loved the dress, light and airy. Choose to wear the backup dress instead for winter event.
links_reviews_text: The dress is made up of multiple layers of shear fabric that is light and airy. Perfect for spring, summer, or fall. The backup dress was heavier so I went with that for a winter party.

It fit nice for me. I have tiny arms and a larger lower body. Usually wear size 8 lower and size 4 or 6 upper body. The fabric on arms is giving and stretchy. Very comfortable and would rent again. I am wearing this straight out of the bag so a little wrinkly. I'll steam before use.
I'm pear shaped and a solid size 14/16 and this fit amazing!!!! Got compliments all night and felt great!

Very pretty dress for a wedding. It fit great and I didn't need spanks or anything to hide my tummy. The bottom does wrinkle a bit when packed. Be sure to wear a very concealable bra....mine showed a little in the front.
This dress was everything I needed it to be - comfortable, flattering, modest but with a wow factor...so amazing!! I wish I owned it.

I am three months postpartum and this dress made me feel amazing! I wore it to an anniversary dinner with my husband and it was very comfortable for eating, sitting, etc. It covered enough to make me feel good, but the sheerness in the arms and the tie around the waist kept it sexy. Highly recommend.

Rented this for my mom to wear to a gala. What a wonderful dress. The fabrics is stretchy so it was fitted, but not skin tight, and was great for taking a twirl on the dance floor. She looked great and was super comfortable!

Love this dress. It is so beautiful, comfortable and looks adorable on. BUT, it arrived with a large black mark on the upper back and had strong BO smell. I had to hustle it into the RTR shipping package and race to UPS drop the same day I received it in order to get another one, as I did not get an answer from the Unlimited Concierge service. Definitely recommend this dress. The color and fabric are clearly of high quality and the fit is amazing and flattering.

Great dress! Very comfortable to wear. I paired with turquoise earrings and nude sandals (not black shown, but same sandal). Lots of compliments throughout the night. Would definitely recommend and rent again.

links_reviews_title: Pretty and comfortable but high slit at left thigh
links_reviews_text: Loved the fabric, very comfortable for all day wear! I didn't realize it had a slit that went to mid thigh... made me a little self conscience but I was wearing to an awards luncheon for work. Prob better suited for evening.
Beautiful dress to spice up my normal work attire. It was a cold day so I wore tights and I'm glad I did because the slit was a little high for the office. ;)

links_reviews_title: Casual to dressy New Year's Eve party, so the red was perfect and the dress allowed me to dance.
links_reviews_text: Color was beautiful, very vibrant. The fabric was very comfortable. Because I am short, and could only get a regular length, the dress did come down to just below my calf, but honestly, with the shape and flow of the dress, it looked fine. Based on the body types and sizes worn of some of the reviews I read before I rented, I went up a size than is normal and was very glad I did. I wasn't really happy with the waist and the little rope belt tie that came with the dress, so I found a wide black belt that really made the waist better and taped most of the belt flat at the waist with the rest hanging down into the pleats of the dress and then matched that with a black necklace with gold accents and black shoes. IMO, a wider belt looked much better on people like me that might have a thicker waist.

I got compliments and stares, so apparently this wasn't bad on me. But I wanted it to be better for the price. I was thrown off by the unfinished edges too. But the color and fit are great. I was happy for the slit - spiced it up a bit

I LOVED this dress and got so many compliments on it. I wore full body black spanx with it and it was not see through. High slit in the dress is perfect because it adds a little sass with a pretty conservative dress.

This dress is great! I wore it to a steak dinner/five star hotel evening with the fianc√© and business partners. It is very comfortable and elegant. It is paired with a Kate Spade bag and The Fifth coat that I love love love also available on RTR.

links_reviews_title: These photos are from a 360 booth at the party.
links_reviews_text: The skirt part (and arms) are definitely sheer so I wore nude shorts underneath. The torso isnt sheer. Theres a long slit on the left leg, so consider that when thinking about wearing a slip. The belt became pretty thin when I tied it but probably could put a wider belt on top of it (its sewn onto the dress in the back). Kept it simple and wore with black pointy heels w/ an ankle strap. Could definitely be accessorized to be glammed up or toned down. Pretty versatile dress. Its cute and flowy and a great color. Got lots of compliments!

links_reviews_title: I loved the dress, very comfortable and received several compliments.
links_reviews_text: It is a lot more flattering on than it seemed on the hanger. It was classy & comfortable for a company party outdoors. I love the material and the peeping slit that appears when walking.
Fits true to size, wore heels but with the slight slit in the dress watch your slip. Probably could get away not wearing one
Perfect fit to look good and hide imperfections because of the stretch

links_reviews_title: Bright, flattering, comfortable, and easy to pack!
links_reviews_text: I'm usually between a 12 and 14, and the XL was perfect in this dress. As with the other Fuzzi designs I've tried, the fit is very flexible (it's made of layers of stretchy small-mesh-like fabric that is see-through when one layer (over the arms) and completely opaque when two layers). It's also incredibly flattering--I honestly have no idea how they do it. I felt like I stood out at the event in a crowd of dark formal dresses and felt sexy (callout to the above-the-knew slit over the left leg--it showed especially when walking quickly due to the flowiness of the fabric), but modest with the high neckline. I didn't need any shapewear (I think even tights would have been difficult with the mesh-ish fabric unless they were really silky). It also folds down really small and would be perfect for packing (though you may want to let the skirt hang overnight or steam it in a bathroom during a shower to get any slight wrinkles out after folding/traveling). Would absolutely rent again.
It's a great dress if you want to hide your tummy. Good fit and the fabric is soft. I am 5ft and the length was good. The slit in the front is just enough. Loved the red. Lots of compliments

I was hesitant to pick this up at the RTR store since it is super thin and looks sheer. However, it still had the tags on it so I figured I'd give it a try.
