Once on, it's not too see-through in the legs. The pleating on the skirt makes the silhouette more flattering and less sheer. Wish the belt was removable, but it's attached at the back.

Comfortable dress that is form fitting at the top and a flowy at the bottom and a surprise slit. Wore to gala and received so many compliments. I really loves the mesh sleeves, gave the dress more sex appeal!

links_reviews_title: Very stretchy and comfortable but waist is high
links_reviews_text: This dress would be best for people who have a defined waist. I am built without that definition and, while I'm only 5'5" the waist hit me 2 inches above my belly button which made me look like spongebob squarepants. :/ On the bright side, the material is very stretchy and comfy. The skirt flows nicely, the slit isn't too high- how rare is that?! The fuller skirt is great for hiding any trouble areas and allowing you to live your life without shapewear. I wish it had worked for me!

links_reviews_title: A bit too sexy for holiday parties
links_reviews_text: I liked the fit and look of this dress. Unfortunately, the sheer red fabric and moderately high leg slit made it feel a bit too sexy to wear around the family for the holidays. But if that's what you're looking for, this is a great dress!

links_reviews_title: It fit great and the slot was a perfect level of sexy for my work event.

links_reviews_text: I paired this dress with a different red and gold belt to fancy it up. I've been drawn to red which I was I originally chose this dress. Pretty dress for a fall/winter wedding
This dress is so flattering. I love it! Rented for family photos. I'm not typically a red dress person, but it looks great on!

links_reviews_title: Too sheer and slit too high for my taste

links_reviews_text: Good dress for an event in SF. Slit and see-through sleeves gives it a lot more sex appeal than your average full-sleeve, past the knees dress.

Glamorous, flattering and received lots of compliments. Probably not good for much more of a baby bump (5 months at time)... it does have a significant side slit I had to pin shut, couldn't see that in photo, would definitely get again
I didn't end up wearing this dress because I thought that material wasn't dressy enough for my event. SO thought it would be perfect for a date night and wanted me to buy it.

Cute log sleeve conservative dress. Has lots of stretch. Scared slit would be too high but didn't even reach mid thigh and wore tights so perfectly acceptable for more conservative settings without being too warm of a dress

links_reviews_title: A nice dress but not memorable
links_reviews_text: I really liked this dress, but it definitely was not a "wow" piece. It does have a high slit that is visible when you walk, so it was on the edge for work appropriate. Color is a deep red. I am a 14, sometimes 16, and the XXL was large on me. I could have worn the XL for sure.
Clear sleeves and brilliant color red. Comfortable and flattering.

links_reviews_title: Pretty, comfortable. Wrinkles easily. Beautiful color. I felt amazing and confident in it.
links_reviews_text: Wrinkly. Comfortable.

Gorgeous color & easy to wear. Fit perfectly in size 0R. I‚Äôm 5‚Äô7‚Äù, 120, 30DDD and it zipped up easily and covered my strapless bra. I wore 3‚Äù heels & the train was perfect. 4‚Äù heels looked great, too. Wore this in lieu of a Sari to a Themed Fundraiser/Gala & it was perfect. I pulled the added panel up high to accentuate the scarf effect! Would totally recommend!
Perfect dress for sightseeing in India! I wore a size 2 and it was a little big, but I made it work! Next time I would size down.
Wore this dress for a benefit. It's super cute and I felt fabulous. Fits true to size with room for forgiveness if needed as it's stretchy.

links_reviews_title: This dress was made to be seen
links_reviews_text: These colors ugh love! The dress is a bit complicated to put on but once you got it just start strutting your stuff. I have yet to wear a Tanya Taylor dress I didn't love and this one is no exception

I rented this dress for an outdoor formal wedding and was so glad I took a chance on it. It fit perfectly (true to size but I'd probably size up if in between) and was comfortable to wear all night. I loved wearing something so unique and got tons of compliments. The armhole on one side did gap weirdly as someone else mentioned, but it wasn't super noticeable for me.

links_reviews_title: LOVE. so fun, so unique. So many compliments
links_reviews_text: I'm usually a 2 or a 4 and a 2 fit well. I'm 5,8" and maybe 130ish. Since it fit great, it was comfy. Perfect for a summer beach wedding - the top part was a little tricky to figure out but it's not too bad. Loved the colors!
So comfortable and light! Fit great and got many compliments.
I love the fabric over the arms, and the overall flowy cut of the dress. It was easy to move around and dance in! Not too long for me to wear, even with just 2" wedges!

links_reviews_title: Wanna have the best dress at your event?!
links_reviews_text: I liked this dress when I ordered and it came, fits well, a bit long for me even in big heels but I'm also 5 foot barely nothing. But let me tell you this dress was a HIT! I wore it to rehearsal dinner but it can def be worn for a summer wedding non-black tie. Can play with the accessories too with this one! Def recommend!

I was in search of something to wear to a spring wedding. This is a beauty! Size 10 runs true to size. Very long! I'm 5'7" with 4 inch heels and the back still dragged on the floor. Tricky to get into, I had to reference the model to make sure I had it right. I ended up not choosing it for my event, but don't be afraid to try this. It's different and fun and a stand out!
Loved the unique look of this beautiful dress. Super feminine and flattering. Will rent again!
Loved the fit and color perfect vacation dress
So many compliments!

links_reviews_title: Felt so comffortable, feminine, and put together
links_reviews_text: Small in waist a little long

links_reviews_title: Even the waiter came up to say, "Wow!"
links_reviews_text: When I saw this dress, I knew it would be perfect for an upcoming event--the "Green & Blue Celebration." It did not disappoint! I'm only 5'0", so I knew the dress would be long. With the slit and shorter front, this worked out. I was not tripping on the dress but definitely had a "train." If you're ok with that, go for it my short girl friends! The middle was a little snug on the 2R, so I decided to wear the 4R. The fun part about this dress is how you can maneuver it to work for you. I decided to pin the green drapey piece in front over my shoulder and wear it off the back. With fancier earrings and heels, the dress worked for this particular formal affair. Overall, I would consider the crepey fabric to be a bit casual for a formal affair. It would be a great piece for a spring/summer wedding. Received many, many compliments--at the end of the night, a member of the waitstaff even came over to say what a statement the dress made.

links_reviews_title: Love this. Fits well. So flattering
links_reviews_text: Fits so well. Got many compliments
It was great.

links_reviews_title: So many compliments on this dress!
links_reviews_text: The dress was so beautiful and unique! It was a little confusing to put on at first, but I just looked at the photos from RTR and I was good. It is long, so wear high heels and expect people to step on your dress! Finally, the dress was very comfortable and a great choice to dance in at a wedding.

So flowy and fun. Never felt self-conscious. So many layers but was still lightweight. Quite long however - definitely need hiiiiigh heels! Colorful but not too overwhelming or flashy for a black tie optional wedding. Would recommend!!!

For petite ladies -- beware, this dress is gorgeous but it will look like you have a train. It's ok if you're going for a little *extra.* Otherwise, surprisingly comfortable and flattering. Breezy and perfect for a tropical wedding destination

It fit perfectly, was easy to throw on and wear during a travel tour day after changing from bathing suits. It elevated my whole look I wasn't wearing makeup, just threw my hair in a bun and it was perfect to go from volcano hike to sunset dinner at oia.

I was invited to an Indian/Pakistani wedding. I opted out of the Sari dress tradition but wanted something that was inspired by the theme. This dress was just perfect. Colorful, flowy, asymmetrical and overall fun! I got nonstop compliments and couldn't be happier and more comfortable in this design. The Marchesa chandelier earrings completed my look. Just a note in length. I wore a 2R size... My 5'7 height and 5" heels were just right for this. Any shorter, and the dress would be dragging.

Fun colors and interesting design! Unfortunately, one side has a weird side boob cut and the fabric stretches out so I felt exposed. Despite that slight design flaw I felt pretty and enjoyed the dress. The dress I got was in poor condition, with a messed up zipper (zips fine, but the top of the notion sticks out). I had tried it on in the store and that one was stained and the seam was ripped. I had this one mailed, but it too disappointed.

There's quite a bit of fabric but it's not too hot. It moves with you well and doesn't wrinkle. Very flattering. I went with a size 4 and it fit perfectly. (I'm usually between 2 and 4). Got lots of compliments from other women. It has buttons on the slot so you can make it more or less conservative. I opted for a few buttons undone to give me more room to walk and dance.

links_reviews_title: Flowy, colorful and best vacation dress
links_reviews_text: Picked it for our NoLA vacation and loved it! Fit well, I wore with a strapless bra and I got million compliments all day. Highly recommend.
Wore this to a wedding in Greece and never felt more like myself. Best part the material is semi crinkle so no need to iron!!! Tons of compliments and great in hot weather.

links_reviews_title: Beautiful ruffles that hide it all
links_reviews_text: A dress that hides all your imperfections and makes you stand out in a room. I recently gained a bit of weight from work and had to go up a size from my regular clothes. This dress is true to size with no stretch. It has a bit of flexibility though because the zipper is on the side and there are a lot of ruffles. I would still size up to be safe. I loved the way the whole dress laid. It doesn't really wrinkle or maybe the whole thing is just kind of supposed to be wrinkly but the material makes it so you don't have to iron or steam. The no sleeve and the random hanging piece was cute but I decided to just put that piece around my shoulder as a sleeve piece too. It looked nice. Got so many compliments it became the main talk of the entire gala. The slit up the front is gorgeous. It is modest and buttoned down but the min you want to show a little leg, it does it beautifully. Love this dress.

This dress is amazing, well-fitting and sexy. There are buttons on the asymmetrical hem that can be buttoned or undone to make the dress more conservative or sexy as appropriate for your particular event. This was my back-up option for a wedding in FL and ended up wearing it because it was so pretty! Its a great dress to dance in and the bright blue and green color of the fabric looks fabulous on. Will definitely rent this one again. Thanks RTR.
The colors on this dress are so pretty, I did not wear it because I felt it was a bit to formal for what I need
I went with what felt like a smaller size but based on reviews it was perfect!
Fit too tight at the boobs and I couldn't zip therefore couldn't wear. Bummer

I've gained a bit of weight around my mid section and chest so I've had a hard time feeling sexy in clothing. This dress fit so well it hid the things I didn't like and highlighted my best parts. Lots of frilly drapey fabric and nice details of button in the center. I would love to own this dress.
For true to size, long for a 5'3" with 4" heels
High slit but lovely otherwise!

I had to return this since I was wearing to a dance event and the dress had a train for my 5'4" height. The dress is stunning and hugs in all the right places and the straps that goes over the shoulder is somewhat adjustable. Love the dress, just wish it were shorter for me.
Beautiful dress , just to long on me and I am unable to wear heels due to recent fractured ankle. If you wear 4 inch heels I could see it working even at my height.
Everything about this was wrong on me. It was too long, the waist/hips were too loose & I could barely zip it over my bust. Maybe best on someone tall & thin?
The slit is too high. All the way up to the crotch area. Unfortunately this was not evident in the website pictures. The print and fabric are pretty.
This dress was beautiful. It didn't look nice on me at all it is a gorgeous dress though

links_reviews_title: Overall great dress. Bright, colorful, different.
links_reviews_text: The bust area seemed stretched out but the tie around the next helped the dress stay in place.

links_reviews_title: Super comfy and still looks nice/professional!
links_reviews_text: I wore this to a work event and got so many compliments. I loved this and will rent again- actually almost purchased. It could be a little less loose on me- that's the only reason I gave it 4 stars
This jumpsuit is so cute and comfortable. I love the tie-back. It's classy yet sexy. Perfect for a dinner date. I would wear this again for sure

Definitely needed the medium, but large was all that was available. Made it work, but it is definitely true to size. You can tie the back tighter if needed to make it tighter/more flattering. Great color, material, and unique style

I absolutely loved this jumpsuit. The color is a beautiful copper/maroon shade. Very fun outfit and got lots of compliments! The only downside are the bows in the back. They are a bit difficult to tie without help. I was able to do it myself, but not the easiest. Other than that, this is a winner.
Wore this to office holiday party and I loved it. The color is shiny but not too much and the bows are big enough to keep it office appropriate.
Loved the back of this jumpsuit. The bows were adorable. The color was great and very different. The front was a bit boring, and a little large in the waist and stomach area.

links_reviews_title: nothing because I did not wear it
links_reviews_text: I did not like the overall fit of this on me. The color is beautiful, but the back did not lay right and it just did not look good on me.

links_reviews_title: Beautiful color! The pictures didn't do justice!
links_reviews_text: The cut is perfect for my curves. It accentuated my small waist perfectly.
Fabric to die for and the cut is so chic - loved it!

links_reviews_title: Wore this dress for Christmas with family abroad. It was a hit, and I felt fabulous!
links_reviews_text: This jumpsuit fit like a glove! Perfect for petite women (I'm 5'3" and it hit me right at the ankle). The material is luxurious, silky, shimmery, soft - form fitting and yet smoothing. 10/10 for comfort and look. Highly recommend for any occasion that calls for a tasteful glam look.

Loved this coat! It looks more fuchsia than red, but it makes it super unique. It was definitely a head turner everywhere I went. Also, surprisingly warm, i wore it when it was about 10 degrees outside and it kept me warm. Would definitely rent it again.
Love this. Cozy warm and furry. Only drawback is the coat fastens with large snaps that kept popping open. Other than that thumbs up!

I rented for a holiday trip to NYC. This coat is so warm! The weather was in the 30's and I was so Cozy. There are three snaps on the coat to keep it closed and the color is darker in person and quite beautiful. Loved this coat!
Literally the best coat I've ever worn. Exceeded my expectations and it was SO soft. Everyone kept hugging me. I got so many compliments and felt so gorgeous in it!

links_reviews_title: If you have unlimited at least rent it once!!
links_reviews_text: Rented because I figured why not. Went to a winter wonderfest in it and was warm and festive. I loved it.
Really bright red
It's warm and super comfy. An attention getter for sure. Pair with stylish sunglasses and people will be asking you for your autograph.
It was an amazing accent for my bachelorette party attire! Stand out you will!!
A bit too much for every day given the bright color but it was fun for a formal, and the weekend.
I wore this beautiful faux fur on multiple occasions under my unlimited account. Love it! Compliments every time I put it on.

links_reviews_title: Such a fun coat to rock for any occasion!
links_reviews_text: Fits great and obviously super warm. It definitely makes a statement so get ready to rock your day with this super awesome coat!

Wore this on a work trip and decided to hike the Grand Canyon. Did a tour of the antelope canyon and was the only one NOT cold. Many compliments and I pretty much looked obnoxious everywhere I went and loved it.

All the feels! All the compliments! All the everything! It's perfect for special occasions and is sure to turn heads. I was ok with the buttons not staying closed because I was going for an open look. It's super warm! Also, I had been eyeing this for a while but when it became available, it wasn't in my size for days. Something told me to just try it and good thing I did! It runs small, so I suggest going up a size.
A little large but so much fun! I got so many compliments walking the streets of New York. It's was so warm too!

I wore this coat for NYE in New York. It was cold or but I was very warm in this coat. I didn't get a picture with my outfit from the night before but I did get one the next day. I love this coat. I'm going to rent it again before it gets warm outside.
Was so excited to get this jacket, but oh my - this was not for me. I looked like a large muppet. I don't think sizing down would've helped.

This is a glorious red coat. Super soft and just a show stopper. I got multiple compliments everywhere I wore it. It's so fabulous. Has pockets! Buttons do suck - per other reviews too - but I wasn't buttoning it up in TX December (55F! Ha). The buttons hold just fine if you want them too but I liked it open to show my glitzy NYE outfit off too.

I mean if you want a statement coat, this is it. This definitely wasn't something I normally would go for-- the RTR store added this to my rental for me after a series of mess-ups with my original order--but it was SO fun to wear. Lots of compliments.
This coat is a dream. It is so very warm and soft! It is an eye-turner. I got compliments like crazy. It is a beautiful coat. It was difficult for me to return it. I really wanted to keep it!
Adorable, plush, fun. You'll make a statement for sure.
I didn't end up wearing this because it didn't suit me but I would have loved to. Great color, beautiful quality, I just don't think I'm tall enough to pull it off!

links_reviews_title: Should've waited till it was colder
links_reviews_text: This coat was too much for me. It overwhelmed me. I ordered a small and it felt too big and bulky. Looks so cute on other people

links_reviews_title: Too warm to wear but can't wait to rent in the winter!
links_reviews_text: Slightly boxy, but such a fabulous looking coat. Thought it was going to be cold and rainy but the weather was perfect the afternoon/evening of the wedding so left the coat behind. Would love to rent when it cools down again!

links_reviews_title: Got so many compliments on this coat
links_reviews_text: Very warm and fluffy.

I thought this would be a fun, warm winter statement coat. However, it was huge and looked silly on me. I'm petite, so it was just too oversized and long. If you're tall then I think this could be a really fun, warm and vibrant winter coat. It just wasn't for me.
Absolutely love this coat. Super glamorous and eye catching! Very warm for my Minnesota weather!
Definitely a statement piece! Nice and long so I wasn't cold when I wore a skirt and tall boots and very soft! A fun addition to an outfit

I rented this for a formal event in the dead of winter - kept me plenty warm on the walk outdoors in single digit temps. Decided to keep it for the polar vortex that came a few days later - best decision. This coat was great for the -30 degree weather. Very tempted to keep it - but hoping there won't be many more days like that this winter. Similar to other reviewers - buttons on the coat were an issue, the arms were a bit tight, but the rest of the coat was big and shapeless - but really, still fabulous!

links_reviews_title: Love the color and the ridiculous warmth!
links_reviews_text: This coat is definitely oversized, but the color is amazing, and the fabric is plush and cozy. It got me through a cold snap and was ridiculously warm. I had people stopping me to tell me how much they loved it!!

links_reviews_title: This coast makes you feel EXTRA.
links_reviews_text: Great coat if you're looking for WOW factor. Really thick and warm, even in the sub-zero temps (and wind) of NYC. Wore this out for everything from date night to casual shopping on Sat. Ups the ante on any outfit and is so fun to wear.
warm but bulky.
This coat looked great, but the cut pulled at my sides and made me look larger than I am.

links_reviews_title: Not sure if I will wear or not ... jury is out on the piece.
links_reviews_text: Fur is super soft. Not the same color as shown in the photo. More of a Cherry Cabernet color. Definitely pops though. The fit is where I am struggling. The sleeves are very thick, not sure it would be comfortable to wear with a sweater underneath. They are kind of tight. But the overall fit is huge throughout the body giving it no real shape. Definitely thought the fit would be better, and although the fur is soft, the overall quality is not as good as I expected for the retail value of the jacket.

This coat is RED, total showstopper, lots of compliments. Extremely warm and thick, great for very cold winter days. Very fuzzy and fun! My only complaint is given the thickness of the faux fur material, the snaps used for closure are very small snaps and sometimes hard to get closed because of all the fabric/fur around them.

I wore this to a very cold, outdoor Christmas party and can I just say that it was a HIT! Not only is it super cozy, warm and soft, people couldn't stop touching me..well, the coat, because of its softness. I wore it all night and was super happy with my rental. I paired it with a Christian Siriano dress that I also rented -- Perfect Night!

links_reviews_title: beautiful coat but a lot bulkier and large than pictured, not as fun or elegant.
links_reviews_text: Really soft and warm.
Loved this coat!!!! Absolutely stunning

I received so many compliments on this fab faux, and extra long hugs because of its softness; one woman, not knowing that I'm vegan, mistook it for sheared beaver. There is one major drawback which surprised me when I tried it on - instead of his quality hook closers like the ones you usually find on faux furs, this coat has cheap little snaps that do not stay closed and do not stay on - I hope I am not charged for having lost first one, and then, a second snap, while wearing this coat over a week long period. It's simply mystifying why the manufacturer thought it would be sufficient way to keep a huge furry coat closed in this way, but it is glorious in other ways, namely color and softness and general fabulosity.
Loved this dress. It had a great cut. I did need to wear a camisole because it was low cut for work.
I rented this for work. I was able to wear with a tank top underneath otherwise V was too deep. I am regularly size 2 or 4 and the 0 for well.
Fit was good but v was very deep

Though this dress runs a little bit large, I am totally in love with it -- adds color to my wardrobe and is very comfortable and flattering. I had to pin the neckline to make it a bit less revealing but otherwise this is an awesome rental for work. I've gotten tons of compliments!
Fit great and I really liked the extra detailing above the waist... I paired it with leggings, boot and a cami. Would be too low-cut without the cami, even for us 36a gals!

links_reviews_title: Lovely dress in the front, back poofs out
links_reviews_text: I really wanted to wear this dress. The pattern is beautiful, and I love the style. Size 2 is a snug but comfortable fit around the chest (36 B). The dress looks great from the front, but there is too much material in the back, that ends up sticking out past my butt. It's not a good look on a dress. I can't get rid of this back poof no matter how I adjust the waist. I tried pulling the dress down, and scooting the band up to create a poof around the front. Neither worked, as the fit model for this dress must have terrible posture.

The fit was spot on. The top was low-cut, but I didn't like the look with a cami. Fortunately I had a bra that minimized cleavage & went with that. The colors & fabric are even more gorgeous IRL. The empire waist gave it shape while still being very comfortable. Highly recommend this dress as a way to add color to your fall/winter wardrobe.
Love this dress! Fit perfectly in all the right places, was a great length, perfect fall dress. Wish I could keep!

links_reviews_title: Fun, comfy, day to night. Flattering for all figures
links_reviews_text: Love this dress. I wore with motorcycle boots. But I can see wearing with cute sandals. Good for every season. Very comfortable. But it was fitted across the waist and ribs. So it I was a couple of pounds heavier, or my weight was proportioned differently, might have been uncomfortable

I wore a 2, which felt appropriate for my size 6-8 frame. Could have worn size 1, but it was a bit tight in the shoulders. The v-neck on this dress is comically low, so I tacked it shut at an appropriate length with a single stitch that was easy to remove. I can't imagine wearing this dress otherwise, as your chest would be 100% on view to the public. My dress came without a belt, which was not a big deal.
I used double sided stickies to hold the chest in place so there wasn't too much cleavage showing.

This dress fit great. As others mentioned, neck line is pretty revealing. I wore a black cami under and black tights with knee boots for a work holiday lunch. Im 5'7" and it was a little short ended up a bit above the knee. Also being in mid-40s, this dress felt a little young for me.

This dress was super cute but I found it to be slightly too low cut for office wear. I ended up pairing it with my spank faux leather leggings and wore it as a tunic on Thanksgiving. Made for a comfortable and stylish outfit.
This loose dress is easy to wear but needs a camisole because the neckline plunges deeply.

This dress has a zipper and a structured waist band. It fit me just right. The plunging neck-line required a camp-- it did teal, which pulled out the color in the pattern. I wore this dress two days in a row-- to a wake and then to work. It was perfect for both.

Thought I would try this for a work party, but didn't end up wearing. The colors were more dull than they look in the picture, better for fall than summer. Also was low-cut as others have mentioned and not as cute with a tank underneath. Otherwise for was pretty good, if not the most flattering (puffy shoulders are not my favorite look). Might consider for another type of event in the fall.

I've loved all the ba&sh dresses I've rented --but not this one! It's more fitted in the waist, to the point it was difficult to get on and pull it over my chest. And the way it hangs with the waistband was just not flattering to the front or backside. I wore it once because...we'll, it was in my closet.

links_reviews_title: Loved the print, hated the fit
links_reviews_text: This dress was a very pretty print, but it was so awkward on me! Huge, gaping material at the bust (I'm a 34B), tight at the waist (I'm 155lbs), and odd looking. I wanted to love it!
Needed to wear a cami because it is very low cut. Would of worn it but did not receive belt
Too small
Fit fine but wasn't special
Very pretty pattern. Comfortable. I wore this with boots and black tights. A touch long on me (I'm 5'1) but still ok.

links_reviews_title: Just the right amount of dressy
links_reviews_text: I wore this dress for a nice dinner and then a night on the town. It was just dressy enough. The fit was good overall. I liked the lightweight, flowy material. The empire waist was flattering, however, like another review, there was a bit of fabric that popped out in the back. It didn't bother me but I did notice it. I also felt more comfortable wearing a cami underneath as it is quite low cut. Perfect length and I loved the flowy skirt.

links_reviews_title: Really cute dress, but too tight through the rib cage
links_reviews_text: I loved the style and colors of this dress, but it is VERY tight through the rib cage. It has a belt of fabric at the empire waist but there is no stretch to this belt of fabric. I always find dresses like this, particularly when coupled with a side zipper like this one is, to be extremely uncomfortable around my rib cage. At 3 months pregnant, this dress nicely hid my bump and was super cute for work, but pretty uncomfortable around my rib cage. If I rented it again, I'd size up. Also, it is low cut, so I wore it with a black camisole underneath.
Great fit. Wore more than once.

links_reviews_title: A little style to jazz up the day
links_reviews_text: I am usually a Medium or an 8. I wore a 2 and it fit perfectly. Not tight but hugged loosely in all the right places. Very comfortable. Looked good. Wore a tank underneath to fill in the lowest part of the slit.

links_reviews_title: For my figure, this was my favorite dress ever.
links_reviews_text: While I did end up wearing this, I found the fitted part under the bust to be a little snug and I did need to wear a cami underneath as the v-neck was rather plunging on my short stature. The colors were a little less vivid than I expected as well. While I did actually receive a compliment on it, I just didn't like how curvy it made me look as it did really accentuate my bustline. But, for a different figure, or someone who likes that sort of style, it would be a nice dress for work or a date night!

Right now I‚Äôm a size 10 on top and a 12 on the bottom, and size 3 was the right size for me, though it was a little loose through the shoulders. The neckline was quite low so I had to tack it shut a bit to avoid unintentional exposure‚Äî a camisole also could have solved that problem. Cute under a sweater too.
nice fit
I loved the fit of this dress! It perfectly highlights the smallest part of my body. I wore it to work and needed to wear a tank because of the low neckline. I felt gorgeous all day!
Very nice fit. Made my bust look larger.
Ordered without reading reviews, definitely runs very large. I was swimming in the size 0. Unfortunately not for petite gals.
It was a little bigger than I expected, order a size down. It also low cut. Fine for small chest, but may be a little deep for a large bust.
I loved the colors I. This dress and the very float feminine cut
It's cut lower than expected and the colors are not as bright as in the photo, but this dress was comfortable, cute, and fun!
Dress runs a tad large in the bust. I have a larger bust and I still found the cleavage to be a little too generous

links_reviews_title: cute dress, great pattern and colors
links_reviews_text: Really enjoyed this dress. Great pattern and colors. Sleeves fit a bit large around the shoulders.

links_reviews_title: Pretty print and shape, runs large
links_reviews_text: Loved the shape and print on this, but felt a bit dowdy in it due to the sizing. Order at least a size down! I have a large bust and there was some cleavage, but still was able to wear it to work. More conservative offices might be a no go though.
I rented this to wear to work, but the v-neck was way too low cut. Would have been cute for a night out, but I never have those! Darn!

Perfect for balmy autumn weather. Light fabric but fall colors. Had to pin in the front. Tons of complements. I did not want to send it back. I think it runs large as I am certainly not a size 0 and it was a bit roomy on me but still flattering.
Love this beautiful dress! Very bright and the slurs on the back was not revealing at all! That was my initial concern but dang, just lovely and comfy!
A little low cut in the front but overall a nice dress. The fabric is high quality and the way it fits in the back is really nice.
Comfy, fun and sophisticated... great for slim built ...

links_reviews_title: Great color but not flattering for short girls!
links_reviews_text: This runs large... I am normally a size 4-6 and the size 2 fit perfectly. It is a beautiful color and the waist is cinched, which helps the shape of the dress. However, I felt like it looked like a maternity dress on me! I'm only 5'2" and the dress hung well past my knees, so I definitely needed heels. And the dress is pretty low cut, so for work I wore I bralette to make it more appropriate but it would have been just fine for a date night or party. Overall, it is a beautiful high quality dress but just not the right style for me!
Loved this dress, although I definitely could have gone down a size! Just need a low cut bra for it!

Wore at 27 weeks pregnant. Glad I had a slip on hand because I didn't realize the back has a weird cutout when I ordered. For summer casual I'd probably be comfortable without a slip, but I needed one for work. Runs large - went 1 size down from normal even though I'm pregnant

My hands are there, they are just in the pockets! Super cute dress perfect for mild weather. It tends to run a bit large so I would recommend sizing down. The bust and top midsection can be fitted in a loose way giving you shape yet keeping it comfortable. I would recommend this dress for expecting mothers as well!

links_reviews_title: Curves in all the right places
links_reviews_text: This dress is so cute and vintage and hugs your hips but not your tummy to give that hourglass shape!!

the photo doesn't do justice to this beautiful pink dress. it is loose and comfortable, the color is a show-stopper, with subtle cutouts in the back and sides that do not show bra! the material is heavy, so although perhaps it's challenging to wear in hotter weather, after a while in the air conditioning, it's really a good thing because you never freeze. that said, the thick, polyester fabric makes it unbreathable, and therefore, one of those dreaded "body odor" garments (y'all know what i'm talking about). despite being dry cleaned by RTR before it got to me, the dress wasn't freshened up. i could not wait to get it off for only that reason. so, minus one star for the funk.

I love this dress! The cuts are in just he right spot and it draped really nicely on my body. I can see how this may be a little tent-like on some body types but I'd give it a try, it's really comfortable. Tome is one of by favorite body-positive brands right now.

I wore Tome dresses during my pregnancy for special events/showers and loved them. This was the perfect dress to mask my (shrinking) belly! Although, my tatas were a little unruly, I loved this dress so much!

links_reviews_title: Beautiful color and fit. The opening in the back gave it a little something extra.
links_reviews_text: I rented this for my mom who is 4'11 and 130 lbs. This size ran a little large, but still looked lovely on her.
This dress is amazing. Just make sure you wear the right kind of bra with it!

links_reviews_title: Love the pink. Wore it for everyday.
links_reviews_text: Fits well for a pear shaped person. Would rent again.
Cute dress. It was see through though, which I didn't notice until I was at work so definitely wear something under it.

links_reviews_title: I rented the dress to wear for work unfortunately this is my first order that I cannot wear.
links_reviews_text: The dress shows a lot of cleavage to much for work. The sides are cut out which is another no no for a work dress.

links_reviews_title: Wasn‚Äôt able to wear, dress was too big
links_reviews_text: If this dress had fit it would have been amazing, there are cute cut outs in the back and the fit is loose and comfortable. I‚Äôd highly recommend sizing down!

links_reviews_title: Looked like a big pink shopping bag.
links_reviews_text: I was looking forward to this dress and greatly disappointed. The fit was really so over-sized it missed the mark completely. There were large cut-outs in the back which made it inappropriate for work. The crepey fabric was itchy. Sending back without wearing.

links_reviews_title: Looks a bit like a church choir gown
links_reviews_text: Sadly didn't wear this because it ran big and reminded me of a church choir gown.

Ordered this for the relaxed fit but nice lines to wear 19 weeks pregnant-- maybe I didn't look closely enough at the photos though-- there are serious cutouts that run from under the arms to the back so it is not a modest look! You can probably size down given the cut.

links_reviews_title: Loved this frock, but the fabric is super heavy. Very hot!
links_reviews_text: This is a great relaxed-fit piece. It's a little plain, so it definitely requires some great shoes to set off the pepto bismol pink of the dress. With the right accessories, the possibilities are endless.

links_reviews_title: Has slits on the sides which don‚Äôt show in the photo. Limits where this is appropriate to wear.
links_reviews_text: Disappointed- slits on side of dress make it limited
This is cute but very loose and very long. I wore big statement earrings so it worked but i would size down. I am a size 6 and I was still swimming in a size 4.
I really enjoyed this dress The shape is oh so forgiving and the color is so pretty The slits in the back added a lil spice and love love love that it has pockets

This was a great option for flattering maternity dress. Unfortunately it was actually too big. I'm usually a 6 or 8 dress size pre- maternity so decided to go for size 8 and not size up because the reviews said it was big. I could have easily worn the size 6 - it would have been more flattering. I didn't end up wearing it. Also the material was a bit hard to steam and there were still wrinkles.
Definitely go down a size - it was too big in the waist and just felt super large, although very comfortable.

links_reviews_title: Did not wear this.. not flattering .
links_reviews_text: Hate the cut outs

links_reviews_title: gorgeous color and much prettier on than i expected.
links_reviews_text: I thought this might be too sack-like. It's not.
This dress was all wrong! Bad color, bad cut, it is a tent made in pepto pink!

links_reviews_title: Looked better than a lot of the photos. Got so many compliments.
links_reviews_text: Beautiful fabric and drape. Great color.

Was really looking forward to this dress. It ran quite large. What I disliked the most was the awkward slits in the back which was unflattering because it showed your bra or your skin. I returned immediately and was also surprised by how heavy the material was. Beautiful color though and really wish it had worked to me!
Fit very big and then has cut outs in the back that showed skin. Ended up not wearing since it was supposed to be for work.
Nice pink color, cool cut outs. Super huge dress.
Super roomy. Doesn't wrinkle. Has pockets.
neck line is too low
To long I'm 5'7" wouild have liked it shorter

I ordered this dress for an event, but it did arrive in time for me to wear it. It is really flowly and has slits in the back. I plan to rent again for a future event, but I will size down because it was large around my natural waist.
Couldn't get past the weird cut outs in the back, nor is this dress lined.

links_reviews_title: This dress was for everyday wear.
links_reviews_text: The color was beautiful and fit was loose and fun BUT THERE ARE SLITS MIDBACK THAT SHOW THREE INCHES OF SKIN ON EACH SIDE! I am so SHOCKED this wasn't in the picture. I planned to wear this to work. Absolutely not with my back and sides showing.
Pretty color, pretty silk.

Rented this for a bridal shower and it was super cute but I found it ran large. Knocked a star off because the under dress is super short! It was cute but I later looked at photos of me sitting with one leg over the other and my bum was nearly out!

links_reviews_title: My favorite rental of all time
links_reviews_text: AMAZING! I loved this dress so much -- rented for a rehearsal dinner in Croatia. The details are amazing, super comfortable fit, looked great with a tan and minimal accessories. The liner underneath is very short, though -- only warning! But this dress is unreal.

links_reviews_title: Super cute dress that's a bit fussy
links_reviews_text: I loved the look and feel of this dress. I think it might run a little small because I'm usually more of a 2, but the 4 fit great. I will agree with other reviewers that the slip is crazy short and I'm 5'3. I also had an awkward issue with my bra showing through the cutouts so I kept having to pull it down to look right. Wasn't a deal breaker because I still felt awesome in it, but enough of an annoyance to give 4 stars

links_reviews_title: It's not a style I would normally choose, but was very fun and comfortable.
links_reviews_text: Fit perfect

Wore this to a late summer bridal shower and it couldn't have worked out better. So unique with a classic twist. The cutouts mixed with the lace detailing is KILLER. I'm usually a 6R but it was a little too tight and thus unflattering. The 8R had just enough give and fit perfectly! Rent this!

Absolutely stunning! The color is perfect for summer and the cutouts are in just the right spot. The slip underneath was a bit short (I'm 5'7) but I received sooo many compliments. Will definitely rent again!

links_reviews_title: Got so many compliments, felt like a sexy princess
links_reviews_text: Pros: Sexy while still being girly and edgy at the same time Con: The liner is super short. I had to really pay attention to make sure I wasn't exposed.
The lace is light weight and stretchy which I loved - it was so comfortable to wear. The short slip and cutouts made it sexier on than I expected but it was perfect for a day time party.
Not great fit wise, because of the holes on the sides it kind of rides up so its not very flattering, overall it is cute but I didn't love it

Dress is so cute! The underslip is a lil short if you have a bubble butt.... but not really a problem since the overla is long and thick enough. It runs true to size had plenty of room and is stretchy. I could of worn a 0R and been comfortable too I believe bc of the stretch.

links_reviews_title: I felt like a modern day Anne of Green Gables in puffed sleeves! Perfect 4 rustic + elegant events!
links_reviews_text: For a girl without a six pack, I still felt sexy where the cuts are placed to show some tummy skin, as well as tasteful! I also loved the silhouette this dress gave me. Went well with my rose gold glitter heels and burgundy colors.

I wanted to love this dress so bad!!!!! I wear the prairie-style all the time but this one wasn't it for me. The shift underneath is a size and a half smaller than the outside lace. So, on my 5'9 body, I was pulling at the shift the entire time! I changed out of it because it was too much maintenance. If you're short, it will probably work better for you. I'm so sad ive been eyeing it for so long but alas it's not for me.
The short slip made the dress look super cheap. It's a cute dress in theory but did not work for me and I didn't end up wearing it.
The slip is so so short if I had worn it I would had been walk-in around with my booty cheeks hanging out. I loved the look but the slips just too small I couldn't even wear it once :/

links_reviews_title: Great color, love the sleeves, unique design.
links_reviews_text: Rented a 6 because a 4 wasn't available, it was a little big but the stretchy fabric and ruched bodice made it less obvious. At 5'11 the slip length was short (as it is in the picture), but a great color and I received many compliments.

links_reviews_title: Hugging all the wrong places, didn't wear it
links_reviews_text: Didn't work for me
Received so many compliments on this. It made me feel like a modern princess haha. The color is beautiful and the fit is great.

Runs a little large. I could have sized down. I can't decide if I like this dress or not. Amazing color but the sleeves are a little too poofy. Great for a formal event, not a date night. I did get a lot of compliments, so maybe that's just my personal taste!

This dress is by far the most complicated dress I've ever worn, the slip got tangled in the actual lace and I spent maybe 30 minutes trying to figure out how I can put it back in the right place, finally my husband help me so that helped a lot, it is very cute my husband said it's more like a lingerie feel to it and it shows all your imperfection especially in the mid section ... it's very cute though ,it will also look better in a curvier girl, I am straight and petite 5'2 110 lbs and it did not compliment my figure

links_reviews_title: Love the idea of this but not cute on
links_reviews_text: The fabric is light and stretchy which is great but looks a bit costume / Cinderella like. This was definitely made for a particular body type, not short and hourglass shaped
Will use a pin and get rid of black tank next time to make the look more elegantly
Beautiful dress I wore for church. It is a great length and looks very flattering and feminine. It is not very tight material so it is true to size.

links_reviews_title: Odd bust fit, risk of cleavage showing
links_reviews_text: Pattern and flouncy edging is cute, but honestly I didn't feel comfortable in this dress. Because it's a wrap dress the v neck moves around with risk of exposing your bra. I tried to tape it with clothing tape but didn't work well. Didn't have a safety pin but perhaps that would have worked better.
I loved this dress. So flattering and such a good fit for my body type.

Super cute dress and flattering fit. It's on the short side for work: I'm just under 5'6" and my fingertips were brushing the bottom of the skirt, which is technically the limit for skirts at my office. So for me I wish it were an inch longer, but still enjoyed the dress and would recommend.

links_reviews_title: With a little help of fashion tape...
links_reviews_text: Great colors on this dress. I wore it twice- to work and a bridal shower. Would recommend using double stick tape to keep the top in place if you're moving around a lot. The dress stays wrapped well otherwise.

links_reviews_title: Cute wrap dress. Sleeve ruffles needed some help.
links_reviews_text: Fun to try a wrap dress, not my usual style. The capped sleeves were a little tight but worked fine. The ruffle on the sleeves required some ironing / water and holding down to get them to stop sticking up. Overall a fun dress for a conference.

links_reviews_title: Comfortable a flattering day time dress. Wish I could have kept it!
links_reviews_text: I got this dress because it came free with my order of a different dress, I ended up loving it more than my original order! I was attending a destination wedding and chose to wear this during the day, it was perfect. It is a little low cut but I didn't wear a bra with it so cleavage was not an issue. I also wore a cross body bag to keep the dress from fluttering open. I dressed it down with a pair of Steve Madden slip on shoes and I got lots of compliments. This was the only picture I got, sorry

links_reviews_title: Cute dress, arms a little tight
links_reviews_text: This was a cute dress, I loved the color and most of the fit. I have a little bit of larger arms so the a holes felt a little tight. I also wore a tank underneath as my bust isn't too big. (34B)
Not super fitted, cinched at waist.
I felt feminine and pretty. Not a dress I would normally wear. It was comfortable and a nice length. I had to wear a tank under because I'm busty to hide boobs. It's better for spring.

links_reviews_title: The fit was amazing. Very easy and comfortable.
links_reviews_text: Easy fit for a date night out.

This dress was cute and I love wrap dresses, so I expected a bit of maintenance around the cleavage area. However, this dress ran SMALL and I would not have been able to wear this at all if not for a cami underneath. I'm 38F and I would guess anyone bigger than 34C will need something to bridge the gap in the front (It was a solid 4 inches exposed on me). The fabric is light and airy (perfect for a summer night out) but has absolutely no give . It's a flattering fit and I like the cap sleeve, which seems at the shoulder but is loose over the arm. It was just a touch shorter than I wanted it to be so I didn't where it to work, but was fine for an evening out with friends. I wouldn't wear again because I didn't love the look after adding the cami, but this would be adorable on the right sized woman.

links_reviews_title: Fun everyday wrap in beautiful colors
links_reviews_text: Great fit (even for busty ladies) and got so many compliments. I loved the rusty red color.

links_reviews_title: Lovely dress but don't wear on a windy day!
links_reviews_text: Cute dress, went to about mid thigh. But be warned it will show all on a windy day. I wore shorts underneath.
Love this flowy light dress. You definitely need a safety pin for the top. And I wouldn't recommend wearing it on a windy day.

links_reviews_title: Large fits more like a medium
links_reviews_text: This dress is pretty, but just ok. The fit is small. I'm always a large and this one barely fit me all the way around. It is more like a medium. The dress is also shorter than I had hoped for work. It just felt the dress needed a little more... something... beyond just some additional material.

links_reviews_title: Cute spring time wrap made for those with a bust
links_reviews_text: Love the colors, the delicate frills at the sleeves and hem, and the wrap style. However I couldn't fill out the chest part will probably wear a padded bra in the future.
Wore this to a spring baby shower and received many compliments! Unless you want to constantly keep checking to make sure your cleavage isn't hanging out, though, be sure to safety pin the bust.
Super flattering and easy to wear

links_reviews_title: Pretty pattern and flattering wrap dress
links_reviews_text: Really liked this as a work outfit with booties - super easy to throw on in the morning!

This is very light fabric, even though it is lined, it still is nice and cool and lightweight. The wrap falls nicely at the bust. The length is about to the knee on me since I am petite. My husband complimented me on the dress.
Adorable dress. cleavage was low. Maybe downsizing would fix? may try again...
I didn't love the coloring in person (seemed more brick than red) but fits true to size and is nice for a brunch or summer work day!

links_reviews_title: Wasn't a huge fan of the fit of this dress
links_reviews_text: The dress looks nice when you are standing up and not moving. However, even the slightest breeze lifts up the wrapping flap so you have to always be careful. It's also pretty low cut and I had to fix the neck with a safety pin so it doesn't gape.
Super cute, but a little big for a small. Kept having fabric slip and Waldron malfunctions
Great color great fit, a tad short if you're taller, but too short to wear
I wore this one twice. Once with a cami under it as it does show a lot of cleavage and the the second time without it.

I am 5' 2" and this dress hit me a couple of inches above the knee. If you are quite bit taller, this dress will be short on you. The cut and fabric of the dress felt Spring-like, but the colors felt like Fall. Overall, cute and comfortable dress,

links_reviews_title: I wore this for a graduation happy-hour event
links_reviews_text: The length was perfect, but the top was a little large. Since the dress is a true wrap dress beware of any wind at the wrong angle. Cute & comfortable dress all-in-all.

links_reviews_title: I did not wear this rental
links_reviews_text: Chest/V-neck was gaping, not appropriate for work unless pinned and I didn't want to put a hole in the fabric
I felt so feminine in this dress and got tons of compliments. I'll definitely be renting again.

links_reviews_title: It was fun to wear something different and feminine!
links_reviews_text: I'm a redhead, and this set of colors looked great on me. This style also flattered my pear shape/flat belly. I did not, however, receive a single compliment, and part of me wonders if it just looked like a housedress to someone who didn't know it was a $700+ dress! It was comfortable and pretty though, and I liked it, anyway.

links_reviews_title: Perfect for work with a blazer.
links_reviews_text: The large fit me well, but I am usually a medium. The fit may run small on some.
This is a simple wrap dress that was really flirty and cute for fall.

links_reviews_title: Pretty orange color. Perfect for summer. Very thin material.
links_reviews_text: It's short, and fit good around hips, but runs big in the chest area. Wore it, but didn't feel to comfortable with being short.

links_reviews_title: Loved this dress - comfortable and beautiful.
links_reviews_text: I loved this dress. I wore it to work with brown leather booties. I loved the fit. It was flattering on my petite frame. I would rent this again.

This dress is really comfortable, pretty, and flattering on! The pattern is slightly different in person, but still really beautiful. The material is soft and high quality, but isn't so delicate that it gets snagged or messed up easily. I debated buying this dress!
Nice shape and colors for fall! Looked great with boots and jean jacket!
I loved color and overall way this dress fit. The chest was a bit big and I had to use fashion tape to keep it from gaping, but that was manageable.

This dress was amazing, it was fun to wear and I felt sexy and comfortable. Wore this for engagement photos and everyone comments on how beautiful my dress was. It's flattering and perfect dress for summer weddings or fun date night.

The fabric and print is fantastic! So, so pretty! I was worried with all the ruffles it wouldn't look flattering, but somehow it did. The back cut out is super cute. However, it is a true wrap dress. It is low cut and I was worried about it slipping all night. It's difficult to find a bra that works with the back cut out. It ended up being fine. This is a dress for the evening though and not something I'd feel comfortable all day long.

links_reviews_title: Great dress but tight on waist
links_reviews_text: I wore this to a formal rehearsal dinner. The dress is beautiful, super flattering and unique. However, the inside fasten was uncomfortably tight on my waist. I have an athletic build and this would probably not be an issue if you have a tiny waist. This can also probably be solved with a safety pin.

links_reviews_title: So many compliments on this dress!!
links_reviews_text: Fits perfect. Very flattering and flowy

This is a beautiful dress. Very summery and light weight. It was very tight until he bust for me so if size up. I can't imagine it'd make much difference with the wrap. That said it's not a true wrap dress. The inside connects with a button and then the string goes around but you have to button it.

links_reviews_title: Even prettier in person, may never want to take it off!
links_reviews_text: It took me a few minutes to find the arm holes but once I got it all situated I was obsessed. The print is so vibrant and beautiful. The fit is swingy and flow-y and so fun to wear. I didn't wear a bra with this dress and you'd have no clue because the wrap stays closed (thank you LORD!)!! While the dress looks quite bold on the model, in person it's very versatile. I would have no problem wearing this to a wedding, to church, or even just everyday. Highly highly recommend!!
Perfection. Print is stunning, fit was perfect as I know in Temperly I'm always a size larger
Amazing fit..I did not need a bra for this. The material is flowy and airy. I wore it in Miami during the hot weather and it was perfect. I will rent this again.

Rented this for a wedding that unknowingly was quite casual. With a swap to flat sandals, I was classily attired without being overdone. The wrap style fit well for larger bust and the length was perfect.

Everything you want in a summer dress! This temperley London dress is perfection. Fits perfectly and flows over the body. I usually have issues with wrap dresses not covering my chest but this one shows just the right amount of cleavage. I wore this for Sunday funday in soho with family and friends, but this could (should!) also be worn for summer events. Perfection!

Gorgeous fabric, I love Temperly. Very easy to wear, I always size up, normally a 6 but got the 8 and the waist with the little button was perfect. Maybe a little loose around boobs, but it's a casual style. Perfect for living on Maui. Tons of compliments. Having trouble sending back. It arrived new with tags which is always lovely.

links_reviews_title: Simply beautiful, although proportions slightly challenging
links_reviews_text: Beautiful dress, but slightly difficult fit Pros: gorgeous print and colors, light fabric very comfortable for warm weather, really lovely cut. Cons: typical wrap-dress problems ‚Äì tendency to open a bit in the skirt at the front, and top nightmarishly large and required garment-taping or it would have gapped open. The proportion was a little off for my body as well, so even though I am fairly long in the torso, the straps at the back were too long and hung loose instead of lying flat and taut (because the waist can be tightened with a belt and the top part of the neck fits rather like a halter, those straps sit loose rather than the entire top being too loose which is ultimately a good thing). Overall a beautiful dress for an event or party but a bit insecure for everyday wear ‚Äì I wore it for a post-work event and also wore it all day at work.
Tight in the waist but doable for a few hours. It's the kind of dress you suffer for a little. Also don't even try to wear a bra.
Loved the print; unique cut and flowy material.

links_reviews_title: Not enough coverage up top - sad
links_reviews_text: Everything fit fine although straps were a-bit long in back. I just couldnt figure out how to get enough coverage on these post baby boobs with no bra. I think size up would have been too big everywhere else. Beautiful dress but Didnt love it enough to try to make it work

Keeping this one! I highly recommend, but keep in mind this dress is NOT bra friendly. I pinned it under the ruffle to ad some support and that was fine. The back is open and super low, so it's difficult to find a suitable undergarment.
This dress swallowed my small frame! The ruffles totally overwhelmed my body. I wouldn‚Äôt recommend for petite women
Loved the print. Size was a little big and required a lot of fashion tape to stay in place. Unique dress and lots of compliments
Runs a bit large and near impossible to wear a bra with it.

Love the print and colors but I think there are just too much going on for it to be flattering. Fun to try on though! I ordered an 8 because it was the only one available and I was hoping it would work but was way too big. I would have probably worn a 4 given the chance.

links_reviews_title: I felt like a floating princess
links_reviews_text: Absolutely beautiful dress. When I walked the fabric just floated around me. It definitely will get you attention...especially if you wear it on a windy day like I did!

links_reviews_title: Easy to wear and special without stealing the show.
links_reviews_text: Not something I would normally wear, but I got a ton of compliments. It was a tad tight in the waist (I do not do sit ups), but I just added an elastic hair tie to the elastic loop to give me an extra inch of give on the button you wrap and attach to. The material is nice enough but doesn't standout as being super high quality, so it's nicer to rent than to buy. Perfect for a casual birthday party with dancing. I love the back.

I loved this dress, but it was colder than I expected so I picked another for my date. I tried it on with my aqua heals and I wanted to go out dancing. I generally wear a size 12-14, and the 12 worked well. Normal bras will show in the back, so plan ahead. I think this is a great dress for curvy ladies.

links_reviews_title: PERFECT dress for a destination wedding. Lightweight and I didn't have to steam out of my bag!
links_reviews_text: Flattering, lightweight and comfortable. Was literally the perfect dress for a destination wedding and I received a lot of compliments.

Gorgeous dress, worn for my work outdoor Christmas party in Florida. Although it was a chill night, just having the ruffle over my shoulders made a difference. We were on the water so there was a little breeze but the dress fluttered so elegantly. Can't believe I didn't get a photo.
Flowy and comfortable, I loved wearing this dress. Lots of compliments.
I rented this twice already. I love the flow of this dress and you should definitely wear smaller size. I'm between two sizes and For sure the smaller size fits me much better

links_reviews_title: Wore with a brown leather jacket and had tons of compliments!
links_reviews_text: Kind of funky to get on, but definitely a beautiful fit. Flattering if you have small bust.

Really loved how the back is open - the front is almost equally as revealing, haha! I wore with a strapless bralette and showed in the front (on purpose). I then wore it again to work with a white t-shirt and slides - lots of compliments and comfortable.

links_reviews_title: Looks expensive and is super comfortable
links_reviews_text: A little low cut but easy to safety pin. Best step dress I've ever worn. Stands out in a great way.
Easy, paired with black leather loafers and an oversized jean jacket for a lecture. No bra though.

Little bit tight around the wrap area. There is a button that has a hook to connect to inside the wrap. Was able to add a black cami for work due to it being somewhat low cut and open back. Lots of great compliments! The print is crazy beautiful in person.

links_reviews_title: Very beautiful dress. Received lots and lots of compliments.
links_reviews_text: A bit tricky to put on and somewhat low cut but overall just gorgeous.

really unique pattern and cut. flows very well when you walk and doesn't look overwhelming. i'm typically a 4, but sized up to a 6 for my waist and bust and am glad i did! i got great coverage for my boobs and space to eat. this just touched the floor in flats. i pinned the front shut for a baby shower, but left it unpinned at night. i love the colors and the feel of this. rent this!
I love the fabric and breezy flow of this dress. I did pin it at the front and also at the top of straps in the back because they aren't adjustable.

I ended up wearing a different dress to my event but this dress was gorgeous!! Can be worn to a more casual or dressy affair. Very versatile. Because of back strap details must be worn with A strapless bra or bra less

links_reviews_title: Glorious Dress, LOVE the fabric, A-Cups beware, you'll need cutlets
links_reviews_text: LOVED THIS but had to wear a padded bra to fill out the top which was annoying. I'm normally a perfect size two and a full A cup. This was made oddly, I had to wear a padded bra to fill it out with cutlets which I'm not a fan of doing. The top part was just so saggy and cut for much larger breasts.

This dress fit me perfectly! There is a button on the inside to hold the too pieces together but I just decided to wrap it and tie it in a bow. I felt great in it, I'm from Chicago and as I walked around the city the breezes the fabric blew and fluttered around beautifully! Everyone loved it and I would highly recommend it! Also I'm a short girl (only 5' 1") and I wore 5 inch platform heels, it didn't drag and the opening in the front allowed me to show off my legs nicely. Very sexy, highly recommend this one! The only thing don't forget your FASHION TAPE for this dress on the top as its cut in a low deep v and you may need some coverage. I recommend using tupee tape or sewing tape that's meant for rolling hems under as its sticker than most fashion tapes! Enjoy!
Gorgeous dress! True to size. Quality fabric. Loved wearing it.

links_reviews_title: stunning ... got so many compliments : ) great dress very feminine
links_reviews_text: i am petite busted but the bra could be tricky for a bustier lady because of the way the back is out
Perfect dress for my birthday! The dress runs small so size up. It was a little itchy in the arms, but it didn't bother me the rest of the day. So cute and fun. I got so many compliments!
The dress is super cute. The fabric does feel a little scratchy though, so beware.
Loved this! Wore it to the symphony and it was romantic and alluring while being covered. Agree with others, this runs small and order a size up. This has no give. Lots of compliments!

Very pretty and fun dress! I'm 5'4" and 124lb and I wore the small. I could have worn the xs but the dress has no stretch so I went with bigger size and it was perfect! Wore it for Valentine's Weekend wedding & got Lots of complements !

ITCHY! I'm 5'1" - This dress definitely runs true to size, the small is small. The dress fell about 2 inches above my knee without looking too long because of the sheer quality. It was sexy, and I really loved it for Valentine's Day but be warned- anywhere the dress touches you without the black lining it is suuuper itchy. I wore it for about 4 hours but was literally itching to take it off by the time we got home. I actually had my partner scratching my back at the bar to relieve the discomfort haha. If you need comfort, do not rent. If you are willing to sacrifice for the look at least you know what you're getting yourself into!
The roses on the lace popped and looked gorgeous. The color in person are amazing and I got compliments all night

links_reviews_title: Stand out in the trade show crowd
links_reviews_text: The fit is fitted. I ordered XS and S. Because it has no stretch in the fabric, I wore the small. The print color was more vivid - especially the red - than the photo on line. I loved it.

I got so many compliments on this dress. I loved it perfect for a February wedding. It was very formatting so I'm glad I got two sizes. I'm normally a small I got a medium just Incase based on others reviews and I'm glad I did. Medium was perfect.

Wore this to a fun cowboy party. I wear an 8 and this was a little short and cut off right below my behind. I didn't mind that it was short for this event but just heads up in case - you could also wear a slip because the skirt is sheer so my thighs were visible. Loved the dress

links_reviews_title: This actually the 2nd style RTR sent me for FREE because the first dress didnt work for me.
links_reviews_text: I love this dress! I wore this on my 30th birthday and I got a lot of compliments!

This dress was perfect for the rehearsal dinner in Mexico we went to in December! Got so many compliments. Be warned: it is very short. If we had been dancing or sitting in a lounge (not at a table with a tablecloth, napkins, etc that could help cover up legs)... it would not have been possible. But thankfully, it was perfect!

links_reviews_title: Perfect dress for garden themed event
links_reviews_text: Couldn‚Äôt have chosen a more perfect dress for a garden themed event in NYC! It fit perfectly. The sleeves were just a tad itchy at first, but I didn‚Äôt notice it after a few minutes. It was super cute. Would wear again!
I loved wearing this. It is so beautiful in person. I would happily rent this one again in a heart beat!

I really liked this dress! I loved the floral pattern and the cut. Hits perfectly above the knee; not too short. I wore for a holiday charity event. Perfect for any season though! Material a little itchy and runs a bit snug but nothing I couldn't deal with. Note: does not have any stretch or "give".

All the reviews are correct, it is short and a little itchy. But worth it and so pretty! I wore it for a work Christmas party and I got a ton of compliments. I'm 5'5 and 140 lbs and the medium was perfect.

I really loved this dress. I wore it for a casual fall wedding. I received tons of compliments on it. The dress runs small so order the larger size. Usually I wear a size 4/Small but I wore the medium size of this dress. I wore it with dark gray stockings because it is short and comes up close to the booty so be aware if you're not planning on wearing stockings. I thought I'd hate the sleeves but they were super cute and so was the neckline. Loved it!

Gorgeous dress, the embroidery is stunning. Colors are beautiful. Fits perfectly. Received compliments all night! My only con is although the lace ruffle hits lower on the leg, the under lining is VERY short. Like don't bend, reach or climb stairs if anyone's behind you ;) If I wore it again I would wear opaque black tights so I wouldn't have to be so paranoid.

I'm used to one color, solid dresses so I was hesitant to rent this because of how busy it seemed. I absolutely fell in love when I received it as it is much prettier in person. I got compliments all night and I'm sooo happy I ended up renting it. I absolutely loved it! The only thing I had a slight issue with was that there is no stretch in it and it is pretty short. Still rocked it and felt confident.
This dress was perfect for an outdoor wedding! The lacey trim at the neck can be a little itchy, but I was impressed by the dance-ability of the dress. I felt beautiful and festive!

links_reviews_title: Not suggested for big chested girls
links_reviews_text: So I'm normally a size 6, sometimes an 8. And almost always a medium, but that fluxes up and down depending on brand. I loved the print of this dress but just couldn't get the medium to zip over my chest, and then the large just fit completely wrong (too much length from neck to chest) as a short girl. So sad this didn't work out! (But should add I have thick arms (ha) and the arms fit great on this one!)

links_reviews_title: The dress and embroidery is stunning.
links_reviews_text: It does run a little short and sitting down is a little tricky. I'd recommend sizing up just for length (but I am 5'9). The material is a little itchy but not itchy enough to not wear this beautiful look!
Loved the dress but I sized up bc some reviews said it ran small. It was a bit loose on me bc I sized up. I think it's true to size. Such a fun dress for date night with my hubby.
I have never felt so confident! The compliments kept coming. I have a wide rib cage/broader shoulders and I was worried about the shear sleeves not fitting but they were perfect!
Loved this dress so much ‚Äî the rose pattern and colors are beautiful. The dress fit me a little big overall, but still worked. Would definitely rent again!
The dress was absolutely beautiful and it got tons of compliments. It is very short but looked fine when worn with black tights.

links_reviews_title: Favorite dress I have ever worn!
links_reviews_text: I wore this for my boyfriend's fraternity formal in mid-May in the Midwest. After reading reviews, I was initially pretty concerned about the fit, but the XS fit me very well, and wasn't so tight that I couldn't sit down comfortably. I wore a regular T-back nude bra, and it was unnoticeable. The lace and mesh parts of this dress are a little itchy, but you don't notice that at all after a drink or two. My one biggest complaint with this dress is that the little black bands on the sleeves near the elbow are not stretchy AT ALL. I have skinny arms, and I was still unable to lift my arms above my head without fear of ripping the arms somehow. The length was also good, hitting me about four inches above the knee (I"m 5'6). I looooved this dress, and got compliments from many of the other girls there.

links_reviews_title: The stress is definitely a conversation piece! It was perfect for the Kentucky Derby.
links_reviews_text: This dress is super short! Typically wear a size small so that‚Äôs what I ordered and for the most part fit well. There is no kids in the material, so the neckline was a bit itchy and seems around the arms and rib cage were a bit tight. Only wore it for about four hours and nothing strenuous. I don‚Äôt think you could do much dancing or bending over in this one!

links_reviews_title: Got so many compliments on this dress
links_reviews_text: Dress was gorgeous

links_reviews_title: Wore this is a casual "rustic" wedding in Savannah. Got lots o compliments!
links_reviews_text: Very flattering fit! I'm usually a small or medium but the small fit perfectly (without a bra)

I fell in love with the dress when I saw it! It was a little more form fitting than I imagined it would be. I wore spanx for the first time ever because I just had to wear the dress. I am 5 months postpartum so the tummy area was a little unforgiving for my post baby pooch. Once I had those spanx on, I felt amazing. I couldn't figure out why other reviews said it was so short, but once I had it on, I definitely understood! The ruffle at the bottom gives it extra length but the slip underneath stops pretty high. I paired the dress with thigh high boots! I got lots of compliments!!! I highly recommend this dress!!!

Great dress!! It was a smaller Large than normal, but it still fit really well. The previous reviews were correct, the collar-line was a tad itchy, but definitely not a reason to dislike this dress. Received numerous complements, 10/10 for sure! I would absolutely rent it again.
Fit perfectly and had such fun details that it made it a great dress to wear!
This dress is amazing!! I haven't even wore it to my event, but trying it on I feel like a million dollars!! It's short & sexy but tasteful. I wear a 10 and it's a perfect fit.

links_reviews_title: Sweet and Romantic, but a Little Itchy
links_reviews_text: Rented originally for a belated holiday party, but then ended up wearing a different dress to the party. Wore this out to date night instead. :) The floral details are lovely, but the mesh-y fabric does get a little bit itchy. I'm also usually somewhere between a 2/4, but since other reviewers said this dress doesn't have any stretch to it, I went with the size 4. Glad I did because the 2 would've definitely been too tight.

links_reviews_title: Perfect dress for a winter event, I got so many compliments
links_reviews_text: A little short so I went with a large which gave me more length.
I got so many compliments and felt sexy all night long. It's tight but flattering !

links_reviews_title: Wish I could give it 10 stars!
links_reviews_text: This is my favorite dress I think I've ever worn. It is absolutely beautiful!! It runs very small though, and is pretty short but I liked the length - I'm only 5'3". My only complaint would be that the material is itchy so if you have sensory issue I would choose another.

went up a size (usually I'm a medium but the large was perfect), so keep that in mind!! was so beautiful, a bitch itchy but nothing uncomfortable. it is short so if you bend over you will be flashing some people, so be mindful of that. very happy with my choice overall as long as you keep everything I've mentioned in mind you will be very happy with this dress.
I love this dress!! Material is a little itchy but def a rent the runway success! I received compliments ALL night!
No stretch, so glad i sized up to a large. Also short. Very cute!
Good for tall. Classy. Well lined. Didn't work for me as I went up two sizes and the shoulder part was too big/loose for me. The rest of the dress fit fine.
Perfect little black dress with something special going on. Flattering, easy to wear, sitting, standing, dancing- all went well!

links_reviews_title: I wore this to a formal dinner party
links_reviews_text: I loved everything about this dress. The fit is very flattering. It hugs the body in all the right places and made my waist look very small. I thought the shoulder ruffle might be a bit too much as I am petite but it was an elegant touch. I'm only 5 ft tall. It was a little long (hit my lower calf) but looked fine with heels on. I received numerous compliments. I liked it well enough I'm contemplating buying it because what women doesn't need another LBD in their collection!

This was the first dress I ordered from Rent the Runway. The dress fit like a glove in all the right places. The only con was that it was too tight under my right armpit. Otherwise, I received many complements! I would go up a size next time.
Wore this dress for NYE in Miami Beach. Loved the dress and my only issue was that I had to safety pin the top otherwise it would not have fit correctly. Even so, I would rent again.

links_reviews_title: So chic. So flattering. Perfect for a black tie wedding
links_reviews_text: Loved this dress so much. I rented another dress for a wedding but as soon as I put this on, it kicked my other little dresses butt. The dress fit pretty true to size. I received a ton of compliments all night. The slit on the side added an even sexier touch. I'm between a 6 and 8 and the 8 fit fine but was a bit big up top. It was a great fit in the body and hips.
Absolutely loved this dress! It runs a bit large though !

links_reviews_title: This was one sexy dress...a head turner
links_reviews_text: Dress was like a glove and it was definitely a head turner. The material held up well for travel and only needed to be steamed slightly. My only issue is that this is the one item that did not arrive in a plastic dry cleaned bag and it smelled like body odor. Had to have it cleaned so I could wear it.

links_reviews_title: Beautiful dress, very comfortable and loved the fit!
links_reviews_text: Was perfect for outdoor wedding in LA. Very fitted but hugged my curves in all the right places.
Beautiful dress! Very elegant It is a very tide material. But stretchy

links_reviews_title: I used this dress for a European styled city photoshoot and it was perfect!
links_reviews_text: I'm usually a size 4-8 but I read the reviews and got the size 12 and felt it fit perfect especially for a hot day it was easy to slip on and off for a quick change for a multiple looks photoshoot!

links_reviews_title: Beautiful dress for a black tie wedding
links_reviews_text: I wore this to a winter wedding in nyc and absolutrly loved it. SUPER slimming, and looks very high end with the flower ruffle detail. Wear spanx and a strapless bra
This dress is fabulous. A 12R is a US 8, and fit perfectly (i normally wear an 8). It was elegant, kept everything "in" and i felt really glam in it. Tons of compliments also :) sad to return it.

links_reviews_title: A little fancy for my party, but I loved it!
links_reviews_text: The bust area was too large, so sleeveless side of dress top kept slipping... Otherwise, a great fit. Very comfortable. U. S. size 8 reg was a 12 reg for this dress. They did the conversion for me... I'm 146 lbs and 5 ft 6 in. And 36 DD bra sized. May rent again.
Its skin tight but boy is it sexy and classy!

links_reviews_title: A LBD FOR OUR runway event
links_reviews_text: And elegant black dress that is a complete showstopper. People were taking me aside to ask who the designer was. The fit is forgiving and gives you curves in all the right places. Loved this glamorous dress
