links_reviews_title: I felt so fancy- careful with European sizing
links_reviews_text: Very comfortable, beautiful length. Stretchy enough so that your stride is not shortened. Definitely looks like a designer piece. You will be the best dressed in the room. Just keep in mind, the dress is very fancy. I loved it, although it did not fit perfectly under my coat, the accents on the dress will not and did not "wrinkle or get matted". I love this dress - would rent again

links_reviews_title: Absolutely love this dress, wore it to a gala at the french embassy and the complments were non stop
links_reviews_text: Definitely runs small. I am normally a 0/2 but this dress only fit in a size 8.

This was my second choice and while I did not wear it to my event, I will absolutely rent it again in the future. Stretchy and forgiving material, perfect length, and being an athletic build with full bust this is the first partially-strapless dress I've ever been able to actually fit in up top and have it fit true to size elsewhere. The ruffled detailing at top is sophisticated and stand-out. Can be word without bra as the ruffle will hide the beams, but you may want tape to maintain lift!
This is a perfect, comfortable black party dress. Never boring. Completely flattering.

links_reviews_title: Nice fit and fairly tick fabric so it smoothes everything out - no bumps or bulges. Lots of complim
links_reviews_text: Good fit - fairly long so better for tall women (I'm 5'9")

links_reviews_title: Wayyy tooo small for bustier girls! Size up!
links_reviews_text: You'll need someone to help you zip it up for sure! Way too small-- size up at least 2 sizes if you're bigger in the bust! Very body conscious!

links_reviews_title: Ruffles aren't as large in person
links_reviews_text: When I tried this on, I realized that it resembled my homing dress from the 90's. I didn't end up wearing it.
I was not able to wear this outfit because it was too snug on top for me to comfortably zip
Great style, great fit, the support on the ruffles helps keep the form of the dress.

The dress is elegant and glamorous, without being over the top. Yes, despite the ruffles at the top, the dress isn't "too much." Rather, it was eye-catching and elegant without being obnoxious. I received many compliments and would absolutely rent it again.
Beautiful dress, but I didn't end up wearing it because it was a bit too sexy for my event. It's very well made, and comfortable to wear. You will need to size up due to the European sizing.
Dress fit perfectly! It is tight and some how hides everything you don‚Äôt want people to see.
Fit Small
Stunning!

The squigglies shown in the picture are not as prominent, I'm assuming after use and dry cleaning. I received a bunch of compliments and it was a safe choice just not as wow as I would have liked to feel.

This Osman dress is truly one of a kind and very unique with bold ruffles that bring major drama to the dress. However, at US size 10 it was incredibly small and I couldn't zip up. It is such a shame because it is gorgeous and I really wanted to wear it.

I'm not fond of wearing all white but found this romper to be extremely flattering. It's lined in the right places where I did not need to wear a bra and was well covered and supported. It fit perfectly at the top and was a bit loose on the bottom but I actually prefer it that way. I was comfortable all night and received plenty of compliments. Would definitely rent this one again.

links_reviews_title: Wore this cute romper the day after my wedding
links_reviews_text: It looked adorable with a gardenia in my hair at the Glen Ellen Village Fair the day after my wedding. I got lots of compliments from random strangers and felt bridal yet playful. The only issue is that the cut is for a shorter torso, so I was borderline camel toe if I wasn't careful. I'm 5'9", so shorter ladies shouldn't have an issue.

Very sweet looking romper. I wore it on a date with my fianc√© to the Dal√≠ museum. I felt beautiful, and comfortable, in the 90 degree heat. It was a little tricky to unzip and zip on your own, which could be bad news when you need the bathroom. It was loose enough on me so that I could do this on my own, but if it were more snug, I would've needed help. I'm 5'0", 130lbs, 34DD.

links_reviews_title: Wore this as my wedding dress!
links_reviews_text: This was the PERFECT wedding dress for my little elopement in Tahoe. It's very comfortable and flattering...and it has pockets! I highly recommend this for any spring/late fall event that you're going to. I wouldn't trade this baby in for a poofy dress any day :)

links_reviews_title: Playing D&D on camera in the Feywild was a treat!
links_reviews_text: Pockets! I probably could have gone with a smaller size because 6 was a little bit droopy in a lot of places. But it was still cute, and I was able to move around and be comfortable. I love the little pockets of see-through lace.

links_reviews_title: Didn't want to take this off!
links_reviews_text: Fits perfectly - true to size for sure. I'm a 36D and didn't need a bra which was a DELIGHT. A bit tough to zip on your own but that's the case with most rompers. Also it was long enough for work which is seriously a gift when it comes to rompers. Considering buying.
Wore this is out for my bachelorette night. It was a little loose but overall really comfortable and pretty
Super cute. White party company event. I usually wear a 4 so a little poochy in some pics.
This romper made me feel great! The short part is long enough and I wasn't worried about my buttocks showing! Wore it to Top Golf in Vegas. I would rent this again!
Super cute! Fit true to size. Very comfortable. Easy to dress up or down. Loved wearing it! The only minor challenge is getting it zipped/unzipped by yourself.

I rented this romper to wear for a date for my wedding anniversary. It fit true to size and I received many compliments. The only issue is that the zipper is hard to close at certain spots where the fabric changes...which makes using the restroom difficult! It is better for a short event rather than a whole day.

I wore this for my bachelorette party. It was super comfortable and cute, but was a little puffy over my lower stomach. This is well shaped for pear shaped bodies with the shorts not being super short.

links_reviews_title: Cute but didn't blow me away.
links_reviews_text: This is cute but I can't zip this without help and I'm not sure it's worth the struggle. It's tight on my ribcage - not quite tight enough to run small, though. There's no stretch in the fabric, I'm glad I sized up. For someone else who is less curvy than me, it would be a win.

This is a really pretty romper that fits true to size with no stretch. It has great lace details, the only gripe I'd have is that it poofs out at the waist when you sit down and the lace has no backing in the stomach section so basically you can see the poof + your stomach which isn't great for those of us fluffy around the middle. Otherwise, a great rental!

links_reviews_title: Rented it for a white night party and it looked fab.
links_reviews_text: It is a little tight at the top so it's good for me but if you are having more than a C cup I would order a size up.
Fits true to size. Only thing is is that the pace is more of a crochet and not actual lace.
Loved this romper. It was really cute and had pockets! The bottom portion is a little baggier, but I didn't mind that. Perfect to wear out on vacation during the day.
I probably could have sized down, but I liked the looser fit since it was more comfortable. Got tons of compliments on this - fit great in all the right places!

links_reviews_title: I was going to wear this out to my weekly night out with my hubby but he said no.
links_reviews_text: I didnt see the bare tummy when selecting so was not age appropriate for me in my opinion, I didnt wear it

links_reviews_title: Loved it! Great fit and very flattering.
links_reviews_text: Easy to wear and received compliments.

I took a risk for an en blanc party and rented this brand new romper. Sometimes this brand can run small on me so I went a size up. It was roomy in a good, comfortable way! No spanx or bra needed (I have B cups). It was perfect for a hot, outdoor party. I could see a bride wearing this as well. I think it is actually true to size (I rented an 8 but I would imaging that a 6 would work) however I have bigger hips and a booty (true pear) so I am happy with my size selection. RENT THIS.
Wore this on my Bach and it was perfect. Really cute and fits great

AMAZING color for melanin blessed ladies, great fit for all. Felt like a neon goddess in this and people let me know. Main issues that took off a star were that the top needed to be taped and pinned and so did the slit. Lightweight and great for a summer or hot weather event. So simple and so good!
The dress was wonderful! It truly fit well the only thing I would complain about is the top part not fitting too well. Everyone at the wedding I attended complimented on the dress

Rented this for a black tie gala and LOVED IT!! I'm 5'5" and rented the 4L - wore it with 4" platforms and it was the perfect length (I tried the 4R and it brushed the floor barefoot so had to get the long!). The slit goes all the way up to the waistline so when seated, it can gape open but it's manageable or would easily be fixed with a safety pin. Would definitely rent again!!

links_reviews_title: Such a stunning color--stands out in a crowd!
links_reviews_text: Such a beautiful dress! I ordered a 6L and a 4R-- ideally, I would have been able to wear a 4L because I am 5'11", but it was out of stock, but it would have been the perfect length for someone a little shorter than me! The neon yellow was perfect. Would rent again.

links_reviews_title: Love the color and style of the dress!!
The dress !!! It was perfect night. I felt very confident
links_reviews_text: If you are tall like me 5'11 is perfect for you! If it's winter time maybe is no te correct choice . You should be careful when you seat. But overall the dress is perfect

links_reviews_title: Great for nice dinner during beach vacation!
links_reviews_text: This dress was great and it definitely felt vacation appropriate. The color was very bright, so it helped to have a tan to balance it out. As far as fit, I did feel a little self conscious with the top gaping a bit (but I'm also small busted and it may fit better on a larger bust). The front skirt of the dress doesn't conceal much when sitting due to the high cut slit, but with a bit of patience and adjustments, wasn't too bad! Overall, I really liked it!

Dress fit like a glove and stood out in a sea of black. I'm nearly 5'7" so I felt like I was in between a 4R and a 4L. I went with the 4L because I felt like the longer length was more glamorous. I used a little piece of fashion tape right below the straps to hold the chest area up.

I rented this for a wedding and although I loved the color and fit, it had a stain and a snag. I ended up wearing the other dress I rented. I'm 5'2 and although it was long, it was not too long for me with heels on. The cut is flattering too.
Wore it for a gala needed tape for boobs. Everyone loveddddd it.

links_reviews_title: Great color, received a lot of compliments
links_reviews_text: I rented this dress for a formal wedding and it runs true to size. You'll need double stick tape to hold the bodice in place and a safety pin to make the slit a little more modest. Overall, loved the dress and felt beautiful all night long!

links_reviews_title: This gown was comfortable and gorgeous, and I got tons of compliments.
links_reviews_text: The dress was a bit long, even with 3-4" heels on, but it was manageable. I used double-sided tape on the bust to avoid any incidents. The color looks a bit more fluorescent in sunlight than otherwise (hence the two photos), but I loved the material and color and everything about this dress.

Does it matter if you are big or not or anything else, you are not just putting this dress on and leaving You need pins at least 4 the top flaps open and so does the slit Also anything you wear underwear wise you can see
I loved everything about it. So unique
This dress was EVERYTHING! I received so many compliments. I felt so comfortable, and effortlessly elegant. I was sad to see it go!

I absolutely loved the color of the dress, and it looked great overall. However the slit opens ALL the way up.... so make sure you are prepared with safety pins. I don‚Äôt see how anyone can wear it without safety pinning the front shut!

This dress is equal parts sexy and fun! The back is extremely flattering and color made such a statement. Lots of compliments. Only complaints were the slit was high so had to hold it closed while seated and straps are thin so they dig in a bit to your shoulders. That's the best part of renting-- I can deal with those things for an evening and then try something else next time!

I rented this dress for a Mexican themed wedding shower and it was perfect. I dressed it down with flats and fun earrings but it can easily dressed up as well. I will echo other reviews, it was a bit reviling on top, but was an easy fix with fashion tape! Would 100p rent again!

links_reviews_title: You will be the STAR OF THE PARTY in this dress!!
links_reviews_text: This dress is surprisingly easy to wear. The color, while shockingly bright, is flattering on almost any skin tone. The fabric has a nice weight - light and airy, while still giving you nice coverage. The slit is quite high, but the long length and flowy shape balances it out. A standard strapless bra won't work with the deep V neck, so I went without. Used silicone pasties and double sided tape. Overall I loved this dress - it feels like a real special treat!!
Loved this SO much!!!!! The color really popped and it was so fun to wear! Lots of compliments! The Long was super long though as I could have gotten away with the regular. Great dress!!!!

I absolutely loved the color of this dress. The only 2 bad things I can say are; you may be better off using nipple covers. I tried to use a sticky bra but it peaked out a little in the front. Secondly this dress is hella long. I'm 5'1 and I thought I would be ok with my heels but it was still a little long. Beautiful dress nonetheless.

links_reviews_title: Flew in for a 4 day weekend and dresses were there!
links_reviews_text: This dress needs tape, luckily I read the reviews and bought pasties and tape! It was a knock out dress! I suggest getting the tape haha.

links_reviews_title: This dress was so beautiful. Such a unique color. I got compliments all night!!
links_reviews_text: The slit is very risky... I wore spanx underneath. I'm also small chested and struggled with the chest area a bit. Had to use fashion tape.

links_reviews_title: This dress was so fun and makes you stand out from the crowd!
links_reviews_text: The fit is a little bigger on top. I usually wear a 4 but wore a 2 instead. It isn't snug in the hip or butt area. One thing I had to watch out for is the slit, it literally went up to the bust of the dress. I taped it but it didn't stick all night. It didn't come open when I walked but I had to be careful if the wind blew hard
This dress was a show stopper, people all night did not stop complimenting it! Perfect fit, length, open back. Stunning! Def can not wear a bra but it worked out for me. Love LOVE this dress.
Loved it. You have to pin the top and the bottom slit though

I loved the way this dress looked on. It was fun and vibrant for a black tie summer wedding. A couple of things to be aware of - you can't wear spanx or a bra with this dress because of how low the back is. You also probably want to invest in some fashion tape to make sure the top doesn't reveal more than you want it to. Seems to fit pretty true to size - I didn't even try on the 0 because the 2 seemed fine, although maybe the 0 would have felt less revealing in the top? One other thing, the way the dress is made the front part opens all the way up, essentially one long slit up the front. So I just had to be aware of that, particularly sitting/standing getting out of cars. Also when I walked I would hold the dress on that side to keep it all together. I would have used fashion tape there, but I was worried the dress may not lay as nicely if I did that. All in a little high maintenance, but in my opinion, worth it! Lovely dress.

Beautiful dress. Needs fashion tape for the chest & you have to be careful with the front opening. It's easy to show a little to much . Also for the y'all girls out there. This dress in a long is long enough!!! I am 6' tall and I wore 2.5" heels and it was still touching the floor.

Yes yes yes! This dress is everything! The fit, the color, everything! Let me say that I was on the fence after reading some reviews, but I'm so happy I took a chance. True to size, yes, but I wish I would have gotten my backup a size down rather than a size up. The fabric is light and flows perfectly. Sheer, yes, but not unmanageable. I wore high waisted nude spanx panties without a problem. The top...I am a small C cup and Hollywood Fashion Breast Lift Tape did the job perfectly! Two small pieces of tape along the seam on the chest for good measure and all was well. I am 5'6" and 165lbs. The 10R fit perfect with 3 inch heals. The compliments were unending and still coming days later. If you want to make a statement, this is your dress!

links_reviews_title: The best highlighter yellow dress I could ever hope for
links_reviews_text: Super fun dress that I got many compliments about. I was initially worried about the low cut top and the slit that other people were talking about. I had a few "Marylin Monroe" moments when I walked over a floor AC unit, and I was careful walking up stairs and when I was sitting down but it didn't take away from me being able to enjoy the night. I didn't want to wear heels in this dress, so I was delighted when it just brushed the ground when I wore flats (I got regular length and I am 5'9") so if you want to wear heels and you are my height or taller, maybe consider getting a long. I wore a sticky bra from Target and had a few moments when you could see the lining of the bra when I sat down, but I think some fashion tape would have solved that problem. As you can see in the photos, the dress in daylight looks more like a highlighter yellow which I LOVED, and when photographed in low light looks more like a bright yellow. Super fun dress, fit great and I had a blast wearing it. One other noteworthy tip, if you are planning on wearing shapewear with this dress, because of the high slit you will need a thong bodysuit or pull a Kim K moment and cut off a leg/legs of some shapewear because the slit goes high enough you will see the shapewear on your thighs.

Loved, loved this dress! Felt like a goddess. This was my back up dress but ended up wearing it because, wow...it‚Äôs unique! Several people popped over to our table to say they loved it too. The open back style was beautiful but not over the top. The slit goes all the way up...so just be wise while walking quickly. I had no trouble dancing in it. I did use 2 safety pins to keep the front of the dress somewhat closed. Wore an adhesive bra from Target for this & it worked beautifully with the open back. The dress is BRIGHT yellow. You will stand out in a sea of black dresses! Highly recommend.

I loved this dress!!! It was so comfortable. I got SO many compliments! Only negatives were that it gaped at the chest and fashion tape is a must. It also has a very revealing slit. Lastly, I am 5'4" and even with 3 inch heels the dress was slightly too long. But overall, it was a great dress!
Loved the color of this dress in person, very dramatic and perfect for a Summer black tie event. I'm normally a size 4 but wore the 2 and honestly could have even gone a size smaller.

Required some fashion tape for the top but otherwise fit great. Little sheer, nude panties a must. Worn with flat sandals and hit the ground perfectly (I'm 5'7"). A nice, bright color for a summer wedding!

The color of the dress was definitely what it made it the most special. Unfortunately, the top was quite revealing when sitting down and if its windy forget about it! Youll have to pick between keeping the high slit closed and your breasts from pouring out. With that said, it looked amazing, it was flattering and comfortable. I would buy this dress and was so close to not sending it back üòâ

links_reviews_title: Best dress I've ever rented -- didn't want to take off
links_reviews_text: OBSESSED. First off, the color is unique and crazy and a showstopper. Second, Jay Godfrey knows how to make a woman feel elegant and sexy at the same time. Slit goes all the way to the waist since it's basically just a simple wrap technique. Be careful when sitting or you'll show your undies haha. It fits pretty much TTS, but the waist could have been slightly tighter and also I have small boobs for size 4, so it was a little gappy. Also I'm 5'10 and wore flats and it was dragging on the ground, so the 4L is perfect for tall girls. Overall AMAZING dress and will be renting again.

links_reviews_title: The color is beautiful and perfect for a summer wedding! LOVED this dress!!
links_reviews_text: Fits true to size, super comfortable, nice and light material, great for dancing!

links_reviews_title: Didnt end up wear this to my event, but love the dress, beautiful color
links_reviews_text: awesome dress, a little long must wear heels im 5'5 didn't wear it to my event but i would rent it again for vacation LOVE THE COLOR

links_reviews_title: Stunning, but gaped a bit in the chest area
links_reviews_text: Such a great dress, but I am a C, and I had to tape this down to my skin so my boobs didn't pop out when I sat down. The 2 was also a tad tight around my rib cage, but no way I could do the 4 because of the chest. I wish it fit a bit better, but it was a great dress and got lots of compliments.

Perfect fit. Clipped the bust area to cover up (wore it to church ceremony) The slit didn‚Äôt show unless i poked my leg out. i‚Äôm 4‚Äô11 so even my 4inch pumps didn‚Äôt help with the length. recommend if you are about 5‚Äô2 and up.

Great length and fit! One of the fasteners was broken when I got it but I was able to use a safety pin to secure it for one night. It hit right below my hips which helps being a tall girl with a long torso.

links_reviews_title: Great fit, but not that special
links_reviews_text: The fit on this top was perfect. I wore it out twice, once to a friend's party at a brewery and then to a dinner party. Paired with dark jeans and black booties. Liked the sleeves and the high neck for a cold night. It just wasn't that special or noticeable to earn 5 stars.

I wore this to my cousin's rehearsal dinner. It was a huge hit! The shape is awesome and really accentuated my curves without adding bulk. The material felt comfortable in the crisp spring evening. The back is also gorgeous. I would definitely rent again!

I tried this on in a 4 and it was a bit snug so I went with the 6 which is a bit big. I'm normally a 6 so I would say this runs large. That said, I couldn't take a picture that did justice to this adorable top. It made me feel very polished, very Audrey Hepburn. I wore it to a Broadway show but I could have gotten away with it for work. There is a large "keyhole" In the back but you could do it in a creative office. I wore it with black pants but it would look great with jeans as well. I am 5'2". It reaches my hands in the sleeves and hits below my hips. Very tunic like. Fabric is crazy soft and comfy. It's thick so working perfect on this spring day and would be good in winter. You would sweat in summer!!
Fit really well and the back detail is beautiful.
Cute top. Interesting side slits and back keyhole. Impossible to hook neck by yourself. True to size. Looks cute with jeans or slacks. Will rent again when I need to hostess! True to size

Nice heavy material but not hot. Perfect length (not "boxy") & I LOVE the slits on the sides. The bell sleeves and adorable keyhole back make this so much more than just another black top! The keyhole back is NOT so low that you can't wear a bra, so that was a major plus for me! I'll probably buy it!
Too long and large for me.
It needs a black tank top underneath to prevent sides from showing but otherwise very pretty. This model was a bit worn so color fading.

A little more fitted, this brought some interesting elements to a well-made closet staple. Love the back cutout that is just enough and the vents in the sides, skims the body in a flattering way. Debating buying this one!!

links_reviews_title: Comfortable versatile top for work or with jeans.
links_reviews_text: Comfortable versatile top for work or with jeans. The side slits are too high for anything other than high waisted pants.

links_reviews_title: Loved It So Much I Bought it
links_reviews_text: This is a really cute top with subtle details that make it more stylish than a basic black top. There is a key hole back and side slits so it is comfortable and moves really well. Nice weight to the fabric and very flattering. This is bound to be a wardrobe staple.
Fit perfectly and looked very professional and feminine. I would rent this again.

links_reviews_title: I couldn't really wear it. The seam was torn in the side. Shame as it was SUPER cute!
links_reviews_text: I couldn't really wear it. The seam was torn in the side. Shame as it was SUPER cute!
The fit and style were nothing special so I sent it back

links_reviews_title: This is a great top for a night out.
links_reviews_text: This runs a little big, I could have gone down a size.

links_reviews_title: Wore it for presenting at a work conference. It's great!
links_reviews_text: I'm pretty small chested so it was a little big in that area, but super flattering and sophisticated.
Beautiful fabric and fit, very expensive looking and sophisticated.
Loved this top. I received a lot of compliments on it and the classic cut. My shoulders are broad so I was glad the cut was true to size.
The slits on the side come up a little too high, other than that it's nice.
This top is elegantly flattering and warm. Although I live in Arizona, this top is perfect for our winter weather. The fabric breaths and is very comfortable.
Date night perfect

links_reviews_title: Valentine‚Äôs Day date with my husband
links_reviews_text: I normally wear an 8, but that wasn‚Äôt available so I went with the 10 and it was a little bit too big. But, I wore it was skinny black pants and it was really cute, flattering and comfortable. The fabric is great!

links_reviews_title: couldn't wear because of neck collar
links_reviews_text: I loved the top and really wanted to wear it....was super disappointed but if you live alone there is no possible way to clip the neck collar hooks and I didn't have anyone who could help me so I never got to wear the top other than try it on for size. I think too maybe wearing it might not be comfortable for a whole day.
This top is versatile and can be dressed up or down. Nice fabric and good side slit detail.
Looks great on chest. Perfect fit.

This top is incredible. It's classy, comfortable and I'd totally consider buying it. It's a great rental for just about any occasion. I would totally rent this again--definitely snag it if it's available. It fit true to size and I felt great in it.

The 12 fit my 36DD+ chest just fine, didn't pull across the back. The side slits didn't show any skin with my mid-rise jeans unless my arms were raised. Overall, the top was very flattering and comfortable for a night out.
I thought the material would be a little softer to the touch. It's a little scratchy. But the look of the top and the back is great!
Sleek, classy, elegant, flattering. What's not to love?
Wore this for a night out with my husband. Super cute, but the clasp in the back kept digging into my neck.
Fit perfect
great sleeves and great black detail. nice material overall.

links_reviews_title: super easy to wear and great detail
links_reviews_text: for long armed gals this may not work. I wish the sleeves were a little longer but I made it work. The nice keyhole back was a nice touch. Very well-made and versatile.

I'm short, so probably not the best candidate for a shirt like this, but it was more of a tunic length on me (fell over the tops of my thighs) which wasn't the tailored look I was going for. I didn't end up wearing this style, but I'm sure it could look more flattering on someone taller. The opening in the back was really cute and helped the style feel less severe.

I wore a size 0, normally wear a 4/6 so this seems like it either runs large or is just forgiving enough that it didn't matter. Looks super cute with pants or a skirt. The back is open, but still work appropriate.

links_reviews_title: Cute but runs a little small!
links_reviews_text: Liked this but only wore it once. Fits nice (a little tight for me but I am very hour shape!
This is a good basic top. The back is open, which I didn't realize I guess. It does run on the smaller size.
So beautiful and easy. Definitely will rent again.
Great for vacation! Exotic pattern and light fabric. I loved off the shoulder detail with halter. One of the best maxi dresses rented so far.
Wore this in vacation. It is fab. Wore a wide suede belt to give shape. Colors are bright and the detail in the pattern is super!

This dress would be perfect with a few modifications. First, it's about an inch and a half to 2 inches too long. Secondly, the elastic waist band is about an inch or so too large. And, lastly, the bust runs very large as well. Somehow I made this work but it was an awful lot of fabric everywhere.
Pros: comfortable fit and great length. Wore it with 3.5" heels without the dress being too short. Beautiful, light fabric and perfect for a hot summer day. Would rent again. Cons: none. üíõ

links_reviews_title: Fun print! Wore for Burning Man event.
links_reviews_text: Not the most flattering dress you'll ever wear but not everything has to be. It was fun for the occasion. The length and tie around the neck made me feel glamourous.

links_reviews_title: Not right for me but nice!
links_reviews_text: I ended up going with a different dress for my event. This one fit true to size and was comfy but I thought it looked a little overwhelming on me thanks to all the fabric and colors and pattern; a classic case of the dress wearing you instead of the other way around. I also wish the leg slit was higher; it's barely noticeable. Overall though if this is your style I say go for it!

Absolutely stunning Temperley London dress. Perfect for a warm, breezy summer day. The print is STUNNING! The photos of it in the model don't do it justice. I ordered a 10R (US Size 6) and it was HUGE. Definitely go down a size as this dress runs very large. Will definitely rent again in a smaller size. 5 stars!
Fits way too big, didn't do anything for my body. Loved the pattern though!

This is a f*cking dress!!! This is beautifully made and exceptionally constructed. There are subtle spines in the back that keep the back up and make it look light and airy. The arms are not tight at all. I ordered up because tempers runs small but this would've got closer to my size. There is no give in the waist though so if you're unsure size up and belt it. It's a float style and would be easy to adjust. You will need to belt it regardless though.
unbelievable print and cut

links_reviews_title: Beautiful dress! I styled this with my own belt to make the waist more pronounced.
links_reviews_text: Better for taller ladies! I had to wear a small heel.

links_reviews_title: Way too long for anyone 5'5" or under.
links_reviews_text: I would have loved to have worn this dress, but it was dragging on the floor even paired with my tallest heels!

links_reviews_title: Wish I found it earlier this summer
links_reviews_text: This would have been a great dress in June but I only found it on the site recently. I was hoping to wear it before Labor Day but never made it. Its a great fit and very fun! It's loud but definitely elegant. I do think the necktie and waist-tie combo is a little much (I wore without the belt and considered tying the neck strap in a bow). Length is good for tall gals who like flats or low heels!
I loved this dress soooo much. I wore it out on a date and to work with a jean jacket over it. It's absolutely beautiful with a great pattern. I would 100% recommend this dress.

links_reviews_title: It's a gorgeous dress but unfortunately, way too large in the bust for me to hold it up.
links_reviews_text: I wore a padded strapless bra, I'm a 38B and unfortunately, the dress kept sliding off my shoulders and chest exposing my bra. I didn't get to wear it out of the house.
I loved wearing this dress to a summer wedding reception . It was very comfortable and complimented my shape . The dress does run a little big so I would size down .

links_reviews_title: Dress is beautiful, but didn't fit.
links_reviews_text: Dress runs large, especially in the chest. The top of this dress fell down around my waist. Even with the strap tied around my neck, the were about 4 extra inches of loose fabric around the top.

This is a beautiful dress and I've been eyeing it for a while. I'm 20 weeks pregnant and only my pre-pregnancy size was available (which often fits), but I couldn't get the zipper to close. If you're pregnant and considering this dress, I recommend sizing up at least 2 sizes.

Unfortunately I couldn't wipers this stylish dress because the dress arrived with a busted invisible zipper. It was disappointing because quality control missed checking this before sending to me. Super stylish and trendy.
Was a little big but I belted it and I think it ended up looking nice. I would say the quality felt a little low considering the retail price of the item but it was pretty for dinner in Napa.
Size down. I might try it again in a size smaller. It would be great for resort wear dinner out.
This dress was a showstopper at my Cinco de Mayo party! Short enough to wear with flats. Plenty of details and light and airy.
Too large in a 6. Returned for a smaller size
Sipper difficult to maneuver

Wore this for GOT watch party ( fire and ice). So comfortable. Most of the time arms are too tight to fit well, the arms were comfortable and waist was also roomy. If it weren't so expensive, I would keep!

links_reviews_title: Too Big and Too Short for a Tall Woman
links_reviews_text: Very gorgeous color but I found this to run large, but short. I'm 6ft tall so I'm aware I'm taller than average but I'm also thin and straight so it was baggy in the chest, midsection and hip area. Very pretty but just not for my shape.
The top was a little tight but everywhere else it fit great! Perfect for vacation! It is a beautiful dress!

Wow, this dress was incredible! It was so beautiful in person. The material was just as beautiful as the print! It did run large but a wore a belt to cinch up the waist. Received a ton of compliments!

This would be perfect if it wasn't so large and long! I'm 5'7" and was tripping over the hem in 3" wedges. It runs really big. I'm 175 lbs and pregnant and it was huge on me. I'd go down one or maybe two sizes.

links_reviews_title: Amazing dress, but runs very large
links_reviews_text: Amazing pattern but runs large for the brand. I typically have to size up in Temperly and this time I should have sized down. Flowy throughout but there is some boning in the sides of the bodice. So sad I didn't get to wear it out, literally sat in my living room wearing the dress I loved it so much.

links_reviews_title: So comfy, kinda weird bottom, but great print
links_reviews_text: Love the waist for hourglass figure but the bottom is a bit weird and I think forces you to wear heels. Super soft and pretty
Loved the fit.
This dress was ok. It was pretty and it fit but the trumpet bottom was kind of weird and the length was meh. One and done.

links_reviews_title: Beautiful Dress, so many complements, wish I had ordered a 2
links_reviews_text: This dress was beautiful and I received so many compliments! I wore it to an outdoor formal wedding in July. I normally wear a 2,but had to order a 4 because the 2 was unavailable. The 4 fit; was a little big but not noticeably. I really enjoyed this dress, would recommend!

links_reviews_title: This was the perfect dress for a summer, outdoor/indoor wedding!
links_reviews_text: The dress is AMAZING! If I had a spare $1,200 I would buy it in a heart beat. The dress was so, so flattering, and the bottom portion of the dress was really flirty and added a really fun element to the dress. The silk fabric did wrinkle under my bust and on my thighs after a 1 hour car drive, but I didn't feel like the wrinkles ruined the look. I found it to be true to size. It did loosen up a bit throughout the night, so if you are in between sizes, I would probably order a size down for your backup. I felt comfortable, confident and beautiful at the wedding I attended and would rent this dress again and again. I see it being a universally flattering cut for all shapes and sizes. I'm curvy and this dress really accentuated me in all of the right places while hiding some of my lumps and bumps. No bra was needed, either. Christian Siriano clearly knows how to design for the every day woman's body and this dress is proof.
Runs a bit small. Awesome fit on your curves if you have a fair share of hips. Also, feels amazing on your skin. I would definitely rent again.

I wore this dress for my engagement party at a formal restaurant and I received a ton of compliments! Overall this dress fits true to size, hugs your curves and is very comfortable to wear (has stretch). It's fitted around the waist so I would recommend sizing up for a backup.

links_reviews_title: I got lots of compliments on the dress
links_reviews_text: Fits very well. Super lightweight fabric. Very feminine. Bright bold colors. The waist was at the top of my hips so it was a bit of a drop-waist fit for me. I really liked it.
Beautiful colors, fabric. Very curve conscious, hugs in all the right places. The 8 was a little tight on me, I'll try 10 next time. Will definitely rent again

links_reviews_title: Looks better on you than on the hanger! Lots of compliments.
links_reviews_text: Packed easy an no need to iron/steam. Nice length around knees (5'9") and room for bust. Needs strapless bra but nice thicker material than it appears so it lays and hangs great.

The fit is slightly large, the dress is fitted and then flares. Great dress to dance in. I took it to Fiji on our vacation and wore it two of the nights (2 different resorts). I got tons of compliments.

Gorgeous dress- design, colors, fabric. It had it all. Comfortable yet SOO stylish. wore to a corporate party at a 5 star resort (Hawaii). Will rent again. Got the matching earrings.Felt great in this dress. No cons! Compliments all night.

links_reviews_title: Perfect for sunset dinner on the beach!
links_reviews_text: This dress ran a size small. Easy fit and great for the beach.

links_reviews_title: Not the best option for pear shaped figure.
links_reviews_text: Loved the material! Gorgeous, so soft and comfortable. But I don't think it is the best option for a pear shaped figure. The bottom was way too tight (pulling across my stomach and thighs) and the top was on the verge of being too big. So I didn't think the 12 would work on top. It would be gorgeous for an hourglass figure or a straight figure. Maybe a pear with larger breasts. It hugs the booty so nicely.
This dress was beautiful and fit me perfectly. I received a lot of compliments.

I wore it to my engagement party and felt like a million bucks! I got my hair done before the party and the women at the salon made me take pictures! Easy to zip myself, and gave me the illusion of a waist! Would definitely rent it again!
Was comfortable and great length- good for warm weather and light weight and because of the material you cannot see wrinkles

The fabric is lightweight and stretchy. While, clingy, the texture makes it a little more forgiving. It's so lightweight that you won't feel like a sausage in a casing. Easy to move, breathe, dance, sit, etc. I wore it with a regular bra with the straps crossed - strapless or stick-on may have been better. I splurged to wear it for my rehearsal dinner because it was exactly what I wanted - summery and colorful but still mostly white - and it was worth the higher rental price! I felt amazing, which is how you should feel the weekend of your wedding!

links_reviews_title: Beautiful dress for a special occasion
links_reviews_text: My first choice didn't have the look I was aiming for and RTR customer service was great about sending a replacement dress that worked. I instinctively chose the larger size since I wanted to be comfortable while hosting family and friends for our sons sacraments and brunch. Over the course of the day the fabric did give and it ended up fitting looser than I liked but in the end it was a beautiful dress and I don't regret the choice. Perfect length and great coverage for a religious event.
Loved the fit of the dress. Fitted but not too tight.

This dress was perfect. Easy to wear, eye catching, and comfortable. We attended a fundraiser gala and I felt like a star even before receiving many compliments. Wonderfully made and a true pleasure to wear! Wouldn't change a thing.

links_reviews_title: Great dress that easily does day to evening
links_reviews_text: Fit great. Has a lot of stretch. Fabric has a light rose lace texture to it, but its very unnoticable.

This was my back up dress as my other dress was not shipped back to rent the runway in time. The material and dress were beautiful . It was a silk crepe i think. I got plenty of compliments on the dress. It was a nit more fitted then i would have liked around the stomache. I am not sure if a larger size would have looked better. It was a fun experience. I called rent the runway and they sent me another dress that i was able to wear to work the next day. Great customer service

The dress was beautiful and unique with the water colors. I love the flare for dancing and how the fabric is lightweight, cool and comfy. I normally wear a 12 but the 14 fit better. I received tons of compliments. Thanks RTR!

links_reviews_title: RTR is not disappointing me. I make personal stylist appointments and the personnel have been great.
links_reviews_text: The fit was close to the body and hugged all curves. I LOVED this dress, but I was self conscious all night because I don't have the fittest body and had to suck in the tummy throughout the event. But I did receive compliments. The print is stunning and despite the snug fit it was very comfortable.

links_reviews_title: I received so many compliments! Perfect for the beach wedding.
links_reviews_text: The dress is true to size and very flattering.

Love at first sight with this one!! It was the perfect summer wedding guest dress! The material is so beautiful and falls great on my curvy body. I could've worn the 14 but decided I wanted a more loser fit for this one. But if you're a true 14, I'd go for that and the 16 as your backup. The colors made a statement on their own. I literally didn't want to take it off!

A great shimmery summer look. Rented this for a fancy dinner and it was perfect. You can wear this with a racerback bra--shoulders are exposed. It's a little clingy in the midsection but has lots of room in the hips. The fabric is very soft a drapes beautifully and the fluted skirt is wonderful!

links_reviews_title: Gorgeous print and fun to dance in!
links_reviews_text: I received this dress as a backup for a wedding when my first choice wasn't available, and I was really pleased with it! The skirt was perfect for dancing. I loved the way it swished and twirled as I moved. The bold floral looked great and was definitely unique. Regarding fit, there's not a lot of give in the fabric, so if you're between sizes, you might need to go a size up. That being said, I didn't feel like it actually "ran small." Also, as the picture makes clear--the fabric wrinkles pretty easily, so it wasn't great for a 45 minute car ride to the wedding.

links_reviews_title: Beautiful dress that is fun to twirl in!
links_reviews_text: This is a flattering dress that fits true to size, but might be a bit tricky on very pear-shaped women. I am a small-busted hourglass (or mini pear), so the size 2 fit perfectly on the bottom, but was too loose in the bust and waist, and the size 0 fit perfectly in the bust and waist, but was very snug around my butt/upper thighs. Since the material DOES have a bit of stretch, I decided to go with the smaller size. This ended up being the right decision because the dress loosened up over the course of the evening-- right in time for dinner and dancing! The silk is study enough that despite it being white, I was able to go braless and sans shapewear without any imperfections showing through. The material tends to wrinkle a bit, so take your pictures before you do a lot of sitting!

This dress was sent as a replacement for a unavailable size (in another dress). I'm So glad it came! It was comfortable, 96 degrees that day- and beautiful. I wore spanx underneath and you could not see any lines! Very nice material, I'm still getting compliments!

This dress is everything! Super flattering & comfortable to dance in all night long. I wore a stick on bra, which was perfect. The dress also has this texture pattern on the fabric that adds some gorgeous detail. Only minor thing is if you're a legs and butt lady, it'll be very form fitting around that area. But not in ill taste. There dress gives lots of options for shoes & earrings, so an easy one to rent and be complimented in all night!

links_reviews_title: The perfect dress for a production of The Little Mermaid!
links_reviews_text: I adore this dress! It was comfortable and colorful and designed by Christian Siriano! I am a true 6, and this dress really hugged my curves. I cannot even convey how many compliments I got on it, so I definitely felt very confident in the dress. It was form-fitting until about mid thigh, maybe a bit higher, but then it flared out a bit, giving it a great mermaid shape. It was a true midi dress on my 5'5" frame. I wore a strapless bra and some spanx, mostly because the white is a little bit see-through. Just don't plan on wearing obnoxious colored underwear. The dress wrinkles a bit as you wear it, but it didn't bother me. I really loved wearing this dress; this was a great first RTR experience. Highly recommend! Especially if you want to flaunt your curves!
Great print, form fitting. Strapless bra required.

links_reviews_title: Twirlability makes dancing even more fun!
links_reviews_text: The skirt is a blast for dancing, the twirling feels extra youthful! It's a comfortable material, moves really well, but Spanx could be friendly (it was too hot for me to be concerned enough with a few pudges to squeeze into them). One detail that doesn't show in photos is the texturing to the material (it has a floral/tapestry texture).

Siriano, oh how I love you! Rented this as my backup and I'm so glad I did! Easy, figure flattering, eye catching dress! Many compliments throughout the night. Going to be another tough one to return!!! Ran true to size, mid calf length, bootie hugging, bold print. Sorry, just couldn't find a negative if I tried!

links_reviews_title: I got so many compliments on this dress. It fit like a glove and even my boyfriend was in awe!!
links_reviews_text: Fit was perfect. Color was perfect. I can't rave enough about this dress.

This is a really eye-catching dress and it was great for a summer event at the art museum. It runs true to size, however I recommend sizing up because the fabric is quite thin and will show every line. Consider having some shapewear on standby. Works for big busts if you have a good strapless bra, but no built-in support.

links_reviews_title: Kept me cool during Very Warm/Hot Outdoors ceremony & No AC reception
links_reviews_text: Visited an RTR store, did not have initial dress wanted but saw this and figured it would suffice the South Lake Tahoe wedding. I tried a 6, it fit but felt too snug, so RTR store ordered next size up and guaranteed it would arrive day prior to our departure... 1 star: arriving on time! 2 star: no issues with dress out of package 3 star: slid on easily & comfortable 4 stars: breathable wear (survived the no-shade from sun and the no air conditioning reception area! 5 stars: customer service and easy return packaging!

links_reviews_title: Beautiful dress, very flattering, lots of compliments
links_reviews_text: This was actually not the dress I chose for the wedding. But the second size wasn't available so I was able to choose any dress I wanted at zero cost. Amazing! The dress was beautiful, very flattering, true to size. My husband loved how my curves fit in the dress. Very soft fabric and so comfortable to wear all night and dancing.

I appreciate the details that covered my not so favorite spaces -- like the belly pooch or the baby fat by my armpit that is doomed to be there forever. Heavy enough fabric to not be sheer but not so heavy you're hot. Super cute overall!
Very flattering fit and beautiful color. Highly recommend this rental!

I got this dress for a breast cancer awareness event. So many compliments on it. For it to be strapless, it held up my ladies really well. The material is thick and layered so any undies work and you feel really secure and held in.
I love black halo! Well made, structured, full lines and always flattering. Wore this to a jewelry store opening in Laguna Beach. Compliments all night! Would rent again.
Super form fitting and got so many compliments. Wore to a summer wedding

Loved the overall look. Hugged curves nicely and the folds added interest. Hemline reached the perfect spot on my legs. My husband loved the dress! Picky stuff that picky people might like to know: 1) No bra necessary... hooray! 2) The pink is more of a light bubblegum pink than a blush, but the color looks good on. 3) If you are uncomfortable with your stomach, this is an ideal dress. It shifts attention and gives you a great defined waist. 4) If you don't think your derri√®re is the best, you might feel uncomfortable without shapewear. (Note: there is a very high slit that might show long shorts.) My "seat" is not toned and dimples showed a little bit at times through the dress, even with light shapewear. The overall look made it worth it though!
Great dress, everything looks sharp and more importantly stays put where it is suppose to stay which is a big win for a strapless dress. The zipper did give me trouble at the waist.

links_reviews_title: It's a beautiful dress every one loved it
links_reviews_text: It's small in the hips

links_reviews_title: This dress was perfect for my shower. I felt so beautiful in it.
links_reviews_text: The color was dreamy, the material had a little stretch for comfort and the design was so feminine. I felt like I hit it out of the park with this dress. This may have been my best rental ever!
Loved it. So many compliments. The pleats were very flattering. Perfect for a wedding guest.
This dress was absolutely perfect. Received alot of compliments. Arrived way ahead of schedule and return was so simple. Would absolutely do again!

links_reviews_title: Great work celebration dress. Flattering but structured and professional. Lots of compliments
links_reviews_text: Great fit/shape without being body conscious

links_reviews_title: I received so my compliments on this dress!!! Easy to wear and I loved it!
links_reviews_text: True to size
Love this super cute dress! Got tons of compliments on it all night. Felt like Jackie O!

I don't have a single negative thing to say about this dress. I absolutely loved it! It has a built in corset so I didn't have to wear a bra which is always a plus. Although such a formal look, the dress's material is stretchier than it looks. I got a ton of compliments in this dress and I highly recommend it!

I rented this for the Friday night rehearsal dinner of a wedding. I normally wear a 6 or 8, but will size up in dresses because of my curves. The 8 fit perfectly. The dress fit perfectly and was a really nice color. I have a booty, and it hugged me in all the right places and was very comfortable. Would definitely rent it again!
Too long and not for petite gals

I LOVED this dress and the way I felt in it. It runs a little small so it was VERY tight but thankfully the corset top made everything look nice and shapely. The color is a true pink - I was worried it would be blush and I wore it to a rehearsal dinner so that was very important. Everyone complimented the dress, it was seriously such a showstopper. I'm a size 4, 5'0", and this fit great, even in length!

Loved this dress! It is such a unique color and well made design. I wore it to a semi-formal outdoor wedding and received several compliments. This dress is flattering at every angle and I paired it with neutral shoes, black dangling earrings (chin length) and had my hair in a loose updo to show off the shoulder design. If you want to standout and be comfortable, this dress is for you.

links_reviews_title: This was very flattering around my midsection
links_reviews_text: The color was also great.
did not end up wearing it.
looks unfinished on the top chest part. other than that it's pretty dress.

links_reviews_title: beautiful blush pink color and modern design
links_reviews_text: nice length, pretty neck line

links_reviews_title: Country Club party for a birthday
links_reviews_text: Beautiful dress. Off the shoulder neckline did not fall down. Only down side is I wish they would make better zippers. So difficult to pull up without help.

links_reviews_title: Didn't wear it. Would be great for a benefit, but not the outdoor farm wedding!
links_reviews_text: Fits perfectly and covers all the right places!
It was a bit tight on the waist and chest, but overall a beautiful dress. I received a lot of compliments at the event and I had people coming up to me and asking who the designer was.

I enjoyed wearing this memorable dress so much! The color is vibrant, the fit is so comfortable, forgiving, true to size and hugging you in all the right places! I got complimented and am so glad I picked this dress for an important work event. Another RTR win!
Incredible dress. Folds hide all potential problem areas so rent without worry! I went braless since the bodice was fitted and fabric in the chest area is thick. The color is beautiful. Get this!

links_reviews_title: It's just so pretty and sophisticated
links_reviews_text: . It hugs your body in the right places. Hides your tummy!! Shows off your shoulders and bottom ;) I think is just perfect. Right amount of sexy without actually showing too much skin. It was really comfy. I wear size 29 in GAP jeans and 34C on top by VS. medium tops. I can tell you i will definitely rent many more dresses just like this one as it hides my tummy very well..
Loved this dress so much, it was brand new when I received it. Such a well made brand. First time renting Black halo and won't be the last.

links_reviews_title: Longer than it looks and baggy at the bottom
links_reviews_text: Had to get the 8 for my bust but the bottom was way too baggy and unflattering. Prettier color than shown though!

links_reviews_title: Loved the quality and style of this dress
links_reviews_text: I got a lot of compliments on this dress for my work holiday party. The fit was great and the length was perfect. It was small for an 8 so I would go up a size if your debating between 2 sizes.
I sized up and still found the shoulders to be WAY too tight so if you have narrow shoulders this is the dress for you.

links_reviews_title: Been waiting a year to wear this!!
links_reviews_text: I have had this dress on my wishlists for over a year, probably since joining the RTR community. This was the first time my need matched the dress's availability As others have mentioned it runs small in the chest and shoulders but don't let that deter you. It is absolutely fabulous. Styled as shown, with a neon yellow clutch for my evening event.

links_reviews_title: Don't want to give it back.
links_reviews_text: I need more money so I can buy this dress. I'm 43 and I don't like wearing anything too short. The hemline stays in place when I'm sitting down and doesn't ride up for uncomfortable pulling and tugging. I wouldn't usually wear a mini but I felt super comfortable in this one. Love.

I wore this dress for a summer wedding. While the fabric was a bit thick for a 90 degree day I was still comfortable. The chest and arm area was a bit tight thus sizing up a bit but the A line was perfect for my 6 month post partum belly. I would definitely rent this again!

links_reviews_title: Love the print. A little short for this tall girl.
links_reviews_text: Liked the print and very forgiving. A bit short in length.
This dress was simply classy. I wore it to a rehearsal dinner. It's a great comfortable dress. It runs big. I wear size 4 but went with the 2 because it fit better

This is a lovely dress that is hilariously poorly constructed. I actually got this dress by accident - but was happy when I saw it. Until I read the reviews, which are spot on. The sleeves have zero give and make it impossible to lift your arms. I wore this to a bar mitzvah in synagogue and it looked terrific - but even with the back three inches open at the top (and hidden by a jacket) I was very uncomfortable. It's not the overall sizing- as you can see from the picture the rest of it fit perfectly. A huge bummer, but glad it was just a rental! Also-- one more word of caution: It's not black!! I didn't realize until I left the house and realized I was wearing black tights, shoes, and jacket with a navy dress.
Beautiful material and perfect amount of fun for business casual workplace. Perfect fit around chest and waist, I sized up and was very happy.

Rented this for a work cocktail party. I'm tall so I'd need tights for a regular office day. I sized up per other reviews and I think that was a good call. It was comfortable all night and very flattering. If I were to keep it, I'd probably have the waist taken in a smidge.

Fabric wasn't as heavy as I anticipated, but that actually worked in its benefit. Really cute work dress. But I opted for the 2 as opposed to the 0. I'm sure the 0 would've worked but definitely not for work bc it would have been WAY too tight. I would recommend sizing up if you're in between.

Great if you dont need to use your arms. We had a good laugh about how I had t-rex arms the entire night because the shoulders were stiff and I couldnt move. Made dancing pretty difficult. Its a really beautiful dress, just hilariously poorly constructed. It also should have pockets
Beautiful dress for work or actually any event. Fit was to size. The tight sleeves didn't bother me. One inch shorter than I would like.
I wore this to a fundraiser dinner. I am a little broader in my shoulders and chest so felt like a had to keep pulling the top down over my chest, but it looked great! I would rent again.
The dress was beautiful. I got several compliments throughout the event. The cape sleeves do have some arm restriction. Definitely not good for YMCA dance moves.
Great choice for an early March wedding in New England.

Arm movement was restricted once the dress was on but I was still able to zip it up myself and do the cleverly made hook and eye closure. Lined throughout, nice medium weight material. Was almost tight in the chest for me as a 36B so this may smush your chest a bit if you're bustier.

I wore this dress out to dinner for my birthday, and I loved it! It was actually a replacement for the dress I rented but wasn't available at the last minute (RTR, what's up with how often that's been happening?). This dress is made for someone with my body type - it fit perfectly. It has no stretch, and you can't lift your arms above your head, but I found it to be completely comfortable. The only small issue is that I don't think you could zip up the back if you don't have help - the zipper tape gets stuck in the zipper easily, and my husband had to carefully work it up the back.

I got a lot of complements on this dress, and it was very comfortable other than the sleeves. It's cut very tight across the chest and I could barely moves my arms past a certain point. Other than that design flaw I would suggest this style.

Loved this dress. It was beautiful and different (not just another lace dress!). As other reviews mentioned your arms will be a bit restricted, but only from raising your arms above your head. Had no problem dancing at the wedding! I did end up wearing the 8 which was my backup, just so that I didn't have to feel too sealed in, but the 6 also fit.
Other reviews are correct there is little lift in the arms but I didn't have a problem.

I rented this for a formal date night with my boyfriend and it was perfect! I felt so beautiful the entire night, and turned a number of heads. The dress fit perfectly - tight enough to show off my curves, but not so tight that it looked unflattering. The sleeves do make it a little hard to lift your arms over your head, but I didn't actually need to do that at all during the night, so it wasn't a problem. Would highly recommend for any formal affair, or a nice date night with your SO. I paired with an ornate gold bracelet and black heels.

Really nice dress that feels high end. The colors are lovely, length is appropriate for short gals to wear to work. Only challenge is that there's no way to wear a blazer on top given the sleeves - can't lift arms! Also - as you can see in the picture.. wrinkles easily.
This style is great for any occasion! You are able to dress this up or down. Even though this runs true to size, I would suggest going up as a back up size due to the material has no stretch.
Such a pretty dress, very true to size. But you can't lift your arms when in the dress!
This runs extra small in the bust and the edge of the cap sleeve is tight. Couldn't wear. Beautiful color, design. I was really disappointed.

This dress is amazing- very well made, great weight for spring or fall. Unlike the other reviewers, I found it ran true to size. I'm always an 8 and that's what I took in this dress. If you have a larger chest, I would suggest sizing up as there is no stretch to this dress. Very slimming fit- slight A line so if you have hips or a butt, you'll still be able to wear this.

links_reviews_title: Loved the pattern and the fabric. Flattering cut. Could've been great!
links_reviews_text: I really loved this dress but the cap-sleeves made me feel like I couldn't move my arms and the fit was super constricted through the chest. The fabric is nice and thick but has little give so I ended up not wearing it (after getting dressed in it twice - once for a brunch and once for a date night). It would be perfect for either of those events if only it didn't feel so right through the chest/shoulders.

As most of the other reviews noted, this dress provides limited mobility in your arms. I wore this work so it wasn't a big deal, however this dress wouldn't be ideal if you were going to be dancing or moving around a lot. The pattern and material were high quality. I received many compliments.

The fabric is rich, unique, and high quality. I agree that the arms are not flexible. Don't rent this for dancing because you will feel restricted in the arms like a Barbie. I would wear again if the arms were more flexible because it is beautiful otherwise.

This dress is simply amazing!! I rented through my Unlimited subscription, and it is possibly my favorite thing in my closet at the moment. The fabric is gorgeous, and the fit is perfect. This is a dress I would consider owning, if it were for sale. I LOVE IT!

Beautiful dress. The fabric was so beautiful in person and soft to touch too even though it had good structure. The lines in this dress were amazing...perfect flare out at the hips, cinched in at the waist. My only critique is that the arms fit a little snug. I have a long torso, so maybe it's just my proportions but I didn't feel I could lift my arms without feeling restricted. Also, while I sized up (typically 8/10) the bust was still snug and gave me the "uniboob" feeling (36D). Size up for your backup.

This dress is amazingly beautiful. The details are exquisite. Its great for work, conservative while being fashionable. It's very structured, which while it makes the dress very flattering, also gives the arms very little room to move. Other reviewers said this as well, so i sized up to compensate. I still couldnt move my arms. Just know going into renting this that you won't be grabbing anything off the top shelf!

Loved every bit of this dress! The fabric is stunning, and it could easily be dressed up or down. I wore to a holiday cocktail party and added jewels to dress it up. Like other reviews have said, you cannot raise your arms. There is absolutely no give, so I would not suggest if you are large chested... or maybe go up a size. This dress is what RTR is all about...I got to feel like Michelle Obama for the night but for a fraction of the price! Best unlimited rental EVER! Still not ready to send back...

links_reviews_title: Gorgeous 5 Star - But you can't lift your arms
links_reviews_text: I am definitely giving this 5 stars BUT note that you can not lift your arms in this dress, beyond a 45 degree angle from your sides. So don't get it if you need to move around a lot, dance with your arms in the air, lift things, etc. That being said, the material is gorgeous, unique and eye-catching. The zero fit me perfectly, like it was a custom dress. This would not be a good dress for a person who wears a small size and has a larger chest though - the fabric does not have any stretch. E.g.,I am very flat chested and it fit perfectly, in that department. Seems like it would be good for work, winter bridal shower, charity event, date night, etc. I wore it with boots because it's cold and I wore it to work, but would look really good with nude heels.

links_reviews_title: Photos can't do this dress justice
links_reviews_text: This is a beautiful, textured dress. It is perfect for fall/winter and is absolutely gorgeous. I received it new with tags, which is always nice. I think it may be my best rental yet.

I was lucky enough to receive this amazing Jason Wu dress new with tags. The photos do not do this dress justice - just so much detail in the fabric and embroidery...I fully understand why FLOTUS is a fan! I received so many compliments...the fit was perfect. I wish I could keep it, but alas, I should let others experience the beauty of this dress!

links_reviews_title: Not for women with big bust!
links_reviews_text: The dress is nice but it does not stretch. Based on my size, it should not have been recommended for me!!

links_reviews_title: Really cute material but too large to wear
links_reviews_text: This dress was way too big and sleeves were weird. When I raised my arms the whole dress lifted up and showed my underwear. The pattern is adorable though. Wished it had fit
Fits nicely. Made me personally look a little bit boxy, but otherwise very professional and the embroidery is super cute.
This dress was fabulous! High quality material and fit like a glove! Compliments all night! I highly recommend!

Classy and chic. This was such a good look! I did wear some shapewear underneath because the material is very sweater like and can bulge on the places that you do. But overall this was really perfect and form fitting.
What a great dress! The material is luxurious and lays perfectly. The details on the top are nice. Nice for work or play. It will keep you warm

links_reviews_title: Didn't wear this time, but beautiful dress
links_reviews_text: I ended up not wearing this dress because the weather was too warm. This is high quality, very heavy knit fabric. It is form fitting but fit true to size. I might rent again now that the weather is colder.

Lots of boobs- my husband's favorite in a year of renting. The color is a rich fuchsia and the sleeves are dramatically long. Very comfortable, but will show every lump in your torso and hips without proper undergarments. I wore with a plunge bra, control top hose, and 3" heeled dark brown knee length boot. Size up if hourglass- ordered a medium which fit perfectly. (My normal size small would have been too tight in the bust and torso.)
Love this dress. Your breast definitely are a focal point but in a sexy way. Love the different trim colors. Very comfortable. I loved the sleeves but they do get in the way when eating.
This made me feel put-together and was very flattering. It worked great for work and then for dinner after work. I'd rent this again!
Sexy. Sleeves are open, which were a bit annoying, but cute!
I wore this to a friend's daytime outdoor wedding and received so many compliments. The colors are beautiful and the pattern is very unique. I didn't want to send it back!
Fits well and is so unique. The boob tube is a little short I was worried about underboob at times.
The material is very nice. I rented Alexi Brand's dress for my birthday 3 years straight now. Love it!
I usually wear a M in most clothes but am a L in Alexis lace dresses. It was super cute and different.

links_reviews_title: Beautiful dress but a few draw backs
links_reviews_text: First, let me say that this dress is gorgeous and I got many compliments on it! The only reason for the less than 5 star review is because I didn't realize there was a cut out in it upon ordering or I wouldn't have ordered it. I still wore anyway though. My dress had a very finicky zipper and I had to slip into it with it only half way unzipped. Apologies for the odd picture. My boyfriend took this just for my review.

The first time I rented an Alexis dress I got a small and could not zip it up past my waist. This time I ordered a Medium and it fit perfectly. I'm petite, 5'4", 34c, 27 waist and it made happy to wear this dress. I love the lace details and the unexpected light green beneath the lace. The lining feel silky and luxurious. Yes, it's fancy but I wore it to work anyway! No need for much jewelry, just a thin bangle bracelet and dangling earrings will do. Nude heels work well, as would strappy heeled sandals. Can't wait to rent another Alexis dress!
I love the color and the details! Received so many compliments! Would definitely rent again!

I wore this dress to a Saratoga race day in Upstate New York, and it was a huge hit! I was told by strangers that I was the best dressed one at the race. Absolutely loved it. Super high-quality and very dainty dress, Fits like a glove

links_reviews_title: Super cute semi formal summer dress
links_reviews_text: This dress is absolutely gorgeous in person! The fabric has a nice weight to it and the fit and length are perfect. Highly recommend
I'm 5'4 and 120lbs. The small size fit perfect. I have a small bust size so I can see how a larger bust would probably not work with this dress since the stomach portion is a little see through.
Great material!
The colors are way more vibrant in person! Great dress.

Cannot tell you how much I love this dress. The colors are brighter than the model pictures and the details are perfect. I'm usually a S/M but I have a wider rib cage so the M was perfect. There is no give in the rib cage area but very comfortable and fun for a wedding. I wore a nude regular bra and it was fine. Definitely recommend!

links_reviews_title: I‚Äôve never received so many compliments in my life!! This is perfect for a beach vacation night.
links_reviews_text: Fit was perfect on me!! I wore a small it was perfect in all the right places. My stats are 5‚Äô5 and 130. I ordered a small and it couldn‚Äôt have been better.

links_reviews_title: Playful. Could wear a bra with it
links_reviews_text: Perfect for #wedding . I love the colors and comfortable fit in hot weather. I also loved that I could wear a strapless bra with it and it didn't show.
so flattering on, you can tell the material is quality. i need to find another occasion to wear this to, great easter dress!
Men and women were stopping me at Easter brunch to say they loved my dress. Very delicate and well designed dress.

links_reviews_title: Beautiful pink dress for baby shower
links_reviews_text: This dress was a hit at a baby shower for my good friend who is expecting a girl. The pink lace overly over the green pattern was just adorable. I liked this dress in person way more than I expected. I received so many compliments.
I fell in love with this dress as soon as I put it on! Beautiful and well made with a great fit and feminine flair. Many compliments.
Fit beautifully and I got tons of compliments ! Would rent this again for sure

links_reviews_title: It was bright and festive. Got several compliments.
links_reviews_text: It fit well but the zipper was a little difficult and needs help.

I love the quality of the material of this dress - it is so beautifully made. I wore this to a polo match and got tons of compliments on it. One girl even said she had worn it before 9lucking she wasn't wearing it this day) and loved it! It's a true winner!

links_reviews_title: So pretty and very well made!
links_reviews_text: Dress fit like a glove - receives tons of compliments

You seriously cannot go wrong with this designer!! I'm obsessed with everything she does. The colors on this dress or so unique with just a touch of green. The lace design is stunning and the structure of the skirt will make you feel like a million bucks!

Dress fit really well. It was a bit more heavy and bulky than I assumed it would be and it is a little tough to zipper, but overall great dress with fun colors. Wore a strapless bra, but it wasn't required.
I didn't end up wearing it because of how tight it runs. Also, felt too Tinsley Mortimer to me.

I rent most of my dresses for work. I read the reviews and looked at the pictures but I still didn't realize the mid section didn't have a lining. The dress fit perfectly and looked adorable but I can't wear it to work so I sent it back. The lining covering the bust area is really small and I'm small chested. So just an FYI on that! I'll for sure rent this dress again when it's more appropriate for me to wear it. I was super bummed.
Dress was well made. It was a little shorter than I thought but It worked.

Loved the colors, the fit, the feel, just everything! Wore this to a movie premiere after a full day of work in it and received a ton of compliments. Felt great in this one and would definitely rent again.
Very cute and original colourway. If you were shorter than me you could likely get away with this for work. V cute - I'm curvy and fit well.

This dress is so cute! I've reviewed the same design in maroon and bluein the past in the same size but the inside "bra light green" lining on this one is smaller. Just like a previous reviewer mentioned, it rides up so if you're busty [i'm 34DD] (see first pic how it sits at the first half of my chest), need to wear an inner blouse or in my case I wore a nude bra. This wasn't the case with the maroon one. overall it fits TTS, no stretch in the waist. Fit and flare design plus pink color makes it superfun and girly!!!

links_reviews_title: Large chested girls might have bra coverage issues, but overall very charming and fun.
links_reviews_text: Well-constructed dress. I got a lot of compliments, it's very fun. My husband said the colors reminded him of watermelon bubblegum. You can't really tell from the pictures, but the midsection is see-through lace (so are the shoulders). However, the green lace is really tightly woven, so I don't think the cut out is super noticeable. However, my biggest issue was the white band covering the bust was not generous enough for my bust size. Like more than 1/4 of my bust/bra fell below the white band, which you could kind of see through the lace, so I had to wear a white cami underneath. I tried to show this in the picture. If you look close, you can kind where the line of the white band falls (and how much of my bust is below it). Smaller chested girls shouldn't have an issue.

It was my second time renting the dress. It's a statement piece and has a flattering fit. It is a bit see thru in the midsection, but all the important parts are covered with a white slip. Love the dress.

This dress is very cute, but I am way too tall/large chested for it. It is see through, but has a small piece of fabric to cover your chest. 50% of my boobs showed through the bottom! Maybe this would work for a shorter girl or someone with a/b boobs.

links_reviews_title: Runs small. Very pretty but small
links_reviews_text: The fit is very tight through the rib cage section Loved the look but too small
This dress is pretty and well made. It's just a little too juvenile for me. I wore it anyway because the other dress I ordered was too big. Not my fave rental.
Beautiful dress. Gorgeous color combo and very flattering fit. High quality fabric - just heavy enough to keep the shape, but soft to the touch and not scratchy. I will def. rent it again.

links_reviews_title: I rented this for a cruise vacation to wear to the formal dinner evening event.
links_reviews_text: The fit was perfect and the dress is fun and gorgeous! I got a ton of compliments.

links_reviews_title: It's lace but it doesn't breath!
links_reviews_text: Very cute dress. Like other reviews said if you are busty you will want a bra underneath because the lining doesn't cover much. I wore this to an outdoor summer wedding and it was so hot! It gives the appearance of cool and breezy lace but it is total opposite. Would not rent this for a warm weather event. I couldn't lift my arms very well so it wasn't great for dancing, but the skirt would have been fun for twirling.

links_reviews_title: Beautiful design and easy to wear!
links_reviews_text: This dress can be dressed up with heels or dressed down with sandals. The fit for me was very comfortable and I liked that it was not tight in the tummy. I wore a strapless bra. It traveled well and came out of my suitcase ready to wear. Lots of compliments.

This is the second time I have rented this dress. This time I sized down and I felt a little more comfortable because you can't wear a bra with this dress. It was very cool, while walking around on a very hot vacation. Feminine yet relaxed.
Cute
Love the green/pink combo, high neck in the front/low in the back and fitted in the waist
True size and beautiful design
In person, the print looks a little outdated. It runs a bit tight thru the rib cage.

links_reviews_title: Finally was a dress I rented and that kind of fit!
links_reviews_text: Loved the pattern and the concept of the style and fit, plus the pockets!! Don't think it did the best things for my figure/ made me look a big broad but still enjoyed wearing it as a fun Day dress

links_reviews_title: Really flattering dress, especially the back.
links_reviews_text: Fit perfectly.
Wore this to a friends bridal shower. Perfect! No complaints
Seemed a little worn and rib cage wouldn't zipper. Too tight but too big on bust for me
The colors in this dress look much darker than in the picture...the fabric is kind of dull and bulky. I did not wear this. It just looked kind of old.
too tight
