I'm normally an 8/10 and rented the Large, thinking it would be comfortable for a summer weekend in the mountains. The neck was much higher than in pictures and it was so small I couldn't even zip it all the way up. Cute fabric but sizing is weird.

I have rented from this designer before and loved it so much I bought it. NOT this one. Too large. Looked like a tent on me. Don't think a smaller size would have helped. The pockets added more to my hips. I never wore it.

I really wanted to love this dress. It was super cute in the pictures but I could not get it zipped up without real effort. The zipper would stick and I didn't want to break it. Also, my torso may have been to short because even if it had zipped, it would have been gappy on the sides.

links_reviews_title: Odd fit, couldn't make it work, unfortunately
links_reviews_text: I loved the pattern and shape of this dress but could barely even get it on. It was unflattering and uncomfortable on me. I am tall and found this to be too short. It also ran very small in my opinion. I'd recommend sizing up. See all of my rentals and how I wore them on my YouTube channel (Pointe Boutique).
Tight around the rib cage, but overall great dress. Wore out to dinner while on vacation at the beach

Color is gorgeous, something about fit made it not great for my figure - my chest isn't quite large enough to fill out the top so it looked a bit baggy, but I think would be beautiful on someone else.

links_reviews_title: Material not very high quality, a bit big
links_reviews_text: The photo of this dress makes it look like it's made of a breezy light material, but it was actually a kind of ehhh quality stiffer feel. Also was too large (I"m typically a medium but this was quite loose). Honestly felt worn out - I know it's a style that's been on the site for awhile. I'd skip this one.
Fit well.

links_reviews_title: I love the overall style of the dress. It was a little tight in the rib cage as other reviews said.
links_reviews_text: The print was adorable but looked a bit worn so I did not wear it.

links_reviews_title: Fun party and loved the length of the dress!
links_reviews_text: tight across the chest but fit perfect. need to wear some type of bra and the material is not very structured. got a lot of compliments!
na

Pretty dress but had two major issues that kept me from wearing it. First, the other reviewers are right, it is very tight around the rib cage. I am typically a 32 or 34 in bras and I had a ton of difficulty getting the small zipped up. Secondly, there is a lot of material around the hips area. Typically I like items that are loose in the hips because I am have bigger hips/thighs but there was way too much material in this dress. The pockets added to the poofy look around the thighs. It was very unflattering and made my thighs look huge. I think if they were ironed flat they might not look so bad but I already decided not to wear this dress so I didn't try. Length was good with flats or low heels for me - I'm about 5'4".

links_reviews_title: It was a destination wedding and it was beautiful wedding. Dress was suitable for location and even
links_reviews_text: Fit was perfect

links_reviews_title: the dress was cute but ran small around the cage area
links_reviews_text: runs small

This was a beautiful dress, I received so many compliments! The colors were very pretty, and the fit was perfect. It nips in your waist and shows off your shoulders and back. The pockets were a bonus for sure!

links_reviews_title: The pattern is really unique and the dress fabric very comfortable
links_reviews_text: This dress photographs really well! I'm 5'5" and the length was perfect. I wort 1 inch wedge sandals with them but it would've looked good with heels too.
Great fit. I am 5ft 3in and the length was perfect for either flats or wedges.

The gathered waist line with lots of extra fabric and pockets underneath added a lot of volume to my hips/ Lower abdomen. Also the waist was quite tight and not very comfortable. I did not wear this. Print was beautiful though.

links_reviews_title: Not as much of a wow factor as I was looking for
links_reviews_text: Very casual Saturday afternoon dress. The material is a very thin cotton and doesn't feel high quality at all. A nice sexy open back and the dress also has pockets. Could have gone without a bra but felt more comfortable with a nu bra and fashion tape. Was ok...just not a wow. Arrived a bit wrinkled

links_reviews_title: Loved it! Got lots of compliments. The only issue was that I have a smaller bust line.
links_reviews_text: Get for an evening out!
I didn't like this dress, mainly because of the fit. The fabric seemed worn and faded. Not a winner.
It was too tight in the rib cage area. Beautiful color combination. Will probably rent again in a different size.
I am typically a 12/14 and the XL didnt zip up the side
True to size fit and length.
Fun, preppy dress for a summer day event or BBQ.
Way too tight in the chest and waist. It's a maxi dress with a mini top.

links_reviews_title: dress fit well, colors are pretty for the summer
links_reviews_text: a bit too much material at the bottom for me (i'm short)
A little tight around the neck

I ended up renting the medium ( I usually wear small) because that was what was available on unlimited when I was looking. It was fairly loose on me, but I still ended up wearing the dress several times before returning it because it was such an easy thing to throw on for any casual weekend outing. The colors and the pattern were eye-catching, and of the cotton fabric was cool in our recent heat wave. You definitely cannot wear a bra with it, so if that's an issue, it might not be great for you.

links_reviews_title: One of my favorite rentals ever!
links_reviews_text: I've used my membership during quarantine to rent really fun pieces, and this has been my favorite of them all... super dramatic & feminine. Paired here with a white ribbed turtleneck crop top & white/ black cap tie YSL pumps... but I think would be equally stunning with white sneakers & a fitted white tee, or a black cami & strappy black sandals. Will definitely rent again... another badgley mischka stunner!

I loved this skirt. Got so many compliments on it throughout the night. I am 5'4 and I wore it up pretty high so i do think its a little long. I expected it to be more tea length like the picture. Like others said, the elastic waistband is nice but it was a little tight and digs into you. But overall, I loved the fit and the look.
This skirt was amazing and I received so many compliments! I loved it so much I want to own it!! I'll be renting this again for sure.

I rented this skirt for my engagement photos and I'm so glad I did! I wanted something classic, eye-catching and black, and this certainly delivered! It channels both Audrey Hepburn and Carrie Bradshaw at the same time. A great mix of classic and modern. I can wear between a 0 - 4 (mostly 0 or 2) depending on the designer, and based on reviews I chose a 0 and 2. I went with the 2 because while the 0 fit they looked almost exactly the same, and it was a hot day so I didn't want to become uncomfortable after an hour or two of taking photos. The 2 fit great on my waist. I wanted it to fit higher rather than lower, and it did.
Fit was great. I could have worn this with any number of tops I own. I love black and this was perfect for a winter wedding.
LOVE this skirt. Please know it's definitely not the most flattering skirt. I think it ran small, as I am usually a size 6 and ordered the 8. It fit. I have a 27" waist.
I wish I could afford to keep this skirt. It's really the perfect staple piece. I feel like a ballerina skirt can dress up anything. For great and looked so chic!

I wore this to see Mean Girls on Broadway for my 40th birthday. We started receiving compliments the moment we stepped into the hotel lobby. So cute and fun!! The fit is comfy. It hits you at the smallest part of your waist, so it‚Äôs very flattering. Loved this choice!
Elastic waist - full flowy skirt
The skirt is a little on the long side but beautiful. Took a little while to find the right top but def worth it! Wore it for a graduation, got a lot of compliments, it was so fun to wear!

I rented this for an event where a group of us would be a silly matching t shirts, so I wanted to stand out a little bit and still look cute. I had a blast twirling in this skirt and it's very comfortable. My biggest complaint it is made of normal tulle and one snag will cause it to rip. So it's probably a little too delicate for me to rent again, but loved wearing it!

I rented this skirt for my engagement pictures. It was the perfect mix of something classy, modern, and whimsical. I am usually a size 6, but the size 4 was more flattering. Since the skirt is so fluffy, i recommend going down a size. My pictures turned out beautiful! I would definitely recommend this skirt to anyone looking for the perfect statement piece for a special occasion!

links_reviews_title: It was used for my sons 1st birthday party which is on NYE! Couldn't have been happier.
links_reviews_text: I feel I am typically a 2-4 and this was a perfect fit for a 4. This was also my backup dress but worked perfectly with my custom made shirt for my sons' 1st birthday so I went with this! The length was great with flats and heels though I chose flats b/c my husband said the heels made it look "too Grease like". It was the perfect dress for my occasion and RTR was great!

I'd say it runs slightly small judging by where it sits on the waist of the model vs where it sat on me, but I personally think it looks better sitting higher up anyway. Very comfy, incredibly flattering, and kept me warm!

I rented this for NYE and had such a blast wearing it for the night. I got tons of compliments, twirled around all night, and felt comfortable/confident. I loved that it was unique in a sea of sequin dresses. Will definitely rent again.
I loved this skirt! I'm very self-conscious about my hips and stomach, so the high-waist on this worked perfectly for our engagement photos. I felt fashion-forward, fun and fabulous!
This was very fun but IÔ∏è did feel a little big in it. The tulle gets crimped after sitting on it and really poofs out.

links_reviews_title: Worked great for my Halloween costume!
links_reviews_text: This skirt was great with a body suit for Halloween. The waist is forgiving with some stretch to it.

I was the hostess for my friend's Mad Hatter Bridal Tea Party. The skirt was cute, flirty and fit perfectly. I received a number of complaints. I paired the skirt with a gold belt and rose gold heels. Super cute!!!
Wore it for our engagement photos, and I think the photos look great. A fun skirt, I'd rent again!

This skirt was the perfect flare for a fall wedding. Wore a sweeter top with it and was being told I looked like I belong in 'Sex in the City'. Loved it and the length was perfect, longer than what I expected!!
The skirt ran a little large in the waist, but overall fit really well. It was comfortable and perfect for our pictures!
Skirt runs a little small but overall great material and product! I made it work!
I rented this skirt for my work Seminar and it was more fun than I could've imagined! I received tons of compliments. I felt super trendy and fashionably chic! The skirt ran true to size.
Paired with a backless Deep V halter. Felt absolutely magical for my black tie engagement pics

I rented this skirt to match my daughter's outfit for her second birthday party and it was perfect!! The length was a little long (I'm 5' 1") so I rolled the waistband and made it work. So light and airy...ideal for an outdoor party in June!

I rented this skirt for our engagement pictures and was very bummed when we got rained out. The skirt has the perfect amount of fullness, and I sized down so that it would sit at my natural waist instead of around my hips. I ended up wearing it out to dinner that night instead because I wanted to wear it so bad!

I LOVED this but found it difficult to find a shirt to match. I could have worn the 8 but there was a rip in it. The 10 fit fine too. Sits up on your hips so had some wiggle room. The top is not stretchy

Loved this tulle skirt! Didn't make my hips look wide like other tulle skirts I have tried on. 6 was a good fit...8 was too big. Def order down a size if in between. Larger size will make your hips look bigger.

links_reviews_title: I wore this skirt to a wedding and it was perfect.
links_reviews_text: I am 5'3 and usually wear a size 10 and this fit my waist perfectly. Since I am shorter, I imagine the skirt ran a little longer on me than it would others, but I loved the length. I had read reviews that said the skirt needed to be steamed, so I was ready with a steamer, but honestly I don't think it needed it (I steamed it anyway, just in case!). I got SO many compliments on the skirt throughout the evening! Definitely will rent again.

links_reviews_title: Tulle skirt perfect paired with crop top.
links_reviews_text: The skirt ran a bit tight in the waist so I opted for the 4. Paired with a silk crop top also a RTR rental and it was perfect for our special Alinea restaurant experience in Chicago.
Skirt did not rise or sag throughout the night at all. Fit great and stayed in place. Was super comfortable and not itchy.

Wore this for friendsgiving dinner with friends. I ordered both a 10 and 12. I wore the 12 and my friend wore the 10. It was so comfortable and there's so many ways to wear it. I would definitely rent again!!

links_reviews_title: Gorgeous and fun - very sex and the city
links_reviews_text: Loved this skirt! Wore with a top I bought from the rtr clearance sale last year. I'm 5'3" or 4" and it reached below the knee, mid calf, not quite to the ankle. I ironed before I wore and it laid so well. This pic was from the end of the night after sitting and dancing so it looks a little wilder than earlier in the evening. I am usually between and 2 and 4 (with my smallest point at my waist often a 2) and the 4 was a little tight, FYI! Would rent again,

links_reviews_title: Fits great, feels great, looks great.
links_reviews_text: The skirt fit well at the waist, the liner was good material and the length was a bit longer than what I'd hoped for, but still short enough that I could still wear shoes with ankle straps. Got compliments from everyone I saw the whole night.

Loved this skirt. I wear anywhere from a size 10-14 depending on the designer and had to wear the 14. The size 12 was a little too snug on the waist. Wanted to feel more comfortable and the 14 had plenty of breathing room. Watch out though, the tulle is poofy make sure it doesn't get caught on anything when walking.

I love this skirt! It is so much fun. It is several layers of tulle. I have worn it several times and I get compliments every time I do. I feel like a princess when I wear it. I've worn a different top with out each time and the one in this picture looked the best with it. The waist is elastic, and there is a zipper. If you wasn't too feel like a princess, rent this skirt.

I wore this to my Company Christmas Party and I absolutely loved it! It's very flowey and fun to dance in. It runs true to size and the waist band doesn't stretch so order a size up if you're not sure.
This skirt is everything! I wore it for engagement photos and didn't want to take it off! Gorgeous flowing material! I'm 5'10" and it was the perfect length. Highly recommend renting this piece!

I rented this skirt for a funeral and it was lovely. I received a ton of compliments. It was longer than I expected but looked nice. It came wrinkled and I had to steam in my bathroom by running a hot shower with the door closed but that was easy to do.

This dress was very comfortable, the lace and the lining both had good stretch, the sleeve shoulder puff detail was cute, the color was a pretty rich evergreen color, and the fit was forgiving. I got the 16 and the 18 and both fit but I am subconscious about my postpartum tummy right now so I went larger for more room. I received several compliments from other wedding guests. I would definitely rent again!

I wore this for a semi-formal military dinner. I usually wear a 8, but they only had a 10 in stock so I went for it. It was a little big, but not noticeable. It was so comfortable! Very flattering and beautiful. I would definitely rent this again!

This dress looks so great and is incredibly comfortable. Don't let the sunny photo fool you, the dress is very dark green. I'm pretty short, so the dress went past my knees, but I still loved it and would rent again!

links_reviews_title: This dress is the best! Need to buy it ASAP
links_reviews_text: Got this dress for my boyfriend's installation banquet after my previous dress rental from RTR didn't fit. I'm normally a size 16/18, but I could fit into a size 14. It was so comfortable and the lace has stretch so it was easy to move and sit in. I did wear Spanx, but just to smooth everything out. EVERYONE LOVED THIS DRESS, from my boyfriend to his colleagues to my mother, who insisted I buy it after seeing it on me. Hopefully I can, because I was sad to send it back.
This dress was super comfortable and fit beautifully. My husband and I were celebrating our 15th wedding anniversary and he was wowed! This is my 2nd RTR and is my go to now for any event.

Love the slight puffed sleeve not too dramatic Bodice is large as is usual with Ralph Lauren- length was to the knee at 5'6 Arms fit great bust was fitted just around waist and butt was baggy but I still loved this dress Beautiful ever winter green Comfortable zip up sturdy zipper with no issues Flattering sexy and modest at same time
This dress fit perfectly with enough room to be comfortable. Absolutely gorgeous.
I wore the dress for Christmas Eve. Great color, and the dress had a nice stretch to it. Very comfortable. I am tall, and the length was perfect. I would definitely rent this dress again.

links_reviews_title: Rented for wedding and it was perfect. Fit excellent. Classy. Love the slightly puffed shoulders.
links_reviews_text: I wear a 4 but the size 2 was a perfect fit so may run slightly big.

links_reviews_title: I felt so comfortable and confident during the entire event.
links_reviews_text: Completely, 100% comfortable! Extremely flattering to my pear shaped body. I wore it with high-waist Spanx that included coverage of thighs. The color is amazing, a nice alternative to black and navy. Sadly I was having so much fun that I forgot to take a photo!

links_reviews_title: Beautiful dress and beautiful color! Fit a little big, but was still great!

links_reviews_text: I‚Äôm usually between and 8‚Äì10 but the 10 was way too big overall for me. I got a lot of compliments on the color and fit.

links_reviews_title: Stylish and comfortable all in one
links_reviews_text: Wearing this dress, I felt sexy, put together and comfortable - a rare combination for formal wear! I added sheer black nylons and a black heel to complete my cold weather look.
Great dress. Would definitely recommend

I wore this to a fancy dinner on vacation with my family and it was great. There is stretch so it was comfortable all evening and did not require significant shape wear. I would definitely rent this again

links_reviews_title: I chose this as my dress for my bridal shower! It was super comfy. I wish I got it a size smaller.
links_reviews_text: Fit great. Material was amazing. Wish I got it a size smaller.
Nice fabric, flattering lines
Dress was true to size, stretchy material made it move with me, beauiful green lace sleeves help since it was a chilly afternoon Wedding.

Many of my girlfriends complimented the dress and when they found out I rented it they had to know more. The dress was perfect: slim enough to show off some curves but stretchy enough to not be confining. It runs pretty true to size, a great winter-wedding dress!
fit well. good length
The dress is a classic. The color cut and material are so nice. Received many compliments when wore.
Received tons of compliments- this dress looks fantastic on! The slight extra poof to the sleeves is subtle but enough to make the dress really stand out overall. Will rent again!

links_reviews_title: Classy and comfortable special occasion dress!
links_reviews_text: Wore this to a winter wedding. Loved having long sleeves, but as they are lace it was not too hot when the dancing started- perfect! Highly recommend for a comfortable and super stylish and classy dress for any winter special events!

links_reviews_title: I never knew that lace could be so soft!!!!
links_reviews_text: Very soft lace. The sheer sleeves and slight puff was beautiful. I would love to purchase this dress someday. Absolutely gorgeous! The picture is just as described and doesn't highlight your midsection flaws.

links_reviews_title: This dress was comfortable and beautiful. I had several positive comments.
links_reviews_text: I'm 5 foot and it was a great length.

links_reviews_title: This was a life saver! The other dress ordered was much to small.
links_reviews_text: This dress had some give to it and was very comfortable. Beautiful color...

Loved the color and the weight of the material. Not too heavy but sturdy enough that it kept its shape well. The straps were a little to big for someone my height and I had to pin it but other than that no faults with this cutsie dress. You'll get lots of compliments!

links_reviews_title: Perfect summer dress for the islands
links_reviews_text: Wore this to a girls night out before my wedding. It was very comfortable but I heeded the previous reviews and ordered a size larger due to the non stretchy material. Easy to dance in.

links_reviews_title: Loved this dress!! No bra needed. A bit short.
links_reviews_text: Easy to wear, good amount of material. Great cut and fit. Flouncy & flattering. Hide the stomach pouch well!!

links_reviews_title: Looked like I was trying to wear my daughters clothes
links_reviews_text: Such a cute pattern and style but NOT for taller girls. I rented the large because reviews said it ran short. The large was big on the top but the biggest issue was that the flare started at my rib cage instead of at my waist because of my height. Darling dress for a more petite gal!

This dress is a hot little number! It is extremely fitted in the rib cage--from just below the boobs to the natural waist. I wasn't sure if I would get it zipped, but once done it was like second skin. While small through the upper rib cage, the boobs have plenty of room due to the tie in front. This combination makes for a very boob-a-licious dress! I kept it for two weeks hoping for the right occasion, but never felt it was the appropriate. The dress, made with fine quality fabric and an extra full skirt bests lends itself to a party or event. It is a party dress. I had hoped that I could wear it out to dinner on the weekend. It's not just that it was a little dressy but I felt I needed a date, an escort, in such a boob-a-licious dress. I have returned the dress, but have an annual party in the Spring and think this would be perfect.

links_reviews_title: Super short so added an orange mini skirt
links_reviews_text: I used pins to wrap the front tie so that there was no Skin showing for work. I added a fun flower pin to hold the wrap place
The amount of fabric overwhelmed my small frame and the waist fell more on my upper Ron age because I am so short. I also could not get the sash to tie like on the model. Returned without wearing

I wore this dress to a barbecue get together with friends and it looked great; although the fabric is nice enough to wear at a formal party. It is light, flirty, pretty girlie and it shows your chest.

So as everyone says this dress runs small especially if you're top heavy. I usually wear a Medium, but since someone with a similar bust to mine recommended ordering larger and thank goodness I did. Dress fit well and was a hit! Very cute, light and comfortable for a summer wedding!

Loved this dress- the skirt is extremely flattering and the top is not too revealing but still gives a sexy neckline. A couple of things to note- had I put this dress on the conventional way, it would not have fit. The top is extremely snug- I ended up loosening the chest tie before sipping up the dress and once in was zipped, adjusted the tie. Also- I have a very short torso so the waistband hit right at the narrowest part of my waist and had my torso been longer (or even normal length) it may not have been as flattering. The fabric is stunning and the photo really doesn't do the colors justice.

Loved this dress! I'm so glad RTR has the AI to size-predict cause I'd never have ordered an XL on my own but it was the correct size for me (I'm usually a M/L). This dress was cute and fun, got lots of compliments, photographed well. I did wear shorts under but I'm also hella tall and we bike a lot so gotta careful. Also there was unexpected underboob situation but it was ok.
I'm in love with the pinup vibes of this dress.

I am 5'3" and 120 lbs. I usually wear a 4 or a S but I rented a M based on reviews and it fit perfectly. I didn't need to wear a bra because you can adjust the tightness in the chest by tying it. The color is fabulous and it was a great length. Would definitely rent again!

Fit and flare braless wonder that should work for all boob sizes since the bold pattern and big bow cover the girls with cute confidence. I'm flat with 2 different sized boobs, 32 A & B, but you couldn't tell at all which was a fun perk because I usually need to wear a bra. Luxe material, elevated pattern and flirty style (I'm only 5'5" and it's on the shorter size so please take note long legged and long torso beauties) in a rusty orange that worked with nude, metallic or orange shoes. Wore for an outdoor baby shower and received tons of compliments. Would totally rent again!

I rented a medium, which is my current size in Alexis & I needed at least 6" more material to even think about zipping it over my chest. It measures 15" across the chest with no give. I'm 5'2" 135lb 36D & doubt I could even wear an XL. If you have any chest at all, size up. If you have a large chest, don't bother.
Love it

The weather changed in a day and I was unable to work this into my wardrobe with the dropped temperature. It was so flattering. True to size. Created an awesome shape for my petite frame. I wish I had a chance to wear it!
Loved the fit and fuller skirt. Great for dancing and summer fun. Cute cut out too! Super feminine!
runs small through ribcage

links_reviews_title: Obsessed with this dress! Perfect for tropical wedding.
links_reviews_text: This dress is everything. I love the shape, the lightweight fabric (for hot weather), the ties, the length... it's just so cute. I received many compliments!

I rented an XL and was unable to zip the dress AT ALL. I am usually a size 8 in dresses but this dress was TINY. The shape was adorable and I desperately wanted to make it work but there was no chance. Do not recommend.
I couldn't zip this. If you're large busted, beware even the XL may be too small.
Cute but small through the bust and ribcage not the most comfortable. Size up.
kind of an odd cupcake like dress in fit and color.
Didn't wear this, but it was a fun party dress! XL fit for a usual size 8.

links_reviews_title: Did not wear it, I am usually an XSmall but on this dress I would be a Small.
links_reviews_text: Did not wear it

Look at the picture, I wish I had paid more attention, because even in the picture you can tell that is a very short torso dress. I have a long torso so the skirt falls way above my waist, almost imperial waist. I felt a looked pregnant, nothing wrong with that if you are but I'm not:). I ordered a small, I'm usually an xs. It was actually to large on top on me even though most pf the reviews say is small. For reference i'm a 32-C bust, so I'm thin below the bust. Cute dress I would recommend if you are petite with a shorter torso.

The dress was super cute and flattering on! I'm usually a Medium but got this in a Large and it fit perfectly. I wore it to an engagement party and got lots of compliments! I would definitely recommend!

links_reviews_title: Really nice fabric. Sized up from reviews which was smart
links_reviews_text: Runs a little tight as reviewers note but is forgiving in hips and the tie front helps too. Not usually my colors but I really like this dress and the fabric is super nice

I'm glad I size up. I'm usually a L in the Alexis brand, but got a XL in this one. It's very fitted at the rib cage. Dress have no stretch. Wore it for a Mother's Day brunch and got compliments all day long.

This dress has a flowy bottom and a side zipper, so while there is no problem getting the dress past the butt, and even the stomach, it runs very small on the chest. I am only a 34B and yet a size 4 could not zip up past my chest. I would definitely recommend sizing up, just for this reason.
This dress was perfect for my trip to Hawaii. Unfortunately I found that it runs small and has absolutely no stretch. The straps were a little long despite the tightness.
A cutie but runs super small. I typically wear a large, sometimes a medium but the XL fit really snug, couldn't bring the zipper up. XL would fit a small or small/medium.
Runs very small. I am usually an XS in Alexis and couldn't zip this. It runs very short too.
Was too snug for my chest.
Rented this for my 30th birthday party! It was perfect and fun! Snug through the chest so sized up. Paired with a coral cardigan and some fun sandals.

links_reviews_title: So much fun for a summer party!
links_reviews_text: I loved everything about this dress, it was so fun and flowY for my in-laws 50th wedding anniversary party!

The dress was super flattering for a pear shaped figure and was very comfortable. Perfect for this rehearsal dinner in Mexico. My only complaint is that this piece has started to pill on the top white part.

I absolutely loved this dress! I rented both the XL and 1X and like the 1X better because the strap changes from tiny little spaghetti style to real straps that can cover a bra. It was light airy and had pockets which was great for a event at the Zoo. It does have some weird darts that makes the 'girls' a little more evident but it was so perfect everywhere else I didn't care at all!
This dress is so comfortable and so cute! A regular strapless bra was easy to wear and jewelry could be simple since it was so colorful. Would rent this one again!

links_reviews_title: Nice dress for a rehearsal dinner!
links_reviews_text: Great fit! I feel like you can dress this up or down with different shoes and accessories. Noticed several stains on the dress, but they were not noticeable to other people. I might have received a heavily rented dress! Overall, I really liked the dress though- colors are my favorite.

links_reviews_title: Beautiful dress, just not for me
links_reviews_text: This dress just wasn't for me. Too big on the top, you can see the "breast lines" (no idea what to call those things) start below my breasts, which just looks weird. The waist was a bit too big, and hit awkwardly on my hips and was not flattering to my waist. I agree with some of the other reviews- may be better for for women with less hips!

links_reviews_title: Comfortable dress with pockets! Love Love Love!
links_reviews_text: Fit was perfect! I wore the small (ordered medium, just in case) but since I am 34A, the small worked just fine - I went without a bra, and had no issues - the top is a little thick/lined so that helps. LOVE that it has pockets and was comfortable all night for a summer wedding. I was a little worried that the high/low skirt would look odd, since I am taller - but the front wasn't too short and the back wasn't too long either. For reference, I am 5'-10"/163 lbs with a long torso - this was a super flattering dress and I got compliments on it all night! I only wish I could buy this dress to keep forever!
The dress fit nicely! The bottom part came wrinkled but once I got outside it was fine. I love that it has pockets!
Fit was true to size, I wore the large and was comfortable. I loved the length and it even had pockets‚ÄîI would definitely rent again!
I rented this outfit (earrings, necklace, dress) for family photos. I loved the whole thing together. Hopefully the pictures turn out well!!

Medium fit perfectly! I have a small chest but a big back so I always order a large as well just in case but still had breathing room in the medium. So many compliments, I love RTR dresses! Perfect for a summer baby shower on the lake :) it was comfortable and light.
Great fit! Great flow!

Loved this dress for engagement photos and an engagement party -- it was flattering and loved the flowy-ness of the dress. I normally wear a size 6, maybe an 8, and the small was perfect. The medium was a bit too baggy. Loved that the dress had pockets! Received so many compliments. Would definitely recommend!
I wore this dress to my bridal shower and loved it! It fit me really well and I got a ton of compliments on it. Great fit and feel. Quality material.

links_reviews_title: Perfect dress for an engagement party!
links_reviews_text: The dress fit perfectly! It was just tight enough on top to make you feel tucked in and secure, but flowy on the bottom so you could eat/drink and not worry! I ended up sizing down to the small as the medium was just a bit big under the arm holes and was nervous that it would rub. The dress was absolutely perfect - my fiance even asked if I could buy it after the party :)

I wore this all day at a conference, and even into the evening it was super comfortable. The MR actually fit better than the LR because I wanted the top a bit tighter so I wouldn't have to wear a bra. Lots of compliments!

links_reviews_title: The process of receiving the dress on time.
links_reviews_text: First time renting from the site and I was not disappointed one bit from the process. The dress arrived well in advance that gave me a chance to try on and exchange for another size if necessary. The dress fit like a glove. I wore it for my nieces graduation. The dress was so comfortable. If you have a big bust you must go the next size up. Other than that I received so many compliments.

Dress fit true to size, but the cut wasn't as flattering on my hips as I would have liked. I have a fairly hourglass shape, but definitely wide hips and I think this dress accentuated them. Loved the material and the feel of the dress - the high-low skirt was great. You definitely need a strapless bra.

I'm usually a size 4 in dresses. Both the XSR and SR fit, but I preferred the XSR because it was more fitted up top. The dress was really comfortable for eating, drinking, and dancing at a wedding. It can be dressed up or down. Overall, it was a great dress and I'd recommend it!

The style of this dress is amazing and the fit on this dress was so flattering with the fitted top and flowy skirt. I wore it for a dressier communion on a Sat night with platform sandals and a more casual one the next day with flat sandals and a denim jacket. The straps are looking a little worn but probably not noticeable to anyone not wearing the dress. I didn't see a problem with the nips the way other women did but I did have to wear a strapless bra, my girls just sagged without one. Great rental, wish I could buy this one but glad I got to wear it twice!

links_reviews_title: I wore this to my rehearsal dinner for my wedding. It was perfect!
links_reviews_text: I probably could have gone with a small, but it still fit pretty well. It is forgiving on people like me with larger hips. I wish I could buy this dress! I also loved the pockets! I definitely felt great!

This dress was perfect for my Goddaughter's baptism. The top was thick enough and wasn't see through. The length was good for being 5 feet 3 inches. The only downside was the zipper (which was on the side) was a bit tricky. I ended up wearing the medium.

links_reviews_title: When can I buy this dress?!
links_reviews_text: This was a back up dress sent to me for my wedding weekend. I wore it the night before our rehearsal during "welcome to town" cocktail hour. It was amazing!! I want to buy this dress so bad! It was so so cute and super comfy! Loved how it looked and how I felt in it! Great for a causal event that you still want to "Dress up" for.

links_reviews_title: This dress is perfect for vacation! I am a 38DD and 180lbs. Could have done a L
links_reviews_text: #vacation

I rented this dress to wear to an outdoor wedding. The top is knit and so so comfortable. The flowy skirt is so feminine and pretty and I felt beautiful in this dress all day. I would have bought it if I had other events to go to. Highly recommend!
Loved this dress for our spring engagement party. It is so comfortable and pretty.
I agree with the other reviews, the darts in the bust are terrible and look like nips for sure. Not sure how flattering it was on me, but it was super comfortable!
Fit is super flattering. Side zipper. Print of the skirt is beautiful. 10/10
Paired with an asymmetrical black sweater for a cooler and casual day. Layered with Jean jacket / got compliments galore.

I'm 5'10" and very hippy so I'm always wary of A-line dresses, but this was SO GORGEOUS on me. I have strong shoulders so the top looked great and I loved the flow of the bottom. It's a little staticy but it was fine. I didn't need to wear a bra but you could pull off one if necessary. Tons of compliments all day and my favorite part was obviously the pockets!!!
It was very flattering. Perfect dress for dinner and a late night stroll on the beach. I would rent again.

I wore for a baby shower and received lots of compliments. Material is great and didn't require any ironing. The top is a thicker cotton and a nude strapless bra worked perfectly. The dress also has pockets which is a bonus!

This is a great dress! Super flattering, forgiving and yes, girl, it has POCKETS! I'm pear shaped, with a small chest. Wore a nude strapless bra comfortably. You could go brakes, the upper fabric is heavy. The skirt is floaty and leaves a train when you walk. Very fun to dance in. It was a hot Minnesota August wedding at a golf course. It kept me as comfortable at I could be in the temps and humidity.
A bit long for me, but cute. Top was nice, thick material and skirt was very flowing.
Colors, flow; and flatter. That's all you need for a perfect summer dress!
Amazing dress, Easy to wear and looks amazing. Effortless Glamour.. and it travels well! This was one of my favorites.

links_reviews_title: So many compliments, so much bourbon at this Chicago architectural wedding
links_reviews_text: Super comfortable tank top feel, upper fabric was thick and stretchy enough to let me get away without a bra or those sticky nipple covers. IT HAS POCKETS Y‚ÄôALL.

Loved this dress the colors, the style was perfect. The top was a little too big for me, but there was space for someone who's a little bustier. I took the photos after our birthday dinner So my belly was pretty full, but I thought the flowy dress covered it nicely. Also, POCKETS!!

This dress was soooo comfy! Perfect for an outdoor summer wedding! I received complements all night and everyone wanted to know where I got it! I also rented the L and it also fit very well, just a tad too loose in the chest. The M was perfect on me. Very flattering shape and didn't hinder my dancing at all. The bodice fabric has some stretch so it fit great with my strapless bra. I would buy this dress if I could!

links_reviews_title: Unique details and fun pop of color
links_reviews_text: This top is the perfect color for summer or fall. It is a premium knit material with fun back detailing. Length was perfect, but it was a bit large in the shoulders. Sleeves are very long, but you can see that in model photos

links_reviews_title: I LOVED the color but the sleeves were crazy long
links_reviews_text: The sleeves were so so long. The whole fit ran big but particularly the arms. Other than that it would've been so cute and flattering.

This is stretchy and works well for a larger chest. You can wear a normal bra with it which I loved. I got a lot of compliments on the color and felt the fit was very flattering! Perfect rental because it's very memorable

links_reviews_title: Pop of color and fun cut!
links_reviews_text: I wanted to LOVE this top. Just a slightly awkward fit, but I think most people wouldn't notice. Definitely a stand out color. Sleeves were a little too loose and unfortunately rtr forgot to send the white strap that is part of the top. So those white tabs kept sticking out despite my tucking them in.
Beautiful fabric, nice fit and well made.

I can't say enough about this awesome top. Great fabric. Amazing fit. The back is so cute. I loved it. Received tons of compliments. Would be great for summer too, with white jeans. It's not a heavy fabric
What made it memorable was I looked like a sausage casing.. lol. Did not wear. It was extremely tight in the shoulders and bust.
wore this to happy hour and drinks and friends and it definitely made a statement! wore with casual jeans and felt great!!!!

I probably rented this for the wrong time. It's a cute enough sweater, though the wrap around part looked weird on me - I think another reviewer said this, but it looked more like a second set of sleeves than like a pretty tie, which I'm all in favor of. Didn't end up wearing this.

links_reviews_title: The top was cute but too long in the arms and to heavy to wear in Los Angeles

links_reviews_text: The sleeves were super long and sloppy.

NEON orange- which is typically outside my wheelhouse but was into it upon arrival! Very vivid. The material was luxurious. Stretchy kind of athletic sweater feel. My issue was the fit- sleeves were so long! Covered my hands. The white elastic strap is removable (I dk why?) and adjustable, which I suppose is nice. The medium was tight on my Size C boobs, but made the girls look nice- I would just need petals or a sticky with this top cause it was nice and fitted in the chest. Now the wrap was another story- it's adjustable where you wrap it if you wanna make it more cropped you can or could make it longer BUT the ties looked like two extra sleeves hanging at my waist. Just an odd fit! If you have long arms and are cool with your midsection and the neon orange, rent this!

Rented for a wedding and was very comfortable. It could have used more room in the best as I felt a little squished but the color was so nice and the slit and cut out made it sexy but still classy. Material is a little stretchy though not much. I probably could have sized up for a little extra room but the length of the 6 was good for my frame.

links_reviews_title: Boyfriend's son's wedding with ALL his relatives!
links_reviews_text: Absolutely stunning! The right amount of slit, too.
This dress was so comfortable and easy to move and dance in all night!

links_reviews_title: So glad I ordered a long!
links_reviews_text: I am about 5' 9.5" and with 2 inch heels, the long was the perfect length! This was for a black tie wedding and was comfortable, flattering, I received so many compliments. The reason I ranked it a 4 instead of 5 was because it was a little tight around the chest and the material/color seemed a bit worn. Would definitely rent again though!
Unique fit and color for a stand out dress. Highly recommend.
This dress fit like a glove. The materias was perfect for a winter wedding in Texas. Got lots of compliments.
I felt very elegant in this but also that it had just the right amount of peek a boo features. Sexy but still appropriate for my formal work affair.

links_reviews_title: Comfortable and elegant for formal event.
links_reviews_text: Dress was a little long however very flattering. Lots of compliments.

links_reviews_title: Delivery came early! This was my first experience with RTR and I will definitely consider them again
links_reviews_text: So glad the 8R fit - the backup 6R I ordered had seen better days. The seams were shiny from too many ironings and the hem was quite frayed. Having said that, the dress was stunning and very comfortable for a formal New Years' Eve wedding. Everything stayed in place and it was well-cut for walking and dancing.

I chose this dress to wear to a formal wedding. It was pretty maroon color and I got lots of compliments on it! The cutout made me a little worried about a wardrobe malfunction (it was more revealing than I expected) but I was able to dance the night away without any problems! I ordered both an 8 and a 10 and the 10 was the most flattering.

links_reviews_title: The color of this dress is the best part
links_reviews_text: Wore this dress for my Engagement photos. The color is why I chose it but the fit and material are also great. I felt hugged in all the right places and the slit was super fun and added some flair.

This dress was great for a December desert wedding. Perfect color, I loved the classy one shoulder style and the slit added some sexiness. Even though it was a size long, it was a bit short on me with my heels, but I'm 5'10.5" and my heels were 4in. I would have loved for it to hit the floor like in the photo. The midsection was a bit roomy; I'm not a true size 6, a little smaller in the waist and bigger in the bust. All in all, it was very comfortable and I got so many compliments.

links_reviews_title: Lots of excellent comments on how much people liked the dress.
links_reviews_text: For was great with nice thick material to hold everything in. I'm 5'1" and I wore standard heels so dress was a hair too long, but not enough where I stepped on it all night, but did have to hold up while I was dancing. Love this dress!

I was hesitant at first only reserving one size, but turned out this dress fit perfect! I am 5'2 125Lb and 32C bust. The dress fit perfect. It was about an inch too long with heels, I used fashion tape for the bottom and never had a problem. Would rent again!

This is a very pretty dress although I didn't wear it. I rented both a 0 and a 2 and the 0 was VERY small. My hips are wide so the 2 fit better there but my bust still didn't fill out the top. The way the dress is designed, I couldn't wear a strapless bra because you could see it and a sticky bra still didn't fill it out enough. I think if the strap was shorter, maybe my and inch or two, the dress would have fit MUCH better. Pretty dress just not for me.

links_reviews_title: Somehow gave me curves and a waist (black magic)!
links_reviews_text: I unfortunately was not able to actually attend the wedding, but I'm in love with this dress. I have an athletic build and am pretty boxy but by some sort of black magic, this dress made me look beautifully curvy and as if I have a small waist. Loved the one shoulder, I felt stunning in this. The fabric was thick enough to hide any insecurities but still lightweight overall. I'm 5'5" and wore my little 1-1.5" heels - hem of the dress just grazed the floor. Color is a dark brick/deep wine.

I wore this to a black tie gala. The fit was perfect all over with the exception of a tiny bit of gaping in the chest and under the left arm (to be fair, I didn't wear a bra). I normally wear a 4 and found the 4L fit me best. I wore 3" heels and the dress just reached the bottom of my shoes. Super happy with my choice and would definitely rent again for a formal event.

links_reviews_title: I got so many compliments on this dress- It was very flattering!
links_reviews_text: This was actually my back up dress and ended up fitting much better fit than I imagined it would be. The color is so fun and a nice flattering alternative to wearing black. I typically wear a size 6 or 8. However due to the lack of give in the material and it being a little more form fitting, I ended up wearing a size 10 and it fit perfectly. I wore 3" heels and am 5'9" and the 10L ended up being the perfect length.

links_reviews_title: It worked for the purposes I needed it for.
links_reviews_text: I really loved this dress in the pictures and the reviews seemed like it would work for my body. I'm pretty petite, so it was a little bit big all over. I wore a silicon sticky bra, which helped the top, but kept having to readjust all evening since it was just a bit big. It worked, but I wouldn't wear it again, although if I had a little bit more to fill it, I might feel differently. Some of the other reviews said the dress kind of stretched as the night wore on, which was even true for me, despite the fact my body wasn't filling it out quite right.
The thickness of the material and snug fit kept everything in place and I didn't have to keep adjusting as much as I typically do.

This dress fit my hips and waist beautifully but there was extra fabric at the top. I have a short torso, and a small busy line, which resulted in the top feeling a bit ill fitting. I‚Äôm 5‚Äô1, and wore 3 inch heels making the length perfect. The leg slit is a sexy touch but i still felt covered and appropriate. The color is PERFECTION. The fabric is nice and thick, so I didn‚Äôt wear spanks (think smooth skin). I would recommend this dress.

I am curvier so I think you should size up if hippier. I went with 6L Bc I didn't order 8L but 8 would've been better. The material is thicker so no light jacket was needed for the evening breeze. The stretch allowed me to eat and dance without feeling stuffed in a dress. I really loved the slit in the one shoulder. It's very flirty. I kept my look simple. I wore earrings, gold bangle, gold clutch, black/gold heels, sleek hair, ring, and glam neutral makeup. My measurements 36 top, 27 mid, 40 hip. My husband loved me in the dress and I received many compliments!
The fit was amazing, loved the neckline and the slit. Rented it for a black tie wedding and loved it. Would recommend

links_reviews_title: Beautiful dress! So happy I used RTR for this event!
links_reviews_text: Definitely a beautiful dress that is comfy enough to be able to eat and dance in. No need to wear a bra; the fabric is thick enough to not reveal anything. I felt glamorous in this dress. Maybe would suggest some fabric tape for the top non-strap side since it's been tugged on by everyone who has worn it. I didn't use any, but that was the only thing I was considering using for the event.

links_reviews_title: . Mistaken for black throughout night but captured it here in this photo
links_reviews_text: Fit was perfect.
super comfortable. sexy but classy. would highly recommend!
This dress was beautiful. Thick material was very flattering even though dress was tight! I did wear the backup larger size though. Got lots of compliments!

links_reviews_title: The dress is a beautiful and classy style and cut - very flattering
links_reviews_text: I rented this dress for my sons wedding and needed it to be maroon-to match the wedding theme. this dress is NOT maroon or burgundy- this dress is plum/eggplant- I was upset with this rental due to the color discrepancy. I was also upset that I was unable to get the replacement in time to choose another dress. Since I had no other choice I wore the purple dress so I was denied a refund. If it had not been for that - the dress is beautiful and fits well - but it is NOT maroon as the name suggests. I will not be using this service again

links_reviews_title: My man loved the fit of this dress! So comfy to dance in as well
links_reviews_text: #sexy and a show stopper!
Great fit, is definitely true to size, extremely comfortable!

This is a stunning dress. The material was different than I expected-- it felt kind of like a soft denim-- but it holds you in in all the right places. The cut is also very sophisticated and the seaming along the bodice gives it some more added interest. I got compliments all night!

This dress was great, heavy stretchy fabric, great slit and one shoulder detail. I sized up because I am pear shaped and I need the extra hip room with straight dresses. Didn‚Äôt end up wearing this one because the color was a little weird, almost brown. Otherwise, great dress!

This dress is everything I had hoped it would be and more! It not only fit really well, but the material is super comfortable! It's the perfect combination of cute and sexy! If you're looking for a formal event dress, look no further. I promise you won't be disappointed with this dress.

links_reviews_title: Back up dress ended up being the winner! Rent the Runway quick and efficient with their service.
links_reviews_text: I'm a nurse and brought my man to a Nurses' Ball. I received SO many compliments on the dress. Multiple women wore bold colors like black, red, or blue... so the burgundy stood out in a unique kind of way since it isn't the very first color people consider wearing. The design is lovely and not restricting as I thought it would be since it crosses across the chest. It really accentuated my features: slightly wider shoulders, slightly big bust, smaller waist, and narrow hips with a shaped booty. Haha, my bust is a bit more than my lower half; this dress made my lower half look a little more as I would like it to be so it was really nice. This wasn't originally my dress and my original one came in the day before the event in the early afternoon. So Rent the Runway was nice enough to have the option of ordering a backup by 6PM online! It arrived the next day which was the day of the event and it arrived early in the afternoon again.

links_reviews_title: Perfect dress for a formal spring wedding!
links_reviews_text: Fit like a glove, even had room to wear a strapless bra.

links_reviews_title: Size down. The material is stretchy and forgiving.
links_reviews_text: I was happy with this dress! Flattering and comfortable

links_reviews_title: Amazing dress, didn‚Äôt want to return it!
links_reviews_text: I ordered both a 2L and 4L. The 4L was a more comfortable fit, but it was 2 inches shorter, which was strange. I wore the 2 because the length was perfect. The material was great, thick enough to not need to wear a bra. Color was beautiful, so many compliments.

Absolutely loved this dress! The material is nice and heavy and the slit wasn't too high. I'm 5'8" but all torso so I was worried about the slit. It fit great and felt appropriate for a formal work event. It was a little too long for me with 2 3/4" heels (per the recommendation on the site I got the long length) but other than that it was perfect.

links_reviews_title: Beautiful color, great design, well made, so many compliments!
links_reviews_text: I typically wear a size two, but it was unavailable so I went with a size four-runs true to size so it wasn't as form fitted as it is meant to be. I received so many compliments on the dress and it was SO COMFORTABLE!!

This was the backup dress I ordered for a formal work event. I wound up wearing the one I had originally intended to wear, but this one made it tough to choose. It was a little lower cut up top than I needed for this event, but I loved the fit of this dress and will probably rent it at some point for a future event!
Very flattering dress! Great color and very comfortable.

links_reviews_title: Definitely clings to your curves but adorable!
links_reviews_text: Wore this to Carrie Underwood concert. I was so self conscious with the cutouts but my husband loved it. Definitely hugs your curves! I had bread at dinner and immediately you could tell. Lol. Beautiful color with blue eyes!!

I rented this dress for clubbing. I'm 5'8, 123lbs and a size small fits perfectly. This dress has a thick material so it's forgiving but still hugs your curve well. I would recommend this dress for date night or going out!
Great dress for homecoming party. Cut outs gave it a nice playful look.

Fun dress for weekend or casual wear, but would have liked it better if I didn't have to wear a strapless bra. I THOUGHT I could wear it with a racerback bra, but the front is cut too deep so the straps showed. Would probably be better for those with a smaller bust as I found myself adjusting the top piece several times during the day. I wore it with a mid-heel, but it would look great with flat sandals for a more casual look. The fabric is stretchy but thick so it holds its shape while being very comfortable.
This dress fits so well! It's stretchy and not very tight, but hugs all the right places. You'll feel amazing in it!

links_reviews_title: Wore this out to a dance club
links_reviews_text: This dress is very cute. The material is so forgiving. I did order a medium because that was all that was availble but a small would have been much bigger. The dress kind of hung off of me. So cute though

This dress i feel will work with most body types. The fabric is thick and stretchy and the design is flattering/slimming. Not too tight. Very fun and flirty. A bra is not needed. Perfect for a night of dancing!
Really comfortable fabric, also very thick fabric. I felt like the neck was too long for someone my height, I felt my breasts would fall out of the armholes so I did not wear it. Otherwise I loved it

Rented this for a girls trip to Nashville. Ran a bit large and was longer than I hoped. Flattering fit but wish I would have gone with the XS. Almost looks like denim but is a soft cotton-like material. However, the material is on the thicker side, so it's more forgiving.
This dress fit perfectly and was very flattering! I got a lot of compliments! Beautiful color. I loved the top portion of the dress. Got to show off my shoulders! Loved it!
Wore a size 4 and it fit me great!! Perfect color and length!

links_reviews_title: Stunning cut outs and beautiful color
links_reviews_text: Thick material, no need to wear a bra.

links_reviews_title: I wore this dress for a bachelorette.
links_reviews_text: If I could purchase this dress, I would ! I had a baby 5 months ago and was a bit concerned that the dress would show too much, but I literally never wanted to take it off. It covered all of the areas that I did not want out. I felt sexy and confident in the dress !
Fun dress yet very Elegant!
Dress was beautiful and material was thick although not warm at all - I have a short torso and it fit just fine - although a longer and taller body would fit best Cute for casual day out in Miami

links_reviews_title: Perfect dress for Vegas! True to size and very durable fabric.
links_reviews_text: The fit was perfect. The RTR photos show a lot more skin, in reality there was a lot more coverage of my abdomen and back. The fabric was like a sweater, but it was 112 degrees Fahrenheit in Vegas and I wasn't too hot! So it's breathable. Loved it!

links_reviews_title: great dress for girls weekend in miami
links_reviews_text: Loved the dress! Thick material and great color. It seemed a little worn though from rentals and was long for someone who was 5'4 but great dress overall. I was between the M and the S and I'm glad that I ordered both because the Medium was too big

links_reviews_title: Awesome dress to dance the night away in!
links_reviews_text: Great fabric, structured fit, unexpected style. I wore this for NYE and felt glamorous and comfortable all night.
The dress was comfy and cute. I have a short torso and it was a bit long through the center

links_reviews_title: Perfect Vegas dress! Fun & flirty with the cut outs.
links_reviews_text: It was slightly stretched out on top. So if you have a smaller bust you may need a thicker/padded bra. I loved the cut outs & the blue color!

links_reviews_title: Great night out at dinner and drinking with friends!
links_reviews_text: The dress was a great fit. It is a beautiful color, flattering style, and is very comfortable. The fabric is a little strange and stiff, but did not affect the overall look.

The dress arrived a little worn looking but that did not show at night. The zipper did not lay flat on my booty. I received a lot of compliments and thought the dress looked great from the front. Be careful how you stand as my fat bulged out a bit in pictures when I angled my body to the side.

First of all My boyfriend picked this out for me to wear and I was worried it would be showing too much skin for a wedding, BUT I wanted to keep this dress on forever. This photo is actually the next morning when I wanted to wear it to breakfast too! I have a very athletic build so I'm lean but I weigh a lot. This is the S and fit great! I could tell the medium would've been fine on top but really frumpy on the bottom half. I have big hips so this fit well and I wore spandex underneath to make it even more comfortable! I wore this to a wedding and although the material feels thicker than I would've expected I was not sweaty from it. We don't dress up too often and I wanted to stay in this dress for days! LOVE this dress and would BUY it if I could and never take it off! :) Oh and that's my dog- she likes to pose for photos. :)

links_reviews_title: Just a comfortable, cool, trendy cut everyday dress.
links_reviews_text: I should have ordered the small but the medium was all that was available but was just fine for a comfortable, casual everyday look. True to size. The fabric is very quality and heavy...perfect for a luncheon.
Loved this dress! Fit perfect! Not too short , just the right amount of cut outs

I originally ordered a different dress that didn't work out so got this as a replacement. I loved this dress. They only had a medium so it was a little big and I could have used a small but I taped up the bottom of the dress and it worked out perfectly. The material is think and lays beautifully. I wish I owned this dress. And props to rent the runway for fixing a crummy situation and making my birthday perfect!

links_reviews_title: Cut outs were fun yet classy!
links_reviews_text: extremely comfortable material and the cutouts were surprisingly very flattering. I wore to a bachelorette party in Chicago and it was perfect! I also had a cast on my leg at the time it was great with that! The length was good but I thought it did run a little large so if you are between sizes I would go with the smaller one.
Material is comfortable and stretchy, yet hugs in all the right places.

Rented this for a night out in Vegas. The cut outs make this dress HOT, but tasteful. Fabric is thick and stretchy, so no need to wear a bra or Spanx. I got a ton of compliments from everyone, including strangers. I will most definitely rent this one again!

links_reviews_title: Dress is so cute and the fabric is forgiving
links_reviews_text: True to size. The fabric is flattering and is not too tight. The dress is not too short. I would totally rent again.

links_reviews_title: Cute dress. Flattering. Uncomfortably short however if you run long in the torso.
links_reviews_text: Cute dress. In retrospect, I might have held on to it for an evening dress rather than for a day time excursions. It was way to short for me personally, so I probably won't be going back for seconds. But overall it was flattering.

links_reviews_title: wish i could buy this dress!
links_reviews_text: so many compliments. great/forgiving fit, perfect length, and really comfortable...would buy it outright if it wasn't a $500 dress!

links_reviews_title: This dress fits like a glove and is so unique
links_reviews_text: Fits true to size, I think a smaller bust works best,the fabric is a great semi stretchy fabric and I could go braless without any worry. Easy to dress up or down! I got tons of compliments! A fabulous little number !

Awesome cut-out style, perfect for a night out! Running on the small size, we recommend sizing up for backup. I don't typically love cut outs that hit at the hips, but this dress was surprisingly flattering! The material is thick and has a good amount of stretch allowing for you to go braless or wear a nubra, but the minimal bust support makes this dress best for cup sizes A-C. Hips are fitted, so definitely size up if you're curvier. At 5'7" the length hit at about mid thigh. Pair with wedges and gold jewelry.
It fit great! Super comfortable and I got lots of compliments.

I rented this for a girls trip to Vegas. I didn't end up wearing it as I went with another option. However, I liked the fit and flare of the dress. The cut outs were fun and the color was a cool blue. I'd rent it again for a fun night out.

links_reviews_title: Just the right amount of sexy
links_reviews_text: I wore this to a show in Vegas and felt comfortable and confident all night. I was skeptical the cutouts would be too much skin but they weren't. As I was expecting from other reviews, the fabric looks worn and the neckline has stretched out a bit. Otherwise I loved the color and though the dress with tight on my mid section, it smoothed everything out and sucked it in a bit.
L

links_reviews_title: This is a very flattering /sexy dress. I received numerous compliments
links_reviews_text: fit perfect

The fit of this dress was perfect for me; I am usually between and 10 and 12 for dresses and the 10 was perfect. For reference my waist is 31" , fullest part of my hips are 42" and my bust is 38" - I did not wear a bra as they dress was secure enough without it.
I will honestly rent this again. So many compliments and soooo comfortable. The dress had a little built in bralette that made you feel extra supported-even without wearing a bra. Super flattering.

I'm short, have hips, and I'm smaller up top. This dress fit beautifully. Hugged all the right spots. Stayed up. Very flattering due to how it's gathered across the stomach. I I'm normally one that has to try everything on, but this dress was perfect. I got so many compliments!!

Unfortunately my initial order was lost in the mail, and had to re-order for the event three days before. This is the only dress that fit me out of the five I got. Therefore this is the one I wore. It does fit nice with plenty of room in the bust and the slit with a ruffle. My only complaint was it was just kind of boring. Was hoping not to wear black.

links_reviews_title: Perfect formal black dress for vertically challenged ladies!
links_reviews_text: Loved this dress! Nice heavy material for a fall black tie optional wedding. Since I'm so short, I always picks high low dress for formal weddings and this length was perfect. It hugged everything in just right, I didn't have to wear a bra. The slit made it the right amount of sexy. I got so many compliments on this dress. I would definitely rent again.

I rented this for a formal affair but ended up wearing a marchesa dress. This dress was gorgeous though! Would rent again in a heartbeat. It is sexy and classy and it is sooo flattering on an hourglass shape! Can't wait to rent again and wear it all night!

links_reviews_title: Wore this dress for a 1940‚Äôs Tropicana Havana Cuba charitable event.
links_reviews_text: Fit very comfortable and easy to wear. Built in bra big for me, so I wore strap-less double cup padded bra to fill up the space.
Ran a bit big. A size smaller may have been too small. Loved it. Accented with red!
Loved this dress. It was very flattering and the quality was fantastic. You really can't go wrong with a black dress like this one! I would rent it again.

I wore this dress to a ball and received many compliments. It fit true to size with breathing room- no spanx required! The built in bra did nothing since it didn‚Äôt get any tighter than the dress, but it wasn‚Äôt an issue for me. I did have to pull the top up several times during the night but it‚Äôs still a great dress and I would rent it again.

I LOVED this dress and felt beautiful wearing it. True to size and high quality. This was actually my backup dress, but I decided to wear it because it was so flattering on. I believe this dress would look great on a variety of body types. The bottom ruffle was such a fun detail, and the fabric is ruched over the tummy in a way to hide sins. Although strapless, it stayed up with no issue. I felt more comfortable wearing a strapless bra under this dress, but it's designed in a way that you don't necessarily have to. The only negative thing I can say about this dress is that it was a little hard to put on. There is an internal strap around the bust with lots of eye hooks that my husband needed to do for me. Otherwise, it was absolutely perfect!

links_reviews_title: Charity gala and fun night of dancing.
links_reviews_text: Loved this dress. Perfect length. Comfotable to dance in. Has a built-in bra. Form-fitting, but fabric camouflages a lot. Could probably have worn one size smaller, but it was comfortable.
Wore this to dinner in Las Vegas. Heavy material. Perfect for winter!!
Gorgeous dress. Rented this for a black tie optional wedding and received so many compliments. I felt amazing in this dress and it fit so well!

This dress was form fitting but still great at hiding imperfects. It was very comfortable and the material was high quality. I'm pretty short so I was worried about the length, but it was perfect because of the cut of this dress. I was also worried about it falling down being strapless but it stayed in place most of the night. I received so many compliments on this dress!

There's a built-in bra, which was excellent bc I have a large bust. I'm 5 feet tall and the length was perfect. It wasn't tight or uncomfortable either. Bad part was that the zipper broke while I was standing for a ceremony (Marine Corp ball) and I had to wear it with safety pins lined up the back. Otherwise it was great. Wore with the Kate Spade earrings suggested by a stylist.
The ruffle detail makes this a much more fun black dress and it fit like a glove!

I loved this dress. It runs true to size, but I would suggest, you size up for your back up. Great for any cup size. The stretchy fabric allows comfortable fit through out bust and midsection. There is a good amount of room in the hips and should be worn with a strapless bra.
Loved this sleek black dress with a kick

Tags we're still on when I received this dress - fit like a glove, and loved the quality of the material. Boning up top, but a strapless bra helped shape and keep the dress up nicely. The material is thick, but would recommend spanx to help smooth out the hips. Rouching along the front was so flattering, and the slit with ruffles went juuust high enough (mid thigh). Got compliments all night and felt beautiful. Highly recommend!!!

This dress has the best built in bra that helped it zipper over my relatively broad back. It stayed up through lots of dancing, was a great length on my petite frame, and had the perfect amount of structure to be flattering. Would rent again - loved it!

Easily my favorite dress I have ever rented. It was perfect for the black tie wedding I rented it for and was very comfortable all night. Did not end up wearing a bra and no spandex needed thanks to the fabric!

I wore this dress to a fall wedding in NYC. I felt like it was just OK. I liked that it was form fitting and the way that the waist was gathered was flattering. However, this slit with the ruffles kept moving around and was difficult to sit with. The dress fit well and stayed up for the whole evening without any problems.

I love this feminine look by Cinq √† Sept! Running true to size with some stretch, I recommend going up one size for your back-up. This style is fitted throughout the midsection and fitted at the hips. At 5'8, the length hit tea length on me. This dress works well with any cup size and can be worn with a strapless bra. This style can be worn to a wedding or on a night out. Pair with a strapped sandal heel or a fun peep toe and trendy accessory to complete your outfit!

links_reviews_title: Fit like a glove and I felt so pretty!
links_reviews_text: I am 5'9 135 and the 6 fit perfect! I got a ton of compliments. Super comfortable too!

links_reviews_title: The dress fit perfectly! So many compliments
links_reviews_text: It fit well everywhere. It wasn't stiff so that really helped. Not much makes my midsection look good from the side but this did! Definitely will rent again and this was my first experience with RTR. Will also be using RTR for many opportunities.
Very flattering and great for dancing

links_reviews_title: Hugs your curves in just the right way
links_reviews_text: Fairly form fitting but looks great!
This dress is so flattering. Get it
Very comfortable, only slightly large in chest area.

links_reviews_title: The fit on this dress is perfect! It's also the perfect length for petite women.
links_reviews_text: The fit on this dress is perfect! It's also the perfect length for petite women.
I rented both the 10r and the 8r and wore the 10. I should have worn the 8 though, because it kept slipping down all night. Very cute dress though and super fun ruffle at the bottom.

links_reviews_title: Comfortable and classy with some flair
links_reviews_text: This is the best dress I‚Äôve ever gotten from RTR. It‚Äôs comfortable, the material is thick enough to forgive any undergarment lines, the strapless top stays up without any pulling, and the skirt was just the right length. Magic! Would rent it again and again!

links_reviews_title: Pretty dress but the bust and stomach area was huge--seemed stretched out.
links_reviews_text: This is a very pretty, well-made dress. I got this with several others for a formal wedding, but ultimately decided I could not wear this. I'm 5', 115lbs, 32C/D. The bust and stomach area were very large, seemed stretched out actually. Even with a strapless bra, the top was too loose :( There are some fabric folds in the stomach area that hang oddly and move around; this is not a good fabric for holding anything in. Otherwise the dress is pretty and looks like it would work for a formal event, but probably not the best choice for petites.

links_reviews_title: Dress fit and looked great! Super flattering
links_reviews_text: When I tried on the size 10, and turned around, the zipper split open... even though it was not tight.... luckily, the size 8 was a much better fit for me... I just wish it wasn‚Äôt missing the top closures on the back.
Very flattering

links_reviews_title: Great black dress, Loved the ruffle and slit.
links_reviews_text: Received tons of compliments and felt great in this dress. I have more of a pear shape and it fit very well. My chest is small, but I danced a ton and never was concerned about pulling the top up, it stayed put all night.

links_reviews_title: Fits well, definitely hugs your curves
links_reviews_text: Fits well, definitely hugs your curves

links_reviews_title: I'm a true 8 by all other brands but RTR, I'm a 10.
links_reviews_text: I'm an 8, needed a 10. Ran small. It would zip, but only if I had someone else dressing me. Couldn't do it on my own. I'm a 36DD, my boobs were lopping out in this dress at a 10. They didn't flop out, but I was cautious. No dancing done, at all. Very pretty and got lots of compliments. Just had to make certain I didn't fall out of the front...
N/A

links_reviews_title: Love this top. I would rent it again.
links_reviews_text: Fit like a dream. Good quality and very comfortable. Received lots of compliments all evening.

links_reviews_title: Show stopper!! Felt amazing in it and so many compliments!
links_reviews_text: Definitely size down, such beautiful material - I was hosting an event so I was walking all over the place and was on stage and it just flowed - I felt like I was on a cloud all night!

links_reviews_title: Perfect top for a dressy casual engagement party!
links_reviews_text: Perfect top for a dressy casual engagement party! I received so many compliments and it was comfortable/easy to wear. I am 5'3 120 lbs and 34B and size 2 fit perfectly.
This top is amazing and I wish I had bought it! The built-in cape-like feature is so unique and beautiful as it billows behind you.

The shape of this top was different than anything I've worn before but I ended up really liking it. I felt stylish and confident both at work and at a rooftop happy hour. I kept it simple and just paired with jeans but I also think it would look great with statement pants. The only con is that it's hard to fasten the buttons at the back of your neck by yourself.
I got so many compliments at work! I wore it twice. The fit was great and it was so unique and elegant

links_reviews_title: Basic top with a bit of drama
links_reviews_text: So classy. Loved the long tails which made it interesting and different.
Beautiful crepe top. The fabric was a little heavy for the Florida summer, but will rent again in the fall. Love the long split in the back. Felt glamorous.
Loved this top, it was simple, elegant and flattering!

links_reviews_title: Trendy, perfect way to take leggings or black pants to the next level
links_reviews_text: I loved the train, it was not too overstated, perfect for happy hour or a night out with the girls or date night. The crop top required the right high wasted bottoms for me as I don‚Äôt like my stomach to show, and I definitely think it‚Äôs best with a tapered or form fitting leg pant or leggings.

Fits amazing for, "that look" and is a visually stunning top. The buttons were very hard to work with. Give yourself 10 minutes and be patient. The blouse I received should have been retired. It was damaged or just super worn but I made it work. I had to iron the heck out of it too!
True to size, wore leggings, covered my butt, super sheen. Loads of compliments
I LOVE this top. One of my colleagues said that I really needed music playing as I walked around. That really sums it up. The fit was great and the flow of the top is just way too fun!

links_reviews_title: I received a ton of compliments. Such a show stopper. A great statement piece for sure!
links_reviews_text: The fit was true to size. The only con I had was the buttons along the center back neck would snag on my hair if it was down. Other than that, loved this top.
Would purchase. A head Turner
Beautiful blouse!! I rented the size 12 and 10. I'm wearing the size 10. I'm upset because I must buy this blouse. Fabulous piece to any wardrobe.

I LOVE this top! Hoping to buy it in the future! The fabric is fabulous...feels high quality. Didn't wrinkle easy. Does run on the large side and definitely would size down a size but it's a lose fit so I felt it was worth the risk of my normal size even though others warned it runs large. I had been eyeing this shirt a while and wanted it for this occasion. Tons of compliments! People said it looked classic and elegant but was unique too.

links_reviews_title: This shirt was a show stopper!! Absolutely gorgeous on
links_reviews_text: Glamorous yet not over the top. Stunning and well made
Love this top. Stylish and comfortable

Wow. This shirt brings the perfect amount of drama to a bachelorette/hen party. It's easy to wear and looks amazing. Thicker fabric, completely opaque. Just loved it. No cons. Note that the lower button on the back is actually Not the button you use, rather there is a hidden inner button. There is a faux loop on the outside that makes you think you're nuts when you can't fit the decorative button through it :p.

Excuse the pic. But it's meant to show that I like this top so much I wore it for just goofy fun! It's extremely soft and silky and comfy. Long enough in front that it doesn't show your belly. Long in back but still kind of shows shape. As it is white it is a little hard to keep clean but then I can just send it back to RTR! Really liked this. Will re-rent, maybe a size smaller.
Loose fitting, high low to

links_reviews_title: This top was a stunner - everyone loved it!
links_reviews_text: Great fit and very chic! I will rent this item again!
