I wore this to an Awards show after after party in Nashville and it was awesomely perfect! Wore with black Mercer pants and a short black leather jacket. The buttons are a bit difficult to get done up but otherwise, true to size, flattering, and fun. You will have to iron this puppy, as it gets really wrinkled in transit.

Loved this top! Did not want to return. Wore multiple times, appropriate for work but also fun night out with friends and Sunday brunch. Cape flows in the wind. The shape of the top in this thicker quality fabric concealed a 5mo baby bump very well.
The fit of this top is great! Such a fun outfit! True to size.

links_reviews_title: I wore it to work and received many compliments
links_reviews_text: Fit was standard and beautiful white shirting with a twist

links_reviews_title: Got tons of compliments. I wore it to both a christening and a women's awards show, where I emcee'd
links_reviews_text: Hides your tummy! It's honestly perfect. No strapless bra or anything else needed.

links_reviews_title: Awesome shape, easy to wear, lots of compliments
I love this top. Unique and well made.
links_reviews_text: This top is awesome. I ordered a size up because I wanted to make sure it was long enough in the front. It was perfect with dark grey linen pants.

I wore this top for engagement photos followed by our engagement party and it was just what I was hoping for. Great fit, super flattering and gives you a really dramatic look. Plus the back has great movement. I wore with leather style leggings and heels and it really popped. Great piece for any party or fun night out.
This top is AMAZING. Tons of compliments. Just get it.
I wore this to a "cocktail" party at a conference. I have never received so many compliments! Sophisticated, comfortable-perfect!

I wore this with a pencil skirt to my board meeting, and got a TON of compliments. I have pretty big boobs for my frame, and this was one of the very few flowy shirts that actually fit like it is supposed to fit. I am obsessed with this top, and am going to have trouble not buying it.
Loved! Got tons of compliments. Felt like A Goddess!
So cute! Great fabric and super classy piece.
Fits a little large
This is drop-dead gorgeous. Simple but statement. Lined, great fabric and drape. Would buy if I could! I'd wear it constantly.
Runs large, baggy, and boxy
Comfortable cotton dress. Low cut but a pin cures that. One star off for no pockets.

links_reviews_title: Nice and light. Lots of cleavage.
links_reviews_text: Fit well. Lots of cleavage. I had to safety pin the chest closed.
I work at QVC and rep the Frye Co. This was the perfect boho dress for one of my shows! I got a ton of compliments. I wore a little cami under it because it came down a little low for TV.
Wore this to a night time event, high humidity. This dress was light weight, airy and perfect. The fit was so comfortable.
I loved this dress! I am bustier and it fit well. I would have purchased this dress, however it looked very worn so I passed on it.

links_reviews_title: Lightweight and perfect for vacation for everyday!
links_reviews_text: Rented this for potential cruise wear and LOVED it. The material is a soft cotton and very lightweight and breathable (which will be perfect for the Caribbean humidity!). The v-neck is a very respectable cut that doesn't show off too much but isn't too conservative either. As an hourglass shape I was nervous this would accentuate my larger hips in a bad way but it surprisingly highlighted them in a nice way. I will definitely be taking this with me on my cruise...and might even end up buying it to keep forever!

links_reviews_title: Comfortable dress perfect for a summer day.
links_reviews_text: The top is a little loose. Opens easily.
This was definitely a size too big for me but still worked out!

links_reviews_title: Love this dress. Runs a little bigger.
links_reviews_text: Dress is beautiful and light, so perfect for a hot day. It runs very big... I should have done a zero but very cute nonetheless

I normally wear a size 8 but was shipped a size 10 and it was a little big but still fit. The top/chest area requires some sticky tape or a cami underneath as I didn't fill the dress out as it's probably meant to be. I got a lot of compliments on it and it was extremely comfortable. Would rent again but in the correct size

links_reviews_title: Wore this during getaway in Austin.
links_reviews_text: The v-neck was too low (and I like low cut) for me and I couldn't get the safety pin to work well with this think fabric. I liked the dress overall and it was fun for an evening of art and nice restaurant. The dress is quite worn at this point in its life and there was a rip near the zipper was overuse.
It is so beautiful, comfortable and flowy. I can wear this to a casual night out of as a day dress. LOVE it!
The top is pretty loose...had to wear a cami under.
Flattering fit for an hourglass figure

Didn't end up wearing this because the shoulder ruffles were a bit large for my style. But overall this is a beautiful dress. Very feminine and pretty. The chest gapped open just a touch which wasn't ideal. But high quality fabric and beautiful cut.
Maybe this would be better suited for a smaller frame, but the fabric was overwhelming on this dress.

SO PRETTY, PERFECT FIT. I have a large bum and small chest and I think it fit perfectly. I wish this dress had pockets.. but all in all this was my favorite out of the 5 items I ordered. LOVEEEEE ... I will have to Iron it, and I think if you don‚Äôt it makes the dress look cheap.

links_reviews_title: Wore it for family pictures on the beach.
links_reviews_text: Comfortable and easy fit

links_reviews_title: Pretty dress but beware of low cut.
links_reviews_text: This dress was very comfortable and fit well - my only complaint is that I had to pin the bust because it was low cut in an unflattering way.

links_reviews_title: Comfortable and light for warm weather but not too bump friendly.
links_reviews_text: I ordered a 6 for extra room for my pregnant (5 months) belly but it was still tight around the belly and very loose in the bust. If I wasn't pregnant I think the 4 would have fit great. I can see where it would be very flattering and forgiving on someone who isn't pregnant.
Very flattering and soft. LOVED IT!
Cute dress, but probably best for spring or summer.
I wore this for my daughter's birthday party. It was so pretty and fit nearly perfect. The chest gaped a little, but I closed it with a safety pin.

links_reviews_title: So many compliments on this dress!
links_reviews_text: I had to pin the front to keep it from showing my chest, but otherwise loved this dress. Dressed it up with heels for a party and it was perfect.
Wore this dress for work, I was extremely large and low cut in the bust (I'm a 34B) and I had to wear a tank underneath and it still was big.

links_reviews_title: Pretty dress, pops open in chest area
links_reviews_text: Such a pretty dress with the flutter sleeves. The neckline is a bit low and is fine when you're standing but when you're sitting it gapes wide open. Still, it's a sweet, romantic summer dress but I would not wear it to a dressy occasion. I would only wear it during the daytime or to a casual summer dinner.
Great Summer everday dress
comfortable

Gorgeous dress - if only weren't so baggy in the chest for me! Fit well everywhere else - BUT when I pinned the front closed it made the shoulders too loose. Would be great for busty ladies! Wish I could have worn...
Lined but thin breathable cotton. Not see through. Cleavage is not revealing unless you sit...
Would've been cute but it was very low cut. Had to send it back.

links_reviews_title: I really liked this dress. I have a small chest and it left a slight gap.
links_reviews_text: I wish I owned it:)

The material was perfect for a daytime event. I thought it ran pretty true to size but I ended up using fashion tape to keep the top down. I'm shorter, 5'3", and it was longer than I would have liked. But that was my only complaint.
I love the print and length of the dress. Unfortunately the front was too low cut and revealing, and not in a good way.

This dress is perfect for a hot summer day ! The fit is true to size. It's made up of mostly cotton so super comfortable! It does get wrinkled pretty fast if traveling but if you have it the night before you will be fine. It's also on the lower cut side but not at an uncomfortable level. Do yourself a favor and rent this dress for a vacation or summer wedding!!!

It runs small, so order up. I am typically a small or medium with a small bust and the large fit perfect in the length and just slightly big around the middle. The tie in the back helps adjust the size. The color, despite being pretty tan, just washed me out. I usually like a blush, but this is more of a tannish blush, so you really have to have the right skin tone to wear. It just ok. It was somewhat fitted around the waist, but still hid a little belly.

links_reviews_title: Easy summer top with a fun back
links_reviews_text: Wore this blouse to a friends birthday party in brooklyn. Fit true to size and didn't have to wear a bra! The back was fun with the big bow tie
Looked great with high waisted jeans!
The straps are long so it sits low in the back (you could see my whole bra) and also sits low in the front. If these could be adjusted to be even shorter then this top would be perfect!
Straps were a bit long so sat low in front. Otherwise, cute top!

The straps were super loose despite being adjustable, so they kept falling down all night which was annoying. I also couldn't figure out if the ruffle was meant to lay inward or outward. Either way, it was a sweet top that would be good on a busty gal in the spring.

links_reviews_title: Really cute top but too big.
links_reviews_text: I was really excited aboutt this top. Thought it would look cute with high waisted jeans for a casual day look, but the straps didn't work it all. They were WAY too big and even though they were adjustable, you can't adjust past the ruffles on the straps so it doesn't give you a lot to work with in terms of getting it to be the right fit. So cute, but didn't work for me.
Flowy in all the right ways and the prettiest back! So cute for a day/night out!
So cute and flowy- my only gripe was that the bow is hard to tie in the back
Thought this was be a little looser but it was too tight in the wrong places
Loved this top, fit true to size, cute tie detail in the back. I received a couple compliments.
Long straps but cute and flowy
A little snug for a small. Agree with other user feedback about the straps

links_reviews_title: Fun top for dinner with friends
links_reviews_text: I wore this top pretty much exactly like the model with dark jeans, sandals, and threw a long cardigan on top. It is fitted in the bust, and I loved the added bow on the back. I would rent this again, hopefully when I am a little more tan! I felt a little washed out in the color.

links_reviews_title: great top for day or night
links_reviews_text: the sweetest feminine top - loved the layers , flowiness, and low back detail
Ran so little, did not look cute on, so short
I thought this was top cute but nothing special.
wear with high waisted jeans as it's a little short on tall people

compliments nonstop! i did find the straps a little long, but it wasn't too bad. if i sized down i think it wldve been too small for my chest so i would say this is TTS. i wore w high waisted jeans, but if they were lower, it wldve been almost a crop top. the colors are rather muted so they would go well w everything. back is super super cute. highly recommend this w some jeans!
I actually didn't wear this- not so flattering on busy ladies. It is also more pink in person than in pic
very cute top but was a tad snug across my chest. Was able to wear it but would have preferred a little more room around my rib cage but looked cute with jeans for a casual dinner out.
Straps were a bit loose, but overall very cute top!!
It has a weird sash tie in the back and I didn't love the color.

links_reviews_title: Runs extremely small. Very pretty colors and soft fabric
links_reviews_text: Extremely small. Could barely get it over my head and it was a large. Couldn't wear it.

links_reviews_title: Adorable, so many compliments on this top
links_reviews_text: Fits great, looks adorable with jeans great summery top

The straps were just too long for me (I'm small chested - the straps are adjustable, but were still too long for me on the shortest length). Fit great everywhere else & was very feminine. Didn't end up wearing since the straps would fall down with any slight move I made.

links_reviews_title: Just not a flattering top- too feminine for me.
links_reviews_text: never wore the top- too immature looking

Based on other reviews I ordered the small vs the extra small and the straps were way too long. I think this would have been a cute top in a smaller size but seriously my chest was busting out because the straps were too long. Would be cute with distressed denim in the right size:)
From the color to the fit, I enjoyed every minute of wearing this top. I rented it for a happy hour event, but was able to wear it at work all day as well.
Unflattering
na
I'm a 34B and wore a small. I was able to wear a strapless bra with it, but just had to wear it lower than normal. Very pretty for the summer season! I would rent again (or maybe even buy).
Such a cute top, but runs big. I'm 5'4, 127lbs, 34B and the small was definitely too big. Might order the XS to try because it is such a pretty top.

links_reviews_title: Rented a small, but the fit was off
links_reviews_text: Disappointed that I couldnt wear it because it was super cute. Hard to say if it runs small or large because it was tight in the waist/tummy but loose up top. I'm normally a small for tops. I was excited to see that there were adjustable straps but even at the tightest, they still fell off my shoulders. As others stated the inner lining is tight. This is probably better for tall/thin ladies especially if you have a long torso.

links_reviews_title: Such a cute top! Great for both day/night
links_reviews_text: Runs a little small - I ordered a S and I'm usually an XS

links_reviews_title: Perfect spring top - suggest no bra
links_reviews_text: This top was perfect for a weekend spring trip paired with high waisted jeans! It does cut low in the back, so unless you're going to wear a cute bralette I suggest going bra-less. Also, it does run slightly small so suggest sizing up!

links_reviews_title: Just a bit too tight around the bust for me.
links_reviews_text: Beautiful print and fabric, but the fit around the bust kept it from being casual with too much cleavage. I will order this again in a large.

Got this top to wear for Easter brunch and it was s hit. It was a little snug (but that could be because I just had a baby and am nursing), but it was still cute. Paired this girly top with boyfriend jeans for a cute look!
This is a cute, very flowy peach top. The middle is big, and doesn't show your shape very well.

links_reviews_title: Didn't wear it, great for the summertime, would rent again when its warmer!
links_reviews_text: Runs SMALL but is very flattering overall

The look was good but they kept falling down all day. I've found this to be the case with most non-maternity leather leggings too. Length was just slightly longer than I wanted them to be on me at 5'5".

links_reviews_title: Perfect pop of fun for maternity wear!
links_reviews_text: I wore these a ton and kept them for 3 months! I do recommend sizing up, especially if you are 3rd trimester. I wore these at the end of the first and well into the second. I wore them out to parties, as a fun piece for everyday, and everything in between. They don't have a ton of stretch due to the pleather. They are a bit low cut in the front, but I found that more comfortable once my bump expanded sufficiently.

links_reviews_title: I'm not pregnant but i wanted to wear the pants!!
links_reviews_text: The drop waist was weird but otherwise these are pretty versatile pants! I sized down cause they're maternity pants but i didnt need to.

links_reviews_title: Very low rise in front but over the booty back
links_reviews_text: I found that the back of this fit well, but it was entirely too low cut in the front for my comfort. I must not be pregnant enough to enjoy the benefits of having something come completely under my belly. The waistband is soft and comfortable. My partner thinks these are too sexy to wear during the day, but I liked them with oversized sweaters or tunics and a work jacket. Ankles not tight. Belt loops are there so maybe that will help keep these pants up--yup, found them sliding down a bit.
I really wanted to like this, but it is super tight so size up...still, a great summer outfit.
I absolutely love this dress. You can't see how gorgeous the color and detail are in pictures.
Gorgeous dress and great quality but unfortunately this wasn't flattering on my midsection. Didn't wear.

This dress is incredibly well made. The embroidery, fabric and the addition of lovely trim. Loved wearing it...have rented it multiple times and have worn it to grab some pizza, host a food event and tour Florence. Love it so much!

links_reviews_title: I have many compliment on dress. Nice material and embroidery color is really beautiful
links_reviews_text: Slightly tight around waist and hip area; especially around trims. Overall very comfortable

Rented this for my bridal shower as I wanted a not entirely white dress. The embroidery was beautiful, and it looked summery and fun while being a bit fancier than a sundress. I sized up because another Alexis rental ran small in the bust and that worked perfectly! Still couldn't wear a bra, but the dress is very supportive and structured.

links_reviews_title: Love it! What a fun dress. I feel very festive, funky, and sexy.
links_reviews_text: The fur is perfect and it is very flattering. I am very petite with 32DD up top, and the fit is truly amazing.
Lots of compliments. Very nice material. Was a little tight in the chest/rib cage but was wearable. I was worried it was going to be too short but I think it worked.

I love renting unique dresses- I can try them on and don't have to worry about repeating something that stands out so much! I got lots of compliments. Like other ladies said, it runs super small. I'm wearing an XL in the photo and I normally wear an 8-10/M. The dropped waist isn't the most flattering for wider bottoms, but the top had ample room for a larger chest. The embroidery and different textures are beautiful.
This dress was perfect for a derby party. It was comfortable and I received endless compliments. I would rent again next year!

The dress fit me perfectly! I usually teeter the line between a small and a medium, but I sized up and am glad that I did, because the dress was tight but not too tight. I got lots of compliments on it!

This dress is fun and beautiful. I am 5' 8.5 and it was not too short. ( i was worried about that) I got lots of compliments. I wore on vacation in Bahamas and even Easter Sunday. I wore 3 times. Loved it!

Fit true to size and is very figure flattering. Fit like a glove. I am a 34 in the bust and it fit snug when wearing a bra. Would not recommend a M if bust is bigger than 34D. Fit my waist perfectly as well and I typically measure around 28 in. I'm 5'1 and hit a few inches above my knee.
Loved this dress. One of my favorite rentals
It was perfect!
I knew the dress ran small so I sized up. I usually a size 8-10 and the XL was snug but I still got away with wearing it. The fabric has zero give. Would for sure rent again

I am a small to medium depending on the dress. This dress fit me perfect. I am 5'2" and about 130lbs. I have broad shoulders so I was afraid it wouldn't close but it was perfect. I wore it to a country music festival and I got compliments all night from complete strangers. I may rent this dress again.

This beautiful, romantic lace and appliqu√© dress was perfect for my Italian vacation, but it would be perfect for any formal event. It def skews summery with the white though, so maybe save it for warm weather destinations if renting in the winter. Fit true to size with a little room up top. Super comfortable, not too short, overall just a really pretty, fun party dress!

links_reviews_title: The dress that dreams are made of.
links_reviews_text: Loved this. Beautiful detail. A little snug at neck line but didn't notice it to much while wearing it. The lining makes it so you do not need a bra.
I love Alexis dresses because they truly are show stopping. The embroidery detail is gorgeous in this dress. I always have a tricky time with the zippers, thankfully my husband is a zipper expert!

links_reviews_title: This dress was so cute and fit so well, I wore it 3 times in one month!
links_reviews_text: Perfect length for summer. Material does not stretch and is form fitting, but very flattering. They did a great job designing this dress. It is a definite must for Summer!
I sooooo wanted to wear this dress! The fit was perfect, except that it was too short. I may try it another time in a larger size.

Alexis, you are my girl!! I love everything you make, and this dress is no exception. The colors are stunning, the skirt is so flattering, and the lace detailing is so unique. Perfect for my honeymoon to the Greek islands!

links_reviews_title: Short. Perfect for petite, small framed ladies!
links_reviews_text: My favorite rental so far! Will use it for my wedding dress shopping day! I am a petite, small framed, pear shaped lady and this dress was perfect on me. The fit felt custom made and tailored. Would buy it if I could. It is pretty short on me (5'3), it might be too short for a semi-formal affair, but I am wide on my derriere. Take a look at the fabric close up!

links_reviews_title: Beautiful colors and details, super flattering!!
links_reviews_text: This dress is absolutely beautiful, it is incredibly well made, the flower embroidery details are amazing. I wore it to a friends baby's christening and received compliments all day. As with a lot of other designer dresses I have rented, the fabric is very thick and the zipper a challenge to get past the lace details at the hem and waist. But, once on.... it is 1000% worth the struggle. It is tight on the chest and has zero give, I was not able to wear a bra, but did not need one. Highly recommended would love to rent again!!!

I love this edgy dress by Alexis! Running tight, I recommend sizing up. Running small with no stretch. It works best for A to C cup sizes. I really love the loose fabric on this dress and how it lightly touches your body. Pair with a cute heel and pretty bracelet!

links_reviews_title: SOOOOO PRETTY!!! Will RENT AGAIN and AGAIN
links_reviews_text: This dress is soooooo beautiful in person! The details are really neat and makes it so rich! I rented this as part of a 3 for 1 promotion for Memorial Weekend. I wasn't sure of my size so i figured i would get it then to test the sizing. I didn't have anywhere special to go that weekend so i decided to dress it down with flip flop and went to the movies. I will definitely rent again. It's a bit snug on the bust so i do not recommend any padded bra with this. But trust me it's one of those rental you won't regret if you get the right size. Will rent again and will dress up next time!!! (Don't mind the poor quality pic)
Alexis does not disappoint. Fits true to size and can be worn with a standard bra. Filmy comfy material. Would have loved this in XS so it was more fitted in the waist but it was not available.
The fit was perfect and the dress was easy to wear. It was flirty without being overly sexy - great for going out to dinner.

I loved this dress and almost purchased for myself. I can see renting again. There was a small stain which looked like they got mostly out on the bust. Not big enough to not wear but was a reason to now purchase from RTR.

I wore this dress for my college graduation and got lots of compliments. The bodice is tight...with no stretch...so it wasn't so comfortable after the graduation luncheon, but otherwise no complaints.

links_reviews_title: LOVED IT! Such a great dress, everyone loved it on me.
links_reviews_text: Fits very well, extremely flattering and comfortable.
Must rent!! It was beautiful
While it zipped the chest was a bit tight. Wore it but not the comfy. Lovely embroidery

links_reviews_title: Wore this for my bridal shower
links_reviews_text: It was very well made, it fit great, I got a lot of compliments and I did not need to wear a bra with it.
Fun and flirty

links_reviews_title: So adorable that even though it was too small, I'm ordering a size up so I can wear it!
links_reviews_text: I'm usually a size 2 or 4 and while I could zip this size small dress up to my waist, I couldn't get it past my rib cage. I'm a 34C, petite, 118 and the arm holes were too small. It is so cute though and I want to wear this dress so will order a size up. Loved the length but some may find it to short to wear.
Super beautiful, well-made dress. Unfortunately runs small and did not fit, so I didn't wear.
Dress is gorgeous with colors that pop. Sweet and comfortable. Usually wear XS but went up to a S. Will rent again!
Runs small.
Fit perfectly and was so comfortable. Fabric is very forgiving for a variety of shapes and sizes. Cute dressed down with a jean jacket and booties!
Rented for vacation to Hawaii to match the color to the hotel I stayed. Comfy and fitted well.
Though I needed the O / XS , I made the 2 regular work for my body . Wore this to an engagement party in the summertime. Material is very silky and comfortable.
I'm consistently a 6 but ordered a 4 based on reviews and it was great & still pretty spacious and flowy. I was so comfortable all night and it was great for dancing.
Loved this jumpsuit! So easy to wear and lightweight. Fits true to size. Wore while in Napa and received so many compliments. Highly recommend!

This jumpsuit fit great! I am 5'5 and it hit right at my ankle so I could still wear fun shoes that people would see. I'm definitely pear shaped and struggle with jumpsuits fitting my hips if they fit my chest. Though this was slightly big on the top, the tie waist, halter combo make it extremely forgiving. Lightweight material makes it perfect for summer. Super fun for a breast cancer awareness charity event! Was comfy all night long!
This jumpsuit is so flattering and easy to wear. Tons of compliments and very comfortable. The 2 was a little big, but because of the belt it worked out.

links_reviews_title: Compliments all night long, but sweaty gals beware!
links_reviews_text: This jumpsuit was a hit! I got compliments all night long. I was half vendor / half wedding guest for a family member's wedding day. I needed something I could move around in easily and film without worrying about any peek-a-boo's, and this jumpsuit was perfection. I also felt fancy enough to jump into family portraits after the ceremony without feeling frumpy. I have a long torso and typically have issues with jumpsuits but this one fit me perfectly. Gorgeous color and perfect for a semi-formal event. Only issue I had was that it shows literally any sweat / spills EXTREMELY obviously (they did dry after a bit, but still). Overall very pleased!
Perfect for brunch. Loved this. Needs the belt. Can wear a strapless bra with it. Sophisticated yet casual. Like you're not trying too hard. Will rent again. Good if you're tall or have a long torso.

links_reviews_title: Perfect weight material for spring in India
links_reviews_text: Beautiful color!

links_reviews_title: Adorable, great color, super comfy, so many compliments!
links_reviews_text: I rented this for Valentine's Day, and it exceeded my expectations. It fit perfectly, was easy to move in, had a great color and was very flattering. Would be great for spring and summer as well!

links_reviews_title: Fit nice. Was comfy and flattering.
links_reviews_text: Would wear again.
Cute comfy thin fabric.... sadly the belt was not sent.
I Loved this beautiful jumpsuit. It was one of my favorites. At 4'11" it goes all the way to the floor but I feel beautiful sexy and classic. I definitely will rent it again.
Will rent again for sure! Got it for vacation and was in love the instant I put it on. Feminine and sexy, while not being overly revealing. It was a great piece.
I love the color and feel of the fabric. It was a little long in the middle area.

Wore this for a friends wedding and received so many compliments. So fun and flirty, yet more conservative and elegant. My only cons are that it came incredibly wrinkled. The wrinkles did come out but the material is prone to wrinkling so I found by the time we got to the wedding there were already wrinkled developing again. Also, it does show undergarment lines rather easily. All in all, definitely worth it just may need to take some extra precautions like spanx or nubras! So much fun though- can't wait to rent it again!
This is one of my all time favorite pieces!!! Loved it!
Loved this rental. Fit well except the straps around the neck were tight.

I always receive compliments on my RTR items, but I received so many for this jumpsuit that it became a game between my husband and I. Seriously, every store I walked in! It fits true to size, if anything, maybe on the bigger side. It was very comfortable and I so badly want to keep it but I can't justify the price tag. Pick this one up, you won't be disappointed!
Did not wear this, too awkward. The fabric is lovely and the fit was fine. The color is more pepto pink than it appears in the photos. Rented for a rehearsal dinner but returned right away
Very cute but I could've worn a size 0, and didn't order that size so I had to return.
I love this jumpsuit. It is loose and flattering on the bottom, even for a pear shape. It was longer on me than intended, but worked just fine with heels.
The tie waist makes this really flattering. Nice enough to wear in a dressy setting. Wore this to our Junior League picnic and to church.
Cute color and ruffled bottom, but there is no shape to it. It is very loose and baggy/boxy. The tie around the waist just gathers everything in a really unflattering way. I didn't wear this one.
Very cute and comfortable- wrinkles easily though!

links_reviews_title: Perfect jumper for a daytime wedding! Received endless compliments, very flattering.
links_reviews_text: I'm fair skinned, somewhat curvy and tall, and I have always struggled with the fits of jumpers. This one was incredibly flattering, and I received compliments all evening. The only warning I would share is that it is a delicate silk, and every single thing marks this material. The condensation from my water glass left marks for hours. Other than that, it was a wonderful outfit! Loved loved loved it!
Arm holes big and fabric sheer see through In sun

links_reviews_title: A little long in the crotch area.
links_reviews_text: Fit good, belt helped

Fit is true to size and pretty color. Disappointing that it‚Äôs unlined and RTR sent without the belt so had no shape either. Rented for a tennis tournament but wrinkles so quickly I wouldn‚Äôt want to sit in it for more than a couple minutes. Will not wear, just returning.

links_reviews_title: Didn't wear it. Returned same day.
links_reviews_text: Not meant for girls with hips. Zipper won't unzip enough to get over my hips. Otherwise it would have been adorable on.

Yikes, the fit was wrong in every way. It was too large in the body but too tight around the hips/butt (there's an internal piece of fabric that covers your butt/hugs your hips and was way too tight on me. I assume this is meant to prevent your underwear from showing through the fabric). I tried turning the jumpsuit around, thinking I had it on backwards, but alas. I had high hopes for this one as I was meaning to bring it on vacation with me, but I just could not make it work. On the upside, I love the idea of this piece. The design looks great in the product pictures and on other girls. The fabric was also a luxurious, gorgeous pink/peachy silk.

links_reviews_title: I wore this to a rehearsal dinner.
links_reviews_text: It fit fine. The only real issue was that it wrinkled so quickly and terribly that I felt uncomfortable in it. It didn't look good.
I got a lot of compliments on this romper. It was great for a nice dinner out in warm weather.
Great outfit. Could wear a strapless with this. Thin material so much better for warmer weather

This jumpsuit is amazing! I was nervous about fit, but reviews said to size down and I'm so glad I did! I usually wear a 4-6 (more typically a 6) and the 4 fit perfectly. Beautiful color and fit is amazing, incredibly flattering! Debating purchasing this...

links_reviews_title: I wore this to work and going out with friends. It is a nice, feminine piece.
links_reviews_text: This jumpsuit is SO COMFORTABLE! The material is extremely light and flowy. I generally wear a 10, and the 8 fit well, even had a bit extra room. I'm 5'4, so the one piece generally is not proportioned well for me (torso on the suit is longer than my body size), but since this is loose and flouncy it didn't seem to be a bother.

This jumpsuit is a pretty color & fit. It wrinkled easily and the neck would tighten when sitting making it a little high maintenance. It looked pretty on and the fabric could be dressed up or down. The lining inside is either broken or just attached weirdly but it didn't show when wearing.
so pretty, color in pretty and bottom cuff has a nice detail. my only con is that it wrinkles so bad that it takes away from how nice the jumpsuit is

If this wasn't so expensive (even after the discount), I would have purchased it! Absolutely beautiful and really stood out! Very well made. I could have easily worn either a 0 or a 2. Note that the color is a little darker in person and a bit more of a rose than a blush. The color IRL is actually a lot prettier!

links_reviews_title: Super comfortable and looked nice all day. It was a 12 hour day and it never stretched out.
links_reviews_text: A little short in the stride but not terrible. Otherwise true to size.

links_reviews_title: Cute but not the best cut
links_reviews_text: Loved the color and style but the cut was a bit off. I did wear it a few times for evening events and to Vegas, got compliments. Liked not loved...
This romper was TTS and super cute- did not slip down at all throughout the evening. Very comfortable!

I loved this romper! I ordered up just because I wasn't sure on sizing and designer brands tend to run small. I was glad I did get XL instead of my usual L. I have a long torso and most rompers don't fit right either but this was great! Front design hides tummy bumps too! I considered buying this it was so cute! Lots of compliments as well.
I'm 5'3" and this is how it fits. It's great for summer night out in town!

Loved the color, more of a darker fuchsia pink. The fit of the S was perfect on me and I'm 5' 1". The XS was not as comfortable in the bottom area and I was going to be hanging out at the beach in this for dinner. I wore it with a strapless bra and sandals but you could dress it up with heels. The best part was the pockets! You could wear the "belt" part on the front or in the back. I tied it around the back part of my waist and loosened it up a bit after dinner, ha! It worked out. Recommend it and I would definitely rent it again.

links_reviews_title: Omg love this - should I keep or rent a thousand times over?

links_reviews_text: Very cute and fit nicely. I wore a bra with it.
Wasn't flattering or my style. Didn't wear, returned.

The way this romper is designed I feel like it would look great on any body type! Stretchy and comfy fabric and super sexy... Not a color I usually wear but got a million compliments so heck I might buy it...
Great romper and great color. I wore it to a bridal shower and it was a great fit. No need to wear a bra, there's support within the romper.

This romper is so comfortable and is a lovely color. It fits very well and is super flattering. I wore the belt tied in the back since my duster also had a belt. If your curvy, just beware that it does ride a bit.
I rented this for dinner and drinks while on vacation. It was form fitting on me, and if you have any junk in the trunk like I do be warned that it is short in the back so you may want to size up.

Y'all, I wanted to love this romper. I really truly did. All of your awesome pictures and reviews really pushed me to rent this... but seriously this just isn't working. The material is thick and comfortable, the design is super cute, and the color is so flattering. My torso isn't exceptionally long (really average, honestly), but this just is not acceptable for public or my own home. I'll just leave this here.

links_reviews_title: Fun and comfortable for a concert outing
links_reviews_text: Stayed put up top but -since I have a longer torso - appreciates that it was strapless. Great color! Interesting look!
Good fit. Felt a little short in the inseam. If I had a longer torso it wouldn't have fit. I wore a strapless bra but could have gone without.
I loved this romper. I'm smaller on top but a 10 on the bottom and it fit great. I was able to wear my strapless bra. If you have a larger bust this may not work well for you.

Everything about this romper is perfection and I wish I could afford to buy it!!! I got this for date night and as a trial run to order to take on my honeymoon in a few months, and I love it! My fianc√© loved it too!

Worn to my sons evening graduation. Romper was very comfortable and kept me cool in the extremely hot and humid weather. I absolutely loved wearing this. I received tons of stares and compliments. If I could find anything wrong, I would have to say that the shorts kept riding up every once in awhile. I would rent again. ;-).
Loved it. Felt great. Camouflaged my midsection well!

links_reviews_title: So cute! Great fit and easy to travel with!!
links_reviews_text: This literally fit me perfectly. It was so cute and did not wrinkled when I packed it for our honeymoon in a relatively small bag. I also did not have to wear a bra and there is no issue with underwear lines. I think this is a great piece to rent and to own. I may keep it next time around!

Super cute and comfy material, however not made for anyone with a long torso! Went out on a limb and chose a romper based on the reviews and was hoping this would be flattering. Not so much. No one likes camel toe!

links_reviews_title: Very cute but didn't wear. Ordered a 4 and I'm typically a 2 or 4, but ran very big.
links_reviews_text: Lots of material. Color was really pretty. Wish it worked.
Fit perfect
I loved this. Wore it without a bra. Super comfortable and cute. Would wear again!
I have rented this in red as well and loved both. Great fit. Can wear with sandals or dress it up with wedges or heels. So many compliments.
The top stayed where it needed to stay. There was not a single time that I had to pull the top back up! Fun to wear and enjoyed wearing this out for a date.
It is a cute romper that is very stretchy. But the torso was too short so it was pulling down on my chest and riding up in the crotch and butt. But the fabric is comfy
I didn't get a chance to wear this but definitely would have if we had one more night of vacation. Very girly and fun but comfy
Would size down if got again. It was super cute and great for daytime.

I rented this in the red color last month in a size Large, and it was WAY too big. The medium was slightly too small but it worked ok because it's got a little give. It runs VERYYYYYY short so be careful. I'm short waisted and I'm only 5ft, and I was tugging at the shorts all night. I'd probably rent again in a Large and make it work like I did with the red one.

links_reviews_title: Cute but not for tall girls
links_reviews_text: This falls into "that category" of rompers tall girls can't wear. On someone 5'7 or under I think it'd be cute but anyone any taller and you'll get a wedgie in all the wrong places.
Great color, got so many compliments all night.
Fit really well--I'm smaller in the busy and it was co fun but didn't feel like it would slip. The tie can be helpful to give the illusion of an even tinier waist. Perfect romper for vacation!
Received a lot of compliments. Shows some cellulite but still looked cute.

links_reviews_title: Great color for a CA vacation!
links_reviews_text: This style was so cute and it would have been perfect for wine tasting in Napa. Unfortunately the XS was too snug in the bust area and I couldn't zip it up, hence I was unable to wear this. The size S was out of stock, so I couldn't exchange either. I would say this might run slightly small, but I think it does depend on bust size.

Loved the color and style however, it was too short for the type of party I was going too. If my hips and butt were a tad bit narrower the shorts would have fit perfectly. They gathered a little in the front. Would have worn anyway had I been going to a different type of event. Sizing up to a large however would likely be too big.
Fit true to size, color was great & very comfy!
Fit perfect no wrinkles love it

I wore this dress to two different events in one weekend and it is a super comfortable dress. The buttons are placed so there is no peek a boo around the bust area. I liked that the buttons didn't go all the way to the bottom, too. It made it comfortable for crossing your legs. I wore flats to both events and I wasn't tripping over the bottom.
I really liked this dress. Fit well. Comfortable and put together. Plenty of compliments from complete strangers. Nice!

links_reviews_title: Cute dress! Runs large in waist
links_reviews_text: Super cute and comfortable. I had to belt because it was pretty large in the waist. Other than that loved it

links_reviews_title: Such a comfy, breezy summer maxi
links_reviews_text: Comfortable and a cute pattern. The fabric got a little wrinkled but the colors and material weren't terribly so I may be the only person that really noticed. It wasn't very fitted in the midsection which made it nice to hang out in but for a fancier look you may need to accesorize.

links_reviews_title: Floral Maxi Dress to the Max
links_reviews_text: I got a lot of compliments on this dress worn for a daytime summer wedding. It was light and comfortable. I have broad shoulders and a large bust, and it wasn't tight, and the buttons didn't gap. It runs a little large, and wasn't super shapely (but isn't that kind of the point of a maxi dress), but it was perfect for my occasion! I am 5'8" (with longer legs) and it hit the floor.

links_reviews_title: Easy to wear! Great day dress!
links_reviews_text: I loved this maxi dress by Draper James. The fabric was light and airy. The fit was perfect - true to size. Overall a great dress for work or weekend.
This dress is so lovely and fits like a glove. I would highly recommend this to anyone looking for a daytime or everyday dress.
Little large in the waist. Put a gold belt with it and was fine.

links_reviews_title: It has pockets and is very comfortable, but runs large.
links_reviews_text: Size down if you don't want to appear frumpy. It has some gathering in the waist/ribs, but it can still look like an unflattering straight dress if you don't size down. The color, the pockets, and the material make this a potential winner for weekend wear, but it can large.
Dress was too big & too long. I'm tall, 5'8, and it dragged on the floor. Might be work with casual/tall wedges but I was hoping to make it work with sneakers or flats.
I have a large chest and was pleased the buttons didn't gap

links_reviews_title: I love this dress. Nice and long for tall girls. I wore it with tall boots and it was so cute!
links_reviews_text: Form flattering. Forgiving on the hips and slimming. So comfy too.

links_reviews_title: the dress is really cute but it was huge
links_reviews_text: runs large
Loved this dress! So cute and so many complements! I'm very tall so it wasn't a full maxi on me but more of a cute midi which also worked well!
Love this dress. So effortless and so comfortable. The pockets are a huge plus!

Fit was great (although not particularly fitted around the midsection if that bothers you). At 6'0" it's rare for maxis to reach my ankle bone but this one did! I wore this for school open house and loved the pockets and that the dress never needed to be tugged, adjusted, or fixed. It just did its job!

It is a tad bit long. I am 5'8 and have to wear pretty sizable wedges but the fit is SO flattering and I get compliments every time I wear it (which has been many times). It really works for so many occasions but I mostly wear it on casual Fridays at the office. It is soft and thin and works well in hot weather.
My favorite combination is cute and comfortable. This dress is easy to wear, very versatile, and looks like more effort than it was. Want to buy!
Not as long as as I thought, but the waist was bigger than anticipated.

links_reviews_title: Nice dress for a hot day
links_reviews_text: Nice and long, even for someone who is 5'11". I liked the fabric, light and airy for a hot day. It was a little big on me but perhaps if I had cinched the waist with a skinny belt it may have helped the fit.

links_reviews_title: This dress was very comfortable and flowy! And it has pockets!
links_reviews_text: It was a little long on me with sandals on, because I am 5'4.

links_reviews_title: I am in love with this dress. It's classy but oddly so comfortable - and it has pockets!!
links_reviews_text: I am busty but this is the first button dress that doesn't pull at the closure. The fitted part hits perfectly at the rib cage area. Great length and the buttons stop at the perfect spot so it is not restricting to walk or get in and out of the car like some maxi dresses are. Love it! The material is so soft too.
I had high hopes for this dress because I thought the print was super cute. But when I put it on, I was not impressed. I thought the cut made the dress a bit dowdy.
I loved everything about this dress. Perfect for summer and very flattering
Not a lot of pizzazz but an overall pretty and easy to wear dress. Good for every day wear with a bit more style than pants and top.

links_reviews_title: Loved it! Was worried it would be too casual for the wedding I was attending but it worked!
links_reviews_text: Very comfortable and flattering.

links_reviews_title: Pretty dress but ran big / long
links_reviews_text: I usually am a pretty consistent 6 or M in Draper James, but this is the first time one of their pieces ran large for me. And not only large, but LONG. I could've definitely gotten away with wearing a S. Still it was a pretty dress and the length was such that I could still wear it, just had to be a bit careful. Very comfy too.
I loved this dress but would flag that it is super long ‚Äî at 5'8" I was almost dragging it on the ground in flats, so plan on wearing heels.
this worked great to transition from day to night, it kind of is awkwardly long. but was lovely with fit and didn't have gapping in the chest.

links_reviews_title: This dress is super cute and you can event spin it 50's vibe. Great for work or weekend.
links_reviews_text: Super comfy fabric, just expected to be more finished for the value. However lightweight and breezy for early summer.
The size was too big for me, I should have gotten a smaller size. It is very pretty and great quality. I would definitely wear it if I got the right size.

links_reviews_title: I did not wear this dress. The fit of the dress was great, but it was WAY to long.
links_reviews_text: The fit of the dress was perfect, but it was ENTIRELY too long. I am 5'5 and with heels on at least 3 inches of fabric was still draping on the floor. It's a shame, cute dress.
Didn't wear because it is very long.
I am busty and this fur perfectly and fell lightly over my hips and camouflaged my tummy. Nice swing to it. Very flattering for curvy girls.

links_reviews_title: Feminine and very well made. Sort of wish the waist had been a little more fitted but still pretty.
links_reviews_text: See above.

This dress fits perfectly. It has stretch and accentuates all the right curves. I wore it for Valentine's Day for drinks, dinner, and then to the ballet. I got a ton of compliments. It dresses up nicely but it super easy and comfortable to wear. Michelle Jolene 40yearflip.com

This particular dress was waaaaaay stretched out but still loved it. This designer is supposed to hug your body and no spanx needed. Plenty of stretch in the fabric, thick scuba like material, but not cheap feeling or looking at all. Super gorgeous. Love!!

The material is dressy - a little too dressy for a standard date or restaurant - but perfect for a summer or vacation event/party. Fits great and is flattering, as are other dresses by this designer. The color and pattern is eye catching and different. A bra with straps is possible but the edges might show in the slit a little bit.

links_reviews_title: Best friend wedding worthy for sure!
links_reviews_text: Fit like a glove and I felt beautiful and special! Only con is I couldn't find a dress that works with this cut so I ended up using booby tape to hold my boobs up which was a tad uncomfortable (but worth it for the added cleavage).
Perfect for this cocktail resort event. I loved the off the shoulder and neckline. I could have sized up, but for one night it was perfect.

Dress is very figure flattering, the dress was weird in the front and I'm not fully certain that it wasn't ripped in one spot (the flap in the front had made the gathering to the side fall funny). I ultimately decided to go with a different RTR dress, but this was absolutely beautiful in person. The material was soft!

links_reviews_title: Fit well like a glove. Easy to pack
links_reviews_text: I rented this for a private dinner at a Napa winery. It traveled well in my cramped luggage. No ironing needed. On the downside it was a little worn out and missing a stitch on the side flaps which no one notice ... all eyes are on the cleavage. Colorful in photos. Definitely will stand out.
This is a beautiful, comfortable, and flattering dress! I danced for hours in it. I'd love to own this dress.

Got a lot of attention in this dress. Rented for a summer wedding & enjoyed the bright, bold print. Looked nice against my summer tan. The neoprene-like fabric and ruching-type style help to mask imperfections. The cut out detail is quite revealing, especially if you have a large chest..so be prepared. I paired with champagne, chunky heeled sandals & dainty gold jewelry.

This fabric is so soft and has a perfect amount of stretch. The fit is perfect. It fits to your curves and has a fabric overlay that hides any imperfections. No spanx necessary. I highly recommend this beautiful dress. The color/pattern and fit is a real head turner.
Dress has nice stretch (make sure you step in) and was super comfortable for 2 summer weddings!
Fun fit.

This dress was a backup, but I'm so glad I wore it! I was nervous about it but it looked so good on others so I went for it. I think it looked great on my curves and since I have a smaller bust I did have to be really mindful about my posture - otherwise I felt like I was flashing people. It was an awesome dress to wear as a bridesmaid for the rehearsal dinner and I got lots of compliments!
Fit perfectly although I didn't think it was the most flattering dress for larger girls, definitely shows all. Loved the colors and cut out.
Easy fit
Fits just perfect around my curves. Wore this for NYE party. I love every dress from Chiara Boni.
Sex appeal without being over the top. Comfortable to wear and hides imperfections. Runs about 1 size large, so suggest ordering down a size.
I love this designer- holds in all the right places and the curves are accentuated! I wish I owned this dress!!

links_reviews_title: The perfect dress for a fun evening!
links_reviews_text: Wore this dress to an evening wedding. Sophisticated and fun dress. Love the neckline. It‚Äôs true to size. Loved the weight and strength of the fabric. Great to dance in.
Fit was great. Flattering style. Great coverage if you're busty. This designer is amazing.

links_reviews_title: AMAZING dress! Endless compliments and did not want to return it! Beautiful for a wedding.
links_reviews_text: Fit perfectly, I wear a L/XL and wore a 50. It is extremely comfortable and has a good amount of stretch. Great for dancing and partying. I will order this again.
Fabulous!!! Best RTR dress bc so comfortable, and easy to put on. No zippers! Felt sexy! Wish this brand had more prints and not all just solid colors!
This is a really beautiful, bright dress. It fit great but could have used a little more hold around the mid section. Still really pretty!
Could've gone down a size, but it still worked. Wore it to church while visiting family. Was very comfortable & pretty. Wore nude shoe & felt put together.
The material is super silky and it has a nice amount of stretch - it fit awesome and the neckline perfectly highlights your collar bone, so classy and sexy!
I felt great in the dress! Loved it
This dress is a knockout! It's so comfortable and flattering! I would buy this dress. I'm 5'8 and 138 pounds and wore a 42. The 40 also fit but the 42 wasn't as snug.

I had rented 42 last time, it was slightly loose, this time i got 40- it was perfect, i was thinking to buy it out with discount offered now, I still might.- its beautiful stretch fabric with very interesting print, its soft & hugs in right places, with nice pick-boo cut on the chest, it doesn't wrinkles!

The dress is even more stunning than pictures. The material is not heavy & very forgiving! The wedding was outside in 95 degree humid weather. It work well for women with curves! it hugs every curve! was a perfect dress! I could have worn the 42 but opted for a lil more room to be comfy & wore the 44 .
This was a beautiful dress and fit like a glove. Definitely would rent again.
Fit was slightly big. Very stretchy so could order a size down. Did not wear it because I hated how casual it seemed for my occasion but would love it for like date night or less formal occasions

Wasn't too sure about the color of the dress but once it arrived it was perfect for an outdoor summer wedding. It surprisingly kept me cool enough in 92 degree weather. I got so many compliments. It was form fitting and had just a touch of sexiness to it.

links_reviews_title: Very comfy bit be prepared to show some cleavage even with a bra
links_reviews_text: I would give a 5 star but noticed there was a part that wasn't sewn on the gather part on the legs. I didn't take any full pics of myself. Duh have to do that next time. I am 5'5" 125 lbs with 32E.

Dress is super comfortable! Just wish it had a little more structure. Even with spanx, I felt like my belly was not held in enough. I like dresses with more boning or stiffness so I dont have to work as hard at keeping my tummy in. ;)

links_reviews_title: Fun, flirty, and classy dress! Perfect for a summer wedding.
links_reviews_text: This dress is gorgeous and I felt so comfortable in it! Very flattering and forgiving. I typically avoid super-fitted dresses because they don't always look great on my mid-section, but the ruching and flaps totally hid that "problem area"! The material is thick, stretchy, and somewhat "scuba-like" as others have mentioned. The slit at the top was a fun and sexy detail, while still remaining somewhat modest and not showing too much. I loved the off-the-shoulder look as well. I was a little worried about the length being at that awkward mid length, but it was perfect. I would definitely rent this dress again!
This was sent to me because the dress I ordered was unable to ship and I loved it! I got so many compliments all night on it and the best part was that it was super comfortable!

links_reviews_title: Sorry no better picture - but you can see relative size
links_reviews_text: Earrings are springy and pretty - gold and cream and are not heavy
Wore it to the horse races. This dress is classy and fun. I would totally rent (buy) this dress!

I wore this to a bridal shower. I loved the fit of this dress -- Very forgiving and comfortable. Watch the neckline if you are busty, as it can slip a little showing more cleavage than you perhaps intended. I love this brand and have never been disappointed.
The dress was really comfortable, and I love that its not crazy short. Its so hard to find a nice mid length dress that still looks sexy.
Absolutely loved this dress! Fit like a glove!

links_reviews_title: Loved this dress!! So many compliments, and fit was amazing!
links_reviews_text: For my first rent the runway dress this did not disappoint! Wore this for a charity fashion show and it was unique enough to stand out!

links_reviews_title: This dress fit perfectly and was one of my favorites!
links_reviews_text: This dress fit me so well and was great with a strapless bra! The colorblocking was gorgeous and I wish I owned it!
Really loved this Nicole Miler dress. Super flattering but definitely not something you'd want to wear you don't want to draw a lot of attention!

This dress was a favorite! Very bright and fun, but classy enough for a nice dinner before a night out. The fit is slightly small so if you want it looser in the midsection order up, otherwise the fabric has some stretch and is easy to wear. Straps are adjustable. Another one that received tons of compliments.
I love the fit and the bright colors! Added bonus: love that I could adjust the straps since I have a shorter torso. Loved this dress!

links_reviews_title: Colorblocking in all the right places.
links_reviews_text: Figure flattering. Just enough stretch. Hemline perfect for petites.
This was an option sent from RTR due to multiple errors with my original order. While this isn't my style, dress fit nicely. It was comfortable, had a modest neckline and was a comfortable length.
I rented this for a bachelorette party in Miami. It was the perfect dress & comfortable for hours! I got tons of compliments and felt amazing.

links_reviews_title: Sometimes you don't want to wear an LBD!
links_reviews_text: I rented for a friend's birthday out and about in LA, and I just wanted something a little different than the usual LBD for going out. I loved the colors and the color blocking. Great fit and material. I'm usually a 4, but sometimes a 6. I rented a 6 in this dress based on the other reviews, and it was pretty perfect.

This dress is one of my favorites that I have rented so far! It fit like a glove, the colors were fantastic, and I felt like a total rockstar! I almost didn't send it back! The straps were a little difficult to adjust, but once in place I didn't have any issues with that!

Wore this for an outdoor wedding & received so many compliments! The fit was perfect & wasn't too tight. Loved that the straps were adjustable. The colors on the dress really popped. Loved this dress!!

links_reviews_title: Fun Flirty Pink and Purple Dress!
links_reviews_text: This dress was super cute for a bachelorette party! It was different and got a lot of compliments :) for sizing, it was a little baggy in the waist area for me and I had to adjust the straps to the toughest possible. If I would have had time, would have considered sizing down. It still worked and was fun to wear for the night!

I didn't think this dress was particularly anything to write home about, but definitely did the job. I wore out to a club in Vegas and actually saw a girl wearing ther same rental!! Great quality fabric, colors as pictured. Definitely meant to be snug, but I don't think I would have sized up.
Fun and flirty dress! Perfect for a summer party. Highly recommend. True to size, plenty of compliments and felt very confident!
Awesome!!
Fits just as expected; the color is really bright & beautiful. Great way to stand out at a formal event!

links_reviews_title: The dress fit perfect! I wore this in the day time in NYC. I got lots of compliments!
links_reviews_text: It's true to size, I'm usually a 0-2 and I rented this in a 0 and I didn't need a back up. The dress doesn't really stretch and the slip underneath rises. However, its still not see through at the bottom once the slip is up.
The dress fit perfectly, was incredibly comfortable and received plenty of compliments. Everything you want in a dress!

links_reviews_title: Perfect for daytime movie premier. Love this dress.
links_reviews_text: Flattering, no-fuss easy to wear, quality material.

links_reviews_title: Cute but ended up not wearing
links_reviews_text: The size 6 was the right size for me but I ended up not wearing it. It fit perfectly in the chest and the backside but bunched a little in the middle so overall ended up going with something else.

links_reviews_title: I didn't end up wearing it because it was not very flattering
links_reviews_text: Fit was ok. A little awkward when on--not great for short girls

links_reviews_title: Cute dress, just not flattering on my body
links_reviews_text: again, cute dress. just not necessarily cut for my body
The polyester on this dress was a little too thick and not soft. I didn't like the way it felt. Other than that, it's an adequate dress.
Fit was good, true to size. Straps are adjustable. Was comfortable. Loved the fun colors.
Great fit
Gorgeous color and fit. Perfect for my birthday brunch.
Great dress but definitely unforgiving in the mid section if you have a tummy
Runs small
I love the colors but need to size up -- will try again in larger size!

links_reviews_title: I literally looked amazing, not being conceited or anything.
links_reviews_text: Very fitted, which I think most will prefer. If you want a looser fit, go a size up.
Nice stretch to the material

links_reviews_title: Loved this dress and got tons of compliments!!!
links_reviews_text: Fit was true to size, not too short, thick enough fabric for coverage.

links_reviews_title: Rented this for a residency graduation dinner.
links_reviews_text: Loved the fit and the lines of this dress. Only downside was I didn't love the the straps were so difficult to adjust.

links_reviews_title: Ultra Comfortable Day 3 Music Festival Dress
links_reviews_text: I sized up 2 sizes bc I was looking for a roomy comfortable dress. Super comfortable and breathable, sleeves were a little too short on my arms for my liking so kept my jacket on the whole time but otherwise it was a total hit!

Dress was cute. A bit tight around my rib cage and the plunge in the neckline was a bit deep and big for me since I'm petite. But overall looked cute and the length worked. I don't normally do animal print but I liked how this one was paired with some flowers. Material is pretty lightweight

Went to the store to find something for a rehearsal dinner and this dress caught my eye. Didn't try it on, but got a medium because I tend to range from XS-m, depending on the designer. Based on the fabric and cut, figured the medium would be safe... I am absolutely obsessed with this dress. Accentuates the curves in all the right places and have never felt sexier in a non-skin right dress. Would definitely rent again and/or buy.

links_reviews_title: This is a great dress. Love it!!
links_reviews_text: This is way more curve hugging than the picture seems. It's a knockout dress.

links_reviews_title: Fun dress to wear, nice material.
links_reviews_text: Black shirt underneath made slit ok for office.
Tight in the chest & not ideal for a windy day but an amazing dress to wear! Chic silky- felt like a classic movie

links_reviews_title: Beautiful print but have to consider where to wear it!
links_reviews_text: Rented this dress because the print was just so cool. Leopard and floral? I'm in! I did read reviews that said there was a slit in front and it was a little lower cut. I'm on the taller side - the skit basically went to right below my private's! Holy heck!! I didn't think the top was too low cut - it fit me well. I do have a smaller rib cage and this fit perfectly which to me means it might run small right under the bust area. But then the bottom was really flowy and a little A-line-esque. I wore it to see cirque du soleil on a rainy day in Southern California so thankfully I could wear it with tights and boots and a leather jacket since it is light material. I don't think I could have worn it on its own without tights. As it was I got several comments from my family members about how high the slit was! Glad I got to wear it once as it is beautiful but I won't be able to rent again.

links_reviews_title: Not safe for work. Because of the cleavage. Slit OK.
links_reviews_text: For shorter girls the slit is not a huge problem. It's really fine and just above the knee a little bit for shorter people like me. It's definitely not work appropriate. Definitely good for a party or fun brunch or dinner. If you have a larger cup you will definitely have a lot of cleavage. I don't really believe in wearing camisoles under things because I think if it's low-cut it's just supposed to be that way. I wore it without a bra because all of my bras showed a little bit otherwise.

The pattern is great, lots of compliments and it's a nice light flowy fabric. The lack of a liner did not bother me, the dress is not see thru on the bottom. I think this dress is best for someone a few inches taller as the chest area looked low/saggy on me.

Almost wore to a work party but was a little low cut and loose on top and would have needed to pin it, but I did wear with a black slip underneath to a beauty conference and then to a brunch and then to work. Fabric is thin but great quality, doesn't give much give.
Beautiful dress, but unlined, low cut, high slit. I wore a tank and boots to make it office appropriate.
Very thin, 100% silk, low cut, slit seemed reasonable to me but had to wear leggings underneath because I don't own a slip

Another amazing Saloni print, very fun take on leopard print that definitely popped. A few elements could have made it even better though. The dress is unlined so I paired with a black slip dress that helped it feel more appropriate and assisted with making the lowcut bodice more appropriate. The slit in the front came up pretty high, so taller ladies beware.

links_reviews_title: Didn't know about the high suit in front
links_reviews_text: Couldn't wear bc slit was ridiculous I didn't see it in the picture Beautiful dress though silky silky soft the Colors are vibrant Very flattering Fits true to size-

First, start by reading a SALONI size chart. Their dresses run a little small imho but fit exactly according to the chart. I wore this for work then a party after- it looked beautiful from dawn to dusk! I agree with other commenters- the neckline is very low. I wore a lace bralette that peeled out and it was fine. I am 5'2 and the slit was not an issue for me. This is lightweight but warm, cut like a dream. I immediately went online to hunt one down to buy!
Couldn't zip the dress over my ribcage. Size 2 was way too small. Not even sure the 4 would have zipped. I have other Saloni dresses and can wear a size 2 in those.

links_reviews_title: A nice alternative to the black cocktail dress for work to play transition
links_reviews_text: Dress was flattering and I loved the colour and prints. V-neck is a little low so wore with a camisole. Received a number of compliments at the office and was perfect to go straight to dinner and the opera on a weeknight.

links_reviews_title: patten was fun but I needed other items so I didn't wear it.
links_reviews_text: This was a great dress and I may order it again. I would wear it to work, but at the time I was headed to vacation so I needed the spot. I would order again.
NOT for large busted girls ;) The V is deep, and the front slit is also high (not shown in pic). Made it work as I had no backup for a dinner on vacation, but NOT work appropriate for me.

links_reviews_title: Silky and pretty piece... I wore mine with red strappy heels.
links_reviews_text: Had to iron the dress before I wore it. The red piping kept getting "lost in the shuffle" around my chest area, so to speak. Definitely need a cami (or a cute bra & some courage) to wear this out and about, as it's pretty revealing up top.

links_reviews_title: Love this dress, 2nd time I've rented.
links_reviews_text: Different style and colors then I would usually wear.
A little too low and the slit a little too high for work

Becoming style and gorgeous fabric. Top portion was large. Needed cami which was fine but junk it would have been better suited for someone with longer waist. Wore to a client cocktail reception and received compliments
I wore this dress more than any other dress I've rented. You can dress down with leather jacket and sandals or dress up with heels!
Light silk with a lovely pattern. Relaxed and summery
This dress is amazing. Sexy and cool but still with appropriate on my 5'3 frame as the slit didn't come to high on me. Amazing print.
I got so many compliments on this dress.
Great colors, fairly low cut and fairly high slit so I would recommend for night/party/weekend.

links_reviews_title: Runs a little small so if you are in between sizes, size up!!
links_reviews_text: I couldn't get the zipper up but I have a pretty broad back and run into this problem frequently. But even if it did, the colors were not that flattering on me so I probably wouldn't have worn it anyway
Beautiful dress but it was not appropriate for my height/size. Neckline plunged way too low and there was bunching on the top. I think my torso was just too short for it.

Fit was good with the exception of the breast area. It appeared to be made for large cup size than my 34B and gathered at the top. The front split is very high making it risky for conservative work environment

I find Saloni is always a little odd of a fit but this was especially weird. I'm generally a true 0, albeit wider in the shoulders. This was huge and too long on the bottom, and like an extra extra extra small on the top. I'd say this would work for someone extremely slim on the top with wider hips, who is pretty tall. Not a great "petite" fit at all.
Loved the dress. The material is a little too thin for my liking.

links_reviews_title: SHEER - warning - it's sheer. But god, is this lovely.
links_reviews_text: Like everyone else who has rented this, this dress is beautiful. But, I'm going to have to think about how to actually wear it out of the house. It is low-cut, so if you're going to work, you'll want to tank it. But it's also sheer throughout the skirt -- so, leggings are a must.

links_reviews_title: Beautiful silky fabric, well made and nicely cut. In the drear winter, I felt it was cheerful!
links_reviews_text: I felt it ran small in the top. I got a small and am really an xs-s. It's different and fun. Enjoyed wearing bright colors in the dead of winter.

This almost fit, but it was a bit too tight. The material also has a tendency to cling, especially in the winter. I might size up and try this again in the spring. The print is really beautiful, and I was disappointed that it didn't fit.

links_reviews_title: Beware of the long front slit
links_reviews_text: I am chesty, 36 D, and the fit in the top was not good for me; in hips and waist the fit was fine. I rented this dress because of the vibrant colors, and it was different than anything else I had in my closet. The colors are unique, and it is a gorgeous dress. The slit is way too high to wear to work, coming up to mid thigh, so the dress is really not practical for day wear. The fabric is extremely light weight, so doesn't drape as well as it looks in the photos.

links_reviews_title: Low cut, high slit in front
links_reviews_text: The fabric, colors and flow were beautiful. The dress is very thin and required a slip. The front is so low it took two safety pins to get it to a spot that was acceptable. The slit up the front came about an inch above my knees and I'm short. If you are tall it will be a VERY high slit.
I didn't end up wearing this dress. The fabric was much thinner than I had anticipated and I didn't love the overall fit or style. It looked more matronly than in the photos.

links_reviews_title: Way too high of a slit
links_reviews_text: This dress runs small, especially across the chest but the main reason I was not able to wear it was that it has an opening right in the center of the dress from the hem to the upper thigh. Even with opaque tights I didn't feel I could wear this and not feel like I was flashing everyone. I am really not sure who would wear this dress is very poorly designed with this very long slit.
I loved this dress! The print is just stunning and the popover is so fun.

I tried on the size 14 fit but felt it might be to tight for the whole night so chose to wear the 16 to feel more comfortable. Also, definitely needed help with the zipper. Overall loved the dress. Received a ton of complements.

Wore this to an October wedding and received so many compliments! True to size - the material was stretchy and comfortable and the perfect length. The dress is slightly darker than the picture on the model. Great rental!

links_reviews_title: Gorgeous fit! Made me feel beautiful!
links_reviews_text: Fit perfectly, so comfortable! Perfect for a wedding!

The size 2 was a tiny bit snug so I opted for the 4. It fit most of me perfectly but I'm fairly small chested and the top was a bit loose. I was yanking it up every now and then to make sure I didn't lose it. I loved the dress though and wish I owned it!

I loved the print and fit of this dress and would wear again. It's tight fitting but the pattern is more forgiving than solid colors and the material is structured yet comfortable. Fun and easy to dance in. Would recommend.
Love this dress! It was so comfy and really easy to move in. The top fit me a little big but I went bra-less and still didn't feel like I had to pull it up all night.

links_reviews_title: Great dress for a summer wedding! So many compliments!
links_reviews_text: This dress was perfect for a late summer wedding. Aside from the endless compliments, the dress was comfortably form fitting and easy to dance in. I usually wear a size 6, but because I have a smaller bust, I sized down. The material has a slight stretch and was very comfortable to wear for the night. 10/10 would recommend!

links_reviews_title: Fits like a glove. Stretchy, too. Which makes in a little more comfortable. Lots of compliments.
links_reviews_text: High quality. Hugs the curves, so I wore Spanx to suck in my hips a little. I didn't need to wear a bra.

links_reviews_title: I felt confident and sexy the entire night. The only part I hate is I can‚Äôt keep her for forever :(
links_reviews_text: It fit like a dream. I have a large bust so strapless is scary but it fit perfectly. The fabric was forgiving and cool for a hot summer night.

I was very nervous about size, so I got a 20. It was definitely too big. But I safety pinned it to make it work. Other than that it was BEAUTIFUL. The flap on the front and back are so flattering and the pattern is Gorgeous
Fit like a glove - literally- over my 25-week bump. I needed help zipping it and it did get uncomfortable towards the end of the night but was perfect for dinner and mocktails on vacation in HI.
Can never go wrong with a Badgley Mischka. Such a cheerful pattern. No issues with top moving around or sliding down. Not binding either. I'm 5'4" 117 pounds.

There is boning in the dress that felt just flat out over worked. It didn't lay flat and was digging into my rib cage. However, due to how loose it is up top, it didn't bother me that much when standing or dancing. Only when sitting, the boning was a problem. Otherwise, loved the dress. Fabric was great, print was perfect. Extremely loose up top - even with undergarment, was still pulling the top of the dress up. Bottom half fit fine.

links_reviews_title: Fun colors and easy to wear!
links_reviews_text: Great dress, really stands out, great colors and thick enough to cover anything that might need covering. Thought it fit perfect to size.
Fit was perfect, felt like it hugged in all the right places. Wore for a rehearsal dinner.

The dress ran true to size. After reading some reviews, I did a size larger in the back-up but didn't end up using it. I will say that the bust runs a little large and although there is boning, I found wearing a strapless bra helped to fill it out (which I wasn't expecting!). It was perfect for a summer wedding, though!

This dress is very flattering and easy to wear! I wore to a mid summer south beach wedding and it was a perfect mix of class and sass ;-) for a mother of 2 with lumps and such it was a great flattering fit!
I loved this dress. I will definitely rent it again!!
This was my first rental experience! Sadly, RTR didn't have the size I needed so I had to go bigger. I would have liked a 10 or 12. It looked so much better with heels but they broke! So cute!!

I'm 4.5 months postpartum. I am about 170 right now and I am breastfeeding, so my boobs are larger. This dress was forgiving of my postpartum bod. The top was big, though. I thought my breastfeeding boobs would fill it out but they did not. I spent the whole night hiking up the dress. I got lots of compliments, though!

Would have give this rental 5 stars but the boning in the back of the dress rubbed on the top of my hips leaving some marks. Aside from that, I absolutely loved the colors in this dress, it is even better in person! The material also had a nice stretch to it. The perfect rental if you're a guest at a summer wedding!

I absolutely loved this dress! The print is so cute and the material is great. I am 5'9" and the dress came right above my knees. The top stayed up pretty well too, which is always a plus with a strapless dress. Highly recommend!

I was a little daring and rented a dress I would typically never wear, and I'm really glad I did! Let me start by saying the dress is intended to be tight. My normal size (12) was tight all over, but very tight on my chest. Also,I'm self conscious about my belly area and the dress is not forgiving there. I ended up sizing up for a looser fit/look. If you don't want a tight fit, I would suggest doing that. The only thing I didn't love about the dress was the boning in the top that would poke me in the back. Nothing that would deter me away from renting this style again though!

I probably should have sized up, but I kept the 8 in hopes of having a "skinny day" when I needed to wear it. Well, I didn't have a skinny day and definitely felt like it was too snug in the stomach area. I would rent again in an 8 if I lost a few lbs or probably size up to be more comfortable. Overall lots of compliments!

links_reviews_title: I rented this dress for a summer wedding and loved it!
links_reviews_text: The fit was perfect, hugged all the right places and was very flattering despite being a new mom and the body changes coming with that. Some people said the bust was big, but I didn‚Äôt find that.
I did have yo size down, but the dress fit well and had a little give in it so it was easy to sit in and dance in, too! The colors are gorgeous. I got so many compliments!
really comfortable, felt good just a bit long

I ordered the 18 and 20. 20 was way too big for me, the 18 fit perfect!! Snug in the bust as to not fall down and accents curves without being constricting. Stretch in the dress , super bright and bold floral pattern. Can't wait to rent from Rent the Runway again!!

It's a very pretty dress that fits well, fabric was good, but I thought the pattern & fit accentuated my pooch, and it's all I can see in photos (I posted the only photo I liked). I was self conscious all night. If you're like me and hate that area, then don't rent this dress.

links_reviews_title: Dress it up or dress it down but DON'T FORGET A SLIP.
links_reviews_text: The dress is beautiful, true to size but the underwire/ribbing at the bust line DIGS into your skin. If you don't wear a slip it will definitely keep you adjusting. I wore a slip and was still adjusting. But you gotta do what you gotta do to make it work because it's just so cute ! I dressed mine down and wore it for a BBQ outside with cute sandals. But could have easily dressed it up as well. BIGGER BUSTED GALS size up or go braless. The slit in the back also comes up a little high. Nothing crazy but if you're not careful you may show a little much.

links_reviews_title: Fun and Flirty Dress - a must rent!
links_reviews_text: I rented this dress for a rehearsal dinner in Florida. It fit extremely well, and gave me some nice curves! The length is classy and the strapless makes it sexy. Loved the floral print! Would definitely rent again!
Super cute & bright; received lots of compliments. I had fun wearing it for my 28th birthday & paired it with a Samantha Sipos jacket also available on here. If you're curvy, size up!
Love love love. Fit great and looked great. Compliments all night

links_reviews_title: Made me feel special on my birthday in Florida.
links_reviews_text: It was comfortable.

links_reviews_title: Super comfy and pop of color
links_reviews_text: I wore this to my sisters rehearsal dinner. It was so pretty and the fabric like sucks you in. I usually don't wear strapless but i liked the way this one laid totally different than the traditional strapless. I got so many compliments and the colors and print was so beautiful!

I love this feminine dress by Badgley Mischka! Running true to size a little stretch, I recommend wearing your true size for your primary size and sizing up for the back up. This style is fitted throughout the midsection hips. It works for all cup sizes and works best with a strapless bra. At 5'3', the length hit mid thigh on me. I love the colors and silhouette of this dress! Pair with nude heels to complete your outfit!
Such a fun rental, received so many compliments! I usually hate and don't wear form fitting things and this one was perfect! Perfect transition piece also
The thick material was stretchy and super flattering. I definitely think it runs true to size.
RTR sent me this dress after my original order got cancelled and I'm so glad they did. It was beautiful and I got so many compliments all night. I would 100% rent it again!
